 nirvācya avidyā dvitaya sacivasya prabhavataḥ  vivartā yasya ete viyat anila tejaḥ  abavanayaḥ yatas ca abhūt viśvam caramacaram uccāvacam idam namāmastahbrahma aparimita sukha jñānam amṛtam niḥśvasitam asya vedā vīkṣitam etasya pañca bhūtāni smitam etasya carācaram asya ca suptam mahāpralayaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ upetāya vividhaiḥ avyayaiḥ api śāśvatāya namaskurmaḥ  vedāya ca bhavāya ca mārtaṇḍa tilaka svāmi mahāgaṇapatīn vayam viśva vandyāt namasyāmaḥ sarva siddhi vidhāyinaḥ brahmasūtra kṛte tasmai vyāsāya apara vedhase jñānaśakti avatārāya namaḥ  bhagavataḥ  hareḥ natvā viśuddha vijñānam śaṅkaram karuṇā nidhim bhāṣyam prasanna gambhīram tad praṇītam vibhajyate ācārya kṛti niveśanam api avadhūtam vacaḥ  asmad ādīnām rathyā udakam iva gaṅgā pravāha pātaḥ pavitrayati atha yad asaṃdigdham apiḥ ayojanam ca na tad prekṣāvat pratipitsā gocaraḥ yathā sa manaska indriya saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ sphīta āloka madhya vartī ghaṭaḥ karaṭa dantā vā tathā ca idam brabma iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ tathā hi bṛhat tvāt bṛṃhaṇa tvāt vātmā eva brahma iti gīyate sa ca ayam ākīṭa pataṅgebhya ā ca devaṛṣibhyaḥ prāṇa bhṛt mātrasyet aṅkāra āspadebhyaḥ  deha indriya manaḥ buddhi viṣayebhyaḥ  vivekena aaham iti asaṃdigdha aviparyasta aparokṣa anubhava siddha  iti na jijñāsāra padam na hi jātu kaścid atra saṃdigdhe aaham vā na aham vā iti na ca viparyasyati anāham eva iti na ca aaham kṛśaḥ sthūlaḥ gacchāmi ityādi deha dharma sāmānādhikaraṇya darśanāt deha ālamnaḥ  ayam ahaṅkāra iti sāṃpratam tad ālambana tve hi ayaḥ  aham bālye pitarau  anvabhūvam sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝn anubhavāmi iti pratisaṃdhānam na bhavet  na hi bāla sthavirayoḥ śarīrayoḥ asti manāk api pratyabhijñāna gandhaḥ  yena ekatvam adhyavasīyeta tasmāt yeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yad anuvartate tad tebhyaḥ  bhinnam yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtram tathā ca bāla ādi śarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣu api parasparam ahaṅkāra āspadam anuvartamānam tebhyaḥ  bhidyate api ca svapna ante divyam śarīra bhedam āsthāya tad ucitān bhogān bhuñjāna eva pratibuddhaḥ  manuṣya śarīram ātmānam paśyan anāham devaḥ  manuṣya eva iti devaṣa śarīre bādhyamāne api aham āspadam bādhyamānam śarīrāt bhinnam pratipadyate api ca yoga vyāghraḥ śarīra bhede api ātmānam abhinnam anubhavati iti na ahaṅkāra ālambanam dehaḥ ata eva na indriyāṇi api asya ālambanam indriya bhede api ayaḥ  aham adrākṣam sa eva etarhi spṛśāmi iti aham ā lambanasya pratyabhijñānāt  viṣayebhyaḥ tu asya vivekaḥ sthavīyān eva buddhi manasoḥ ca karaṇayoḥ aaham iti kartṛ pratibhāsa prakhyānālambanatva ayogaḥ akṛśaḥ  aham aandhaḥ  aham ityādayaḥ tu prayogā asati api abhede kathañcid  amañcāḥ krośanti ityādivat aupacārikā iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ tasmāt idaṅkāra āspadebhyaḥ  deha indriya manaḥ buddhi viṣayebhyaḥ  vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāham anubhava gamya ātmā saṃśaya abhāvāt ajijñāsya iti siddham aprayojana tvāt ca tathā hi saṃsāra nivṛttiḥ apavarga iha prayojanam vivakṣitam saṃsāraḥ ca ātma yāthātmyān anubhava nimitta ātmayāthātmya jñānena nivartanīyaḥ sa ced ayama nādiḥ anādinā ātmayāthātmya jñānena saha anuvartate kutaḥ asya nivṛttiḥ avirodhāt  ḷ kutas ca ātmayāthātmyān anubhavaḥ ḷ na hi aaham iti anubhavāt anyat ātma yāthātmya jñānam asti na ca aaham iti sarva janīna sphuṭatara anubhava samarthita ātmā deha indriya ādi vyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadām sahasraiḥ api anyathayitum anubhava virodhāt  na hi āgamāḥ sahasram api ghaṭam paṭayitum īśate tasmāt anubhava virodhāt upacarita arthā eva upaniṣada iti yuktam utpaśyāma iti āśa yavān āśaṅkya pariharati yuṣmad asmad pratyaya gocarayoḥ iti atra ca yuṣmad asmat  ityādiḥ mithyā iti bhavitum yuktam iti antar  śaṅkā granthaḥ tathā api ityādiḥ parihāra granthaḥ tathā api iti abhisaṃbandhāt śaṅkāyām yadi api iti paṭhitavyam idam asmad pratyaya gocarayoḥ iti vaktavye yuṣmad grahaṇam atyanta bheda upalakṣaṇa artham yathā hi ahaṅkāra pratiyogī tvaṅkāraḥ  na evam idaṅkāraḥ aete vayam ime vayam āsmahe iti bahulam prayoga darśanāt iti cit svabhāva ātmā viṣayī jaḍa svabhāvā buddhīndriya deha viṣayā viṣayāḥ ete hi cit ātmānam visinvanti avabadhnanti svena rūpeṇa nirūpaṇīyam kurvanti iti yāvat  para sparān adhyāsa hetau atyanta vailakṣaṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ tamaḥ prakāśavat  iti na hi jātu kaścid samudācārat vṛttinī prakāśa tamasī paraspara ātma tayā pratipattum arhati tad idam uktam itaretara bhāva anupapattau iti itaretara bhāvaḥ itaretara tvam tādātmyam iti yāvat  tasya anupapattau  iti syāt etad  mā bhūt dharmiṇoḥ paraspara bhāvaḥ tad dharmāṇām tu jāḍya caitanya nityatva anityatva ādīnām itaretara adhyāsaḥ  bhaviṣyati dṛśyate hi dharmiṇoḥ viveka grahaṇe api tad dharmāṇām adhyāsaḥ yathā kusumāt bhedena gṛhyamāṇe api sphaṭi ka maṇau  atisvaccha tayā japā kusuma pratibimba udgrāhiṇi aaruṇaḥ sphaṭikaḥ iti āruṇya vibhrama iti ata idam uktam tad dharmāṇām api iti itaretaratra dharmiṇi dharmāṇām bhāvaḥ vinimayaḥ tasya anupapattiḥ ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ rūpavat hi dravyam ati svaccha tayā rūpavataḥ  dravya antarasya tad vivekena gṛhyamāṇasya api cchāyām gṛhṇīyāt  cit ātmā tu nīrūpaḥ  viṣayī na viṣaya  chāyām udgrāhayitum arhati yathā āhuḥ aśabda gandha rasa ādīnām kīdṛśī pratibimba tā iti tad iha pāriśeṣyāt viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ anyonya ātma saṃbhedena eva tad dharmāṇām api paraspara saṃbhedena vinimaya ātmanā bhavitavyam tau ced dharmiṇau atyanta vivekena gṛhyamāṇau  asaṃbhinnau asaṃbhinnāḥ sutarām tayoḥ dharmāḥ sva āśrayābhyām vyavadhānena dūra apeta tvāt  tad idam uktam sutarām iti tad viparyayeṇa iti viṣaya viparyayeṇa iti arthaḥ mithyā śabdaḥ apahnava vacanaḥ etad uktam bhavati adhyāsaḥ  bheda agraheṇa vyāptaḥ tad viruddhaḥ ca iha asti bheda grahaḥ sa bheda agraham nivartayan  tad vyāptam adhyāsam api nivartayati iti mithyā iti bhavitum yuktam yadi api tathā api iti yojanā idam atra akūcam bhavet etad evam yadi aaham iti anubhave ātmata tvam prakāśeta na tu etad asti tath hi samasta upādhi anavacchinna ananta ānanda caitanya ekarasam udāsīnamkam advitīyam ātma tattvam śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu gīyate na ca etāni upakrama parāmarśa upasaṃhāraiḥ kriyā samabhihāreṇa īdṛś ātma tattvam abhidadhati tad parāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇa api upacarita arthāni kartum abhyāse hi bhūyas tvam arthasya bhavati yathā aahaḥ darśanīyā ahaḥ darśanīyā iti na alpa tvam api prāk eva upacarita tvam iti aham anubhavaḥ tu prādeśikam anekavidha śoka duḥkha ādi prapañca upaplutam ātmānam ādarśayan katham ātma tattva gocaraḥ katham vā an upaplavaḥ ḷ na ca jyeṣṭha pramāṇa pratyakṣa virodhāt āmnāyasya eva tad apekṣasya aprāmāṇyam upacarita artha tvam vā iti yuktam tasya apauruṣeya tayā nirasta samasta doṣa āśaṅkasya bodhaka tayā ca svatas siddha pramāṇa bhāvasya sva kārye pramitau  anapekṣa tvāt pramitau  anapekṣa tve api utpatau pratyakṣa apekṣa tvāt tad virodhāt anutpatti lakṣaṇam asya aprāmāṇyam iti ced  na utpādaka apratidvandvi tvāt  na hi āgama jñānam sāṃvyavahārikam pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam upahanti yena kāraṇa abhāvāt na bhavet  api tu tāttvikam na ca tāttvikam asya utpādakam atāttvika pramāṇa bhāvebhyaḥ  api sāṃvyavahārika pramāṇebhyaḥ tattva jñāna utpatti darśanāt tathā ca varṇe hrasvatva dīrgha tvāt ayaḥ  anya dharmā api samāropitāḥ tattva pratipatti hetavaḥ na hi laukikāḥ anāgaḥ iti vā nagaḥ iti vā padāt kuñcaram vā tarum vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ na ca ananya param vākyam sva artha upacarita artham yuktam uktam hi ana vidhau paraḥ śabda arthaḥ iti jyeṣṭha tvam ca anapekṣitasya bādhya tve hetuḥ na tu bādhaka tve rajata jñānasya jyāyasaḥ śukti jñānena kanīyasā bādha darśanāt  tad am apa bādhane tad apabādha ātmanaḥ tasya utpatteḥ anupapatteḥ darśitam ca tāttvika pramāṇa bhāvasya anapekṣita tvam tathā ca pāramarṣam sūtram apaurvā aparye pūrva daurbalyam prakṛtivat iti tathā ca pūrvāt para balīyaḥ tvam tatra nāma pratīyatām anyonya nirapekṣāṇām yatra janma dhiyām bhavet  iti api ca ye api ahaṅkāra āspadam ātmānam āsthiṣata taiḥ api asya na tāttvika tvam abhyupetavyam aaham iha eva asmi sadane jānānaḥ iti sarva vyāpinaḥ prādeśika tvena grahaṇāt  uccatara giri śikhara vartiṣu mahātaruṣu bhūmiṣṭhasya dūrvā pravāla nirbhāsa pratyayavat  na ca idam dehasya prādeśika tvam anubhūyate na tu ātmana iti sāṃpratam na hi tadā evam bhavati aaham iti gauṇa tve vā na ajānānaḥ iti api ca para śabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇa guṇa yogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛ pratipattroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ sa ca bheda pratyaya puraḥsaraḥ tad yathā naiyamika agnihotra vacane agnihotra śabdaḥ prakaraṇa antara avadhṛta bhede kuṇḍapāyinām ayana gate karmaṇi amāsamagmi hotram juhoti iti atra sādhya sādṛśyena gauṇaḥ māṇavake ca anubhava siddha bhede siṃhāt siṃha śabdaḥ na tu ahaṅkārasya mukhyor athaḥ nirluṭhita garbha tayā deha ādibhyaḥ  bhinnaḥ anubhūyate yena para śabdaḥ śarīra ādau gauṇaḥ  bhavet  na ca atyanta nirūṭha tayā gauṇe api na gauṇatva abhimānaḥ sārṣapa ādiṣu taila śabdavat iti veditavyam tatra api snehāt tila bhavāt bhede siddha eva sārṣapa ādīnām taila śabda vācyatva abhimānaḥ na tu arthayoḥ taila sārṣapayoḥ abheda adhyavasāyaḥ tad siddham gauṇa tvam ubhaya darśinaḥ gauṇa mukhya viveka vijñānena vyāptam tad iha vyāpakam viveka vijñānam nivartamānam gauṇa tām api nivartayati iti na ca bāla sthavira śarīra bhede api asaḥ  aham iti ekasya ātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhāna deha ādibhyaḥ  bhedena asti ātma anubhava iti vācyam parīkṣakāṇām khalu iyam kathā na laukikānām parīkṣakā api hi vyavahāra samaye na loka sāmāmyam ativartante vakṣyati anantaram eva hi bhagavān bhāṣya kāraḥ apaśu ādibhiḥ ca aviśeṣāt iti bāhyā api āhuḥ aśāstra cintakāḥ khalu evam vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ iti tad pāriśeṣyāt cit ātma gocaram ahaṅkāram aaham iha asmi sadane iti prayuñjānaḥ  laukikaḥ śarīra ādi bheda grahāt ātmanaḥ prādeśika tvam abhimanyate nabhasa iva ghaṭa maṇika mallikā ādi upādhi avacchedāt iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ na ca ahaṅkāra prāmāṇyāya deha ādivat ātmā api prādeśika iti yuktam tadā khalu ayamaṇu parimāṇaḥ  vā syāt deha parimāṇaḥ  vā aṇu pariṃmāṇa tve asthūlaḥ  aham dīrghaḥ iti ca na syāt  deha parimāṇa tve tu sa avayava tayā dehavat anityatva prasaṅgaḥ kiñca asmin pakṣe avayava samudāyaḥ  vā cetayet  pratyekam vā avayavāḥ pratyekam cetanatva pakṣe bahūnām cetanānām svatantrāṇām eka vākya tā bhāvāt aparyāyam viruddha dikkriya tayā śarīram unmathyeta akriyam vā prasajyeta samudāyasya tu caitanya yoge vṛkṇa ekasmin  avayave cit ātmanaḥ  api avayavaḥ  vṛkṇa iti na cetayet  na ca bahūnām avayavānām paraspara avinābhāva niyamaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ ya eva avayavaḥ  yadā viśīrṇaḥ tadā tad abhāve na cetayet  vijñāna ālambana tve api ahaṃpratyayasya bhrānta tvam tad avastham eva tasya sthira vastu nirbhāsa tvāt asthira tvāt ca vijñānānām etena asthūlaḥ  aham andhaḥ aham gacchāmi ityādayaḥ  api adhyāsa tayā vyākhyātāḥ tad evam uktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūti kūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūham kartṛtva bhoktṛtva sukha duḥkha śoka ādi ātma tvam aham anubhava prasañjitam ātmanaḥ  niṣeddhum arhati iti tad evam sarva pravāda śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa prathita mithyā bhāvasya ahaṃpratyayasya svarūpa nimitta phalaiḥ upavyākhyānam anyonyasmin ityādi anyonya smin dharmiṇī ātma śarīra ādau anyonya ātmaka tā madhyasya aham idam śarīrāt iti aidam iti ca vastutas  na pratītitaḥ loka vyavahāraḥ lokānām vyavahāraḥ sa ca aayam aham iti vyapadeśaḥ iti śabda sūcitaḥ ca śarīra ādi anukūlam pratikūlam ca prameya jātam pramāṇena pramāya tad upādāna parivarjana ādiḥ anyonya dharmān  ca adhyasya anyonya smin dharmiṇi deha ādi dharmān janma maraṇa jarā vyādhi ādīn ātmani dharmiṇi adhyasta deha ādi bhāve samāropya tathā caitanya ādīn ātma dharmān deha ādau  adhyasta ātma bhāve samāropya amamedam jarā maraṇa putra paśu svāmya ādi iti vyavahāraḥ  vyapadeśaḥ iti śabda sūcitaḥ ca tad anurūpaḥ pravṛtti ādiḥ atra ca adhyāsa vyavahāra kriyābhyām yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna  iti samāna kartṛka tvena aadhyasya vyavahāraḥ iti upapannam pūrva kālatva sūcitam adhyāsasya vyavahāra kāraṇa tvam sphuṭayati mithyājñāna nimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti mithyājñānam adhyāsaḥ tad nimittaḥ tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt vyavahāra bhāva abhāvayoḥ iti arthaḥ tad evam adhyāsa svarūpam phalam ca vyavahāram uktvā tasya nimittam āha itaretarauvivekena iti viveka grahaṇena iti arthaḥ atha aviveka eva kasmāt na bhavati tathā ca na adhyāsa iti ata āha atyanta viviktayoḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ paramārtha taḥ  dharmiṇoḥ atādātmyam vivekaḥ dharmāṇām ca asaṃkīrṇa tā vivekaḥ syāt etad  viviktayoḥ vastu satoḥ bheda āgraha nibandhanaḥ tādātmya vibhramaḥ  yujyate śukteḥ iva rajatāt bheda agrahe rajata tādātmya vibhramaḥ iha tu parama artha satas  cit ātmanaḥ  anyat na deha ādi asti vastu sat tad kutas  cit ātmanaḥ  bheda āgrahaḥ kutas ca tādātmya vibhramaḥ iti ata āha satya anṛte mithunīkṛtya iti viveka agrahādadhi asya iti yojanā satyam cit ātmā anṛtam buddhīndriya deha ādiḥ te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya yugalīkṛtya iti arthaḥ na ca saṃvṛti paramārtha satoḥ pāramārthakam mithunam asti iti abhūta tad bhāva arthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ etad uktam bhavati apratītasya āropa ayogāt āropyasya pratītiḥ upayujyate na vastu sattā iti syāt etad  āropyasya pratītau satyām pūrva dṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropa nibandhanā ca pratītiḥ iti durvāram paraspara āśraya tvam iti ata āha naisargika iti śvābhāvikaḥ anādiḥ ayam vyavahāraḥ vyavahāra anādi tayā tad kāraṇasya adhyāsasya anādita uktā tatas ca pūrva pūrva mithyā jñāna upadarśitasya buddhīndriya śarīra ādeḥ uttara uttara adhyāsa upayoga iti anādi tvāt bīja aṅkuravat na paraspara āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ syāt etad  advā pūrva pratīti mātram upayujyate ārope na tu pratīyamānasya parama artha sattā pratītiḥ eva tu atyanta asataḥ  gagana kamalinī kalpasya deha indriya ādeḥ na upapadyate prakāśamāna tvam eva hi cit ātmanaḥ  api sattvam na tu tad atiriktam sattā sāmānya samavāyoḥ atha kriyā kāritā vā dvaita āpatteḥ sattāyāḥ ca artha kriyā kāritāyāḥ ca sattā antara artha kriyā kārita antara kalpane anavasthā pātāt  prakāśamānatā eva sattā abhyupetavyā tathā ca deha ādayaḥ prakāśamāna tvāt na asantaḥ cit ātmavat  asattve vā na prakāśamānāḥ tad katham satya anṛtayoḥ mithunībhāvaḥ ḷ tad abhāve vā kasya kutaḥ bheda āgrahaḥ ḷ tad asaṃbhave kutaḥ adhyāsaḥ ḷ iti āśayavān āha ākṣeptā kaḥ  ayam adhyāsaḥ  nāma iti ka iti ākṣepe samādhātā loka siddham adhyāsa lakṣaṇam ācakṣāṇa eva ākṣepam pratikṣipati ucyate smṛti rūpaḥ paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsa iti avasannaḥ avamataḥ  vā bhāsaḥ avabhāsaḥ pratyaya antara bādhaḥ ca asya avasādaḥ  avamānaḥ  vā etāvatā mithyājñānam iti uktam bhavati tasya idam upavyākhyānam apūrva dṛṣṭa ityādi pūrva dṛṣṭasya avabhāsaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ mithyā pratyayaḥ ca āropaviṣaya āropaṇīya mithunam antareṇa na bhavati iti pūrva dṛṣṭa grahaṇena anṛtam āropaṇīyam upasthāpayati tasya ca dṛṣṭatva mātram upayujyate na vastu sattā iti dṛṣṭa grahaṇam tathā api vartamānam dṛṣṭam darśanam na āropa upayogi iti pūrva iti uktam tad ca pūrva dṛṣṭam sva rūpeṇa sat api āropaṇīya tayā anirvācyam iti anṛtam āropaviṣayam satyam āha paratra iti paratra śuktikā ādau paramārtha sati tad anena satya anṛta mithunam uktam syāt etad  paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsa iti alakṣaṇam ati vyāpaka tvāt  asti hi svastimatyām gavi pūrva dṛṣṭasya gaḥ tvasya paratra kāla akṣyām avabhāsaḥ asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrva dṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyām avabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ avabhāsa padam ca samīcīne api pratyaye prasiddham yathā nīlasya avabhāsaḥ pītasya avabhāsa iti ata āha smṛti rūpa iti smṛteḥ rūpam iva rūpam asya iti smṛti rūpaḥ asaṃnihita viṣaya tvam ca smṛti rūpa tvam saṃnihita viṣayam ca pratyabhijñānam samīcīnam iti na ati vyāptiḥ na api avyāptiḥ svapna jñānasya api snṛti vibhrama rūpasya evaṃrūpa tvāt tatra api hi smaryamāṇe pitṛ ādau nidrā upaplava vaśāt asaṃnidhāna aparāmarśe tatra tatra pūrva dṛṣṭasya eva saṃnihita deśa kāla tvasya samāropaḥ evam apītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ atiktaḥ  guḍaḥ iti atra api etad lakṣaṇam yojanīyam tathā hi bahis vinirgaccha jati accha nayana raśmi saṃpṛkta pitta dravya vartinīm pīta tām pitta rahitām anubhavan śaṅkham ca doṣa ācchādita śukli mānam anubhavan pīta tāyāḥ ca śaṅkha asaṃbandham ananubhavan asaṃbandha agrahaṇa sārūpye api itam tapanīya piṇḍama api itam bilva phalaṃ iti ādau pūrva dṛṣṭam sāmānādhikaraṇyam pītatva śaṅkha tvayoḥ āropya āha apītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti etena atiktaḥ  guḍaḥ iti pratyayaḥ vyākhyātaḥ evam vijñātṛ puruṣa abhimukheṣu ādarśa udaka ādiṣu su accheṣu cākṣuṣam tejaḥ  lagnam api balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotas  pravartitam mukha saṃyuktam mukham grāhayet  doṣa vaśāt tad deśa tām anabhimukha tām ca mukhyasya agrāhayat  pūrva dṛṣṭa abhimukha ādarśa udaka deśa tām ābhimukhyam ca mukhasya āropayati iti pratibimba vibhramaḥ  api lakṣitaḥ  bhavati etena dvi candra diś moha alāta cakra gandharvanagara vaṃśa uraga ādi vibhrameṣu api yathāsaṃbhavam lakṣaṇam yojanīyam etad uktam bhavati na prakāśam ānatā mātram sattvam yena deha indriya ādeḥ prakāśamānatayā sadbhāvaḥ  bhavet  na hi sarpa atada bhāvena rajjvādayaḥ  vā sphaṭikādayaḥ  vā rakta ādi guṇa yoginaḥ  na pratibhāsante pratibhāsamānā vā bhavanti tad ā ātmānaḥ tad dharmāṇaḥ  vā tathā sati maruṣu marīcikā nicayam auccāvacam uccalat tuṅga taraṅga bhaṅga mālā iyam abhyarṇa bhava tīrṇā mandākinī iti abhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tad toyam āpīya pipāsām upaśamayet tasmāt akāmena api prakāśamānasya api āropitasya na vastu sattvam abhyupagamanīyam na ca marīci rūpeṇa salilam avastu sat  sva rūpeṇa tu paramārtha sadeva deha indriya ādayaḥ tu sva rūpeṇa api asanta iti anubhava agocara tvāt katham āropyanta iti sāṃpratam yatas  yadi asantaḥ  na anubhava gocarāḥ katham tarhi marīci ādīnām asatām toya ādi ātma tayā anubhava gocara tvam ḷ na ca sva rūpa sattvena toya ādi ātmanā api santaḥ  bhavanti yadi ucyeta na abhāvaḥ  nāma bhāvāt anyaḥ kaścid asti api tu bhāva eva bhāva antarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ yathā āhuḥ abhāva antaram abhāvaḥ  hi kayācid tu vyapekṣayā iti tatas ca bhāva ātmanā upākhyeya tayā asya yujyeta anubhava gocara tā prapañcasya punar atyanta asataḥ nirasta samasta sāmarthyasya nistattvasya kutaḥ anubhava viṣaya bhāvaḥ kutaḥ vā cit ātmani āropaḥ ḷ na ca viṣayasya samasta sāmarthya virahe api vijñānam eva tad tādṛśam sva pratyaya sāmarthyāt adṛṣṭānta siddha svabhāva bhedam upajātam asataḥ prakāśanam tasmāt asat prakāśana śaktiḥ eva asya avidyā iti sāṃpratam yatas  yā iyam asat prakāśana śaktiḥ vijñānasya kim punar asyāḥ śakyam ḷ asat iti ced  kim etad kāryam āhosvit asyāḥ  jñāpyam ḷ na tāvat kāryam asataḥ tattva anupapatteḥ na api jñāpyam jñāna antara anupalabdheḥ anavasthā pātāt ca vijñāna svarūpam eva asataḥ prakāśa iti ced  kaḥ punar eṣa sat asatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ ḷ asat adhīna nirūpaṇa tvam sataḥ  jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti ced  ahaḥ bata ayam ati nirvṛtaḥ pratyaya tapasvī yad asya asatī api nirūpaṇam āyatate na ca pratyayaḥ tatra ādhatte kiñcid  asata ādhāratva ayogāt asat antareṇa pratyayaḥ na prathata iti pratyayasya eva eṣa svabhāvaḥ na tu asat adhīnam asya kiñcid iti ced  ahaḥ bata asya asat pakṣapātaḥ yad ayam atad utpattiḥ atadātmā ca tad avinā abhāva niyataḥ pratyaya iti tasmāt atyanta asantaḥ śarīra indriyādayaḥ  nistattvā na anubhava viṣayā bhavitum arhanti iti atra brūmaḥ nistattvam ced na anubhava gocaraḥ tad kim idānīm marīcayaḥ api toya ātmanā sa tattvāḥ yad anubhava gocarāḥ syuḥ na sa tattvāḥ tad ātmanā marīcīnām asattvāt dvividham ca vastūnām tattvam sattvam asat tvam ca tatra pūrvam svatas  param tu paratas  yathā āhuḥ asvarūpa para rūpābhyām nityam sat asat ātmake vastuni jñāyate kiñcid rūpam kaiścid kadācana iti tad kim marīciṣu toya nirbhāsa pratyayaḥ tattva gocaraḥ ḷ tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrāntaḥ  na api bādhyeta addhā   na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayam atoya ātma tattvānatoya ātmanā gṛhṇīyāt  toya ātmanā tu gṛhṇan katham bhrāntaḥ katham vā abādhyaḥ ḷ hanta   toya abhāva ātmanām marīcinām toya bhāva ātma tvam tāvat na sat  teṣām toya abhāvāt abhedena toya bhāva ātma tā anupapatteḥ na api asat vastu antaram eva hi vastu antarasya asattvam āsthīyate abhāva antaram abhāvaḥ  anyaḥ  na kaścid anirūpaṇāt iti vadadbhiḥ na ca āropitam rūpam vastu antaram tad hi marīcayaḥ vā bhavet  gaṅgā ādi gatam toyam vā pūrvasmin kalpe amarīcayaḥ iti pratyayaḥ syāt  na atoyam iti uttarasmin  tu agaṅgāyām toyam iti syāt  na punar  aiha iti deśa bheda asmaraṇe atoyam iti syāt  na pula aiha iti na ca idam atyantam asat  nirasta samasta svarūpam alīkam eva astu iti sāṃpratam tasya anubhava gocaratva anupapatteḥ iti uktam adhastāt tasmāt na sat  na asat  na api sat asat paraspara virodhāt  iti anirvācyam eva āropaṇīyam marīciṣu toyam āstheyam tad anena krameṇa adhyastam toyam parama artha toyam iva ata eva pūrva dṛṣṭam iva tattvataḥ tu na toyam na ca pūrva dṛṣṭam kim tu anṛtam anirvācyam evam ca deha indriya ādi prapañcaḥ  api anirvācyaḥ apūrva u api pūrva mithyā pratyaya upadarśita iva paratra cit ātmani adhyasyata iti upapannam adhyāsa lakṣaṇa yogāt  deha indriya ādi prapañca bādhanam ca upapādayiṣyate cit ātmā tu śruti smṛti itihāsa purām agocaraḥ tad mūla tadaviruddha nyāya nirṇīta śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvaḥ sattvena eva nirvācyaḥ abādhitā svayaṃprakāśa tā eva asya sattā sā ca svarūpam eva cit ātmanaḥ na tu tad atiriktam sattā sāmānya samavāyaḥ artha kriyā kāritā vā iti sarvam avadātam sa ca ayam evaṃlakṣaṇa kaḥ  adhyāsaḥ anirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣām eva saṃmataḥ parīkṣakāṇām tad bhede param vipratipattiḥ iti anirvacanīyatām draḍhayitum āha tam kecid  iti anya dharmasya jñāna dharmasya rajatasya jñāna ākārasya iti yāvat  adhyāsaḥ anyatra bāhye sautrānti ka naye tāvat bāhyam asti vastu sat tatra jñāna ākārasya āropaḥ vijñāna vādinām api yadi api na bāhyam vastu sat tathā api anādya vidyā   āsana āropitam alīkam bāhyam tatra jñāna ākārasya āropaḥ upapattiḥ ca yadyādṛśam anubhava siddham rūpam tad tādṛśam eva abhyupetavyam iti utsargaḥ anyathātvam punar asya balavat bādhaka pratyaya vaśāt anedam rajatam iti bādhakasya idantā mātra bādhena api upapattau na rajata gocaratā ucitā rajatasya dharmiṇaḥ  bhādhe hi rajatam ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite bhavetām tad varam idantā eva asya dharmaḥ  bādhyatām na punā rajatam api dharmi tathā ca rajatam bahis bādhitam arthāda antare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñāna ākārasya bahis adhyāsaḥ sidhyati kecid tu jñāna ākāra khyātau  aparituṣyantaḥ  vadanti yatra yad adhyāsaḥ tad viveka agraha nibandhanaḥ  bhrama iti aparitoṣa kāraṇam ca āhuḥ vijñāna kāra tā rajata ādeḥ anubhavāt vā vyavasthāpyeta anumānāt vā tatra anumānam upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyate anubhavaḥ  api rajata pratyayaḥ vā syāt  bādhaka pratyayaḥ vā na tāvat rajata anubhavaḥ sa hi idaṅkāra āspadam rajatam āvedayati na tvā antaram aaham iti hi tadā syāt  pratipattuḥ pratyayāt avyatirekāt  bhrāntam vijñānam su ākāram eva bāhya tayā adhyavasyati tathā ca na ahaṅkāra āspadam asya gocaraḥ jñāna ākāra tā punar ya bādhaka pratyayam ālocayatu āyuṣmān sa kim puras varti dravyam rajatāt vivecayati āhaḥ jñāna ākāra tām api asya darśayati ḷ tatra jñāna ākāra topadarśana vyāpāram bādhaka pratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ  devānām priyaḥ puras vartitva pratiṣedhāt arthāt asya jñāna ākāra tā iti ced  na asaṃnidhāna āgraha niṣedhāt asaṃnihitaḥ  bhavati pratipattuḥ atyanta saṃnidhānam tu asya pratipatra ātmakam kutastyam ḷ na ca eṣa rajatasya niṣedhaḥ na ca idantāyāḥ kim tu viveka āgraha prasañjitasya rajata vyavahārasya na ca rajatam eva śuktikāyām prasañjitam rajata jñānena na hi rajata nirbhāsasya śuktikā ālambanam yuktam anubhava virodhāt  na khalu sattā mātreṇa ālambanam atiprasaṅgāt  sarveṣām arthānām sattva aviśeṣāt ālambanatva prasaṅgāt  na api kāraṇa tvena indriya ādīnām api kāraṇa tvāt  tathā ca bhāsamāna tā eva ālambana arthaḥ na ca rajata jñāne śuktikā bhāsate iti katham ālambanam ḷ bhāsamāna tā abhyupagame vā katham na anubhava virodhaḥ ḷ api ca indriya ādīnām samīcīna jñāna upajanane sāmarthyam upalabdham iti katham ebhyaḥ  mithyājñāna saṃbhavaḥ ḷ doṣa sahitānām teṣām mithyā pratyaye api sāmarthyam iti ced  na doṣāṇām kārya upajanana sāmarthya vidhāta mātre hetu tvāt  anyathā pluṣṭāt api kuṭaja bījāt vaṭa aṅkura utpatti prasaṅgāt  api ca sva gocara vyabhicāre vijñānānām sarva tra anāśvāsa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sarvam jñānam samīcīnam āstheyam tathā ca arajatam aidam iti ca dve vijñāne smṛti anubhava rūpe tatra aidaṃ iti puras varti dravya mātra grahaṇam doṣa vaśāt tadgata śuktitva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahāt  tanmātram ca gṛhītam sadṛśa tayā saṃskāra udbodha krameṇa rajate smṛtim janayati sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt gṛhītatva aṃśa pramoṣa āt  grahaṇa mātram avatiṣṭhate tathā ca rajata samṛteḥ puras varti dravya mātra grahaṇasya ca mithas  svarūpataḥ  viṣayataḥ ca bheda agrahaṇāt  saṃnihita rajata gocara jñāna sārūpyeṇa aidam ṭarajatam iti dve ete api grahaṇa smaraṇe abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ kvacid punar grahaṇe e mithas  agṛhīta bhede yathā apītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti atra hi vinirgacchat nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya kācasya iva svacchasya pīta tvam gṛhyate pittam tu na gṛhyate śaṅkhaḥ  api doṣa vaśāt śukla guṇa rahitaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate tad anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ asaṃsarga āgrahasā ārūpyāt  pīta tapanīya piṇḍa pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca bheda āgraha prasañjita abheda vyavahāra bādhanāt ca anedam iti viveka pratyayasya bādhaka tvam api upapadyate tad upapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya bhrānta tvam api loka siddham siddham bhavati tasmāt yathārthāḥ sarve vipratipannāḥ saṃdeha vibhramāḥ pratyaya tvāt  ghaṭa ādi pratyayavat tad idam uktam yatra yad adhyāsa iti yasmin śuktikā ādau yasya rajata ādeḥ adhyāsa iti loka prasiddhiḥ na asau  anyathā khyāti nibandhanā kim tu gṛhītasya rajata ādeḥ tad smaraṇasya ca gṛhīta tā aṃśa pramoṣeṇa gṛhīta mātrasya yaḥ aidam iti puraḥ avasthitāt dravya mātrāt tad prajñānāt ca vivekaḥ tad agrahaṇa nibandhanaḥ  bhramaḥ bhrānta tvam ca grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ itareta rasāmāna adhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ  rajata ādi vyavahāraḥ ca iti anye tu atra api aparituṣyantaḥ yatra yad adhyāsaḥ tasya eva viparīta dharma kalpanām ācakṣate atra idam ākūtam asti tāvat rajata arthinaḥ arajatam idam iti pratyayāt putovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca iti sarva janīnām tad etad na tāvat grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ tad gocarayoḥ ca mithas  bheda agraha mātrāt bhavitum arhati grahaṇa nibandhanau hi cetanasya vyavahāra vyapadeśau katham agrahaṇa mātrāt bhavetām ḷ nanu uktam na agrahaṇa mātrāt kim tu grahaṇa smaraṇe eva mithas  svarūpataḥ  viṣayataḥ ca agṛhīta bhede samīcīna puraḥ sthita rajata vijñāna sādṛśyena abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ atha samīcīna jñāna sārūpyam anayoḥ gṛhyamāṇam vā vyavahāra pravṛtti hetuḥ agṛhyamāṇam vā sattā mātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe api asamī cīna jñāna sārūpyam anayoḥ idam iti rajatam iti ca jñānayoḥ iti grahaṇam atha vā atayoḥ eva svarūpataḥ  viṣayataḥ ca mithas  bheda agrahaḥ iti grahaṇam tatra na tāvat samīcīna jñāna sadṛśī iti jñānam samīcīna jñānavat vyavahāra pravartakam na hi agaḥ sadṛśaḥ  gavayaḥ iti jñānam gavārthinam gavaye pravartayati aanayoḥ eva bheda agrahaḥ iti tu jñānam parāhatam na hi bheda agrahe anayoḥ iti bhavati anayoḥ iti grahe bheda agrahaṇam iti na bhavati tasmāt sattā mātreṇa bheda āgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāra hetuḥ iti vaktavyam tatra kim ayam āropotpāda krameṇa vyavahāra hetuḥ āhaḥ anutpādita āropa eva svata iti ḷ vayam tu paśyāmaḥ cetana vyavahārasya ajñāna pūrvakatva anupapatteḥ āropajñāna utpāda krameṇa eva iti nanu satyam cetana vyavahāraḥ  na ajñāna pūrvakaḥ kim tu avidita viveka grahaṇa smaraṇa pūrvaka iti mā evam na hi rajata prātipadika artha mātra smaraṇam pravṛttau  upayujyate idaṅkāra āspada abhimukhī khalu rajata arthinām pravṛttiḥ iti avivādam katham ca ayam idaṅkāra āspade pravarteta yadi tu na tad icchet  ḷ anyat icchati anyat karoti iti vyāhatam na cedi daṅkāra āspadam rajatam iti jānīyāt  katham rajata arthī tad icchet  ḷ yadi atathātvena agrahaṇāt  iti brūyāt  sa ca prativaktavyaḥ atha tathā tvena agrahaṇāt  kasmāt na upekṣeta iti saḥ  ayam upādāna upekṣābhyām ubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ cecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkāra āspade rajata samāropeṇa upādāna eva vyavasthāpyate iti bheda āgrahaḥ samāropa utpāda krameṇa cetana pravṛtti hetuḥ tathā hi bheda agraha ādi daṅkāra āspade rajata tvam samāropya tad jātīyasya upakāra hetu bhāvam anucintya tad jātīyatayet aṅkāra āspade rajate tam anumāya tad arthī pravartate iti ānupūrvyam siddham na ca taṭa stha rajata smṛtiḥ idaṅkāra āspadasya upakāra hetu bhāvam anumāpayitum arhati rajata tvasya hetoḥ apakṣa dharma tvāt eka deśa darśanam khalu anumāpakam na tu aneka deśa darśanam yad āhuḥ  jñāta saṃbandhasya eka deśa dara īśanāt iti samārope tu eka deśa darśanam asti tad siddham etad vivāda adhyāsitam rajata ādi jñānam purovarti vastu viṣayam rajata ādi arthinaḥ tatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt  yad yad arthinam yatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt  yad yad arthinam yatra niyamena pravartayati tad jñānam tad viṣayam yathā ubhaya siddha samīcīna rajata jñānam tathā ca idam tasmāt tathā iti yad ca uktam anavabhāsamāna tayā na śuktiḥ ālambanam iti tatra bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ  vyācaṣṭām kim śuktikātvasya aidam rajatam iti jñānam pratyanālambana tvam āhosvit  dravya mātrasya puras sthitasya sita bhāsvarasya ḷ yadi śuktikātvasya anālambana tvam addhā   uttarasya anālambana tvam bruvāṇasya tava eva anubhava virodhaḥ tathā hi arajatam idam iti anubhavan  anubhavitā puras varti vastu aṅguli ādinā nirdiśati dṛṣṭam ca duṣṭānām kāraṇānām autsargika kārya pratibandhena kārya antara upajanana sāmarthyam yathā dāva agni dagdhānām vetra bījānām kadalī kāṇḍa janaka tvam bhasmaka duṣṭasya ca audaryasya tejasaḥ  bahu anna pacanam iti pratyakṣa bādha apahṛta viṣayam ca vibhramāṇām yathārthatva anumānam ābhāsaḥ hutavaha anuṣṇatva anumānavat  yad ca uktam mithyā pratyayasya vyabhicāre sarva pramāṇeṣu anāśvāsa iti tad  bodhaka tvena svatas prāmāṇyam na avyabhicāreṇa iti vyutpādayadbhiḥ asmābhiḥ parihṛtam nyāya kaṇikāyām iti na iha pratanyate diś mātram ca asya smṛti pramoṣa bhaṅgasya uktam vistaraḥ tu brahma tattva samīkṣāyām avagantavya iti tad idam uktam anye tu yatra yad adhyāsaḥ tasya eva viparīta dharma kalpanām ācakṣate iti yatra śuktikā ādau yasya rajata ādeḥ adhyāsaḥ tasya eva śuktikā ādeḥ viparīta dharma kalpanām rajatatva dharma kalpanām iti yojanā nanu santu nāma parīkṣakāṇām vipratipattayaḥ prakṛte tu kim āyātam iti ata āha sarvathā api iti anyasya anya dharma kalpanā anṛta tā sā ca anirvacanīyatā iti adhastāt upapādayitum tena sarveṣām eva parīkṣakāṇām mate anyasya anya dharma kalpanāniḥ vacanīya avaśyaṃbhāvinī iti anirvacanīya tā sarva tantra siddhānta iti arthaḥ akhyāti vādibhiḥ akāmaiḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśa pravṛtti niyama snehāt idam abhyupeyam iti bhāvaḥ na kevalam iyam anṛta tā parīkṣakāṇām siddhā api tu laukikānām api iti āha tathā ca loke anubavaḥ śuktikā hi rajatavat avabhāsata iti na punā rajatam idam iti śeṣaḥ syāt etad  anyasya ani ātma tā vibhramaḥ  loka siddhaḥ ekasya tu abhinnasya bheda bhramaḥ  na dṛṣṭa iti kutas  cit ātmanaḥ  abhinnānām jīvānām bheda vibhrama iti ata āha ekaḥ candraḥ sa dvitīyavat iti punar api cit ātmani adhyāsam ākṣipati katham punar  iti ayam arthaḥ cit ātmā prakāśate na vā ḷ na ced  prakāśate katham asmin  adhyāsaḥ  viṣaya tad dharmāṇām ḷ na khalva pratibhāsamāne puras vartini dravye rajatasya vā tad dharmāṇām vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavati pratibhā samāne vā na tāvat ayam ātmā jaḍaḥ  ghaṭa ādivat para adhīna prakāśa iti yuktam na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati virodhāt  para samaveta kriyā phala śāli hi karma na ca jñāna kriyā para samavāyini iti katham asyāḥ karma ḷ na ca tad eva svam ca param ca virodhāt  ātma antara samavāya abhyupagame tu jñeyasya ātmanaḥ anātmatva prasaṅgaḥ evam tasya tasya iti anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ syāt etad  ātmā jaḍaḥ  api sarva artha jñāneṣu bhāsamānaḥ  api kartā eva na karma para samaveta kriyā phala śālitva abhāvāt caitravat  yathā hi caitra samaveta kriyayā caitra nagara prāptau  ubaya samavetāyām api kriyamāṇāyām nagarasya eva karma tā para samaveta kriyā phala śāli tvāt na tu caitrasya kriyā phala śālinaḥ  api caitra samavāyāt gamana krīyāyā iti tad na śruti virodhāt  śrūyate hi asatyam jñānam anantam brahma iti upapadyate ca tathā hi yaḥ  ayam artha prakāśaḥ phalam yasmin  arthaḥ ca ātmā ca prathete sa kim jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ  vā ḷ jaḍaḥ ced  viṣaya ātmau  api jaḍau  iti kasmin kim prakāśeta aviśeṣāt  iti prāptam āndhyam aśeṣasya jagataḥ tathā ca ābhāṇakaḥ aandhasya iva andha lagnasya vinipātaḥ pade pade iti na ca nilīnam eva vijñānam artha ātmānau jñāpayati cakṣuḥ ādivat iti vācyam jñāpanam hi jñāna jananam janitam ca jñānam jaḍam sanna ukta dūṣaṇam ativarteta iti evam uttarottarāṇi api jñānāni jaḍāni iti anavasthā tasmāt apara adhīna prakāśā saṃvid upetavyā tathā api kim āyātam viṣaya ātmanoḥ svabhāva jaḍayoḥ ḷ etad āyātam yad tayoḥ saṃvid ajaḍa iti tad kim putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitā api paṇḍitaḥ  astu ḷ svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yad artha ātma saṃbandhi tā iti ced  hanta putrasya api paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yad pitṛ saṃbandhi tā iti samānam saha artha ātma prakāśena saṃvid prakāśaḥ  na tu artha ātma prakāśam vinā iti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti ced  tad kim saṃvidaḥ  bhinnau saṃvid artha ātma prakāśau tathā ca na svayaṃprakāśā saṃvid  na ca saṃvid  artha ātma prakāśa iti atha saṃvid artha ātma prakāśaḥ  na saṃvidaḥ  bhidyete saṃvid eva tau evam ced  yāvat uktam bhavati saṃvid  ātma arthau saha iti tāvat uktam bhavati saṃvid artha ātma prakāśau saha iti tathā ca na vivakṣita artha siddhiḥ na ca atīta anāgata artha gocarāyāḥ saṃvidor atha sahabhāvaḥ  api tad viṣaya hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhi jananāt artha sahabhāva iti ced  na artha saṃvida iva hāna ādi buddhīnām api tad viṣayatva anupapatteḥ hāna ādi jananāt dhāna ādi buddhīnām artha viṣaya tvam artha viṣaya hāna ādi buddhi jananāt ca artha saṃvidaḥ tad viṣaya tvam iti ced  tad kim dehasya prayatnavat ātma saṃyogaḥ  deha pravṛtti nivṛtti hetuḥ artha iti artha prakāśaḥ  astu ḷ jāḍyāt deha ātma saṃyogaḥ  na artha prakāśa iti ced  nanu ayam svayaṃprakāśaḥ  api sva ātmani eva khadyotavat prakāśaḥ arthe tu jaḍa iti upapāditam na ca prakāśasya ātmānaḥ  viṣayāḥ te hi vicchinna dīrgha sthūla tayā anubhūyante prakāśaḥ ca ayam antaraḥ  asthūlaḥ  anaṇurahrasvaḥ  adīrdhaḥ ca iti prakāśate tasmāt candre anubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaḥ candramāḥ sva prakāśāt anyor athaḥ anirvacanīya eva iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ na ca asya prakāśasya ajānataḥ sva lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ  anubhūyate na ca anirvācya artha bhedaḥ prakāśam nirvācyam bhettum arhati atiprasaṅgāt  na ca arthānām api parasparam bhedaḥ samīcīna jñāna paddhatim adhyāste iti upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate tad ayam prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭasthaḥ  nityaḥ  niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmā aśakya nirvacanīyebhyaḥ  deha indriya ādibhya ātmānam pratīpam nirvacanīyam añcati jānāti iti pratyaṅ sa ca ātmā iti pratyagātmā sa ca apara adhīna prakāśāt anaṃśa tvāt ca aviṣayaḥ tasmin  adhyāsaḥ  viṣaya dharmāṇām deha indriya ādi dharmāṇām katham ḷ kim ākṣepe ayuktaḥ  ayam adhyāsa iti ākṣepaḥ kasmāt ayam ayukta iti ata āha sarvaḥ  hi puraḥ avasthite viṣaye viṣaya antara madhyasyati etad uktam bhavati yad para adhīna prakāśam aṃśavat ca tad sāmānya aṃśa grahe karaṇa doṣa vaśāt ca viśeṣa agrahe anyathā prakāśate pratyagātmā tu apara adhīna prakāśa tayā na sva jñāne kāraṇāni apekṣate yena tad āśrayaiḥ deṣaiḥ duṣyet  na ca aṃśavān yena kaścid asya aṃśaḥ  gṛhyeta kaścid na gṛhyeta na hi tad eva tadānīm eva tena eva gṛhītam agṛhītam ca saṃbhavati iti na svayaṃprakāśa tā pakṣe adhyāsaḥ sadātane api aprakāśe puraḥ avasthita tvasya aparokṣa tvasya abhāvāt na adhyāsaḥ na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyām rajata madhyasyati aidam rajatam iti tasmāt atyanta grahe atyanta agrahe ca na adhyāsa iti siddham syāt etad  aviṣaya tve hi cit ātmanaḥ  na adhyāsaḥ viṣaya eva tu cit ātmā asmad pratyayasya tad katham na adhyāsa iti ata āha yuṣmad pratyaya apetasya iti viṣaya tve hi cit ātmanaḥ  anyaḥ  viṣayī bhavet  tathā ca yaḥ  viṣayī sa eva cit ātmā viṣayaḥ tu tatas  anyaḥ  yuṣmad pratyaya gocaraḥ  abhyupeyaḥ tasmāt anātmatva prasaṅgāt anavasthā parihārāya yuṣmad pratyaya apeta tvam ata eva aviṣaya tvam ātmanaḥ  vaktavyam tathā ca na adhyāsa iti arthaḥ pariharati ucyate na tāvat ayam ekāntena aviṣayaḥ kutas  ḷ asmad pratyaya viṣaya tvāt ayam arthaḥ satye pratyagātmā svayaṃprakāśa tvāt aviṣayaḥ  anaṃśaḥ ca tathā api anirvacanīyānādi vidyā parikalpita buddhi manaḥ sūkṣma sthūla śarīra indriya avacchedaka bhedena anavacchinnaḥ api vastu tas  avacchinna iva abhinnaḥ api bhinna iva akartā api kartā iva abhoktā api bhoktā iva aviṣayaḥ  api asmad pratyaya viṣaya iva jīva bhāvam āpannaḥ avabhāsate nabha iva ghaṭa maṇika mallikā ādi upādhi avaccheda bhedena bhinnam iva anekavidha dharmakam iva iti na hi cit eka rasasya ātmanaḥ cidāṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītam kiñcid asti na khalu ānanda nityatva vibhutva ādayaḥ asya cit rūpāt vastutaḥ bhidyante yena tad grahe na gṛhyeran gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā iti agṛhītā iva ābhānti na ca ātmanaḥ  buddhi ādibhyaḥ  bhedaḥ tāttvikaḥ yena cit ātmani gṛhyamāṇe saḥ  api gṛhīta eva bhavet  buddhi ādīnām anirvācya tvena tad bhedasya api anirvacanīya tvāt tasmāt cit ātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasya eva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyaḥ  buddhi ādibhyaḥ  bheda agrahāt tad adhyāsena jīva bhāva iti tasya ca anidam idam ātmanaḥ asmad pratyaya viṣaya tvam upapadyate tathā hi kartā bhoktā cit ātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate na ca udāsīnasya tasya kriyāśaktiḥ bhoga śaktiḥ vā saṃbhavati yasya ca buddhi ādeḥ kārya karaṇa saṃghātasya kriyā bhoga śaktī na tasya caitanyam tasmāt cit ātmā eva kārya karaṇa saṃghātena grathitaḥ  labdha kriyā bhoga śaktiḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ  api buddhi ādi viṣaya vid churaṇāt kathañcid asmad pratyaya viṣayaḥ ahaṅkāra āspadam jīva iti ca jantuḥ iti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate na khalu jīvaḥ cidātmanaḥ  bhidyate tathā hi śrutiḥ aanena jīvena ātmanā iti tasmāt cit ātmanaḥ  avyatirekāt  jīvaḥ svayaṃprakāśaḥ  api ahaṃpratyayena kartṛ bhoktṛ tayā vyavahāra yogyaḥ kriyata iti ahaṃpratyaya ālambanam ucyate na ca adhyāse sati viṣaya tvam viṣaya tve ca adhyāsaḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvam iti sāṃpratam bīja aṅkuravat anādi tvāt  pūrva pūrva adhyāsa tad vāsanā viṣayīkṛtasya uttarottara adhyāsa viṣayatva avirodhāt iti uktam  naisargikaḥ  ayam loka vyavahāraḥ iti bhāṣya granthena tasmāt  suṣṭhu uktam na tāvat ayam ekāntena aviṣaya iti jīvaḥ  hi cit ātma tayā svayaṃprakāśa tayā aviṣayaḥ  api aupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ syāt etad  na vayam apara adhīna prakāśa tayā aviṣaya tvena adhyāsam apākurmaḥ kim tu pratyagātmā na svatas  na api paratas  prathata iti aviṣaya iti brūmaḥ tathā ca sarvathā prathamāne pratyagātmani kutaḥ adhyāsa iti ata āha aparokṣa tvāt ca pratyak ātma prasiddheḥ iti pratīca ātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ prathā tasyāḥ  aparokṣa tvāt  yadi api pratyagātmani na anyā prathā asti tathā api bheda upacāraḥ yathā apuruṣasya caitanyam iti etad uktam bhavati avaśyam cit ātmā aparokṣaḥ  abhyupetavyaḥ tad aprathāyām sarvasya aprathanena jagat āndhya prasaṅgāt iti uktam śrutiḥ ca atra bhavati atam eva bhāntam anu bhāti sarvam tasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti iti tad evam parama artha parihāramuktvā abhyupetya api cit ātmanaḥ parokṣatām prauḍha vādi tayā parihāra antaram āha na ca ayam asti iti puraḥ avasthita eva aparokṣa eva kasmāt ayam na niyama iti ata āha apratyakṣe api iti hiḥ yasmāt arthe nabhaḥ  hi dravyam sat  rūpa sparśa virahān na bāhya indriya pratyakṣam na api mānasam manasaḥ  asahāyasya bāhye apravṛtteḥ tasmāt apratyakṣam atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ para darśita darśinaḥ kadācid pārthiva  chāyām śyāma tām āropya kadācid taijasam śukla tvam āropya nīlotpala palāśa śyāmam iti vā rājahaṃsa mālā dhavalam iti vā nirvarṇayanti tatra api pūrva dṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛti rūpaḥ  avabhāsa iti evam tad eva tala madhyasyanti avāṅmukhībhūta mahā indranīla maṇi maya mahā kaṭāha kalpam iti arthaḥ upasaṃharati evam uktena prakāreṇa sarva ākṣepa parihārāt  aviruddhaḥ pratyak ātmani api anātmanām buddhi ādīnām adhyāsaḥ nanu santi ca sahasram adhyāsāḥ tad kim artha mayam eva adhyāsa ākṣepa samādhānābhyām vyutpāditaḥ na adhyāsa mātram iti ata āha tam etam evaṃlakṣaṇam adhyāsam paṇḍitā avidyā iti manyante avidyā hi sarva anartha bījam iti śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa ādiṣu su prasiddham tad ucchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttā iti vakṣyati pratyak ātmani anātma adhyāsa eva sarva an artha hetuḥ na punā rajata ādi vibhramā iti sa eva avidyā tad svarūpam ca avijñātam na śakyam ucchettum iti tad eva vyutpādyam na adhyāsa mātram atra ca evaṃlakṣaṇam  iti evaṃrūpa tayā anartha hetu tā uktā yasmāt pratyak ātmani aśanāya ādi rahite aśanāya ādi upeta antaḥkaraṇa ādi ahita āropeṇa pratyak ātmānam aduḥkham duḥkhākaroti tasmāt anartha hetuḥ na ca evam pṛthagjanā api manyante adhyāsam yena na vyutpādyeta ityata uktam  paṇḍitā manyante iti nanu iyam anādiḥ ati nirūḍha nibiḍa vāsanā anubaddhā avidyā na śakyā niroddhum upāya abhāvāt  iti yaḥ  manyante tam prati tad nirodha upāyam āha tad vivekena ca vastu svarūpa avadhāraṇam nirvicikitsam jñānam vidyām āhuḥ paṇḍitāḥ pratyagātmani khalu atyanta vivikte buddhi ādibhyaḥ buddhi ādi bheda āgraha nimittaḥ  buddhi ādi ātmatva tad dharma adhyāsaḥ tatra śravaṇa manana ādibhiḥ yad viveka vijñānam tena viveka agrahe nivartite adhyāsa apabādha ātmakam vastu svarūpa avadhāraṇam vidyā cit ātma rūpam svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata iti arthaḥ syāt etad  ati nirūḍha nibiḍha vāsanā anuvid vā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitā api sva vāsanā vaśāt punar udbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanā ādi kāryam sva ucitam iti aya āha tatra evam sati evaṃbhūta vastu tattva avadhāraṇe sati yatra yad adhyāsaḥ tad kṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇu mātreṇa api sa na saṃbadhyate antaḥkaraṇa ādi doṣeṇa aśanāya ādinā cit ātmā cit ātmanaḥ  guṇena caitanya ānanda ādinā antaḥkaraṇa ādi na saṃbadhyate etad uktam bhavati tattva avadhāraṇa abhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ yad anādim api nirūḍha nibiḍa vāsanam api mithyā pratyayam apanayati tattva pakṣa pātaḥ  hi svabhāvaḥ  dhiyām yathā āhuḥ bāhyā api nirupadrava bhūta artha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ na bādhaḥ  ayatnavat tve api buddheḥ tad pakṣa pātatas iti viśeṣataḥ tu cit ātma svabhāvasya tattva jñānasya atyanta antaraṅgasya kutaḥ anirvācyayā avidyayā bādha iti yad uktam  satya anṛte mithuna ākṛtya viveka agrahādadhi asya aaham idam amamedam iti loka vyavahāraḥ iti tatra vyapadeśa lakṣaṇaḥ  vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭha uktaḥ iti śabda sūcitam loka vyavahāram ādarśayati tam etam avidyā ākhyam iti nigada vyākhyātam ākṣipati katham punar avidyāvat viṣayīṇi pratyakṣa ādīni pramāṇāni tattva paricchedaḥ  hi pramā vidyā tad sādhanāni pramāṇāni katham avidyāvat viṣayāṇi ḷ na avidyāvantam pramāṇāni āśrayanti tad kāryasya vidyāyā avidyā virodhi tvāt iti bhāvaḥ santu vā pratyakṣa ādīni saṃvṛtya api yathā tathā śāstrāṇi tu puruṣa hita anuśāsana parāṇi avidyā pratipakṣa tayā na avidyāvat viṣayāṇi bhavitum arhanti iti āha śāstrāṇi ca iti samādhatte ucyate iti deha indriya ādiṣu ahaṃmama abhimāna hīnasya tādātmya tad dharma adhyāsa hīnasya pramātṛtva anupapattau satyām pramāṇa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ ayam arthaḥ pramātṛ tvam hi pramām prati kartṛ tvam tad ca svātantryam svātantryam ca pramātuḥ itara kārakā prayojyasya samasta kāraka prayoktṛ tvam tad anena pramākaraṇam pramāṇam prayojanīyam na ca sva vyāpāram antareṇa karaṇam prayoktum arhati na ca kūṭastha nityaḥ cidātmā apariṇāmī svatas  vyāpāravān tasmāt  vyāpāravat buddhi ādi tādātmya adhyāsāt vyāpāravat tayā pramāṇam adhiṣṭhātum arhati iti bhavati avidyāvat puruṣa viṣaya tvam avidyāvat puruṣa āśraya tvam pramāṇānām iti atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni kim naḥ chinnam ityata āha na hi indriyāṇi anupādāya pratyakṣa ādi vyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati vyavahriyate anena iti vyavahāraḥ phalam pratyakṣa ādīnām pramāṇānām phalam iti arthaḥ indriyāṇi iti indriya liṅga ādīni iti draṣṭavyam adaṇḍinaḥ  gacchanti itivat  evam hi pratyakṣa ādi iti upapadyate vyavahāra kriyayā ca vyavahārya ākṣepāt samāna kartṛka tā anupādāya yaḥ  vyavahāra iti yojanā kim iti punar  pramātā upādatte pramāṇāni ḷ atha svayam eva kasmāt na pravartante iti ata āha na ca adhiṣṭhānam antareṇa indriyāṇām vyāpāraḥ pramāṇānām vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati na jātu karaṇāni anadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā sva kārye vyāpriyante mā bhūt kuvinda rahitebhyaḥ  vema ādibhyaḥ paṭa utpattiḥ iti atha deha eva adhiṣṭhātā kasmāt na bhavati ḷ kṛtam atra ātma adhyāsena ityata āha na ca anadhyasta ātma bhāvena dehena kaścid vyāpriyate suṣupte api vyāpāra prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ syāt etad  yathā anadhyasta ātma bhāvam vema ādikam kuvindaḥ  vyāpārayan paṭasya kartā evam anadhyasta ātma bhāvam deha indriya ādi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tad abhijñaḥ pramātā iti ata āha na ca etasmin sarvasmin itaretara ātmā adhyāse itaretara ātmā adhyāse itaretara dharma adhyāse ca asati ātmanaḥ  asaṅgasya sarvathā sarvadā sarva dharma dharmi viyuktasya pramātṛ tvam upapadyate vyāpāravantaḥ  hi kuvindāt ayaḥ  vema ādīn adhiṣṭhāya vyāpārayanti anadhyasta ātma bhāvasya tu deha ādiṣu ātmanaḥ  na vyāpāra yogaḥ  asaṅga tvāt iti arthaḥ ātaḥ ca adhyāsa āśrayāṇi pramāṇāni iti āha na ca pramātṛ tvam antareṇa pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ asti pramāyām khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati antaḥkaraṇa pariṇāma bhedaḥ ca prameya pravaṇaḥ kartṛ sthaḥ cit svabhāvaḥ pramā katham ca jaḍasya antaḥkaraṇasya pariṇāmaḥ cit rūpaḥ  bhavet  yadi cit ātmā tatra na adhyasyeta ḷ katham ca eṣa cit ātma kartṛ kaḥ  bhavet  yadi antaḥkaraṇam vyāpāravat  cit ātmani na adhyasyet ḷ tasmāt itara itara adhyāsāt cit ātma kartṛ stham pramā phalam sidhyati tad siddhau ca pramātṛ tvam tām eva ca pramā murarīkṛtya pramāṇasya pravṛttiḥ pramātṛ tvena ca pramā upalakṣyate pramāyāḥ phalasya abhāve pramāṇam na pravarteta tathā ca pramāṇam apramāṇam syāt iti arthaḥ upasaṃharati tasmāt avidyāvat viṣayāṇi eva pratyakṣa ādīni pramāṇāni syāt etad  bhavatu pṛthagjanānām evam āgama upapatti pratipanna pratyagātma tattvānām vyutpannānām api puṃsām pramāṇa prameya vyavahārā dṛśyanta iti katham avidyāvat viṣayāṇi eva pramāṇa āni iti ata āha paśu ādibhiḥ ca aviśeṣāt iti vidantu nāma āgama upapattibhyām deha indriya ādibhyaḥ  bhinnam pratyagātmānam pramāṇa prameya vyavahāre tu prāṇa bhṛt mātra dharma tvam na ativartante yādṛśaḥ  hi paśu śakunta ādīnām avipratipanna mugdha bhāvānām vyavahāraḥ tādṛśaḥ  vyutpannānām api puṃsām dṛśyate tena tad sāmānyāt teṣām api vyavahāra samaye avidyāvat tvam anumeyam caśabdaḥ samuccaye ukta śaṅkā nivartana sahitā pūrva ukta upapattiḥ avidyāvat puruṣa viṣaya tvam pramāṇānām sādhayati iti arthaḥ etad eva vibhajate yathā hi paśu ādaya iti atra ca śabda ādibhiḥ śrotra ādīnām saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣam pramāṇam darśitam śabda ādi vijñāne iti tad phalam uktam pratikūle iti ca anumāna phalam tathā hi śabda ādi svarūpam upalabhya tad jātīyasya pratikūla tām anusmṛtya tad jātīyatayā upalabhyamānasya pratikūla tām anumimata iti udāharati yathā daṇḍa iti śeṣam ati rohita artham syāt etad  bhavantu pratyakṣa ādīni avidyāvat viṣayāṇi śāstram tu ajyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ  yajeta ityādi na deha ātmā adhyāsena pravartitum arhati atra hi āmuṣmika phala upabhoga yogyaḥ adhikārī pratīyate tathā ca pāramarṣam sūtram aśāstra phalam prayoktari tad lakṣaṇa tvāt tasmāt svayam prayoge syāt iti na ca deha ādi bhasmībhūtam pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti deha ādi atiriktam kañcid ātmānam adhikāriṇam ākṣipati śāstram tad avagamaḥ ca vidyā iti katham avidyāvat viṣayam śāstram iti āśaṅkya āha śāstrī yetu iti tu śabdaḥ pratyakṣa ādi vyavahārāt bhinatti śāstrī iyam adhikāra śāstram hi svarga kāmasya puṃsaḥ para loka saṃbandham vinā na nirvahati iti tāvat mātram ākṣipet  na tvarayā saṃsāri tvam api tasya adhikāre anupayogāt  pratyuta aupaniṣadasya puruṣasya akartuḥ abhoktuḥ adhikāra virodhāt  prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karma janita phala bhoga bhāgī karmaṇi adhikārī svāmī bhavati tatra katham akartā prayoktā ḷ katham ca abhoktā karma janita phala bhoga bhāgī ḷ tasmāt anādya vidyā labdha kartṛtva bhoktṛtva brāhmaṇatva ādi abhimāninam naram adhikṛtya vidhi niṣedha śāstram pravartate evam vedāntā api avidyāvat puruṣa viṣayā eva na hi pramātṛ ādi vibhāgāt ṛte tad artha adhigamaḥ te tu avidyāvantam anuśāsataḥ  nirmṛṣṭa nikhila avidyam anuśiṣṭam svarūpaḥ  vyavasthāpayanti iti etāvān eṣām viśeṣaḥ tasmāt avidyāvat puruṣa viṣayāṇi eva śāstrāṇi iti siddham syāt etad  yadi api virodha anupayogābhyām aupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre na apekṣyate tathā api upaniṣadbhyaḥ  avagamyamānaḥ śaknoti adhikāram niroddhum tatas ca paraspara parāhata artha tvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyam apajahi āt ityata āha prāk  ca tathābhūta ātma iti satyam aupaniṣada puruṣa adhigamaḥ adhikāra virodhī tasmāt tu purastāt karma vidhayaḥ sva ucitam vyavahāram abhinirvartayantaḥ  na anupajātena brahma jñānena śakyā niroddhum na ca paraspara parāhatiḥ vidyā vidyāvat puruṣa bhedena vyavasthā upapatteḥ yathā ana hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti sādhya aṃśa niṣedhe api aśyenena abhicaran yajeta iti śāstram pravartamānam ana hiṃsyāt iti anena na virudhyate tad kasya hetoḥ ḷ puruṣa bhedāt iti avajita krodha arātayaḥ puruṣā niṣedhe adhikriyante krodha arāti vaśīkṛtāḥ tu śyena ādi śāstre iti avidyāvat puruṣa viṣaya tvam na ativartata iti yad uktam tad eva sphuṭayati tathā hi iti varṇa adhyāsaḥ arājā rājasūyena yajeta ityādiḥ āśrama adhyāsaḥ agṛhasthaḥ sadṛśīm bhāryām vindeta ityādiḥ vayaḥ  adhyāsaḥ akṛṣṇa keśaḥ  agnīnāt adhīta ityādiḥ avasthā adhyāsaḥ aapratisamādheya vyādhīnām jala ādi praveśena prāṇatyāgaḥ ityādiḥ ādi grahaṇam pātaka upapātaka saṃkarīkaraṇa apātrīkaraṇa malinīkaraṇa ādi adhyāsa upasaṃgraha artham tad evam ātmān ātmanoḥ paraspara adhyāsam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām upapādya pramāṇa prameya vyavahāra pravartanena ca dṛḍhīkṛtya tasya anahartha hetu tvam udāharaṇa prapañcena pratipādayan tad svarupamuktam smārayati adhyāsaḥ  nāma atasmin  tad buddhiḥ iti avocāma asmṛti rūpaḥ paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ iti asya saṃkṣepa abhidhānam etad  tatra aaham iti dharmi tādātmya adhyāsa mātram amama iti anutpādita dharma adhyāsam na anartha hetuḥ iti dharma adhyāsam eva mamakāram sākṣāt aśeṣa anartha saṃsāra kāraṇam udāharaṇa prapañcān āha tad yathā putra bhārī ādiṣu iti deha tādātmyam ātmani adhyasya deham artham putra kalatra ādi svābhyam ca kṛśatva ādivat  āropya āha aham eva vikalaḥ sakalaḥ iti svasya khalu sākalyena sva abhyasākalyāt  svāmī īśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ  bhavati tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmya vaikalyāt  svām ī īśvaraḥ  visalaḥ  asaṃpūrṇaḥ  bhavati bāhya dharmā ye vaikalya ādayaḥ sva abhyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tān ātmani adhyasyati iti arthaḥ yadā ca para upādhyapekṣe deha dharme svāmye iyam gatiḥ tadā kā eva kathā anaupādhikeṣu deha dharmeṣu kṛśatva ādiṣu iti āśa yavān āha tathā deha dharmān iti dehāt api antaraṅgāṇām indriyāṇā m adhyasta ātma bhāvānām dharmān mūkatva ādīn tatas  api antaraṅgasya antaḥkaraṇasya adhyasta ātma bhāvasya dharmān kāma saṃkalpa ādīn ātmani adhyasyati iti yojanā tad anena prapañcena dharma adhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlam dharmyadhyāsam āha evam ahaṃpratyayinam ahaṃpratyayaḥ vṛttiḥ yasmin antaḥkaraṇa ādau saḥ  ayam ahaṃpratyayī tam sva pracāraṇa sākṣiṇi antaḥkaraṇa pracāra sākṣiṇi caitanya udāsīnatābhyām pratyak ātmani adhi asya tad anena kartṛtva bhoktṛ tve upapādite caitanyam upapādayati tam ca pratyak ātmānam sarva sākṣiṇam tad viparyayeṇa antaḥkaraṇa ādi viparyayeṇa antaḥkaraṇa ādi acetanam tasya viparyayaḥ caitanyam tena itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu adhyasyati tad anena antaḥkaraṇa ādi avacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idam anidaṃrūpaḥ cetanaḥ kartā bhoktā kārya kāraṇa avidyā dvaya ādhāraḥ  ahaṅkāra āspadam saṃsārī sarva anartha saṃbhāra bhājanam jīvātmā itaretara adhyāsa upādānaḥ tad upādānaḥ ca adhyāsa iti anādi tvāt bīja aṅkuravat na itaretara āśraya tvam iti uktam bhavati pramāṇa prameya vyavahāra dṛḍhīkṛtam eva śiṣya hitāya svarūpa abhidhāna pūrvakam sarva loka pratyakṣa tayā adhyāsam su dṛḍhīkaroti evam ayam anādiḥ anantaḥ tattva jñānam antareṇa aśakya samucchedaḥ anādi ananta tve hetuḥ uktaḥ naisargika iti mithyā pratyaya rūpaḥ mithyā pratyayānām rūpam anirvacanīya tvam tad yasya sa tathā uktaḥ anirvacanīya iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati asya anartha hetoḥ prahāṇāya virodhi pratyayam vinā kutaḥ asya prahāṇam iti aya uktam ātmā ekatva vidyā pratipattaye pratipattiḥ prāptiḥ tasyai na tu japa mātrāya na api karmasu pravṛttaye ātmā eka tvam vigalita nikhila prapañca tvam ānanda rūpasya sataḥ tad pratipattim nirvicikitsām bhāvayantaḥ  vedāntāḥ sa mūla ghātam adhyāsam upaghnanti etad uktam bhavati asmad pratyayasya ātma viṣayasya samīcīna tve sati brahmaṇaḥ  jñāta tvāt  niṣprayojana tvāt ca na jijñāsā syāt  tad abhāve ca na brahma jñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran api tu avivakṣita arthā japa mātre upayujyeran na hi tad aupaniṣada ātma pratyayaḥ pramāṇa tām aśnute na ca asau  apramāṇam abhyastaḥ  api vāstavam kartṛtva bhoktṛtva ādi ātmanaḥ  apanetum arhati āropitam hi rūpam tattva jñānena apodyate na tu vāstavam atattva jñānena na hi rajjvā rajju tvam sahasram api sarpa dhārā pratyayā apavaditum utsahante mithyājñāna prasañjitam tu rūpam śakyam tattva jñānena apavaditum mithyājñāna saṃskāraḥ ca su dṛḍhaḥ  api tattva jñāna saṃskāreṇa ādara nairantarya dīrdha kāla āsevita tattva jñāna abhyāsa janmanā iti syāt etad  prāṇa ādi upāsanā api vedānteṣu bahulam upalabhyante tad katham sarveṣām vedāntānām ātmā ekatva pratipādanam artha iti ata āha yathā ca ayam arthaḥ ityādi śarīram eva śarīrakam tatra nivāsī śārīrakaḥ  jīvātmā tasya tvaṃpadā abhidheyasya tad pada abhidheya paramātma rūpa tayā yā mīmāṃsā sā tathā uktā etāvān atra artha saṃkṣepaḥ yadi api svādhyāya adhyayana vidhinā svādhyāya pada vācyasya veda rāśeḥ phalavat artha avabodha para tām āpādayatā karma vidhi niṣedhānām iva vedāntānām api svādhyāya śabda vācyānām phalavat artha avabodha para tvam āpāditam yadi api ca aaviśiṣṭaḥ tu vākya arthaḥ iti nyāyāt  mantrāṇām iva vedāntānām artha paratvam autsargikam yadi api ca vedāntebhyaḥ caitanya ānanda ghanaḥ kartṛtva bhoktṛtva rahitaḥ  niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate tathā api kartṛtva bhoktṛtva duḥkha śoka moha mayam ātmānam avagāhamānena ahaṃpratyayena sedeha bādha virahiṇā virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ sva arthāt pracyutā upacarita arthā vā japa mātra upayoginaḥ  vā iti avivakṣita sva arthāḥ tathā ca tad artha vicāra ātmikā catur lakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā na ārabdhavyā na ca sarva janīnāham anubhava siddha  ātmā saṃdigdhaḥ  vā sa prayojanaḥ  vā yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāram prayuñjīta iti pūrva pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu bhavet etad evam yadi ahaṃpratyayaḥ pramāṇam tasya tu uktena krameṇa śruti ādi bādhakatva anupapatteḥ śruti ādibhiḥ ca samasta tīrthakaraiḥ ca prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt adhyāsa tvam evam ca vedāntā na avivakṣita arthāḥ na api upacarita arthāḥ kim tu ukta kṣaṇāḥ pratyagātmā eva teṣām mukhyor athaḥ tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdha tvāt  prayojana tvāt ca yuktā jijñāsā iti āśayavān sūtra kāraḥ tad jijñāsām asūtrayat atha atas  brahma jijñāsā iti jijñāsayā ca saṃdeha prayojane sūcayati tatra sakṣāt icchā vyāpya tvāt brahma jñānam kaṇaṭha uktam prayojanam na ca karma jñānāt parācīnam anuṣṭhānam iva brahma jñānāt parācīnam kiñcid asti yena etad avāntara prayojanam bhavet  kim tu brahma mī māṃsa ākhya tarka iti kartavyatā anujñāta viṣayaiḥ vedāntaiḥ āhitam nirvicikitsam brahma jñānam eva samasta duḥkha upaśama rūpam ānanda eka rasam paramam prayojanam tam artham adhikṛtya hi prekṣāvantaḥ pravartanta itarām tad ca prāptam api anādya vidyā vaśāt aprāptam iva iti prepsitam bhavati yathā sva grīvā gatam api graiveyakam kutaścid bhramāt na asti iti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditam aprāptam iva prāpnoti jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryam iti sva kāraṇam saṃśayam sūcayati saṃśayaḥ ca mīmāṃsā ārambham prayojayati tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvat pravṛtti hetu saṃśaya prayojana sūcanāt  yuktam asya sūtrasya śāstra ādi tvam iti āha bhagavān bhāṣya kāraḥ vedāntamī māṃsā śāstrasya vyāci khya asitasya asmābhiḥ idam ādimam sūtram pūjita vicāra vacanaḥ  mīmāṃsā śabdaḥ parama puruṣa artha hetu bhūta sūkṣmatama artha nirṇaya phala tayā ca vicārasya ca pūjita tā tasya mīmāṃsāyāḥ śāstram sā hi anena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyaḥ  yathāvat pratipādyata iti sūtram ca bahu artha sūcanāt  bhavati yathā āhuḥ laghūni sūcita arthāni su alpa akṣara padāni ca sarvatas  sāra bhūtāni sūtrāṇi āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ iti tad evam sūtra tātparyam vyākhyāya tasya prathama padam atha iti vyācaṣṭe tatra atha śabda ānantarya arthaḥ parigṛhyate teṣu sūtra padeṣu madhye yaḥ  ayam atha śabdaḥ sa ānantarya artha iti yojanā nanu adhikāra arthaḥ  api atha śabdaḥ  dṛśyate yathā aatha eṣa jyotiḥ iti vede yathā vā loke aatha śabda anuśāsanam iti aatha yoga anuśāsanam iti ca tad kim atra adhikāra arthaḥ  na gṛhyata iti ata āha na adhikāra arthaḥ kutas  ḷ brahma jijñāsāyā anadhikārya tvāt  jijñāsā tāvat iha sūtre brahmaṇaḥ ca tad jñānāt ca śabdataḥ pradhānam pratīyate na ca yathā adaṇḍī praiṣānanvāha iti atra apradhānam api daṇḍa śabda arthaḥ  vivakṣyate evam iha api brahma tad jñāne iti yuktam brahmamī māṃsā śāstra pravṛtti aṅga saṃśaya prayojana sūcana artha tvena jijñāsāyā eva vivakṣita tvāt  tad avivakṣāyām tad asūcanena kāka danta parīkṣāyām iva na brahmamīmāṃsāyām prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran na hi tadānīm brahma tad jñānam ca abhidheya prayojane bhavitum arhataḥ anadhyasta ahaṃ pratyaya virodhena vedāntānām evaṃvidher athe prāmāṇya anupapatteḥ karma pravṛtti upayogi tayā upacarita arthānām vā japa upayoginām vā ahum iti evamādīnām iva avivakṣita arthānām api svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi adhīna grahaṇa tvasya saṃbhavāt  tasmāt saṃdeha prayojana sūcanī jijñāsā iha padataḥ  vākyataḥ ca pradhānam vivakṣitavyā na ca tasyāḥ  adhikārya tvam aprastūyamāna tvāt  yena tad samabhivyāhṛtaḥ  atha śabdaḥ  adhikāra arthaḥ syāt  jijñāsā viśeṣaṇam tu brahma jñānam adhikāryam bhavet  na ca tad api atha śabdena saṃbadhyate prādhānya abhāvāt  na ca jijñāsā mīmāṃsā yena yoga anuśāsanavat adhikriyeta na anta tvam nipātya amāṅ māne iti asmāt vā amāna pūjāyām iti asmāt vā dhātoḥ amān bandha ityādinā anicchā arthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsā āpadasya pūjita vicāra vacana tvāt  jñāna icchā vācaka tvāt jijñāsā āpadasya pravartikā hi mīmāṃsāyām jījñāsā syāt  na ca pravarti apravartakayoḥ aikyam ekatve tad bhāva anupapatteḥ na ca sva artha paratvasya upapattau satyām anya artha paratva kalpanā yuktā atiprasaṅgāt  tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam ajijñāsāyāḥ  anadhikārya tvāt iti atha maṅgala arthaḥ  atha śabdaḥ kasmāt na bhavati ḷ tathā ca maṅgala hetu tvāt  pratyaham brahma jijñāsā kartavyā iti sūtra arthaḥ saṃpadyata iti ata āha maṅgalasya ca vākya arthe samanvaya abhāvāt  padārtha eva hi vākya arthe samanvīyate sa ca vācyaḥ  lakṣyaḥ  vā na ca iha maṅgalam atha śabdasya vācyam vā lakṣyam vā kim tu mṛdaṅga śaṅkha dhvanivat atha śabda śravaṇa mātra kāryam na ca kārya jñāpyayoḥ vākya arthe samanvayaḥ śabda vyavahāre dṛṣṭa iti arthaḥ tad kim idānīm maṅgala arthaḥ  aśabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ ḷ tathā ca oṅkāraḥ ca atha śabdaḥ ca dvau  etau brahmaṇaḥ purā kaṇṭham bhittvā viniryātau tasmāt māṅgalikau  ubhau iti smṛti vyāka upa iti ata āha artha antara prayukta eva hi atha śabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgala prayojanaḥ  bhavati artha antareṣu ānantari ādiṣu prayuktaḥ atha śabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇa mātreṇa veṇu vīṇā dhvanivat maṅgalam kurvan maṅgala prayojanaḥ  bhavati anya artham ānīyamāna uda kumbha darśanavat  tena na smṛti vyākopaḥ tena ca iha ānantarya arthasya sataḥ śravaṇa mātreṇa maṅgala artha tā iti arthaḥ syāt etad  pūrva prakṛta apekṣaḥ  atha śabdaḥ  bhaviṣyati vinā eva ānantarya artha tvam tad yathā iyam eva atha śabdam prakṛtya vimṛśyate akim ayam atha śabda ānantarye atha adhikāre iti atra vimarśaka vākye atha śabdaḥ pūrva prakṛtam atha śabdam apekṣya prathama pakṣa upanyāsa pūrvakam pakṣa antara upanyāse na ca asya ānantaryam arthaḥ pūrva prakṛtasya prathama pakṣa upanyāsena vyavāyāt  na ca prakṛta anapekṣā tad anapekṣasya tad viṣayatva abhāvena asamāna viṣaya tayā vikalpa anupapatteḥ na hi jātu bhavati kim nitya ātmā atha anityā buddhiḥ iti tasmāt ānantaryam vinā pūrva prakṛta apekṣa iha atha śabdaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha pūrva prakṛta apekṣāyāḥ ca phalata ānantarya avyatirekāt  asya arthaḥ na vayam ānantaryā artha tām vyasani tayā rocayāmahe kim tu brahma jijñāsā hetu bhūta pūrva prakṛta siddhaye sā ca pūrva prakṛta artha apekṣa tve api atha śabdasya sidhyati iti vyartha ānantarya arthatva avadhāraṇa āgrahaḥ  asmākam iti tad idam uktam aphalataḥ iti paramārthataḥ tu kalpa antara upanyāse pūrva prakṛta apekṣā na ca iha kalpa antara upanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyāt ānantarya artha eva iti yuktam bhavatu ānantarya arthaḥ kim evam satī iti ata āha sati ca ānantarya arthatva iti na tāvat yasya kasyacid atra ānantaryam iti vaktavyam tasya abhidhānam antareṇa api prāpta tvāt  avaśyam hi puruṣaḥ kiñcid kṛtvā kiñcid karoti na ca ānantarya mātrasya dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam vā prayojanam paśyāmaḥ tasmāt tasya atra ānantaryam vaktavyam yad vinā brahma jijñāsā na bhavati yasmin sati tu bhavantī bhavati eva tad idam uktam yad pūrva vṛttam niyamena apekṣata iti syāt etad  dharma jijñāsāyā iva brahma jijñāsāyā api yogya tvāt  svādhyāya adhyayana ānantaryam dharmavat brahmaṇaḥ  api āmnāya eka pramāṇa gamya tvāt tasya ca agṛhītasya sva viṣaye vijñāna ajananāt grahaṇasya ca asvādhyāyaḥ  adhyetavyaḥ iti adhyayanena eva niyata tvāt  tasmāt veda adhyayana ānantaryam eva brahma jijñāsāyā api atha śabda artha iti ata āha svādhyāya ānantaryam tu samānam dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tad viṣayam adhyayanam lakṣayati tathā ca aatha atas  dharma jijñāsā iti anena eva gatam iti na idam sūtram ārabdhavyam dharma śabdasya veda artha mātra upalakṣaṇa tayā dharmavat brahmaṇaḥ  api veda arthatva aviśeṣeṇa veda adhyayana ānantarya upadeśa sāmyāt iti arthaḥ codayati nanu iha karma avabodha ānantaryam viśeṣaḥ dharma jijñāsātaḥ  brahma jijñāsāyāḥ asya arthaḥ avividiṣanti yajñena iti tṛtīyā śrutyā yajña ādīnām aṅga tvena brahma jñāne viniyogāt  jñānasya eva karma tayā icchām prati prādhānyāt  pradhāna saṃbandhāt ca apradhānānām padārtha antarāṇām tatra api ca na vākya artha jñāna utpattau  aṅga bhāvaḥ  yajña ādīnām vākya artha jñānasya vākyāt eva utpatteḥ na ca vākyam sahakāritayā karmāṇi apekṣata iti yuktam akṛta karmaṇām api vidita pada padārtha saṃbandhānām samadhigata śābda nyāya tattvānām guṇa pradhāna bhūta pūrva apara padārtha ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhi yogya ta anusaṃdhānavatām apratyūham vākya artha pratyaya utpatteḥ anutpattau vā vidhi niṣedha vākya artha pratyaya abhāvena tad artha anuṣṭhāna parivarjana abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tad bodhataḥ tu tad artha anuṣṭhāna parivarjane paraspara āśrayaḥ tasmin sati tad artha anuṣṭhāna parivarjanam tatas ca tad bodha iti na ca vedānta vākyānām eva sva artha pratyāyane karma apekṣā na vākya antarāṇām iti sāṃpratam viśeṣa hetoḥ abhāvāt  nanu atattvam asi iti vākyāt  tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛ bhoktṛ rūpasya jīva ātmanaḥ  nitya śuddha buddha uda āsīna svabhāvena tad padārthena paramātmanā aikyam aśakyam drāk iti eva pratipattum āpātataḥ aśuddha sattvaiḥ yogya tā viraha viniścayāt yajña dāna tapaḥ  anāśaka tanūkṛta antar malāḥ tu viśuddha sattvāḥ śraddadhāna ayogya tā avagama puraḥsaram tādātmyam avagamiṣyanti iti ced  tad kim idānīm pramāṇa kāraṇam yogyatā avadhāraṇam apramāṇāt karmaṇaḥ  vaktu madhya vasitaḥ  asi pratyakṣa ādi atiriktam vā karma api pramāṇam vedānta aviruddha tad mūla nyāya balena tu yogyatā avadhāraṇe kṛtam karmabhiḥ tasmāt  atattvam asi iti ādeḥ śruta mayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātma bhāvam gṛhītvā tad mūlayā ca upapattyā vyavasthāpya tad upāsanāyām bhāvanā para abhidhānāyām dīrgha kālanaiḥ antaryavatyām brahma sākṣātkāra phalāyām yajña ādīnām upayogaḥ yathā āhuḥ asa tu dīrdha kāla nairantarya satkāra āsevitaḥ  dṛḍha bhūmiḥ iti brahmacarya tapaḥ śraddhā yajña ādayaḥ ca satkārāḥ ata eva śrutiḥ atam eva dhīraḥ  vijñāya prajñām kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ iti vijñāya tarka upakaraṇena śabdena prajñām bhāvanām kurvīta iti arthaḥ atra ca yajña ādīnām śreyaḥ paripanthi kalmaṣa nibarhaṇa dvāreṇa upayoga iti kecid  puruṣa saṃskāra dvāreṇa iti anye yajña ādi saṃskṛtaḥ  hi puruṣaḥ ādara nairantarya dīrgha kālaiḥ āsevamānaḥ  brahma bhāva nām anādya vidyā vāsanām sa mūla kāṣam kaṣati tatas  asya pratyagātmā su prasannaḥ kevalaḥ  viśadībhavati ata eva smṛtiḥ amahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ iti ayasya ete aṣṭācatvāriṃśat saṃskārāḥ iti ca apare tu ṛṇa traya apākaraṇena brahma jñāna upayogam karmaṇām āhuḥ asti hi smṛtiḥ aṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ  mokṣe niveśayet iti anye tu atam etam veda anuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena ityādi śrutibhyaḥ tad tad phalāya coditānām api karmaṇām saṃyoga pṛthaktvena brahma bhāvanām pratyaṅga bhāvam ācakṣate kratu arthasya iva khādira tvasya vīrya artha tām aekasya tu ubhaya artha tve saṃyoga pṛthak tvam iti nyāyāt  ata eva pāramarṣam sūtram asarva apekṣā ca yajña ādi śruteḥ aśvavat iti yajña tapaḥ dāna ādi sarvam tad apekṣā brahma bhāvanā iti arthaḥ tasmāt  yadi śruti ādayaḥ pramāṇam yadi vā pāramarṣam sūtram sarvathā yajña ādi karma samuccitā brahma upāsanā viśeṣaṇa trayavatī anādya vidyā tad vāsanā samuccheda krameṇa brahma sākṣātkārāya mokṣa apara nāmne kalpata iti tad artham karmāṇi anuṣṭheyāni na ca etāni dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa sāma vāyi kārāt upakāra hetu bhūta aupadeśika ati deśika krama paryanta aṅga grāma sahita paraspara vibhinna karma svarūpa tad adhikāri bheda pari vinā śakyāni anuṣṭhātum na ca dharma mīmāṃsā pariśīlanam vinā tad parijñānam tasmāt sādhu uktam akarma avabodha ānantaryam viśeṣaḥ iti karma avabodhena hi karma anuṣṭhāna sāhityam bhavati brahma upāsanāyāḥ  iti arthaḥ tad etad nirākaroti na iti kutas  ḷ karma avabodhāt  prāk api adhīta vedāntasya brahma jijñāsā upapatteḥ idam atra ākūtam brahma upāsanayā bhāvanā para abhidhānayā karmāṇi apekṣyanta iti uktam tatra brūmaḥ kva punar asyāḥ karma apekṣā ḷ kim kārye yathā āgneya ādīnām paramāpūrve cira bhāvi phala anukūle janayitavye samidh ādi apekṣā ḷ svarūpe vā yathā teṣām eva dvis avatta puroḍāśa ādi dravya agni devatā ādi apekṣā ḷ na tāvat kārye tasya vikalpa asaha tvāt tathā hi brahma upāsanāyāḥ  brahma svarūpa sākṣātkāraḥ kāryam abhyupeyaḥ sa ca utpādyaḥ  vā syāt  yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ vikāryaḥ  vā yathā avaghātasya vrīhayaḥ saṃskāryaḥ  vā yathā prokṣaṇasya ulūkhala ādayaḥ prāpyaḥ  vā yathā dohanasya payaḥ na tāvat utpādyaḥ na khalu ghaṭa ādi sākṣātkāra iva jaḍa svabhāvebhyaḥ  ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ  bhinna indriya ādi ādheyaḥ  brahma sākṣāt kāraḥ  bhāvanā dheyaḥ saṃbhavati brahmaṇaḥ  apara adhīna prakāśa tayā tad sākṣātkārasya tad svabhāvyena nityatayā utpādyatva anupapatteḥ tatas  bhinnasya vā bhāvanā ādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhā pratyayavat  saṃśaya ākrānta tayā prāmāṇya ayogāt tadvidhasya tad sāmagrīkasya eva bahulam vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ na khalu anumāna avagatam siddham vahnim bhāvayataḥ śīta ārtasya śiśira bhara mantharatara kāya kāṇḍasya sphurat jvālā jaṭila anala sākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇa antareṇa saṃvādyate visaṃvādasya bahulam upalambhāt  tasmāt  prāmāṇika sākṣātkāra lakṣaṇa kārya abhāvāt na upāsanāyā utpādye karma apekṣā na ca kūṭastha nityasya sarva vyāpinaḥ  brahmaṇa upāsanātaḥ  vikāra saṃskāra prāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti syāt etad  mā bhūt brahma sākṣātkāra utpādya ādi rūpa upāsanāyāḥ saṃskāryaḥ tu anirvacanīya avidyā dvaya pidhāna apanayanena bhaviṣyati pratisīrā apihitā nartakī iva pratisīra apanaya dvārā raṅga vyāpṛtena tatra ca karmaṇām upayogaḥ etāvān  tu viśeṣaḥ pratisīra apanaye pāriṣadānām nartakī viṣayaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ  bhavati iha tu avidyā pidhāna apanaya mātram eva na aparam utpādyam asti brahma sākṣātkārasya brahma svabhāvasya nitya tvena anutpādya tvāt  atra ucyate kā punar iyam brahma upāsanā ḷ kim śābda jñāna mātra saṃtatiḥ āhaḥ nirvicikitsaśa abda jñāna saṃtatiḥ ḷ yadi śābda jñāna mātra saṃtatiḥ na tarhi iyam abhyāsyamānā api avidyām samucchettum arhati tattva viniścayaḥ tad abhyāsaḥ  vā sa vāsanam viparyāsam unmūlayet  na saṃśaya abhyāsaḥ sāmānya mātra darśana abhyāsaḥ  vā na hi sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ  vā iti vā āroha pariṇāhavat  dravyam iti vā śataśas  api jñānam abhyasyamānam puruṣa eva iti niścayāya paryāptam ṛte viśeṣa darśanāt  nanu uktam śruta mayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātma bhāvam gṛhītvā yukti mayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti tasmāt nirvicikat sa śābda jñāna saṃtati rūpa upāsanā karma sahakāriṇī vidyā dvaya uccheda hetuḥ na ca asau  anutpādita brahma anubhavā tad ucchedāya paryāptā sākṣātkāra rūpaḥ  hi viparyāsaḥ sākṣātkāra rūpeṇa eva tattva jñānena ucchidyate na tu parokṣa avabhāsena diś moha alāta cakra calat vṛkṣa maru marīci salila ādi vibhrameṣu aparokṣa avabhāsiṣu aparokṣa avabhāsibhiḥ eva diś ādi tattva pratyayaiḥ nivṛtti darśanāt  naḥ khalu āpta vacana liṅga ādi niścita diś ādi tattvānām diś moha āt ayaḥ  nivartante tasmāt  tvaṃpadārthasya tad padārtha tvena sākṣātkāra eṣitavyaḥ etāvatā hi tvaṃpadārthasya duḥkhi śokitvā ādi sākṣātkāra nivṛttiḥ na anyathā na ca eṣa sākṣātkāraḥ  mīmāṃsā sahitasya api śabda pramāṇasya phalam api tu pratyakṣasya tasya eva tad phalatva niyamāt anyathā kuṭaja bījāt api vaṭa aṅkura utpatti prasaṅgāt  tasmāt nirvicikitsa vākya artha bhāvanā paripāka sahitam antaḥkaraṇam tvaṃpadārthasya aparokṣasya tad tad upādhi ākāra niṣedhena tad padārtha tām āvirbhāvayati iti yuktam na ca ayam anubhavataḥ  brahma svabhāvaḥ  yena na janyeta api tu antaḥkaraṇasya eva vṛtti bhedaḥ  brahma viṣayaḥ na ca etāvatā brahmaṇaḥ  api para adhīna prakāśa tā na hi śābda jñāna prakāśyam brahma svayam prakāśam na bhavati sarva upādhi vihīnam hi svayan jyotiḥ iti gīyate na tu upahitam api yathā āha sma bhagavān bhāṣya kāraḥ ana tāvat ayam ekāntena aviṣayaḥ iti na ca antaḥkaraṇa vṛttau  api asya sākṣātkāre sarva upādhi vinirmokaḥ tasya eva tad upādheḥ vinaśyat avasthasya sva para upādhi virodhinaḥ  vidyamāna tvāt  anyathā caitanya  chāyā pattim vinā antaḥ karaṇa vṛtteḥ svayam acetanāyāḥ sva prakāśatva anupapattau sākṣātkāratva ayogāt na ca anumita bhāvita vahni sākṣāt kāravat  pratibhā tvena asya aprāmāṇyam tatra vahni sva lakṣaṇasya parokṣa tvāt iha tu brahma svarūpasya upādhi kaluṣitasya jīvasya prāk api aparokṣa tvāt na hi śuddha buddha tvāt ayaḥ  vastutas tatas  atiricyante jīva eva tu tad tad upādhi rahitaḥ śuddha buddhatva ādi svabhāvaḥ  brahma iti gīyate na ca tad tad upādhi virahaḥ  api tatas  atiricyate tasmāt  yathā gāndharva śāstra artha jñāna abhyāsa āhita saṃskāra sacivaḥ śrotra indriyeṇa ṣaḍja ādi svara grāma mūrchana abhedam adhyakṣam anubhavati evam vedānta artha jñāna abhyāsa āhita saṃskāraḥ  jīvaḥ svasya brahma bhāvam antaḥkaraṇena iti antaḥkaraṇa vṛttau brahma sākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tad upāsanāyāḥ karma apekṣā iti ced  na tasyāḥ karma anuṣṭhāna sahabhāva abhāvena tad sahakāritva anupapatteḥ na khalu atattvam asi iti ādeḥ vākyāt nirvicikitsam śuddha buddha uda āsīna svabhāvam akartṛtva ādi upetam apeta brāhmaṇatva ādi jātim deha ādi atiriktam ekam ātmānam pratipadyamānaḥ karmasu adhikāram avaboddhum arhati anarhaḥ ca katham kartā vā adhikṛtaḥ  vā yadi ucyeta niścite api tattve viparyāsa nibandhanaḥ  vyavahāraḥ  anuvartamānaḥ  dṛśyate yathā guḍasya mādhurya viniścaye api pitta upahata indriyāṇām tikta tā avabhāsā anuvṛttiḥ āsvādya thūtkṛtya tyāgāt  tasmāt avidyā saṃskāra anuvṛttyā karma anuṣṭhānam tena ca vidyā sahakāriṇā tad samuccheda upapatsyate na ca karma avidyā ātmakam katham avidyām ucchinatti karmaṇaḥ  vā tad ucchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam sajātīya sva para virodhinām bhāvānām bahulam upalabdheḥ yathā payaḥ payaḥ  antaram jarayati svayam ca jīryati yathā viṣam viṣa antaram śamayati svayam ca śāmyati yathā vā kataka rajaḥ  rajaḥ  antarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptam rajaḥ  antarāṇi bhindat  svayam api bhidyamānam anāvilam pāthaḥ karoti evam karma avidyā ātmakam api avidyā antarāṇi apagamayat svayam api apagacchati iti atra ucyate satyam asat eva somya idam agra āsīt iti upakramāt  atattvam asi iti antāt śabdāt brahma mī māṃsa upakaraṇāt asakṛt abhyastāt nirvicikitse anādya vidyā upādāna deha ādi atirikta pratyagātma tattva avabodhe jāte api avidyā saṃskāra anuvṛttyā anuvartante sāṃsārikāḥ pratyayāḥ tad vyavahārāḥ ca tathā api tān api ayam vyavahāra pratyayāt mithyā iti manyamānaḥ  vidvān ca śraddhatte pitta upahata indriya iva guḍam thūtkṛtya tyajan  api tasya tikta tām tathā ca ayam kriyā kartṛ karaṇa iti kartavya tā phala prapañcam atāttvikam viniścinvan katham adhikṛtaḥ  nāma ḷ viduṣaḥ  hi adhikāraḥ anyathā paśu śūdra ādīnām api adhikāraḥ  durvāraḥ syāt  kriyā kartṛ ādi svarūpa vibhāgam ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvān abhimataḥ karma kāṇḍe ata eva bhagavān avidvat viṣaya tvam śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣya kāraḥ tasmāt yathā rāja jātīya abhimāni kartṛke rājasūye na vipra vaiśya jātīya abhimāninoḥ adhikāraḥ evam dvijāti kartṛ kriyā karaṇa ādi vibhāga abhimāni kartṛke karmaṇi na tad anabhimāninaḥ  adhikāraḥ na ca anadhikṛtena samarthena api kṛte vaidikam karma phalāya kalpate vaiśya stoma iva brāhmaṇa rājanyābhyām tena dṛṣṭa artheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam dṛṣṭa tvāt  adṛṣṭa artheṣu tu śāstra eka samadhigamyam phalam anadhi kāriṇi na yujyata iti na upāsanā kārye karma apekṣā syāt etad  manuṣya abhimānavat adhikārike karmaṇi vihite yathā tad abhimāna rahitasya anadhikāraḥ evam niṣedha vidhayaḥ  api manuṣya adhikārā iti tad abhimāna rahitaḥ teṣu api na adhikriyeta paśu ādivat  tathā ca ayam niṣiddham anutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt  tiryak ādivat iti bhinna karma tā āpātaḥ mā evam na khalu ayam sarvathā manuṣya abhimāna rahitaḥ kim tu avidyā saṃskāra anuvṛttyā asya mātrayā tad abhimānaḥ  anuvartate anuvartamānam ca mithyā iti manyamānaḥ  na śraddhatta iti uktam kim atas  yadi evam ḷ etad atas  bhavati vidhiṣu śrāddhaḥ  adhikārī na aśrāddhaḥ tatas ca manuṣya ādi abhimāne na śraddhadhānaḥ  na vidhi śāstreṣu adhikriyate tathā ca smṛtiḥ aaśraddhayā hutam dattam iti ādikā niṣedha śāstram tu na śraddhām apekṣate api tu niṣidhyamāna kriyā unmukhaḥ  nara iti eva pravartate tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śraddhā avagata brahma tattvaḥ  api niṣedham atikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaiti iti na bhinna karma darśana abhyupagamaḥ tasmāt na upāsanāyāḥ kārye karma apekṣā ata eva na upāsana utpattau  api nirvicikitsaśa abda jñāna utpatti uttara kālam anadhikāraḥ karmaṇi iti uktam tathā ca śrutiḥ ana karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgena eke amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ iti tad kim idānīm anupayoga eva sarvathā iha karmaṇām ḷ tathā ca avividiṣanti yajñena ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ virudhyeran na ārāt upakāraka tvāt karmaṇām yajña ādīnām tathā hi tam etam ātmānam veda anuvacanena nitya svādhyāyena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti veditum icchanti na tu vidanti vastutas  pradhānasya api vedanasya prakṛti artha tayā śabdataḥ guṇa tvāt  icchāyāḥ ca pratyaya artha tayā prādhānyāt  pradhānena ca kārya saṃpratyayāt na hi arāja puruṣam ānaya iti ukte vastutas  pradhānaḥ  api rājā puruṣa viśeṣaṇa tayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate api tu puruṣa eva śabdataḥ tasya prādhānyāt  evam veda anuvacanasya iva yajñasya api icchā sādhana tayā vidhānam evam tapasaḥ  anāśakasya kāma anaśanam eva tapaḥ hita mitamedhya āśinaḥ  hi brahmaṇi vividiṣā bhavati na tu sarvathā anaśnataḥ maraṇāt  na api cāndrāyaṇa ādi tapaḥ tad śīlasya dhātu vaiṣamya āpatteḥ etāni ca nityāni upātta durita nibarhaṇena puruṣam saṃskurvanti tathā ca śrutiḥ asa ha vā ātmā yājī yaḥ  veda idam me anena aṅgam saṃskriyata idam me anena aṅgam upadhīyate iti anena iti prakṛtam yajña ādi parāmṛśati smṛtiḥ ca ayasya ete aṣṭācatvāriṃśat saṃskārāḥ iti nitya naimittika anuṣṭhāna prakṣīṇa kalmaṣasya ca viśuddha sattvasya aviduṣa eva utpanna vividiṣasya jñāna uttapattim darśayati ātharvaṇī śrutiḥ viśuddha sattvaḥ tatas tu tam paśyati niṣkalam dhyāyamānaḥ iti smṛtiḥ ca ajñānam utpadyate puṃsām kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ iti ādikā kḷptena eva ca nityānām karmaṇām nityehitena upātta durita nibarhaṇena puruṣa saṃskāreṇa jñāna utpattau  aṅga bhāva upapattau na saṃyoga pṛthaktvena sākṣāt aṅga bhāvaḥ  yuktaḥ kalpanā gaurava āpatteḥ tathā hi nitya karmaṇām anuṣṭhānāt dharma utpādaḥ tatas  pāpmā nivartate sa hi anitya aśuci duḥkha rūpe saṃsāre nitya śuci sukha khyāti lakṣaṇena viparyāsena citta sattvam malinayati atas  pāpa nivṛttau pratyakṣa upapatti dvāra apāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣa upapattibhyām saṃsārasya anitya aśuci duḥsva rūpa tvam apratyūham avabudhyate tatas  asya asmin  anabhirati saṃjñam vairāgyam upajāyate tatas tad jihāsā upāvartate tatas  hāna upāyam paryeṣate paryeṣamāṇaḥ ca ātma tattva jñānam asya upāya iti upaśrutya tad jijñāsate tatas  śravaṇa ādi krameṇa tad jānātīti ārāt upakāraka tvam tattva jñāna utpādam prati citta sattva śuddhyā karmaṇām yuktam iyam eva artham anuvadati bhagavadgītā aārurukṣoḥ muneḥ yogam karma kāraṇam ucyate yoga ārūḍhasya tasya eva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate iti evam ca ananuṣṭhita karmā api prāk bhavīya karma vaśāt yaḥ  viśuddha sattvaḥ saṃsāra asāra tā darśanena niṣpanna vairāgyaḥ kṛtam tasya karma anuṣṭhānena vairāgya utpāda upayoginā prāk bhavīya karma anuṣṭhānāt eva tad siddheḥ iyam eva ca puruṣa dhaureya bhedam adhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ ayadi vetarathā brahmacaryāt eva pravrajet iti tad idam uktam karma avabodhāt  prāk api adhīta vedāntasya brahma jijñāsā upapatteḥ iti ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi yena tad apākaraṇa artham karma anutiṣṭhet etad anurodhāt ca ajāyamānaḥ  vai brāhmaṇaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇavā jāyate iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam anyathā ayadi vetarathā brahmacaryāt eva iti śrutiḥ virudhyeta gṛhasthasya api ca ṛṇa apākaraṇam sattva śuddhi artham eva jarā maryavādaḥ  bhasma anta tāvādaḥ  antyeṣṭayaḥ ca karma jaḍāna viduṣaḥ prati na tu ātma tattva vidaḥ paṇḍitān tasmāt tasya ānantaryam atha śabda arthaḥ yad vinā brahma jijñāsā na bhavati yasmin  tu sati bhavantī bhavati eva na ca ittham karma avabodhaḥ tasmāt na karma avabodha ānantarya mātra atha śabda artha  iti sarvam avadātam syāt etad  mā bhūt agni hotra yavāgū pākavat arthaḥ kramaḥ śrautaḥ tu bhaviṣyanti agṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet  vanī bhūtvā pravrajet iti jābāla śrutiḥ ga arhasthyena hi yajña ādi anuṣṭhānam sūcayati smaranti ca aadhītya vidhivat vedān putrān  ca utpādya dharmataḥ iṣṭvā ca śaktitaḥ  yajñaiḥ manaḥ  mokṣe niveśayet  iti nindanti ca aanadhītya dvijaḥ  vedān anutpādya tathā ātmajān aniṣṭvā ca eva yajñaiḥ ca mokṣam icchan vrajati adhaḥ iti āha yathā ca hṛdaya ādi avadānānām ānantarya niyamaḥ kutas  ḷ ahṛdayasya agre avadyati atha jihvāyāḥ  atha vakṣasaḥ iti atha agra śabdābhyām kramasya vivakṣita tvāt  na tathā iha kramaḥ  vivakṣitaḥ śrutyā tayā eva anantaram aniyamasya darśita tvāt  ayadi vetarathā brahmacaryāt eva pravrajet gṛhāt vā vanāt vā iti etāvatā hi vairāgyam upalakṣayati ata eva ayat ahar eva virajet tad ahar eva pravrajet iti śrutiḥ nindā vacanam ca aviśuddha sattva puruṣa abhiprāyam aviśuddha sattvaḥ  hi mokṣam icchan  ālasyāt tad upāye apravartamānaḥ  gṛhastha dharmam api nitya naimittikam anācaran pratikṣaṇam upacīyamāna pāpmā adhas gatim gacchati iti arthaḥ syāt etad  mā bhūt śrauta ārthaḥ  vā kramaḥ pāṭha sthāna mukhya pravṛtti pramāṇakaḥ tu kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha śeṣa śeṣi tve pramāṇa abhāvāt  śeṣāṇām samidh ādīnām śeṣiṇām ca āgneya ādīnām eka phalavat upakāra upanibaddhānām eka phala avacchinnānām eka prayoga vacana upagṛhītānām eka adhikāri kartṛkāṇām eka paurṇamāsya māvāsya akāla saṃbaddhānām yugapad  anuṣṭhāna aśakteḥ sāmarthyāt krama prāptau tad viśeṣa apekṣāyām pāṭhā ādayaḥ tad bheda niyamāya prabhavanti yatra tu na śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ na api eka adhikāra avacchedaḥ yathā saurya āryamṇa prājāpatya ādīnām tatra krama bheda apekṣā bhāvāt na pāṭhā ādiḥ krama viśeṣa niyame pramāṇam avarjanīya tayā tasya tatra avagata tvāt  na ca iha dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ śeṣa śeṣi bhāve śruti ādīnām anyatamam pramāṇam asati iti nanu śeṣa śeṣi bhāva abhāve api krama niyamaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ yathā gaḥ dohanasya puruṣa arthasya dārśa paurṇamāsikaiḥ aṅgaiḥ saha yathā vā adarśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti darśa pūrṇamāsa somayoḥ aśeṣa śeṣiṇoḥ iti ata āha adhikṛta adhikāre vā pramāṇa abhāvāt  iti yojanā svarga kāmasya hi darśa pūrṇamāsa adhikṛtasya paśu kāmasya sataḥ  darśa pūrṇam āsa kratu arthāp praṇayana āśrite gaḥ dohane adhikāraḥ naḥ khalu gaḥ dohana dravyam avyāpriyamāṇam sākṣāt paśūn bhāvayitum arhati na ca vyāpāra antara āviṣṭam śrūyate yatas tad aṅga kramam atipatet ap praṇayana āśritam tu pratīyate acamasena apaḥ praṇayet gaḥ dohanena paśukāma āsya iti samabhivyāhārāt  yogya tvāt ca asya apām praṇayanam prati tasmāt kratvarthāp praṇaya na āśrita tvāt gaḥ dohanasya tad krameṇa puruṣa artham api gaḥ dohanam kramavat iti siddham śruti nirākaraṇena eva iṣṭi soma kramavat api kramaḥ  apāstaḥ  veditavyaḥ śeṣa śeṣitva adhikṛta adhikāra abhāve api kramaḥ  vivakṣyeta yadi eka phala avacchedaḥ  bhavet  yathā āgneya ādīnām ṣaṇṇām eka svarga phala avacchinnānām yadi vā jijñāsi abrahmaṇaḥ aṃśaḥ dharmaḥ syāt  yathā catur lakṣaṇī vyutpādyam brahma kenacid kenacid  aṃśena ekena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate tatra caturṇām lakṣaṇānām jijñāsyā bhedena paraspara saṃbandhe sati kramaḥ  vivakṣitaḥ tathā iha api eka jijñāsya tayā dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ kramaḥ  vivakṣyeta na ca etad ubhayam api asti iti āha phala jijñāsya bhedāt ca phala bhedam vibhajate abhyudaya phalam dharma jñānam iti jijñāsāyā vastu tas  jñāna tantra tvāt jñāna phalam jijñāsā phalam iti bhāvaḥ na kevalam svarūpataḥ phala bhedaḥ tad utpādana prakāra bhedāt api tad bheda iti āha tad ca anuṣṭhāna apekṣam
