brahma jñānam ca na anuṣṭhāna antara apekṣam śābda jñāna abhyāsa at na anuṣṭhāna antaram apekṣate nitya naimittika karma anuṣṭhāna sahabhāvasya apāsta tvāt  iti bhāvaḥ jijñāsyabhedam ātyantikam āha bhavyaḥ ca dharma iti bhavitā bhavyaḥ kartari kṛtyaḥ bhavitā ca bhāvaka vyāpāra nirvartyatayā tad tantra iti tatas  prāk jñāna kāle na asti iti arthaḥ bhūtam satyam sat ekāntatas na kadācid asat iti arthaḥ na kevalam svarūpataḥ  jijñāsyayoḥ bhedaḥ jñāpaka pramāṇa pravṛtti bhedāt api bheda iti āha codanā pravṛtti bhedāt ca codanā iti vaidikam śabdam āha viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya lakṣaṇāt  pravṛtta bhedam vibhajate yā hi codanā dharmasya iti ājñā ādīnām puruṣa abhiprāya bhedānām asaṃbhavāt apauruṣeye vede codana upadeśaḥ ata eva uktam atasya jñānam upadeśaḥ iti sā ca sva sādhye puruṣa vyāpāre bhāvanāyām tad viṣaye ca yāga ādau sa hi bhāvanā viṣayaḥ tad adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt prayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ aṣiñ bandhane iti asmāt  dhātoḥ viṣaya pada vyutpatteḥ bhāvanāyāḥ tad dvāreṇa ca yāga ādeḥ apekṣita upāya tām avagamayantī tatra icchā upahāra mukheṇa puruṣam niyuñjānā eva yāga ādi dharmam avabodhayati na anyathā brahma codanā tu puruṣam avabodhayati eva kevalam na tu pravartayanti avabodhayati kutas  ḷ avabodhasya pravṛttiḥ ahitasya codanā janya tvāt nanu aātmā jñātavyaḥ iti etad vidhi paraiḥ veda antaiḥ tad eka vākya tayā avabodhe pravartayadbhiḥ eva puruṣaḥ  brahmā avabodhyata iti samāna tvam dharma codanābhiḥ brahma codanānām ityata āha na puruṣaḥ  avabodhe niyujyate ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ na tāvat brahma sākṣātkāre puruṣaḥ  niyoktavyaḥ tasya brahma svābhāvyena nitya tvāt  akārya tvāt  na api upāsanāyām tasyāḥ  api jñāna prakarṣe hetu bhāvasya anvaya vyatireka siddha tayā prāpta tvena avidheya tvāt  na api śābda bodhe tasya api adhīta vedasya puruṣasya vidita padatad arthasya samadhigata śābda nyāya tattvasya apratyūham utpatteḥ atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā akṣa artha iti dārṣṭa antike yojayati tadvat  iti api ca ātma jñāna vidhi pareṣu vedānteṣu na ātma tattva viniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt  na hi tadā ātma tattva parāste kim tu tad jñāna vidhi parāḥ yad parāḥ ca te ta eva teṣām arthāḥ na ca bodhasya bodhya niṣṭha tvāt apekṣita tvāt  anya parebhyaḥ  api bodhya tattva viniścayaḥ samāropeṇa api tad upapatteḥ tasmāt na bodha vidhi parā vedāntā iti siddham prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt kim api vaktavyam iti yasmin  asati brahma jijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavati eva iti arthaḥ tad āha ucyate nitya anitya vastu viveka ityādi nityaḥ pratyagātmā anityāḥ deha indriya viṣaya ādayaḥ tad viṣayaḥ ced vivekaḥ  niścayaḥ kṛtam asya brahma jijñāsayā jñāta tvāt brahmaṇaḥ atha vivekaḥ  jñāna mātram na niścayaḥ tathā sati eṣa viparyāsāt anyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt  tathā ca na vairāgyam bhāvayet  abhāvayan katham brahma jijñāsā hetuḥ ḷ tasmāt evam vyākhyeyam nitya anityayoḥ vasati iti nitya anitya vastu tad dharmaḥ nitya anityayoḥ dharmiṇoḥ tad dharmāṇām ca vivekaḥ  nitya anitya vastu vivekaḥ etad uktam bhavati mā bhūt  idam ṛtam nityam idam tad anṛtam anityam iti dharmi viśeṣayoḥ vivekaḥ dharmi mātrayoḥ nitya anityayoḥ tad dharmayoḥ ca vivekam niścinoti eva nitya tvam satya tvam tad yasya asti tad nityam satyam tathā ca āsthā gocaraḥ anitya tvam asatya tvam tad yasya asti tad anityam anṛtam tathā ca anā sthā gocaraḥ tad eteṣu anubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmad asmad pratyaya gocareṣu viṣaya viṣayiṣu yadṛtam nityam sukham vyavasthāsyate tad āsthā gocaraḥ  bhaviṣyati yadtva nityam anṛtam bhaviṣyati tāpa traya parītam tad tyakṣyata iti saḥ  ayam nitya anitya vastu vivekaḥ prāk bhavīyāt aihikādvā karmaṇaḥ  viśuddha sattvasya bhavati anubhava upapattibhyām na khalu satyam nāma na kiñcid asti iti vācyam tad abhāve tad adhiṣṭhānasya anṛtasya api anupapatteḥ śūnya vādinām api śūnyatāyāḥ  eva satya tvāt  atha asya puruṣa dhaureyasya anubhava upapattibhyām evam su nipuṇam nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt  ā ca avīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānam kṣaṇa muhūrtayāmāhorātra ardha māsa māsartu ayana vatsara yuga caturyuga manvantara pralaya mahāpralaya mahā sarga avāntara sarga saṃsāra sāgara ūrmi tāpa traya parītam ātmānam jīva lokam ca avalokya asmin saṃsāra maṇḍale anitya aśuci duḥkha ātmakam prasaṃkhyānam upāvartate tatas  asya īdṛśāt nitya anitya vastu viveka lakṣaṇāt prasaṃkhyānāt ihamutra artha bhega virāgaḥ bhavati arthyate prārthyata iti arthaḥ phalam iti yāvat  tasmin virāgaḥ  nāma anābhoga ātmikā upekṣā buddhiḥ tatas  śama dama ādi sādhana saṃpad  rāga ādi kaṣāya madirā mattam hi manaḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu uccāvacam indriyāṇi pravartayat  vividhāḥ ca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat  puruṣam ati ghore vividha duḥkha jvālā jaṭāle saṃsāra hutabhuji juhoti prasaṃkhyāna abhyāsa labdha vairāgya paripāka bhagna rāga ādi kaṣāya madirā madam tu manaḥ puruṣeṇa avajīyate vaśīkriyate saḥ  ayam asya vairāgya hetukaḥ manaḥ vijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkara saṃjña iti ca ākhyāyate vijitam ca manaḥ tattva viṣaya viniyoga yogya tām nīyate sā iyam asya yogya tā damaḥ yathā dāntaḥ  ayam vṛṣabhayuvā hala śakaṭa ādi vahana yogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate ādi grahaṇena ca viṣaya titikṣā tad uparama tattva śraddhāḥ saṃgṛhyante ata eva śrutiḥ atasmāt śāntaḥ  dānta uparataḥ titikṣuḥ śraddhā vittaḥ  bhūtvā ātmani eva ātmānam paśyet  sarvam ātmani paśyati iti tad etasya śama dam ādi rūpasya sādhanasya saṃpad  prakarṣaḥ śama dama ādi sādhana saṃpad  tatas  asya saṃsāra bandhanāt mumukṣā bhavati iti āha mumukṣu tvam ca iti tasya ca nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāva brahma jñānam mokṣasya kāraṇam iti upaśrutya tad jijñāsā bhavati dharma jijñāsāyāḥ prāk ūrdhvam ca tasmāt teṣām eva ānantaryam na dharma jijñāsāyā iti āha teṣu hi iti na kevalam jijñāsā mātram api tu jñānam api iti āha jñātum ca upasaṃharati tasmāt  iti krama prāptam atas śabdam vyācaṣṭe atas śabdaḥ  hetu arthaḥ tam eva atas śabdasya hetu rūpam artham āha yasmāt veda eva iti atra evam paricodyate satyam yathā ukta sādhana saṃpatti anantaram brahma jijñāsā bhavati sā eva tu anupapannā iha amutra phala bhoga virāgasya anupapatteḥ anukūla vedanīyam hi phalam iṣṭa lakṣaṇa tvāt phalasya na ca anurāga hetau  asya vairāgyam bhavitum arhati duḥkha anuṣaṅga darśanāt sukhe api vairāgyam iti ced  hanta bhoḥ sukha anuṣaṅgāt duḥkhe api anurāgaḥ  na kasmāt bhavati ḷ tasmāt  sukhe upādīyamāne duḥkha parihāre prayatitavyam avarjanīya tayā duḥkham āgatam api parihṛtya sukha mātram bhokṣyate tad yathā matsya arthī sa śalkān sa kaṇṭakān matsyān upādatte sa yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya nivartate yathā vā dhānya arthī sa palālāni dhānyāni āharati sa yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya nivartate tasmāt duḥkha bhayāt na anukūla vedanīyamaihikam vāmuṣmikam vā sukham parityaktum ucitam na hi mṛgāḥ santi iti śālayaḥ  na upyante bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ  na adhiśrīyante api ca dṛṣṭam sukham candana vanitā ādi saṅga janma kṣayitā lakṣaṇena duḥkhena āghrāta tvāt ati bhīruṇā tyajyeta api na tvā amuṣmikam svarga ādi tasya avināśi tvāt  śrūyate hi aapāma somam amṛtā abhūma iti tathā ca aakṣayyam ha vai cāturmāsya yājinaḥ sukṛtam bhavati iti na ca kṛtakatva hetukam vināśitvā anumānam atra saṃbhavati nara śiraḥ kapāla śauca anumānavat āgama bādhita viṣaya tvāt tasmāt yathā ukta sādhana saṃpatti abhāvāt na brahma jijñāsā iti prāptam evam prāpte āha bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ aataḥ iti tasya artham vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ yasmāt veda eva iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ satyam mṛgabhikṣuka ādayaḥ śakyāḥ parihartum pācaka kṛṣīvala ādibhiḥ duḥkham tu anekavidha aneka kāraṇa saṃpāta jama śakya parihāram antatas  sādhana āpāratantrya kṣayita lakṣaṇayoḥ duḥkhayoḥ samasta kṛtaka sukha āvinābhāva niyamāt na hi madhu viṣa saṃpṛktam annam viṣam parityajya madhu miśram śakyam śilpi vareṇa api bhoktum kṣayitā anumāna upodvalitam ca atat yathā iha karma citaḥ ityādi vacanam kṣayitā pratipādakam aapāma somam iti ādikam vacanam mukhya asaṃbhave jaghanya vṛtti tām āpādayati yathā āhuḥ paurāṇikāḥ aābhūta saṃplavam sthānam amṛta tvam hi bhāṣyate iti atra ca brahma padena tad pramāṇam veda upasthāpitaḥ sa ca yogya tvāt  atat yathā iha karma citaḥ ityādiḥ aataḥ iti sarva nāmnā parāmṛśya hetu pañcamyā nirdiśyate syāt etad  yathā svarga ādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkha anuṣaṅgaḥ tathā brahmaṇaḥ  api iti ata āha tathā brahma vijñānāt api iti tena ayam arthaḥ atas  svarga ādīnām kṣayitā pratipādakāt  brahma jñānasya ca parama puruṣa arthatā pratipādakāt  āgamāt  yathā ukta sādhana saṃpad  tatas ca jijñāsā iti siddham brahma jijñāsā pada vyākhyānam āha brahmaṇa iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pradarśanena prācām vṛtti kṛtām brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahma jijñāsā iti caturthī samāsaḥ parāḥ taḥ veditavyaḥ atādarthya samāse prakṛti vikṛti grahaṇam kartavyam iti kātyāyanīya vacanena yūpa dāru ādiṣu eva prakṛti vikāra bhūteṣu caturthī samāsa niyamāt  aprakṛti vikāra bhūte iti evamādau tad niṣedhāt  aaśva ghāsa ādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsā bhaviṣyanti iti aśva ghāsa ādiṣu ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pratividhānāt ṣaṣṭhī samāse api ca brahmaṇaḥ  vāstava prādhānya upapatteḥ iti syāt etad  brahmaṇaḥ  jijñāsā iti ukte tatra aneka artha tvāt brahma śabdasya saṃśayaḥ kasya brahmaṇaḥ  jijñāsā ḷ iti asti brahma śabdaḥ  vipratva jātau yathā brahmahatyā iti asti ca vede yathā brahmojjham iti asti ca parama ātmani yathā abrahma veda brahmā eva bhavati iti tam imam saṃśayam apākaroti brahma ca vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇam iti yatas  brahma jijñāsām pratijñāya tad jñāpanāya paramātma lakṣaṇam praṇayati tatas  avagacchāmaḥ parama ātma jijñāsā eva iyam na vipratva jāti ādi jijñāsā iti arthaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsa parigrahe api na iyam karma ṣaṣṭhī kim tu śeṣa lakṣaṇā saṃbandha mātram ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇaḥ  jijñāsā iti ukte brahma saṃbandhinī jijñāsā iti uktam bhavati tathā ca brahma svarūpa pramāṇa yukti sādhana prayojana jijñāsāḥ sarvā brahma jijñāsā arthā brahma jijñāsayā avaruddhā bhavanti sākṣāt  pāramparyeṇa vā brahma saṃbandhāt  karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyām tu brahma śabda arthaḥ karma sa ca svarūpam eva iti tad pramāṇāt ayaḥ  na avarudhyeran tathā ca apratijñāta artha cintā pramāṇa ādiṣu bhavet  iti ye manyante tān pratyāha brahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti atra hetum āha jijñāsya iti icchāyāḥ pratipatti anubandhaḥ jñānam jñānasya ca jñeyam brahma naḥ khalu jñānam jñeyam vinā nirūpyate na ca jijñāsā jñānam vinā iti pratipatti anubandha tvāt  prathamam jijñāsā karma eva apekṣate na tu saṃbandhi mātram tad antareṇa api sati karmaṇi tad nirūpaṇāt  na hi candramasam ādityam vā upalabhya kasya ayam iti saṃbandhi anveṣaṇā bhavati bhavati tu jñānam iti ukte viṣaya anveṣaṇā kiṃviṣayam iti tasmāt prathamam apekṣita tvāt karma tayā eva brahma saṃbadhyate na tu saṃbandhitā mātreṇa tasya jaghanya tvāt  tathā ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī iti arthaḥ nanu satyam na jijñāsyam antareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate jijñāsya antaram tu asyāḥ  bhaviṣyati brahma tu śeṣa tayā saṃbhantsyata iti ata āha jijñāsya antara iti nigūḍha abhiprāyaḥ codayati nanu śeṣa ṣaṣṭhī parigrahe api iti sāmānya saṃbandhasya viśeṣa saṃbandha avirodhena karma tāyāḥ  avighātena jijñāsā nirūpaṇa upapatteḥ iti arthaḥ nigūḍha abhiprāya eva dūṣayati evam api pratyakṣam brahmaṇa iti vācyasya karma tvasya jijñāsayā prathamam apekṣitasya prathama saṃbandha arhasya ca anvaya parityāgena paścāt kathañcid apekṣitasya saṃbandhi mātrasya saṃbandhaḥ  jaghanyaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaḥ ca jaghanyaḥ iti su vyāhṛtam nyāya tattvam pratyakṣa parokṣata abhidhānam ca prāthamyā prāthamya sphuṭatva asphuṭatva abhiprāyam cedakaḥ sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati na vyarthaḥ brahma āśrita aśeṣa iti vyākhyātam etad adhastāt  samādhātā sva abhisaṃdhim udghāṭayati na pradhāna parigraha iti vāstavam prādhānyam brahmaṇaḥ śeṣam sa nidarśanam ati rohita artham śruti anugamaḥ ca ati rohitaḥ tad evam abhimatam samāsam vyavasthāpya jijñāsā padārtham āha jñātum iti syāt etad  na jñānam icchā viṣayaḥ sukha duḥkha avāpti parihārau vā tad upāyaḥ  vā tad dvāreṇa icchā gocaraḥ na ca evam brahma jñānam na khalu etad anukūlam iti vā pratikūla nivṛttiḥ iti vā anubhūyate na api tayoḥ upāyaḥ tasmin sati api sukha bhedasya adarśanāt  anuvartamānasya ca duḥkhasya anivṛtteḥ tasmāt na sūtrakāra vacana mātra ādiṣi karma tā jñānasya ityata āha avagati paryantam iti na kevalam jñānam iṣyate kim tu avagatim sākṣātkāram kurvat avagati paryantam sanvācyāyāḥ  icchāyāḥ karma kasmāt  ḷ phala viṣaya tvāt icchāyāḥ tad upāyam phala paryantam gocarayati icchā iti śeṣaḥ nanu bhavatu avagati paryantam jñānam kim etāvatā api īṣṭam bhavati ḷ na hi anapekṣaṇīya viṣayam avagati paryantam api jñānam iṣyata iti ata āha jñānena hi pramāṇena avagantum iṣṭam brahma bhavatu brahma viṣaya avagatiḥ evam api katham iṣṭa ityata āha brahma avagatiḥ hi puruṣa arthaḥ kim abhyudayaḥ ḷ na kim tu niḥśreyasam vigalita nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅga parama ānanda ghana brahma avagatiḥ brahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti sā eva niḥśreyasam puruṣa artha iti syāt etad  na brahma avagatiḥ puruṣa arthaḥ puruṣa vyāpāra vyāpyaḥ  hi puruṣa arthaḥ na ca asyā brahma svabhāva bhūtāyā utpatti vikāra saṃskāra prāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti tathā satya nitya tvena tad svābhāvya anupapatteḥ na ca utpatti ādi abhāve vyāpāra vyāpyatā tasmāt na brahma avagatiḥ puruṣa artha iti ata āha niḥśeṣa saṃsāra bīja avidyā ādi anartha nibarhaṇāt satyam brahma avagatau brahma svabhāve na utpatti ādayaḥ saṃbhavanti tathā api anirvacanīyānādi vidyā vaśāt brahma svabhāvaḥ  apara adhīna prakāśaḥ  api pratibhān api na pratibhāti iva para adhīna prakāśa iva deha indriya ādibhyaḥ  bhinnaḥ api abhinna iva bhāsata iti saṃsāra bīja avidyā ādi anartha nibarhaṇāt prāc aprāpta iva tasmin sati prāpta iva bhavati iti puruṣeṇa arthyamāna tvāt puruṣa artha iti yuktam avidyā ādi iti ādi grahaṇena tad saṃskāraḥ  avarudhyate avidyā ādi nivṛttiḥ tu upāsanā kāryāt antaḥ karaṇa vṛtti bhedāt  sākṣātkārāt iti draṣṭavyam upasaṃharati tasmāt brahma jijñāsitavyam ukta lakṣaṇena mumukṣuṇā na khalu tad jñānam vinā sa vāsana vividha duḥkha nidānam avidyā ucchidyate na ca tad ucchedam antareṇa vigalita nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅga ānanda ghana brahma ātmatā sākṣātkāra āvirbhāvaḥ  jīvasya tasmāt ānanda ghana brahma ātma tām icchatā tad upāyaḥ  jñānam eṣitavyam tad ca na kevalebhyaḥ  vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahma mī māṃsa upakaraṇebhya iti icchā mukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyām pravartyate na tu vedānteṣu tad artha vivakṣāyām vā tatra phalavat artha avabodha para tām svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ sūtrayatā aatha atas  dharma jijñāsā iti anena eva pravartita tvāt  dharma grahaṇasya ca veda artha upalakṣaṇa tvena adharmavat brahmaṇaḥ  api upalakṣaṇa tvāt  yadi api ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat  veda arthamīmāṃsayā brahmamī māṃsā api ākṣeptum śakyate tathā api prācyā mīmāṃsayā na tad vyutpādyate na api brahmamīmāṃsāyāḥ  adhyayana mātra ānantaryam iti brahma mīmāṃsa ārambhāya nitya anitya viveka ādi ānantarya pradarśanāya ca idam sūtram ārambhaṇīyam iti apaunaruktyam syāt etad  etena sūtreṇa brahma jñānam pratyupāya tā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata iti uktam tad ayuktam vikalpa asaha tvāt iti codayati tad punar brahma iti vedāntebhyaḥ  apauruṣeya tayā svatas siddha prāmāṇyebhyaḥ prasiddham aprasiddham vā syāt  yadi prasiddham vedānta vākya samutthena niścaya jñānena viṣayīkṛtam tatas  na jijñāsitavyam niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa ādhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt  atha aprasiddham vedāntebhyaḥ tarhi na tad vedāntāḥ pratipādayanti iti sarvathā prasiddham na eva śakyam jijñāsitum anubhūte hi priye bhavati icchā na tu sarvathā ananubhūta apūrve na ceṣyamāṇam api śakyam jñātum pramāṇa abhāvāt  śabdaḥ  hi tasya pramāṇam vaktavyam yathā vakṣyati aśāstra yoni tvāt iti sa ced tad na avabodhayati kutas tasya tatra prāmāṇyam ḷ na ca pramāṇa anantaram brahmaṇi prakramate tasmāt prasiddhasya jñātum śakyasya api ajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasya icchāyā aviṣaya tvāt  aśakya jñāna tvāt ca na brahma jijñāsyam iti ākṣepaḥ pariharati ucyate asti tāvat brahma nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvam ayam arthaḥ prāk api brahmamīmāṃsāyāḥ  adhīta vedasya nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa ādi pariśīlana vidita pada tad artha saṃbandhasya asat eva somya idam agra āsīt iti upakramāt  atattvam asi iti antāt saṃdarbhāt nityatva ādi upeta brahma svarūpa avagamaḥ tāvat āpātataḥ vicārāt vinā api asti atra ca brahma ityādinau  agamyena tad viṣayam avagamam lakṣayati tad astitvasya sati vimarśe vicārāt prāc anirṇayāt  nityā iti kṣayitā lakṣaṇam duḥkham upakṣipati śuddha iti deha ādi upādhikam api duḥkham apākaroti buddhā iti apara adhīna prakāśam ānanda ātmānam darśayati ānanda prakāśayoḥ abhedāt  syāt etad  muktau satyām asya ete śuddhatva ādayaḥ prathante tatas tu prāk  deha ādi abhedena tad dharma janma jarā maraṇa ādi duḥkha yogāt ityata uktam mukta iti sadā eva muktaḥ sadā eva kevalaḥ  anādya vidyā vaśāt tu bhrāntyā tathā avabhāsata iti arthaḥ tad evam anaupādhikam brahmaṇaḥ  rūpam darśayitvā avidyā upādhikam rūpam āha sarvajñam sarva śakti samanvitam tad anena jagatkāraṇa tvam asya darśitam śakti jñāna bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt kāraṇatva bhāva abhāvayoḥ kutas  punar evaṃbhūta brahma svarūpa avagatiḥ iti ata āha brahma śabdasya hi iti na kevalam asat eva somya idam ityādīnām vākyānām paurvāparya paryālocanayā itthaṃbhūta brahma avagatiḥ api tu brahma padam api nirvacana sāmarthyāt imam eva artham sva hastayati nirvacanam āha bṛhateḥ dhātoḥ artha anugamāt vṛddhi karmā hi bṛhatiḥ atiśāyane vartate tad ca idam atiśāyanam anavacchinnam pada antara avagamitam nitya śuddha buddhatva āt yasya abhyanujānāti iti arthaḥ tad evam tad padārthasya śuddhatva ādeḥ prasiddhim abhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasya api āha sarvasya ātma tvāt ca brahma astitva prasiddhiḥ sarvasya pāṃsula pādakasya hālikasya api brahma astitva prasiddhiḥ kutas  ḷ ātma tvāt  etad eva sphuṭayati sarvaḥ  hi iti pratītim eva apratīti nirākaraṇena draḍhayati na na iti na na pratyeti aaham asmi iti kim tu pratyeti eva iti yojanā nanu aaham asmi iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīt ātmānam iti ata āha yadi iti aham asmi iti na pratīyāt  ahaṅkāra āspadam hi jīva ātmānam ced na pratīyāt  aaham iti na pratīyāt iti arthaḥ nanu pratyetu sarvaḥ  jana ātmānam ahaṅkāra āspadam brahmaṇi tu kim āyātam iti ata āha ātmā ca brahma tadaḥ tvam āsāmāna adhikaraṇyāt  tasmāt tad padārthasya śuddha buddhatva ādeḥ śabdataḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ padārtha jñāna pūrvaka tvāt ca vākya artha jñānasya tvaṃpadārthasya brahma bhāva avagamaḥ atattvam asi iti vākyāt upapadyata iti bhāvaḥ ākṣeptā prathama kalpa āśrayam doṣam āha yadi tarhi loka iti adhyāpaka adhyetṛ paramparā lokaḥ tatra atattvam asi iti vākyāt yadi brahma ātma tvena prasiddham asti aātmā brahmatvena iti vaktavye abrahma ātma tvena iti abheda vivakṣayā gamayitavyam pariharati naḥ kutas  ḷ tad viśeṣam prati vipratipatteḥ tad anena vipratipattiḥ sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāve sati saṃśaya bījam uktam tatas ca saṃśayāt jijñāsā upapadyata iti bhāvaḥ vivāda adhikaraṇam dharmī sarva tantra siddhānta siddhaḥ  abhyupeyaḥ anyathā anāśrayā bhinna āśrayā vā vipratipattayaḥ  na syuḥ viruddhā hi pratipattayaḥ  vipratipattayaḥ na ca anāśrayāḥ pratipattayaḥ  bhavanti anālambanatva āpatteḥ na ca bhinna āśrayā viruddhāḥ na hi aanityā buddhiḥ anitya ātmā iti pratipatti vipratipattī tasmāt tad padārthasya śuddhatva āderveda antebhyaḥ pratītiḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīva ātmanaḥ  lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ tad ābhāsa tvānābhāsatva tad tad viśeṣeṣu paramatra vipratipattayaḥ tasmāt  sāmānyatas  prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣataḥ  vipratipattau yuktaḥ tad viśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ tatra tvaṃpadārthe tāvat vipratipattīḥ darśayati deha mātram ityādinā bhoktā eva kevalam na karttā iti antena atra deha indriya manaḥ kṣaṇika vijñāna caitanya pakṣe na tad padārtha nityatva ādayaḥ tvaṃpadārthena saṃbadhyante yogya tā virahāt śūnya pakṣe api sarva upākhyā rahitam apadārthaḥ katham tattva morgocaraḥ ḷ kartṛ bhoktṛ svabhāvasya api pariṇāmitayā tad padārtha nityatva ādi asaṃgatiḥ eva akartṛ tve api bhoktṛtva pakṣe pariṇāmitayā nityatva ādi asaṃgatiḥ abhoktṛ tve api nānā ātmatva pakṣe nānā tvena avacchinna tvāt anityatva ādi prasaktāvat vaita hānāt ca tad padārtha asaṃgatiḥ tad avasthā eva tvaṃpadārtha vipratipattyā ca tad padārthe api vipratipattiḥ darśitā veda aprāmāṇya vādinaḥ  hi laukāyatika ādayaḥ tad padārtha pratyayam mithyā iti manyante veda prāmāṇya vādinaḥ  api aupacārikam tad padārtham avivakṣitam vā manyanta iti tad evam tvaṃpadārtha vipratipatti dvārā tad padārthe vipratipattim sūcayitvā sākṣāt tad padārthe api vipratipattim āha asti tad vyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva śaktiḥ iti kecid  tad  iti jīvātmanaḥ parāmṛśati na kevalam śarīra ādibhyaḥ jīva ātmabhyaḥ  api vyatiriktaḥ sa ca sarvasya eva jagata īṣṭe aiśvarya siddhi artham svābhāvikam asya rūpa dvayam uktam asarvajñaḥ sarva śaktiḥ iti tasya api jīva ātmabhyaḥ  api vyatirekāt  na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti sva matam āha atmā sa bhoktuḥ iti apare bhoktuḥ jīva ātmanaḥ  avidyā upādhikasya sa īśvaraḥ tad padārtha  ātmā tatas  īśvarāt abhinnaḥ jīvātmā parama ākāśāt iva ghaṭākāśa ādaya iti arthaḥ vipratipattīḥ upasaṃharan vipratipatti bījam āha evam bahava iti yukti yukti ābhāsa vākya vākya ābhāsa samāśrayāḥ santa iti yojanā nanu santu vipratipattayaḥ tad nimittaḥ ca saṃśayaḥ tathā api kimartham brahmamīmāṃsā ārabhyate iti ata āha tatra avicārya iti tattva jñānāt ca niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ na atattva jñānāt bhavitum arhati api ca atattva jñānāt nāstikye sati anartha prāptiḥ api iti āha anartham ca iti sūtra tātparyam upasaṃharati tasmāt  iti vedāntamīmāṃsā tāvat tarka eva tad avirodhinaḥ ca ye anye api tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyām nyāye ca veda pratyakṣa ādi prāmāṇya pariśodhana ādiṣu uktāḥ t upakaraṇam yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā tasmāt parama niḥśreyasa sādhana brahma jñāna prayojanā brahmamīmāṃsā ārabdhavyā iti siddham brahma jijñāsitavyam iti uktam kiṃlakṣaṇam punar tad brahma iti ata āha bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ janma ādyasya yatas  tad evam prathama sūtreṇa mīmāṃsā ārambham upapādya brahmamīmāṃsām ārabhate janma ādyasya yatas  etasya sūtrasya pātanikām āha bhāṣya kāraḥ brahma jijñāsitavyam iti uktam kiṃlakṣaṇam punar tad brahma atra yadi api brahma svarūpa jñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tad aṅgāni api pramāṇa ādīni pratijñātāni tathā api svarūpasya prādhānyāt tad eva ākṣipya prathamam samarthyate tatra yad yāvat anubhūyate tad sarvam parimitam aviśudadhama buddham vidhvaṃsi ca na tena upalabdhena tad viruddhasya nitya śuddha buddha svabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpam śakyam lakṣayitum na hi jātu kaścid kṛtaka tvena nityam lakṣayati na ca tad dharmeṇa nityatva ādinā tad lakṣyate tasya anupalabdha cara tvāt prasiddham hi lakṣaṇam bhavati na atyanta aprasiddham evam ca na śabdaḥ  api atra prakramate atyanta aprasiddha tayā brahmaṇaḥ  apadārthasya avākya artha tvāt tasmāt  lakṣaṇa abhāvāt na brahma jijñāsitavyam iti atya ākṣepa abhiprāyaḥ tam imam ākṣepam bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ pariharati ajanmādyasya yatas iti mā bhūt anu bhūyamānam jagat tad dharma tayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇaḥ  lakṣaṇam tad utpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśa antara prāptiḥ iva savituḥ vrajyāyāḥ  iti tātparya arthaḥ sūtra avayavān vibhajate janma utpattiḥ ādiḥ asya iti lāghavāya sūtra kṛtā janma ādi iti napuṃsaka prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ tad upapādanāya samāhāram āha janma sthiti bhaṅgam iti janmanaḥ ca ityādiḥ kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ iti antar  saṃdarbhaḥ  nigada vyākhyātaḥ syāt etad  pradhāna kāla graha lokapāla kriyāyadṛcchā svabhāva abhāveṣu upaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñam sarva śakti svabhāvam brahma jagat janma ādi kāraṇam iti kutas  saṃbhāvanā ityata āha asya jagata iti atra nāma rūpābhyām vyākṛtasya iti cetana bhāva kartṛkatva saṃbhāvanayā pradhāna ādi acetana kartṛka tvam nirupākhya kartṛka tvam ca vyāsedhati yad khalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate tad cetana kartṛkam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi vivāda adhyāsitam ca jagat nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākṛtam tasmāt cetana kartṛkam saṃbhāvyate cetanaḥ hi buddhau  ālikhya nāma rūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambu grīva ādinā bāhyam ghaṭam niṣpādayati ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasya api antar  saṃkalpa ātmanā siddhasya karma kāraka bhāvaḥ aghaṭam karoti iti yathā āhuḥ abuddhi siddham tu na tad asat iti tathā ca acetanaḥ  buddhau  anālikhitam karoti iti na śakyam saṃbhāvayitum iti bhāvaḥ syāt etad  cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāma rūpe buddhau  ālikhya jagat janayiṣyanti kṛtam ukta svabhāvena brahmaṇā ityata āha aneka kartṛ bhoktṛ saṃyuktasya iti kecid kartāraḥ  bhavanti yathā sūda ṛtvij ādayaḥ na bhoktāraḥ kecid tu bhoktāraḥ yathā śrāddha vaiśvānara iṣṭi ādiṣu pitāputra ādayaḥ na kartāraḥ tasmāt ubhaya grahaṇam deśa kāla nimitta kriyā phalāni iti itara itara dvandvaḥ deśa ādīni ca tāni pratiniyata ati ca iti vigrahaḥ tad āśrayaḥ  jagat  tasya kecid khalu pratiniyata deśa utpādāḥ yathā kṛṣṇamṛga ādayaḥ kecid pratiniyata kāla utpādāḥ yathā kokilā rava ādayaḥ kecid pratiniyata nimittāḥ yathā nava ambuda dhvāna ādi nimittā balākā garbha ādayaḥ kecid pratiniyata kriyāḥ yathā brāhmaṇānām yājana ādayaḥ na itareṣām evam kecid pratiniyata phalāḥ yathā kecid sukhinaḥ kecid duḥkhinaḥ evam ya eva sukhinaḥ ta eva kadācid duḥkhinaḥ sarvam etad ākasmikā para nāmni yādṛcchika tve ca svābhāvika tve ca asarvajñā sarva śakti kartṛka tve ca na ghaṭate parimita jñāna śaktibhiḥ graha lokapāla ādibhiḥ jñātum kartum ca aśakya tvāt tad idam uktam manasā api acintya racanā rūpasya iti ekasya api hi śarīra racanāyā rūpam manasā na śakyam cintayitum kadācid  prāk eva jagat racanāyāḥ kim aṅga punar  kartum iti arthaḥ sūtra vākyam pūrayati tad brahma iti vākya śeṣaḥ syāt etad  kasmāt punar janma sthiti bhaṅga mātram iha ādi grahaṇena gṛhyate na tu vṛddhi pariṇāma apakṣayā api iti ata āha anyeṣām api bhāva vikārāṇām vṛddhi ādīnān triṣu eva antarbhāva iti vṛddhiḥ tāvat avayava upacayaḥ tena alpa avayavāt avayavinaḥ  dvi tantuka ādeḥ anya eva mahān paṭaḥ jāyata iti janma eva vṛddhiḥ pariṇāmaḥ  api trividhaḥ dharma lakṣaṇa avasthā lakṣaṇaḥ utpattiḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ  hi hāṭaka ādeḥ dharma lakṣaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ kaṭaka mukuṭa ādiḥ tasya utpattiḥ evam kaṭaka ādeḥ api pratyutpannatva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ lakṣaṇa pariṇāma utpattiḥ evam avasthā pariṇāmaḥ  nava purāṇatva ādiḥ utpattiḥ apakṣayaḥ tu avayava hrāsaḥ  nāśa eva tasmāt janma ādiṣu yathāsvam antarbhāvāt vṛddhi ādayaḥ pṛthak na uktā iti arthaḥ atha ete vṛddhi ādayaḥ na janma ādiṣu antarbhavanti tathā api utpatti sthiti bhaṅgam eva upādātavyam tathā sati hi tad pratipādake ayataḥ  vā imāni bhūtāni iti veda vākye buddhi sthīkṛte jagat mūla kāraṇam brahma lakṣitam bhavati anyathā tu jāyate asti vardhate ityādīnām grahaṇe tad pratipādakam nairukta vākyam buddhau bhavet  tad ca na mūla kāraṇa pratipādana param mahā sargāt ūrdhvam sthiti kāle api tad vākya uditānām janma ādīnām bhāva vikārāṇām upapatteḥ iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham veda ukta utpatti sthiti bhaṅga grahaṇam iti āha yāska paripaṭhitānām tu iti nanu evam api utpatti mātram sūcyatām tad na antarīyaka tayā tu sthiti bhaṅgam gamyata iti ata āha yā utpattiḥ brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇāt  iti tribhiḥ asya upādāna tvam sūcyate utpatti mātram tu nimitta kāraṇa sādhāraṇam iti na upādāna tvam sūcayet  tad idam uktam tatra eva iti pūrva uktānām kārya kāraṇa viśeṣaṇānām prayojanam āha na yathā ukta iti tad anena prabandhena pratijñā viṣayasya brahma svarūpasya lakṣaṇa dvāreṇa saṃbhāvanā uktā tatra pramāṇam vaktavyam yathā āhuḥ naiyāyikāḥ asaṃbhāvitaḥ pratijñāyām pakṣaḥ sādhyeta hetunā na tasya hetubhiḥ trāṇam utpatan  eva yaḥ  hataḥ yathā ca vandhyā jananī ityādiḥ iti ittham nāma janma ādi saṃbhāvanā hetuḥ yad anye vaiśeṣikakādaya ita eva anumānāt īśvara viniścayam icchanti iti saṃbhāvanā hetu tām draḍhayitum āha etad eva iti codayati nanu iha api iti etāvatā eva adhikaraṇa arthe samāpte vakṣyamāṇa adhikaraṇa artham anuvadan suhṛd bhāvena pariharati na vedānta iti vedānta vākya kusuma grathana artha tvam eva darśayati vedānta iti vicārasya adhyavasānam sa vāsana avidyā dvaya ucchedaḥ tatas  hi brahma avagateḥ nivṛttiḥ āvirbhāvaḥ tad kim brahmaṇi śabdāt ṛte na māna antaram anusaraṇīyam ḷ tathā ca kutaḥ mananam ḷ kutas ca tad anubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ ḷ iti ata āha satsu tu vedānta vākyeṣu iti anumānam vedānta avirodhi tad upajīvi ca iti api draṣṭavyam śabda avirodhinyā tad upajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanam mananam yuktiḥ ca arthāpattiḥ anumānam vā syāt etad  yathā dharmaḥ  na puruṣa buddhi sāhāyyam evam brahmaṇi api kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha na dharma jijñāsāyām iva iti śruti ādaya iti śruti itihāsa purāṇa asmṛtayaḥ pramāṇam anubhavaḥ antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti bhedaḥ  brahma sākṣātkāraḥ tasya avidyā nivṛtti dvāreṇa brahma svarūpa āvirbhāvaḥ pramāṇa phalam tad ca phalam iva phalam iti gamayitavyam yadi api dharma jijñāsāyām api sāmagryām pratyakṣa ādīnām vyāpāraḥ tathā api sākṣāt na asti brahma jijñāsāyām tu sākṣāt anubhava ādīnām saṃbhavaḥ  anubhava arthā ca brahma jijñāsā iti āha anubhava avasāna tvāt brahma anubhavaḥ  brahma sākṣātkāraḥ parama puruṣa arthaḥ nirmṛṣṭa nikhila duḥkha parama ānanda rūpa tvāt iti nanu bhavatu brahma anubhava arthā jijñāsā tad anubhava eva tu aśakyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tad viṣayatva ayogya tvāt  iti ata āha bhūta vastu viṣaya tvāt ca brahma jñānasya iti vyatireka sākṣātkārasya vikalpa rūpaḥ  viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ na tu evam dharma jñānam anubhava avasānam tad anubhavasya svayam apuruṣa artha tvāt tad anuṣṭhān asādhya tvāt puruṣa arthasya anuṣṭhānasya ca vinā api anubhavam śābda jñāna mātrāt eva siddheḥ iti āha kartavye hi ityādinā na ca ayam sākṣātkāra viṣaya tā yogyaḥ  api avartamānaḥ ca anavasthita tvāt iti āha puruṣa adhīna iti puruṣa adhīna tvam eva laukika vaidika kāryāṇām āha kartum akartum iti laukikam kāryam anavasthitam udāharati yathā aśvena iti laukikena udāharaṇena saha vaidikam udāharaṇam samuccinoti tathā atirātra iti kartum akaṛtum iti asya idam udāharaṇam uktam kartum anyathā vā kartum iti asya udāharaṇam āha udita iti syāt etad  puruṣa svātantryāt  kartavye vidhi pratiṣedhānām ānarthakyam atad adhīna tvāt  puruṣa pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ iti ata āha vidhi pratiṣedhāḥ ca atra arthavantaḥ syuḥ gṛhṇāti iti vidhiḥ na gṛhṇāti iti pratiṣedhaḥ udita anudita homayoḥ vidhiḥ evam nārā sthita sparśana niṣedhaḥ  brahma ghnaḥ ca tad vāraṇa vidhiḥ iti evan jātīyakā vidhi pratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ kuta iti ata āha vikalpa utsarga apavādāḥ ca ca u hetau yasmāt grahaṇa agrahaṇayoḥ udita anudita homayoḥ ca virodhāt  samuccaya asaṃbhave tulya balatayā ca bādhya bādhaka bhāva abhāve sati agatyā vikalpaḥ nāra asthi sparśana niṣedha tad vāraṇāyoḥ ca viruddhayoḥ atulya balatayā na vikalpaḥ kim tu sāmānya śāstrasya sparśana niṣedhasya dhāraṇa vidhi viṣayeṇa viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhaḥ etad uktam bhavati vidhi pratiṣedhaiḥ eva sa tādṛśaḥ  viṣayaḥ  anāgata utpādya rūpa upanītaḥ yena puruṣasya vidhi niṣedha adhīna pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ api svātantryam bhavati iti bhūte vastuni tu na iyam asti vidhā iti āha na tu vastu evam na evam iti tad anena prakāra vikalpaḥ  nirastaḥ prakāri vikalpam niṣedhati asti na asti iti syāt etad  bhūte api vastuni vikalpaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ yathā asthā aṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ  vā iti tad katham na vastu vikalpyate iti ata āha vikalpanāḥ tu iti puruṣa buddhiḥ antaḥkaraṇam tad apekṣā vikalpanāḥ saṃśaya viparyāsāḥ sa vāsana manaḥ mātra yona yaḥ  vā yathā svapne sa vāsana indriya manaḥ yonayaḥ vā yathā asthā aṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ  vā iti sthāṇau saṃśayaḥ apuruṣa eva iti ca viparyāsaḥ anya śabdena vastutas  sthāṇoḥ anyasya puruṣasya abhidhānāt  na tu puruṣa tattvam vā sthāṇu tattvam vā apekṣante samāna dharma dharmi darśana mātra adhīna janma tvāt  tasmāt ayathāvaḥ tatas  vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vā iti arthaḥ tattva jñānam tu na buddhi tantram kim tu vastu tantram atas tatas  vastu viniścayaḥ  yuktaḥ na tu vikalpanābhya iti āha na vastu yāthātmya iti evam uktena prakāreṇa bhūta vastu viṣayāṇām jñānānām prāmāṇyasya vastu tantra tām prasādhya brahma jñānasya vastu tantra tām āha tatra evam sati iti atra codayati nanu bhūta iti yad kila bhūta artham vākyam tad pramāṇa antara gocara artha tayā anuvādakam dṛṣṭam yathā nadyāḥ tīre phalāni santi iti tathā ca vedāntāḥ tasmāt  bhūta artha tayā pramāṇa antara dṛṣṭam eva artham anuvadeyuḥ uktam ca brahmaṇi jagat janma ādi hetukam anumānam pramāṇa antaram evam ca maulikam tad eva parīkṣaṇīyam na tu vedānta vākyāni tad adhīna satya tvāni iti katham vedānta vākya grathanā artha tā sūtrāṇām iti arthaḥ pariharati na indriya aviṣaya tvena iti kasmāt punar na indriya viṣaya tvam pratīca iti ata āha svabhāvata iti ata eva śrutiḥ aparāñci khāni vyatṛṇat svayaṃbhūḥ tasmāt parāṅ paśyati na antarātman iti sati hi indriya iti pratyak ātmanaḥ tu aviṣaya tvam upapāditam yathā ca sāmānyatas  dṛṣṭam api anumānam brahmaṇi na pravartate tathā upariṣṭāt nipuṇataram upapādayiṣyāmaḥ upapāditam ca etad asmābhiḥ vistareṇa nyāya kaṇikāyām na ca bhūta artha tā mātreṇa anuvādata iti upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt sarvam avadātam śrutiḥ ca ayataḥ  vā iti janma darśayati ayena jātāni jīvanti iti jīvanam stitim ayat prayanti iti tatra eva layam tasya ca nirṇaya vākyam atra ca pradhāna ādi viṣayatva saṃśaye nirṇaya vākyam ānanda adhi eva iti etad uktam bhavati yathā rajjū ajñāna sahita rajju upādānā dhārā rajjvām satyām asti rajjvām eva ca līyate evam avidyā sahita brahma upādānam jagat  brahmaṇi eva asti tatra eva ca līyata iti siddham jagat kāraṇatva pradarśanena sarvajñam brahma iti upakṣiptam tad eva draḍhayan  āha śāstra yoni tvāt  sūtra antaram avatārayitum purvasūtra saṃgatim āha jagat kāraṇatva pradarśanena iti na kevalam jagat yoni tvāt asya bhagavataḥ sarvajña tā śāstra yoni tvāt api boddhavyā śāstra yoni tvasya sarvajña tā sādhana tvam samartha gate mahata ṛgveda ādeḥ śāstrasya iti cāturvarṇyasya cāturāśramyasya ca yathāyatham niṣeka ādi śmaśāna antāsu brahma muhūrta upakrama pradoṣa parisamāpanīyāsu nitya naimittika kāmya karma paddhatiṣu ca brahma tattve ca śiṣyāṇām śāsanāt  śāstra mṛgveda ādiḥ ata eva mahā viṣaya tvāt mahat  na kevalam mahā viṣaya tvena asya mahat tvam api tu aneka aṅga upāṅga upakaraṇa tayā api iti āha aneka vidyā sthāna upabṛṃhitasya purāṇa nyāyamīmāṃsa ādayaḥ  daśa vidyā sthānāni taiḥ tayā tayā dvāra upakṛtasya tad anena samasta śiṣṭa jana parigraheṇa aprāmāṇya śaṅkā api apākṛtā purāṇa ādi praṇetāraḥ  hi mahā ṛṣayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ taiḥ tayā tayā dvārā vedān vyācakṣāṇaiḥ tad artham ca ādareṇa anutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhītaḥ  veda iti na ca ayam anavabodha kaḥ  na api ara paṣṭa bodhakaḥ  yena apramāṇam syāt iti āha pradīpavat sarva artha avadyotinaḥ sarvam artha jātam sarvathā avabodhayan na anavabodha kaḥ  na api aspaṣṭa bodhaka iti arthaḥ ata eva sarvajña kalpasya sarvajña sadṛśasya sarvajñasya hi jñānam sarva viṣayam śāstrasya api abhidhānam sarva viṣayam iti sādṛśyam tad evam anvayam uktvā vyatirekam āha na hi īdṛśasya iti sarvajñasya guṇaḥ sarva viṣaya tā tad anvitam śāsatram asya api sarva viṣaya tvāt uktam artham pramāṇayati yad yad vistara artham śāstram yasmāt puruṣa viśeṣāt saṃbhavati sa puruṣa viśeṣaḥ tatas  api śāstrāt  adhikatara vijñānaḥ iti yojanā adyatve api asmad ādibhiḥ yad samīcīna artha viṣayam śāstram viracyate tatra asmākam vaktṛṇām vākyāt jñānam adhika viṣayam na hi te te asādhāraṇa dharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum na khalu ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām madhura rasa bhedāḥ śakyāḥ sarasvatyā api ākhyātum vistara artham api vākyam na vaktṛ jñānena tulya viṣayam iti kathayitum vistara grahaṇam sa upanayam nigamanam āha kim u vaktavyam iti vedasya yasmāt  mahataḥ  bhūtāt  yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ tasya mahataḥ  bhūtasya brahmaṇaḥ  niratiśayam sarvajña tvam sarva śakti tvam ca kim u vaktavyam iti yojanā aneka śākhā iti atra ca aneka śākhā bheda bhinnasya ityādiḥ saṃbhava iti anta upanayaḥ tasya ityādi sarva śakti tvam ca iti antam nigamanam aprayatnena eva iti īṣat prayatnena yathā aalavaṇā yavāgūḥ iti deva ṛṣayaḥ  hi mahā pariśrameṇa api yatra aśaktāḥ tad ayam īṣat prayatnena līlayā eva karoti iti niratiśayam asya sarvajña tvam sarva śakti tvam ca uktam bhavati aprayatnena asya veda kartṛ tve śrutiḥ uktā aasya mahataḥ  bhūtasya iti ye api tāvat  varṇānām nitya tvam āsthiṣata taiḥ api pada vākya ādīnām anitya tvam abhyupāyam ānupūrvī bhedavantaḥ  hi varṇāḥ padam padāni ca ānupūrvī bhedavanti vākyam vyakti dharmaḥ ca ānupūrvī na varṇa dharmaḥ varṇānām nityānām vibhūnām ca kālataḥ  deśataḥ  vā paurvāparya ayogāt  vyaktiḥ ca anitya iti katham tad upagṛhītānām varṇānām nityānām api padatā nityā ḷ pada anitya tayā ca vākya ādīnām api anitya tā vyākhyātā tasmāt nṛtta anukaraṇavat pada ādi anukaraṇam api yathā hi yādṛśam gātra calana ādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśam eva śikṣyamāṇā anukaroti nartakī na tu tad eva vyanakti evam yādṛśīm ānupūrvīm vaidikānām varṇa pada ādīnām karoti adhyāpayitā tādṛśīm eva anukaroti māṇavakaḥ na tu tām eva uccārayati ācārya vyaktibhyaḥ  māṇavaka vyaktīnām anya tvāt  tasmāt nitya anitya varṇa vādinām na laukika vaidika pada vākya ādi pauruṣeya tve vivādaḥ kevalam veda vākyeṣu puruṣa svātantrya asvātantrye vipratipattiḥ yathā āhuḥ ayatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇām svatantra tā iti tatra sṛṣṭi pralayam anicchantaḥ  jaiminīyā veda adhyayanam pratyasmādṛśa guru śiṣya paramparām avicchinnām anādim ācakṣate vaiyāsikam tu matam anuvartamānāḥ śruti smṛti itihāsa ādi siddha sṛṣṭi pralaya anusāreṇa anādya vidyā upadhāna labdha sarva śakti sarva jñānasya api paramātmanaḥ  nityasya vedānām yoneḥ api na teṣu svātantryam pūrva pūrva sarga anusāreṇa tādṛśa ānupūrvī viracanāt yathā hi yāga ādi brahma hatyā dayor atha anartha hetavaḥ  brahma vivartā api na sarga antare vipariyanti na hi jātu kvacid sarge brahmahatyā artha hetuḥ anartha hetuḥ ca aśvamedhaḥ  bhavati agniḥ vā kledayati āpaḥ  vā dahanti tadvat  yathā atra sarge niyata ānupūrvyam veda adhyayanam abhyudaya niḥśreyasa hetuḥ anyathā tad eva vāc vajra tayā anartha hetuḥ evam sarga antareṣu api iti tad anurodhāt sarvajñaḥ  api sarva śaktiḥ api pūrva pūrva sarga anusāreṇa vedān viracayan  svatantraḥ puruṣāsvātantrya mātram ca apauruṣeya tvam rocayante jaiminīyā api tad ca asmākam api samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt  na ca ekasya pratibhāne anāśvāsa iti yuktam na hi bahūnām api ajñānām vijñānām vā āśaya doṣavatām pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ tattva jñānavataḥ tu apāsta samasta doṣasya ekasya api pratibhāne yukta eva āśvāsaḥ sarga ādi bhuvām ca prajāpati deva ṛṣīṇām dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya saṃpannānām upapadyate tad svarūpa avadhāraṇam tad pratyayena cāru ācīnānām api tatra saṃpratyaya iti upapannam brahmaṇaḥ śāstra yoni tvam śāstrasya ca apauruṣeya tvam prāmāṇyam ca iti iti prathama varṇakam varṇaka antaram ārabhate atha vā iti pūrveṇa adhikaraṇena brahma svarūpa lakṣaṇa asaṃbhava āśaṅkām vyudasya lakṣaṇa saṃbhava uktaḥ tasya eva tu lakṣaṇasya anena anumānatva āśaṅkām apākṛtya āgama upadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstram pramāṇam uktam akṣara arthaḥ tu atirohitaḥ śāstra pramāṇaka tvam uktam brahmaṇaḥ pratijñā mātreṇa tad anena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyam iti utsūtram pūrvapakṣam āracayati bhāṣya kāraḥ katham punar  iti kim ākṣepe śuddha buddha uda āsīna svabhāvatayā upekṣaṇīyam brahma bhūtam abhidadhatām vedāntānāmapuruṣa artha upadeśi nāma prayojanatva āpatteḥ bhūta artha tvena ca pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ samāna viṣaya tayā laukika vākyavat tad artha anuvādaka tvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt  na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇa antara viṣayam artham avabodhayanti svatas  pramāṇam evam vedāntā api iti anapekṣatva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam eṣām vyāhanyeta na ca taiḥ apramāṇaiḥ bhavitum yuktam na ca aprayojanaiḥ svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi āpādita prayojanavattva niyamāt tasmāt tad tad vihita karma apekṣita kartṛ devatā ādi pratipādana paratvena eva kriyā artha tvam yadi tu asaṃnidhānāt tad para tvam na rocayante tatas  saṃnihita upāsana ādi kriyā paratvam vā vedāntānām evam hi pratyakṣa ādi anadhigata gocara tvena anapekṣa tayā prāmāṇyam ca prayojanavat tvam ca sidhyati iti tātparya arthaḥ pāramarṣa sūtra upanyāsaḥ tu pūrva pakṣa dārḍhyāya ānarthakyam ca aprayojanavat tvam sa apekṣa tayā pramānutpādaka tvam ca anuvādaka tvāt iti atas  ityādi vā ntam grahaṇaka vākyam asya vibhāga bhāṣyam na hi ityādi upapannā vā iti antam syāt etad  akriyā artha tve api brahma svarūpa vidhi parā vedāntā bhaviṣyanti tathā ca avidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt  iti rāddha anta sūtram anugrahīṣyate na khalva pravṛtta pravartanam eva vidhiḥ utpatti vidherajñāta jñāpana artha tvāt vedāntānām ca ajñātam brahma jñāpayatām tathā abhāvāt iti ata āha na ca pariniṣṭhita iti anāgata utpādya bhāva viṣaya eva hi sarvaḥ  vidhiḥ upeyaḥ adhikāra viniyoga prayoga utpatti rūpāṇām parasparam avinā abhāvāt siddhe ca teṣām asaṃbhavāt  tad vākyānām tvaidaṃparyam bhidyate yathā aagnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ ityādibhyaḥ  adhikāra viniyoga prayogāṇām pratilambhāt  aagnihotram juhoti iti utpatti mātra param vākyam na tu atra viniyogāt ayaḥ  na santi santaḥ  api anyatas  labdha tvāt kevalam avivakṣitāḥ tasmāt  bhāvanā viṣayaḥ  vidhiḥ na siddhe vastuni bhavitum arhati iti upasaṃharati tasmāt  iti atra aruci kāraṇam uktvā pakṣa antaram upasaṃkramate atha iti evam ca sati ukta rūpe brahmaṇi śabdasya ātātparyāt  pramāṇa antareṇa yādṛśam asya rūpam vyavasthāpyate na tad śabdena virudhyate tasya upāsana aparatvāt samāropeṇa ca upāsanāyāḥ  upapatteḥ iti prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt na iti sūtreṇa siddhāntayati ucyata iti tad etad vyācaṣṭe tuśabda iti tad iti uttara pakṣa pratijñām vibhajate tad brahma iti pūrva pakṣī karkaśa āśayaḥ pṛcchati katham iti kutas  prakārāt iti arthaḥ siddhāntī sva pakṣe hetum prakāra bhedam āha samanvayāt  samyak anvayaḥ samanvayaḥ tasmāt  etad eva vibhajyate sarveṣu hi vedānteṣu iti vedāntānām aikāntikīm brahma para tām āci khya suḥ bahūni vākyāni udāharati sat eva iti ayataḥ  vā imāni bhūtāni iti tu vākyam pūrvam udāhṛtam jagat utpatti sthiti nāśa kāraṇam iti ca iha smāritam iti na paṭhitam yena hi vākyam upakramyate yena ca upasaṃhriyate sa eva vākya artha iti śābdāḥ yathā upāṃśu yāja vākye anūcoḥ puroḍāśayoḥ jāmitā doṣa saṃkīrtana pūrva ka upa aṃśu yāja vidhānena tad pratisamādhāna upasaṃhāreṇa ca apūrva upāṃśu yāja karma vidhi para tā eka vākyatā balāt āśritā evam atra api asat eva somya idam iti brahma upakramāt  atattvam asi iti ca jīvasya brahma ātmanā upasaṃhārāt tad para ta eva vākyasya evam vākya antarāṇām api paurvāparya ālocanayā brahma paratvam avagantavyam na ca tad paratvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave anya para tā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum atiprasaṅgāt  na kevalam kartṛ para tā teṣām adṛṣṭā anupapannā ca iti āha na ca teṣām iti sa apekṣa tvena aprāmāṇyam pūrva pakṣa bījam smārayitvā dūṣayati na ca pariniṣṭhita vastu svarūpa tve api iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ puṃvākya nidarśanena hi bhūta artha tayā vedāntānām sa apekṣa tvam āśaṅkyate tatra evam bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ  vyācaṣṭām kim puṃvākyānām sa apekṣatā bhūta artha tvena āhaḥ pauruṣeya tvena ḷ yadi bhūta artha tvena tatas  pratyakṣa ādīnām api paraspara apekṣa tvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ tāni api hi bhūta arthāni eva atha puruṣa buddhi purvakatayā puṃvākyam sa apekṣam evam tarhi atad pūrvakāṇām vedāntānām bhūta arthānām api na aprāmāṇyam pratyakṣa ādīnām iva niyata indriya liṅga ādi janmanām yadi ucyeta siddhe kila apauruṣeya tve vedāntānām anapekṣa tayā prāmāṇyam sidhyet  tad eva tu bhūta artha tvena na sidhyati bhūta arthasya śabda anapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa māna antarataḥ śakya jñāna tvāt buddhi pūrvam viracana upapatteḥ vākyatva ādi liṅgakasya veda pauruṣeyatva anumānasya apratyūham utpatteḥ tasmāt pauruṣeya tvena sa apekṣa tvam durvāram na tu bhūta artha tvena kārya artha tve tu kāryasya apūrvasya māna antara agocara tayā atyantān anubhūta pūrvasya tattvena samāropeṇa vā puruṣa buddhau  asamārohāt  tad arthānām vedāntānām aśakya racana tayā pauruṣeyatva abhāvāt anapekṣam pramāṇa tvam sidhyati iti prāmāṇyāya vedāntānām api kārya para tvam ātiṣṭhāmahe atra brūmaḥ kim punar idam kāryam abhimatam āyuṣmataḥ yad aśakyam puruṣeṇa jñātum ḷ apūrvam iti ced  hanta kutastyamasya liṅā ādi artha tvam ḷ tena ālaukikena saṃgati saṃvedana virahāt  loka anusārataḥ kriyāyāḥ  eva laukikyāḥ kārya tayā liṅā ādeḥ avagamāt  asvarga kāmaḥ  yajeta iti sādhya svarga viśiṣṭaḥ  niyojyaḥ  avagamyate sa ca tad eva kāryam avagacchati yad svarga anukūlam na ca kriyā kṣaṇa bhaṅgurā āmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyāt vedata eva apūrve kārye liṅā ādīnām saṃbandha graha iti ced  hanta caitya vandana ādi vākyeṣu api svarga kāma ādi pada saṃbandhāt apūrva kāryatva prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca teṣām api aśakya racana tvena apauruṣeyatva āpātaḥ spaṣṭa dṛṣṭena pauruṣeya tvena vā teṣām apūrva arthatva pratiṣedhe vākyatva ādinā liṅgena vedāntānām api pauruṣeya tvam anumitam iti apūrva artha tā na syāt  anyatas tu vākyatva ādīnām anumāna abhāmatva upapādane kṛtam apūrva artha tvena atra tad upapādakena upapāditam ca apauruṣeya tvam asmābhiḥ nyāya kaṇikāyām iha tu vistara bhayāt na uktam tena apauruṣeya tve siddhe bhūta arthānām api vedāntānām na sa apekṣa tayā prāmāṇya vighātaḥ na ca anadhigata gantṛ tā na asti yena prāmāṇyam na syāt  jīvasya brahma tāyā anyatas  anadhigamāt  tad idam uktam na ca pariniṣṭhita vastu svarūpatva api iti dvitīyam pūrva pakṣa bījam smārayitvā dūṣayati yad tu heya upādeya rahita tvāt  iti vidhi artha avagamāt khalu pāramparyeṇa puruṣa artha pratilambhaḥ iha tu atattvam asi iti avagati paryantāt vākya artha jñānāt bāhya anuṣṭhāna āyāsa anapekṣāt sākṣāt eva puruṣa artha pratilambhaḥ anāyam sarpaḥ  rajjuḥ iyam iti jñānāt iva iti saḥ  ayam asya vidhi artha jñānāt  prakarṣaḥ etad uktam bhavati dvividham hi īpsitam puruṣasya kiñcid aprāptam yathā grāma ādi kiñcid punar  prāptam api bhrama vaśāt aprāptam iti avagatam yathā sva grīva avanaddham graiveyakam evam jihāsitam api dvividham kiñci d ahīnam jīhāsati yathā valayita caraṇam phaṇinam kiñcid punar hīnam eva jihāsati yathā caraṇa ābharaṇe nūpure phaṇinam āropitam tatra aprāpta prāptau ca atyakta tyāge ca bāhya upāya anuṣṭhān asādhya tvāt tad upāya tattva jñānāt asti parācīna anuṣṭhāna apekṣā na jātu jñāna mātram naḥ tu apanayati na hi sahasram api rajju pratyayā vastu santam phaṇinam anyathayitum īśate samāropite tu prepsita jihāsite tattva sākṣātkāra mātreṇa bāhya anuṣṭhāna anapekṣeṇa eva śakyete prāptum iva hātum iva samāropa mātra jīvite hi te samāropitam ca tattva sakṣātkāraḥ sa mūla ghātam upahanti iti tathā iha api avidyā samāropita jīva bhāve brahmaṇi ānande vastutas  śoka duḥkha ādi rahite samāropita nibandhanaḥ tad bhāvaḥ atattvam asi iti vākya artha tattva jñānāt avagati paryantāt nivartate tad nivṛttau prāptam api ānanda rūpam aprāptam iva prāptam bhavati tyaktam api śoka duḥkha ādi atyaktam iva tyaktam bhavati tad idam uktam brahma ātmā avagamāt eva jīvasya sarva kleśasya sa vāsanasya viparyāsasya sa hi kliśnāti jantūnataḥ kleśaḥ tasya prakarṣeṇa hānāt  puruṣa arthasya duḥkha nivṛtti sukha āpti lakṣaṇasya siddheḥ iti yad tu aātmā iti eva upāsīta aātmānam eva lokam upāsīta iti upāsana avākya gata devatā ādi pratipādanena upāsana aparatvam vedāntānām uktam tad dūṣayati devatā ādi pratipādanasya tu ātmā iti etāvat mātrasya sva vākya gata upāsana artha tve api na kaścid virodhaḥ yadi na virodhaḥ santu tarhi vedāntā devatā pratipādana dvāreṇa upāsanā vidhi parā eva ityata āha na tu tathā brahmaṇa iti upāsya upāsaka upāsana ādi bheda siddhi adhīna upāsanā na nirasta samasta bheda prapañce vedānta vedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavati iti na upāsanā vidhi śeṣa tvam vedāntānām tad virodhi tvāt iti arthaḥ syāt etad  yadi vidhi virahe api vedāntānām prāmāṇyam hanta tarhi asaḥ  arodīt ityādīnām api astu svatantrāṇām eva upekṣaṇīya arthānām prāmāṇyam na hi hāna upādāna buddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale upekṣā buddheḥ api tad phala tvena prāmāṇikaiḥ abhyupeta tvāt  iti kṛtam abarhiṣi rajatam na deyam ityādi niṣedha vidhi paratvena eteṣām iti ata āha yadi api iti svādhyāya vidhi adhīna grahaṇa tayā hi sarvaḥ  veda rāśiḥ puruṣa artha tantra iti avagatam tatra ekena api varṇena na apuruṣa arthena bhavitum yuktam kim punar iyatā asaḥ  arodīt ityādinā pada prabandhena na ca vedāntebhya iva tad artha avagama mātrāt eva kaścid puruṣa artha upalabhyate tena eṣa pada saṃdarbhaḥ sa ākāṅkṣa eva āste puruṣa artham udīkṣamāṇaḥ abarhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti ayam api niṣedha vidhiḥ sva niṣedhyasya nindām apekṣate na hi anyathā tatas cetanaḥ śakyaḥ  nivartayitum tad yadi dūratas  api na nindām avāpsyat tatas  niṣedha vidhiḥ eva rajata niṣedhe ca nindāyām ca darvi henatasvasya sāmarthya dvayam akalpayiṣyat tad evam uttaptayoḥ asaḥ  arodīt iti ca abarhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti ca pada saṃdarbhayoḥ lakṣyamāṇa nindā dvāreṇa naṣṭa aśva dagdha rathavat parasparam samanvayaḥ na tu evam vedānteṣu puruṣa artha apekṣā tad artha avagamāt eva anapākṣāt parama puruṣa artha lābhāt iti uktam nanu vidhi asaṃsparśinaḥ vedasya anyasya na prāmāṇyam dṛṣṭam iti katham vedāntānām tad aspṛśām tad bhaviṣyati iti ata āha na ca anumāna gamyam iti abādhita an adhigata asaṃdigdha bodha janaka tvam hi pramāṇa tvam pramāṇānām tad ca svata iti upapāditam yadi api ca eṣām īdṛś bodha janaka tvam kārya arthāpatti samadhi gamyam tathā api tad bodha upajanane māna antaram na apekṣante na api imām ā iva arthāpattim paraspara āśraya prasaṅgāt iti svata iti uktam īdṛś bodha janaka tvam ca kārye iva vidhīnām vedāntānām api brahmaṇi asti iti dṛṣṭānta anapekṣam teṣām brahmaṇi prāmāṇyam siddham bhavati anyathā na indriya antarāṇām rūpa prakāśanam dṛṣṭam iti cakṣuḥ api na rūpam prakāśayet iti prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt  iti ācārya eka deśīyānām matam utthāpayati atra apare pratyavatiṣṭhante iti tathā hi ajñāta saṃgati tvena śāstra tvena arthavat tayā mananā ādi pratītyā ca kārya arthat brahma niścayaḥ na khalu vedāntāḥ siddha brahma rūpa parā bhavitum arhanti tatra avidita saṃgati tvāt yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante na tatra teṣām saṃgati grahaḥ na ca āheyam anupādeyam rūpa mātram kaścid vivakṣati prekṣāvān tasya abubhutsita tvāt abubhutsita avabodhane ca prekṣāvattā vidhātaḥ syāt  tasmāt  pratipitsitam pratipipāt ayiṣat   ayam lokaḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti hetu bhūtam eva artham pratipādayet  kāryam ca avagate tad hetuḥ iti tad eva bodhayet  evam ca vṛddha prayogāt  padānām kārya para tām avagacchati tatra kiñcid sākṣāt  kārya abhidhāyakam kiñcittu kārya artha sva artha abhidhāyakam na tu bhūta artha para tā padānām api ca nara antarasya vyutpannasya artha pratyayam anumāya tasya ca pada śabda bhāva abhāva anuvidhānam avagamyaya śabdasya tad viṣaya bodhaka tvam niścetavyam na ca bhūta artha rūpa mātra pratyaye para nara vartini kiñcid liṅgam asti kārya pratyaye tu nara antara vartini pravṛtti nivṛttī staḥ  hetū iti ajñāta saṃgati tvāt na brahma rūpa parā vedāntāḥ api ca vedāntānām veda tvāt śāstratva prasiddhiḥ asti pravṛtti nivṛtti parāṇām ca pada saṃdarbhāṇām śāstra tvam yathā āhuḥ pravṛttiḥ vā nivṛttiḥ vā nityena kṛtakena vā puṃsām yena upadiśyeta tad śāstram abhidhīyate iti tasmāt śāstratva prasiddhyā vyāhatam eṣām svarūpa paratvam api ca na brahma rūpa pratipādana parāṇām eṣām arthavat tvam paśyāmaḥ na ca arajjuḥ iyam na bhujaṅgaḥ iti yathā kathañcit lakṣaṇayā vākya artha tattva niścayāt yathā bhaya kampa ādi nivṛttiḥ evam atattvam asi iti vākya arthau  agamāt nivṛttiḥ bhavati sāṃsārikāṇām dharmāṇām śruta vākya arthasya api puṃsaḥ teṣām tādavasthyāt  api ca yadi śruta brahmaṇaḥ  bhavati sāṃsārika dharma nivṛttiḥ kasmāt  punar  śravaṇasya upari manana ādayaḥ śrūyante ḷ tasmāt teṣām vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt api na brahma svarūpa parā vedāntāḥ kim tu ātma pratipatti viṣaya kārya parāḥ tad ca kāryam sva ātmani niyojyam niyuñjānam niyoga iti ca māna antara apūrva tayā apūrvam iti ca ākhyāyate na ca viṣaya anuṣṭhānam vinā tad siddhiḥ iti sva siddhi artham tad eva kāryam sva viṣayasya karaṇasya ātma jñānasya anuṣṭhānam ākṣipati yathā ca kāryam sva viṣaya adhīnanirūpaṇam iti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate evam jñānam api sva viṣayam ātmānam antareṇa aśakyanirūpaṇam iti tad nirūpaṇāya tādṛśam ātmānam ākṣipati tad eva kāryam yathā āhuḥ ayat tu tad siddhi artham upādīyate ākṣipyate tad api vidheyam iti tantre vyavahāraḥ iti vidheya tā ca niyoga viṣayasya jñānasya bhāva artha tayā anuṣṭheya tā tad viṣayasya tu ātmanaḥ sva rūpa sattā viniścitiḥ āropita tad bhāvasya tu anyasya nirūpaka tve tena tad nirūpitam na syāt  tasmāt tādṛś ātma pratipatti vidhi parebhyaḥ  vedāntebhyaḥ tādṛś ātma viniścayaḥ tad etad sarvam āha yadi api iti vidhi parebhyaḥ  api vastu tattva viniścaya iti atra vidarśanam uktam yathā yūpa iti ayūpe paśum badhnāti iti bandhanāya viniyukte yūpe tasya alaukika tvāt kaḥ asau yūpa iti apekṣite akhādiraḥ  yūpaḥ  bhavati ayūpam takṣati ayūpam aṣṭa aśrīkaroti ityādibhiḥ vākyaiḥ takṣaṇa ādi vidhi papaiḥ api saṃskāra āviṣṭam viśiṣṭa saṃsthānam dāru yūpa iti gamyate evam āhavanīyāt ayaḥ  api avagantavyāḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti parasya śāstra tvam na svarūpa parasya kārya eva ca saṃbandhaḥ  na svarūpaḥ  iti hetu dvayam bhāṣya vākyena upapāditam pravṛtti nivṛtti prayojana tvāt  ityādinā tad sāmānyāt vedāntānām api tathā eva arthavat tvam syāt  iti antena na ca svatantram kāryam niyojyam adhikāriṇam anuṣṭhātāram antareṇa iti niyojya bhedam āha sati ca vidhi paratve iti abrahma veda brahmā eva bhavati iti siddhavat artha vādāt avagatasya api brahma bhavanasya niyojya viśeṣa ākāṅkṣāyām brahma bubhūṣoḥ niyojya viśeṣasya rātri satra nyāyena pratilambhaḥ piṇḍa putṛ yajña anyāyena tu svarga kāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyām artha vādasya asamaveta artha tayā atyanta parokṣā vṛttiḥ syāt iti brahma bhāvaḥ ca amṛta tvam iti amṛtatva kāmasya iti uktam amṛta tvam ca amṛta tvāt eva na kṛtaka tvena śakyam anityam anumātum āgama virodhāt iti bhāvaḥ uktena dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ vailakṣaṇyenana vidhyaviṣaya tvam codayati nanu iti pariharati na arhati evam iti atra ca ātma darśanam na vidheyam tad hi dṛśeḥ upalabdhi vacana tvāt  śrāvaṇam vā syāt  pratyakṣam vā pratyakṣam api laukikam ahaṃpratyayaḥ  vā bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jam vā tatra śrāvaṇam na vidheyam svādhyāya vidhinā eva asya prāpita tvāt  karma śrāvaṇavat  na api laukikam pratyakṣam tasya naisargika tvāt  na ca aupaniṣada ātma viṣayam bhāvanā ādheya vaiśadyam vidheyam tasya upāsana avidhānāt eva vājinavat anuniṣpādita tvāt  tasmāt aupaniṣadātma upāsanā amṛtatva kāmam niyojyam prati vidhīyate adraṣṭavyaḥ ityādayaḥ tu vidhi sarūpā na vidhaya iti tad idam uktam tad upāsanāt ca iti arthavattyā mananā ādi pratītyā ca iti asya śeṣaḥ prapañcaḥ  vidaja vyākhyātaḥ tad eka deśi matam dūṣayati atra abhidhīyate na eka deśi matam kutas ḷ karma brahma vidyā phalayoḥ vailakṣaṇyāt puṇya apuṇya karmaṇoḥ phale sukha duḥkhe tatra manuṣya lokam ārabhya ā brahma lokāt sukhasya tāratamyam adhika adhika utkarṣaḥ evam manuṣya lokam ārabhya duḥkha tāratamyayā ca avīci lokāt  tad ca sarvam kāryam ca vināśi ca ātyantikam tu aśarīra tvam anatiśayam svabhāva siddha tayā nityam akāryam ātma jñānasya phalam tad hi phalam iva phalam avidyā apanayana mātreṇa āvirbhāvāt  etad uktam bhavati tvayā api upāsana āvidhi para tvam vedāntānām abhyupagacchatā nitya śuddha buddhatva ādi rūpa brahma ātma tā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedānta gamya asthīyate sā ca upāsanā viṣayasya vidheḥ na phalam nitya tvāt akārya tvāt  na api anādi vidyā pidhāna apanayaḥ tasya sva virodhi vidyā udayāt eva bhāvāt  na api vidyā udayaḥ tasya api śravaṇa manana pūrva kopa āsanā janita saṃskāra sacivāt eva cetasaḥ  bhāvāt  upāsana asaṃskāravat upāsana apūrvam api cetaḥ sahakāri dṛṣṭam ca khalu naiyogikam phalam aihikam api yathā citrā kārīrya ādi niyogānām aniyata niyata phalānāmaihika phala iti ced  na gāndharva śāstra artha īpāsanā vāsanāyāḥ  iva apūrva anapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭja ādi sākṣātkāre vedānta artha upāsanau  āsanāyāḥ  jīvasya brahma bhāva sākṣātkāre anapekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt  tathā ca amṛtībhāvam pratyahetu tvāt upāsanā pūrvasya na amṛtatva kāmaḥ tad kāryam avaboddhum arhati anyat icchati anyat karoti iti hi vipratiṣiddham na ca tad kāmaḥ kriyām eva kāryam avagamiṣyati na apūrvam iti sāṃpratam tasyāḥ  māna antarāt eva tad sādhanatva pratīteḥ vidheḥ vaiyarthyāt  na ca avaghāta ādi vidhi tulya tā tatra api niyama apūrvasya anyatas  anavagateḥ na ca brahma bhūyāt anyat amṛta tvama artha vādikam kiñcid asti yena tad kāma upāsanāyām adhikriyeta viśva jit nyāyena tu svarga kalpanāyām tasya sa atiśaya tvam kṣayiṣṇu tvam ca iti na nitya phala tvam upāsanāyāḥ tasmāt brahma bhūyasya avidyā pidhāna apanaya mātreṇa āvirbhāvāt  avidyā apanayasya ca vedānta artha vijñānāt avagati paryantāt eva saṃbhavāt  upāsanāyāḥ saṃskāra hetu bhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāra upajanane manaḥ sācivyasya ca māna antara siddha tvāt aātmā iti eva upāsīta iti na vidhiḥ api tu vidhi sarūpaḥ  ayam yathā upāṃśu yāja vākye aviṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ityādayaḥ  vidhi sarūpā na vidhayaḥ iti tātparya arthaḥ śruti smṛti nyāya prasiddham iti uktam tatra śrutim darśayati tathā ca śrutiḥ iti nyāyam āha ata eva iti yad kila svābhāvikam tad nityam yathā caitanyam svābhāvikam ca idam tasmāt nityam pare hi dvayīm nitya tām āhuḥ kūṭastha nityatā pariṇāmi nityatām ca tatra nityam iti ukte mā bhūt asya pariṇāmi nityatā iti āha tatra kiñcid  iti pariṇāmi nityatā hi na pāramārthikī tathā hi tad sarva ātmanā vā pariṇamate eka deśena vā ḷ sarva ātmanā pariṇāme katham na tattva vyāhṛtiḥ ḷ eka deśa pariṇāme vā sa eka deśaḥ tatas  bhinnaḥ vā abhinnaḥ vā ḷ bhinnaḥ ced  katham tasya pariṇāmaḥ ḷ na hi anyasmin pariṇamamāne anyaḥ pariṇamati atiprasaṅgāt  abhede vā katham na sarva ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ ḷ bhinna abhinnam tad iti ced  tathā hi tad eva kāraṇa ātmanā abhinnam bhinnam ca kārya ātmanā kaṭaka ādaya iva abhinnā hāṭaka ātmanā bhinnāḥ ca kaṭaka ādi ātmanā na ca bheda abhedayoḥ virodha anna ekatra samavāya iti yuktam viruddham iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ ḷ yad pramāṇa viparyayeṇa vartate yad tu yathā pramāṇena avagamyate tasya tathā abhāva eva akuṇḍalam idam suvarṇam iti sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyaye vyaktam bheda abhedau cakāstaḥ tathā hi ātyantike abhede anyatarasya dvi s ava bhāsa prasaṅgaḥ bhede ca atyantike na sāmānādhikaraṇyam gavāśvavat  ādhāra ādheya bhāve eka āśraya tve vā na sāmānādhikaraṇyam na hi bhavati kuṇḍam badaram iti na api eka āsana sthayoḥ caitra maitrayoḥ caitraḥ  maitra iti saḥ  ayam abādhitaḥ  asaṃdigdhaḥ sarva janīnaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyaya eva kārya kāraṇayoḥ bheda abhedau vyavasthāpayati tathā ca kāryāṇām kāraṇa ātma tvāt  kāraṇasya ca sat rūpasya sarvatra anugamāt sat rūpeṇa abhedaḥ kāryasya jagataḥ bhedaḥ kārya rūpeṇa gaḥ ghaṭa ādinā iti yathā āhuḥ kārya rūpeṇa nānā tvam abhedaḥ kāraṇa ātmanā hema ātmanā yathā bhedaḥ kuṇḍala ādi ātmanā bhidā iti atra ucyate kaḥ punar ayam bhedaḥ  nāma yaḥ saha abhedena ekatra bhavet  ḷ paraspara abhāva iti ced  kim ayam kārya kāraṇayoḥ kaṭakahāṭakayoḥ asti na vā ḷ na ced  eka tvam eva asti na ca bhedaḥ asti ced  bheda eva nābhedaḥ na ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ avirodhaḥ saha avasthāna asaṃbhavāt saṃbhave vā kaṭaka vardhamānayoḥ api tattvena abheda prasaṅgaḥ bhedasya abheda avirodhāt  api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakāt abhede yathā hāṭaka ātmanā kaṭaka mukuṭa kuṇḍala ādayaḥ  na bhidyante evam kaṭaka ātmanā api na bhidyeran kaṭakasya hāṭakāt abhedāt  tathā ca hāṭakam eva vastu sat na kaṭaka ādayaḥ bhedasya apratibhāsanāt atha hāṭaka tvena eva abhedaḥ  na kaṭaka tvena tena tu bheda eva kuṇḍala ādeḥ yadi hāṭaka ādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ katham ayam kuṇḍala ādiṣu na anuvartate ḷ na anuvartate ced  katham hāṭaka ādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ ḷ ye hi yasmin  anuvartamāne vyāvartante te tatas  bhinnā eva yathā sūtrāt kusuma bhedāḥ na anuvartante ca anuvartamāne api hāṭaka tve kuṇḍala ādayaḥ tasmāt te api hāṭakāt bhinnā eva iti sattā anuvṛttyā ca sarva vastu anugame aidam iha na idam idam evam na idam iti vibhāgaḥ  na syāt  kasyacid  kvacid  kadācid  kathañcid viveka hetoḥ abhāvāt  api ca dūrāt kanakam iti avagate na tasya kuṇḍala ādayaḥ  viśeṣā jijñāsyeran kanakāt abhedāt teṣām tasya ca jñāta tvāt  atha bhedaḥ  api asti kanakāt  kuṇḍala ādīnām iti kanaka avagame api ajñātāḥ te nanu abhedaḥ  api asti iti kim na jñātāḥ ḷ pratyuta jñānam eva teṣām yuktam kāraṇa abhāve hi kārya bhāva autsargikaḥ sa ca kāraṇa sattayā apodyate asti ca abhede kāraṇa satta iti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍala ādaya iti tad jijñāsā jñānāni ca anarthakāni syuḥ tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yad na gṛhyate tad tatas  bhidyate yathā karabhe gṛhyamāṇe agṛhyamāṇe rāsabhaḥ karabhāt  gṛhyamāṇe ca dūratas  hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍala ādayaḥ tasmāt te hemnaḥ  bhidyante katham tarhi hema kuṇḍalam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti ced  na hi ādhāra ādheya bhāve samāna āśraya tve vā vā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti uktam atha anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti vyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍala ādi jijñāsā ca katham ḷ na khalva bhede aikāntike anaikāntike ca etad ubhayam upapadyate iti uktam tasmāt bheda abhedayoḥ anyatarasmin  avaheye abhedaḥ  pādānā eva bheda kalpanā na bheda upādāna abheda kalpanā iti yuktam bhidyamāna tantra tvāt bhedasya bhidyamānānām ca pratyekam eka tvāt  eka abhāve ca anāśrayasya bhedasya ayogāt eka tvasya ca bheda an adhīna tvāt  na aya mayam iti ca bheda grahasya pratiyogi graha sāpekṣa tvāt  ekatva grahasya ca anya anapekṣa tvāt abheda upādāna eva anirvacanīya bheda kalpanā iti sāṃpratam tathā ca śrutiḥ amṛttikā iti eva satyam iti tasmāt  kūṭastha nityatā eva pāramārthikī na pariṇāmi nityatā iti siddham vyomavat  iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ para siddhaḥ asmad mate tasya api kāryatvena anitya tvāt  atra ca kūṭastha nityam iti nirvartya karma tām apākaroti sarva vyāpi iti prāpya karmatām sarva vikriyā rahitam iti vikārya karmatām niravayavam iti saṃskārya karmatām vrīhīṇām khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskāra ākhyoṃ aśaḥ yathā janyate na evam brahmaṇi kaścid aṃśaḥ kriyā ādheyaḥ  asti anavayava tvāt  anaṃśa tvāt iti arthaḥ puruṣa artha tām āha nitya tṛptam iti tṛptyā duḥkha rahitam sukham upalakṣayati kṣudh duḥkha nivṛtti sahitam hi sukham tṛptiḥ sukham ca apratīyamānam na puruṣa artha iti ata āha svayan jyotiḥ iti tad evam sva matena mokṣa ākhyam phalam nityam śruti ādibhiḥ upapādya kriyā niṣpādyasya tu mokṣasya anitya tvam prasañjayati tad yadi iti na ca āgama bādhaḥ āgamasya uktena prakāreṇa upapatteḥ api ca jñāna janyā pūrva janitaḥ  mokṣaḥ  naiyogika iti asya arthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ nivārikā iti āha api ca brahma veda iti avidyā dvaya pratibandha apanaya mātreṇa ca vidyāyā mokṣa sādhana tvam na svatas  apūrva utpādena vā iti atra api śrutiḥ udāharati tvam hi naḥ pitā iti na kevalam asmin  arthe śruti ādayaḥ api tu akṣapāt ācārya sūtram api nyāya mūlam asti iti āha tathā ca ācārya praṇītam iti ācāryaḥ ca ukta lakṣaṇaḥ purāṇe ācinoti ca śāstra artham ācāre sthāpayati api svayam ācarate yasmāt ācāryaḥ tena ca ucyate iti tena hi praṇītam sūtram aduḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt apavargaḥ iti pāṭhā apekṣayā kāraṇam uttaram kāryam ca pūrvam kāraṇa apāye kārya apāyaḥ kapha apāye iva kapha udbhavasya jvarasya apāyaḥ janma apāye daḥkha apāyaḥ pravṛtti apāye janma apāyaḥ doṣa apāye pravṛtti apāyaḥ mithyājñāna apāye doṣa apāyaḥ mithyājñānam ca avidyā rāga ādi upajanana krameṇa dṛṣṭena eva saṃsārasya paramam nidānam sā ca tattva jñānena brahma ātmā ekatva vijñānena eva avagati paryantena virodhinā nivartyate tatas  avidyā nivṛttyā brahma svarūpa āvirbhāvaḥ  mokṣaḥ na tu vidyā kāryaḥ tad janitā pūrva kāryaḥ  vā iti sūtra arthaḥ tattva jñānāt mithyā jñāna apāya iti etāvat mātreṇa sūtra upanyāsaḥ na tu akṣa pāda saṃmatam tattva jñānam iha saṃmatam tad anena ācārya antara saṃvādena ayam arthaḥ  dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ syāt etad  na ekatva vijñānam yathā avasthita vastu viṣayam yena mithyājñānam bheda avabhāsam nivartayan  vidhi viṣayaḥ  bhavet  api tu saṃpad ādi rūpam tathā ca vidheḥ prāc aprāptam puruṣa icchayā kartavyam sat  vidhi gocaraḥ  bhaviṣyati yathā vṛtti antara tvena manasaḥ  viśvedeva sāmyāt viśvān devān manasi saṃpādya mana ālambanam avidyamāna samam kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānām viśveṣām eva devānām anucintanam tena ca ananta loka prāptiḥ evam cit rūpa sāmyāt jīve brahma svarūpam saṃpādya jīvam ālambanam avidyamāna samam kṛtvā prādhānyena brahma anucintanam tena ca amṛtatva phala prāptiḥ adhyāse tu ālambanasya eva prādhānyena āropita tad bhāvasya anucintanam yathā amanaḥ  brahma iti upāsīta aādityaḥ  brahma iti ādeśaḥ evam jīvam abrahma abrahma iti upāsīta iti kriyā viśeṣa yogāt vā yathā avāyuḥ vāva saṃvargaḥ aprāṇaḥ  vāva saṃvargaḥ bāhyā khalu vāyudevatā saṃvargaḥ bāhyā khalu vāyudevatā saṃvargaḥ sa hi vahni ādīn saṃvṛṅkte mahāpralaya samaye hi vāyuḥ vahni ādīn saṃvṛtya saṃhṛtya ātmani sthāpayati yathā āha draviḍa ācāryaḥ asaṃharaṇāt vā saṃvaraṇāt vā sva ātmībhāvāt vāyuḥ saṃvargaḥ iti adhyātmam ca prāṇaḥ saṃvarga iti sa hi sarvāṇi vāc ādīni saṃvṛṅkte prāyaṇa kāle hi sa eva sarvāṇi indriyāṇi saṃgṛhya utkrāmati iti sā iyam saṃvarga dṛṣṭiḥ vāyau prāṇe ca daśa āśā gatam jagat darśayati yathā evam jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇa kriyayā brahma dṛṣṭi smṛta tvāya phalāya kalpata iti tad eteṣu triṣu api pakṣeṣu ātma darśana upāsana ādayaḥ pradhāna karmāṇi apūrva viṣaya tvāt  stuta śastravat  ātmā tu dravyam karmaṇi guṇa iti saṃskāraḥ  vā ātmanaḥ  darśanam vidhīyate yathā darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇe apatnī avekṣitam ājyam bhavati iti samāmnātam prakaraṇinā ca gṛhītam upāṃśuyāga aṅga bhūta ājya dravya saṃskāra tayā avekṣaṇam guṇa karma vidhīyate evam kartṛ tvena kratu aṅga bhūte ātmani aātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ iti darśanam guṇa karma vidhīyate ayaiḥ tu dravyam cikīrṣyate guṇaḥ tatra pratīyeta iti nyāyāt  ata āha na ca idam brahma ātmā ekatva vijñānam iti kutas  ḷ saṃpad ādi rūpe hi brahma ātmā ekatva vijñāne iti darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇe hi samāmnātam ājya avekṣaṇam tad aṅga bhūta ājya saṃskāra iti yujyate na ca aātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ ityādi kasyacid prakaraṇe samāmnātam na ca anārabhya adhītam api ayasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati iti avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha juhū dvāreṇa juhūpadam kratum smārayat vākyena yathā parṇa tāyāḥ kratu śeṣa bhāvam āpādayati na evam ātmā api avyabhicārita kratu saṃbandhaḥ yena tad darśanam kratu aṅgam sadā ātmānam kratu artham saṃskuryāt  tena yadi apyayam vidhiḥ tathā api asuvarṇam hiraṇyam bhāryam itivat  viniyoga bhaṅgena pradhāna karma eva apūrva viṣaya tvāt  na guṇa karma iti sthavīyaḥ tayā etad dūṣaṇam anabhidhāya sarva pakṣa sādhāraṇam dūṣaṇam uktam tad atirohita artha tayā na vyākhyātam kim ca jñāna kriyā viṣayatva vidhānam asya bahu śruti viruddham iti āha na ca vidikriya iti śaṅkate aviṣaya tve iti tatas ca śānti karmaṇi vetāla udaya iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti na kutas ḷ avidyā kalpita bheda nivṛtti paratvāt iti sarvam eva hi vākyam nedantayā vastu bhedam bodhayitum arhati na hi ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām madhura rasa bhedaḥ śakya ākhyātum evam anyatra api sarvatra draṣṭavyam tena pramāṇa antara siddhe laukike eva arthe yadā gatiḥ idṛśī śabdasya tadā kā eva kathā pratyak ātmani alaukike adūra viprakarṣeṇa tu kathañcid pratipādanam iha api samānam tvaṃpadārthaḥ  hi pramātā pramāṇa adhīnayā pramityā prameyam ghaṭa ādi vyāpnoti iti avidyā vilasitam tad asya aviṣayībhūta udāsīna tad padārtha pratyak ātma sāmāna adhikaraṇyena pramātṛtva abhāvāt tad nivṛttau pramāṇa āt ayaḥ tisraḥ  vidhā nivartante na hi paktuḥ avastu tve pākyapāka pacanāni vastusanti bhavitum arhanti iti tathā hi vigalita parāk vṛtti artha tvam padasya tadaḥ tadā tvam iti hi padana eka artha tve tvam iti api yad padam tad api ca tadā gatvā ekārthyam viśuddha cit ātma tām tyajati sakalān kartṛtva ādīn padārtha malān nijān iti āntaraślokaḥ atra eva arthe śrutīḥ udāharati tathā ca śāstram yasya āmatam iti prakṛtam upasaṃharati atas  avidyā kalpita iti para pakṣe mokṣasya anitya tām āpādayati yasya tu iti kāryam apūrvam yāga ādi vyāpāra janyam tad apekṣate mokṣaḥ sva utpattau  iti tayoḥ pakṣayoḥ iti nirvartya vikāryayoḥ kṣaṇikam vijñānam ātmā iti bauddhāḥ tathā ca viśuddha vijñāna utpādaḥ  mokṣa iti nirvartyaḥ  mokṣaḥ anyeṣām tu saṃskāra rūpa avasthām apahāya yā kaivalya avasthā avāptiḥ ātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryaḥ  mokṣaḥ yathā payasaḥ pūrva avasthā apahānena avasthā antara prāptiḥ vikāraḥ  dadhi iti tad etayoḥ pakṣayoḥ na nitya tā mokṣasya kāryatvāt  dadhi ghaṭa ādivat  aatha yad atas  paraḥ  divaḥ  jyotiḥ dīpyate iti śruteḥ brahmaṇaḥ  vikṛta avikṛta deśa bhedauvagamāt avikṛta deśa brahma prāpti svarūpa āsana ādi vidhi kāryā bhaviṣyati tathā ca prāpya karmatā brahmaṇa iti ata āha na ca apyatvena api iti anyat anyena vikṛta deśa parihāṇya avikṛta deśam prāpyate tad yathā upavelam jala dhiḥ ati bahala capala kallola mālā paraspara āsphālana samullasat phena puñja stabaka tayā vikṛtaḥ madhye tu praśānta sakala kallola upasargaḥ svacchaḥ sthira tayā avikṛtaḥ tasya madhyama vikṛtam pautikaḥ potena prāpnoti jīvaḥ tu brahma eva iti kim kena prāpyatāmḷ bheda āśrayātvāt prāpteḥ iti arthaḥ atha jīvaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ  bhinnaḥ tathā api na tena brahma āpyate brahmaṇaḥ  vibhu tvena nitya prāpta tvāt iti āha sva rūpa vyatirikta tve api iti saṃskāra karma tām apākaroti na api saṃskārya iti dvayī hi saṃskāryatā guṇa ādhānena vā yathā bījapūra kusumasya lākṣā rasa avasekaḥ tena hi tad kusumam saṃskṛtam lākṣā rasa savarṇam phalam prasūte doṣa apanayena vā yathā malinam ādarśa talam nighṛṣṭam iṣṭakā cūrṇena udbhāsita bhāsvara tvam saṃskṛtam bhavati tatra na tāvat brahmaṇi guṇa ādhānam saṃbhavati guṇa u hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ  vā bhinnaḥ vā ḷ svabhāvaḥ ced  katham ādheyaḥ tasya nityavāt  bhinna tve tu kāryatvena mokṣasya anityatva prasaṅgaḥ na ca bhede dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ gavāśvavat  bheda abhedaḥ ca vyudastaḥ virodhāt  tad anena abhisaṃdhinā uktam anādheya atiśaya brahma svarūpa tvāt mokṣasya iti dvitīyam pakṣam pratikṣipati na api doṣa apanayanena iti aśuddhiḥ satī darpaṇe nivartate na tu brahmaṇi asatī nivartanīyā nitya nivṛtta tvāt iti arthaḥ śaṅkate sva ātma dharma eva iti brahma svabhāva eva mokṣaḥ  anādya vidyā mala āvṛta upāsana ādi kriyayā ātmani saṃskriyamāṇe abhivyajyate na tu kriyate etad uktam bhavati nitya śuddha tvam ātmanaḥ  asiddham saṃsāra avasthāyām avidyā malina tvāt iti śaṅkām nirākaroti na kutas  ḷ kriyā śrayatva anupapatteḥ na avidyā brahma āśrayā kim tu jīve sā tu anirvacanīya iti uktam tena nitya śuddham eva brahma abhyupetya tu aśuddhim kriyā saṃskārya tvam dūṣyate kriyā hi brahma samavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt  yathā nigharṣaṇam iṣṭakā cūrṇa saṃyoga vibhāga pracayaḥ  nirantara ādarśa tala samavetaḥ anya samavetā vā na tāvat brahma dharmaḥ kriyā tasyāḥ sva āśraya vikāra hetu tvena brahmaṇaḥ  nityatva vyāghātāt  anya āśrayā tu katham anyasya upakaroti atiprasaṅgāt  na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇiḥ viśuddhaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ tad ca aniṣṭam iti tadā bādhanam parāmṛśati atra vyabhicāram codayati nanu deha āśrayayā iti pariharati na deha saṃhatasya iti anādya nirvācya avidyā upadhānam eva brahmaṇaḥ  jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ācakṣate sa ca sthūla sūkṣma śarīra indriya ādi saṃhataḥ tad saṃghāta madhya patitaḥ tad abhedena ahamiti pratyaya viṣayībhūtaḥ atas  śarīra ādi saṃskāraḥ śarīra ādi dharmaḥ  api ātmanaḥ  bhavati tad abheda adhyavasāyāt yathā aṅga rāga dharmaḥ sugandhi tā kāminīnām vyapadiśyate tena atra api yad āśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārika pramāṇa viṣayīkṛtā tasya eva saṃskāraḥ  na anyasya iti na vyabhicāraḥ tattvataḥ tu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti sa nidarśanam tu śeṣam adhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛta vyākhyānam iti na iha vyākhyātam tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam iti anyaḥ  jīvātmā pippalam karma phalam anaśnan  anya iti paramātmā saṃhatasya eva bhoktṛ tvam āha mantra varṇaḥ ātma indriya iti anupahita śuddha svabhāva brahma pradarśana parau mantrau paṭhati ekaḥ  deva iti śukram dīptimat  avraṇam duḥkha rahitam asrāviram avigalitam avināśī iti yāvat  upasaṃharati tasmāt  iti nanu mā bhūt nirvartyādi karma tā catuṣṭayī pañcamī tu kācid  vidhā bhaviṣyati yayā mokṣasya karma tā ghaṭiṣyata iti ata āha atas  anyat  iti ebhyaḥ prakārebhyaḥ  na prakāra antaram anyat asti yatas  mokṣasya kriyā anupraveśaḥ  bhaviṣyati etad uktam bhavati catasṛṇām vidhānām madhye anyatama tayā kriyā phala tvam vyāptam sā ca mokṣāt vyāvartamānā vyāpaka anupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyā phala tvam vyāvartayati iti tad kim mokṣe kriyā eva na asti ḷ tathā ca tad arthāni śāstrāṇi tad arthāḥ ca pravṛttayaḥ  anarthakāni iti ata upasaṃhāra vyājena āha tasmāt jñānam ekam iti atha jñānam kriyā mānasī kasmāt na vidhi gocaraḥ ḷ kasmāt ca tasyāḥ phalam nirvartya ādiṣu anyatamam na mokṣaḥ ḷ iti codayati nanu jñānam iti pariharati na kutas  ḷ vailakṣaṇyāt  ayam arthaḥ satyam jñānam mānasī kriyā tu iyam brahmaṇi phalam janayitum arhati tasya svayaṃprakāśa tayā vidikriyā karma bhāva anupapatteḥ iti uktam tad etasmin vailakṣaṇye sthite eva vailakṣaṇya antaram āha kriyā hi nāma sā iti yatra viṣaye vastu svarūpa nirapekṣā eva codyate yathā devatā saṃpradānaka haviḥ grahaṇe devatā vastu svarūpa anapekṣā devatā dhyāna kriyā yathā vā yoṣiti agni vastu anapekṣā agni buddhiḥ yā sā kriyā hi nāma iti yojanā na hi ayasyai devatāyai haviḥ gṛhītam syāt tām dhyāyet vaṣaṭkariṣyan iti asmāt vidheḥ prāk devatā dhyānam prāptam prāptam tu adhīta vedāntasya vidita pada tad artha saṃbandhasya adhigata śabda nyāya tattvasya asat eva somya idam iti ādeḥ atattvam asi iti antāt saṃdarbhāt brahma ātma bhāva jñānam śabda pramāṇa sāmarthyāt  indriya artha saṃnikarṣa sāmarthyāt iva praṇihita manasaḥ sphīta āloka madhya varti kumbha anubhavaḥ na hi asau sva sāmagrī bala labdha janmā manuja icchayāni athā kartum akartum vā śakyaḥ devatā dhyānavat yena arthavān atra vidhiḥ syāt  na ca upāsanā vā anubhava paryanta tā vā asya vidheḥ gocaraḥ tayoḥ anvaya vyatireka avadhṛta sāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādya vidyā apanaye vā vidhim antareṇa prāpta tvena puruṣa icchayā anyathā kartum akartum vā aśakya tvāt  tasmāt brahma jñānam mānasī kriyā api na vidhi gocaraḥ puruṣa citta vyāpāra adhīnāya aḥ tu kriyāyāḥ  vastu svarūpa nirapekṣitā kvacid avirodhinī yathā devatā dhyāna kriyāyāḥ na hi atra vastu svarūpeṇa kaścid virodhaḥ kvacid vastu svarūpa virodhinī yathā yoṣit puruṣayoḥ agni buddhiḥ iti etāvatā bhedena nidarśana amithuna dvaya upanyāsaḥ kriyā eva iti evakāreṇa vastu tantra tvam apākaroti nanu aātmā iti eva upāsīta ityādayaḥ  vidhayaḥ śrūyante na ca te pramatta gītāḥ tulyam hi sāṃpradāyikam tasmāt vidheyena atra bhavitavyam iti ata āha tad viṣaye liṅga ādaya iti satyam śrūyante liṅga ādayaḥ na tu amī vidhi viṣayāḥ tad viṣaya tve aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt  heya upādeya viṣayaḥ  hi vidhiḥ sa eva ca heya upādeyaḥ  vā yam puruṣaḥ kartum akartum anyathā vā kartum śaknoti tatra eva ca samarthaḥ kartā adhikṛtaḥ  niyojyaḥ  bhavati na ca evaṃbhūtāni ātma śravaṇa mananā upāsana darśanāni iti viṣaya tad anuṣṭhātroḥ vidhi vyāpakayoḥ abhāvāt vidheḥ bhāva iti prayuktā api liṅa ādayaḥ pravartana āyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣura taikṣṇyam kuṇṭham apramāṇībhavanti iti aniyojya viṣaya tvāt  iti samarthaḥ  hi kartā adhikārī niyojyaḥ asāmarthye tu na kartṛ tā tatas  na adhikṛtaḥ atas  na niyojya iti arthaḥ yadi virodha ābhāt na vidhivacanāni kim arthāni tarhi vacanāni etāni vidhi  chāyāni iti pṛcchati kim arthāni iti na ca anarthakāni yuktāni svādhyāya vidhi adhīna grahaṇatva anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ uttaram svābhāvika iti anyatas  prāptā eva hi śravaṇa ādayaḥ  vidhi sarūpaiḥ vākyaiḥ anūdyante na ca anuvādaḥ  api aprayojanaḥ pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvāt  tathā hi tad tad iṣṭa aniṣṭa viṣaya īpsā ājihāsa apahṛta hṛdaya tayā bahirmukhaḥ  na pratyagātmani manaḥ samādhātum arhati ātma śravaṇa ādi vidhi sarūpaiḥ tu vacanaiḥ manasā u viṣaya srotaḥ khilīkṛtya pratyagātma srota udghāṭyata iti pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tā anuvādānām asti iti sa prayojana tayā svādhyāya vidhi adhīna grahaṇa tvam upapadyata iti yad ca coditam ātma jñānam anuṣṭhāna anaṅga tvāt apuruṣa artha iti tad ayuktam svatas  asya puruṣa artha tve siddhe yad anuṣṭhāna anaṅga tvam tad bhūṣaṇam na dūṣaṇam iti āha yad api iti anusaṃjvaret  śarīram tapyamānam anutapyeta sugamam anyat  prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt na pratipatti iti prakṛti siddhi artham eka deśi matam dūṣayitum anubhāṣate yad api kecid āhuḥ iti dūṣayati tad na iti idam atra ākūtam kārya bodhe yathā ceṣṭā liṅgam harṣa ādayaḥ tathā siddha bodher athavat tā evam śāstra tvam hita śāsanāt  yadi hi padānām kārya abhidhāne tad artha sva artha abhidhāne vā niyamena vṛddha vyavahāre sāmarthyam abadhṛtam bhavet  na bhavet aheyān upādeya bhūta brahma ātma tā paratvam upaniṣadām tatra avidita sāmarthya tvāt padānām loke tad pūrvaka tvāt ca vaidika artha pratīteḥ atha tu bhūte api arthe padānām loke śakyaḥ saṃgati grahaḥ tatas  upaniṣadān tatpara tvam paurvāparya paryālocanayā avagamyamānam apahnuti na kārya para tvam śakyam kalpayitum śruta hānya śruta kalpanā prasaṅgāt  tatra tāvat evam akāryer athe na saṃgati grahaḥ yadi tad paraḥ prayogaḥ  na loke dṛśyeta tad pratyayaḥ vā vyutpannasya unnetum na śakyete na tāvat tatparaḥ prayogaḥ  na dṛśyate loke kutūhala bhaya ādi nivṛtti arthānām akārya parāṇām pada saṃdarbhāṇām prayogasya loke bahulam upalabdheḥ tad yathā ākhaṇḍala ādi lokapāla cakravāla adhivasatiḥ siddha vidyādhara gandharva apsaraḥ parivāraḥ  brahma loka avatīrṇa mandākinī pāthaḥ pravāha prapāta dhauta kaladhauta maya śilātalaḥ  nandana ādi pramadā vana vihāri maṇi maya śakunta kamanīya ninada manoharaḥ parvata rājaḥ sumeruḥ iti na eṣa bhujaṅgaḥ  rajjuḥ iyam ityādiḥ na api bhūta artha buddhiḥ vyutpanna puruṣa vartinī na śakyā samunnetum harṣa ādeḥ unnayana hotoḥ saṃbhavāt  tathā hi avidita ārya jana bhāṣā arthaḥ  draviḍaḥ  nagara gamana udyataḥ  rājamārga abhyarṇam devadatta mandiram adhyāsīnaḥ pratipanna janakānanda nibandhana putra janmā vārttā āhāreṇa saha nagara stha devadatta abhyāśam āgataḥ paṭavāsa upāyana arpaṇa puraḥsaram adiṣṭyā vardhase devadatta putraḥ te jātaḥ iti vārttā āhāra vyāhāra śravaṇa samanantaram upajāta romāñca kañcukam vikasita nayana utpalamati smera mukha mahā utpalam avalokya devadattam utpanna pramodam anumimīte pramodasya ca prāc abhūtasya tad vyāhāra śravaṇa samanantaram prabhavataḥ tad hetu tām na ca ayam apratipādayan harṣa hetum artham harṣāya kalpata iti anena harṣa hetuḥ artha ukta iti pratipadyate harṣa hetu antarasya ca apratīteḥ putra janmanaḥ ca tad hetoḥ avagamāt tad eva vārttā āhāreṇa abhyadhāyi iti niścinoti evam bhaya śokāt ayaḥ  api udāhāryāḥ tathā ca prayojanavat tayā bhūta artha abhidhānasya prekṣāvat prayogaḥ  api upapannaḥ evam ca brahma svarūpa jñānasya parama puruṣa artha hetu bhāvāt anupadiśatām api puruṣa pravṛtti nivṛttī vedāntānām puruṣa hita anuśāsanāt śāstra tvam siddham bhavati tad siddham etad  vivāda adhyāsitāni vacanāni bhūta artha viṣayāṇi bhūta artha viṣaya pramājanaka tvāt  yad yad viṣaya pramājanakam tad tad viṣayam yathā rūpa ādi viṣayam cakṣuḥ ādi tathā ca etāni tasmāt tathā iti tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam tad na aupaniṣadasya puruṣasya ananya śeṣa tvāt iti upanipūrvāt sadeḥ viśaraṇa arthāt kvipi upaniṣad padam vyutpāditam upanīya advayam brahma sa vāsanām avidyām hinasti iti brahma vidyām āha tad hetu tvāt vedāntā api upaniṣadaḥ tatas  viditaḥ aupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ etad eva vibhajate yaḥ  asau  upaniṣatsu eva iti ahaṃpratyaya viṣayāt bhinatti asaṃsārī iti ata eva kriyā rahita tvāt caturvidha dravya vilakṣaṇaḥ atas ca caturvidha dravya vilakṣaṇaḥ  yad anya śeṣaḥ anya śeṣam hi bhūtam dravyam cikīrṣitam sat utpattyādyāpyam saṃbhavati yathā ayūpam takṣati ityādi yad punar anya śeṣam bhūta bhāvi upayoga rahitam yathā asuvarṇam bhāryam asaktūn juhoti ityādi na tasya utpatti ādi āpyatā kasmāt punar asya ananyaśeṣa tā ityata āha yatas  sva prakaraṇa sthaḥ upaniṣadām anārabhya adhītānām paurvāparya paryālocanayā puruṣa pratipādana para tvena puruṣasya eva prādhānyena idam prakaraṇam na ca juhvā ādivat avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandhaḥ puruṣa iti upapāditam atas  sva prakaraṇa sthaḥ saḥ  ayam tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamānaḥ  na na asti iti śakyaḥ  vaktum iti arthaḥ syāt etad  māna antaraḥ gocara tvena agṛhīta saṃgati tayā apadārthasya brahmaṇaḥ  vākya arthatva anupapatteḥ katham upaniṣad artha tā ityata āha sa eṣa na iti na iti ātmā iti ātma śabdāt yadi api gavā ādivat māna antara gocara tvam ātmanaḥ  na asti tathā api prakāśa ātmana eva sataḥ tad tad upādhi parihāṇyā śakyam vākya artha tvena nirūpaṇam hāṭakasya iva kaṭaka kuṇḍala ādi parihāṇyā na hi prakāśaḥ sva saṃvedanaḥ  na bhāsate na api tad avacchedakaḥ kārya karaṇa saṃghātaḥ tena asa ena na iti na iti ātmā iti tad tad avaccheda parihāṇyā bṛhat tvāt āpanāt ca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyaḥ  vākyāt  brahma iti ca ātmā iti ca nirūpayitum iti arthaḥ atha upādhi nirāsavat upahitam api ātma rūpam kasmāt na nirasyata iti ata āha ātmanaḥ ca pratyākhyātum aśakyatvāt  prakāśaḥ  hi sarvasya ātmā tad adhiṣṭhāna tvāt ca prapañca vibhramasya na ca adhiṣṭhāna abhāve vibhramaḥ  bhavitum arhati na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvām bhujaṅga iti vā dhārā iti vā vibhramaḥ  dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ api ca ātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā tathā ca śrutiḥ atam eva bhāntam anu bhāti sarvam tasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti iti na ca ātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañca prathā yuktā tasmāt ātmanaḥ pratyākhyāna ayogāt vedāntebhyaḥ pramāṇa antara agocara sarva upādhi rahita brahma svarūpa avagati siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ upaniṣatsu eva avagata iti avadhāraṇam amṛṣyamāṇa  ākṣipati nanu ātmā iti sarva janīna ahaṃpratyaya viṣayaḥ  hi ātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī tatra eva ca laukika parīkṣakāṇām ātma pada prayogāt  ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikāḥ te eva ca teṣām arthā iti aupaniṣadam api ātma padam tatra eva pravartitum arhati na artha antare tad viparīte iti arthaḥ samādhatte na ahaṃpratyaya viṣaya aupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ kutas  ḷ tad sākṣi tvena ahaṃpratyaya viṣayaḥ  yaḥ kartā kārya karaṇa saṃghāta upahitaḥ  jīvātmā tad  sākṣi tvena paramātmanaḥ  ahaṃpratyaya viṣaya tvasya pratyukta tvāt
