etad uktam bhavati yadi api aanena jīvena ātmanā iti jīva paramātmanoḥ pāramārthikam aikyam tathā api tasya upahitam rūpam jīvaḥ śuddham tu rūpam tasya sākṣi tad ca māna antara an adhigatam upaniṣad gocara iti etad eva prapañcayati na hi ahaṃpratyaya viṣaya iti vidhi śeṣa tvam vā netum na śakyaḥ kutas  ḷ ātma tvāt eva na hi ātmā anya arthaḥ anyat tu sarvam ātma artham tathā ca śrutiḥ ana vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvam priyam bhavati ātmanaḥ tu kāmāya sarvam priyam bhavati iti api ca atas  sarveṣām ātma tvāt eva na heyaḥ  na api upādeyaḥ sarvasya hi prapañca jātasya brahmā eva tattvam ātmā na ca svabhāvaḥ  heyaḥ aśakyahāna tvāt  na ca upādeyaḥ upātta tvāt  tasmāt heya upādeya viṣayau vidhi niṣedhau na tad viparītam ātma tattvam viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañca jātasya ātmā eva tattvam iti etad upapādayati sarvam hi vinaśyat vikāra jātam puruṣa antam vinaśyati ayam arthaḥ puruṣaḥ  hi śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa tadaviruddha nyāya vyavasthāpita tvāt paramārtha san prapañcaḥ tu anādya vidyā upadarśitaḥ  aparamārtha san yaḥ ca parama artha āsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajju tattvam iva sarva vibhramasya vikārasya ata eva asya anirvācya tvena adṛḍha svabhāvasya vināśaḥ puruṣaḥ tu paramārtha san na asau kāraṇa sahasreṇa api asan śakyaḥ kartum na hi sahasram api śilpinaḥ  ghaṭam paṭayitum īśata iti uktam tasmāt avināśi puruṣa antaḥ  vikāra vināśaḥ śukti rajju tattva anta iva rajata bhujaṅga vināśaḥ puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañca vikāra jātasya tattvam na ca puruṣasya asti vināśaḥ  yatas  anantaḥ vināśaḥ syāt iti ata āha puruṣaḥ  hi vināśa hetu abhāvāt iti na hi kāraṇāni sahasram api anyat anyathayitum īśata iti uktam atha mā bhūt svarūpeṇa puruṣaḥ  heya upādeyaḥ  vā tadīyaḥ tu kaścid dharmaḥ  hāsyate kaścid ca upādāsyata iti ata āha vikriyā hetu abhāvāt ca kūṭastha nityaḥ trividhaḥ  api dharma lakṣaṇa avasthā pariṇāma lakṣaṇaḥ  vikāraḥ  na asti iti uktam api ca ātmanaḥ paramārtha sataḥ dharmaḥ  api paramārtha san  iti na tasya ātmavat anyathātvam kāraṇaiḥ śakyam kartum na ca dharmān yathā tvāt anyaḥ  vikāraḥ tad idam uktam vikriyā āhotva bhāvāt iti sugamam anyat  yad punar eka deśinā śāstra vid vacanam sākṣi tvena anukrāntam tad anyathā upapādayati yad api śāstra tātparyavidām anukramāṇam iti adṛṣṭaḥ  hi tasya arthaḥ prayojanavat artha avabodhanam iti vaktavye dharma jijñāsāyāḥ prakṛta tvāt dharmasya ca karma tvāt  akarma avabodhanam iti uktam na tu siddha rūpa brahma avabodhana vyāpāram vedasya vārayati na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tad guṇa abhidhānam parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇaḥ  guṇavat tām vidhi śāstram vidhīyamāna karma viṣayam pratiṣedha śāstram ca pratiṣidhyamāna karma viṣayam iti ubhayam api karma avabodhana param api ca aāmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt iti śāstra kṛt vacanam tatra artha grahaṇam yadi abhidheya vāci tatas  bhūta arthānām dravya guṇa karmaṇā ām ānarthakyam anabhidheya tvam prasajyeta na hi te kriyā arthā iti ata āha api ca āmnāyasya iti yadi ucyeta na hi kriyā artha tvam kriyā abhidheya tvam api tu kriyā prayojana tvam dravya guṇa śabdānām ca kriyā artha tvena eva bhūta dravya guṇa abhidhānam na sva niṣṭhatayā yathā āhuḥ śāstra vidaḥ acodanā hi bhūtam bhavantam ityādi etad uktam bhavati kāryam artham avagamayantī codanā tad artham bhūta ādikam api artham gamayati iti tatra āha pravṛtti nivṛtti vyatirekeṇa bhūtam ced  iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ na tāvat kārya arthā eva sva arthe padānām saṃgati grahaḥ  na anyārtha  iti upapāditam bhūte api arthe vyutpattim darśayadbhiḥ na api sva artha mātra para tā eva padānām tathā sati na vākya artha pratyayaḥ syāt  na hi pratyekam sva pradhāna tayā guṇa pradhāna bhāva rahitānām eka vākya tā dṛṣṭā tasmāt padānām sva artham abhidadhatām eka prayojanavat padārtha para tayā eka vākyatā tathā ca tad tad artha antara viśiṣṭa eka vākya artha pratyaya upapannaḥ  bhavati yathā āhuḥ śāstra vidaḥ sākṣāt yadi api kurvanti padārtha pratipādanam varṇāḥ tathā api na etasmin paryavasyanti niṣphale vākya artha mitaye teṣām pravṛttau na antarīyakam pāke jvālā iva kāṣṭhānām padārtha pratipādanam iti tathā ca artha antara saṃsarga para tā mātreṇa vākya artha pratyaya upapattau na kārya saṃsarga paratva niyamaḥ padānām evam ca sati kūṭastha nitya brahma rūpa paratve api adoṣa  iti bhavyam kāryam nanu yad bhavya artham bhūtam upadiśyate na tad bhūtam bhavya saṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa tasya api bhavya tvāt ityata āha na hi bhūtam upadiśyamānam iti na tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ saṃsargaḥ kim tu kāryeṇa saha prayojana prayodanilakṣaṇaḥ  anvayaḥ tad viṣayeṇa tu bhāva arthena bhūta arthānām kriyā ātma tvam iti arthaḥ śaṅkate akriyā tve api iti evam ca akriyā artha kūṭastha nitya brahma upadeśa anupapattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ kriyā artha tve api iti na hi kriyā artham bhūtam upadiśyamānam abhūtam bhavati api tu kriyā nivartana yogyam bhūtam eva tad  tathā ca bhūter athe avadhṛta śaktayaḥ śabdāḥ kvacid sva niṣṭha bhūta viṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcid kriyā niṣṭhatām gamayitum ucitāḥ na hi upahitam śataśas  dṛṣṭam api anupahitam kvacid dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam bhavati tathā ca vartamāna apadeśā asti kriyā upahitā akārya arthā api aṭavī varṇa kādayaḥ  loke bahulam upalabhyante evam kriyā niṣṭhā api saṃbandha mātra paryavasāyinaḥ yathā kasya eva puruṣaḥ iti praśne uttaraṃ rājñaḥ iti tathā prātipadikā artha mātra niṣṭhāḥ yathā kīdṛśāḥ taravaḥ iti praśne uttaraṃ phalinaḥ iti na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇām vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite kim tu puruṣasya svāmi bhedaḥ tarūṇām ca prakāra bhedaḥ praṣṭuḥ apekṣitam ca ācakṣāṇaḥ svāmi bhedam eva prakāra bhedam eva ca prativyakti na punar astitvam tasya tena apratipitsita tvāt upapāditā ca bhūte api arthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām codayati yadi nāma upadiṣṭam bhūtaṅ kim tava upadeṣṭuḥ śrotuḥ vā prayojanam syāt  ḷ tasmāt bhūtam api prayojanavat eva upadeṣṭavyam na aprayojanam aprayojanam ca brahma tasya udāsīnasya sarva kriyā rahita tvena anupakāraka tvāt  iti bhāvaḥ pariharati ucyata iti anavagata ātma vastu upadeśaḥ ca tathā eva prayojanavān eva bhavitum arhati api arthaḥ cakāraḥ etad uktam bhavati yadi api brahma udāsīnam tathā api tad viṣayam śābda jñānam avagati paryantam vidyā sva virodhinīm saṃsāra mūla nidānam avidyām ucchindat prayojanavat iti arthaḥ api ca ye api kārya para tvam sarveṣām padānām āsthiṣata taiḥ api abrāhmaṇaḥ  na hantavyaḥ ana surā pātavyā ityādīnām na kārya para tā śakyā āsthātum kṛti upahita maryādam hi kāryam kṛtyā vyāptam tad nivṛttau nivartate śiṃśapā tvam iva vṛkṣatva nivṛttau kṛtiḥ hi puruṣa prayatnaḥ sa ca viṣaya adhīna nirūpaṇaḥ viṣayaḥ ca asya sādhya svabhāvatayā bhāva artha eva pūrva aparībhūtaḥ  anya utpāda anukūlaḥ  bhavitum arhati na dravya guṇau sākṣātkṛti vyāpyaḥ  hi kṛteḥ viṣayaḥ na ca dravya guṇayoḥ siddhayoḥ asti kṛti vyāpya tā ata eva śāstra kṛt vacaḥ abhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta iti dravya guṇa śabdānām naimittika avasthāyām kārya avamarśe api bhāvasya svatas  dravya guṇa śabdānām tu bhāva yogāt kāryā avamarśa iti bhāva arthebhya eva apūrva avagatiḥ na dravya guṇa śabdebhya iti na ca adadhnā juhoti asaṃtatam āghārayati ityādiṣu dadhi ādīnām kārya viṣaya tā tatra api hi homa ghāra bhāva artha viṣayam eva kāryam na ca etāvatā asomena yajeta itivat  dadhi sāṃtati ādi viśiṣṭa homa āghāra vidhānāt aagnihotram juhoti aāghāram āghārayati iti tad anuvādaḥ yadi api atra api bhāva artha viṣayam eva kāryam tathā api bhāva artha anubandha tayā dravya guṇauvaviṣayau  api vidhīyete bhāva arthaḥ  hi kāraka vyāpāra mātra tayā viśiṣṭaḥ kāraka viśeṣeṇa dravya ādinā viśeṣyata iti dravya ādiḥ tad anubandhaḥ tathā ca bhāva arthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sa anubandhaḥ vidhīyata iti dravya guṇauvaviṣayau  api tad anubandha tayā vihitau bhavataḥ evam ca bhāva artha praṇālikayā dravya ādi saṃkrāntaḥ  vidhiḥ gauravāt bibhyat sva viṣayasya ca anyatas  prāpta tayā tad anuvādena tad anubandhī bhūta dravya ādi paraḥ  bhavati iti sarvatra bhāva artha viṣaya eva vidhiḥ etena ayat āgneyaḥ  aṣṭākapālaḥ  bhavati iti atra saṃbandha viṣayaḥ  vidhiḥ iti parāḥ tam nanu na bhavati arthaḥ  vidheyaḥ siddhe bhavitari labdha rūpasya bhavanam pratyakartṛ tvāt na khalu gaganam bhavati na api asiddhe asiddhasya aniyojya tvāt  gagana kusumavat  tasmāt bhavanena prayojya vyāpāreṇa ākṣiptaḥ prayojakasya bhāvayituḥ vyāpāraḥ  vidheyaḥ sa ca vyāpāraḥ  bhāvanā kṛtiḥ prayatna iti nirviṣayaḥ ca asau  aśakya pratipattiḥ atas  viṣaya apekṣāyām āgneya śabda upasthāpitaḥ  dravya devatā saṃbandha eva asya viṣayaḥ nanu vyāpāra viṣayaḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ katham avyāpāra rūpam saṃbandham gocarayet  ḷ na hi aghaṭam kuru iti atra api sākṣāt nāma artham ghaṭam puruṣa prayatnaḥ  gocarayati api tu daṇḍa ādi hasta ādinā vyāpārayati tasmāt ghaṭa arthām kṛtim vyāpāra viṣayām eva pratipadyate na tu svarūpataḥ  ghaṭa viṣayām uddeśya tayā tu asyām asti ghaṭaḥ  na tu viṣaya tayā viṣaya tayā tu hasta ādi vyāpāra eva ata eva aāgneyaḥ iti atra api dravya devatā saṃbandha ākṣiptaḥ  yajiḥ eva kārya viṣayaḥ  vidheyaḥ kim uktam bhavati  āgneyaḥ  bhavati  iti ḷ āgneyena yāgena bhāvayet iti ata eva aya evam vidvān paurṇamāsyām yajate aya evam vidvān amāvāsyām yajate iti anuvādaḥ  bhavati ayat āgneyaḥ ityādi vihitasya yāga ṣaṭkasya ata eva ca vihita anūditasya tasya eva adarśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ  yajeta iti ādhikāra saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt sarvatra kṛti praṇālikayā bhāva artha viṣaya eva vidhiḥ iti ekāntaḥ tathā ca ana hanyāt ana pibet ityādiṣu yadi kāryam abhyupeyeta tatas tad vyāpikā kṛtiḥ abhyupetavyā tad vyāpakaḥ ca bhāva arthaḥ  viṣayaḥ evam ca prajāpati vrata nyāyena paryudāsa vṛtti āhananā pāna saṃkalpa lakṣaṇayā tad viṣayaḥ  vidhiḥ syāt  tathā ca prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ  datta jala añjaliḥ prasajyeta na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā anekṣeta udyantam iti ādau tu atasya vratam iti adhikārāt prasajya pratiṣedha asaṃbhavena paryudāsa vṛttyā anīkṣaṇa saṃkalpa lakṣaṇā yuktā tasmāt  ana hanyāt ana pibet ityādiṣu prasajya pratiṣedheṣu bhāva artha abhāvāt tad vyāptāyāḥ kṛteḥ abhāvaḥ tad abhāve ca tad vyāptasya kāryasya abhāva iti na kārya paratva niyamaḥ sarvatra vākye iti āha brahmaṇaḥ  na hantavya iti evamādyā iti nanu kasmāt nivṛttiḥ eva kāryam na bhavati tad sādhanam vetyata āha na ca sā kriyā iti kriyā śabdaḥ kārya vacanaḥ etad eva vibhajate akriyā arthānām iti syāt etad  vidhi vibhakti śravaṇāt kāryam tāvat atra pratīyate tad ca na bhāva artham antareṇa na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hanana pāna ādau  akasmāt audāsīnyam upapadyate vinā vidhāraka prayatnam tasmāt sa eva pravṛtti unmukhānām manaḥ vāc dehānām vidhārakaḥ prayatnaḥ  niṣedha vidhi gocaraḥ kriyā iti na akriyā param asti vākyam kiñcid api iti āha na ca hanana kriyā nivṛtti audāsīni avyatirekeṇa nañaḥ śakyam aprāpta kriyā artha tvam kalpayitum kena hetunā na śakyam iti ata āha svabhāva prāpta hanti artha anurāgeṇa nañaḥ ayam arthaḥ hanana pāna paraḥ  hi vidhi pratyayaḥ pratīyamānaḥ te eva vidhatte iti utsargaḥ na ca ete śakye vidhātum rāgataḥ prāpta tvāt  na ca atra nañaḥ prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ  vidheyaḥ tasya api audāsīnya rūpasya siddha tayā prāpta tvāt  na ca vidhārakaḥ prayatnaḥ tasya aśruta tvena lakṣyamāṇa tvāt  sati saṃbhave ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ  anyāyya tvāt  vidhi vibhakteḥ ca rāgataḥ prāpta pravṛtti anuvādaka tvena vidhi viṣayatva ayogāt tasmāt yad pibet dhanyā t vā itya nūdya tad na iti niṣidhyate tad abhāvaḥ  jñāpyate na tu nañarthaḥ  vidhīyate abhāvaḥ ca sva virodhi bhāva nirūpaṇa tayā bhāva  chāyā anupāti iti siddhe siddhavat  sādhye ca sādhyavat bhāsata iti sādhya viṣayaḥ  nañarthaḥ sādhyavat bhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ tad idam āha nañaḥ ca eṣa svabhāva iti nanu bodhayatu sva saṃbandhinaḥ  abhāvam nañ pravṛtti unmukhānām tu manaḥ vāc dehānām kutaḥ akasmāt nivṛttiḥ iti ata āha abhāva buddhiḥ ca audāsīnya paripālana kāraṇam ayam abhiprāyaḥ ajvaritaḥ pathyam aśnīyāt ana sarpāya aṅgulim dadyāt ityādi vacana śravaṇa samanantaram prayojya vṛddhasya pathya aśane pravṛttim bhujaṅga aṅguli dāna unmukhasya ca tatas  nivṛttim upalabhya bālaḥ  vyutpitsuḥ prayojya vṛddhasya pravṛtti nivṛtti hetū icchā dveṣau  anumimīte tathā hi icchā dveṣa hetuke vṛddhasya pravṛtti nivṛttī svatantra pravṛtti nivṛtti tvāt madīya svatantra pravṛtti nivṛttivat  kartavyatā eka artha samaveta iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhana bhāva avagama pūrvakau ca asya icchā dveṣau pravṛtti nivṛtti hetu bhūta icchā dveṣa tvāt mad pravṛtti hetu bhūta icchā dveṣavat  na jātu mama śabda tad vyāpāra puruṣa āśaya traikālyān avicchanna bhāvanā pūrva pratyaya pūrvauvicchā dveṣau  abhūtām api tu bhūyaḥ bhūyas  sva gatam ālocayata ukta kāraṇa pūrvau  eva pratyavabhāsete tasmāt vṛddhasya svatantra pravṛtti nivṛttī icchā dveṣa bhedau ca kartavyatā eka artha samaveta iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhana bhāva avagama pūrvau  iti ānupūrvyā siddhaḥ kārya kāraṇa abhāva iti iṣṭa aniṣṭa sādhana tā avagamāt prayojya vṛddha pravṛtti nivṛttī iti siddham sa ca avagamaḥ prāc abhūtaḥ śabda śravaṇa anantaram upajāyamānaḥ śabda śravaṇa hetuka iti pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu ayajeta ityādiṣu śabda eva kartavyam iṣṭa sādhanam vyāpāram avagamayan  tasya iṣṭa sā adhana tām kartavyatām ca avagamayati ananya labhya tvāt ubhayoḥ ananti alabhyasya ca śabda artha tvāt yatra tu kartavyatānyata eva labhyate yathā ahanyāt ana pibet ityādiṣu hanana pāna pravṛttyaḥ  rāgataḥ pratilambhāt  tatra tad anuvādena nañsamabhivyāhṛtā liṅā ādi vibhaktiḥ anyatas  aprāptam anayoḥ anartha hetu bhāva mātram avagamayati pratyakṣam hi tayoḥ iṣṭa sādhana bhāvaḥ  avagamyate anyathā rāga viṣayatva ayogāt tasmāt rāga ādi prāpta kartavyatā anuvādena anartha sādhana tā prajñāpana param ana hanyāt ana pibet ityādi vākyam na tu kartavyatā param iti suṣṭhu uktam akārya niṣṭha tvam niṣedhānām niṣedhyānām ca anartha sādhana tā buddhiḥ eva niṣedhya abhāva buddhiḥ tayā khalu ayam cetana āpātataḥ ramaṇīya tām paśyan  api āyatim ālocya pravṛtti abhāvam nivṛttim avabudhya nivartate audāsīnyam ātmanaḥ  avasthāpayati iti yāvat  syāt etad  abhāva buddhiḥ ced audāsīnya sthāpana akāraṇam yāvat audāsīnyam anuvarteta na ca anuvartate na hi udāsīnaḥ  api viṣaya antara vyāsakta cittaḥ tad abhāva buddhimān na ca avasthāpaka kāraṇa abhāve kārya avasthānam dṛṣṭam na hi stambha avapāte prāsādaḥ  avatiṣṭhate ata āha sā ca dagdha indhana agnivat su ayam eva upaśāmyati tāvat eva khalu ayam pravṛtti unmukhaḥ  na yāvat asya anartha hetu bhāvam adhigacchati anartha hetutva adhigamaḥ  asya sa mūla uddhāram pravṛttim uddhṛtya dagdha indhana agnivat su ayam eva upaśāmyati etad uktam bhavati yathā prāsāda avasthāna kāraṇam stambhaḥ  na evamaudāsīnya avasthāna kāraṇam abhāva buddhiḥ api tu āgantukāt vināśa hetoḥ trāṇena avasthāna kāraṇam yathā kamaṭha pṛṣṭha niṣṭhuraḥ kavacaḥ śāstra prahāra trāṇena rājan yajīva avasthāna hetuḥ na ca kavaca apagame ca asati ca śastra prahāre rājanyajīva nāśa iti upasaṃharati tasmāt prasakta kriyā nivṛtti audāsīnyam eva iti audāsīnyam ajānataḥ  api asti iti prasakta kriyā nivṛttya upalakṣya viśinaṣṭi tad kimakriyā artha tvena anarthakyam āśaṅkya kriyā arthatva upavarṇanam jaiminīyam asamañjasam eva iti upasaṃhāra vyājena pariharati tasmāt puruṣa artha iti puruṣa artha anupayogi upākhyāna ādi viṣayau  akriyā artha tayā kriyā artha tayā ca pūrva uttara pakṣau na tu upaniṣad viṣayau upaniṣadām svayam puruṣa artha rūpa brahma avagatam aparyanasānāt iti arthaḥ yad api aupaniṣada ātma jñānam apuruṣa artham manyamānena uktam kartavya vidhi anupraveśam antareṇa iti atra nigūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ pūrva uktam parihāram smārayati tad parihṛtam iti atra ākṣeptā sva uktam artham smārayati nanu śruta brahmaṇaḥ  api iti nigūḍham abhisaṃdhim samādhāta udghāṭayati atra ucyate na avagata brahma ātma bhāvasya iti satyam na brahma jñāna mātram sāṃsārika dharma nivṛtti kāraṇam api tu sākṣātkāra paryantam brahma sākṣātkāraḥ ca antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti bhedaḥ śravaṇa manana ādi janita saṃskāra saciva manaḥ janmā ṣaḍja ādi bheda sākṣātkāra iva gāndharva śāstra śravaṇa abhyāsa saṃskṛta manaḥ yoniḥ sa ca nikhila prapañca mahā indra jāla sākṣātkāram sa mūlam unmūlayan  ātmānam api prapañcatva aviśeṣāt unmūlayati iti upapāditam adhastāt tasmāt rajju svarūpa kathana tulya taiva atra iti siddham atra ca veda pramāṇa mūla tayā veda pramāṇa janita iti uktam atra eva sukha duḥkha anutpāda bhedena nidarśana dvayam āha na hi dhanina iti śrutim atra udāharati tad uktam iti codayati śarīre patite iti pariharati na sa śarīra tvasya iti yadi vāstavam sa śarīra tvam bhavet  na jīvataḥ tad nivarteta mithyājñāna nimittam tu tad  tad ca utpanna tattva jñānena jīvatā api śakyam nivartayitum yad punar aśarīra tvam tad asya svabhāva iti na śakyam nivartayitum svabhāva hānena bhāva vināśa prasaṅgāt iti āha nityam aśarīra tvam iti syāt etad  na mithyājñāna nimittam sa śarīra tvam api tu dharma adharma nimittam tad ca sva kāraṇa dharma adharma nivṛttim antareṇa na nivartate tad nivṛttau ca prāyaṇam eva iti na jīvataḥ  aśarīra tvam iti śaṅkate tad kṛta iti tad  iti ātmānam parāmṛśati nirākaroti na śarīra saṃbandhasya iti na tāvat ātmā sākṣāt dharma adharmau kartum arhati vāc buddhi śarīra ārambha janitau hi tau na asati śarīra saṃbandhe bhavataḥ tābhyām tu śarīra saṃbandham rocayamānaḥ  vyaktam paraspara āśraya tvam doṣam āvahati tad idam āha śarīra saṃbandhasya iti yadi ucyeta satyam asti paraspara āśraya tvam na tu eṣa doṣaḥ anādi tvāt  bīja aṅkuravat  iti ata āha andha parampara eṣānāditva kalpanā yad tu manyate na iyam andha paramparā tulyā anāditā na hi yatas  dharma adharma bhedāt ya ātma śarīra saṃbandha bhedaḥ tata eva śarīra saṃbandhāt  sa dharma adharma bhedaḥ kim tu eṣa pūrvasmāt ātma śarīra saṃbandhāt pūrva dharma adharma bheda janmanaḥ eva tu ātma śarīra saṃbandhaḥ  anyasmāt dharma adharma bhedāt  iti tam pratyāha kriyā samavāya abhāvāt iti śaṅkate saṃnidhāna mātreṇa iti pariharati na iti upārjanam svīkaraṇam na tu iyam vidha ātmani iti āha na tu ātmana iti ye tu deha ādau  ātma abhimānaḥ  na mithyā api tu gauṇaḥ māṇavaka ādau  iva siṃha abhimāna iti manyante tad matam upanyasya dūṣayati atra āhuḥ iti prasiddhaḥ  vastu bhedaḥ  yasya puruṣasya sa tathā uktaḥ upapāditam ca etad asmābhiḥ adhyāsabhāṣya iti na iha upapādyate yathā manda andhakāre sthāṇuḥ ayam iti agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣe vastuni puruṣāt  sāṃśayikau puruṣa śabda pratyayau sthāṇu viṣayau tatra hi puruṣa tvam aniyatam api samāropitam eva evam saṃśaye samāropitam aniścitam udāhṛtya viparyaya jñāne niścitam udāharati yathā vā śuktikāyām iti śukla bhāsvarasya dravyasya puras sthitasya sati śuktikā rajata sādhāraṇye yāvat atra rajata viniścayaḥ  bhavati tāvat kasmāt śukti viniścaya eva na bhavati ḷ saṃśayaḥ  vā dvedhā yuktaḥ samāna dharma dharmiṇaḥ  darśanāt  upalabghi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa dvaya smṛteḥ ca saṃskāra unmeṣa hetoḥ sādṛśyasya dviṣṭha tvena ubhayatra tulyam etad iti ata uktam akasmāt  iti anena dṛṣṭasya hetoḥ samāna tve api adṛṣṭam hetuḥ uktam tad ca kārya darśana unneya tvena asādhāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ ātmānātma vivekinām iti śravaṇa manana kuśa la tā mātreṇa paṇḍitānām anutpanna tattva sākṣātkārāṇām iti yāvat  tad uktam paśu ādibhiḥ ca aviśeṣāt iti śeṣam ati rohita artham jīvataḥ  viduṣaḥ  aśarīra tve ca śruti smṛtī udāharati tathā ca iti su bodham prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt na avagata brahma ātma bhāvasya iti nanu uktam yadi jīvasya brahma ātmatvā avagatiḥ eva sāṃsārika dharma nivṛtti hetuḥ hanta manana ādi vidhāna ānarthakyam tasmāt pratipatti vidhi parā vedāntā iti tad anubhāṣya dūṣayati yad punaruktam śravaṇāt parācīnayoḥ iti manana nididhi āsanayoḥ api na vidhiḥ tayoḥ anvaya vyatireka siddha sākṣātkāra phalayoḥ vidhi sarūpaiḥ vacanaiḥ anuvādāt  tad idam uktam avagati artha tvāt  iti brahma sākṣāt kāraḥ  avagatiḥ tad artha tvam manana nididhi āsanayoḥ anvaya vyatireka siddham iti arthaḥ atha kasmāt manana ādi vidhiḥ eva na bhavati iti ata āha yadi hi avagatam iti na tāvat manana nididhi āsane pradhāna karmaṇī apūrva viṣaye amṛtatva phale iti uktam adhastāt atas  guṇa karma tvam anayoḥ ava ghāta prokṣaṇa ādivat pariśiṣyate tad api ayuktam anyatra upayukta upayokṣyamāṇatva abhāvāt ātmanaḥ viśeṣataḥ tu aupaniṣadasya karma anuṣṭhāna virodhāt  iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt  iti evam ca siddha rūpa brahma paratve upaniṣadām brahmaṇaḥ śāstra arthasya dharmāt anya tvāt  bhinna viṣaya tvena śāstra bhedāt  aatha atas  brahmajijñāsā iti asya śāstra ārambha tvam upapadyata iti āha evam ca sati iti itarathā tu dharma jijñāsā eva iti na śāstra antaram iti na śāstra antara ārambha tvam syāt iti āha pratipatti vidhi paratva iti na kevalam siddha rūpa tvāt brahma ātmā aikyasya dharmāt anya tvam api tu tad virodhāt api iti upasaṃhāra vyājena āha tasmāt aham brahmā asmi iti iti karaṇena jñānam parāmṛśati vidhayaḥ  hi dharme pramāṇam te ca sādhya sādhana itikartavya tā bheda adhiṣṭhānā dharma utpādinaḥ ca tad adhiṣṭhānā na brahma ātma aikye sati prabhavanti virodhāt  iti arthaḥ na kevalam dharma pramāṇasya śāstrasya iyam gatiḥ api tu sarveṣām pramāṇānām iti āha sarvāṇi ca itarāṇi pramāṇāni iti kutas  ḷ na hi iti advaite hi viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ  na asti na ca kartṛ tvam kārya abhāvāt na ca kāraṇa tvam ata eva tad idam uktam apramātṛkāṇi ca iti cakāreṇa atra eva brahma vidām gāthā udāharati api ca āhuḥ iti putra dāra ādiṣu ātma abhimānaḥ  gauṇaḥ yathā sva duḥkhena duḥkhī yathā sva sukhena sukhī tathā putra ādi gatena api iti saḥ  ayam gauṇaḥ na tu ekatva abhimānaḥ bhedasya anubhava siddha tvāt tasmāt  agauḥ vāhīkaḥ itivat gauṇaḥ deha indriya ādiṣu tu abheda anubhavān na gauṇa ātma abhimānaḥ kim tu śuktau rajata jñānavat mithyā tad evam dvividhaḥ  ayam ātma abhimānaḥ  lokayātrām vahati tad asattve tu na lokayātrā na api brahma ātmā ekatva anubhavaḥ tad upāyasya śravaṇa mananādeḥ abhāvāt  tad idam āha putra deha ādi bādhanāt gauṇa ātmanaḥ  asattve putra kalatra ādi bādhanam mamakāra abhāva iti yāvat  mithyā ātmanaḥ  asattve deha indriya ādi bādhanam śravaṇa ādi bādhanam ca tatas ca na kevalam lokayātrā samucchedaḥ sat brahmā aham iti evam bodhi bodha śīlam yad  kāryam advaita sākṣātkāra iti yāvat  tad api katham bhavet  ḷ kutas tad asaṃbhava iti ata āha anveṣṭa vyātma vijñānāt prāk pramātṛ tvam ātmanaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etad  pramā prameya pramāṇa vibhāga iti api draṣṭavyam etad uktam bhavati eṣa hi vibhāgaḥ  advaita sākṣātkāra kāraṇam tatas  niyamena prāgbhāvāt  tena tad abhāve kāryam na utpadyata iti na ca pramātuḥ ātmanaḥ  anveṣṭavya ātmā anya iti āha anviṣṭaḥ syāt pramātā eva pāpma doṣa ādi varjitaḥ uktam hi grīvā stha graiveyaka nidarśanam syāt etad  apramāṇāt katham pāramārthikā dvaita anubhava utpattiḥ iti ata āha deha ātma pratyayaḥ yadvat pramāṇa tvena kalpitaḥ laukikam tadvat eva idam pramāṇam tu asya avadhim āha ā ātma niścayāt  ā brahma svarūpa sākṣātkārāt iti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati pāramārthika prapañca vādibhiḥ api deha āt iṣu ātma abhimānaḥ  mithyā iti vaktavyam pramāṇa bādhita tvāt  tasya ca samasta pramāṇa kāraṇa tvam bhāvika lokayātrā vāhi tvam ca abhyupeyam sā iyam asmākam api advaita sākṣātkāre vidhā bhaviṣyati na ca ayam advaita sākṣāt kāraḥ  api antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti bheda ekāntatas parama arthaḥ yaḥ tu sākṣātkāraḥ  bhāvikaḥ na asau kāryaḥ tasya brahma svarūpa tvāt avidyā tu yadi avidyām ucchindyāt janayet vā na tatra kācid anupapattiḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ vidyām ca avidyām ca yaḥ tad veda ubhayam saha avidyayā mṛtyum tīrtvā vidyayā amṛtam aśnute iti tasmāt sarvam avadātam iti catur sūtrī samāptā evam akārya anvayam vinā siddha rūpe brahmaṇi mānatā puruṣa arthe svayam tāvat vedāntānām prasādhitā brahma jijñāsām pratijñāya ajanmādyasya yatas ityādinā atat tu samanvayāt iti antena sūtra saṃdarbheṇa sarva śaktau jagat utpatti sthiti vināśa kāraṇe prāmāṇyam vedāntānām upapāditam tad ca brahmaṇi iti paramārthataḥ tvadya api brahmaṇi eva iti vyutpāditam tad tra saṃdihyate tad jagat upādāna kāraṇam kim cetana muta acetanam iti atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādīnām viśeṣa anupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ tatra ca pradhānam acetanam jagat upādāna kāraṇam anumāna siddham anuvadanti upaniṣada iti sāṃkhyāḥ jīva aṇu vyatirikta cetaneśvara nimitta adhiṣṭhitāḥ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ  jagat upādāna kāraṇam anumitam anuvadanti iti kāṇādāḥ ādi grahaṇena abhāva upādānatva ādi grahītavyam anirvacanīyānādi vidyā śaktim añcetana upādānam jagadāgamikam iti brahma vidaḥ etāsām ca vipratipattīnām anumāna vākya anumāna vākya tad ābhāsā bījam tad evam vipratipatteḥ saṃśaye kim tāvat prāptam tatra jñāna kriyā śakti abhāvat brahmaṇaḥ  apariṇāminaḥ na sarva śakti vijñāne pradhāne tu asti saṃbhavaḥ jñāna kriyā śaktī khalu jñāna kriyā kārya darśana unneya sadbhāve na ca jñāna kriye cit ātmani staḥ tasya apariṇāmi tvāt eka tvāt ca triguṇe tu pradhāne pariṇāmini saṃbhavataḥ yadi api ca sāmya avasthāyām pradhāne samudācarat vṛttinī kriyā jñāne na staḥ tathā api avyaktena śakti ātmanā rūpeṇa saṃbhavata eva tathā ca pradhānam eva sarvajñam ca sarva śakti ca na tu brahma sva rūpa caitanyam tu asya āvṛttitam anupayogi jīvātmanām iva asmākam na ca sva rūpa caitanye kartṛ tvam akārya tvāt tasya kāryatve vā na sarvadā sarvajña tā bhoga aparga lakṣaṇa puruṣa artha dvaya prayuktān ādi pradhāna puruṣa saṃyoga nimittaḥ tu mahat ahaṅkāra ādi krameṇa acetanasya api cetanā anadhiṣṭhitasya pradhānasya pariṇāmaḥ sargaḥ dṛṣṭam ca acetanam cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam puruṣa arthe pravartamānam yathā vatsa vivṛddhi artham acetanam kṣīram pravartate atadaikṣata bahu syām prajāyeya ityādyāḥ ca śrutayaḥ acetane api cetanavat upacārāt sva kārya unmukham ādarśayanti yathā kūlam pipatiṣati iti ayat prāye śrūyate yad ca tad tādṛś avagamyate bhākta prāye śrutam idam atas  bhīktam pratīyate api ca āhuḥ vṛddhāḥ yathā agrya prāye likhitam dṛṣṭvā vadanti bhavet ayam agryaḥ iti tathā it api atā āpa aikṣanta tad teja aikṣata ityādi upacāra prāye kṣutam tadā aikṣata iti aupacārikam eva vijñeyam anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīva ātma tvam jīva artha kāritayā āha yathā hi bhadrasenaḥ  rāja artha kārī rājñā bhadrasenaḥ  mama ātmā iti upacaryate evam tad tvam asi ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ bhāktāḥ saṃpatti arthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ svam apītaḥ  bhavati iti ca niruktam jīvasya pradhāne svakīye api ayam suṣupta avasthāyām brūte pradhāna aṃśa tamaḥ samudrake hi jīvaḥ nidrāṇaḥ tamasi iva magnaḥ  bhavati yathā āhuḥ abhāva pratyaya ālambanā vṛttiḥ nidrā iti vṛttīnām anyāsām pramāṇa ādīnām abhāvaḥ tasya pratyaya kāraṇam tamaḥ tad ālambamā nidrā jīvasya vṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ tathā sarvajñam prastutya śvetāśvatara mantrraḥ  api sakārāṇām karaṇa adhipa adhipa iti prādhāna abhiprāyaḥ pradhānasya eva sarvajña tvam pratipāditam adastāt  tasmāt acetanam pradhānam jagat upādānam anuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ evam kāṇāt ādi mate api kathañcid yojananīyāḥ śrutayaḥ akṣara arthaḥ tu pradhāna kāraṇa pakṣe api iti pradhānasya api iti apikārau  eva kāra arthau syāt etad  sattva saṃpattyā ced asya sarvajña tā atha tamaḥ saṃpatti ā sarvajña tā eva asya kasmāt na bhavati iti āha tena ca sattva dharmeṇa jñānena iti sattvam hi prakāśa śīlam niratiśaya utkarṣam sarvajña tā bījam tathā āhuḥ niratiśayam sarvajña tā bījam iti yad khalu sa atiśayam tad kvacid niratiśayam dṛṣṭam yathā kuvala āmalaka bilveṣu sa atiśayam mahat tvam vyomni parama mahati niratiśayam evam jñānam api ekat vi bahu viṣaya tayā sa atiśayam iti anena api kvacid niratiśayena bhavitavyam idam eva ca asya niratiśaya tvam yad vidita samasta veditavyam tad idam sarvajña tvam sattvasya niratiśaya utkarṣa tve saṃbhavati etad uktam bhavati yadi api rajaḥ tamasī api staḥ tathā api puruṣa ārta prayukta guṇa vaiṣamya atiśayāt sattvasya niratiśaya utkarṣe sārvajñyam kāryam utpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyām api tanmātram vivakṣitvā avivakṣitvā ca tamaḥ kāryam pradhānam sarvajñam upacaryata iti apibhyām avadhāraṇasya vyavacchedyam āha na kevalasya iti na hi kiñcid ekam kāryam janayet api tu bahūni cit ātmā ca ekaḥ pradhānam tu triguṇam iti tatas  eva kāryam utpattim arhati na cit ītmana iti arthaḥ tava api ca yogyatā mātreṇa eva cit ātmanaḥ rvajña tā abhyupagamaḥ  na kārya yogāt iti āha tvayā api iti na kevalasya akārya kāraṇasya iti etad siha avalokena prapañcayati prāk utpatteḥ iti api ca pradhānasya iti caḥ tu arthaḥ evam prāpta ucyate īkṣateḥ na aśabdam nāma rūpa prapañca lakṣaṇa kārya darśanāt etad kāraṇa mātravat iti sāmānya kalpa māyām iti pramāṇam na tu tad acetanam cetanam iti vā viśeṣa kalpanāyām asti anumānam iti upariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyate tasmāt nāma rūpa prapañca kāraṇa bheda pramāyām āmnāya eva bhagavān upāsanīyaḥ tad evam āmnāya eka samadhigamanīye jagat kāraṇam apaurvā parya parāmarśāt yad āmnāyaḥ  añjasā vadet  jagat bījam tad eva iṣṭam cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ teṣu teṣu khalu āmnāya pradeśeṣu tadā aikṣata iti evan jātīyakaiḥ vākyaiḥ īkṣituḥ kāraṇat jagajjanma ākhyāyata iti na ca pradhāna paramāṇu ādeḥ acetanasya īkṣitṛtvamān jasam sattva aṃśena īkṣitṛ pradhānam tasya prakāśaka tvāt iti ced na tasya jāḍyena tattva anupapatteḥ kaḥ tarhi rajataḥ tamobhyām sattvasya viśeṣaḥ svaccha tāṣa svaccham hi sattvam asvacche ca rajaḥ tamasī svacchasya ca caitanya bimba udgrahitayā prakāśakatva vyapadeśe na itarayoḥ asvacchatayā tad grāhikatva abāvāt pārthiva tve tulya iva maṇeḥ bimba udgrāhitā na loṣṭa ādīnām brahmaṇaḥ tu īkṣitṛ tvamān jasam tasya āmnā āyataḥ  nitya jñāna svabhāvatva viniścāt  nanvata eva asya na īkṣitṛ tvam nityasya jñāna svabhāva bhūtasya īkṣaṇasya akriyā tvena brahmaṇaḥ tad prati nimitta bhāva abhāvāt akriyā nimittasya ca kārakatva nivṛttau tad vyāptasya tad viśeṣasya kartṛ tvasya nivṛtteḥ satyam brahma svabhāvaḥ caitanyam nitya tayā na kriyā tasya tu anavat chinnasya tad tad viṣaya upadhāna medā avacchedena kalpita bhedasya anitya tvam kīrya tvam ca upapadyate tathā ca evaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarva viṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantrya lakṣaṇam kartṛ tvam upapannam yadi api ca kūṭastha nityasya apariṇāmina audāsīn yam asya vāstavam tathā api anādya nirvacanīya vidyā vacchinnasya vyāpāravattva bhava bhāsata iti kartṛtva upapattiḥ paraiḥ api ca cicchekte kūṭastha nityāyāḥ  vṛttīḥ prati kartṛ tvam īdṛśam eva abhyupeyam caitanya sāmānya adhikaraṇyena jñātṛtva upalabdheḥ na hi prādhānikāni antar bahis karaṇāni trayodaśa sattva guṇa pradhānāni api svayam eva acetanāni tad vṛttayā svam vā param vā veditum utsahante naḥ khalu andhāḥ sahasram api pānthāḥ panthānam vidanti cakṣuṣmatā ca ekena ced vedyate sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā netā teṣām evam buddhi sattvasya svayam acetanasya citi bimba saṃkrāntyā ced āpannam caitanyasya jñātṛ tvam citiḥ eva jñātrī svatantrā na antar bahiṣkaraṇāni andha sahasra pratimā anya sva santrāṇi na ca asyaḥ citeḥ asti vyāpāra yogaḥ na ca tad ayoge api ajñātṛ tvam vyāpāravatām api jaḍānām ajña tvāt tasmāt antaḥkaraṇa vartinam vyāpāram āropya citi śaktau kartṛtva abhimānaḥ antaḥkaraṇe vā caitanyam āropya tasya jñātṛtva abhimānaḥ sarvathā bhavat mateṣaṣ api na idam svābhāvikam kvacid api jñātṛ tvam api tu sāṃvyavahārārikam eva iti parama arthaḥ nityasya ātmanaḥ  jñānam pariṇāma iti ca bheda abheda pakṣam apākurvadbhiḥ apāḥ tam kūṭasthasya nityasya ātmanaḥ  avyāpāravata eva bhinnam jñānam dharma iti ca upariṣṭāt apākariṣyate tasmāt vastutaḥ anavacchinnam caitanyam tattva anyatva abhyām anirvacanīya avyākṛta vyāci kīrṣita nāma rūpa viṣaya avacchinnam sat jñānam kāryam tasya kartā īśvaraḥ  jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarva śaktiḥ iti siddham tathā ca śrutiḥ tapasā cīyate brahma tatas  annam abhijāyate annāt prāṇaḥ  manaḥ satyam lokāḥ karmasu ca amṛtam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vidyasya jñāna mayam tapaḥ tasmāt etad brahma nāma rūpam annam ca jāyate iti tapasā jñānena avyākṛta nāma rūpa viṣayeṇa cīyate tad vyācikīrṣavat bhavati yathā kuvinda ādiḥ avyākṛtam paṭa ādi buddhau  ālikhya cikīrṣati eka dharmavān dvitīya dharma upajananena upacita ucyate vyācikīrṣāyām ca upacaye sati tatas  nāma rūpam anna madanīyam sādhāraṇam saṃsāriṇām vyācikīrṣitam abhijāyate tasmāt avyākṛtāt vyācikīrṣitāt annāt prāṇaḥ  hiraṇyagarbhaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ  jñāna kriyā śakti adhiṣṭhānam jagat sūtra ātmā sādhāraṇe jāyate yathāvyākṛtāt  vyacikīrṣitāt paṭāt avāntara kāryam dvi tantuka ādi tasmāt ca prāṇān mana ākhyam saṃkalpa vikalpa ādi vyākaraṇa ātmakam jāyate tatas  vyākaraṇa ātmakān manasaḥ satya śabda vācyāni ākāśa ādīni jāyante tebhyaḥ ca satya ākhyebhyaḥ  anukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūḥ ādayaḥ teṣu manuṣṭa ādi prāṇinaḥ varṇa āśrama krameṇa karmāṇi dharma adharma rūpāṇi jāyante karmasu ca amṛtam phalam svarga naraka ādi tad ca sva ninittayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ satoḥ na vinaśyati iti amṛtam yāvat dharma adharma bhāvi iti yāvat  yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sāmānyatas  sarva vid viśeṣataḥ yasya bhagavataḥ  jñāna mayam tapaḥ  dharmaḥ  na āyāsa mayam tasmāt brahma maḥ pūrvasmāt etad param kāryam brahma kiñca nāma rūpam annam ca vrīhi yava ādi jāyata iti tasmāt pradhānasya sāmya avasthā āyām anīkṣitṛ tvāt  kṣetrajñānām ca sati api caitanye sarga ādau viṣayāni īkṣaṇāt  mukhya saṃbhave ca upacārasya anyāyya tvāt  mumukṣoḥ ca ayatha artha upadeśa anupapatteḥ mukti virodhi tvāt  tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām ca mukhya asaṃbhavena upacāra āśrayaṇasya yukti siddha tvāt  saṃśaye ca tad prāya pāṭhasya niścāyaka tvāt  iha tu mukhyasya autsargika tvena niścaye sati saṃśaya abhāvāt  anyathā kirāta śata saṃkīrṇa deśa nivāsinaḥ  brāhmaṇāyanasya api kirātatva āpatteḥ brahma eva īkṣitra nādya nirvācya avidyā sacivam jagat upādānam śuktiḥ iva samāropitasya rajatasya marīcaya iva jalasya evaḥ cadramā iva dvatīyasya cadramasaḥ na tu acetanam pradhāna paramāṇatva ādi aśabdam hi tad  na ca pradhānam paramāṇavaḥ  vā tad atirikta sarva jñeśvara adhiṣṭhitā jagat upādānam iti sāṃpratam kāryatvāt  kāraṇāt kāryāṇām bheda abhāvāt kāraṇa jñānena samasta kārya parijñānasya mṛdādi nidarśanena āgamena prasādhi tvāt  bhede ca tad anupapatteḥ sākṣāt ca aekam eva advitīyam aneha nānā asti kiñcana mṛtyoḥ mṛtyum āpnoti ityādibhiḥ brahma atiriktasya prapañcasya pratiṣedha acetana upādānam eva jagat  bhujaṅga iva āropiti gajjūpādāna iti siddhāntaḥ sat upādāna tve hi siddhe jagataḥ tad upādānam cetanam acetanam vā iti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta adya api tu sat upādāna tvam asiddham iti ata āha tatra idaṃśabda vācyam ityādi darśayati iti antena tathā api īkṣitā pāramārthika pradhāna kṣetrajñātirikta īśvaraḥ  bhaviṣyati yathā āhuḥ hairaṇyagarbhā iti atas  śrutiḥ patitā aekam eva advitīyaṃ iti bahu syām iti ca acetanam kāraṇam ātmana eva bahu bhāvam āha tena api kāraṇat cetanā bhinnam kāryam abhyupagamyate yadi api ākāśa ādyā bhūta sṛṣṭiḥ tathā api tejaḥ  abannānām eva trivṛt karaṇasya vivakṣita tvāt tatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāt tejaḥ prathamam uktam ekam advitīyam jagat upādānam iti atra śruti antaram api paṭhati tathā anyatra iti brahma catuṣpād aṣṭāśapham ṣoḍaśa kalaśam tad yathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīci iti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ tad ardham śaphaḥ tathā pṛthivī antarīkṣam dyauḥ samudra iti aparaḥ catasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ  anantavān nāma tathā agniḥ sūryacadramā vidyut iti catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmān nāma tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ prāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotram vāc iti catasraḥ kālāḥ sa caturtham āyatanavān nāma brahmaṇaḥ pādaḥ tad evam ṣoḍaśa kalam ṣoḍaśa avayavam brahma upāsyam iti siddham syāt etad  īkṣateḥ iti tipā dhātu svarūpam ucyate na ca avivakṣita arthasya dhātu svarūpasya cetana upādāna sādhanatva saṃbhava iti ata āha īkṣateḥ iti dhātu artha nirdeśaḥ  abhimataḥ viṣayiṇam niṣaya lakṣaṇāt  prasiddhā ca iyam lakṣaṇa iti āha yajataritivat iti ayaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti sāmānyatas  sarva vid  iti viśeṣataḥ sāṃkhyīyam sva mata samādhānam upanyasya dūṣayati yad tu uktam sattva dharmeṇa iti punar  sāṃkhyam utthāpayati nanu uktam iti pariharati tad api iti sāmudācarat vṛtti tāvat na bhavati sattvam guṇa vaiṣamyam sāmya anupapatteḥ na ca avyaktena rūpeṇa jñānam apapayujyate rajataḥ tamasoḥ tad pratibandhasya api sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa sadbhāvāt iti arthaḥ apica caitanya pradhāna vṛtti vacanaḥ  jānātiḥ na ca acetane vṛtti mātre dṛṣṭa cara prayoga iti āha apica na asākṣikā iti katham tarhi yoginām sattva āśā utkarṣa hetukam sarvajña tvam iti ata āha yoginām tu iti sattva aṃśa utkarṣaḥ  hi yoginām cetanya cakṣuṣmatām upakaroti na andhasya pradhānasya iti arthaḥ yadi tu kāpila matam apahāya hairaṇyagarbham āsthīyeta tatra api āha atha punar  sākṣi nimittam iti teṣām api hi prakṛṣṭa sattva upādānam puruṣa viśeṣasya eva kleśa karma vipāka āśaya aparābhṛṣṭasya sarvajña tvam na tu pradhānasya acetanasya tad api ca advaita śrutibhiḥ apāstam iti bhāvaḥ pūrva pakṣa bījam anubhāṣate yad punaruktam brahmaṇaḥ  api iti cetanyasya śuddhasya nitya tve api upahitam sat anityam kāryam ākāśam iva ghaṭa avacchinnam iti abhisaṃdhāya pariharati idam tāvat bhavān iti pratata auṣṇya prakāśe savitari iti etad api viṣaya avacchinna prakāśaḥ kāryam iti etad abhaiprāyam vaiṣamyam codayati nanu savituḥ iti kim vāstavam karma abhāvam abhipretya vaiṣamyam āha bhavān uta tad vivakṣā bhāvam tatra yadi tad vivakṣā bhāvam tadā prakāśayati iti anena mā bhūt sāmyam prakāśata iti anena tu asti na hi atra karma vivakṣā etam atha ca prakāśa svabhāva pratyāsta svātantryam savituḥ iti pariharati na asatī api karmaṇi iti asati apīti avivakṣite api iti arthaḥ atha vāstavam karma abhāvam abhisaṃdhāya vaiṣamyam ucyeta tad na asiddha tvāt karma abhāvasya vivikṣita tvāt ca atra karmaṇa iti pariharati karma apekṣāyām tu iti yāsām sati karmaṇi avivakṣite śrutīnām upapattiḥ tāsām sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarām iti arthaḥ yad prasādāt iti yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt  tasya nitya siddhasya īśvarasya nityam jñānam bhavati iti kim u vaktavyam iti yojanā yathā duryoga śāstra kārāḥ atatas pratyak cetana adhigamaḥ  api antarāya abhāḥ ca iti tad bhāṣya kārāḥ ca bhakti viśeṣāt āvarjita īśvaraḥ tam anugṛhṇāti jñāna vairāgya ādinā iti savitṛ prakāśavat iti vastu tas  nityasya kāraṇa anapekṣām sva rūpeṇa uktvā vyatireka mukhena api āha api ca avidyā ādimata ityādi ādi grahaṇena kāma karma ādayaḥ saṃgṛhyante na jñāna pratibandha kāraṇa rahitasya iti saṃsāriṇām vastu tas  nitya jñāna tve api avidyāyāḥ pratibandha kāraṇāni santi na tu īśvarasya avidyā rahitasya jñāna pratibandha kāraṇa saṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ na tasya kāryam āvaraṇa ādi apagamaḥ  vidyate anāvṛtta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ jñāna balena kriyā pradhānasya tu acetanasya jñāna bala abhāvāt jagataḥ  na kriyā iti arthaḥ apāṇiḥ gṛhītā apādaḥ  vegavān viharaṇavān atirohita artham anyat  syāt etet  anātmani vyomni ghaṭa ādi upādhi kṛtaḥ  bhavatu avacchedaka vi bhramaḥ na tu ātmani svabhāva siddha prakāśe sa ghaṭata iti ata āha dṛśyate ca ātmana eva sata iti abhiniveśaḥ mithyā abhimānaḥ mithyā buddhi mātreṇa pūrveṇa iti anena anāditā darśitā mātra grahaṇena vicara sahatvena nirvacanīyatā nirastā pariśiṣṭam tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt iti śaṅkottara tvena vā svātantryeṇa vā pradhāna nirākaraṇa artham sūtram śaṅkā ca bhāṣye uktā syāt etad  brahmā eva jñīpsitam tad ca na prathamam sūkṣma tayā śakyam śvetaketum grāhayitum iti tad saṃbaddham pradhānam eva sthūlatayā ātma tvena grāhyate śvetaketuḥ arundhatīm iva atīva sūkṣmām darśayitum tad saṃnihitām sthūla tārakām darśayati iyam asau  arundhati iti asyām śaṅkāyām uttaram heyatva avacanāt ca iti sūtram cakāraḥ  anukta samuccaya arthaḥ tad ca anuktam bhāṣya uktam api ca jagat kāraṇam prakṛtya svapiti iti asya niruktam karvitī śrutiḥ cetanam eva jagat kāraṇam brūte yadi sva śabda ātma vacanaḥ tathā api cetanasya puruṣasya acetana pradhānatva anupapattiḥ atha ātmīya vacana sthathā api acetane puruṣa artha tayā ātmīye api cetanasya pralaya anupapattiḥ na hi mṛd ātmā ghaṭa ātmīye api pāthasi pralīyate api tu ātma bhūtāyām mṛdi eva na ca gajatamana ātma bhūte hastini pralīyate kintvā ātma bhūtāyām śuktau  eva iti āha sva apyayāt  gati sāmānyāt  gatiḥ avagatiḥ tārkika samaya iva iti yathā hi tārkikāṇām samaya bhedeṣu paraspara āhata artha tā na evam vedānteṣu paraspara parāhṛtiḥ api tu teṣu sarvatra jagat kāraṇa cetanyāvagatiḥ samāna iti cakṣuḥ ādīnām iva rūpa ādiṣu iti yathā hi sarveṣām cakṣū rūpam eva grāhayati na punā rasa ādikam kasyacid darśayati kasyacid rūpam evam rasana ādiṣu api gati sāmānyam darśanīyam śruta tvāt ca atadaikṣata iti atra īkṣaṇa mātram jagat kāraṇasya śrutam na tu sarva viṣayam jagat kāraṇa saṃbandhi tayā tu tad arthāt sarva viṣayam avagatam śveta aśvatarāṇām tu upaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaraḥ  jagatkāraṇam iti sākṣāt uktam iti viśeṣaḥ uttara sūtra saṃdarbham ākṣipati janma ādyasya yata iti ārabhya iti brahma jijñāsitavyam iti hi pratijñātam tad ca śāstra eka samadhigamyam śastram ca sarvajñe sarva śaktau jagat utpatti sthiti pralaya kāraṇam brahmaṇi eva pramāṇam na pradhāna ādau  iti nyāyataḥ  vyutpāditam na ca asti kaścid vedānta bhāgaḥ  yaḥ tad viparītam api bodhayet iti ca gati sāmānyāt  iti uktam tad kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artha antara sūtra saṃdarbhasya avatāraḥ syāt iti kim utthānam iti kim ākṣepe samādhatte ucyate dvi rūpam hi iti yadi api tatvataḥ  nirasta samasta upādhi rūpam brahma tathā api na tena rūpeṇa śakyam upadeṣṭum iti upahitena rūpeṇa upadeṣṭavyam iti tatra ca kvacid upādhiḥ vivakṣitaḥ tad upāsanāni kānicid  abhyudaya arthāni manaḥ mātra sādhana ta yā atra paṭhitāni kānicid krama mukti arthāni kānicid karma samṛddhi arthāni kvacid punaruktaḥ  api upādhipavi vakṣitaḥ yathā atra eva annamaya ādaya ānanda maya antāḥ pañca kośāḥ tad atra kasmin  upādhiḥ vivakṣitaḥ kasmin  iti na adya api vivecitam tathā gati sāmānyam api siddhavat uktam na tvadya api sādhitam iti tad artham uttara grantha saṃdarbha ārambha iti arthaḥ syāt etad  parasya ātmanaḥ tad tad upādhi bheda viśiṣṭasya api abhedāt katham upāsana abhedaḥ katham ca phala bheda iti ata āha eka eva tu iti rūpa abhede api upādhi bhedāt upahita bhedāt upāsana abhedaḥ tathā ca phalam eva iti arthaḥ kratuḥ saṃkalpaḥ nanu yadi eka ātmā kūṭastha nityaḥ  niratiśayaḥ sarva bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ katham etasmin bhūta āśraye tāratamī aśru tayā iti ata āha yadi apyeyaka ātmā iti yadi api niratiśayakam eva rūpam ātmana eśvaryam ca jñānam ca ānandaḥ ca tathā api anādyātamaḥ samāvṛtām teṣu teṣu prāṇabhṛt bhedeṣu kvacid asat iva kvacid sat iva kvacid apakṛṣṭam iva kvacid prakarṣavat  kvacid atyanta prakarṣavat iva bhāsate tad kasya hetoḥ avidyatamasaḥ prakarṣa nikarṣa tāratamyāt iti tathā uttama prakāśaḥ savitā dihmaṇḍala moka rūpeṇa eva prakāśena āpūrayan  api varṣāsu nikṛṣṭa prakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭa prakāśa iva prathate tathā idam api iti apekṣita upādhi saṃbandham upāsya tvena nirasta upādhi saṃbandham jñeya tvena iti ānandam ayaḥ  abhyāsāt  tatra tāvat prathamam eka deśi matena adhikaraṇam āracayati taittirīyake anna mayam ityādi agauṇa pravāha pāte api yujyate mukhyam īkṣaṇam mukhya tve tu ubhayoḥ tulye prāya dṛṣṭiḥ viśeṣikā ānanda maya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭaḥ tulyam mukhya artha tvam iti vikāra artha anna maya ādi pada prāya pāṭhāt ānanda maya padam api vikāra artham eva iti yuktam na ca prāṇa maya ādiṣu vikāra arthatva ayogāt svārthikaḥ  mayaṅ iti yuktam prāṇa ādi upādhi avacchinnaḥ hi ātmā bhavati prāṇa ādi vikārāḥ ghaṭa ākāśam iva ghaṭa vikārāḥ na ca sati arthe svārthika tvam ucitam acatu ṛkośa antara tve tu na sarva antaratā ucyate priya ādi bhāgī śarīraḥ  jīvaḥ  na brahma yujyate na ca sarva antara tayā brahma eva ānanda mayam na jīva iti sāṃpratam na hīyam śrutiḥ ānanda mayasya sarva antara tām brūte api tu anna maya ādi kośa catuṣṭhayā antara tām ānanda maya kośasya na ca asmāt anyasya antarasya aśravaṇa āt ayam eva sarva antara iti yuktam yad apekṣam sasya antara tvam śrutam tad tasmāt eva antaram bhavati na hi devadattaḥ  balavān iti ukte sarvān siṃha śārdūla ādīn api prati halavān apratīyate api tu samāna jātīya nara antara napekṣya evam ānandam ayaḥ  api anna maya ādibhyaḥ  antaraḥ  na tu sarvasmāt  na ca niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ priya ādi ava yava yogaḥ na api śarīra tvam yujyata iti saṃsārya iva ānanda mayaḥ tasmāt upahitam eva atra upāsya tvena vivakṣitam na tu brahma rūpam jñeya tvena iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ api ca yadi prācurya arthaḥ  api mayaṭ  tathā api saṃsārya iva ānanda mayaḥ na tu brahma ānanda prācurya hi tad viparīta duḥkha lava saṃbhave bhavati na tu tad atyanta asaṃbhave na ca paramātmanaḥ  manāk api duḥkha lava saṃbhavaḥ ānanda eka rasa tvāt iti āha na ca sa śarīrasya sata iti aśarīrasya punar apriya saṃbandhaḥ  manāk api na asti iti prācurya arthaḥ  api mayaṅ na upapadyayata iti arthaḥ ucyate ānanda maya avayavasya tāvat brahmaṇaḥ pucchasya aṅga tayā na prādhānyam api tu aṅgina ānanda mayasya eva brahmaṇaḥ prādhānyam tathā ca tadhikāre paṭhitam abhyasyamānam ānanda padam tad buddhim ādhatta iti tasya eva ānanda mayasya abhyāsa iti yuktam jyotiṣṭoma adhikāre avasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta iti jyotiḥ padam iva jyotiṣṭoma abhyāsaḥ kāla viśeṣa vidhi paraḥ api ca sākṣāt ānanda maya ātmā abhyāsaḥ śrūyate aetam ānandamayam ātmānam upasaṃkrāmati iti pūrva pakṣa bījam anubhāṣyam dūṣayati yad tu uktam anna mayāt iti na hi mukhya arundhatī darśanam tad tad amukhya arundhatī darśana prāya paṭhitam api amukhya arundhatī darśanam bhavati tādarthyāt pūrva darśanānām anya darśana anuguṇyam na tu tad virodhitā iti ced  iha api ānanda mayāda antarasya anyasya aśravaṇāt tasya tu anna maya ādi sarva antaratva śruteḥ tad paryavāsānāt tādarthyam tulyam priya ādi ava yava yoga śarīra tve ca bhāṣyeṇa samāhite priya ādi avayava yogāt ca duḥkha lava yoge api paramātmana aupādhika upapāditaḥ tathā ca ānanda maya iti prācuryā artha tā mayaṭa upapāditā iti api ca mantra brāhmaṇayoḥ upeya upāya bhūtayoḥ saṃpratipatteḥ brahma eva ānanda maya padārthaḥ mantre hi punar  aanyaḥ  antara ātmā iti para brahmaṇyā antaratva śravaṇāt tasya eva ca aanyaḥ  antara ātma ānanda mayaḥ iti brāhmaṇe pratyabhijñānāt  para brahma eva ānanda mayam iti āha sūtra kāraḥ māntra varṇikam eva ca gīyate māntra varṇikam eva param brahma brāhmaṇe api ānanda maya iti gīyata iti api ca ānanda mayam prakṛtya śarīra ādi utpatteḥ prāk sraṣṭṛtva śravaṇāt  abahu syām iti ca sṛjyamānānām sraṣṭuḥ ānanda mayāt abheda śravaṇāt ānanda mayaḥ para eva iti āha sūtram na itaraḥ  anupapatteḥ na itaraḥ  jīva ānanda mayaḥ tasya anupapatteḥ iti bheda vyapadeśāt ca rasaḥ sāraḥ  hi ayam ānanda maya ātmā arasam hi eva ayam labdhvā anandī bhavati iti saḥ  ayam jīva ātmanaḥ  labdhṛ bhāvaḥ ānanda mayasya ca labhyatā nābheda upapadyate tasmāt ānanda mayasya jīva ātmanaḥ  bhede para brahma tvam siddham bhavati codayati katham tarhi iti yadi labdhvā na labdhavyaḥ katham tarhi paramātmanaḥ  vastu tas  abhinnena jīva ātmanā paramātmā labhyata iti arthaḥ pariharati bāḍham tathā api iti satyam parama arthayaḥ abhede api avidyā āropitam bhedam upāśritya labdhṛ labdha vyabhāva upapadyate jīvaḥ  hi avidyayā para brahmaṇaḥ  bhinnaḥ darśitaḥ na tu jīvāt api tathā ca ānanda mayaḥ ced jīvaḥ na jīvasya avidyayā api svatas  bhedaḥ  darśita iti na labdhṛ labdha vyabhāva iti arthaḥ bheda abhedau ca na jīva para brahmaṇoḥ iti uktam adhastāt syāt etad  yathā parameśvarāt bhinnaḥ jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavati evam jīva ātmanaḥ  api draṣṭuḥ na bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasya anirvācya tve parameśvaraḥ  api anirvācyaḥ syāt  tathā ca vastu sannityata āha parameśvaraḥ tu avidyā kalpitāt iti rajatam hi rāma āropitam na śuktitaḥ  bhidyate na hi tad bhedena abhedena vā śakyam nirvaktum śuktiḥ tu parama artha satī nirvacanīyā anirvacanīyāt rajatāt bhidyata eva atra eva sarūpa mātram dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā māyāvina iti etad aparitoṣeṇa atyanta sarūpam dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā vā ghaṭa ākāśāt iti śeṣam ati rohita arthamḥḥ sva mata parigraha artham eka deśi matam dūṣayati idam tu iha vaktavyam iti eṣa tāvat utsargaḥ  yad  brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti brahma śabdāt pratīyate viśuddham brahma vikṛtam tu ānanda maya śabdataḥ tatra kim puccha pada samabhivyāhārāt anna maya ādiṣu ca asya avayava para tvena prayogāt  iha api avayava para tvāt puccha padasya tad samāna adhikaraṇam brahma padam api sva artha tyāgena kathañcid avayava param vyākhyāyātām ānanda maya padam ca anna maya ādi vikāra vāci prāya paṭhitam vikāra vāci vā kathañcid pracura ānanda vāci vā brahmaṇi aprasiddham kayācid vṛtyā brahmaṇi vyākhyāyātām ānanda pada abhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padena iva jyotiṣṭoma anandam ayaḥ  lakṣyatām uta ānanda mayam vikāra artham astu brahma padam ca brāhmaṇī ā iva sva arthe astu ānandam apada abhyāsaḥ ca sva arthe puccha pada mātram avayava prāya likhitam adhikaraṇa para tayā vyākriyatām iti kṛtabuddhi eva vidāṅkurvantu tatra aprāya pāṭha parityāgaḥ  mukhya tritaya laṅghanam pūrvasmin  uttare pakṣe prāya pāṭhasya bādhanam puccha padam hi vāladhau mukhyam sat ānanda maya avayave gauṇam eva iti mukhya śabda artha laṅghanam avayava para tāyām aṅikaraṇa para tāyām ca tulyam avayava prāya lekha bādhaḥ ca vikāra prāya lekha bādhena tulyaḥ brahma padam ānanda maya padam ānanda padam iti tritaya laṅghanam tu adhikam tasmāt mukhya tritaya laṅghanāt sādhīyān pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ mukhya traya anuguṇyena tu uttara eva pakṣaḥ  yuktaḥ api ca ānanda maya padasya brahma artha tve brahma puccham iti na samañjasam na hi tad eva avayavi avayavaḥ ca iti yuktam ādhāra paratve ca puccha śabdasya pratiṣṭhā iti etad api upapannataram bhavati ānanda mayasya ca antara tvam anna maya ādi kośa apekṣayā brahmaṇā aḥ tu āntara tvam ānanda mayāt arthāt gamyata iti na śrutyā uktam evam ca anna maya ādivat ānanda mayasya priya ādi avayava yogaḥ  yuktaḥ vāc manasā agocare tu para brahmaṇi upādhim antar bhāvya priya ādi ava yava yogaḥ prācuryaḥ ca kleśena vyākhyāyeyātām tathā ca māntra varṇikasya brahmaṇā eva brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti sva pradhānasya abhidhānāt  tasya eva adhikāraḥ  na ānanda mayasya iti saḥ  akāmayeta ityādyā api śrutayaḥ brahma viṣayā iti artha saṃkṣepaḥ sugamam anyat  sūtrāṇi tu evam vyākhyeyāni iti vedasūtrayoḥ virodhe aguṇe tu anyāyi akalpanā iti sūtrāṇi anyathā netavyāni ānanda maya śabdena tad vākyasya brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti etad gatam brahma padam upalakṣyate etad uktam bhavati ānanda maya ityādi vākye yad  brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti brahma padam tad sva pradhānam eva iti yad tu brahma adhikaraṇam eva iti vaktavye brahma puccham iti āha śrutiḥ tad kasya hetoḥ pūrvam avayava pradhāna prayogāt tad prayogasya eva buddhau saṃnidhānāt  tena api ca adhiraraṇa lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ iti māntra varṇikam eva ca gīyate yad  satyam jñānam ityādinā mantra varṇena brahma uktam tad eva upāya bhūtena brāhmaṇena sva pradhānyena gīyate brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti avayava vacana tve tu asya mantre prādhānyam brāhmaṇe prādhānyam iti upāya upeyayoḥ mantra brāhmaṇayoḥ vipratipattiḥ syāt iti na itaraḥ  anupapatteḥ atra aitaḥ ca ānanda mayaḥ iti bhāṣyasya sthāne itas ca brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhitavyam bheda vyapadeśāt ca atra api itas ca ānanda mayaḥ iti asya ca ānanda maya adhikāre iti asya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti brahma puccha adhikāre iti ca paṭhita vayam kāmāt ca na anumāna apekṣā asmin  asya ca tad yogam śāsti iti anayoḥ api sūtrayoḥ bhāṣye ānanda maya sthāne brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti pāṭhaḥ  draṣṭavyaḥ tad hetu vyapadeśāt ca vikārasya ānanda mayasya brahma puccham avayavaḥ ced katham sarvasya asya vikāra jātasya sa ānanda mayasya brahma puccham kāraṇam ucyeta idam sarvam asṛjata yad idam kiñca iti śrutyā na hi ānanda maya vikāra avayavaḥ  brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇam upapadyate tasmāt ānanda maya vikāra avayavaḥ  brahma iti tad avayava yogya ānandam ayaḥ  vikāra iha na upāsya tvena vivakṣitaḥsa kintu sva pradhānam iha brahma puccham jñeya tvena iti siddham anta karaḥ tad dharma upadeśāt pūrvasmin  adhikaraṇe apāsta samasta viśeṣa brahma pratipatti artham upāya tā mātreṇa pañca kośā upādhayaḥ sthitāḥ na tu vivakṣā etāḥ brahmā eva tu pradhānam brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti jñeya tvena upakṣiptam iti nirṇītam saṃprati tu brahma vivakṣita upādhim upasyatvena upakṣipyate na tu vidyā karma atiśaya labdha utkarṣaḥ  jīvātma āditya pada vedanīya iti nirṇīyate tatra maryādā ādhāra rūpāṇi saṃsāriṇi pare na tu tasmāt upāsyaḥ saṃsāri karma anadhikṛtaḥ  raviḥ piraṇyaśmaśruḥ ityādi rūpa śravaṇāt  ya eṣaḥ  antarāditye ya eṣaḥ  antarakṣiṇī iti ca ādhāra bheha śravaṇāt ye ca amuṣmāt parāñcaḥ  lokāḥ teṣām ceṣṭe deva kāmānām ca iti aiśvaryāda aśruteḥ ca saṃsāri iva kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta ātmakaḥ  rūpa ādi saṃpanna iha upāsyaḥ na tu paramātmā aśabdam asparśam ityādi śrutibhiḥ apāsta samasta rūpāḥ ca sve mahimni iti ādi śrutibhiḥ apākṛta ādhāraḥ ca eṣa sarva īśvaraḥ iti ādi śrutibhiḥ adhigata nirmaryāda aiśvaryaḥ ca śakya upāsya tvena iha pratipattum sarva pāpma virahaḥ ca āditya puruṣe saṃbhavati śāstrasya manuṣya adhikāra tayā devatāyāḥ puṇyu pāpayoḥ anadhikārāt  rūpa ādimattva anyā anupapattyā ca kārya kāraṇa ātmake jīve upāsya tvena vivakṣite yatta avadṛś ādi ātmaka tayā asya sarva ātmaka tvam śrūyate tad kathañcid āditya puruṣasya eva stutuḥ iti āditya puruṣa eva upāsyaḥ  na paramātmati evam prāptam anādhāra tve ca nitya tvam sarva gata tvam ca hetuḥ anityam hi kāryam kāraṇa ādhāram iti nānā dhāram nityam api asarva gatam ca yad tasmāt adhara bhāvena āsthitam tad eva tasya uttarasya ādhāra iti nānā dhāram tasmāt ubhayam uktam evam prāpte abhidhīyate aantaḥ tad dharma upadeśāt asārvātmya sarva durita virahābhyām iha ucyate brahma eva avyabhicāribhyām sarva hetuḥ vikāravat nāma niruktena hi sarva pāpmā apāda ānatayasya udaya ucyate na ca ādityasya devatāyāḥ karma anadhikāre api sarva pāpma virahaḥ prāc bhavīya dharma rūpa pāpma saṃbhave sati na ca eteṣām prāc bhavīyaḥ  dharma eva asti na pāpma iti sāṃpratam vidyā karma atiśaya samudācāre api anādi bhava paraṃpara upārjitānām pāpmanām api prasuptānām saṃbhavāt  na ca śruti prāmāṇya ādi dātya śarīra abhimāninaḥ sarva pāpma viraha iti yuktam brahma viṣaya tvena api asyāḥ prāmāṇya upapatteḥ na ca vinigamanā hetu abhāvaḥ tatra tatra sarva pāpma virahasya bhūyas bhūyas  brahmaṇi eva śravaṇāt  tasya eva ca iha pratyabhijñāyamānasya vinigamanā hetoḥ vidyamāna tvāt  apica sārvātmyam jagat kāraṇasya brahmaṇa eva upapadyate kāraṇāt abhedāt kārya jātasya brahmaṇaḥ ca jagat kāraṇa tvāt  āditya śarīra abhimāninaḥ tu jīva ātmanaḥ  na jagat kāraṇa tvam na ca mukhya artha saṃbhave prāśasti alakṣaṇayā stuti artha tā yuktā rūpavat tvam ca asya para anugrahāya kāya nirmāṇena vā tad vikāra tayā vā sarvasya kārya jātasya vikārasya ca vikāravataḥ  ananya tvāt tādṛśa rūpa bhedena upadiśyate yathā gandhaḥ saḥ iti na ca brahma nirmitam māyā rūpam anuvadat śāstram aśāstram bhavati api tu tām kurvat  iti māśāstratva prasaṅgaḥ yatra tu nirasta samasta upādhi bhedam jñeya tvena upakṣipyate tatra śāstram aaśabdam asparśam arūpam avyayam iti pravartate tasmāt rūpavat tvam api paramātmani upapadyate etena eva maryādā ādhāra bhedau  api vyākhyātau api ca āditya deha abhimāninaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ  antaryāmī bhedena uktaḥ sa eva antarāditya iti antar  śruti sāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ  bhavitum arhati tasmāte dhana sanaya iti dhanavantaḥ  vibhūtimanta iti yāvat  kasmāt punar vibhūtimat tvam parameśvara parigrahe ghaṭata iti ata āha yad yad vibhūtimat iti sava ātmaka tve api vibhūtimatsu eva parameśvara svarūpa abhivyaktiḥ na tu avidyā tamaḥ pihita parameśvara svarūpeṣu avibhūtimatsu iti arthaḥ loka kāma īśitṛ tvam api iti atas  atyanta apāra arthya nyāyena nirāṅkuśam aiśvaryam iti arthaḥ ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt  pūrvasmin  adhikaraṇe brahmaṇaḥ  asādhāraṇa dharma darśanāt vivakṣita upādhinaḥ  asya eva upāsanā na tu āditya śarīra abhimāninaḥ  jīvātmana iti nirūpitam idānīm tu asā dhāraṇa dharma darśanāt tad eva udgīthe saṃpādya upāsya tvena upadiśyate na bhūtākāśa iti nirūpyate tatra aākāśa iti ha uvāca iti kim mukhya kāśa pāda anurodhena aasya lokasya kā gitaḥ iti asarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni iti ajyāyāḥ iti ca aparāyaṇam iti ca kathañcid vyākhyāyatām uta etad anurodhena ākāśa śabdaḥ  bhaktyā para ātmāne vyākhyāyatām iti patra prathvī tvād pradhāna tvāt ākāśam mukhyam eva naḥ tadā anuguṇyena anyāni vyākhyeyāni iti niścayaḥ aasya lokasya kā gatiḥ iti praśna uttare aākāśa iti ha uvāca iti ākāśasya gati tvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt  asarvāṇi ha vā ityādīnām tu tad viśeṣaṇa tayā guṇa tvāt  aguṇe tvanyāṭya kalpanā iti bahūni api apradhānāni pradhāna anurodhena netavyāni apica aākāśa iti ha uvāca iti uttare prathama avagatam ākāśam anupajāta virodhi tena tad anuraktāyām buddhau yad yad eva tad eka vākya gatam upanipatati tad tad jaghanyatayā upasaṃjāta virodhi tadā anuguṇyena eva vyavasthānam arhati na ca kkacid ākāśa śabdaḥ  bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tad pareṇa bhavitavyam na hi gaṅgāyām ghoṣa iti atra gaṅga padam anupapattyā tīra param iti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyām iti atra api anena tad pareṇa bhavitavyam saṃbhavaḥ ca ubhayatra tulyaḥ na ca brahmaṇi api ākāśa śabdaḥ  mukhyaḥ anaika artha tvasya anyāṭya tvāt  bhaktyā ca brahmaṇi prayoga darśana upapatteḥ loke ca asya nabhasi nirūḍha tvāt  tad pūrvaka tvāt ca vaidika artha pratīteḥ vaiparītya anupapatteḥ tadā anuguṇyena ca asarvāṇi ha vā ityādīni bhāṣya kṛtā svayam eva nītāni tasmāt bhūta ākāśam eva atra upāsya tvena upadiśyate na paramātmā iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate ākāśa śabdena brahmaṇaḥ  grahaṇam kutas  tad liṅgāt  tathā hi asāmānadhikaraṇyena praśna tad prativākyayoḥ paurvāparya parāmarśāt pradhāna tve api gauṇa tā yadi api ākāśa padam pradhāna artham tathā api yad pṛṣṭam tad eva prativaktavyam na khalu nunmatta āmnān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidāsanā caṣṭe tad iha aasya lokasya kā gatiḥ iti praśnaḥ  dṛśyamāna nāma rūpa prapañca mātra gati viṣaya iti tad anurodha adya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa eva ākāśa śabdena prativaktavyaḥ na ca bhūta ākāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ tasya api loka madhya pāti tvāt tad eva tasya matiḥ iti anupapatteḥ na ca uttare bhūta ākāśa śravaṇāt bhūta ākāśa kāryam eva pṛṣṭam iti yuktam praśnasya prathama avagataḥ  anupajāta virodhinaḥ  loka sāmānya viṣayasya upajāta virodhina uttareṇa saṃkoca anupapatteḥ tad anurodhena uttara vyākhyānāt na ca praśnena pūrva pakṣa rūpeṇa anavasthita arthena uttaram vyavasthita artham na śakyam niyantum iti yuktam tad nimittānām ajñāna saṃśaya viparyasānām anavasthāne api tasya sva viṣaye vyavasthānāt  anyathā uttarasya anālambana tvāt teḥ vaiyadhikaraṇyāpatteḥ vā api ca uttare api bahu asamañjasam tathā hi asarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni akāśāt eva samutpadyante iti sarva śabdaḥ kathañcid alpa viṣayaḥ  vyākhyeyaḥ evam eva kāraḥ  api asamañjasaḥ na khalu apām ākāśa eva kāraṇam api tu tejaḥ  api evam annasya api na ākāśam eva kāraṇam api tu pāvaka pāthasī api mūla kāraṇa vivakṣāyām tu brahmaṇi eva avadhāraṇam samañjasam asamaḍhjasam tu bhūta ākāśe evam sarveṣām bhūtānām layaḥ  brahmaṇi eva evam sarvebhyaḥ  jyāyaḥ tvam brahmaṇa eva evam paramayanam brahmā eva tasmāt sarveṣām lokānām iti praśna upakramāt  uttare ca tad tad asādhāraṇa brahma guṇa parāmarśāt pṛṣṭāyāḥ ca gateḥ paramayanam iti āsādhāraṇa brahma guṇa upasaṃhārāt  bhūyasīnām śrutīnām anugrahāya atyajet ekam kulasya arthe itivat varam ākāśa pada mātram asamañja samastu etāvatā hi bahu samañjasam syāt  na ca ākāśasya prādhānyam uttare kintu pṛṣṭa artha tvāt uttarasya loka sāmānya gateḥ ca pṛṣṭa tvāt  aparāyaṇam iti ca tasya eva upasaṃhārā brahmā eva pradhānam tathā ca tad artham sat  ākāśa padam pradhāna artham bhavati na anyathā tasmāt brahmā eva pradhānam ākāśa padena iha upāsya tvena upakṣitam na bhūtākāśam iti siddham api ca asya eva upakrame aantavat kila te sāma iti antavattva doṣeṇa śālāvatyasya iti na ca ākāśa śabdaḥ  gauṇaḥ  api vilambita pratipattiḥ tatra tatra brahmaṇi ākāśa śabdasya tad paryāyasya ca prayoga prācuryāt atyanta abhyāsena asya api mukhyavat pratipatteḥ avilambanāt iti darśana artham brahmaṇi prayoga prācuryam vaidikam nidarśitam bhāṣya kṛtā tatra eva ca prathama avagata anuguṇyena uttaram nīyate yatra tad anyathā kartum śakyam yatra tu na śakyam tatra uttara anuguṇyena eva prathamam nīyata iti āha vākya upakrame api iti ata eva prāṇaḥ udgīthe ayā devatā prastāvam anvāyattā iti ukramya śrūyate akatamā sā devatā iti prāṇa iti ha uvāca uṣasti śkrāyaṇaḥ udgītha upāsana prasaṅgena prastāva upāsanam api udgītha iti uktam bāṣya kṛtā prastāva iti sāmnaḥ  bhakti viśeṣaḥ tam anvāyattā anugatā prāṇaḥ  devatā atra prāṇa śabdasya brahmaṇi vāyu vikāre ca darśanāt saṃśayaḥ kim ayam brahma vacana uta vāyu vikāra vacana iti tatra ata eva brahma liṅgāt eva prāṇaḥ  api brahmā eva na vāyu vikāra iti yuktam yadi evam tena eva gata artham etad iti kaḥ  adhikaraṇa antarasya ārambha arthaḥ tatra ucyate aarthe śrutyā eka gamye hi śrutim eva ādriyāmahe māna antarau  agamye tu tad vaśāt tad vyavasthitiḥ brahmaṇaḥ  vāsarva bhūta kāraṇa tvam ākāśasya vā vāṭu ādi bhūta kāraṇa tvam prati na āgamāt ṛte māna antaram prabhavati tatra paurvāparya paryālocanayā yatra arthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa eva arthaḥ tasya gṛhyate tyajyate ca itaraḥ iha tu saṃveśana udgamane bhūtānām prāṇam pratyucyamāne kim brahma pratyucyate āhaḥ vāyu vikāram prati iti viśaye ayadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇam tarhi vāc apya iti iti ādikāyāḥ śruteḥ sarva bhūta sāra indriya saṃveśana udgamana pratipādana dvārā sarva bhūta saṃveśana udgamana pratipādikāyāḥ  māna antara anugraha labdha sāmarthyāyāḥ  balāt saṃveśana udgamane vāyu vikārasya eva prāṇasya na brahmaṇaḥ api ca atra udgītha pratihārayoḥ sāma bhaktyoḥ brahmaṇaḥ  anye ādityaḥ ca annam ca devate abhihite kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta rūpe tad sāhacaryāt prāṇaḥ  api kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta rūpa eva devatā bhavitum arhati nistaḥ api ayam artha īkṣati adhikaraṇe pūrva ukta pūrva pakṣa hetu upa udbalāya punar upanyastaḥ tasmāt vāyu vikāra eva atra prāṇa śabda artha iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate apuṃvākyasya balīyaḥ tvam māna antara samāgamāt apauruṣeye vākye tad saṃgatiḥ kim kariṣyati naḥ khalu svatas siddha pramāṇa bhāvam apauruṣeyam vacaḥ sva viṣaya jñāna utpāde vā tad vyavahāre vā māna antaram apekṣate tasya apauruṣeyasya nirasta samasta doṣa āśaṅkya svata eva niścāyaka tvāt  niścāyaka tvāt  niścaya pūrvaka tvāt vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ tasmāt asaṃvādinaḥ  vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvac indriya saṃvādinaḥ  vā tasya eva dravye na adārḍhyam vā dārḍhyam vā tena stām indriya mātra saṃveśana udgamane vāyu vikāre prāṇe sarva bhūta saṃveśana udgamane tu na tatas  vākyāt pratīyate pratītau vā tatra api prāṇaḥ  brahmā eva bhavet na vāyu vikāraḥ ayadā suptaḥ svapnam na kañcana paśyati atha asmin prāṇa eva ekadhā bhavati iti atra vākye yathā prāṇa śabdaḥ  brahma vacanaḥ na ca asmin vāyu vikāre sarveṣām bhūtānām saṃveśana udgamane māna antareṇa dṛśyete na ca māna antara siddha saṃvāda indriya saṃveśana udgamana vākya dārḍhyāt sarva bhūta saṃveśana udgamana vākyam kathañcid indri viṣaya tayā vyākhyānam arhati svatas  siddha pramāṇa bhāvasya svabhāva dṛḍhasya māna antara anupayogāt na ca asya tena eka vākyatā eka vākyatāyām ca tad api brahma param eva syāt iti uktam indriya saṃveśana udgamanam tu avayutya anuvādena api ghaṭiṣyate ekam vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte itivat  na tu sarva śabda arthaḥ saṃkocam arhati tasmāt prastāva bhaktim prāṇa śabda abhidheya brahma adṛṣṭyā upāsīt na vāyu vikāra dṛṣṭyā iti siddham tathā ca upāsakasya prāṇa prāptiḥ karma samṛddhiḥ vā phalam bhavati iti vākya śeṣa balena iti vākyāt saṃnidhānam durbalam iti arthaḥ udāharaṇa antaram tu nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa dūṣitam jyotiścaraṇa abhidhānāt idam āmananti aatha yad atas  paraḥ  divaḥ  jyotiḥ dīpyate niśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvatas  pṛṣṭheṣu anuttameṣu uttameṣu lokeṣu idam vāva tad yad idam asmin  antar  puruṣe jyotiḥ iti yad jyotiḥ atas  divaḥ  dyu lokāt param dīpyate prakāśate viśvatas pṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣām upari asaṃkucat vṛttiḥ ayam viśva śabdaḥ  anavayava tvena saṃsāra maṇḍalam brūta iti darśayitum āha sarvatas pṛṣṭheṣu uttameṣu na ca idam uttama mātram api tu sarva uttamam iti āha anuttameṣu na asti ebhyaḥ  anya uttama iti arthaḥ aidam vāva tad yad idam asmin puruṣe antar jyotiḥ tu agrāhyeṇa śārīreṇa ūṣmaṇā śrotra grāhyeṇa ca pihita karṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgena anumīyate tatra śārīrasya ūṣmaṇaḥ tvacā darśanam dṛṣṭiḥ ghoṣasya ca śravaṇam śrutiḥ tayoḥ ca dṛṣṭi śrutī jyotiṣa eva tad liṅgena tad anumānāt iti atra saṃśayaḥ kim jyotiḥ śabdaḥ teja uta brahma iti kim tāvat prāptam teja iti kutas  gauṇa mukhya grahaṇa viṣaye mukhya grahaṇasya aautsargika tvāt vākya stha tejaḥ liṅga upalambhanāt vākya antareṇa aniyamāt tad artha apratisaṃdhitaḥ balavat bādha kopa nipātena khalva ākāśa prāṇa śabdau mukhya artha tvāt pracyā anya tra pratiṣṭhāpitau tad iha jyotiṣpadasya mukhya tejaḥ vacana tve bādhakaḥ tāvat sva vākya śeṣaḥ  na asti pratyuta tejaḥ liṅgam eva adīpyate iti kokṣeya jyotiḥ sārūpyam ca cakṣuṣyaḥ  rūpavān śrutaḥ  viśrutaḥ  bhavati iti alpa phala tvam ca sva vākye śrūyate na jātu jvalana apara nāmā dīptiḥ vinā tejaḥ  brahmaṇi saṃbhavati na ca kaukṣeya jyotiḥ sārūpi am ṛte bāhyāt tojasaḥ  brahmaṇi asti na ca auṣṇya ghoṣa liṅga darśana śravaṇam audaryāt tejasaḥ  anyatra brahmaṇi upapadyate na ca mahā phalam brahma upāsana maṇīyase phalāya kalpate audarye tu tejasi adhyasya bāhyam teja upāsanam etad  phala anurūpam yujyate tad etad tejaḥ liṅgam etad upodbalāya ca nirastam api maryādādhāra bahu tvam upanyastam iha tad nirāsa kāraṇa abhāvāt na ca maryādāvat tvam tejaḥ rāśeḥ na saṃbhavati tasya saurya ādeḥ sāvayava tvena tad eka deśa maryādā saṃbhavāt tasya ca upāsya tvena vidhānāt  brahmaṇaḥ tu anavayavasya avayava upāsana anupapatteḥ avayava kalpanāyāḥ ca satyām gatau  anavakalpanāt  na ca apādaḥ  asya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasya amṛtam divi iti brahma pratipādakam vākya antaram ayadataḥ paraḥ  divaḥ  jyotiḥ śabdam brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayati iti yuktam na hi saṃnidhāna mātradvākya antareṇa vākya antara gatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhya artha antryāvayitum na ca vākya antare adhikaraṇa tvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryāda aśrutau śakyā pratyabhijñātum apica vākya antarasya api brahma artha tvam prasādhyam eva na adya api sidhyati tad katham tena niyantum brahma para tayā ayadataḥ paraḥ iti vākyam śakyam tasmāt teja eva jyoti na brahma iti prāptam tejaḥ kathana prastāve tamaḥ kathanam pratipakṣa upanyāsena pratipakṣa antare dṛḍhā pratītiḥ bhavati iti etad artham cakṣuḥ vṛtteḥ nirodhakam iti artāvaraka tvena ākṣeptāha nanu kāryasya api iti samādhāta eka deśī brūte astu tarhi iti yad tu tejaḥ  abannābhyām asaṃpṛktam tad atrivṛt kṛtam ucyate ākṣeptā dūṣayati na iti na hi tad kakkacid api upayujyateca sarvāsu artha kriyāsu trivat kṛtasya eva upayogāt iti arthaḥ eka deśinaḥ śaṅkām āha idam eva iti ākṣeptā nirākaroti na prayojana antara iti aeka ekām trivṛtam trivṛtam karavāṇi iti tejaḥ prabhṛti upāsanā mātra viṣayā śrutiḥ na saṃkocayitum yuktā iti arthaḥ evam eka deśini dūṣite parama samādhātā pūrva pakṣī brūte astu tarhi trivṛt kṛtam eva iti bhāginī yuktā yadi api ādhāra bahutva śrutiḥ brahmaṇi api kalpita upādhi nibandhanā kathañcid upapadyate tathā api yathā kārye jyotiṣyati śayena upapadyate na tathā atra ityata uktam upapadyetatarām iti prākṛtam prakṛteḥ jātam kāryam iti yāvat  evam prāpta ucyate asarva nāma prasiddha artham prasādhya artha vighāta kṛt prasiddhi apekṣi sat pūrva vākya stham apakarṣa iti tad balāt tena neyāni tejaḥ liṅgāni api druvam brahmaṇi eva pradhānam hi brahmacchandaḥ  na tatra tu autsargikam tāvat yad aprasiddha artha anuvādaka tvam yad vidhi vibhaktim api apūrva artha avabodhana svabhāvāt pracyāvayati yathā ayasya āhitāgneḥ agniḥ gṛhān dahet ayasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti yatra punar tad prasiddham anyatas  na kathañcid āpyate tatra vacanāni tu apūrva tvāt iti sarva nāmnaḥ prasiddha artha tvam balāt apanīyate yathā ayat āgneyaḥ  aṣṭākapālaḥ  bhavati iti tad iha ayadataḥ paraḥ  divaḥ  jyotiḥ iti yad śabda sāmarthyāt  dyu maryādena api jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam na ca tasya pramāṇa antarataḥ prasiddhiḥ asti pūrva vākye ca dyu saṃbandhi tayā tripād brahma prasiddham iti prasiddhi apekṣāyām tad eva saṃbadhyate na ca pradhānasya prātipadikā arthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tad viśeṣaṇasya vibhakti arthasya anya tā mātreṇa anya tā yuktā evam ca tad vākya sthāni tejaḥ liṅgāni asamañjasāni iti brahmaṇi eva gamayitavyāni gamitāni ca bhāṣya kṛtā tatra jyotiḥ brahma vikāra iti jyotiṣā brahma eva upalakṣyate athavā prakāśa mātra vacanaḥ  jyotiḥ śabdaḥ prakāśasya brahma iti brahmaṇi mukya iti jyotiḥ bahma iti siddham prakṛta hānā prakṛta prakriye iti prasiddhi apekṣāyām pūrva vākya gatam prakṛtam saṃnihitam aprasiddham tu kalpyam na prakṛtam ata eva uktam kalpyata iti saṃdaṃśanyām āha na kevalam iti parasya api brahmaṇaḥ  nāma ādi pratīkatvavat iti kaukṣeyam hi jyotiḥ jīva bhāvena anupraviṣṭasya paramātmanaḥ  vikāraḥ jīva bhāve dehasya śaityāt  jīvataḥ ca auṣṇyāt jñāyate tasmāt tad pratīkasya upāsanam upapannam śeṣam nigada vyākhyātam bhāṣyam chandobhidhānāt na iti ced  na tathā cetorpaṇa nigadāt tathā hi darśanam pūrva vākyasya hi brahma artha tve siddhe syāt etad evam na tu tad brahma artham api tu gāyatrī artham agāyatrī vā idam sarvam bhūtam yad idam kiñca iti gāyatrīm prakṛtyā idam śrūyate atripādasya amṛtam divi iti nanu aākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt iti anena eva gata artham etad  tathā hi atāvān asya mahimā iti asyāmṛci brahma catuṣpād uktam sā eva ca atat etad ṛca abhyanūktam iti anena saṃgamita arthā brahma liṅgam evam agāyatrī vā idam sarvam iti akṣara saṃniveśa mātrasya gāyatryā na sarva tvam upapadyate na ca bhūta pṛthivī śarīra hṛdaya vāc prāṇa ātma tvam gāyatryāḥ sva rūpeṇa saṃbhavati na ca brahma puruṣa saṃbandhi tvam asti gāyatryāḥ tasmāt gīyatrī dvārā brahmaṇa eva upāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇa eva gata artha tvāt anārambhaṇīyam etad  na ca pūrva nyāya smāraṇe sūtra saṃdarbha etāvān i uktaḥ atra ucyate asti adhikā śaṅkā tathā hi gāyatrī dvārā brahma upāsana iti kor athaḥ gāyatrī vikāra upādhinaḥ  brahmaṇa upāsana iti na ca tad upādhinaḥ tad avactha chinnasya sarva ātma tvam upādheḥ avacchedāt  na hi ghaṭa avacchinnam nabhaḥ  anavacchinnam bhavati tasmāt asya sarva ātmatva ādikam stuti artham tad varam gāyatryā eva astu stutiḥ kathācid praṇāḍyā avāc vai gāyatrī vāc vā idam sarvam bhūtam gāyati ca trāyate ca ityādi śritibhyaḥ tathā ca agāyatrī vā idam sarvam iti upakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdaya ādibhiḥ vyākhyāya ca asā eṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī iti upasaṃhāraḥ  gāyatryām eva samañjasaḥ bhavati brahmaṇi tu sarvam atadasam añjasam iti ayat vai tad brahma iti brahma śabdaḥ chandaḥ viṣaya eva yathā aetām brahma upaniṣadam iti atra veda upaniṣad ucyate tasmāt gāyatri chanda ubhidhānāt na brahma viṣayam etad iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate na kutas  tathā cetorpaṇa nigadāt  gāyatrī ākhya  chanda udvāreṇa gāyatrī rūpa vikāra anugate brahmaṇi cetaḥ rpaṇam citta samādhānam anena brahmaṇa vākyena nigadyate etad uktam bhavati na gāyatrī brahmaṇaḥ  avacchedikā utpalasya iva nīlatvam yena tad avacchinna tvam anaytra na syāt avacchedaka virahāt kintu yad etad brahma sarva ātmakam sarva kāraṇam sat svarūpeṇa aśakya upadeśam iti tad vikāra gāyatrī dvāreṇa upalakṣyate gāyatryāḥ sarva  chandaḥ vyāptyā ca savana traya vyāptyā ca dvijāti dvitīya janma jananīya tayā ca śruteḥ vikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratva upapatteḥ na ca anyatra upalakṣaṇa abhāvena na upalakṣyam pratīyate na hi kuṇḍalena upalakṣitam kaṇṭha rūpam kuṇḍala viyoge api paścāt pratīyamānam apratīyamānam bhavati tad rūpa pratyāyana mātra upayogi tvāt upalakṣaṇānām anavacchedaka tvāt  tad evam gāyatrī śabdasya mukhya artha tve gāyatryā brahma upalakṣyata iti uktam saṃprati ti gāyatri śabdaḥ saṃkhyā sāmānyāt gauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇi eva vartata iti darśayati apara āha iti tathā hi ṣaṣ akṣaraiḥ pādaiḥ yathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā evam brahmā api catuṣpād  sarvāṇi hi bhūtāni sthāvara jaṅgamāni asya ekaḥ pādaḥ athavā divya ākāśe trayaḥ pādāḥ tathā hi śrutiḥ aidam vāva tad yaḥ ayam puruṣāt ākāśaḥ tad hi tasya jagarita sthānam jāgratva khalu ayam bāhyān padārthān veda tathā aayam vāva sa yaḥ  ayam antar  puruṣa ākāśaḥ śarīra madhya iti arthaḥ tad hi tasya svapna sthānam tathā aayam vāva sa yaḥ  ayam antar hṛdaya ākāśaḥ hṛdaya puṇḍarīka iti arthaḥ tad hi tasya suṣupti sthānam tad etad atripādasya amṛtam divi iti uktam tad evam catuṣpād tu asāmānyāt gāyatrī śabdena brahmā ucyata iti asmin pakṣe brahma eva abhihitim iti brahma para tvāt abhihitam iti uktam ṣaḍvidhā iti bhūta pṛthivī śarīra hṛdaya vākprāṇā iti ṣaḍ  prakārā gāyatrī ākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante pañca brahma puruṣā iti ca hṛdaya yasuṣiṣu brahma puruṣa śrutiḥ brahma saṃbandhi tāyām vivakṣitāyām saṃbhavati asya arthaḥ hṛdayasya asya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇa ādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svarga prāpti dvārāṇi iti deva suṣayaḥ tathā hi hṛdayasya yad prāṅmukham chidram tad sthaḥ  yaḥ  vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ tena hi prayāṇa kāle saṃcarate svarga lokam sa eva cakṣuḥ sa eva āditya iti arthaḥ aādityaḥ  ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ iti śruteḥ atha yaḥ  asya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣiḥ tad sthaḥ  vāyu viśeṣaḥ  vyānaḥ tad saṃbaddham śrotra tad candramāḥ aśrotreṇa sṛṣṭā viśaḥ candramāḥ ca iti śruteḥ atha yaḥ  asya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣiḥ ta tad sthaḥ  vāyu viśeṣaḥ  apānaḥ sa ca vāc saṃbandhāt vāc  avāgvā agniḥ iti śruteḥ atha yaḥ  asya udaṅmukhaḥ suṣiḥ tad sthaḥ  vāyu viśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ pāda talāt ārabhya ūrdhvam nayanāt  sa vāyuḥ tad ādhāraḥ ca ākāśaḥ  devatā te vā ete pañca suṣayaḥ tad saṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryām akṣara saṃniveśa mātre saṃbhavanti kintu brahmaṇi eva iti yathā soka iti yad ādhāra tvam mukhyam divaḥ tadā kathañcid maryādā vyākhyeyā yaḥ  hi śyenaḥ  vṛkṣa agre vastu tas  asti sa ca tatas  paraḥ  api asti eva arvāc bhāga atiriktam api apara bhāga sthasya tasya eva vṛkṣāt parataḥ avasthānāt  evam ca bāhyadi ubhāga atirikta śārīra hārdadyu bhāga sthasya brahmaṇaḥ  bāhyāt  dyubhāgāt parataḥ avasthānam upapannam yadā tu maryādā eva mukhya tayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayā ādhāra tvam vyākhyeyam yathā gaṅgāyām ghoṣa iti atra sāmīpyāt iti tad idam uktam apara āha iti ata eva divaḥ param api iti uktam prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt aaneka liṅga saṃdohe balavtakasya kim bhavet  liṅginaḥ  liṅgam iti atra cintyate prāc acintitam mukhya prāṇa jīva devatā brahmaṇām anekeṣām liṅgāni bahūni saṃplavante tad katamat atra liṅgam liṅga ābhāsam ca katamaditi atra vicāryate na ca ayam arthaḥ aata eva prāṇaḥ iti atra vicāritaḥ syāt etad  hitatama puruṣa artha siddhiḥ ca nikhila bhrūṇa hatyā ādi pāpa aparāmarśaḥ ca prajñā ātma tvam ca ānanda ādiḥ ca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti tathā aeṣa sādhu karma kārayati aeṣa loka adhipatiḥ ityādi api jīve tu prajñā ātma tvam kathañcid bhavet itareṣām tu asaṃbhavaḥ vaktṛ tvam ca vākkaraṇa vyāpāravat tvam yadi api parama ātmani sva rūpeṇa na saṃbhavati tathā api ananyathā siddha bahu brahma liṅga virodha parihārāya jīva dvāreṇa brahmaṇi eva kathañcid vyākhyeyam jīvasya brahmaṇaḥ  abhedāt  tathā ca śrutiḥ ayat vācā anabhyuditam yena vāc abhyudyate tad eva brahma tvam viddhi iti vāc vadanasya brahma kāraṇam iti āha śarīra dhāraṇam api yadi api mukhya prāṇasya eva tathā api prāṇa vyāpārasya paramātmā āyattatvāt paramātmana eva yadi api ca atra indra devatāyāḥ  vigrahavatyā liṅgam asti tathā hi indradhāma gatam pratardanam pratīndra uvāca amām eva vijānīhi iti upakramya aprāṇaḥ  asmiprajñā ātmā iti ātmani prāṇa śabdam uccacāra prajñā ātma tvam ca asya upapadyate devatānām apratihata jñāna śakti tvāt sāmarthya atiśayāt ca indrasya hitatama puruṣa artha hetu tvam api manuṣya adhikāra tvāt śāstrasya devān pratyapravṛtteḥ bhrūṇa hatyā ādi pāpa aparāmarśasya upapatteḥ loka ādhapatyam ca indrasya lokapāla tvāt ānanda ādi rūpa tvam ca svargasya eva ānanda tvāt aābhūta saṃplavam sthānam amṛta tvam hi bhāṣyate iti smṛteḥ ca amṛta tvam indrasya atvāṣṭra mahanam ityādyā ca vigrahavat tvena stutiḥ tatra eva upapadyate tathā api parama puruṣa arthasya apavargasya para brahma jñānāt anyatas  anavāpteḥ parama ānanda rūpasya mukhyasya amṛta tvasya ajaratvasya ca brahma rūpa avyabhicārāt adhyātma saṃbandha bhūmnaḥ ca parāci indre anupapatteḥ indrasya devatāyāḥ  ātmani pratibuddhasya carama dehasya vāmadevasya iva prarabdha vipāka karma āśaya mātram bhogena kṣapayataḥ  brahmaṇa eva sarvam etad kalpata iti vigrahavat indri jīva prāṇa vāyu parityāgena brahma eva atra prāṇa śabdam pratīyata iti pūrva pakṣa abhāvāt anārabhyam etad iti atra ucyate ayaḥ  vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaiḥ saha hi etavasmin śarīre vasataḥ saha utkrāmataḥ iti yasya eva prāṇasya prajñā ātmana upāsya tvam uktam tasya eva prāṇasya prajñā ātmanā saha utkramaṇam ucyate na ca brahmaṇi abede dvicanam na sahabhāvaḥ na ca utkramaṇam tasmāt vāyuḥ eva prāṇaḥ jīvaḥ ca prajñā ātmā saha pravṛtti nivṛttyā bhaktyā ekatvam anayoḥ upacaritam ayaḥ  vai prāṇaḥ ityādina ānanda amara ajara apahata pāpmatva ādayaḥ ca brahmaṇi prāṇe bhaviṣyanti tasmāt yathāyogam traya eva atra upāsyāḥ na ca eṣa vākya bhedaḥ  doṣam āvahati vākya artha avagamasya padārtha avagama pūrvaka tvāt padārthānām ca uktena mārgeṇa svātantryāt  tasmāt upāsya bhedāt upāsā traividhyam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu satyam padārtha avagama upapāyaḥ  vākya artha vagamaḥ na tu padārtha avagama parāṇi eva padāni api tu eka vākya artha avagama parāṇi tam eva tu ekam vākya artham padārtha avagamam antareṇa na śaknuvanti kartum iti antarā tad artham eva tam api avagamayanti tena padāni viśiṣṭa eka artha avabodhana svarasāni eva bala badbādhaka upanitān nāna artha bodha para tām nīyante yathā āhuḥ asaṃbhavati eka vākya tve vākya bhedaḥ ca na iṣyate iti tena yathā upāṃśu yāja vākye jāmitā doṣa upakrame tad pratisamādhāna upasaṃhāre ca eka vākya tvāya aprajāpatuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ityādayaḥ  na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintu artha vādā iti nirṇītam tathā ihāmām evi vijānīhi iti upakramya aprāṇaḥ  asmi prajñā ātmā iti uktvā ante asa prāṇa eva prajñā ātma ānandaḥ  ajaraḥ  amṛtaḥ iti upasaṃhārāt brahmaṇi eka vākyatva avagatau satyām jīva mukhya prāṇa liṅge api tad anuguṇa tayā netavye anyathā vākya bheda prasaṅgāt  yad punar bheda darśanam asaha hi etau iti tad jñāna kriyā śakti bhedena buddhi prāṇayoḥ pratyagātma upādhi bhūtayoḥ nirdeśaḥ pratyagātmānam eva upalakṣayitum ata eva upalakṣyasya pratyagātma svarūpasya abhedam upalakṣaṇam bhedena upalakṣayati aprāṇa eva prajñā ātmā iti atasmāt ananyathā siddhi brahma liṅga anusārātaḥ eka vākya balāt prāṇa jīva liṅga upapādanam iti saṃgrahaḥ na brahma vākyam bhavitum arhati iti na eṣa saṃdarbhaḥ  brahma vākyam eva bhavitum arhati iti kintu tathā ayogam kiñcid atra jīva vākyam kiñcid mukhya prāṇa vākyam kiñcid brahma vākyam iti arthaḥ prajñā sādhana prāṇa antara āśraya tvāt iti prāṇa antarāṇi indriyāṇi tāni hi mukhye prāṇe pratiṣṭhitāni jīva mukhya prāṇayoḥ anyatara iti upakrama mātram ubhau  iti tu pūrva pakṣa tattvam brahma tu dhruvam na brahma iti na brahma eva iti arthaḥ daśānām būta mātrāṇām iti pañca śabda ādayaḥ pañca pṛthivī ādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ tad evam sva matena vyākhyāya prācām vṛtti kṛtām matena vyācaṣṭe athavā iti pūrvam prāṇasya ekam upāsanam aparam jīvasya aparam brahmaṇa iti upāsana atraividhyena vākya bheda prasaṅgaḥ  dūṣaṇam uktam iha tu brahmaṇa ekasya eva upāsā traya viśiṣṭasya vidhānāt na vākya beda iti abhimānaḥ prācām vṛtti kṛtām tad etad ālocanīyam katham na vākya bheda iti yuktam asomena yajeta iti ādau soma ādi guṇa viśiṣṭa yāga vidhānam tad guṇa viśiṣṭasya apūrvasya vidhi viṣaya tvāt  iha tu siddha rūpam brahma na vidhi viṣayaḥ  bhavitum arhati abhāva artha tvāt bhāva arthasya vidhi viṣayatva niyamāt  vākya antarebhyaḥ ca brahma vagateḥ prāpta tvāt tad anūdyā prāpta upāsanā bhāva arthaḥ vidheyaḥ tasya ca bedāt vidhyāvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ  vākya bedaḥ  ati sphuṭa iti bāṣya kṛtā na udghāṭitaḥ sva vyākhyānena eva ukta praya tvāt iti sarvaṃvadātam iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām prathamasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ iti prathamasya adhyāyasya spaṣṭa brahma liṅga śruti samanvaya ākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ prathama adhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ atha dvitīyam pādam āripsuḥ pūrva uktam artham smārayati vakṣyamāṇa upayogi tayā prathame pāda iti uttaratra hi brahmaṇaḥ  vyāpitva nityatva ādayaḥ siddhavat hetu tayā upadekṣyante na ca ete sākṣāt pūrvam upapāditā iti katham hetu bhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭum iti ata uktam samasta jagat kāraṇasya iti yadi api ete na pūrvam kaṇṭhata uktāḥ tathā api brahmaṇaḥ  jagat janma ādi kāraṇatva upapadānena adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāyena upakṣiptā iti upapannaḥ teṣām uttaratra hetu bhāvena upanyāsa iti arthaḥ artha antara prasiddhānām ca iti yatra artha antara prasiddhā eva ākāśa prāṇa jyotiḥ ādayaḥ  brahmaṇi vyākhyāyante tad avyabhicāri liṅga śravaṇāt tatra kā eva kathā manaḥ maya ādīnām artha antaram prasiddhānām padānām brahma gocaratva nirṇayam prati iti abhiprāyaḥ pūrva pakṣa abhiprāyam tu agre darśayiṣyāmaḥ sarvatra prasiddha upadeśāt idam āmnāyate sarvam khalu idam brahmaḥ kutas  tad jalān iti yatas tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ  jāyata iti tad jam tasmin  ca līyata iti tallam tasmin  ca aniti sthiti kāle ceṣṭata iti tad anam jagat  tasmāt sarvam khalu idam jagat brahma atas  kaḥ kasmin rajyate kaḥ ca kam dveṣṭi iti rāga dveṣa rahitaḥ śāntaḥ san  upāsīta atha khalu kratu mayaḥ puruṣaḥ  yathākratuḥ asmin  loke puruṣaḥ  bhavati tathā itas  pretya bhavati sa kratum kurvīta manaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa śarīra  ityādi tatra saṃśayaḥ kim iha manaḥ mayatva ādibhiḥ dharmaiḥ śārīra ātma upāsya tvena upadiśyate āhosvit brahma iti kim tāvat prāptam śārīraḥ  jīva iti kutas  akratum ityādi vākyena vihitām kratu bhāva nām anūdya asarvam ityādi vākyam śama guṇe vidhiḥ tathā ca asarvam khalu idam brahma iti vākyam prathama paṭhitam api artha ālocanayā param eva tad artha upajīvi tvāt  evam ca saṃkalpa vidhiḥ prathamaḥ  nirviṣayaḥ sanna paryavasyan viṣaya
