apekṣaḥ svayam anirvṛttaḥ  na vidhi antareṇa upajīvitum śakyaḥ anupapadāka tvāt tasmāt śāntatā guṇa vidhānāt pūrvam eva amanaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa śarīraḥ ityādibhiḥ viṣaya upanāyakaiḥ saṃbadhyate manaḥ mayatva ādi ca kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta ātmanaḥ  jīvātmana eva nirūḍham iti jīvātmanā upāsyena uparakta upāsanā na paścāt  brahmaṇā saṃbaddhum arhati utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa avarodhāt  na ca asarvam khalu idam iti vākyam brahma param api tu śama hetuvat nigadārtha vādaḥ śānta tā vidhi paraḥ aśūrpeṇa juhoti atena hi annam kriyate itivat  na ca anya parāt api brahma apekṣita tayā svīkriyata iti yuktam manaḥ mayatva ādibhiḥ dharmaiḥ jīve su prasiddhaiḥ jīva viṣaya samarpaṇena anapekṣita tvāt  sarva karmatva ādi tu jīvasya paryāyeṇa bhaviṣyati evam ca aṇīyaḥ tvam api upapannam paramātmanaḥ tu aparimeyasya tad anupapattiḥ prathama avagatena ca aṇīyaḥ tu ena jyāyaḥ tvam tad anuguṇa tayā vyākhyeyam vyākhyām ca bhāṣya kṛtā evam karma kartṛ vyapadeśaḥ saptamī praṇama anta tā ca abhede api jīvātmani kathañcid bheda upacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivat draṣṭavyā aetat brahma iti ca jīva viṣayam jīvasya api deha ādi bṛṃhaṇa tvena brahmā tvāt  evam satya saṃkalpa tvāt ayaḥ  api paramātma vartinaḥ  jīve api saṃbhavanti tad avyatirekāt  tasmāt jīva eva upāsya tvena atra vivakṣitaḥ na paramātmā iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate asamāsaḥ sarva nāma arthaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭam apekṣate tad hita arthaḥ  api sāmānyam na apekṣāyā nivartakaḥ tasmāt apekṣitam brahma grāhyam anya parāt api tathā ca satya saṃkalpa prabhṛtīnām yathārtha tā bhavet etad evam yadi prāṇa śarīra  ca sarva nāma artham saṃprāpya tad abhidhānam paryavasyet  tatra manaḥ maya padam paryamasita abhidhānam tad abhidhāna paryavasānāya alam tad eva tu manaḥ vikāraḥ  vā manaḥ pracuram vā kimartham iti adya api na vijñāyate tad yatra eṣa śabdaḥ samaveta arthaḥ  bhavati sa samāsa arthaḥ na ca eṣa jīva eva samavetā athaḥ na brahmaṇi iti tasya aaprāṇaḥ  hi amanāḥ ityādibhiḥ tad viraha pratipādanāt iti yuktam tasya api sarva vikāra kāraṇa tayā vikārāṇām ca sva kāraṇāt abhedāt teṣām ca manaḥ matayā brahmaṇaḥ tad kāraṇasya manaḥ mayatva upapatteḥ syāt etad  jīvasya sākṣāt manaḥ mayatva ādayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu tad dvārā tatra prathamam dvārasya buddhi stha tvāt tad eva upāsyam astu na punar jaghanyam brahma brahma liṅgāni ca jīvasya brahmaṇaḥ  abhedāt jīve api upapatsyante tad etad atra saṃpradhāryam kim brahma liṅgaiḥ jīvānām tad abhinnānām astu tadvat tā tathā ca jīvasya manaḥ mayatva ādibhiḥ prathamam avagamāt tasya eva upāsya tvam uta na jīvasya brahma liṅgavat tā tad abhinnasya api jīva liṅgaiḥ tu brahma tadvata tathā ca brahma liṅgānām darśanāt  teṣām ca jīve anupapatteḥ brahma eva upāsyam iti vayam tu paśyāmaḥ asamāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayaḥ  rūpavān bhavet ṣa viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyam na rūpavat  samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatva ādinā rajjū rūpavatī na tu rajjū rūpeṇa abhigamyatva ādinā bhujaṅgaḥ  rūpavān tadā bhujaṅgasya eva abhāvāt kim rūpavat  bhujaṅga daśāyām tu na na asti vāstavī rajjuḥ tad iha samāropita jīva rūpeṇa vastu sat brahma rūpavat yujyate na tu brahma rūpaiḥ nityatva ādibhiḥ jīvaḥ tadvān bhavitum arhati tasya tadānīm asaṃbhavāt tasmāt brahma liṅga darśanāt jīve ca tad asaṃbhavāt brahmā eva upāsyam na jīva iti siddham etad upalakṣaṇaṇāya ca asarvam khalu idam brahma iti vākyam upanyastam iti yadi api apauruṣeya iti śāstra yoni tve api īśvarasya pūrva pūrva sṛṣṭi racita saṃdarbha apekṣa racana tvena asvātantryāt apauruṣeyatva abhidhānam tathā ca asvātantryeṇa vivakṣā na asti iti uktam parigraha parityāgau ca upādana anupādāne ukte na tu upādayeya tvam eva anyathā uddeśya tayā anapapādeyasya graha ādeḥ avivakṣita tvena camasādau  api saṃmārga prasaṅgāt  tasmāt anupādeya tve api graha uddeśya tayā parigṛhītaḥ  vivakṣitaḥ tad gatam tu eka tvam avacchedaka tvena varjitam avivakṣitam icchā anicche ca bhaktitaḥ tad idaktam veda vākyatāt paryātātparyābhyām avagamyete iti yad param veda vākyam tad tena upāttam vivakṣitam atatpareṇa ca anupāttam avivakṣitam iti arthaḥ yathā satya saṃkalpa tvāt ayaḥ  brahmaṇi upapadyante evam śārīre api upapatsyante śārīrasya brahmaṇaḥ  abhedāt  śārīra guṇā iva manaḥ maya tvāt ayaḥ  brahmaṇi ityata āha sūtra kāraḥ anupapatteḥ tu na śārīraḥ yad tad avocāma samāropya dharmāḥ samāropa viṣaye saṃbhavanti na tu viṣaya dharmāḥ samāropya iti tasyeta utthānam atra āha ca udakaḥ kaḥ punar ayam śārīraḥ  nāma iti na tāvat bheda pratiṣedhāt bheda vpadeśāt ca bheda abhedau  ekatra tāttvikau bhavitum arhataḥ  virodhāt iti uktam tasmāt ekam iha tāttvikam atāt tvikam ca itarat  tatra paurvāparyeṇa advaita pratipādana para tvāt vedāntānām dvaita grāhiṇaḥ ca māna antarasya abhāvāt tad bādhanāt ca tena advaitam eva parama arthaḥ tathā ca aanupapatteḥ tu ityādya saṃgata artham iti arthaḥ pariharati satyam eva etad  para eva ātmā deha indriya manaḥ buddhi upādhibhiḥ avicchidyamānaḥ  bālaiḥ śārīra iti upacaryate anādya vidyā avaccheda labdha jīva bhāvaḥ para eva ātmā svatas  bhedena avabhāsate tādṛśām ca jīvānām avidyā na tu nirūpa adhinaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ na ca avidyāyām satyām jīvātma vibhāgaḥ sati ca jīva ātma vibhāge tad āśrayā avidyā iti anyonya āśrayam iti sāṃpratam anādi tvena jīva avidyayoḥ bīja aṅkuravat anava kḷpteḥ ayogāt  na ca sarvajñasya sarva śakteḥ ca svatas  kutaḥ akasmāt saṃsāritā yaḥ  hi paratantraḥ saḥ  anyena bandhana āgāre praveśyeta na tu svatantra iti vācyam na hi tad bhāgasya jīvasya saṃpratitanī bandhana āgāra praveśitā yena anuyujyeta kintvi manādiḥ pūrva pūrva karma avidyā saṃskāra nibandhanā na anuyogam arhati na ca etāvatā īśvarasya anīśa tā na hi upakaraṇa ādi apekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryam vihanti tasmāt yad kiñcet i tad api iti viśeṣāt iti vaktavye vaiśeṣya abhidhānam ātyantikam viśeṣam pratipādayitum tathā hi avidyā kalpitaḥ sukha ādi saṃgaḥ  avidyā ātmanaḥ  eva yujyate na tu nirmṛṣṭa nikhila avidyā tadvāsanasya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvasya paramātmana iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham attā carācara grahaṇāt kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate yasya brahma ca kṣatram ca ubhe bhavata odamaḥ mṛtyuḥ yasya upaseta canam ka itthā veda yatra sa iti atra cādanīya audāna upasecana sīcitaḥ kaścid attā pratīyate attṛ tvam ca bhoktṛtā vā sa harntṛtā vā syāt  na ca prastutasya paramātmanaḥ  bhoktṛtā asti aana śrannanyaḥ  aabhicākaśīti iti śrutyā bhoktṛta apratiṣedhāt jīvātmanaḥ ca bhoktṛtā vidhānāt atayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādvatti iti tad yadi bhoktṛtva mattṛ tvam tatas  mukta saṃśayam jīva ātmā eva pratipattavyaḥ brahma kṣatra ādi ca asya kārya kāraṇa saṃghātaḥ  bhoga āyatana tayā vā sākṣāt vā saṃbhavati bhogyam atha tu saṃhartṛ tā bhoktṛtā tatas trayāṇām agni jīva paramātmanām praśna upanyāsa upalabdheḥ saṃhartṛ tvasya aviśeṣāt bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim attā agniḥ āhaḥ jīva uta ahaḥ paramātmā iti tatra odanasya bhogya tvena loke prasiddheḥ bhoktṛ tvam eva prathamam buddhau viparivartate caramam tu saṃhartṛ tvam iti bhoktā eva āttā tathā ca jīva eva ana jāyate mriyate iti ca tasya eva stutiḥ yadi tu saṃhāra kāle api saṃskāra mātreṇa tasya avasthānāt durjñāna tvam ca tasya sūkṣma tvāt  tasmāt jīva eva atta iha upāsyata iti prāptam yadi tu saṃhartṛtva mattṛ tvam tathā api agnirattā aagniḥ anna ādaḥ iti śruti prasiddhibhyām evam prāptā ibhidhīyate atta atra paramātmā kutas  carācara grahaṇāt aubhe yasya udanaḥ iti amṛtyuḥ yasya upasecanam iti ca śrūyate tatra yadi jīvasya bhoga āyatana tayā tad sādhana tayā ca kārya kāraṇa saṃghātaḥ sthitaḥ na tarhi edanaḥ na hi odanaḥ  bhoga āyatanam na api bhoga sādhanam api tu bhogyaḥ na ca bhoga āyatanasya bhoga sādhanasya vā bhogya tvam mukhyam na ca atra mṛtyuḥ upasecana tayā kalpyate na ca jīvasya kārya kāraṇa saṃghātaḥ  brahma kṣatra ādi rūpaḥ  bhakṣyaḥ kasyacid krūra sattvasya vyāghra ādeḥ kaścid bhavet na tu sarvathā sarva jīvasya tena brahma kṣatra viṣayam api sarva jīva sya āttṛ tvam na vyāpnoti kim aṅga punar mṛtyu upasecana vyāptam carācaram na ca odana padāt prathama avagata bhogyatva anurodhena yathāsaṃbhava mattṛ tvam yojyata iti yuktam na hi odana padam śrutyā bhogya tvam āha kintu lakṣaṇayā na ca lākṣaṇika bhogyatva anurodhena amṛtyuḥ yasya upasecanam iti abrahma ca kṣatram ca iti ca śrutī saṃkocam arhataḥ na ca brahma kṣatre eva atra vivakṣite mṛtyu upasecanena prāṇa bhṛt mātra upasthāpanāt prāṇiṣu pradhāna tvena ca brahma kṣatra upanyāsasya upapatteḥ anartha tvāt ca tathā ca carācara saṃhartṛ tvam paramātmana eva na agneḥ na api jīvasya tathā ca ana jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit iti prakṛtasya na hānam bhaviṣyati aka itthā veda yatra saḥ iti ca durjñāna tā upapatsyate jīvasya tu sarva loka prasiddhasya na durjñāna tā tasmāt attā paramātmā eva iti siddham guhām praviṣṭau  ātmānau hi tad darśanāt  saṃśayam āha tatra iti pūrva pakṣe prayojanam āha yadi buddhi jīvau  iti siddhānte prayojanam āha atha jīva paramātmanau  iti autsargikasya mukhya tā balāt pūrva siddhānta pakṣā saṃbhavena pakṣa antaram kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayam ākṣipati atra ahākṣeptā iti ṛtam satyam avaśyaṃbhāvi iti yāvat  samādhatte atra ucyata da iti adhyātma adhikārāt anyau tāvat pāta ārāva śakyau kalpayitum tad iha buddheḥ acaitanyena paramātmanaḥ ca pibat śabdaḥ  lakṣayan su ārtam aja hanni carecara yukta pibada pibat paraḥ  bhavati iti arthaḥ astu vā mukhya  eva tathā api na doṣa iti āha yad vā iti svātantrya lakṣaṇam hi kartṛ tvam tad ca pātuḥ iva pāyayituḥ api asti iti saḥ  api kartā ata eva ca āhuḥ ayaḥ kārayati sa karoti eva iti evam karaṇasya api svātantrya vivakṣayā kathañcid kartṛ tvam yathā kāṣṭhāni pacanti iti tasmāt mukhya tve api avirodha iti tad evam saṃśayam samādhāya pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti buddhi kṣetrajñau  iti aniyata ādhāra tā buddhi vasaṃbhavinī na hi kleśāt kalpayitum yuktā sarvage parama ātmani na ca pibantau  itivat praviṣṭa padam api lākṣaṇikam yuktam sati mukhya artha tve lākṣaṇikā arthatva ayogāt buddhi jīvayoḥ ca guhā praveśa upapatteḥ apica asukṛtasya loke iti sukṛta loka vyavasthānena karma gocara an atikrama uktaḥ buddhi jīvau ca karma gocaraṃmanatikrāntau jīvaḥ  hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiḥ ca bhoga sādhana tayā dharmasya gocare sthitau na tu brahma tasya tad āyatta tvāt kiñca chāyā tapau  iti tamaḥ prakāśau  uktau tatra api prete vicikitsā apanuttaye buddheḥ bhedena para lokī jīvaḥ  darśanīya iti buddhiḥ ucyate evaṃprāptā ibhidhīyate aṛta pānena jīvātmā niścitaḥ  asya dvitīya tā brahmaṇā eva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā prathamam sa dvitīya tve brahmaṇā avagate sati guhā āśraya tvam caramam vyākhyeyam avirodhataḥ gauḥ sa dvitīya iti ukte sajātīyena eva gavā antareṇa avagamyate na tu vijātīyena āśva ādinā tad iha cetanaḥ jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanā antareṇa eva brahmaṇā sa dvitīyaḥ pratīyate na tu acetanayā virūpayā buddhyā tad evam aṛtam pibantau iti atra prathamam avagate brahmaṇi tad anurodhena caramam guhā āśraya tvam śālagrāme hariḥ itavat vyākhyeyam bahulam hi guhā āśraya tvam brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ tad idam uktam tad darśanāt iti tasya brahmaṇaḥ  guhā āśraya tvasya śrutiṣu darśanāt iti evañca prathama avagata brahma anurodhena sukṛta loka varti tvam api tasya lakṣaṇayā chatri nyāyena gamayitavyam chāyā ātapa tvam api jīvasya avidyā āśraya tayā brahmaṇaḥ ca śuddha prakaśa svabhāvasya tad anāśraya tayā mantavyam imam eva nyāyam advā suparṇā iti atra api udāharaṇe kṛtvā acintayā yojayati eṣa eva nyāya iti atra api kim buddhi jīvau uta jīva paramātmānau  iti saṃśaṭya karaṇa rūpāyāḥ  api buddheḥ edhāṃsi pacanti itivat kartṛtva upacāra abuddhi jīvau  iha pūrva pakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam siddhāntaḥ ca bhāṣya kṛtā sphoritaḥ tad darśanāt iti ca asamāne vṛkṣe puruṣaḥ  nimagnaḥ iti atra mantre na khalu mukhye kartṛ tve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtva upacāraḥ  yukta iti kṛtvā acintām udghāṭayati apara āha sattvam buddhiḥ śaṅkate sattva śabda iti siddhānta artham brāhmaṇam vyācaṣṭa iti arthaḥ nirākaroti tad na iti yena svapnam paśyati iti yena iti karaṇam upadiśati tatas ca bhinnam kratāram kṣetrajñam yaḥ  ayam śārīra upadraṣṭā iti astu tarhi asya adhikaraṇasya pūrva pakṣe eva brāhmaṇa arthaḥ vacana avirodhe nyāyasya ābhāsa tvāt ityata āha na api asya adhikaraṇasya pūrva pakṣam bhajata iti evam hi pūrva pakṣam asya bhajeta yadi hi kṣetratre saṃsāriṇi paryavasyeta tasya tu brahma rūpa tāyām paryavasyanna pūrva pakṣam api svīkaroti iti arthaḥ apica tau  etau sattva kṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi raja ādhvaṃsata iti rajaḥ  avidyā na adhvaṃsanam saṃśleṣam evaṃvidi karoti iti etāvatā eva vidyā upasaṃhārāt jīvasya brahma ātma tā aparata asya lakṣyata iti āha tāvatā ca iti cedayati katham punar iti nirākaroti ucyate na iyam śrutiḥ iti anaśnan jīvaḥ  brahma abhicāka śīti iti ukte śaṅkate yadi jīvaḥ  brahma ātmanā na aśnāti katham tarhi anmin bhoktṛtva avagamaḥ caitanya samāna adhikaraṇam hi bhoktṛ tvam avabhāsata iti tad nirāsāya āha śrutiḥ atayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādvatti iti etad uktam bhavati na idam bhoktṛ tvam jīvasya tattvataḥ api tu buddhi sattvam mukha ādiḥ upa pariṇatam citi  chāyā pattyā upapanna caitanyam iva bhuṅkte na tu tattvataḥ  jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte tad etad adhyāsa ābhāṣye kṛta vyākhyānam tad anena kṛtvā cinta udghāṭitā antara upapatteḥ nanu aantaḥ tad dharma upadeśāt iti anena eva etad gata artham santi khalu atra api amṛtatva abhaya tvāt ayaḥ  brahma dharmāḥ pratibimba jīva devatā su asaṃbavinaḥ tasmāt brahma dharma upadeśāt brahma eva atra vivakṣitam sākṣāt ca brahma śabda upādānāt  ucyate aeṣa dṛśyata iti etad pratyakṣer athe prayujyate parokṣam brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate upakrama vaśāt pūrvam itareṣām hi varṇanam kṛtam nyāyena yena eva sa khalu atra anuṣajyate aṛtam pibantau iti atra hi jīva paramātmānau prathama m anagatau  iti tad anurodhena guhā praveśa ādayaḥ paścāt avagatā vyākhyātāḥ tad vid ihā api aya eṣaḥ  akṣiṇi puruṣaḥ  dṛśyate iti pratyakṣa abhidhānāt prathamam avagate chāyā puruṣe tad anurodhena amṛtatva abhayatva ādayaḥ stutyā kathañcid vyākhyeyāḥ tatra ca amṛta tvam katipa yakṣaṇa avasthānāt abhaya tvam acetana tvāt  puruṣa tvam puruṣa ākāra tvāt ātma tvam kanīnikā āyatana tvāt  brahma rūpatva m ukta rūpa amṛtatva ādi yogāt evam vāmanī tvādayaḥ  api asya stutyā eva kathañcid netavyāḥ kam ca kham ca ityādi tu vākyam agnīnām na ācārya vākyam niyantum arhi aācāryaḥ tu te gatim vaktā iti ca gati antara abhiprāyam na tu ukta pariśiṣṭa abhiprāyam tasmāt chāyā puruṣa eva atra upāsya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃbhava mātreṇa tu jīva devate upanyaste bādhaka antara upadarśanāya ca eṣa dṛśyata iti asya atra abhāvāt aantaḥ tad dharma upadeśā diti anena nirākṛta tvāt  evam prāpta ucyate ya eṣa iti aaniṣpanna abhidhāne dve sarvanāma pade satī prāpya saṃnihitasya artham bhavetām abhidhātṛṇī saṃnihitāḥ ca puruṣa ātma ādi śabdāḥ te ca na yāvat sva artham abhidadhati tāvat sarva nāmabhyām na artha tuṣaḥ  abhidhīyata iti kutas tad arthasya aparokṣatā puruṣa ātma śabdau ca sarvanāma nirapekṣau svarasataḥ  jīve vā parama ātmani vā vartete iti na ca tayā uṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣa darśanam iti nirapekṣa puruṣa pada pratyāyita artha anurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśṭata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavam vyākhyeyam vyākhyātam ca siddhavat upādānam śāstra ādi apekṣaṃvid vid viṣayam prarocana artham viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdiḥ eva dṛḍha tayā pratyakṣavat uparyate praśaṃsā artham iti arthaḥ api ca tad eva caramam prathama anuguṇa tayā nīyate yad netum śakyam alpam ca iha tu amṛta tvāt ayaḥ  baha va śāśakyāḥ ca netum na hi sva satta akṣaṇa avasthāna mātram amṛta tvam bhavati tathā sati kim nāma na amṛtam syāt iti vyartham amṛta padam bhaya abhaye api cetana dharmau na acetane saṃbhavataḥ evam vāmanī tvādayaḥ  api anyatra brahmaṇaḥ  netumaśakyāḥ pratyakṣa vyapadeśaḥ ca upapāditaḥ tad idam uktam upapatteḥ iti aetat amṛtam abhayam etad brahma iti ukte syāt āśaṅkā nanu sarva gatasya īśvarasya kasmāt viśiṣeṇa cakṣuḥ eva sthānam upadiśyata iti tad pariharati śrutiḥ atat yadi api asmin sārpiḥ vā udakam vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati iti vartmanī pakṣa sthāne etad uktam bhavati nirlepasya īśvarasya nirlepam cakṣuḥ eva sthānam anurūpam iti tad idam uktam tathā parameśvara anurūpam iti saṃyat vāma ādi guṇa upadeśaḥ ca tasmin brahmaṇi kalpate ghaṭate samaveta artha tvāt pratibimba ādiṣu tu asaṃveta arthaḥ vāmanīyāni saṃbhajanīyāni śobhanīyāni puṇya phalāni vāmāni saṃyanti saṃgacchamānāni vāmāni anena iti saṃyadvāmaḥ paramātmā tad karaṇa tvāt puṇya phala utpatteḥ tena puṇya phalāni saṃgacchante sa eva puṇya phalāni vāmāni nayati lokam iti vāmanīḥ eṣa eva bhāmanīḥ bhāmānī bhānāni nayati lokam iti bhāmanīḥ tad uktam śrutyā atam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvam tasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti iti sthāna ādi vyapadeśāt ca āśaṅka uttaram idam sūtram āśaṅkām āha katham punar iti sthāninaḥ  hi sthānam mahat vṛṣṭam yathā yādasām abdhiḥ tad katham ati alpam cakṣuḥ adhiṣṭhānam paramātmanaḥ parama mahata iti śaṅkā arthaḥ pariharati atra ucyata iti sthānāni ādayaḥ  yeṣām te sthānāt ayaḥ  nāma rūpa prakarāḥ teṣām vyapadeśāt sarva gatasya eka sthāna niyamaḥ  na avakalpate na tu nānā sthāna tvam nabhasa iva nānā sūcī pāśa ādi sthāna tvam viśeṣataḥ tu brahmaṇaḥ tāni tāni upāsana āsthānāni iti taiḥ asya yuktaḥ  vyapadeśaḥ apica prakṛta anusārāt api brahma eva atra pratyetavyam na tu pratibimba jīva devatā iti āha sūtra kāraḥ sukha viśiṣṭa ābhādhānāt eva ca evam khalu upākhyāyate upakosalaḥ  ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryam uvāsa tasmācāryasya dvādaśa varṣaṇi agnīn upacacāra sa ca ācāryaḥ  anyān brahmacāriṇaḥ svādhyāyam grāhayitvā samāvartayāmāsa tam eva ekam upakosalam na samāvartayati sma jāyayā ca tad samāvartanāya arthitaḥ  api tad vacanam avadhīrya ācāryaḥ proṣitavān tatas  ati dūna māna samagni paricaraṇa kuśalam upakosalam upetya trayaḥ  agnayaḥ karuṇā para adhīna cetasaḥ śraddadhānāya asmai dṛḍha bhaktaye sametya brahma vidyā sūcire aprāṇaḥ  brahma kam brahma kham brahma iti atha upakosala uvāca vijānāmi aham prāṇaḥ  brahma iti sa hi sūtra ātmā vibhūtimat tayā brahma rūpa āvirbhāvāt brahma iti kintu kam ca kham ca brahma iti etad na vijānāmi na hi viṣaya indriya saṃparka jam sukham anityam loka siddham kham ca bhūta ākāśam acetanam brahma bhavitum arhati atha enam agnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ ayat vāva kam tad eva kham yad eva kham tad eva kam iti evam saṃbhūya uktvā pratyekam ca sva viṣayām vidyām ūcuḥ apṛthivī agniḥ annam ādityaḥ ityādanā punar ta enam saṃbhūya ūcuḥ eṣā somya te asmid vidyā pratyeka muktā sva viṣayā vidyā ātma vidyā ca asmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvam uktā prāṇaḥ  brahma kam kham brahma iti ācāryaḥ tu te gatim vaktā brahma vidyā iya muktā asmābhiḥ gati mātram tu avaśiṣṭam na uktam tad tu vidyā phala prāptaye jābālaḥ tava ācāryaḥ  vakṣyati iti uktvā agnaya uparemire evam vyavasthite ayat vāva kam tad eva kham yad eva kham tad eva kam iti etad vyācaṣṭe bhāṣya kāraḥ tatra khaṃśabda iti pratīka abhiprāyeṇa iti āśraya antara pratyayasya āśraya antare prakṣepaḥ pratīkaḥ yathā brahma śabdaḥ paramātma viṣayaḥ  nāma ādiṣu kṣipyate idam eva tad brahma jñeyam yad nāma iti tathā idam eva tad brahma yad bhūta ākāśam iti pratītiḥ syāt  na ca etad pratīka tvam iṣṭam laukikasya mukhasya sādhana pāracantryam kṣayiṣṇu tā ca āmayaḥ tena saha vartata iti sāmayam sukham tad evam vyatireke doṣa muktvā ubhaya anvaye guṇam āha ita careta viśeṣitau tu iti tad arthayoḥ viśeṣita tvāt śabdau  api viśeṣitau  ucyete sukha śabda samāna adhikaraṇaḥ  hi khaṃśabdaḥ  bhūta ākāśam artham parityajya brahmaṇi guṇogena vartate tādṛśā ca khena sukham viśiṣyamāṇam sāmayāt vyāvṛttam nirāmayam bhavati tasmāt upapannam ubhaya upādānam brahma śabda abhyāsasya prayojanam āha tatra dvitīya iti brahma padam kaṃpadasya upari prayujyamānam śiraḥ evam khaṃpadasya api brahma padam śiraḥ  yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoḥ te brahmaśirasī tayoḥ bhāvaḥ  brahmaśiraḥ tvam astu prastute kim āyātam iti ata āha tad evam vākya upakrama iti nanu agnibhiḥ pūrvam nirdiśyatām brahma aya eṣaḥ  akṣiṇi iti ācārya vākye apa tad eva anuvartanīyam iti tu kuta iti āha ācāryaḥ tu te gatim vaktā iti ca gati mātra abhidhānam iti yadi api ete bhinna vac tṛṇī vākye tathā api pūrveṇa vaktnā eka vākyatām gamite gati mātra abhidhānāt kim uktam bhavati tubhyam brahma vidyā asmābhirūpa diṣṭā tad vidaḥ tu gatiḥ na uktā tām ca kiñcid adhikam ādhyeyam pūrayitvā ācāryaḥ  vakṣyati iti tad anena pūrva asaṃbaddha artha antara vivakṣā vāritā iti atha evam agnibhiḥ upadiṣṭe proṣita ācāryaḥ kālena ājagāma āgataḥ ca vīkṣya upakosalam uvāca brahma vida iva te somya mukham prasannam bhāti kaḥ  anu tvām anuśaśāsa iti upakosalaḥ tu hrīṇaḥ  bhītaḥ ca kaḥ  nu mām anuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayi iti āpātatas  apajñāya nirbadhyamānaḥ  yathāvat agnīnām anuśāsanam avocat  tad upakṣutya ca ācāryaḥ su ciram kliṣṭa upakosale samupajāta daryārdra hṛdayaḥ pratyuvāca somya kila tubhyam agnayaḥ  na brahma sākalyena avocan tad aham tubhyam sākalyena vakṣyami tad anubhava māhātmyāt ayathā puṣpa kara palāśa āpaḥ  na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvida pāpam karma na śliṣyate iti evam uktavatī ācārya āha upakosalaḥ bravītu me bhagavān iti tasmai ha uvāca ācāryaḥ  arciḥ ādikān gatim vaktu manāḥ yad uktam agnibhiḥ prāṇaḥ  brahma kam brahma kham brahma iti tad paripūraṇāya aeṣaḥ  akṣiṇi puruṣaḥ  dṛśyate ityādi etad uktam bhavati ācāryeṇa ye sukham brahma akṣi sthānam saṃyat vāmam vāmanībhāmanīti evaṅguṇa kam prāṇa sahitam upāsate te sarve apahata pāpmānaḥ  anyat karma kurvantu mā vā akārṣuḥ arciṣam arciḥ abhimāninīm devatām abhisaṃbhavanti pratipadyante arciṣaḥ  aharahar devatām ahna āpūryamāṇa pakṣam śukla pakṣa devatām tatas  ṣaṣ māsān yeṣu māseṣu uttarām diśam eti savitā te ṣaṣ māsā uttarāyaṇam tad devatām pratipadyante tebhyaḥ  māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsara devatām tatas  ādityam ādityāt candramasam candramasaḥ  vidyutam tatra sthitān etān puruṣaḥ kaścid brahma lokāt avatīryāmānavaḥ  amānavyām sṛṣṭau bhavaḥ brahma loka bhava iti yāvat  sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etān satya loka stham kāryam brahma gamayati sa eṣa deva pathaḥ  devaiḥ arcira ādibhiḥ netṛbhiḥ upalakṣita iti devapathaḥ sa eva ca brahmaṇā gantavyena upalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ satya loka stham brahma imam mānavam manoḥ sargam kiṃbhūtam āvartam janma jarā maraṇa paunaḥ punyam āvṛttiḥ tad kartāvartaḥ  mānavaḥ  lokaḥ tam na āvartante tathā ca smṛtiḥ abrahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare parasya ante kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti param padam tad anena upākhyāna vyākhyānena śruta upaniṣad ka gati abhidhānāt ca iti api sūtram vyākhyātam anavasthiteḥ asaṃbhavāt ca na itaraḥ aya eṣaḥ  akṣiṇi iti nityavat śutam anitye chāyā puruṣe na avakalpate kalpanā gauravam ca asmin pakṣe prasajyata iti āha naca upāsanā kāla iti tathā vijñāna ātmanaḥ  api iti vijñāna ātmanaḥ  hi na pradeśe upāsanāni atra dṛṣṭa carī brahmaṇaḥ tu tatra śruta pūrvā iti arthaḥ miṣā bhiyā asmāt  brahmaṇaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham antaryāmya adhidaiva ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt asva karma upārjitam deham tena anyat ca niyacchati takṣa ādiḥ śarīraḥ tu na ātma antaryamitām bhajet  pravṛtti niyama lakṣaṇam hi kāryam cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ sva śarīra indriya ādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsya ādau dṛṣṭam na aśarīrasya brahmaṇaḥ  bhavitum arhati na hi jātu vaṭa aṅkuraḥ kuṭaja bījāt jāyate tad anena ajanmādyasya yatas iti et api ākṣiptam veditavyam tasmāt paramātmanaḥ śarīra indriya ādiḥ ahahitasya antar yāmitva abhāvāt pradhānasya vā pṛthivī ādi abhimānavatyā devatāyāḥ  vāṇim ādya aiśvarya yoginaḥ  yoginaḥ  vā jīva ātmanaḥ  vā antaryāmitā syāt  tatra yadi api pradhānasya adṛṣṭatva aśru tatva amatatva vijñāta tvāni santi tathā api tasya acetanasya draṣṭṛtva śrotṛ tvam anṛtva vijñātṛ tvānām śrutānām abhāvāt anātma tvāt ca aeṣa ta ātmā iti śruteḥ anupapatteḥ na pradhānasya antaryāmitā yadi api pṛthivī ādi abimāninaḥ  devasya ātma tvam asti adṛṣṭatva ādayaḥ ca saha dṛṣṭṛtva ādibhiḥ upapadyante śarīra indriya ādi yogāt ca apṛthivī eva yasya āyatanam agniḥ lokaḥ  manaḥ  jyotiḥ ityādi śruteḥ tathā api tasya pratiniyata niyamanāt  ayaḥ sarvan  loka an antaraḥ  yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni antaraḥ  yamayati iti śruti virodhāt anupapatteḥ yogī tu yadi api loka bhūta viśatayā sarvān  lokān sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantum arhati tatra tatra anekavidha deha indriya ādi nirmāṇena asa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati ityādi śrutibhyaḥ tathā api ajagat vyāpāra varjam prakaraṇāt iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāra viṣaye vidyā siddhānām vyāpāra bhāvāt saḥ api na antaryāmī tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt jīva eva cetanaḥ deha indriya ādimān dṛṣṭṛtva ādi saṃpannaḥ svayam adṛśya ādiḥ sva ātmani vṛtti virodhāt  amṛtaḥ ca deha indriya ādi nāśe api anāśāt  anyathā muṣmika phala upabhoga abhāvena kṛta vipraṇāśa akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅgāt  aya ātmani tiṣṭhan iti ca abhede api kathañcid bheda upacārāt asa bhagavaḥ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni itivat  ayam ātmā na veda iti ca sva ātmani vṛtti virodha abhiprāyam ayasya ātmā śarīram ityādi ca sarvam asve mahimni itivat yojanīyam yadi punar ātmanaḥ  api niyantūḥ anyaḥ  niyantā bhavet  veditā vā tatas tasya api anya iti anavasthā syāt  sarva loka bhūta niyantṛ tvam ca jīvasya adṛṣṭa dvārā tad upārjitau hi dharma ajharmau niyacchata iti anayā dvārā jīvaḥ  niyacchati eka vacanam ca jāti abhiprāyam tasmāt jīvātmā eva antaryāmī na paramātmā iti evam prāpte abhidhīyate adeha indriya ādi niyame na asya deha indriya antaram tad karma upārjitam tad ced tad avidyā arjitam jagat  śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu tāvat atrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya sa vaśakteḥ parameśvarasya jagadyoni tvam avagamyate na tad pṛthagjana sādha āramya anumāna ābhāsena āgama virodhinā śakyam apahnotum tathā ca sarvam vikāra jātam tad avidyā śakti pariṇāmaḥ tasya śarīra indriya sthāne vartata iti yathāyatham pṛthivī ādi devatā ādi kārya karaṇaiḥ tān eva pṛthivī ādi devatā ādīn śaknoti niyantum na ca anavasthā na hi niyantṛ antaram tena niyamyate kintu yaḥ  jīvaḥ  niyantā loka siddhaḥ sa paramātmā eva upādhi avaccheda kalpita bhedaḥ tathā vyākhyāyata iti asakṛt āveditam tad kutaḥ niyantṛ antaram kutas ca anavasthā tathā ca anānyaḥ  atas  asti draṣṭā ityādyā api śrutaya upapanna arthāḥ paramārtha taḥ  antaryāmiṇaḥ  anyasya jīva ātmanaḥ  draṣṭuḥ abhāvāt  avidyā kalpita jīva param ātma bheda āśrayāḥ tu jñātṛ jñeya bheda śrutayaḥ pratyakṣa ādini pramāṇāni saṃsāra anubhavaḥ vidhi niṣedha śāstrāṇi ca evam ca adhidaiva ādiṣu ekasya eva antaryāmiṇaḥ pratyabhijñānam samañjasam bhavati ayaḥ sarvān  lokān ayaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni iti atra ya iti eka vacanam upapadyate amṛta tvam ca parama ātmani samañjasam na anyatra aya ātmani tiṣṭhan iti ādau ca abhede api bheda upacāra kleśaḥ  na bhaviṣyati tasmāt paramātmā antaryāmī na jīvādiḥ iti siddham pṛthivī ādi stanayitnvantam adhidaivam ayaḥ sarveṣu loka iṣu iti ādhilokam ayaḥ sarveṣu vedeṣu iti adhivedam ayaḥ sarveṣu yajña iṣu iti adhiyajñam ayaḥ sarveṣu bhūta iṣu iti adhibhūtam prāṇa ādi ātma antam adhyātmam saṃjñāyā aprasiddha tvāt iti upakrama mātram pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ darśana ādi kriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛtti virodhāt  kartari ātmani pravṛtti virodhāt iti arthaḥ adṛśyatva ādi guṇa kaḥ  dharma ukteḥ atha parā yayā tad akṣaram adhigamyate yad tad adreśyam buddhīndriya aviṣayaḥ agrāhyam karmendriya agocaraḥ agotram kāraṇa rahitam avarṇam brāhmaṇatva ādi hīnam na kaivalam indriyām āma viṣayaḥ indriyāṇi api asya na santi iti āha acakṣuḥ kṣotram iti buddhīndriyāṇi upalakṣayati apāṇi pādam iti karmendriyāṇi nityam sarva gatam su sūkṣmam durvijñāna tvāt  syāt etad  nityam sat kim pariṇāmi nityam na iti āha avyayam kūṭastha nityam iti arthaḥ pariṇāmaḥ  vivartaḥ  vā sarūpasya upalabhyate cit ātmanā tu sārūpyam jaḍānām na upapadyate jaḍam pradhānam eva atas  jagadyoniḥ pratīyatām yoni śabdaḥ  nimittam ced kutaḥ jīva nirākriyā pariṇāma mānasarūpā eva pariṇāmā dṛṣṭāḥ yathā ūrṇana abhilālā pariṇāmā lūtā tantavaḥ tad sarūpāḥ tathā vivartā api vartamāna sarūpā eva na virūpāḥ yathā rajju vivartā dhārā uragāt ayaḥ  rajju sarūpāḥ na jātu rajjvām kuñjara iti viparyasyanti na ca hema paṇḍi pariṇāmaḥ  bhavati lūtā tantuḥ tad kasya hetoḥ atyanta vairūpyāt  tasmāt pradhānam eva jaḍam jaḍasya jagataḥ  yoniḥ iti yujyate sva vikārān aśruta iti tad akṣaram ayaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vit iti ca akṣarāt parātparasya ākhyānam aakṣarāt paratas  paraḥ iti śruteḥ na hi parasmāt ātmanor avāc vikara jātasya ca parastāt pradhānāt ṛte anyat akṣaram saṃbhavati atas  yaḥ pradhānāt paraḥ paramātmā sa sarva vid  bhūta yoniḥ tu akṣaram pradhānam eva tad ca sāṃkhya abhimatam eva astu atha tathā prāmāṇika tvāt na tatra parituṣyati astu tarhi nāma rūpa bīja śakti bhūtam avyākṛtam bhūta sūkṣmam pradīyate hi tena vikāra ajitam iti pradhānam tad khalu jaḍam anirvācyam anirvācyasya jaḍasya prapañcasya upādānam yujyate sārūpyāt  nanu cit ātmā nirvācyaḥ virūpaḥ  hi saḥ acetanānām iti bhāṣyam sārūpya pratipādana param syāt etad  smārta pradhāna nirākaraṇena eva etad api nirākṛta prāyam tad kutaḥ asya śaṅkā iti ata āha apica pūrvatra adṛṭa tvāt iti sati bādhake asya ana āśrayaṇam iha tu bādhakam na asti iti arthaḥ tena atadaikṣata iti ādau  upacarya tām brahmaṇaḥ  jagadyonitā avidyā śakti āśraya tvena iha tu avidyā śakteḥ eva jagat yonitva saṃbhave na dvārāt vāribhāvaḥ  yayukta iti pradhānam eva atra vākye jagadyoniḥ ucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ atha yoni śabdaḥ  nimitta kāraṇa paraḥ tathā api brahmā eva nimittam na tu jīva ātmā iti vinigamanāyām na hetuḥ asti iti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ atra ucyate aakṣarasya jagadyoni bhāvam uktvā hi anantaram yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate tena nirdeśa sāmānyāt pratyabhijñānataḥ sphuṭam akṣaram sarva vid vi śvayaḥ niḥ na acetanam bhavet  akṣarāt parata iti śrutiḥ tu avyākṛte matā aśrute yad sva kāryāṇi tatas  avyākṛtam akṣaram na iha tirohitam iva asti kiñcid  yad tu sārūpya abāvān na cit ātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti addhā avivartaḥ tu prapañcaḥ  ayam brahmaṇā upariṇāminaḥ anādi vāsanā udbhūtaḥ  na sārūpyam apekṣate na khalu bāhya sārūpya nibandhana eva sarvaḥ  vibhrama iti niyama nimittam asti āntarāt api kāma krodha bhaya unmāda svapna ādeḥ mānasāt aparādhāt sārūpya anapekṣāt tasya tasya vibhramasya darśanāt  apica hetum iti vibhrame tad abhāvāt anuyogaḥ  yujyate anādya vidyā tad vāsanā pravāha patitaḥ tu na anuyogam arhati tasmāt  paramātma vivartatayā prapañcaḥ tad yoniḥ bhujaṅga iva rajju vivarta tayā tad yoniḥ na tu tad pariṇāma tayā tasmāt tad dharma sarva vidtva ukteḥ liṅgāt  ayat tad adreśyam iti atra brahmā eva upadiśyate jñeya tvena na tu pradhānam jīvātmā vā upāsya tvena iti siddham na kevalam liṅgāt api tu aparā vidyā iti samākhyānāt api etad eva pratipattavyam iti āha apica dve vidye iti liṅga antaram āha kasmin nu bhavata iti bhogā bhogyāḥ tebhyaḥ  vyatirikte bhoktari avacchinnaḥ hi jīvātmā bogyebhyaḥ  viṣayebyaḥ  vyatirikta iti tad jñānena na sarvam jñātam bhavati samākhyā antaram āha apica sa brahma vidyām sarva vidyā pratiṣṭhām iti plavā hi ete adṛḍhā yajña rūpā aṣṭādaśa iti plavante gacchanti asthāyina iti plavāḥ ata eva adṛḍhāḥ ke te yajña rūpāḥ rūpyante anena iti rūpam yajñaḥ  rūpam upādhiḥ yeṣām te yajña rūpāḥ te tu ṣoḍaśa ṛtvijaḥ ṛtu yajanena upādhinā ṛtvij śabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajña upādhaya ṛtvijaḥ evam yajamānaḥ  api yajña upādhiḥ eva evam patnī apatyuḥ na u yajña saṃyoge iti smaraṇāt  ta ete aṣṭādaśa yajña rūpāḥ yeṣu ṛtvij ādiṣu uktam karma yajñaḥ yad āśrayaḥ  yajña iti arthaḥ tad ca karma avaram svarga ādi avara phala tvāt apiyanti prāpnuvanti na hi dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antikrayoḥ iti ukta abhiprāyam viśeṣaṇa bhedav yapadeśābhyām ca na itarau viśeṣaṇam hetum vyācaṣṭe viśinaṣṭi hi iti śārīrāt iti upalakṣaṇam pradhānāt iti api draṣṭavyam bheda vyapadeśam vyācaṣṭe tathā pradhānāt api iti syāt etad  kim āgamikam sāṃkhya abhimatam pradhānam tathā ca bahu samañjasam syāt iti ata āha na atra pradhānam nāma kiñcid iti rūpa upanyāsāt ca tad etad para matena ākṣepa samādhānābhyām vyākhyāya sva matena vyācaṣṭe anye punar manyanta iti punar śabdaḥ  api pūrvasmāt viśeṣam dyotayan  asya iṣṭatām sūcayati jāyamāna varga madhya patitasya agni mūrdha ādi rūpavataḥ sati jāyamānat saṃbhave na akasmāt janakatva kalpanam yuktam prakaraṇam khalu etad viśaṣu ayoneḥ saṃnidhiḥ ca jāyamānānām saṃnidheḥ ca prakaraṇam balīya iti jāyamāna parityāgena viśvayoneḥ eva prakaraṇinaḥ rūpa abhidhānam iti ced  na prakaraṇinaḥ śarīra indriya ādi rahitasya vigrahavattva virodhāt  na ca etāvatā mūrdha ādi śrutayaḥ prakaraṇa virodhāt sva artha tyāgena sarva ātma tā mātra parā iti yuktam śruteḥ atyanta viprakṛṣṭa arthāt prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ tvāt  siddhe ca prakaraṇinā saṃbandhe jāyamāna madhya pāti tvam jāyamāna grahaṇe kāraṇam upanyastam bhāṣya kṛtā tasmāt hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇa ātmanā sarva bhūta antaraḥ kāryaḥ  nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam tad kim idānīm sūtram anavadheyam eva na iti āha asmin pakṣa iti prakaraṇāt  vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇa śabda viśeṣāt prācīna śāla satya yajña indradyumna jana buḍilāḥ sametya mīmāṃsām cakruḥ kaḥ  na ātmā kim brahma iti ātmā iti ukte jīvātmani pratyayaḥ mā bhūdata uktam kim brahma iti te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayam anadhigacchantaḥ kaikeya rājam vaiśvanara vidyauvidam upaseduḥ upasadya ca ūcuḥ ātmanam eva imam vaiśvānaram saṃprati adhyeṣi smarati tam eva naḥ brūhi iti upakramya dyu sūrvāyu ākāśa vāri pṛthivīnām iti ayam arthaḥ vaiśvānarasya bhagavataḥ  dyauḥ mūrdhā su tejāḥ cakṣuḥ ca viśva rūpaḥ sūryaḥ prāṇaḥ  vāyuḥ pṛthak vartma ātmā pṛthak  vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthak vartmā sa eva ātmā svabhāve yasya sa pṛthak vartma ātmā saṃdehaḥ  dehasya madhya bhāgaḥ sa ākāśaḥ  bahulaḥ sarva gata tvāt bastiḥ eva rayiḥ āpaḥ yatas  adbhyaḥ  annam annāt ca rayirdhanam tasmāt āpaḥ rayiḥ uktāḥ tāsām ca mūtrībhūtānām bastiḥ sthānam iti bastiḥ eva rayiḥ iti uktam pādau pṛthivī tatra pratiṣṭhānāt  tad evam vaiśvānara avayaveṣu dyu sūrya anila ākāśa jala avaniṣu mūrdha cakṣuḥ prāṇa saṃdeha basti pādeṣu ekaikakasmina vaiśvānara buddhyā viparīta tayā upāsakānām prācīna śāla ādīnām mūrdha pāta andhatva prāṇa utkramaṇa deha śīrṇa tā basti bheda pāda ślathī bhāva dūṣaṇaiḥ upāsanānām nindayā mūrdha ādi samasta bhāvam upadiśyāmnāyate ayaḥ tu etam evam prādeśa mātram abhivimānam iti sa sarveṣu lokeṣu dyupabhṛtiṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvara jaṅgameṣu sarveṣu ātmasu deha indriya manaḥ buddhi jīveṣu annam asti sarva saṃbandhi phalam āpnoti iti arthaḥ atha asya vaiśvānarasya bhoktuḥ bhojanasya agnihotra tā saṃpipādayiṣayā āha śrutiḥ ura eva vediḥ vedi sārūpyāt  lomāni barhiḥ āstīrṇa brahis sārūpyāt  hṛdayam gārhapatyaḥ hṛdaya anantaram manaḥ  anvāhārya pacanaḥ āsyam āhavanīyaḥ tatra hi tad annam hūyate nanu akaḥ na ātmā kim brahma iti upakrame ātma brahma śabdayoḥ parama ātmani rūḍha tvena tad uparaktāyām buddhau vaiśvānara agni ādayaḥ śabdāḥ tad anurodhena paramātmani eva kathañcid netum yujyante na tu prathama avagatau brahma ātma śabdau carama avagata vaiśvānara ādi pada anurodhena anyathayitum yujyete yadi api ca vājasaneyinām vaiśvānara vidyā upakrame avaiśvānaram ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda tam naḥ brūhi iti atra na ātma śabdau staḥ tathā api tad samāna artham chāndogya vākyam tad upakramam iti tena niścita arthena tad avirodhena vājasaneyi vākya arthaḥ  niścīyata niścita arthena hi aniścita artham vyavasthāpyateṣa na aniścita arthena niścita artham karmavat ca brahmā api sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam eva na ca dyu mūrdhatva ādikam jāñara bhūta agni devatā jīva ātmanām anyatamasya api saṃbhavati na ca sarva loka āśraya phala bhāgitā na ca sarva pāpma pradāha iti pāriśeṣyāt paramātmā eva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutas  punar iti am āśaṅkā śabda ādibhyaḥ  antar  pratiṣṭhānāt na iti ced iti ucyate tad eva upakrama anurodhena anyathā nīyate yad netum śakyam aśakyau ca vaiśvānara agni śabdau  anyathā netum iti śaṅkituḥ abhimānaḥ api ca antar pratiṣṭhata tvam ca prādeśa mātra tvam ca na sarva vyāpinaḥ  aparimāṇasya ca para brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavataḥ na ca prāṇa huti adhikaraṇa tā anyatra jāṭhara agneḥ yujyate na ca gārhapatya ādi hṛdaya ādi tā brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavinī tasmāt yathāyogam jāṭhara bhūta agni devatā jīvānām anyatamaḥ  vaiśvānaraḥ na tu brahma tathā ca brahma ātma śabdau  upakrama gatau  api anyathā netavyau mūrdhatva ādayaḥ ca stuti mātram athavā agni śarīrāyāḥ  devatāyāḥ  aiśvarya yogāt  dyu mūrdhatva ādaya upapadyanta iti śahkituḥ abhisaṃdhiḥ atra uttaram na kutas  tathā dṛṣṭi upadeśāt addhā caramam ananyathā siddham prathama avagatam anyathayati na tu atra caramatyān anyathā siddhiḥ pratīka upadeśena vā manaḥ  brahma itivat  tad upādhi upadeśena vā manaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa śarīraḥ  bāru upa itivat upapatteḥ vyutpattyā vā vaiśvānara agni śabdayoḥ brahma vacana tvāt na anyathā siddhiḥtha tathā ca brahma āśrayasya pratyayasya āśraya antare jāṭhara vaiśvānara āhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭha vaiśvānara upādhini vā brahmaṇi upāsye vaiśvānara dharmāṇām brahma dharmāṇām ca samāveśa upapadyate asaṃbhavāt iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe yadi ca iha parameśvaraḥ  na vivakṣyeta iti puruṣam api ca enam adhīyata iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe yadi ca kevala eva iti na brahma upādhitayā na api pratīkatayā iti arthaḥ na kevalam antar pratiṣṭhitam puruṣam api iti apeḥ arthaḥ ata eṣa yad puruṣa iti puruṣa m anūdya na vaiśvānaraḥ  vidhīyate tathā asati puruṣe vaiśvānara dṛṣṭi padiśyeta evam ca parameśvara dṛṣṭiḥ hi jāṭhare vaiśvānara iha upadaiśyata iti bhāṣyam virudhyeta śruti virodhaḥ ca asa yaḥ  ha etam evam agnim vaiśvānaram puruṣam puruṣa vidham puruṣe antar pratiṣṭhitam veda iti vaiśvānarasya hi puruṣatva vedanam atra anūdyate na tu puruṣasya vaiśvanaratva vedanam tasmāt  asa eṣaḥ  agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ  yad iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣa dṛṣṭeḥ upadeśa iti yuktam ata eva na devatā bhūtam ca ata eva etebyaḥ śruti smṛti avagatadyu mūrdhatva ādi saṃbandha sarva loka āśraya phala bhāgitva sarṃva pāpma pradāha ātma brahma brahma pada ukramebhyaḥ  hetubhya iti arthaḥ ayaḥ  bhānunā pṛthivīm dyām uta imām iti mantra varṇaḥ  api na kevala auṣṇya prakāśa vibhava mātrasya bhūta agneḥ amam īdṛśam mahimānam āhaga api tu brahma vikāra tayā tādrūpyeṇa iti bhāvaḥ sākṣāt api avirodham jaiminiḥ yad etad prakṛtam mūrdha ādiṣu cubuka anteṣu puruṣa avayaveṣu dyu prabhṛtīn pṛthivī paryantān  trailokya ātmanaḥ  vaiśvānarasya avayavān saṃpādya puruṣavidha tvam kalpitam tad abhiprāyeṇa idam ucyate apuruṣavidham puruṣe antar pratiṣṭhitam veda iti atra avayava saṃpattyā puruṣavidha tvam kārya kāraṇa samudāya rūpa puruṣa avayava mūrdha ādi cubuka antar pratiṣṭhānāt ca puruṣe antar pratiṣṭhita tvam samudāya madhya pati tvāt tad avayavānām samudadāyinām atra eva nidarśanam āha yathā vṛkṣe śākhām iti śākhā kāṇḍa mūla skandha samudāye pratiṣṭhitā śākhā tad madhya patitā bhavati iti arthaḥ samādhāna antaram āha athavā iti antar pratiṣṭha tvam mādhyāsthyam tena sākṣi tvam lakṣayati etad uktam bhavati vaiśvānaraḥ paramātmā carācara sākṣī iti pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ  anuśayam unmūlayati niścite ca iti viśva ātmaka tvāt  vaiśvānaraḥ pratyāgātmā viśveṣām vāyam naraḥ tad vikāra tvāt viśva prapañcasya viśve narā jīvā vā ātmānaḥ  asya tādātmena iti abhivyakteḥ iti āśmarathyaḥ sākalyena upalambha asaṃbhavāt upāsakānām anugrahāya anantaḥ  api parameśvaraḥ prādeśa mātram ātmanam abhivyanakti iti āha atimātrasya api iti atikrāntaḥ  mātrām parimāṇam atimātraḥ upāsakānām kṛte upāsaka artham iti yāvat  vyākhyā antaram āha pradeśeṣu vā iti saṃpatteḥ iti jaiminiḥ mūrdhānam upakramya cubu kāntaḥ  hi kāya pradeśaḥ prādeśa mātraḥ tatra eva trailokya ātmanaḥ  vaiśvānarasya avayavān saṃpādayan prādeśa mātram vaiśvānaram darśayati atra eva jābāla śruti saṃvādam āha sūtra kāraḥ āmananti ca enam asmin avimukte avidyā upādhi kalpita avacchede jīvātmani sa khalva vimuktaḥ tasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ paramātmā tādātmyāt  ata eva hi śrutiḥ aanena jīvena ātmanā iti avidyā kalpitam tu bhedam āśritya ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ varaṇā bhrūḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīrakamīm aṃsa ābhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām prathamasya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ iti prathama adhyāyasya upāsyabrahma vācaka aspaṣṭa śruti samanvaya ākhyaḥ  dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ prathama adhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ dyubhva ādi āyatanam sva śabdāt  iha jñeya tvena brahma upakṣipyate tatra apāravat tvena setu tvāt bhede ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayogataḥ dyubhva ādi āyatanam yuktam na amṛtam brahma karhicit  pārāvāram athya pātī hi setuḥ tābhyām avacchidyamānaḥ  jala vidhārakaḥ  loke dṛṣṭaḥ na tu bandhana hetu mātram haḍi nigāḍa ādiṣu api prayoga prasaṅgāt  na ca anavacchinnam brahma setu bhāvam anubhavati na sat brahma amṛtasya setuḥ iti yujyate na ca brahmaṇaḥ  anyat amṛtam asti yasya tad setuḥ syāt  na ca abhede ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayogaḥ  dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ tad idam uktam amṛtasya eṣa setuḥ iti śravaṇāt iti amṛtasya iti śrava māt iti yojanā tatra amṛtasya iti śravaṇāt iti viśabda tayā na vyākhyātam setuḥ iti śravaṇāt iti vyācaṣṭe pāravān iti tathā ca pāravati amṛta vyatirikte setau  anuśriyamāṇe pradhānam vā sāṃkhya pārikalpitam bhavet  tad  khalu sva kārya upahita maryāda tayā puruṣam yāvat agacchat bhavati iti pāravat  bhavati ca dyubhva ādi āyatanam tad prakṛti tvāt prakṛti āyatana tvāt ca vikārāmām bhavati ca ātmā ātma śabdasya svabhāva vacana tvāt  prakāśa ātmā pradīpa itivat  bhavati ca asya jñānam apavarga upayogi tad abhāve pradhānāt vivekena puruṣasya anavadhāraṇāt apavanu parga āpatteḥ yadi tu asmin pramāṇa abhāvena na parituṣyasi astu tarhi nāma rūpa bīja śakti bhūtam avyākṛtam bhūta sūkṣmam dyubhva ādi āyatanam tasmin prāmāṇike sarvasya uktasya upapatteḥ etad api pradhāna upanyāsena sūcitam atha tu sākṣāt śuti uktam dyubhvā adi āyatanam ādriyame tatas  vāyuḥ eva astu avāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇa āya ca lokaḥ paraḥ ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti iti śruteḥ yadi punar asya dyubhvā ādi āyatanasya sārvajñya śruteḥ atra api na parituṣyam i bhavatu tatas  hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtra ātmā dyubhva ādi āyatanam tasya hi kāryatvena pāravat tvam ca amṛtāt para brahmaṇaḥ  bhedaḥ ca ityādi sarvam upapadyate ayam api avāyunā vai gotama sūtreṇa iti śrutim upanyasyatā sūcitaḥ tasmāt ayam dyuparbhṛtīnām āyatanam iti evam prāpte abhidhīyate dyabhva ādi āyatanam param brahmā eva na pradhāna avyākṛta vāyu śārīra hiraṇgarbhāḥ kutas  sva śabdāt  adhāraṇāt vā amṛta tvasya sādhanāt vāsya setu tā pūrva pakṣe api mukhya arthaḥ setu śabdaḥ  hi na iṣyate na hi mṛd dāru mayaḥ  mūrtaḥ pārāvāra madhya vartī pāthasām vidhārakaḥ  loka siddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānam vā avyākṛtam vā vāyuḥ vā jīvaḥ  vā sūtra ātmā vā abhyupeyate kintu pāravat tā mātra paraḥ  lakṣaṇikaḥ setu śabdaḥ  abhyupeyaḥ saḥ  asmākam pāravat tau  arjam vidharaṇatva mātreṇa yoga mātra adrūḍhim parityajya pravartsyati jīvānām amṛtatva pada prāpti sādhana tvam vatma jñānasya pāravata eva lakṣayiṣyati amṛta śabdaḥ ca bhāva pradhānaḥ yathā advi ekayoḥ dvivacana eka vacane iti atra dvitva eka tve dvi eka śabda arthau anyathā dvi ekeṣu iti syāt  tad idam uktam bhāṣya kṛtā amṛtatva sādhana tvāt iti tathā ca amṛtasya iti ca setuḥ iti ca brahmaṇi dyubhva ādi āyatane upapatsyete atra ca sva śabdāt iti tantra uccaritatam ātma śabdāt iti ca sat āyatanā iti sat śabdāt iti ca brahma śabdāt iti ca sūcayati sarve hi ete asya sva śabdāḥ syāt etad  āyatana āyatana vbhāvaḥ sarvam brahma iti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam hiraṇyagarbhepi upapadyate tathā ca sa eva atra aḥ tu amṛta tvasya setuḥ iti āśaṅkya śruti vākyena sa avadhāraṇena uttaram āha tatra āyatana āyatanavat bhāva śravaṇāt iti vikāra rūpe anirvācya abhisaṃdhānam yasya abhisaṃdhānupuruṣasya sa tathā uktaḥ bheda prapañcam satyam abhimanyamāna iti yāvat  tasya apavādaḥ  doṣaḥ śrūyate mṛtyoḥ iti sarvam brahma iti tu iti yad sarvam avidyā āropitam tad sarvam parama artha brahma na tu yad brahma tad sarvam iti arthaḥ apara āha iti na atra dyubhvā ādi āyatanasya setunā ucyate yena pāravat tā syāt  kintu ajānatha iti yad jñānam kīrtitam yaḥ ca avācaḥ vimuñcatha iti vāc vimokaḥ tasya amṛtatva sādhana tvena setutā ucyate tad ca ubhayam api pāradā iva na ca prādhānyāt eṣa iti sarva nāmnā dyubhva ādi āyatanam ātmā eva parāmṛśyate na tu tad jñāna vāc vimocane iti sāṃpratam vāc vimocana ātma jñāna bhāvanayoḥ eva vidheya tvena prādhānyāt  ātmānaḥ tu dravyasya avyāpāra tayā avidheya tvāt  vidheyasya vyāpārasya eva yogyatayā guṇa u api parāmṛśyate mukta upasṛpyavyapadeśāt dyubhva ādi āyatanam prakṛtyā avidyā ādi doṣa muktaiḥ upasṛtyam vyapadiśyate abhijyate hṛdaya granthiḥ ityādinā tena tad  dyubhva ādi āyatana viṣayam eva brahmaṇaḥ ca mukta upasṛpya tvam ayadā sarve pramucyante iti ādau śruti antare prasiddham tasmāt mukta upasṛpya tvāt  dyubhva ādi āyatanam brahma iti niścīyate hṛdaya granthiḥ ca avidyā rāgāt veṣa bhaya mohāḥ mohaḥ ca viṣādaḥ śokaḥ param hiraṇyagarbha ādi avaram yasya tad brahma tathā uktam tasmin brahmaṇi yad dṛṣṭam darśanam tasmin  tad artham iti yāvat  yathā acarmaṇi dvīpinam hanti iti carma artham iti gamyate nāma rūpa āditya vidyā abhiprāyam kāmā ye asya hṛdi śritā iti kāmā iti avidyām upalakṣayati na anumānam atad śabdāt  na anumānam iti upalakṣaṇam na avyākṛtam iti api draṣṭavyam hetoḥ ubhayatra api sāmyāt  praṇabhṛt ca cena atad śabda tvam hetuḥ anakṛṣyate svayam ca bhāṣya kṛt atra hetum āha na ca upādhi paricchinnasya iti na samyak  saṃbhavati na añjasam iti arthaḥ bhogya tvena hi āyatana tvam iti kliṣṭam syāt etad  yadi atad śabdatva āt iti atra api hetuḥ anakraṣṭavyaḥ hanta kasmāt pṛthak yoga karaṇam yāvatā ana prāṇabhṛt anumāne iti eka eva yogaḥ kasmāt na kṛta iti ata āha pṛthak iti abheda vyapadeśāt ityādinā hi prāṇabhṛt eva niṣidhyate na pradhānam tad ca eka yoga karaṇe durvijñānam syāt iti prakaraṇāt  na khalu hiraṇyagarbha ādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvam jñātam bhavati kintu brahmaṇi eva iti sthiti adanābhyām ca yadi jīvaḥ  hiraṇyagarbhaḥ  vā dyubhva ādi āyatanam bhavet  tatas tad prakṛtyā aana śrannanyaḥ  aabhicākaśīti iti paramātma abhidhānam ākasmikam prasajyeta na ca hiraṇyagarbha udāsīnaḥ tasya api bhoktṛ tvāt na ca jīva ātmā eva dyubhva ādi āyatanam tathā sati sa eva atra kathyate tad kathanāya ca brahmā api kathyate anyathā siddhānte api jīva ātma kathanam ākasmikam syāt iti vācyam yatas  anadhigata artha avabodhana svarasena āmnāyena prāṇabhṛt mātra prasiddha jīva ātmadhi gamāya atyanta anavagatam alaukikam brahmā avabodhyata iti subhāṣitam yadā api paiṅgī upaniṣad kṛtena vyākhyānena iti tatra hi aana śrannanyaḥ  aabhicākaśīti iti jīva upādhi rahitena rūpeṇa brahma svabhāva udāsīnaḥ  abhoktā darśitaḥ tad artham eva acetanasya buddhi sattvasya apāramārthikam bhoktṛ tvam uktam tathā cetthaṃbhūtam jīvam kathayata anena mantra varṇena dyubhva ādi āyatanam brahmā eva kathitam bhavati upādhi avacchinnaḥ ca jīvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ  bhavati iti na pauṅgi brāhmaṇa virodha iti arthaḥ prapañca artham iti tad madhye na paṭhitam iti kṛtvā acintayā idam adhikaraṇam pravṛttam iti arthaḥ bhūmā saṃprasādāt adhi upadeśāt nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karma vidana ātma vittayā śocyam ātmānam manyamānaḥ  bhagavantam ātma jñam ājāna siddham mahā yoginam sanatkumāram upasasāda upasadya ca uvāc bhagavan anātma jña tā janita śoka sāgara pāram uttārayatu mām bhagavān iti tad upaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa anāma brahma iti upāstva iti ukte nāradena pṛṣṭam kiṃnāmnaḥ  asti bhūya iti tatra sanatkumārasya prativacanam avāgvāva nāmnaḥ  bhūyasī iti tad evam nārada sanatkumārayoḥ bhūyasī praśna uttare vāc indriyam upakramya manaḥ saṃkalpa citta dhyāna vijñāna bala anna toya vāyu sahita tedaḥ nabhaḥ smāra śā prāṇeṣu paryavasite kartavyā kartavya vivekaḥ saṃkalpaḥ tasya kāraṇam pūrva apara viṣaya nimitta prayojana nirūpaṇam cittam smaraḥ smaraṇam prāṇasya ca samasta kriyā kāraka phala bhedena pitṛ ādi ātma tvena ca ratha ara nābhidṛṣṭāntena sarva pratiṣṭhatvena ca prāṇa bhūyaḥtva darśinaḥ ativādi tvena ca nāma ādi prapañcādaśāntāt bhūyaḥ tvam uktvā āpṛṣṭa eva nāradena sanatkumāra eka granthena aeṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti satya ādīn kṛti paryanta anuktvā upadideśa asukham tu eva vijijñāsitavyam iti tad upaśrutya nāradena asukham tu eva bhagavaḥ  vijijñāse iti ukte sanatkumāraḥ ayaḥ  vai bhūmā tad sukham iti upakramya bhūmānam vyutpādayāṃbabhūva ayatra na anyat paśyati ityādinā tad idṛśe viṣaye vicāra ārabhyate tatra saṃśayaḥ kim prāṇaḥ  bhūmā syāt āhaḥ paramātmā iti bhāva bhavitroḥ tādātma vivakṣayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam saṃśayasya bīja m uktam bhāṣya kṛtā tatra aetasmin grantha saṃdarbhe yad uktāt bhūyasaḥ anyatas  ucyamānam tu tad bhūya ucyate praśna pūrvakam na ca prāṇāt  kim bhūya iti pṛṣṭam na api bhūmā vā asmāt bhūyān iti pratyuktam tasmāt prāṇa bhūyaḥtva abhidhāna anantaram apṛṣṭhena bhūmocyamānaḥ prāṇasya eva bhavitum arhati apica bhūma iti bhāvaḥ na bhavitāram āntareṇa śakyaḥ  nirūpayitum iti bhavitāram apekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasya ānantaryeṇa buddhi saṃnidhānāt tam eva bhavitāram prāpya nirvṛṇoti ayasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti atra ārti vārtam haviḥ yathā āhuḥ amṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇam iti na ca ātmanaḥ prakaraṇāt ātmā eva buddhaistha iti tasya eva bhūmā syāt iti yuktam sanatkumārasya anāma brahma iti upāstva iti pratīka upadeśa rūpeṇa uttareṇa nārada praśnasya api tad viṣaya tvena paramātma upadeśa prakaraṇasya anutthānāt atat viṣaya tve ca uttarasya praṣaśna uttarayoḥ vaiyadhi karaṇyena vipratipatteḥ aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt  tasmāt asati prakaraṇe prāṇasya anantaryāt tasya eva bhūma iti yuktam tad etad saṃśaya bījam darśayatā bhāṣya kāreṇa sūcitam pūrva pakṣa sādhanam iti na punaruktam na ca bhūyas bhūyas  praśnāt paramātmā eva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam prāṇa upadeśa anantaram tasya uparamāt  tad evam prāṇa eva bhūma iti sthite yad yad tad virodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tad tad anuguṇa tayā na iyam nītam ca bhāṣya kṛtā syāt etad  aeṣa tu vā ativadati iti tuśabdena prāṇa darśinaḥ ativādinaḥ  vyavacchidya satyena atila ādi tvam vadan katham prāṇasya bhūmānam abhidadhīta iti ata āha prāṇam eva tu iti prāṇa darśinaḥ ca ativādi tvam iti nāma ādya aśāntam atītya vadana śīla tvam iti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati na ayam tuśabdaḥ prāṇa ativāditvā dvayavacchinatti api tu tad ativādi tvam aparityajya pratyuta tad anukṛṣya tasya eva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇa manana śraddhā niṣṭha kṛtibhiḥ vijñānāya niścayāya satyena ativadati iti prāṇa vratam eva ativādi tvam ucyate tuśabdaḥ  nāma ādi ati vādi tvat vyavacchinatti na nāma ādya aśānta vādi ati vādi api tu satya prāṇa vādī ativāditi arthaḥ atra ca āgama ācārya upadeśābhyām satyasya śravaṇam atha āgama avirodhi nyāya niveśanam mananam matvā ca guru śiṣya sabrahmacāribhiḥ anusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvam śraddhatte śraddhā anantaram ca viṣaya antara darśī niraktaḥ tatas  vyāvṛttaḥ tattva jñāna abhyāsam karoti sā iyam asya kṛtiḥ prayatnaḥ atha tattva jñāna abhyāsa niṣṭhā bhavati yad anantaram eva tattva vijñānam anubhavaḥ prādurbhavati tad etad bāhyā api āhuḥ abhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jam yogi jñānam iti bhāvanā prakarṣasya prayantaḥ  niṣṭhā tasmāt jāyate tattva anubhava iti tasmāt prāṇa eva bhūma iti prāpte abhidhīyate aeṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti uktvā bhūmā ucyate tatra satya śabdaḥ parama arthe nirūḍha vṛttiḥ śrutyā parama artham āha parama arthaḥ ca paramātmā eva tatas  hi anyat sarvam vikāra jātam anṛtam kayācid apekṣayā kathañcid satyam ucyate tathā ca aeṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyena ativat iti iti brahmaṇaḥ  ativāditam śrutyā anya nirapekṣayā liṅga ādibhyaḥ  balīyasya avagamitam katham iva saṃnidhāna mātrāt śruti ādi apekṣāt ati durbalāt katham cit prāṇa niṣaya tvena śakyam vyākhyātum evam ca prāṇāt ūrdhvam brahmaṇi bhūtām avagamyamānaḥ  na prāṇa viṣayaḥ  bhavitum arhati kintu satyasya paramātmana eva evam ca anātma vida ātmānam vividiṣoḥ nāradasya praśne paramātmānam eva asmai vyākyāsyāmi iti abhisaṃdhimān sanatkumāraḥ sopāna ārohaṇa nyāyena sthūlāt ārabhya tad tad bhūma vyutpādana krameṇa bhūmānam ati durjñāna tayā parama sūkṣmam vyutpādayāmāsa na ca praśna pūrvatā pravāha patitena uttareṇa sarveṇa praśna pūrveṇa eva bhavitavyam iti niyamaḥ  asti iti ādi sugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpaditam vijñāna ādi sādhana paramparā manana śraddhā ādiḥ prāṇa antare ca anuśāsane tatāvat mātreṇa eva prakaraṇa samāpteḥ na prāṇasya anyāyat tatocyeta tad abhidhāne hi sa apekṣa tvena na prakaraṇam samāpyeta tasmāt na idam prāṇasya prakaraṇam api tu yad ā āyattaḥ prāṇaḥ tasya sa ca ātmā iti ātmana eva prakaraṇam śaṅkate prakarama anta iti prāṇa prakaraṇa samāptau  iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na sa bhagava iti saṃdaṃśa nyāyena hi bhrūma etad prakaraṇam sa ca udbhūmā prāṇaḥ prāṇasya etad prakaraṇam bhavet  tad ca ayuktam iti uktam na kevalam śruteḥ bhūma ātma tā paramātmanaḥ liṅgāt api iti āha sūtra kāraḥ dharma upapatteḥ ca yad api pūrva pakṣiṇā kathañcid nītam tad anubhāṣya bhāṣya kāraḥ  dūṣayati yaḥ  api asau suṣupta avasthāyām iti suṣupta avasthāyām indriya ādi asaṃyogya ātmā eva na prāṇaḥ paramātma prakaraṇāt  anyat ārtam vinaśvaram iti arthaḥ atirohita artham anyat  akṣaram ambara anta dhṛteḥ akṣara śabdaḥ samudāya prasiddhyā varṇeṣu rūḍhaḥ parama ātmani ca avayava prasiddhyā yaugikaḥ avayava prasiddheḥ ca samudāya prasiddhiḥ balīyasi iti varṇā eva akṣaram na ca varṇeṣu ākāśasya utatva prota tve na upapadyete sarvasya eva rūpa dheyasya nāma dheya ātmaka tvāt sarvam hi rūpadheyam nāmadheya saṃbhinnam anubhūyate gaurayam vṛkṣaḥ  ayam iti na ca upāya tvāt tad saṃbheda saṃbhavaḥ na hi dhūma upāyā bahni dhīrdhuma saṃbhinnam bahnim avagāhate dhūmaḥ  ayam bahniḥ iti kintu vaiyadhikaraṇyena dhūmāt vihniḥ iti bhavati tu nāmadheya saṃbhinnaḥ rūpa dheya pratyayaḥ ḍitthaḥ  am iti apica śabdān upāye api rūpa dheya pratyaye liṅga indriya janmani nāma saṃbhedaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt nāma saṃbhinnā pṛthivī ādayaḥ  ambara antā nāmnā gratitāḥ ca viddhāḥ ca nāmāni ca oṃkāra ātmakāni tad vyāpta tvāt atat yathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi saṃtṛṇṇāni evam oṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk iti śruteḥ ata oṃkāra ātmakāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ  ambara antā iti varṇā eva akṣaram na paramātmā iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate akṣaram paramātmā eva na tu varṇāḥ kutas  ambara anta dhṛteḥ na khalu ambara antāni pṛthivī ādīni varṇā dhārayitum arhanti kintu paramātmā eva teṣām paramātma vikāra tvāt  na ca nāmadheya ātmakam rūpadheyam iti yuktam svarūpa bhedāt  upāya bhedāt  artha kriyā bheda tathā hi śabdatva sāmānya ātmakāni śrotra grāhyaṇi abhidheya pratyaya artha kriyāṇi nāmadheyāni anubhūyante rūpadheyāni tu ghaṭa paṭa ādīni ghaṭatva paṭatva ādi sāmānya ātmakāni cakṣuḥ ādi indriya agrāhyāṇi madhu dhāraṇa prāvaṇa ādi artha kriyāṇi ca bhedena anubhūyante iti kutaḥ nāma saṃbhedaḥ na ca ḍitthaḥ  am iti śabda sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyayaḥ na khalu śabda ātmakaḥ  ayam piṇḍa iti anubhavaḥ kintu yaḥ  nānā deśa kāla saṃplutaḥ piṇḍaḥ saḥ  ayam saṃnihita deśa kāla iti arthaḥ saṃjñā tu gṛhīta saṃbandhaiḥ atyanta abhyāsāt piṇḍa ābhā ni veśinī eva saṃskāra udbodha saṃpāta āyātā smaryate yathā āhuḥ ayat saṃjñā smaraṇam tatra na tad api anya hetukam piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñām smārayitum kṣamaḥ saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇā api pratyakṣa tvam na bādhate saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpa ācchādana kṣamā iti na ca varṇa atirikte sphoṭa ātmani alaukike akṣara pada prasiddhiḥ asti loke na ca eṣa prāmāṇika iti upariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyate niveditam ca asmābhiḥ tattva bindau tasmāt śrotra grāhyāṇām varṇānām ambara anta dhṛteḥ anupapatteḥ samudāya prasiddhi bādhana avayava prasiddhyā paramātmā eva akṣaram iti siddham ye tu pradhānam pūrva pakṣayitvā anena sūtreṇa paramātmā eva akṣaram iti siddhāntayanti cairambara anta dhṛteḥ iti anena katham pradhānam nirākriyata iti vācyam atha na adhikaraṇatva mātram dhṛtiḥ tathā api ambara anta dhṛteḥ iti anarthakam etāvat vaktavyam akṣaram praśāsanāt iti etāvatā eva pradhāna nirākaṇa siddheḥ tasmāt varṇa akṣara tā nirākriyā eva asya arthaḥ na ca sthūla ādīnām varṇeṣu aprāpteḥ asthūlam ityādi niṣedha anupapatteḥ varṇeṣu śaṅkā eva na asti iti vācyam na hi avaśyam prāpti pūrvakā eva pratiṣedhā bhavanti aprāpteṣu api nitya anuvādānām darśanāt  yathā na antarikṣe na divi iti agni cayana niṣedha anuvādaḥ tasmāt  yad kiñcid etad  sā ca praśāsanāt  praśāsanam ājñā cetana dharmaḥ  na acetane pradhāne vāvyākṛte vā saṃbhavati na ca mukhya artha saṃbhave kūlam pipatiṣati itivat bhakta tvam ucitam iti bhāvaḥ anya bhāva vyāvṛtteḥ ca ambara anta vidharaṇa lasya akṣarasya īśvara agadyat anyat varṇā vā pradhānam vā vyākṛtam vā teṣām anyeṣām bhāvalaḥ anya bhāvaḥ tam atyantam vyavartayati śrutiḥ atadvā etad akṣaram gārgi iti ādikā anena eva sūtreṇa jīvasya api akṣara tā niṣiddhā ityata āha tathā iti anānyat iti ādikayā hi śruti ātma bhedaḥ pratiṣidhyate tathā ca upādhi bhedāt bhinnā jīvā niṣiddhā bhavanti abheda abhidhānāt iti arthaḥ itas  api na śārīrasya akṣara śabda tā iti āha acakṣuṣkam iti akṣarasya cakṣuḥ ādi upādhim vārayantī śrutiḥ aupādhikasya jīvasya akṣaratām niṣedhati iti arthaḥ tasmāt varṇa pradhāna avyākṛta jīvānām asaṃbhavāt saṃbhavāt ca paramātmanaḥ paramātmā eva akṣaram iti siddham īkṣati karma vyapadeśāt saḥ akārya brahma jana prāpti phala tvāt artha bedataḥ darśana dhyānayoḥ dhyeyam aparam brahma gamyate abrahma veda brahmā eva bhavati iti śruteḥ sarva gata para brahma vedena tad bhāva āpattau asa sāmabhiḥ unnīyate brahma lokam iti na deśa viśeṣa prāptiḥ upapadyate tasmāt aparam eva brahma iha dhyeya tvena codyate na ca īkṣaṇasya loke tattva viṣaya tvena prasiddheḥ parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ tathā abhāvāt  dhyāyateḥ ca tena samāna viṣaya tvāt  para brahma viṣayam eva dhyānam iti sāṃpratam samāna viṣaya tvasya eva asiddheḥ paraḥ  hi puruṣaḥ  dhyāna viṣayaḥ parātparaḥ tu darśana viṣayaḥ na ca tattva viṣayam eva sarvam darśanam anṛta viṣayasya api tasya darśanāt  na ca mananam darśanam tad ca tattva viṣayam eva iti sāṃpratam mananāt bhedena tatra tatra darśanasya nirdeśāt  na ca mananam api tarka apara nāma avaśyam tattva viṣayam yathā āhuḥ atarkaḥ  apratiṣṭhaḥ iti tasmāt aparam eva brahma iha dhyeyam tasya ca para tvam śarīra apekṣayā iti evam prāpta ucyate aīkṣaṇa dhyānayoḥ ekaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhūtayoḥ artha autsargikam tattva viṣaya tvam yathā īkṣateḥ dhyānasya hi sākṣātkāraḥ phalam sākṣātkāraḥ ca utsargataḥ tattva viṣayaḥ kkacittu bādhaka upanipāte samāropita gocaraḥ  bhavet  na ca asati apavāde śakya utsargaḥ tyaktum tathā ca asya tattva viṣaya tvāt tad kāraṇasya dhyānasya api tad tatva viṣaya tvam apica vākya śeṣeṇa eka vākyatva saṃbhave na vākya bhedaḥ  yujyate saṃbhavati ca para puruṣa viṣaya tvena artha pratyabhijñānāt samabhivyāhārāt ca eka vākya tā tad anurodhena ca parātpara iti atra parāt iti jīva ghana viṣayam draṣṭavyam tasmāt tu paraḥ puruṣaḥ  dhyātavyaḥ ca draṣṭavyaḥ ca bhavati tad idam uktam na ca atra jīva ghana śabdena prakṛtaḥ  abhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyateḥ kintu jīva ghanāt  parāt  paraḥ  yaḥ  dhyātavyaḥ  draṣṭavyaḥ ca tam eva kathayitum jīva ghanaḥ  jīvaḥ khilya bhāvam upādhi vaśāt āpannaḥ sa ucyate asa sāmabhiḥ unnīyate brahma lokam iti anantara vākya nirdiṣṭaḥ  brahma lokaḥ  vā jīva ghanaḥ sa hi samasta karaṇa ātmanaḥ sūtra ātmanaḥ  hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavataḥ  nivāsa bhūmitayā karaṇa parivṛtānām jīvānām saṃghāta iti bhavati jīva ghanaḥ tad evam tri mātra uṅkāra āyatanam param eva brahma upāsyam ata eva ca asya deśa viśeṣa adhigatiḥ phalam upādhimat tvāt  krameṇa ca samyak darśana utpattau muktiḥ abrahma veda brahmā eva bhavati iti tu nirupādhi brahma vedana viṣayā śrutiḥ aparam tu brahma ekaimātra āyatanam upāsyam iti mantavyam dahara uttarebhyaḥ aatha yad idamā asmin brahma pure daharam sūkṣmam guhā prāyam puṇḍarīka saṃniveśam veśma adaharaḥ  asmin  antara ākāśaḥ tasmin yad antar tad anveṣṭavyam āgama ācārya upadeśābhyām śravaṇam ca tad avirodhinā tarkeṇa mananam ca tad anveṣaṇam tad pūrvakeṇa ca ādara nairantarya dīrgha kāla āsevitena dhyāna abhyāsa paripākena sākṣātkāraḥ  vijñānam viśiṣṭam hi tad jñānam pūrvabhyaḥ tad icchā vijijñāsanam atra saṃśayam āha tatra iti tatra prathamam tāvat evam saṃśayaḥ kim dahara ākāśāt anyadeva kiñcid anveṣṭavyam vijijñāsitavyam ca uta dahara ākāśa iti yadā api dahara ākāśaḥ  anveṣṭavyaḥ ta dā api kim bhūtākāśa āhaḥ śārīra ātmā kim vā paramātmā iti saṃśaya hetum pṛcchati kuta iti tad hetum āha ākāśa brahma pura śabdābhyām iti tatra prathamam tāvat bhūtākāśa eva dahara iti pūrvapakṣayati tatra ākāśa śabdasya bhūta ākāśe rūḍha tvāt iti eṣa tu bahutara uttara saṃdarbha virodhāt tucchaḥ pūrva pakṣa iti aparitoṣeṇa pakṣa antaram ālambate pūrva pakṣī athavā jīvaḥ  dahara iti prāptam yuktam iti arthaḥ tatra aādheya tvāt viśeṣāt ca puram jīvasya ujyate dehaḥ  na brahmaṇaḥ  yuktaḥ  hetu dvaya viyogataḥ asādhāraṇyena hi vyapadeśa tā bhavanti tad yathā kṣiti jala pavana bīja ādi sāmagrī samavadhāna janma api aṅkuraḥ śāli bījena vyapadiśyate śāli aṅkura iti na tu kṣiti ādibhiḥ teṣām kārya antareṣu api sādhāraṇyāt  tad iha śarīram brahma vikāraḥ  api na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam brahmaṇaḥ sarva vikāra kāraṇa tvena ati sādhāraṇyāt  jīva bheda dharma adharma upārjitam tad iti asādhāraṇa kāraṇa tvāt jīvena vyapadiśyata iti yuktam apica brahma pura iti saptamī adhikaraṇe smaryate tena ādheyena anena saṃbaddhavyam na ca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasya anādheyasya ādhāra saṃbandha kalpate jīvaḥ tvāra agra mātra iti ādheyaḥ  bhavati tasmāt brahma śabdaḥ  rūḍhim parityajya deha ādi bṛṃhaṇa tayā jīve yaugike vā bhāktaḥ  vā vyākhyeyaḥ caitanyam ca bhaktiḥ upādhāna anupadhāne tu viśeṣaḥ vācya tvam gamya tvam syāt etad  jīvasya puram bhavatu śarīram puṇḍarīka dara gocara tā tu anyasya bhaviṣyati vatsa rājasya pura iva ujjayinyām bhaitrasya sa jñma ityata āha tatra pura svāmina iti ayam arthaḥ veśma khalu adhikaraṇam anirdiṣṭhā dheyam ādheya viśeṣa apekṣāyām pura svāminaḥ prakṛta tvāt tena eva ādheyena saṃbaddham sat anapekṣam na ādheya antareṇa saṃbandham kalpayati nanu tathā api śarīram eva asya bhoga āyatanam iti kaḥ  hṛdaya puṇḍarīkasya viseṣaḥ  yad tad eva asya sa jñma ityata āha manaupādhikaḥ ca jīva iti nanu manaḥ  api cala tayā sakala deha vṛtti paryāyeṇa iti ata āha manaḥ ca prāyeṇa iti ākāśa śabdaḥ ca arūpatva ādinā sāmānyena jīve bhāktaḥ astu vā bhūtākāśa eva ayam ākāśa śabdaḥ  adaharaḥ  asmin  antara ākāśaḥ iti tathā api adoṣa  iti āha na ca atra daharasi ākāśasya anveṣya tvam iti evam prāpta ucyate bhūta ākāśasya tāvat na dahara tvam ayāvan vā ayam ākāśaḥ tāvān oṣaḥ  antar hṛdaya ākāśaḥ iti upamāna virodhāt tathā hi atena tasya upameya tvam rāma rāvaṇa yuddhavat  agatyā bhedam āropya gatau satyām na yujyate asti tu dahara ākāśasya brahma tvena bhūta ākāśāt bhedena upamānasya gatiḥ na ca anavacchinna parimāṇam avacchinnam bhavati tathā satyavat cheda anupapatteḥ na bhūta ākāśa māna tvam brahmaṇaḥ  atra vidhīyate yena ajyāya ana ākāśāt iti śruti virodhaḥ syāt  api tu bhūta ākāśa upamānena puṇḍarīka upādhi prāptam dahara tvam nivartyate apica sarva eva uttare hetavaḥ  dahara ākāśasya bhūta ākāśa tvam vyāsedhanti iti āha na ca kalpita bheda iti na api dahara ākāśaḥ  jīva iti āha yadi api ātma śabda iti aupalabdheḥ adhiṣṭhānam brahmaṇaḥ  deha iṣyate tān āsā dhāraṇa tvena dehaḥ  brahma puram bhavet  dehe hi brahma upalabhyata iti asādhāraṇa tayā dehaḥ  brahma puram iti vyapadiśyate na tu brahma vikāra tayā tathā ca brahma śabda arthaḥ  mukhyaḥ  bhavati astu vā brahma puram jīvapuram tathā api yathā vatsa rājasya pure ujjayinyām maitrasya sa jñma bhavati evam jīvasya pure hṛd puṇḍarīkam brahma sadanam bhaviṣyati uttarebhyaḥ  brahma liṅgebhyaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ  avadhāraṇāt  brahmaṇaḥ  hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati brahma liṅgāni kathañcid abheda vivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante na ca iha brahmaṇaḥ  bādhakam pramāṇam sādhakam vā asti jīvasya brahma pura vyapadeśaḥ ca upapāditaḥ  brahma upalabdhi sthāna tayā arbhakaukaḥ tvam ca uktam tasmāt  sati saṃbhave brahmaṇi tad liṅgānām na abrahmaṇi vyākhyānam ucitam iti brahmā eva dahara ākāśaḥ  na jīva bhūta ākāśau  iti śravaṇa mananam anuvidya brahma anubhūya caraṇam cāraḥ teṣām kāmeṣu caraṇam bhavati iti arthaḥ syāt etad  dahara ākāśasya anveṣya tve siddhe tatra vicāraḥ  yujyate na tu tad anveṣṭavyam api tu tad ādhāram anyat eva kiñcid iti uktam iti anubhāṣate yad api etad iti anubhāṣitam dūṣayati atra brūma iti yadi ākāśa ādhāram anyat anyā iṣṭavyam bhavet tad eva upari vyutpādanīyam ākāśa vyutpādanam tu kkopayujyata iti arthaḥ codayati nanu etad api iti ākāśa kathanam api tad antar varti vastu sadbhāva pradarśanāya eva atha ākāśa param eva kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha tam ced brūyar iti ācāryeṇa hi adaharaḥ  asmin  antakara ākāśaḥ tasmin yad antar tad anveṣṭavyam tad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti upadiṣṭe ateva asinā ākṣiptam akim tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyam puṇḍarīkam eva tāvat sūkṣmataram tad avaruddham ākāśam sūkṣmatamam tasmin sūkṣmatame kim aparam asti na asti eva iti arthaḥ tad  kim anveṣṭavyam iti tad asmin  ākṣepe parisamāpte samādhāna avasara ācāryasya ākāśa upamāna upakramam vacaḥ aubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī samāhite iti tasmāt puṇḍarīka avaruddha ākāśa āśraye dyāvāpṛthivī au  eva anveṣṭavye upadiṣṭe na ākāśa iti arthaḥ pariharati na etad evam evam hi iti syāt etad  evam eva etad  naḥ khalu abhyupagamā eva doṣa tvena iti ata āha tatra vākya śeṣa iti vākya śeṣaḥ  hi dahara ākāśa ātma vedanasya phalavat tvam brūte yad ca phalavat  tad kartavya tayā codyate yad ca kartavyam tad icchiti iti atad anveṣṭavyam tad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti tad daharākāśa viṣayam avatiṣṭhate syāt etad  dyāvāpṛthivyau  eva ātmānau bhaviṣyataḥ tābhyām eva ātmā lakṣayiṣyate ākāśa śabdavat  tatas ca ākāśa ādhārau tau  eva parāmṛśyate iti ata āha asmin kāmāḥ samāhitāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ eṣa ātma apahata pāpmā iti anena prakṛtam dyāvāpṛthivī ādi samādhāna ādhāram ākāśam ākṛṣya dyāvāpṛthivī abhidhāna vyavahitam api iti śeṣaḥ nanu satyakāma jñānasya etad phalam tad anantaram nirdeśāt  na tu dahara ākāśa vedanasya ityata āha samuccaya arthena caśabdena iti aasmin kāmāḥ iti ca aeṣaḥ iti ca eka vacana antam na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭum arhati iti dahara ākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāya arthaḥ tad anena krameṇa atasmin yad antaḥ iti atra tad śabdaḥ  anantaram api ākāśam ati laṅgasya hṛd puṇḍarīkam parāmṛśatati uktam bhavati tasmin hṛd puṇḍarīke yad antar ākāśam tad anveṣu yam iti arthaḥ gati śabdābhyām tathā hi dṛṣṭam liṅgam ca uttarebhyaḥ  iti asya prapañcaḥ etam eva dahara ākāśam prakramya bata ahaḥ kaṣṭam idam vartate jantūnām tattva avabodha vikalānām yad ebhiḥ sva adhīnam api brahma na prāpyate tad yathā cirantana nirūḍha nibiḍa m ala pihitānām kaladhauta śakalānām pathi patitānām upari apari saṃcaradbhiḥ api pānthaiḥ dhanāyadbhiḥ grāvakhṇḍa nivaha vibhrameṇa etāni na upādiyanta iti abisaṃdhimatī sa adbhutam iva sakhā idam iva śrutaḥ pravartate aimāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahar gacchanti etam brahma lokam na vindanti iti svāpa kāle hi sarva eva ayam vidvān avidvān  ca jīva lokaḥ  hṛd puṇḍarīka āśrayam daharākāśa ākhyam brahma lokam prāptaḥ  api anādya vidyā tamaḥ paṭala pihita dṛṣṭi tayā brahma bhūyam āpannaḥ  aham asmi iti na veda saḥ  ayam brahma loka śabdaḥ tad gatiḥ ca pratyaham jīva lokasya dahara ākāśasya eva brahma rūpa lokatām āhatuḥ tad etad āha bhāṣya kāraḥ itas ca parameśvara eva daharaḥ  yasmāt daharavākī śeṣa iti tad anena gati śabdau vyākhyātau atathā hi dṛṣṭam iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe tathā hi arahar jīvānām iti vede ca loke ca dṛṣṭam yadi api suṣuptasya brahma bhāve laukikam na pramāṇa antaram asti tathā api vaidikīm eva prasiddhim sthāpayitum ucyate īdṛśī nāma iyam vaidikaḥ  prasiddhiḥ yad loke api gīyata iti yathā śruti antare yathā ca loke tathā iha brahma loka śabdaḥ  api iti yojanā aliṅgam ca iti sūtra avayava vyākhyānam codya mukhena avatārayati nanu kamalāsana lokam api iti pariharati gamayet yadi brahmaṇaḥ  loka iti atra tāvat niṣāda sthapati nyāyena ṣaṣṭhī samāsāt karma dhārayaḥ  balīyān iti sthitam eva tathā api iha ṣaṣṭhi samāsa nirākaraṇena karma dhāraya samāsa sthāpanāya liṅgam api adhikam asti iti tad api uktam sūtrakāreṇa tathā hi loka veda prasiddha ahara har brahma loka prāpti abhidhānam eva liṅgam kamala āsana loka prāpteḥ vipakṣāt asaṃbhavāt vyāvartamānam ṣaṣṭhī samāsa āśaṅkām vyāvartayat dahara ākāśa prāptau  eva avatiṣṭhate na ca dahara ākāśaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ  lokaḥ kintu tad brahma iti brahma ca tad lokaḥ ca iti karmadhā arayaḥ siddhaḥ  bhavati lokyata iti lokaḥ hṛd puṇḍarīka sthaḥ khalu ayam lokyate yad khalu puṇḍarīka stham antaḥkaraṇam tasmin viśuddhe pratyāhṛta itara karaṇānām yoginām nirmala iva udake candramasaḥ  bimbam ati svaccham caitanyam jyotiḥ svarūpam brahmā avalokyata iti dhṛteḥ ca mahimnaḥ  asya asmin  upalabdheḥ sautraḥ  dhṛti śabdaḥ  bhāva vacanaḥ dhṛteḥ ca parameśvara eva dahara ākāśaḥ kutas  asya dhāraṇa lakṣaṇasya mahimnaḥ  asmin  eva īśvara eva śruti antareṣu upalabdheḥ nigada vyākhyānam asya bhāṣyam prasiddheḥ ca na ca iyam ākāśa śabdasya brahmaṇi lakṣyamāṇa vibhutva ādi guṇa yogāt vṛttiḥ sāṃpratikī yathā rathāṅga nāmā cakravāka iti lakṣaṇā kintu atyanta nirūḍhā iti sūtra arthaḥ ye tu ākāśa śabdaḥ  brahmaṇi api mukhya  eva nabhaḥvat iti ācakṣate taiḥ aanyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti ca aanani alabhyaḥ śabda arthaḥ iti ca mīmāṃsakānām mudrā bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ labhyate hi ākāśa śabdāt vibhutva ādi guṇa yogena api brahma na ca brahmaṇi eva mukhyaḥ  nabhasi tu tena eva guṇa yogena vartsyati iti vācyam loka adhīna avadhāraṇa tvena śabda artha saṃbandhasya vaidika padārtha pratyayasya tad pūrvaka tvāt nanu ayau  an vā ayam ākāśaḥ tā  ān eṣaḥ  antar hṛdaya ākāśaḥ iti vyatireka nirdeśāt na lakṣaṇā yuktā na hi bhavati gaṅgāyāḥ kūlam iti vivakṣite gaṅgāyāḥ  gaṅgā iti prayogaḥ tad kim idānīm apaurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyā yajeta aamāvasya āyāmam āvāsyayā iti asādhuḥ vaidikaḥ prayogaḥ na ca paurṇamāsya amāvāsyā śabdau  agneya ādiṣu mukhyau yad ca uktaṃyatra śabda artha pratītiḥ tatra lakṣaṇā yatra punar anya arthe niścite śabda aprayogaḥ tatra vācaka tvam eva iti tad ayuktam ubhayasya api vyabhicārāt  asomena yajeta iti śabdāt arthaḥ pratīyate na ca atra kasyacid la akṣaṇika tvam ṛte vākya arthāt  na ca aya evam vidvān paurṇamāsīm yajeta ya evam vidvān amāvāsyām iti atra paurṇamāsya māvāsyā śabdau na lākṣaṇikau tasmāt yad kiñcid etad iti itara parāmarśāt sa iti ced na asaṃbhavāt samyak  prasīdati asmin jīvaḥ  viṣaya indriya saṃyoga janitam kāluṣyam jahāti iti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādaḥ  jīvasya avasthā bedaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ tathā śarīrāt samutthānam api śarīra āśrayasya jīvasya natu anāśrayasya brahmaṇaḥ tasmāt yathā pūrva uktaiḥ vākya śeṣa gataiḥ liṅgaiḥ brahma avagamyate dahāra ākāśaḥ evam vākya śeṣa gatābhyām eva saṃprasāda samutthānābhyām dahara ākāśaḥ  jīvaḥ kasmāt na avagamyate tasmāt na asti vinigamana iti śaṅkā arthaḥ anāsaṃbhavāt saṃprasāda samutthanābhyām hi jīva parām arśaḥ  na jīva paraḥ kintu tadīya tāttvika rūpa brahma bhāva paraḥ tathā ca eṣa parāmarśaḥ  brahmaṇa eva iti na saṃprasāda samutthāne jīva liṅgam api tu brahmaṇa eva tādarthyāt iti agre vakṣyate ākāśa upamāna ādayaḥ tu brahma avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca brahma parāḥ ca iti asti vinigamanā iti arthaḥ uttarāt ced āvirbhūta svarūpaḥ tu dahara ākāśam eva prakṛtyā upākhyāyate yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvan  ca lokān āpnoti sarvān  ca kāmān tam ātmānam vividiṣantau sura asura rāja vindri virocanau samidh pāṇī prajāpatim vari vasitum ājagmatuḥ āgatya ca dvātriṃśatam varṣāṇi tad paricaraṇa parau brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ atha etau prajāpatiḥ uvāca kiṅkāmauvihasthau yuvām iti tau  ūcatuḥ ya ātma apahata pāpmā tam āvām vividiṣā ava iti tatas  prajāpatiḥ uvāca ya eṣaḥ  akṣiṇi puruṣaḥ  dṛśyate eṣa ātma apahata pāpmatva ādi guṇa yad vijñānāt sarva loka kāma avāptiḥ etad amatṛtam abhayam atha etad śutvā etau  aprakṣīṇa kalmaṣa āvaraṇa tayā chāyā puruṣam jagṛhatuḥ prajāpatim ca prapacchatuḥ atha yaḥ  ayam bhagavaḥ  apsu dṛśyate yaḥ ca ādarśaḥ  yaḥ ca svaṅga ādau katama eteṣu asau atava eka eva sarveṣu iti tam etayoḥ śrutvā praśnam prajāpatiḥ bata ahaḥ su dūraram udbhāntau  etau asmābhiḥ akṣi sthāna ātma upadiṣṭaḥ etau ca chāyā puruṣam pratipannau tad yadi vayam bhrāntau stha iti brūmaḥ tatas  sva ātmani samāropita pāṇḍitya bahu mānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvat upadeśam na gṛhṇīyātām iti anayoḥ āśayam anurudhya yathārtham grāhayiṣyāma iti abisaṃdhimān pratyuvāca udaśarava ātmānam avekṣethām asmin yad paśyathaḥ tad brūtam iti tau ca dṛṣṭvā saṃtuṣṭa hṛdayau na abrūtām atha prajā pitiḥ etau viparīta grāhiṇau mā bhūtām iti āśayavān papraccha kim atra apaśyatām iti tau ha ūcatuḥ yathā eva avami cira brahmacarya caraṇa samupajāta āyata na kha loma ādimantau  evam āvayoḥ pratirūpakam nakha loma ādi mat udaśa rāve apaśyāva iti punar etayoḥ chāyā ātma vibhramam apaninīṣuḥ yathā eva hi chāyā puruṣa upajana apāya dharma abhedena avagamyamāna ātma lakṣaṇa virahān na ātmā eva ivam eva idam śarīram na ātmā kintu tatas  bhinnam iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām etau jānīyātām iti āśayavān prajāpatiḥ uvāca sādhu alaṅkṛtau su vasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvā punar udaśa rāve paśyatam ākmānam yad ca atra paśyathaḥ tad bratam iti tau ca sādhu alaṅkṛtau su vasanau chinna nakha lomānau bhūtvā tathā eva cakratuḥ punar ca prajāpatinā āpṛṣṭau tām eva chāyām ātmānam ūcatuḥ tad upaśrutya prajāpatiḥ ahaḥ bata adya api na praśānta enayoḥ vibhramaḥ tad yathā abhimatam eva ātma tattvam kathayāmi tāvat  kālena kalmaṣe kṣīṇe asmad vacana saṃdarbha paurvāparya locanayā ātma tattvam pratipatsyete svayam eva iti matvā uvāca eṣa ātmā etad amṛtam abhayam etad brahma iti tayoḥ virocanaḥ  deha anupāti tvāt chāyāyā deha eva ātma tattvam iti matvā nija sadanam āgatya tathā eva asurān upadiśyate deva indraḥ tu aprāpta nija sadanaḥ  adhvani eva kiñcid varala kalmaṣatayā chāyā ātmani śarīra huṇa doṣa anuvidhāyini tam tam doṣam paribhāvayan na aham atra chāyā ātma darśane bhogyam paśyāmi iti prajāpati samīpam samidh pāṇiḥ punar eva iva aya āgataḥ ca prajāpatinā āgamana kāraṇam pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribāvitam jagad prajāpatiḥ tu su vyākhyātam api ātma tattvam akṣīṇa kalmaṣa āvaraṇa tayā na agrahīḥ tad punar api tad prakṣayāyāḥ  cara aparāṇi dvātriṃśatam varṣāṇi brahmacaryam atha prakṣīṇa kalmaṣāya te aham etam eva ātmānam bhūyaḥ anuvyākhyāyasyāmi iti avocat  sa ca tathā cari tad brahmacaryaḥ sura indraḥ prajāpatim upasasāda upapannāya ca asmai prajāpatiḥ vyacaṣṭe ya ātma apahata pāpma di lakṣaṇaḥ  akṣaṇa darśitaḥ saḥ  ayam ya eṣa svapne mahiyamānaḥ  vanitā ādibhiḥ anekadhā svapna upabhogān bhuñjānaḥ  virahati iti asmin  api deva indraḥ  bhayam dadarśa yadi apyayam chāyā puruṣavat na śarīra dharmān anupatati tathā api śoka bhaya ādi vividha bādha anubhavān na tatra api asti svasti prāptiḥ iti uktavati maghavati punar aparāṇi cara dvātriṃśatam varṣāṇi svaccham brahmacaryam idānīm api akṣīṇa kalmaṣaḥ  asi iti ūce prajāpatiḥ atha asmin  evaṅkāram upasanne maghavati prajāpatiḥ uvāca ya eṣa ātma apahata pāpma ādi guṇa u darśitaḥ  akṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yaḥ  viṣaya indriya saṃyoga virahāt prasannaḥ suṣupta avasthāyām iti atra api na indraḥ  nirvavāra yathā hi jāgrat vā svapna gataḥ  vā ayam aham asmi iti imāni bhūtāmani ca iti vijānāti na evam suṣuptaḥ kiñcid api vedayate tadā khalu ayam acetayamānaḥ  abhāvam prāpta iva bhavati tad iha kā nirvṛtiḥ iti eva muktavati maghavati bata adya api na te kalmaṣa kṣayaḥ  abhūt  tad punar aparāṇi cara pañca varṣāṇi brahmacaryam iti avocat prajāpatiḥ tad evam asya maghonaḥ tribhiḥ paryāyaiḥ vyatīyuḥ ṣaṇṇau  ati varṣāṇi caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇi iti eka uttaram śatam varṣāṇi brahmacaryam carataḥ sahasrākṣasya sa upedire atha asmai brahmacarya saṃpad unmṛdita kalmaṣāya maghavate ya eṣaḥ  akṣiṇi yaḥ ca svapne suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātma apahata pāpma ādi guṇa kaḥ  darśitaḥ tam eva amaghavan martyam vai śarīram ityādinā vispaṣṭam vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ ayam asya abhisaṃdhiḥ yāvat kiñcita sukham duḥkham āgama apāyi tad sarvam śarīra indriya antaḥkaraṇa saṃbandhi na tu ātmanaḥ sa punar etān eva śarīra ādīn anādya vidyā vāsanā vaśāt ātma tvena abi pratītaḥ tad gatena sukha duḥkhena tadvantam ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ  anutapyate yadā tu ayam apahata pāpmatva ādi lakṣaṇam udāsīnam ātmānam caitanya ānanda ghane rūpe vyavasthitaḥ samasta loka kāmān prāptaḥ  bhavati etasya eva hi parama ānandasya mātrāḥ sarve kāmāḥ duḥkham tu avidyā nirmāṇam iti na vidvān āpnoti aaśīlita upaniṣadām vyāmoha iha jāyate teṣām anugrahāya idam upākhyānam avartayam evam vyavasthita uttarāt vākya saṃdarbhāt prājāpatyāt akṣiṇi ca svapne suṣupte ca caturthaḥ  ca paryāye aeṣa saṃprasādaḥ  asmāt śarīrāt samutthāya iti jīva ātmā eva upahata pāpma ādi guṇaḥ śrutyā ucyate naḥ khathalu parasya akṣi sthānam saṃbhavati na api svapna ādi avasthā yogaḥ na api śarīrāt samutthānam tasmāt yasya etad  sarvam saḥ  apahata pāpma ādi guṇaḥ śrutyā uktaḥ jīvasya ca etad  sarvam iti sa eva apahata pāpma ādi guṇaḥ śrutyā ukta iti na apahata pāpma ādibiḥ param brahma gamyate nanu jīvasya apahata pāpma tvāt ayaḥ  na saṃbhavanti iti uktam vacanāt bhaviṣyati kim iva vacanam na kuryāt  na asti vacanasya atibāraḥ na ca māna antara virodhaḥ na hi jīvaḥ pāpma ādi svabhāvaḥ kintu vāc buddhi śarīra ārambha saṃbhavaḥ  asya pāpma ādiḥ śarīra ādi bhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvaja abāva iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti tam prati brūyāt  āvirbhūta svarūpaḥ tu ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ paurvāparya ālocanayā tāvat upaniṣadām śuddha buddham uktam ekam aprapañcam brahma tad atiriktam ca sarvam tad vivartaḥ rajjoḥ iva bhujaṅga iti atra tātparyam avagamyate tathā ca jīvaḥ  api avidyā kalpita deha indriya ādi upahitam rūpam brahmaṇaḥ  na tu sva bāvikaḥ evam ca na apahata pāpmatva ādayaḥ tasmin  avidya upādhau saṃbhavinaḥ āvirbhūta brahma rūpe tu nirupādhau saṃbhavantaḥ  brahmaṇa eva na jīvasya evam ca brahma eva apahata apāpma ādi guṇam śruti uktam iti tad eva dahara ākāśaḥ  na jīva iti syāt etad  svarūpa āvirbhāve ced brahmā eva na jīvaḥ tarhi vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate jīva āvirbhūta svarūpa iti ata āha bhūta pūrva gatyā iti udaśarauvabrahmaṇena iti yathā eva hi maghonaḥ pratibimbāni udaśarava upajāna apāya dharma kāṇi ātma lakṣaṇa virahān na ātmā evam deha indriya ādi api upajana apāyadha makam na ātmā iti udaśarāva dṛṣṭāntena śarīra ātma tāyā vyutthānam bādha iti codayati katham punar  svam ca rūpam iti dravya antara saṃsṛṣṭam hi tena abhibhūtam tasmāt vivicyamānam vyajyate hema tāraka ādi kūṭastha nityasya punar anyena asaṃsṛṣṭasya kutaḥ vivecanāt abhivyaktiḥ na ca saṃsāra avasthāyām jīvaḥ  anabhivyaktaḥ dṛṣṭyādayaḥ  hi asya svarūpam te ca saṃsāra avasthāyām bhāsanta iti katham jīva rūpam na bhāsata iti arthaḥ pariharati prāk viveka jñāna utpatteḥ iti ayam arthaḥ yadi api asya kūṭastha nityasya anya saṃsargaḥ  na vastu tas  asti yadi api ca saṃsāra avasthāyām asya dṛṣṭi ādi rūpam cakāsti tathā api anirvācya anādya vidyā vaśādavidyā kalpitaiḥ eva deha indriya ādibhiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭam api saṃsṛṣṭam ivi viviktam api aviviktam iva dṛṣṭi ādi rūpam asya prathate tathā ca deha indriya ādi gataiḥ tāpa ādibhiḥ tāpādimat iva bhavati iti upapāditam ca etad vistareṇa adhyāsa bhāṣya iti na iha upapādyate yadi api sphaṭikādayaḥ  japā kusuma ādi saṃnihitāḥ saṃnidhānam ca saṃyukta saṃyoga ātmaka tathā ca saṃyuktāḥ tathā api na sākṣāt japa ādi kusuma saṃyogina iti etāvatā dṛṣṭācintatā iti vedanā harṣa bhaya śoka ādayaḥ dārṣṭa antike yojayati tathā deha ādi iti asaṃprasādaḥ  asmāt śarīrāt samutthāya param jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate iti etad vibhajate śruti kṛtam viveka vijñānam iti tad anena śravaṇa manana dhyāna abhyāsāt viveka vijñānam uktvā tasya viveka vijñānasya phalam kevala ātma rūpa sākṣātkāraḥ sva rūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ sa ca sākṣātkāraḥ  vṛtti rūpaḥ prapañca mātram pravilāpayan svayam api prapañca rūpa tvāt kataka phalavat pravilīyate tathā ca nirmṛṣṭa nikhila prapañca jālam anupasargam apara adhīna prakāśam ātma jyotiḥ siddham bhavati tad idam uktam param jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya iti atra ca upasaṃpattau  uttara kālāyām api ktvā prayogaḥ  mukham vyādāya svapiti itīvat mantavyaḥ yadhā ca vivikesa akṣātkāraḥ śarīrāt samutthānam na tu śarīra apādānakam gamanam tadā tad sa śarīrasya api saṃbhavati prārabdha kārya karmakṣasya purastāt iti āha tathā vivekauviveka mātreṇa iti na kevalam asa yoha vai tad paramam brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati ityādi śrutibhyaḥ  jīvasya paramātmanaḥ  abedaḥ prājāpatya vākya saṃdarbha paryālocanayapi evam eva pratipattavyam iti āha kutas ca etad evam pratipattavyam iti syāt etad  praticchāyā ātmavat jīvam paramātmanaḥ  vastu tas  bhinnam api amṛtā abhaya ātma tvena grāhayitvā paścāt paramātmānamṛta abhaya ādimantam prajāpatiḥ grāhyati na tvayam jīvasya parama ātma bhāvam ācaṣṭe chāyā ātmana iva ityata āha na api praticchāyā ātmā ayam akṣi lakṣita iti akṣi lakṣitaḥ  api ātmā eva upadiśyate na chāyā ātmā tasmāt asiddhaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ kiñca dvitīya ādiṣu api paryāyeṣu aetam tu eva te bhūyaḥ anuvyākhyāyasyāmi iti upakramāt prathama paryāya nirdiṣṭaḥ  na chāyā puruṣaḥ api tu tatas  anyaḥ  dṛṣṭa ātmā iti darśayati anyathā prajāpateḥ pratārakatva prasaṅgāt ityata āha tathā dvitīye api iti atha chāyā puruṣa eva jīvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati tathā ca chāyā puruṣa eva etam iti parāmṛśyata iti ata āha kiñca aham adya svapne hastinam iti kiñcite samuccaya abhidhānam pūrva upapatti sāhityam brūte tad ca śaṅkā nirākaraṇa dvāreṇa chāyā puruṣaḥ  asthāyī sthāyī ca ayam ātmā cakāsti pratyabhijñānāt iti arthaḥ na hi khalu ayam evam iti ayam suṣuptaḥ saṃprati suṣupta avasthāyām aham ātmānam ahaṅkāra āspadam ātmānam na jānāti kena prakareṇa na jānātīti ata āha ayam aham asmi imāni bhūtāni ca iti yathā jāgṛtau svapne ca iti anahi vijñātuḥ vijñāteḥ viparilopaḥ  vidyate avināśi tvāt iti anena avināśi tvam siddhavat hetu kurvatā supta utthitasya ātma pratyabhijñānam uktam ya eva aham jāgaritvā suptaḥ sa eva etarhi jāgarmi iti ācārya deśayamatam
