āha kecid tu iti yadi hi etam iti anena anantara uktam cakṣuḥ adhiṣṭhānam puruṣam parāmṛśṭa tasya ātma tvamucyeta tatas  na bhavet chāyāpuruṣaḥ na tu etad asti vākya upakrama sūcitasya para ātmanaḥ parāmarśāt  na khalu jīva ātmanaḥ  apahata pāpmatva ādi guṇa saṃbhava iti arthaḥ tad etad dūṣayati teṣām etam iti su bodham mata antaram āha aparetu vādina iti yadi na jīvaḥ kartā bhoktā ca vastu tas  bhavet  tatas tad āśrayāḥ karma vidhaya uparudhyeran sūtra kāra vacanam ca anāsaṃbhavāt iti kupyeta tad khalu brahmaṇaḥ  guṇānām jīve asaṃbhavam āha na ca abhede brahmaṇaḥ  jīvānām brahma guṇānām asaṃbhavaḥ  jīveṣu iti teṣām abhiprāyaḥ teṣām vādinām śārīrakeṇa eva uttaram dattam tathā hi paurvāparya paryālocanayā vedāntānām ekam advayam ātma tattvam jīvāḥ tu avidyā upadhāna kalpitā iti atra tātparyam avagamyate na ca vastu sataḥ brahmaṇaḥ  guṇāḥ samāropiteṣu jīveṣu saṃbhavanti naḥ khalu vastu satyā rajjvā dharmāḥ sevyatva ādayaḥ samāropite bhujaṅge saṃbhavinaḥ na ca samāropitaḥ  bhujaṅgaḥ  rajjvā bhinnaḥ tasmāt na sūtra vyākopaḥ avidyā kalpitam ca kartṛtva bhoktṛ tvam yathāloka siddham upāśritya karma vidhayaḥ pravṛttāḥ śyena ādi vidhaya iva niṣiddhe api ana hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti sādhya aṃśe abhicāre atikrānta niṣedham puruṣam āśritya avidyāvat puruṣa āśraya tvāt śastrasya iti uktam tad idam āha teṣām sarveṣām iti nanu brahma ced atra vaktavyam kṛtam jīva parāmarśena iti uktam iti ata āha anya arthaḥ ca parāmarśaḥ jīvasya upādhi kalpitasya brahma bhāva upadeṣṭavyaḥ na ca asau jīvam aparāmṛśya śakya upadeṣṭum iti tisṛṣu avasthāsu jīvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ tad bhāva pravilayanam tasya pāramārthikam brahma bhāvam darśayitum iti arthaḥ alpa śruteḥ iti ced tad uktam nigada vyākhyātena bāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam anukṛteḥ tasya ca aabhānam tejasaḥ  dṛṣṭam sati tejaḥ  antare yatas  tejaḥ dhātu antaram tasmāt anukārāt ca gamyate balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandam tejaḥ candra tāraka ādi abhibhūyamānam dṛṣṭam na tu tejasaḥ  anyena ye api pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛha ghaṭādayaḥ  na te sva bhāsā pradīpam bhāsayitum īśate śrūyate ca atasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti iti sarva śabdaḥ prakṛta sūrya ādi apekṣaḥ na ca atulya rūpe anubhānam iti anukāraḥ saṃbhavati na hi gāvaḥ  varāham anudhāvanti iti kṛṣṇa vihaṅga anudhāvanam upapadyate gavām api tu tādṛśa sūkara anudhāvanam tasmāt yadi api ayasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī ca antarikṣamotam iti brahma prakṛtam tathā api abhibhava anukāra sāmarthya lakṣaṇena liṅgena prakaraṇa bādhayā tejaḥ dhātuḥ avagamyate na tu brahma liṅga anupapatteḥ tatra tam tasya iti ca sarvanāma padāni pradarśanīyam eva avamrakṣyanti na ca tad śabdaḥ pūrva ukta parāmarśī iti niyamaḥ samasti na hi atena raktam rāgāt atasya apatyam iti ādau pūrva uktam kiñcid asti tasmāt pramāṇa antara apratītam api tejaḥ  antaram alaukikam śabdāt upāsya tvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate abrahmaṇi eva hi tad liṅgam na tu tejasya laukike tasmāt na tad upāsya tve brahma jñeyam tu gamyate atam eva bhānta t iti atra kim alaukikam tejaḥ kalpayitvā sūrya ādīnām anubhānam upapadyatām kiṃvā abhārūpaḥ satya saṃkalpaḥ iti śruti antara prasiddhena brahmaṇaḥ  bhānena sūrya ādīnām bhānam upapādyatām iti viśaye na śruta saṃbhave aśrutasya kalpanā yujyata iti aprasiddham na alaukikam upāsyam tejaḥ  yujyate api tu śruti prasiddham brahmā eva jñeyam iti tad etad āha prājña eva ātmā bhavitum arhati virodham āha sama tvāt ca iti nanu sva pratibhāne sūrya ādayaḥ cākṣuṣam tejaḥ  apekṣante na hi andhena ete dṛśyante tathā tad eva cākṣuṣam tejaḥ  bāhya saurya āditeja āpyāyitam rūpa ādi prakāśayati nānā āpyāyitam andhakāre api rūpa darśana prasaṅgāt ityata āha yam bhāntam anubhāyuḥ iti na hi tejontarasya tejaḥ  antara apekṣām vyāsedhāmaḥ kintu tad bhānam anubhānam na ca locanabhānam anubhānti sūrya ādayaḥ tad idam uktam na hi pradīpa iti pūrva pakṣam anubhāṣya vyabhicāram āha yad api uktam iti etad uktam bhavati yadi svarūpa sāmya abhāvam abhipretya anukāraḥ  nirākriyate tadā vyabhāciraḥ atha kriyā sāmya abhāvam saḥ  asiddhaḥ asti hi vāyu rajasoḥ sva rūpa visadṛśayoḥ api niyata diś deśa vahana kriyā sāmyam vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayoḥ tu yadi api dahana kriyā na bhidyate tathā api dravya bhedena kriyā bhedam kalpayitvā kriyā sādṛśyam vyākhyeyam tad evam anukṛteḥ iti vibhajya tasya ca iti sūtra avayavam vibhajate tasya ca iti caturtham iti jyotiṣām sūrya ādīnām brahma jyotiḥ prakāśakam iti arthaḥ tejaḥ  antareṇa anindriya bhāvam āpannena sūrya ādi tejaḥ  vibhāti iti aprasiddham sarva śabdasya hi svarasataḥ  niḥśeṣa abhidhānam vṛttiḥ sā tejedhātauvalaukike rūpa mātra prakāśake saṃkucet  brahmaṇi tu niḥśeṣa jagat avabhāsake na sarva śabdasya vṛttiḥ saṃkucati iti tatra śabdam āharan  iti sarvatra khalu ayam tatraśabdaḥ pūrva ukta parāmarśī atena raktam rāgāt iti ādau  api prakṛteḥ parasmin pratyayer atha bhede anvākhyāyamāne prātipadika pratyarthasya pūrva vṛtta tvam asti iti tena iti tad parāmarśāt na vyabhāciraḥ tathā ca sarvanāma śrutiḥ eva brahma upasthāpayati tena bhavatu nāma prakaraṇāt liṅgam balīyaḥ śrutiḥ tu liṅgāt balīyasi iti śrautam iha brahmā eva gamyata iti api ca apekṣita anapekṣitā bhādhānayoḥ apekṣita abhidhānam yuktam dṛṣṭa artha tvāt iti āha anantaram ca hiraṇya maye pare kośa iti asmin vākye jyotiṣām jyotiḥ iti uktam tatra katham tad  jyotiṣām jyotiḥ iti apekṣāya am itadam upatiṣṭhate na tatra sūrya iti svātantryeṇa tu ucyamāne anapekṣitam syāt adṛṣṭa artham iti brahmaṇi api ca eṣām bhāna pratiṣedhaḥ  anakalpata iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ ana tatra sūryaḥ  bhāti iti na iyam satisaptamī yatas  sūrya ādīnām tasmin sati abhibhavaḥ pratīyeta api tu viṣaya saptamī tena na tatra brahmaṇi prakāśayitavye sūrya ādayaḥ prakāśaka tayā bhānti kintu brahmā eva sūrya ādiṣu prakāśayitavyeṣu prakāśaka tvena bhāti tad ca svayaṃprakāśam agṛhyaḥ  na hi gṛhyata ityādi śrutibhya iti api ca smaryate na tad bhāsayata iti brahmaṇaḥ  agrāhya tvam uktam yad ā āditya gatam iti anena tasya eva grāhaka tvam uktam iti śabdāt eva pramitaḥ anāñjasā māna bhedaḥ  asti parasmin māna varjite bhūta bhavya īśitā jīve na añjasī tena saṃśayaḥ kim aṅguṣṭha mātra śruti anugrahāya jīva upāsana aparam etad vākyam astu tad anurodhena ca īśāna śrutiḥ kathañcid vāya ākhyāyatām āhosvit īśāna śruti anugrahāya brahma param etad astu tad anurodhena aṅguṣṭha mātra śrutiḥ kathañcid nīya tām tatra anyatarasya anyatara anurodha viṣaye prathama anurodhaḥ  nyāṭya iti aṅguṣṭha śruti anurodhena īśāna śrutiḥ netavyā apica yuktam hṛd puṇḍarīka da hara sthāna tvam parama ātmānaḥ parimāṇa mātra nirdeśāt  na ca amadhya ātmani iti atra sthāna bhedaḥ  avagamyate ātma śabdaḥ  hi ayam svabhāva vacanaḥ  vā jīva vacanaḥ  vā brahma vacanaḥ  vā syāt  tatra svabhāvasya sva bhavitra dhīna nirūpaṇa tayā svasya ca bhavituḥ anirdeśāt na jñāyate kasya madhya iti na ca jīva parayoḥ asti madhyam añjasā iti na eṣa sthāna nirdeśaḥ  vispaṣṭaḥ spaṣṭaḥ tu parimāṇa nirdeśaḥ parimāṇa bhedaḥ ca parasmin  saṃbhavati iti jīva ātmā eva aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ sa khalu antaḥkaraṇa ādi upādhi kalpitaḥ  bhāgaḥ paramātmanaḥ antaḥkaraṇam ca prāyeṇa hṛd kamala kośa sthānam hṛd kamala kośaḥ ca manuṣyāṇām aṅguṣṭha mātra iti tad avacchinnaḥ jīvātmā api aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ nabha iva vaṃśa parva avacchinnam aratni mātram api ca jīvātmanaḥ spaṣṭam aṅguṣṭha mātra tvam smaryate aaṅguṣṭha mātram puruṣam niścakarṣa yamaḥ  balāt iti na hi sarva īśasya brahmaṇaḥ  yamena balāt niṣkarṣaḥ kalpate yamaḥ  hi jagau ahari guru vaśa gaḥ asmi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mama api viṣṇuḥ iti tena aṅguṣṭha mātra tvasya jīve niśchayāt āpekṣikam kiñcid bhūta bhavyam prati jīvasya īśāna tvam vyākhyeyam aetat vai tad iti ca pratyakṣa jīva rūpam parāmṛśati tasmāt jīvātmā eva atra upāsya iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate apraśna uttara tvāt īśāna śravaṇasya aviśeṣataḥ jīvasya brahma rūpatva pratyāyana param vacaḥ iha hi bhūta bhavya mātram prati niraṅkuśam īśāna tvam pratīyate prāk  pṛṣṭam ca atra brahma aanyatra dharmāt anyatra adharmāt ityādinā tad anantarasya saṃdarbhasya tad prativacana tā īcitā iti aetat vai tad iti brahma abhidhānam yuktam tathā ca aṅguṣṭha mātra tayā yadi api jīve avagamyate tathā api na tad param etad vākyam kintu aṅguṣṭha mātrasya jīvasya brahma rūpa tā pratipādana param evam niraṅkuśam īśāna tvam na saṃkocayitavyam na ca brahma praśna uttara tā hātavyā tena yathā atattvam asti iti vijñāna ātmanaḥ tvaṃpadārthasya tad iti paramātmanā eka tvam pratipādyate tathā iha api aṅguṣṭha parimitasya vijñāna ātmana īśāna śrutyā brahma bhāvaḥ pratipādya iti yuktam hṛdi apekṣayā tu manuṣya adhikāra tvāt sarva gatasya api para brahmaṇaḥ  hṛdaye avasthānam apekṣya iti jīva abhiprāyam na ca anyaḥ paramātmāna iha grahaṇam arhati iti na jīva param etad vākyam iti arthaḥ manuṣyān eva iti traivarṇikān eva arthi tvāt iti antar saṃjñānām mokṣamāṇānām ca kāmyeṣu karmasu adhikāram niṣedhati śakta tvāt iti tiryak deva ṛṣīṇām aśaktānām adhikāram nivartayati upanayana ādi śāstrāt ca iti śūdrāṇām anadhikāritām darśayati yad api uktam parimāṇa upadeśāt smṛteḥ ca iti yadi etad paramātma param kim iti tarhi jīva iha ucyate nanu paramātmā eva ucyatām ucyate ca jīvaḥ tasmāt jīva param eva iti bhāvaḥ pariharati tad pratyucyata iti jīvasya hi tattvam paramātma bhāvaḥ tad vaktavyam na ca tad jīvam anabhidhāya śakyam vaktum iti jīva ucyata iti arthaḥ tad upari api bādarāyaṇaḥ saṃbhavāt  deva rṣīṇām brahma vijñāna adhikāra cintā samanvaya lakṣaṇe asaṃgata iti asyāḥ prāsaṅgikīm saṃgatim darśayitum prasaṅgam āha aṅguṣṭha mātraśrutiḥ iti syāt etad  deva dīnām vividha vicitra ānanda bhoga bhoginām vairāgya abhāvāt na arthi tvam brahma vidyāyām iti ata āha tatra arthi tvam tāvat mokṣa viṣayam iti kṣaya atiśaya yogyasya svarga ādi upabhoge api bhāvāt asti vairāgyam iti arthaḥ nanu deva ādīnām vigraha ādi abhāva indriya artha saṃnikarṣa jāyāḥ pramāṇa ādi vṛtteḥ anupapatteḥ avidvat tayā sāmarthya abhāvena na adhikāra iti ata āha tadā sāmarthyam iti teṣām iti yathā ca mantra ādibhyaḥ tad avagamaḥ tathā upariṣṭāt upapādayiṣyate nanu śudravat upanayana asaṃbhavena adhyāyana abhāvāt teṣām anadhikāra iti ata āha na ca upanayana śāstreṇa iti na khalu vidhivat  guru mukhāt gṛhyamāṇaḥ  vedaḥ phalavat karma brahma avabodha hetuḥ api tu adhyayana uttara kālam nigama niruj talavyākaraṇa ādi vidita pada tartha saṃgateḥ adhiśābda nyāya tattvasya puṃsaḥ smaryamāṇaḥ sa ca manuṣyāṇām iha janmani iva deva dīnām prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ ata eva svayam pratibhātaḥ  vedaḥ saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ na ca karma anadhikāre brahma vidyān adhikāraḥ  bhavati iti āha yad api karmasu anadhikāra kāraṇam uktam iti vasu ādīnām hi na vasu ādya antaram asti na api bhṛgu ādīnām bhṛgu ādi antaram asti prācām vasu bhṛgu prabhṛtīnām kṣīṇa adhikāra tvena idānīm deva ṛṣi tvā bāvāt iti arthaḥ virodhaḥ karmaṇi iti ced na aneka pratipatteḥ darśanāt  mantra ādi pada samanvayāt pratīya mānor athaḥ pramāṇa antara avirodhe sati upeyaḥ na tu virodhe pramāṇa antara viruddham ca idam vigrahavattva ādi devatāyāḥ tasmāt  ayajamānaḥ prastaraḥ iti ādivat upacarita arthaḥ  mantra ādiḥ vyākhyeyaḥ tathā ca vigraha ādi abhāvāt śabda upahita arthoḥ atha upahitaḥ  vā śabdaḥ  devatā iti acetana tvāt na tasyāḥ kkacid api adhikāra iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti na kasmāt  aneka rūpa pratipatteḥ sā eva kuta iti ata āha darśanāt  śrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tathā hi ekasya aneka kāya nirmāṇam adarśanāt vā na yujyate bādha darśanāt vā tatra adarśanam asiddham śruti smṛtibhyām darśanāt  na hi laukikena pramāṇena adṛṣṭa tvāt āgamena dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam bhavati mā bhūt yāga ādīnām api svarga ādi sādhana tvam adṛṣṭam iti manuṣya śararasya mātā pitṛ saṃyoga ja tu aniyamāt api pitroḥ saṃyoge kutas  saṃbhavaḥ saṃbhave vā anagnitaḥ  api dhūmaḥ syāt iti bādha darśanam iti ced  hanta kim śarīra tvena hetunā deva ādi śarīram api mātā pitṛ saṃyoga jam siṣā dhayiṣasi tathā ca aneka antaḥ  hetvābhāsaḥ sveda ja udbhid jānām śarīrāṇām atat bhetu tvāt  icchā mātra nirmāṇa tvam deha ādīnām adṛṣṭa caram iti ced  na bhūta upādāna tvena icchā mātra nirmāṇatva asiddheḥ bhūta vaśinām hi deva ādīnām nānā kāya cikīrṣā vaśāt bhūta kriyā utpattau bhūtānām paraspara saṃyogena nānā kāyam asutpādāt dṛṣṭā ca vaśina icchā vaśā dvaye kriyā yathā viṣa vidyā vida icchā mātreṇa viṣa śakala preraṇam na ca viṣa vidyā vidaḥ  darśanena adhiṣṭhāna darśanāt vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa bhūta adarśanāt deva ādīnām katham adiṣṭhānam iti vācyam kāca abhra paṭala pihitasya viprakṛṣṭasya ca bhaumaśanaiścara ādeḥ darśanena vyabhācirāt  asaktāḥ ca dṛṣṭayaḥ  deva ādīnām kāca abhra paṭala ādivat mahī mahīdhara ādibhiḥ na vyavadhīyante na ca asmad ādivat teṣām śarīri tvena vyavahita aviprakṛṣṭa ādi darśana asaṃbhavaḥ  anumīyata iti vācyam āgama virodhinaḥ  anumānasya utpāda ayogāt antārdhānam ca añjana ādinā manujānām iva teṣām prabhavatām upapadyate tena saṃnihitānām api na kratu deśe darśanam bhaviṣyati tasmāt sūktam aneka pratipatteḥ iti tathā hi kati devāḥ  iti upakramya iti vaiśvadeva śāstrasya hi nividi akati devāḥ iti upakramya nividā eva uttaram dattam śākalyāya yājñavalkyena trayaḥ ca trī ca śatā trayaḥ ca trī ca sahasra iti vivinnāma śas māna devatā saṃkhyā vācakāni mantra padāni etad uktam bhavati vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasya uttaram atrayaḥ ca trī ca śatā ityādi yāvat saṃkhyākā vaiśvadeva nividi saṃkhyātā devāḥ te  etāvanta iti punar ca śākalyena akatame te iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu yājñavalkyasya uttaram mahimāna eva eṣām ete trayastriṃśat tvā iva devāḥ  iti aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśa ādityā indraḥ ca prajāpatiḥ ca iti trayastriṃśat devāḥ tatra agniḥ ca pṛthivī ca vāyuḥ ca antarikṣam ca ādityaḥ ca dyauḥ ca candramāḥ ca nakṣatrāṇi ca iti vasavaḥ ete hi prāṇinām karma phala āśrayeṇa kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta rūpeṇa pariṇamantaḥ  jagat idam sarvam vāsayanti tasmāt vasavaḥ katame rudrā iti daśa ime puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhi karma indriyāṇi daśa ekādaśam ca mana iti tad etāni prāṇaḥ tad vṛtti tvāt te hi prāyaṇa kāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣam rodayanti iti rudrāḥ katama ādityā iti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya avayavāḥ punar  punar  paru vartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtām āyūṃṣu ca karma phala upabhogam ca ādāpayanti iti ādityāḥ aśaniḥ indraḥ sā hi balam sā hi indrasya paramā īśatā tayā hi sarvān prāṇinaḥ pramāpayati tena stanayitnuḥ aśaniḥ indraḥ yajñaḥ prajā pitiḥ ita yajña sādhanam ca yajña rūpam ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ eta eva trayastriṃśat devāḥ ṣaṇṇām agniṣṭathivī vāṭu antarikṣa āditya divām mahimānaḥ  na tatas  bhidyante ṣaṭ eva tu devāḥ te tu ṣaṣ agnim pṛthivīm ca ekūkṛtya antarikṣam vāyum ca ekīkṛtya divam ca ādityam ca ekīkṛtya trayaḥ  lokāḥ traya eva devāḥ  bhavanti eta eva ca trayaḥ  anna prāṇayoḥ antarbhavantaḥ  anna prāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ tau  api adhyardhaḥ  deva ekaḥ katamaḥ  adhyardhaḥ yaḥ  ayam vāyuḥ pavate katham ayam eka eva adhyardhaḥ yad asmin sati sarvam idam adhyardham vṛddhim prāpnoti tena adhyardha iti katama eka iti sa eva adhyardhaḥ prāṇa ekaḥ  brahma sarva deva ātma tvena bṛhat tvāt brahma tad eva tyat iti ācakṣate parokṣa abhidhāyakena śabdena tasmāt ekasya eva devasya mahima vaśāt yugapad aneka deva rūpa tām āha śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ ca nigavya ākhyātā api ca pṛthagjanānām api upāya anuṣṭhāna vaśāt prāpta aṇi madya aiśvaryāṇām yugapad aṅga bhāva pratipattiḥ aṅgama avagamanam tasya darśanāt  tad eva parisphuṭam darśayitum vyatirekam tāvat āha kkacid eka iti na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣu ekaḥ  brāhmaṇaḥ  yugapad aṅga bhāvam gantum arhati ekasya anekatra yuhapad aṅga bhāvam āha kkacid ca eka iti yathā ekam brāhmaṇam uddiśya yugapad namaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhiḥ tathā sva sthāna sthitām ekām devatām uddiśya bahubhiḥ yajamānaiḥ nānā deśa avasthitaiḥ yugapad dhaviḥ tyajyate tasyāḥ ca tatra asaṃnihitāyā api aṅga bhāvaḥ  bhavati asti hi tasyāḥ  yugapad viprakṛṣṭa an eka artha upalambha sāmarthyam iti upapāditam śabda iti ced na atas  prabhavāt pratyakṣa anumānābhyām gaḥtva ādivat pūrva avamarśa abhāvāt upādheḥ api ekasya apratīteḥ pācaka ādivat ākāśaṣa ādi śabdavat vyakti vacanā eva vasu ādi śabdāḥ tasyāḥ ca nitya tvāt tayā saha saṃbandhaḥ  nityaḥ  bhavet  vigraha ādi yoge tu sāvayava tvena vasu ādīnām anitya tvāt tatas  pūrvam vasu ādi śabdaḥ  na sva arthena saṃbaddha āsīn sva arthasya eva abhāvāt tatas ca utpanne vasu ādau vasu ādi śabda saṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavan devadatta ādi śabda saṃbandha vatpuruṣa buddhi prabhava iti tad pūrva kaḥ vākya artha pratyayaḥ api puruṣa buddhi adhīnaḥ syāt  puruṣa buddhiḥ ca māna antara adhīna janma iti māna antara apekṣayā prāmāṇyam vedasya vyāhanyeta iti śaṅkā arthaḥ uttaram na atas  prabhavāt  vasutva ādi jāti vācakāt śabdāt tad jātīyām vyaktim cikīrṣitām buddhi vāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam tad idam tad prabhava tvam etad uktam bhavati yadi api na śabda upādāna kāmam vasu ādīnām brahma upādāna tvāt  tathā api nimitta kāraṇam uktena krameṇa na ca etāvatā śabda artha saṃbandhasya anitya tvam vasu ādi jāteḥ vā tad upādheḥ vā yayā kayācid ā akṛtya avacchinnasya nitya tvāt iti imam eva ārtam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām vibhajate nanu janma ādyasya yata iti te nigada vyākhyāte tad kim idānīm svayaṃbhuvā vāc nirmitā kāli dāsa ādibhiḥ iva kumāra saṃbhava ādi tathā ca tad eva pramāṇa antara apekṣa vākya tvāt aprāmāṇyam āpatitam iti ata āha utsargaḥ  api ayam vācaḥ saṃpradāya pravartana ātmaka iti saṃpradāya u guru śiṣya paramparayā adhyayanam etad uktam bhavati svayaṃbhuvaḥ  veda kartṛ tve api na kāli dāsa ādivat svatantra tvam api tu pūrva sṛṣṭi anusāreṇa etad ca asmābhiḥ upapāditam upapādayiṣyati ca agre bhāṣya kāraḥ api ca adya tve api etad dṛśyate tad darśanāt prācām api kartṛṇām tathā abhāvaḥ  anumīyata iti āha apica cikīrṣitam iti ākṣipati kimātmakam punar iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ vācaka śabda prabhava tvam hi devānām abhyupetavyam avācakena teṣām buddhā  anālekhanāt tatra na tāvat vasu ādīnām vakārāt ayaḥ  varṇā vācakāḥ teṣām pratyuccāraṇam anya tvena aśakya saṃgati graha tvāt agṛhīta saṃgateḥ ca vācaka tve ati prasaṅgāt  api ca ete pratyekam vā vākya artham abhidadhīran militā vā na tāvat pratyekam eka varṇa uccāraṇa anantaram artha pratyaya adarśanāt  varṇa antara uccāraṇa anarthakya prasaṅgāt ca na apa militāḥ teṣām eka vaktṛ prayujyamānānam rūpataḥ  vyaktitaḥ  vā pratikṣaṇam apavargiṇām mithas  sāhitya saṃbhava abhāvāt na ca pratyeka samudāyābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ saṃbhavati na ca svarūpa sāhitya abhāve api varṇānām āgneya ādīnām iva saṃskāra dvārakam asti sāhityam iti sāṃpratam vikalpa asaha tvāt kaḥ  nu khalu ayam saṃskāraḥ  abhimataḥ kim apūrvam āgneya ādi janyam iva kiṃvā bhāvanā para nāmā smṛti prasava bījam na tāvat prathamaḥ kalpaḥ na hi śabdaḥ svarūpataḥ  aṅgataḥ  vā aviditaḥ  avidita saṃgatiḥ artha dhī hetuḥ indriyavat  uccaritasya badhireṇa agṛhītasya gṛhītasya vāgṛhīta saṃgateḥ apratyāyaka tvāt  tasmāt viditaḥ  vidita saṃgatiḥ vidita samasta jñāpana aṅgaḥ ca śabdaḥ  dhūma ādivat pratyāya kaḥ  abhyupeyaḥ tathā ca apūrva abhidhānaḥ  asya saṃskāraḥ pratyāyana aṅgam iti artha pratyayāt prāc vagantavyaḥ na ca tadā tasya avagama upāyaḥ  asti artha pratyayāt tu tad avagamam samarthayamānaḥ  duruttaram itaretara āśrayam āviśati saṃskāra vasāyāt artha pratyayaḥ tatas ca tad avasāya iti bhāvanā abhidhānaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ smṛti prasava sāmarthyam ātmanaḥ na ca tad eva artha pratyaya prasava sāmarthyam api bhavitum arhati na api tasya eva sāmarthyasya sāmarthyau  antaram na hi yā eva bahneḥ dahana śaktiḥ sā eva tasya prakāśana śaktiḥ na api dahana śakteḥ prakāśana śaktiḥ apica vyutkrameṇa uccaritebhyaḥ  varṇebhyaḥ sā eva asti smṛti bījam vāsanā iti artha pratyayaḥ prasajyeta na ca asti tasmāt na kathañcid api varṇā arthavīhetavaḥ na api tad atiriktaḥ sphoṭa ātmā tasya anubhavān ārohāt  artha dhiyaḥ tu kāryāt tad avagame paraspara āśraya prasaṅga iti ukta prāyam sattā mātreṇa tu tasya nityasya artha dhī hetu bhāve sarvadā artha pratyaya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ nirapekṣasya hetoḥ sadātana tvāt  tasmāt vācakāt śabdāt vācya utpāda iti anupapannam iti atra ācārya deśīya āha sphoṭam iti āha iti mṛṣyāmahe na varṇāḥ pratyāyakā iti na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ tad anubhava an antaram vidita saṃgateḥ arthadhī samutpādāt  na ca varṇa atiriktasya tasya anubhāvaḥ  na asti gauḥ iti ekam padam gām ānaya śuklam iti ekam vākyak iti nānā varṇa padātirikta eka pada vākya avagateḥ sarva janīna tvāt na ca ayam asi iti bādhake eka pada vākya anubhavaḥ śakyaḥ  mithyā iti vaktum na api aupādhikaḥ upādhiḥ khalu ekadhī grāhyatā vā syāt  eka arthadhī hetu tā vā na tāvat ekadhī gocarāṇām dhava svadira palāśānām eka nirbhāsaḥ pratyayaḥ samasti tathā sati dhava svadira palāśā iti na jātu syāt  na api ekārtha dhī hetu tā tad hetutvasya varṇeṣu vyāsedhāt  tad hetu tvena tu sāhitya kalpane anyonya āśraya prasaṅgaḥ sāhityāt tad hetu tvam tad hetu tvāt ca sāhityam iti tasmāt ayam abādhitaḥ anupādhiḥ ca pada vākya gocara eka nirbhāsa anubhāvaḥ  varṇa atiriktam vācakam ekam avalambena sa sphoṭa iti tam ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekam vyañjayantaḥ  api na drāgi tvā iva viśadayanti yena drāgā artha dhīḥ syāt  api tu ratna tattva jñānavat yathāsvam dvi tri catuṣpañca ṣaṣ darśana janita saṃskāra paripāka saciva cetaḥ labdha janmani carame cetasi cakāsti viśadam pada vākya tattvam iti prāk anutpannāyāḥ tad anantaram arthadhiya udaya iti na uttareṣām ānarthakyam dhvanīnām na api prācām tad abhāve tad janita saṃskāra tad paripāka abhāvena anugraha ābāvāt antyasya cetasaḥ kevalasya ajanaka tvāt  na ca pada pratyayavat  pratyekam avyaktām arthadhiyam ādhāsyanti prāñcaḥ varṇāḥ caramaḥ tu tad sacivaḥ sphuṭatarām iti yuktam vyakta avyakta avabhāsitāyāḥ pratyakṣa jñāna niyamāt sphoṭa jñānasya ca pratyakṣa tvāt  artha dhiyaḥ tu apratyakṣāyā māna antara janmanaḥ  vyakta eva upajanaḥ  na vā syāt na punar asphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ tasmāt nityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācakaḥ  na varṇā iti tad etad ācārya deśīya matam sva matam upapādayan  apākaroti varṇā eva tu na śabda iti evam hi varṇa atiriktaḥ sphoṭaḥ  abyupeyeta yadi varṇānām vācaka tvam na saṃbhavet  sa ca anubhava paddhatim adhyāsīta dvidhī ca vācaka tvam varṇānām kṣaṇika tvena aśakya saṃgati graha tvāt vā vyasta samasta prakāra dvaya abhāvāt vā na tāvat prathamaḥ kalpaḥ varṇānām kṣaṇaka tve māna abhāvāt nanu varṇānām pratyuccāraṇam anya tvam sarva jana prasiddham na pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt  na ca asati api ekatve jvālā ādivat sādṛśya nibandhanam etad  pratyabhijñānam iti sāṃpratam sādṛśya nibandhana tvam asya balavda bādha kopa nipātāt vā asthīyeta kkacit jvālā ādau vyabhicāra darśanāt vā tatra kkacid vyabhicāra darśanena tad utprekṣāyām ucyate vṛddheḥ svatas prāmāṇ vādibhiḥ autprekṣeta hi yaḥ  mohāt ajñātam api bādhanam sa sarva vyavahāreṣu saṃśaya ātmā kṣayam vrajet  iti prapañcitam ca etad asmābhiḥ nyāya kaṇikāyām na ca idam pratyabhijñānam gatvā ādi jāti viṣayam na gādi vyakti viṣayam tāsām pratinaram bheda upalambhādata eva śabda beda upalambhāt vāc tṛ bheda unnīyate asomaśarma adhīte na viṣṇuśarmā iti yuktam yatas  bahuṣu gakāram uccārayatsu nipuṇam anubhavaḥ parīkṣyatām yathā kālakṣīm ca svastimatīm ca īkṣamāṇasya vyakti bheda prathāyām satyām eva tad anugatam ekam sāmānyam prathate tathā kim gakāra ādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣu eva ga tvam ekam tad anugatam cakāsti kiṃvā yathā gaḥ tvam ājānata ekam bhinna deśa parimāṇa saṃsthāna vyakti upadhāna bhedāt bhinna deśam iva alpam iva mahat iva dīrgham iva vāmanam iva tathāga vyaktiḥ ājānata ekā api vyañjaka bheda ātta dharma anupātinī iva prathata iti bhavanta eva vidāṅkurvantu tatra havyakti bhedam aṅgīkṛtya api yaḥ  gatvasya ekasya para upadhāna bheda kalpanā prayāsaḥ sa varam gavyaktau  eva astu kim antar gaḍunā gatvena abhyupetena yathā āhuḥ atena yad prārtyate jāteḥ tad varṇāt eva lapsyate vyakti labhyam tu nādebhya iti gatvā ādi dhīḥ vṛthāḥ na ca svastintya ādivat  gavyakti bheda pratyayaḥ sphuṭaḥ pratyuccaraṇam asti tathā sati daśa gakarān udacārayat caitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt  na syāt daśa kṛtva udacārayat gakāram iti na ca eṣa jāti abhiprāyaḥ  abhyāsaḥ  yathā śata kṛtvas tittirīn upāyuṅkta devadatta iti atra hi sa uraḥ tāḍam krandataḥ  api gakāra ādi vyaktau lokasya uccāraṇa abhyāsa pratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ ca udakaḥ pratyabhijñāna bādhakam utthāpayatim katham hi ekasmin kāle bahūnām uccārayatām iti yad  yugapad viruddha dharma saṃsargavat tad  na an yathā gavāśvādiḥ dviśapha ekaśapha keśara gala kambala ādimān yugapad udātta anudātta ādi viruddha dharma saṃsargavān  ca ayam varṇaḥ tasmāt nānā bhavitum arhati na codātta ādayaḥ  vyañjaka dharmāḥ na varṇa dharmā iti sāṃpratam vyañjakā hi asya vāyavaḥ teṣām aśravaṇa tve katham tad dharmāḥ śrāvaṇāḥ syuḥ idam tāvat atra vaktavyam na hi guṇa gocaram indriyam guṇinam api gocarayati mā bhūvan ghrāṇa rasana śrotrāṇām gandha rasa śabda gocarāṇām tadvantaḥ pṛthivī udaka ākāśā gocarāḥ evam ca mā nāma bhūdvāyu gocaram śrotram tad guṇān  tu udātta ādīn gocarayiṣyati te ca śabda saṃsarga grahāt  śabda dharma tvena adhyavasīyante na ca śabdasya pratyabijñāna avadhṛta eka tvasya svarūpata udātta ādayaḥ  dharmāḥ paraspara virodhinaḥ  aparyāyeṇa saṃbhavanti tasmāt yathā mukhasya ekasya maṇi kṛpāṇa darpaṇa ādi upadhāna vaśāt nānā deśa parimāṇa saṃsthāna bheda vibhramaḥ evam ekasya api varṇasya vyañjaka dhvani nibandhanaḥ  ayam viruddha nānā dharma saṃsarga vibhramaḥ na tu bhāvikaḥ  nānā dharma saṃsarga iti sthite abhyupetya parihāram āha bhāṣya kāraḥ athavā dhvani kṛta iti athavā iti pūrva pakṣam vyāvartayati bhavetām nāma guṇa guṇinau  eka indriya grāhyau tathā api adoṣaḥ dhvanīnām api śabdavat śrāvaṇa tvāt dhvani svarūpam praśna pūrvakam varṇebhyaḥ  niṣkarṣayati kaḥ punar ayam iti na ca ayam anirdhārita viśeṣa varṇatva sāmānya mātra pratyayaḥ na tu varṇa atiriktad abhi vyañjaka dhvani pratyaya iti sāṃpratam tasya anunāsikatva ādi bheda bhinnasya gādi vyaktivat pratyabhijñāna abhāvāt apratyabhijñāyamānasya ca ekatva abhāvena sāmānya bhāva anupapatteḥ tasmāt avarṇa ātmakaḥ  vā eṣa śabdaḥ śabda atiriktaḥ  vā dhvaniḥ śabdavñjakaḥ śrāvaṇaḥ  abhyupeyaḥ ubhayathā api cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tad tad dhvani bheda upadhānena anunāsika tvāt ayaḥ  avagamyamānāḥ tad dharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svatas  śabdasya dharmāḥ tathā ca yeṣām anunāsika tvāt ayaḥ  dharmāḥ paraspara viruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣām dhvanīnām anitya tā na hi teṣu pratyabhijñānam asti yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānam na teṣām anunāsika tvāt ayaḥ  dharmā iti na anityāḥ evam ca sati sa ālambanā iti yadi eṣa parasya āgrahaḥ dharmiṇī gṛhyamāṇe tad dharmā na śakyā grahītum iti evam nāma astu tathā tuṣyatu paraḥ tathā api adoṣa  iti arthaḥ tad anena prabandhena kṣaṇika tvena varṇānām aśakya saṃgati graha tayā yad avācaka tvam āpāditam varṇānām tad apākṛtam vyasta samasta prakāra dvaya asaṃbhavena tu yadā sañjitam tad nirācikīrṣuḥ āha varṇebhyaḥ ca artha prateḥ iti kalpanāmamṛṣyamāṇa  eka deśyā āha na kalpayāmi iti nirākaroti na asyāḥ  api buddheḥ iti nirūpayatu tāvat gauḥ iti ekam padam iti dhiyam āyuṣmān kim iyam pūrva anubhūtān gakāra ādīn eva sāmastyena avagāhate kiṃvā gakāra ādi atiriktam gavayam iva varāha ādibhyaḥ  vilakṣaṇam yadi gakāra ādi vilakṣaṇam avabhāsayet  gakāra ādi rūṣitaḥ pratyayaḥ na syāt  na hi varāha dhīḥ mahiṣa rūṣitam varāham avagāhate pada tattvam ekam pratyekam abhivyañjayantaḥ  dhvanayaḥ prayatna bheda bhinnāḥ tulya sthāna karaṇa niṣpādya tayā anyonya visadṛśa tad tad pada vyañjaka dhvani sādṛśyena sva vyañjanīyasya ekasya pada tattvasya mithas  visadṛśa an eka pada sādṛśyāni āpādayantaḥ sādṛśya upadhāna bhedāt ekam api abhāgam api na anā iva bhāgavat iva bhāsayanti mukhyam iva ekam niyata varṇa parimāṇa sthāna saṃśtāna bhedam api maṇi kṛpāṇa darpaṇa āt ayaḥ  aneka varṇa parimāṇa saṃsthāna bhedam evam ca kalpitā eva asya bhāgā varṇā iti ced  tad kim idānīm varṇa bhedān asati api bādhake mithyā iti vaktu madhya vasitaḥ  asi eka dhīḥ ā iva nānātvasya bika iti ced  hanta āsyām nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātva avabhāsa ekaika tvam kasmāt na bādhate athavā vanasena ādi buddhivat ekatva nānātve na viruddhe naḥ khalu senā vana buddhī gaja padāti turaga ādīnām campaka aśoka kiṃśuka ādīnām ca bhedam apabādha māne udīyete api tu bhinnānām eva satām kenacid ekena upādhinā avacchinnānām eka tvām āpādayataḥ na ca purā upādhikena eka tvena sva bhāvikam nānā tvam virudhyate na hi aupacārikam agni tvam māṇavakasya svābhāvika naratva virodhi tasmāt pratyeka varṇa anubhava jatita bhāvanā nicaya labdha janmani nikhila varṇa avagāhini smṛti jñāna ekasmin bhāsamānānām varṇānām tad eka vijñāna viṣaya tayā vā eka artha dhī hetu tayā vā eka tvam aupacārikam avagantavyam na ca eka artha dhī hetu tvena ekatvam eka tvena ca eka artha dhī hetu bhāva iti paraspara āśrayam na hi artha pratyayāt pūrvam etāvantaḥ  varṇā eka smṛti samārohiṇaḥ  na prathante na ca tad prathana anantaram vṛddhasya artha dhīḥ na unnīyate tad unnayanāt ca teṣām ekārtha dhiyam prati kāraka tvam ekam avagamya eka padatva adhyasānam iti na anyonya āśrayam na ca eka smṛti samārohiṇām krama ākrama viparīta krama prayuktānām abhedaḥ  varṇānām iti yathā kathañcit prayuktebhya etebhyor atha pratyaya prasaṅga  iti vācyam uktam hi ayāvantaḥ  yādṛśā ye ca padārtha pratipādane varṇāḥ prajñāta sāmarthyaḥ te tathā eva avabodhakāḥ iti nanu paṅkti buddhau  ekasya āmakramāyām api vāstavī śālā ādīnām asti paṅgiḥ iti tathā eva prathā yuktā na ca tathā iha varṇānām nityānām vibhūnām ca asti vāstavaḥ kramaḥ pratyaya upādhiḥ tu bhavet  saca eka iti kutastyaḥ krama eṣām iti ced  na ekasyām api smṛtau varṇa rūpavat kramavat pūrva anubhūta tā parāmarśāt tathā hi jāra arāja iti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛti dhiyoḥ tattve api varṇānām krama bhedāt pada bhedaḥ sphuṭataram cakāsti tathā ca na ākrama viparīta krama prayuktānām aviśeṣaḥ smṛti buddhau  ekasyām varṇānām krama prayuktānām yathā āhuḥ apada avadhāraṇa upāyān bahūn icchanti sūrayaḥ krama nyūna atiriktatva svara vākya śruti smṛtiḥ iti śeṣam ati rohita artham diś mātram atra sūcitam vistaraḥ tu tattva bindau  avagantavya iti alam vā naiyāyikaiḥ vivādena santu anityā eva varṇāḥ tathā api gatvā ādi avacchedena eva saṃgati grahaḥ  avana ādiḥ ca vyavahāraḥ setsyati iti āha atha api nāma iti ata eva ca nitya tvam nanu prācyām eva mīmāṃsāyām vedasya nitya tvam siddham tad kim punar  sādhyata iti ata āha svatantrasya kartuḥ asmaraṇāt eva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti na hi anityāt jagat utpattum arhati tasya api utpattimat tvena sa apekṣa tvāt  tasmāt nityaḥ  vedaḥ jagat utpatti hetu tvāt  īśvaravat iti siddham eva nitya tvam anena dṛḍhīkṛtam śeṣam ati rohita artham samāna nāma rūpa tvāt ca āvṛttau  api avirodhaḥ  darśanāt smṛteḥ ca śaṅkā pada uttara tvāt sūtrasya paṭhati atha api syāt iti abhidhāna abhidheya avicchede hi saṃbandha nitya tvam bhavet  evam adhyāyapaka adhyetṛ paraṃpara avicchede vedasya nitya tvam syāt  niranvayasya tu jagataḥ pravilaye atyanta āsataḥ ca apūrvasya utpāde abhidhāna abhidheyau  atyantam ucchinnau  iti kim āśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt  adhyāpaka adhyetṛ saṃtāna vicchede ca kim āśrayaḥ  vedaḥ syāt  na ca jīvāḥ tad vāsanā vāsitaḥ santi iti vācyam antaḥkaraṇa ādi upādhi kalpitā hi te tad vicchede na sthātum arhanti na ca brahmaṇaḥ tad vāsanā tasya vidyā ātmanaḥ śuddha svabhāvasya tad ayogāt  brahmaṇaḥ ca sṛṣṭi ādau  antaḥkaraṇāni tad avacchinnāḥ cha jīvāḥ prādurbhavantaḥ  na pūrva karma avidyā   āsanāvantaḥ  bhavitum arhanti apūrva tvāt  tasmāt viruddham idam śabda artha saṃbandha veda nitya tvam sṛṣṭi pralaya abhyupagamena iti abhidhātṛ grahaṇena adhyāpaka adhyeta ārau  uktau śaṅkām nirākartum sūtram avatārayati tatra idam abhidhīyate samāna nāma rūpa tvāt iti yadi api mahāpralaya samaye na antaḥkaraṇa ādayaḥ samudācarat vṛttayaḥ santi tathā api sva kāraṇe anirvācyāyām avidyāyām līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śakti rūpeṇa karma vikṣepaka avidyā vāsanābhiḥ mahā avatiṣṭhanta eva tathā ca smṛtiḥ aāsīt idam tamaḥ bhūtam aprajñātam alakṣaṇam apratarkyam avijñeyam prasuptam iva sarvaḥ iti te ca avadhaim prāpya parameśvara icchā pracoditā yathā kūrma dehe nilīnāni aṅgāni tatas  niḥsaranti yathā vā varṣa apāye prāpta mṛd bhāvāni maṇḍūka śarīrāṇi tad vāsanā vāsita tayā ghana ghana agha nāsā rāvaseka suhitāni punar maṇḍūka deha bhāvam anubhavanti tathā pūrva vāsanā vaśāt pūrva samāna nāma rūpāṇi utpadyante etad uktam bhavati yadi api īśvarāt prabhavaḥ saṃsāra maṇḍalasya tathā api īśvaraḥ prāṇabhṛt karma avidyā sahakārī tad anurūpam eva sṛjati na ca sarga pralaya pravāhasya anāditām antareṇa etad upapadyata iti sarga pralaya ābyupagaṃme api saṃsāra anāditā na virudhyata iti tad idam uktam upapadyate ca api upalabhyate ca āgamata iti syāt etad  bhavatu anāditā saṃsārasya tathā api mahāpralaya antarite kutas  smaraṇam vedānām ityata āha anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpa prabodhayoḥ iti yadi apiprāṇā mātrau  aśeṣa tā tanniḥ śeṣaye suṣupta pralaya avasthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ tathā api karma vikṣepa saṃskāra sahita laya lakṣaṇā vidyauvaśeṣa tāsāmyena svāpa pralaya avasthayā ārabheda iti draṣṭavyam nanu na aparyāyeṇa sarveṣām suṣupta avasthā keṣāñcid tadā prabodhāt  tebhyasya supta utthitānām grahaṇa saṃbhavāt  prāyaṇa kāla viprakarṣayoḥ ca vāsanā uccheda kāraṇayoḥ abhāvena satyām vāsanāyām smaraṇa upapatteḥ śabda artha saṃbandha veda vyahāra anucchedaḥ  yujyate mahāpralayaḥ tu aparyāyeṇa prāṇabhṛt mātravatartī prāyaṇa kāla viprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāra mātra uccheda hetū sta iti kutas  suṣuptavat pūrva prabodha vyavahāravat utta prabodha vyavahāra iti codayati syāt etad  svāpa iti pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ sati api vyavahāra uccheni iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ na tāvat prāyaṇa kāla viprakarṣau sarva saṃskāra ucchedakau pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandhāt jātasya harṣa bhaya śoka saṃpratipatteḥ anupapatteḥ manuṣya janma vāsanānām ca aneka jāti antara sahasra vyavahitānām punar manuṣya jāti saṃvartakena karmaṇā abhivyakti abhāva prasaṅgāt  tasmāt nikṛṣṭa dhiyām api yatra sati api prāyaṇa kāla viprakarṣa ādau pūrva vāsana anuvṛttiḥ tatra kā eva kathā parameśvara anugraheṇa dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya atiśaya saṃpannānām hiraṇyagarbha prabhṛtīnām mahā dhiyām yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyaḥ  jñāna ādīnām anubhūyate nikarṣaḥ evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavataḥ  hiraṇyagarbhat jñāna ādīnām prakarṣe api saṃbhāvte tathā ca tad abhivadantaḥ  veda smṛti vādāḥ prāmāṇyam apratyūham aśruvate evam ca atrabhavatām hiraṇyagarbha ādīnām parameśvara anugṛhītānām upapadyate kalpa antara saṃbandhi nikhila vyavahāra anusaṃdhānam iti sugamam anyat  syāt etad  astu kalpanā antara vyavahāra anusaṃdhānam teṣām asyām tu sṛṣṭau  anya eva deśaḥ anya eva ca eṣām arthāḥ anya eva varṇa āśramāḥ dharmāt ca anarthoḥ athaḥ ca adharmāt anarthaḥ ca īpsitor athaḥ ca anīpsitaḥ apūrva tvāt sargasya tasmāt kṛtam atra kalpa antara vyavahāra anusaṃdhānena at kiñcitkara tvāt  tathā ca pūrva vyavahāra ucchedāt śabda artha saṃbandhaḥ ca vedaḥ ca anityau prasajya īyātām iti ata āha prāṇinām ca sukha prāptaya iti yathāvastu svabhāva sāmarthyam hi sargaḥ pravartate na tu svabhāva sāmarthyam anyathayitum arhati na hi jātu sukham tattvena jihāsyate duḥkham ca upāditsyate na ca jātu dharma adharmayoḥ sāmarthya aviparyayaḥ bhavati na hi mṛd piṇḍāt paṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ ca tantubhyaḥ  jāyate tathā sati vastu sāmarthya niyama abhāvāt sarvam sarvasmāt bhavet iti pipāsuḥ api dahanam āhṛtya pipāsām upaśamayet śīta ārtaḥ  vā toyam āhṛtya śīta ārtim iti tena sṛṣṭi antare api brahmahatyā ādiḥ anartha hetuḥ eva artha hetuḥ ca yāga ādiḥ iti ānupūrvyam siddham evam ya eva vedā asmin kalpe ta eva kalpa antare ta eva ca eṣām arthā ta eva ca varṇa āśramāḥ dṛṣṭa sādharmya saṃbhave tad vaidharma kalpanam anumāna āgama viruddham aāgamāḥ ca iha bhūyāṃsaḥ  bhāṣya kāreṇa darśitāḥ śruti smṛti purāṇa ākhyāḥ tad vyākopaḥ  anyathā bhavet  tasmāt suṣṭu uktam samāna nāma rūpa tvāt ca āvṛttau  api avirodha iti aagniḥ vā akāmayata iti bhāvinām vṛttim āśritya yajamāna eva agniḥ ucyate na hi agneḥ devatā antaram agniḥ asti madhu ādiṣu asaṃbhavāt anadhikāram jaiminiḥ brahma vidyāsu adhikāram deva rṣīṇām brūvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ  jāyate kim sarvāsu brahma vidyā sva viśeṣeṇa sarveṣām kiṃvā kāsucid eva keṣāñcid  yadi aviśeṣeṇa sarvāsu tatas  madhu ādi vidyāsu asaṃbhavaḥ katham asau vā ādityaḥ  deva madhu iti atra hi manuṣyā ādityam madhu adhyāsena upāsīran upāsya upāsaka bhāvaḥ  hi bheda adhiṣṭhānaḥ  na sva ātmani ādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati na ca āditya antaram asti prācām ādityānām asmin kalpe kṣīṇa adhikāra tvāt punar ca āditya vyapāśrayāṇi pañca rohita ādīni upakramya iti ayam arthaḥ aasau vā ādityaḥ  deva madhu iti devānām moda hetu tvāt madhu iva madhu bhrāmara madhu sārūpyam āhāsya śrutiḥ atasya madhunaḥ  dyauḥ eva tiraścīna vaṃśaḥ antarikṣam madhu apūpaḥ ādityasya hi madhunaḥ  apūpaḥ paṭalam antarikṣam ākāśam tatra avasthānāt yāni ca soma ājya payaḥ prabhṛtīni agnau hūyate tāni āditya raśmibhiḥ agni saṃvalitairu utpanna pākāni amṛtībhāvam āpannāni aditya maṇḍalam ṛc mantra madhunā eparnīyante yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhyaḥ  āhṛtya makarandam sva sthānam ānayanti evam ṛc mantra bhramarāḥ prayoga samavaita artha smaraṇa ādibhiḥ ṛgveda vihitebhyaḥ karma kusumebhya āhṛtya tad niṣpannam makarandam āditya maṇḍalam lohitābhiḥ asya prācībhī raśmi nāḍībhiḥ ānayanti tad amṛtam vasava upajīvanti atha asya ādityam adhunaḥ  dakṣiṇābhī raśmi nāḍībhiḥ śukla abhi yajurveda vihita karma kusumebhya āhṛtya agnau hutam soma ādi pūrvavat amṛta bhāvam āpannam yajurveda mantra bhramarā āditya maṇḍalam ānayanti tad etam ṛtam rudrā upajīvanti atha asya āditya madhunaḥ pratīcībhī raśmi nāḍībhiḥ kṛṣṇābhiḥ sāmaveda vihita karma kusumebhya āhṛtyau hutam soma ādi pūrvavat amṛta bhāvam āpannam sāma mantra stotra bhramarā āditya maṇḍalam ānayanti tad amṛtam ādityā upajīvanti atha asya āditya madhuna udīcibhiḥ ati kṛṣṇābhiḥ  raśmi nāḍībhiḥ atha veda vihitebhyaḥ karma kusumebhya āhṛtya agnau hutam soma ādi pūrvavat amṛta bhavam āpannam atharvāṅgirasa mantra bhramarāḥ tathā aśvamedha vācaḥ stoma karma kusumāt  hati hāsa purāṇamnatra bhramarā āditya maṇḍalam ānayanti aśvamedhe vācaḥ stome ca pāriplavam śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāt itihāsa purāṇa mantrāṇām api asti prayogaḥ tad amṛtam maruta upajīvanti atha asya yā āditya madhuna ūrdhvā raśmi nāḍyaḥ  gopyāḥ tābhiḥ upāsana bhramarāḥ praṇava kusumāt āhṛtya āditya maṇḍalam ānayanti tad amṛtam upajīvanti sādhyāḥ tā etā āditya vyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitāt ayaḥ  raśmināḍya ṛc ādi saṃbaddhāḥ krameṇa upadiśya iti yojanā etad eva amṛtam dṛṣṭvā upalabhya yathāsvam samaḥ ta ejha karaṇaiḥ yaśaḥ teja handriya sākalya vīryānna adya anya mṛtam tad upalabhya āditye tṛpyati tena khalu amṛtena devānām vasu ādīnām modanam vidadhat ādityaḥ  madhu etad uktam bhavati na kevalam upāsya upāsaka bhāva ekasmin virudhyate api tu jñātṛ jñeya bhāvaḥ ca prāpya prāpaka bhāvaḥ ca iti tathā agniḥ pāda iti adhidaivatam khalu ākāśe brahma dṛṣṭi vidhāna artham uktam ākāśasya hi sarva gata tvam rūpa ādi hīna tve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyam tasya ca etasya ākāśasya brahmaṇaḥ catvāraḥ pādā agni ādayaḥ aagniḥ pādaḥ ityādinā darśitāḥ yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyatanta evam agni ādayaḥ  api na ākāśena sarva gatena iti ākāśasya pādāḥ tad evam ākāśasya catuṣpadaḥ  brahma dṛṣṭim vidhāya sva rūpeṇa vāyum saṃvarga guṇakam upāsyam vidhātum mahīkaroti vāyuḥ vāva saṃvargaḥ tathā sva rūpeṇa eva ādityam brahma dṛṣṭyā upāsyam vidhātum mahikaroti ādityaḥ  brahma iti ādeśaḥ upadeśaḥ atirohita artham anyat  yadi ucyeta na aviśeṣaṇa sarveṣām deva rṣīṇām sarvāsu brahma vidyāsu adhikāraḥ kintu yathāsaṃbhavam iti tad na idam upatiṣṭhate jyotiṣi bhāvāt ca laukikau hi āt ityādi śabda prayoga pratyayau jyotiḥ maṇḍala ādiṣu dṛṣṭau na ca eteṣām asti caitanyam na hi eteṣu deva datta ādivat tadanu rūpā dṛśyante ceṣṭāḥ syāt etad  mantra artha vāda itihāsa purāṇa lokebhya iti tatra ajagṛbhmāte dakṣiṇam indrahasatam iti ca akāśiḥ indra it iti ca kāśiḥ muṣṭiḥ tathā atuvigrīvaḥ  vapa udaraḥ subāhuḥ andhasaḥ  made indraḥ  vṛtrāṇi jighrate iti vigrahavat tvam devatāyāḥ  mantra artha vādā abhivadanti tathā havirbhojanam devatāyāḥ  darśayanti aaddhi indra piba caprasthitasya ityādayaḥ yathā īśanam aindraḥ  diva indra īśe pṛthivyāḥ  indraḥ  apām indra id parvatānām indraḥ  vṛdhām indra inmedhirāṇām indraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ iti tathā aīśānam asya jagataḥ svardṛśam īśānam indra satthuṣaḥ iti tathā vari vasitāram prati devatāyāḥ prasādam prasannāyāḥ ca phala dānām darśayati aāhutibhiḥ eva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣam ūrjam ca yacchanti iti atṛpta eva enam indra prajayā paśubhiḥ tarpayati iti ca dharma śāstra kārā api āhuḥ ate tṛptāḥ tarpayanti enam sarva kāma phalaiḥ śubhaiḥ iti purāṇa vacāṃsi ca bhūyāṃsi devatā vigraha ādi pañcaka prapañcam āpakṣate laukikā api devatā vigraha ādi pañcakam smaranti ca uparacaranti ca tathā hi yamam daṇḍa hastam ālikhanti ruṇam pāśa hastam indram vajrahastam kathayanti ca devatā havirbhuja iti tathā īśanam imām āhiḥ deva grāmaḥ  deva kṣetram iti tathā asyāḥ prasādam ca prasannāyāḥ ca phala dānam āhuḥ prasannaḥ  asya paśupatiḥ putraḥ  asya jātaḥ prasannaḥ  asya dhanadaḥ  dhanam anena labdham iti tad etad pūrva pakṣī dūṣayati na iti ucyate na hi tāvat lokaḥ  nāma iti na khalu pratyakṣa ādi vyatiriktaḥ  lokaḥ  nāma pramāṇa antaram asti kintu pratyakṣa ādi mūlā loka prasiddhiḥ satya tām aśrute tad abhāve tu andha parama prāvat mūla abhāvāt vipalvate na ca vigraha ādau pratyakṣa ādīnām atamam asti pramāṇam na ca itihāsa ādi mūlam bhavitum arhati tasya api pauriṣeya tvena pratyakṣa ādi apekṣaṇāt pratyakṣa ādīnām ca atra abhāvāt iti āha itihāsa purāṇam api iti nanu uktam mantra artha vādebhyaḥ  vigraha ādi pañcaka prasiddhiḥ iti ata āha artha vādā api iti vidhi uddeśena eka vākya tām āpadyamānā artha vādā vidhi viṣaya prāśastyalakṣaṇa aparā na sva arthe pramāṇam bhavitum arhanti ayat paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti hi śābda nyāya vidaḥ pramāṇa antareṇa tu yatra sva arthe api samarthyate yathā vāyoḥ kṣepiṣṭa tvam tatra pramāṇa antara vaśāt saḥ  abhyupeyate na tu śabda sāmarthyāt  yatra tu na pramāṇa antaram asti yathā vigraha ādi pañcake sor athaḥ śabdāt eva avagantavyaḥ atatparaḥ ca śabdaḥ  na tad avagama yutimalam iti tad avagama parasya tatra api tātpar mabhyupetavyam na ca ekam vākyam ubhaya param bhavati iti vākyam bhidyeta na ca saṃbhavati eka vākya tve vākya bhedaḥ  yujyate tasmāt pramāṇa antara anadhigatā vigraha ādi mattā anya parāt śabda avagantavyā iti manoratha mātram iti arthaḥ mantrāḥ ca vrīhi ādivat śuti ādibhiḥ tatra tatra viniyujyamānāḥ pramāṇa bhāvananupraveśinaḥ katham upayujyantām teṣa teṣu karmasu iti apekṣāyām dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati na adṛṣṭa kalpanā ucitā dṛṣṭaḥ ca prakāraḥ prayoga samaveta artha smāraṇam smṛtvā ca anutiṣṭhanti khalu anuṣṭhātāraḥ padārthān autsargikī ca artha para tā padānam iti apekṣita prayoga samaveta artha smaraṇa tātparyāṇām mantrāṇām na anadhigate vigraha ādau  api tātparyam yujyata iti na tebhyaḥ  api tad siddhiḥ tasmāt devatā vigraha vattā ādi bhāva graha pramāṇābāvāt prāptā ṣaṣṭha pramāṇa gocaratā asya iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate bhāvam tu bādarāyaṇe asti hi tuśabdaḥ pūrva pakṣam vyāvartayati ityādi bhūtadhātoḥ āt itya ādiṣu acetana tvam abhyupagamyate iti antam ati rohita artham mantra artha vāda ādi vyavahārāt iti ādi grahaṇena itihāsa purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇi gṛhyante mantra ādīnām vyavahāraḥ pravṛttiḥ tasya darśanāt iti pūrva pakṣam anubhāṣate yad api uktam iti eka deśi matena tāvat pariharati atra brūma iti tad etad pūrva pakṣiṇam utthāpya dūṣayati atra āha pūrva pakṣī śābdī khalu iyam gatiḥ yad tāt parya adhīna vṛtti tvam nāma na hi anya paraḥ śabdaḥ  anyatra pramāṇam bhavitum arhati na hi śvitri nirṇejana param śvetaḥ  dhāvati iti vākya mitas  sārameya gamanam gamayitum arhati na ca nañvati mahā vākye avāntara vākya arthaḥ  vidhi rūpaḥ śakyaḥ  avagantum na ca pratyaya mātrāt saḥ api arthaḥ  asya bhavati tad pratyayasya bhrānti tvāt  na punar  pratyakṣa ādīnām iyam gatiḥ nahi udaka āharaṇa arthinā ghaṭa darśanāya unmīlitam cakṣuḥ ghaṭa paṭau vā paṭam vā kevalam na upalabhate tad evam eka deśini pūrva pakṣiṇā dūṣite parama siddhāntavādi āha atra ucyate viṣama upanyāsa iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ loke viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tad antareṇa na sva artha mātra smāraṇe paryavasyanti na hi sva artha smāraṇa mātrāya loke padānām prayogaḥ  dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ vākya arthe ti dṛśyate na ca etāni asmārita sva arthāni sākṣāt vākya artham pratyāyayitum īśate iti sva artha smāraṇam vākya artham itathe avāntara vyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām na ca yad artham yad tad tena vinā paryavasyati iti na sva artha mātra bhidhāne paryavasānam padānām na ca nañvati vākye vidhāna paryavasānam tathā sati nañpadam anarthakam syāt  yathā āhuḥ asākṣāt yadi api kurvanti padārtha pratipādanam varṇāḥ tathā api na etasmin paryavasyanti niṣphale vākya artha mitaye teṣām pravṛttau na antarīyam pāke jvālā iva kāṣṭhānām padārtha pratipādanam iti sā iyam ekasmin vākye gatiḥ yatra tu vākyasya ekasya vākya antareṇa saṃbandhaḥ tatra loka anusārataḥ  bhūta artha vyutpattau ca siddhāyam ekaikasya vākyasya tad tad viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyanena paryavasita vṛttinaḥ paścāt kutaścid hetoḥ prayojana antara apekṣāyām anvayaḥ kalpyate yathā avāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati sa eva enam bhūtim gamayati vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta iti atra iha hi yadi na svādhyāya adhyāyana vidhiḥ svādhyāya śabda vācyam veda rāśim puruṣa artha tām aneṣyat tatas  bhūta artha mātra paryavasitā na artha vādā vidhi uddeśena eka vākya tām āgamiṣyam tasmāt  svādhyāya vidhi vaśāt kaimarthya ākāṅkṣāyām vṛttānta digocarāḥ santaḥ tad pratyāyana dvāreṇa vidheya prāśastyam lakṣayanti na punar avivakṣita sva arthā eva tad lakṣaṇe prabhavanti tathā sati lakṣaṇā eva na bhavet  abhidheya avinābhāvasya tad bījasya abhāvāt  ata eva gaṅgāyām ghoṣa iti atra gaṅgā śabdaḥ sva artha saṃbaddha bheva tīram lakṣayati na tu samudra tīram tad kasya hetoḥ sva artha pratyāsattyā abhāvāt na ca etad sarvam sva artha avivakṣāyām kalpate ata eva yatra pramāṇa antara viruddha ārtā artha vādā dṛśyante yathāḥ aādityaḥ  vai yūpaḥ ayajamānaḥ prastaraḥ iti evamādayaḥ tatra yathā pramāṇa antara avirodhaḥ yathā ca stutyā artha tā tad ubhaya siddhi artham aguṇavādaḥ tu iti ca atad siddhiḥ iti ca asūtrayat jaiminiḥ tasmāt yatra sor atha ūrthavādānām pramāṇa antara viruddhaḥ tatra guṇa vādena prāśasti alakṣaṇa iti lakṣita lakṣaṇā yatra tu pramāṇa antara saṃvādaḥ tatra pramāṇa antarāt iva artha vādāt api sor athaḥ prasidhyati dvayoḥ paraspara anapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ iva ekatra arthe pravṛtteḥ pramātṛ apekṣayā tu anuvādaka tvam pramātā hi avyutpannaḥ prathamam yathā pratyakṣa ādibhyor atham avagacchati na tathā āmnāyataḥ tatra vyutpatti ādi apekṣa tvāt na tu pramāṇa apekṣayā dvayoḥ sva arthe anapekṣa tvāt iti uktam nanu evam māna antara virodhe api kasmāt guṇavādaḥ  bhavati yāvatā śabda virodhe māna antaram eva kasmāt na bādhyate vedāntaiḥ iva advaita viṣayaiḥ pratyādayaḥ prapañca gocarāḥ kasmāt vār athavādavat vedāntā api guṇa vādena na nīyante atra ucyate loka anusārataḥ  dvividhaḥ  hi viṣayaḥ śabdānām dvārataḥ ca tātparyataḥ ca yathā ekasmin vākye padānām padārthā dvārataḥ  vākya arthaḥ ca tātparyataḥ viṣayaḥ evam vākya dvaya eka vākya tāyām api yathā iyam devadattīyā gauḥ kretavyā iti ekam vākyam eṣā bahu kṣīra iti aparam tad asya bahu kṣīratva pratipādanam dvāram tātparyam tu kretavyā iti vākya antara arthe tatra yad dvārataḥ tad pramāṇa antara virodhe anyathā nīyate yathā viṣam bhakṣaya iti vākyam mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣva iti vākya antara artha param sat  yatra tu tātparyam tatra māna antara virodhe pauruṣeya pramāṇam eva bhavati vedāntāḥ tu paurvāparya paryālocanayā nirastam asta bheda prapañca brahma pratipādana parā apauruṣeya tayā svatas siddha tāttvika pramāṇa vākyam ādityasya yūpatva pratipādana param api tu yūpa stuti param tasmāt pramāṇa antara virodhe dvārībhūtaḥ  viṣayaḥ  guṇa vādena nīyate yatra tu pramāṇa antaram virodhakam na asti yathā devatā avagraha ādau tatra dvārataḥ  api viṣayaḥ pratīyamānaḥ  na śakyaḥ tyaktum na ca guṇa vādena netum kaḥ  hi mukhye saṃbhavati gauṇa mātrayodati prasaṅgāt  tathā satyanadhi gatam vigraha ādi pratipādayam vākyam bhidyeta iti ced  addhā bhinnam eva etad vākyam tathā sati tātparyabhedaḥ  api iti ced  na dvārataḥ  api tad avagatau tātparya antara kalpanā yogāt na ca yasya yatra na tātparyam tasya tatra aprāmāṇyam tathā sati viśiṣṭa param vākyam viśeṣaṇeṣu apramāṇam iti viśiṣṭa param api na syāt  viśeṣaṇā viṣaya tvāt viśiṣṭa viṣaya tvena tu tadākṣepe paraspara āśraya tvam ākṣepāt hi viśeṣaṇa pratipattau satyām viśiṣṭa viṣaya tvam viśiṣṭa viṣaya tvāt ca tad ākṣepaḥ tasmāt viśiṣṭa pratyaya parebhyaḥ  api viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasya eva vākyasya viṣaya tvena anicchatā api abhyupeyāni yathā tad yāni aparebhyaḥ  api artha vāda vākyebhyaḥ  devatā vigraha ādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇa antara virodhe na yuktāḥ tyaktum na hi mukhya artha saṃbhave guṇavādaḥ  yujyate na ca bhūta artham api apauruṣeyam vacaḥ  māna antara apekṣam sva arthe yena māna antara asaṃbhave bhavet apramāṇam iti uktam syāt etad  tātparyaikye api yadi vākya bhedaḥ katham tarhi artha eka tvāt ekam vākyam na tatra tatra yathāsvam tad tad padārtha viśiṣṭa eka padārtha pratīti paryavasāna saṃbhavāt sa tu padārtha antara viśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kkacid  dvāra bhūtaḥ kkacid  dvāri iti etāvān viśeṣaḥ nanu evam sati odanam bhuktvā grāmam gacchati iti atra api vākya bheda prasaṅgaḥ anyaḥ  hi saṃsargaḥ odanam bhuktvā iti anyaḥ tu grāmam gacchati iti na ekatra pratīteḥ aparyavasānāt bhuktvā iti hi samāna kartṛka tā pūrva kāla tā ca pratīyate na ca iyam pratīti para kāla kriyā antara pratyayam antareṇa paryavasyati tasmāt yāvati padābhyām viśiṣṭa artha pratyaya paryavasānāt pañca ṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasmin  ānātva prasaṅgaḥ nānātve api viśeṣāṇānām viśeṣyasya ekatvāt  tasya ca sakṛt śutasya pradhāna bhūtasya guṇa bhūta viśeṣaṇa anurodhena āvartana ayogāt pradhāna bhede tu vākya bheda eva tasmāt vidhi vākyāt arthavāda vākyam anyat iti vākyayoḥ eva sva sva vākya artha pratyaya  asita vyāpārayoḥ paścāt kutaścid apekṣāyām paraspara anvaya iti siddham api ca vidhibhiḥ eva indra ādi daivatyāni iti devatām uddiśya haviḥ avamṛśya ca tad viṣaya svatva tyāga iti yāga śarīram na ca cetasya analikhitā devatā uddeṣṭum śakyā na ca rūpa rahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitum iti yāga vidhinā eva tad rūpa apekṣimā yādṛśa m anya parebhyaḥ  api mantra artha vādebhyaḥ tad rūpam avagatam tad abhyupeyate rūpa antara kalpanāyām māna abhāvāt mantra artha vādayoḥ atyanta parokṣa vṛtti prasaṅgāt ca yathā hi avrātyaḥ  vrātya stomena yajate iti vrātya svarūpa apekṣāyām yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ  vā somam na pibet  sa vrātya iti vidhinā apekṣitam sat artha vādataḥ  avagamyamānam vidhi pramāṇakam tathā devatā rūpam api nanu uddeśaḥ  rūpa jñānam apekṣate na punā rūpa sattām api devatāyāḥ samāropeṇa api ca rūpa jñānam upapadyata iti samāropitam eva rūpam devatāyāḥ  mantra artha vādaiḥ ucyate satyam rūpa jñānam apekṣate tad ca anyatas  asaṃbhavān mantra artha vādebhya eva tasya tu rūpasya asati bādhake anubhāva rūḍham tathā abhāvam parityajya anyathātvam ananubhūyamānam asāṃpratam kalpiyatum tasmāt vidhyayapekṣita mantra artha vādaiḥ anya paraiḥ api devatā rūpam buddhau  upanidhīyamānam vidhi pramāṇakam eva iti yuktam syāt etad  vidhi apekṣāyām anya parāt api vākyāt avagator athaḥ svīkriyate tad apekṣā eva tu na asti śabda rūpasya devatā bhāvāt tasya ca māna antara vedya tvāt ityata āha na ca śabda mātram iti na kevalaṃmantra artha vādataḥ  vigraha ādi siddhiḥ api tu itihāsa purāṇa loka smaraṇebhyaḥ  mantra artha vāda mūlebhyaḥ  vā pratyakṣāt amūlebhyaḥ  vā iti āha itihāsa iti śliṣyate yujyate nigada mātra vyākhyātam anyat  tad evam mantra artha vāda ādi siddhe devatā vigraha ādau guru ādi pūjāvat devatā pūjā ātmakaḥ  yāmaḥ  devatā prasāda ādi dvāreṇa saphalaḥ  avakalpate acetanasya tu pūjām apratipadyamān sya tad anupapattiḥ na ca evam yajña karmaṇaḥ  devatām prati guṇa bhāvāt devatātaḥ phala utpāde yāga bhāvanāyāḥ śrutam phalavat tvam yāgasya ca tām prati tad phala aṃśam vā prati śrutam karaṇa tvam hātavyam yāga bhāvanāyāḥ  eva hi phalavatyā yāga lakṣaṇa sva karaṇa avāntara vyāpāra tvāt devatā bhojana prasāda ādīnām kṛṣi karmaṇa iva tad tad avāntara vyāpārasya sasya adhigama sādhana tvam āgneya ādīnām iva utpatti paramāpūrvāvāntara vyāpārāṇām bhavat mate svarga sādhana tvam tasmāt karmaṇaḥ  apūrvāvāntara vyāpārasya vā devatā prasāda avāntara vyāpārasya vā phalavat tvāt  pradhāna tvam ubhayasmin  api pakṣe samānam na tu devatāyāḥ  vigraha ādimatyāḥ prādhānyam iti na dharma mīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram aapi vā śabda pūrva tvāt yajña karma pradhānam guṇa tve devatā śrutiḥ iti virudhyate tasmāt siddhaḥ  devatānām prāyeṇa brahma vidyāsu adhikāra iti śugasya tad anādara śravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt su ucyate hi avāntara saṃgatim kurvan  aghi karaṇa tātparyāha yatha manuṣya adhikāra iti śaṅkābījam āha tatra iti nirmṛṣṭa nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasya arthitā na asti yena arthitāyāḥ  abhāvāt śūdraḥ  na adhikriyeta na api asya brahma jñāne sāmarthya abhāvaḥ dvividham hi sāmarthyam nijam ca āgantukam ca tatra dvijātīnām iva śūdrāṇām śravaṇa ādi sāmarthyam nijam apratihatam adhyaya na abhāvādagantuka sāmarthya abhāve sati anadhikāra iti ced  hanta ādhāna abhāve sati agni abhāvāt agni sādhye karmaṇi mā bhūt adhikāraḥ na ca brahma vidyāyām agniḥ sādhanam iti kim iti anāhitāgnayaḥ  na adhikriyante na ca adhyayana abhāvāt tad sādhanāyām anadhikāraḥ  brahma vidyāyām iti sāṃpratam yatas  yuktam ayat āhavanīye juhoti iti āhavanīyasya homa adhikaraṇa tayā vidhānāt tad rūpasya alaukika tāna ārabhya adhīta vākya vihitāt ādhānāt anyatas  anadhigamāt ādhānasya ca dvijāti saṃbandhi tayā vidhānāt tad sādhyaḥ  agniḥ alaukikaḥ  na śūdrasya āti iti na āhavanīya ādi sādhye karmaṇi śūdrasya adhikāra iti na ca tathā brahma vidyāyām alaukikam asti sādhanam yad śūdrasya na syāt  adhyayana niyama iti ced  na vikalpa asaha tvāt tad adhyayanam puruṣa arthe vā niyamyet  yathā dhana arjane pratigraha ādi kratu arthe vā yathā avrīhīn avahanti iti avaghātaḥ na tāvat  kratu arthe na hi asvādhyāyaḥ  adhyetavyaḥ iti kañcid  kratum prakṛtya paṭhyate yathā darśa pūrṇam āsam prakṛtya avrīhīn avahanti iti na ca anārabhya adhītam api avyabhāciritakratu saṃbandhi tayā kratum upasthāpayati yena vākyena eva kratunā saṃbadhyeta adhyayanam na hi yathā juhvādi avyabhicarita kratu saṃbaddham evam svādhyāya iti tasmāt na eva kratu arthe niyamaḥ na api puruṣa arthe puruṣa icchā nibandhana eva itikartavya tāsu tu sāmānyatas  viśeṣataḥ ca pravṛttiḥ vidhi para adhīnā eva na hi anadha āgata karaṇa bheda itikartavya tāsu ghaṭate tasmāt vidhi adhīna pravṛtti tayā aṅgānām kratu artha tā kratuḥ iti hividhi viṣayeṇa vidhim parāmṛśati viṣayiṇam tena arthyate viṣayīkriyata iti kratu arthaḥ na ca adhyayanam vā svādhyāyaḥ  vā tad artha jñānam vā prāc vidheḥ puruṣa icchā adhīna pravṛttiḥ yena puruṣa arthaḥ syāt  yadi ca adhyayanena eva artha avabodha rūpam niyamyeta tatas  mānānāntara virodhaḥ tad rūpasya vinā api adhyayanam pustaka ādi pāṭhena api adhigamāt tasmāt  asuvarṇam bhārma itivat adhyayanāt eva phalam kalpanīyam tathā ca adhyayana vidheḥ niyāmaka tvāt śūdrasya adhyayanena vā pustaka ādi pāṭhena vā sāmarthyam asti iti saḥ  api brahma vidyāyām adhikriyeta mā bhūdvā adhyayana abhāvāt sarvatra brahma vidyāyām adhikāraḥ saṃvarga vidyāyām tu bhaviṣyati aaha hāretvā śūdra iti śūdram saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ na ca eṣa śūdra śabdaḥ kayācid avayava vyutpatti āśūdre vartanīyaḥ avayava prasiddhitaḥ samudāya prasiddheḥ anapekṣatayā balīyaḥ tvāt  tasmāt yathā nadhīyānasya iṣṭau niṣāda stha pateḥ adhikāraḥ  vacana sāmarthyāt evam saṃvarga vidyāyām śūdrasya adhikāraḥ  bhaviṣyati iti prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ na śūdrasya adhikāraḥ veda adhyayana abhāvāt iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ yadi api asvādhyāyaḥ  adhyetavyaḥ iti adhyayana vidhiḥ na kiñcit phalavat karma ārabhyāmnātas  na api avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha padārtha gataḥ na hi juhvādivat su ādhyāyaḥ  avyabhicarita kratu sabandhaḥ tathā api svādhyāyasya adhyana saṃskāra vidhiḥ adhyayanasya apekṣita upāya tām avagamayan kim piṇḍa pitṛ yajñavat  svargam vā suvarṇam bhārya miti vada artha vādikam vā phalam kalpayitvā viniyoga bhaṅgena svādhyāyena adhīyīta iti evam arthaḥ kalpatām kiṃvā parama prayāpi anyataḥ apekṣitam adhigamya nirvṛṇotu iti viṣaye na dṛṣṭa dvāreṇa paramparayā api anyatas  apekṣita pratilambhe ca yathā śruti viniyoga upapattau ca saṃbhavantyām śruti viniyoga bhaṅgena adhyayanāt eva aśruta adṛṣṭa phala kalpanā ucitā dṛṣṭaḥ ca svādhyāya adhyayana saṃskāraḥ tena hi puruṣeṇa sa prāpyate prāptaḥ ca phalavat karma brahma avabodham abhyudaya niḥśreyasa prayojanam upajanayati na tu suvarṇa dhāraṇa ādau dṛṣṭa dvāreṇa kiñcid  paramparayā api asti apekṣitam puruṣasya tasmāt viparivṛtya sākṣāt dhāraṇāt eva viniyoga bhaṅgena phalam kalpyate yadā ca adhyana saṃskṛtena svādhyāyena phalavat karma brahma avabodhaḥ  bhāvyamānaḥ  abyudaya niḥśreyasa prayojana iti sthāpitam tadā yasya adhyayanam tasya eva karma brahma avabodhaḥ  abhyudaya niḥśreyasa prayojanaḥ  na anyasya yasya ca upanayana saṃskāraḥ tasya eva adhyayanam sa ca dvijātīnām eva iti upanayana abhāvena adhyayana saṃskāra abhāvāt pustaka ādi paṭhita svādhyāya janyor atha avabodhaḥ śūdrāṇām na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthya abhāvāt na śūdraḥ  brahma vidyāyām adhikriyata iti siddham yajñe anavakḷpta iti yajña grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham vidyāyām anavakḷpta iti api draṣṭavyam siddhavat abhidhānasya nyāya pūrvaka tvāt nyāyasya ca ubhayatra sāmyāt  dvitīyam pūrva pakṣam anubhāṣate yad punar  saṃvarga vidyāyām iti dūṣayati na tad liṅgam kutas  nyāya abhāvāt  na tāvat śūdraḥ saṃvarga vidyāyām sākṣāt ced yate yathā aetayā niṣāda stha patim yājayet iti niṣāda stha patiḥ kintu artha vāda gataḥ  ayam śūdra śabdaḥ sa ca anyatas  siddham artham avadyotayati na tu prāpayati iti adhvaramīmāṃsakāḥ asmākam tu anya parāt api vākyāt asati bādhake pramāṇa antareṇa arthaḥ  avagamyamānaḥ  vidhinā ca apekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva nyāyaḥ ca asmin  arthe uktaḥ  bādhakaḥ na ca vidhi apekṣā asti dviji iti adhikāra pratilambhena vidheḥ paryavasānāt  vidhi uddeśa gata tve tvayam nyāyaḥ  apodyate vacana balat niṣāda stha pativat na tu eṣa vidhi uddeśa gata iti uktam tasmāt na arthavāda mātrāt śūdra adhikāra siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ apica kim artha vāda balāt vidyā mātre adhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvarga vidyāyām vā na tāvat vidyā mātra iti āha kāmam ca ayam iti na hi saṃvarga vidyāyām artha vādaḥ śrutaḥ  vidyā mātre adhikāriṇam upanayati ati prasaṅgāt  astu tarhi saṃvarga vidyāyām eva śūdrasya adhikāra iti ata āha arthavāda stha tvāt iti tad kim etad śūdra padam pramatta gītam na caitya dyuktam tulyam hi sāṃpradāyikam iti ata āha śakyate ca ayam śūdra śabda iti evam kila atra upākhyāyate jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ  bahu dāyī śraddhā ādeyaḥ  bahu pākyaḥ priya atithiḥ babhūva sa ca teṣu teṣu grāma nagara śṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānām anna pānānām pūrṇa anatithibhya āvasathān karayāmāsa sarvata etya eteṣu āvasatheṣu mama anna pānam arthina upayokṣyanta iti atha asya rājñaḥ  dāna śauṇḍasya guṇa gārima sotaṣitāḥ santaḥ  deva ṛṣayaḥ  haṃsa rūpam āsthāya tad anugrahāya tasya nidāgha samaye doṣā harmya tala sthasya upari mālām ābadhya ājagmuḥ teṣām agresaram haṃsam saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhatas  patan  ekatamaḥ  haṃsaḥ sa adbhutam abhyuvāda bhaḥ bhaḥ bhallākṣa jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśam dyu loke  āyatam jyotiḥ tinmā prasāṅkṣīḥ ma etad tvā dhākṣīt iti tam evam uktavantagra gāmī haṃsaḥ pratyuvāca kam varam enam etad santam satu gvānam iva raikkam āttha ayam arthaḥ vara iti sa upahāsam avaram āha athavā varaḥ  varākaḥ  ayam jānaśrutiḥ kam iti ākṣepe yasmāt ayam varākaḥ tasmāt kam enam kiṃbhūtam etam santam prāṇi mātram jānaśrutim āttha raikkasya hi jyotiḥ asahyam na tu etasya prāṇi mātrasya tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇya jñāna saṃbhāra saṃbhṛtasya raikkasya brahma vidaḥ  dharme trailokya udara varti prāṇa bhṛt mātra dharmaḥ  antarbhavati na punā raikka dharma kakṣām kasyacid dharmaḥ  avagāhata iti atha eṣa haṃsa vacanāt ātmanaḥ  atyanta nikarṣam utkarṣa kāṣṭhām ca raikkasya upaśrutya viṣaṇṇa āmānasaḥ  jānaśrutiḥ kitava iva akṣa parājitaḥ paunaḥpunyena niḥśvasan  udvelam katham katham api niśītham ati vāhayāṃbabhūva tatas  niśā avasāna piśunam anibhṛta vandāru vṛnda prārabdha stuti sahasra saṃvalitam maṅgala tūrya nirdhoṣam ākarṇya talpa tala stha eva rājā ekapade yantā naram āhūyādideśa vayasya raikka āhvayam brahma vidam ekaratim sayugvānam ati vivikteṣu teṣu teṣu vepina naga nikuñja nadī pulina ādi pradeśeṣu anviṣya prayatnataḥ  asmabhyam ācakṣva iti sa ca tatra tatra anviṣyan kkacid ativivekte dese śakaṭasya adhastāt  pāmānam kaṇḍūyamānam brāhmaṇāyanam adrākṣīt  tam ca dṛṣṭvā raikkaḥ  ayam bhavitā iti pratibhāvān upaviśya sa vinayam aprākṣīt  tvam asi he bhagavan sa yugvā raikka  iti tasya ca raikka bhāva anumatim ca taiḥ taiḥ iṅgitaiḥ gārhasthya icchām dhanāyām ca unnīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa rājā tu tam niśamya gavām ṣaṣ śatāni niṣkam ca hāram ca aśvatarī ratham ca ādāya sa tvaram raikkam praticakrame gatvā ca abhyuvāda hai raikka  gavām ṣaṣ śatāni imāni niṣkaḥ ca hāra śca ayam aśvatarī rathaḥ etad ādatsva anuśādhi mām bhagavan  iti tam evam uktavantam prati sa āṭopam ca sa spṛham ca uvāca raikkaḥ aha hāretvā śūdra tava eva saha gobhiḥ astu iti aha iti nipātaḥ sa āṭopam ā mantraṇe hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī rathaḥ  hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tava eva astu kim etad mātreṇa mama dhanena akalpa vartinaḥ  gārhasthyasya nirvāha anupayoginā iti bhāvaḥ āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthaka tayā ca gobhiḥ saha iti atra pratisaṃbandhi anupādānena ca ācāryaiḥ dūṣitaḥ tad asyām ākhyāyikāyām śakyaḥ śūdra śabdena jānaśrutī rājanyaḥ  api avayava vyutpattyā vaktum sa hi raikkaḥ parokṣa jña tām cikhyāpayiṣuḥ ātmanaḥ  jānaśruteḥ śūdra iti śucam sūcayāmāsa katham punar  śūdra śabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti ucyate tadā dravaṇāt  tad vyācaṣṭe śucam abhidudrāva jānaśrutiḥ śucam prāptavān iti arthaḥ śucā vā jānaśrutiḥ duduve śucā prāpta iti arthaḥ athavā śucā raikkam jānaśrutiḥ dudrāva gatavān tasmāt tadā dravaṇāt iti tad śabdena śugvā jānaśrutiḥ vā raikkaḥ  vā parāmṛśyata iti uktam kṣatriyatva gateḥ ca uttaratra caitrarathena liṅgāt  itas ca na jāti śūdraḥ  jānaśrutiḥ yad kāraṇam prakaraṇa nirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriya tvam asya jānaśruteḥ avagamyate caijña rathena liṅgāt iti vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇam nirūpayati uttaratra hi saṃvarga vidyā vākya śeṣe caitrarathena abhipratāriṇā niścita kṣātriya tvena samānāyām saṃvarga vidyāyām samabhivyāhārāt liṅgāt saṃdigdha kṣatriya bāvaḥ  jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyaḥ  niścīyate aatha ha śaunakam ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇam ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe iti prasiddha yājaka tvena kāpeyena abhiprayāriṇaḥ  yogaḥ pratīyate brahmacāri bhi kṣayā ca asya aśūdra tvam avagamyate na hi jātu brahmacārī śūdrān bhikṣate yājakena ca kāpeyena yogāt yājyaḥ  abhipratārī kṣatriya tvam ca asya caitrarathi tvāt  atasmāt caitrarathī nāma ekaḥ kṣatra patiḥ ajāyata iti vacanāt  caitrarathi tvam ca asya kāpeyena yājakena yogāt  etena vai citraratham kāpeyā ayājayan  iti chandaḥ gānām dvi rātre śrūyate tena citrarathasya yājakāḥ kāpeyāḥ eṣa ca abhipratāri citrarathāt anyaḥ san  ā iva kāpeyānām rājyaḥ  bhavati yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt  samāna anvayānām hi prāyeṇa samāna anvayā yājakā bhavanti tasmāt caitrarathi tvāt abhipratārī kākṣaseniḥ kṣatriyaḥ tad samabhivyāhārāt ca jānaśrutiḥ api kṣatriyaḥ saṃbhāvyate itas ca kṣatriyaḥ  jānaśrutiḥ iti āha kṣattṛ preṣaṇa ādi aiśvarya yogāt ca kṣattṛ preṣaṇe ca artha saṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānya praṣṭhasya aiśvaryam prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭam yudhiṣṭhira ādivat iti saṃskāra parāmarśāt tad abhāva abhilāpāt ca na kevalam upanīta adhyayana vidhi parāmarśena na śūdrasya adhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyā upadeśeṣu upanayana saṃskāra parāmarśāt śūdrasya tad abhāva abhidhānāt brahma vidyāyām anadhikāra iti nanu anupanītasya api brahma upadeśaḥ śrūyate atān ha anupanīya eva iti tathā śūdrasya anupanītasya eva adhikāraḥ  bhavīṣyati iti ata āha tān ha anupanīyā eva iti api pradarśitā eva upanayana prāptiḥ prāpti pūrvaka tvāt pratiṣedhasya yeṣām upanayanam prāptam teṣām eva tad niṣidhyate tad ca dvijātīnām iti dvijātaya eva niṣiddha upanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti tad abhāva nirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ satya kāmaḥ  ha vai jābālaḥ pramīta pitṛkaḥ svām mātaram jabālām prapaccha aham ācārya kule brahmacaryam cariṣyāmī tad bravītu bhavatī kiṅgotraḥ  aham iti sā bravīt  tvad janaka paricaraṇa para tayā na aham ajñā siṣam gotram tava iti sa cu ācāryam gautamam upasasāda upasadya uvāca he bhagavan brahmacaryam upeyām tvayi iti sa ha uvāc na avijñāta gotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotraḥ  asi iti atha uvāca satya kāmaḥ  na aham veda svam gotram svām mātaram jabāla ām apṛccham sā api na veda iti tad upaśrutya abhyadhāt gautamaḥ na advijanmana ārjava yuktam īdṛśam vacaḥ tena asmin  śūdratva saṃbhāvanā asti iti tvām dvijāti janmānam upaneṣya iti upanetam anuśāsitum ca jābālam gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ tena api śūdrasya na adhikāra iti vijñāyate na satyāt agā iti na satyam atikrāntavān asi iti śravaṇa adhyayana artha pratiṣedhāt samṛteḥ ca nigada vyākhyānena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam atirohita artham anyat  kampanāt  prāṇa vajra śruti halāt vākyam prakaraṇam ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañca vṛttiḥ ādhyātmikaḥ bāhyaḥ ca atra pratipādyaḥ tathā hi prāṇa śabdaḥ  mukhyaḥ  vāyava ādhyātmike vajra śabdaḥ ca aśanau aśaniḥ ca vāyu pariṇāmaḥ vāyuḥ eva hi vāhyaḥ  dhūma jyotiḥ salila saṃvalitaḥ parjanya bhāvena pariṇataḥ  vidyut stanayitnu vṛṣṭi aśani bhāvena vivartate yadi api ca sarvam jagat iti sa vāyukam pratīyate tathā api sarva śabda āpekṣikaḥ api na sva abhidheyam jahāti kintu saṃkucat vṛttiḥ bhavati prāṇa vajra śabdau tu brahma viṣaya tve sva artham eva tyajataḥ tasmāt  sva artha tyāgāt varam vṛtti saṃkocaḥ sva artha leśa avasthānāt amṛta śabdaḥ  api maraṇa abhāva vacanaḥ  na sārvakālikam tad abhāvam brūte jyotiḥ jīvitayā api tad upapatteḥ yathā amṛtā devāḥ  iti tasmāt prāṇa vajra śruti anurodhāt vāyuḥ eva atra vivakṣitaḥ  na brahma iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate kampanāt  sa vāyukasya jagataḥ kampanāt  paramātmā eva śabdāt pramita iti maṇḍūka plutya anuṣajjate brahmaṇā ūnahi bibhdetat jagat kṛtnnam sva vyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādām ativartate etad uktam bhavati na śruti saṃkoca mātram śruti artha parityāge hetuḥ api tu pūrva apara vākya eka vākyatā prakaraṇābhyām saṃvalitaḥ śruti saṃkocaḥ tad idam uktam pūrva aparayoḥ grantha bhāgayoḥ brahmā eva nirdiśyamānam upalabhāmahe iha eva katham antarāle vāyum nirdiśyamānam pratipadyemahi iti tad anena vākya eka vākya tā darśitā prakaraṇāt api iti bhāṣyeṇa prakaraṇam uktam yad khalu pṛṣṭam tad eva pradhānam prativaktavyam iti tasya prakaraṇam pṛṣṭāt anyasmin  tu ucyamāne śāstram apramāṇam bhavet asaṃbaddha pralāpi tvāt  yatu vāyu vijñānāt kkacid amṛta tvam abhihitam āpekṣikam tad iti aapa punar mṛtyum jayati iti śrutyā hi apamṛtyoḥ vijaya uktaḥ  na tu parama mṛtyu vijaya iti āpe ki tvam  ḷ  tad ca tatra eva prakaraṇa antara karaṇena hetunā na kevalam apaśrutyā tadāpekṣikam api tu paramātmānam abhidhāya aatas  anyat ārtam iti vā aṭu ādeḥ ārtatva abhidhānāt nahi ārta ābya āsāt ana ārtaḥ  bhavati iti bhāvaḥ jyotiḥ darśanāt  atra hi jyotiḥ śabdasya tejasi mukhya tvāt  brahmaṇi jaghanya tvāt  prakaraṇāt ca śruteḥ balīyaḥ tvāt  pūrvavat śuti saṃkocasya ca atra abhāvāt  pratyuta brahmajyotiḥ pakṣe ktvā aśruteḥ pūrva kāla arthāyāḥ pīḍana aprasaṅgāt  samutthāna śruteḥ ca teja eva jyotiḥ tathā hi samutthanām udgamanam ucyate na tu viveka vijñānam udgamanam ca tejaḥ pakṣe arciḥ ādi mārgeṇa upapadyate ādityaḥ ca arciḥ ādi apekṣayā param jyotiḥ bhavati iti tad upasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate kārya brahma loka prāptau krameṇa mucyate brahmajyotiḥ pakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā sva rūpa niṣpattiḥ na ca deha ādi vivikta brahma svarūpa sākṣātkāraḥ  vṛtti rūpaḥ  abhiniṣpattiḥ sā hi brahma bhūyāt prācīnā na tu parācīnā sā iyam upasaṃpadya iti ktvā aśruteḥ pīḍā tasmāt tisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇa bādhanāt teja eva atra jyotiḥ iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate param eva brahma jyotiḥ śabdam kasmāt  darśanāt  tasya hi iha prakaraṇe anuvṛttiḥ dṛśyate yad khalu pratijñāyate yad ca madhye parāmṛśyate yad ca upasaṃhriyate sa eva pradhānam prakaraṇa arthaḥ tad antaḥpātinaḥ tu sarve tad anuguṇa tayā netavyāḥ na tu śruti anurodha mātreṇa prakaraṇāt apakraṣṭavyā iti hi loka sthitiḥ anyathā upāṃśu yāja vākye jāmitā doṣa upakrame tad pratisādhāna upasaṃhāre ca tad antar  pātinaḥ  aviṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ityādayaḥ  vidhi śruti anurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran tad kim idānīm atisra eva sāhnasya upasadaḥ kāryā dvādaśa ahīnasya iti prakaraṇa anurodhāt sāmudāya prasiddhi bala labdha mahargāṇa abhidhānam parityajya ahīna śabdaḥ katham api avavavyutpattyā sa annam jyotiṣṭomam abhidhāya tatra eva dvādaśa upasattām vidhattām sa hi kṛtsna vidhānāt na kutaścid api hīyate kratoḥ iti ahīnaḥ śakyaḥ  vaktum mā evam avayava prasiddheḥ samudāya prasiddhiḥ balīyasi iti śrutyā prakaraṇa bādhanāt na dvādaśa upakratoma hīna guṇa yukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum na api atas apakṛṣṭam sat ahargaṇasya vidhatte para prakaraṇe anya dharma vidhera nyāṭya tvāt  asaṃbaddha pada vyavāya vicchinnasya prakaraṇasya punar anusaṃdhāna kleśāt tena anapakṛṣṭena eva dvādaśa ahīnasya iti vākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhim stotum dvādaśa aha vihitā dvādaśa upasattā tad prakṛti tvena ca sarvā hīneṣu prāptā nivīta ādivat anūdyate tasmāt ahīna śrutyā prakaraṇa bādhe api na dvādaśa ahīnasya iti vākyasya prakaraṇāt apakarṣa jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇa āmnātasya pūṣā ādi anumantraṇa mantrasya yad liṅga balāt prakaraṇa bādhena apakarṣaḥ tad agatyā pauṣṇa ādau ca takarmaṇi tasya arthavat tvāt  iha tu apakṛṣṭasya arciḥ ādi mārga upadeśe phalasya upāya mārga pratipādake ati viśade aeṣa saṃprasādaḥ iti vākyasya āviśada eka deśa mātra pratipādakasya niṣprayojana tvāt  na ca dvadaśa ahīnasya itivat yathā ukta ātma dhyāna sādhana anuṣṭhānam stotum eṣa saṃprasāda iti vacam arciḥ ādi mārgam anuvadati iti yuktam stuti lakṣaṇāyām sva abhidheya saṃsarga tātparya parityāga prasaṅgāt dvādaśa ahīnasya iti tu vākye sva artha saṃsarga tātparye prakaraṇa vicchedasya prāpta anuvada mātrasya ca aprayojana tvam iti stuti arthau lakṣyate na ca etad doṣa bhayāt samudāya prasiddhim ullaṅghayā avayava prasiddhim upāśritya sāhnasya eva dvādaśa upasattām vidhātum arhati tritva dvādaśa tvayoḥ vikalpa prasaṅgāt  na ca satyām gatau vikalpaḥ  nyāṭyaḥ sāhnā hīna padayoḥ ca prakṛta jyotiṣṭoma abhidhāyinoḥ ānarthakya prasaṅgāt prakaraṇāt eva tad avagateḥ iha tu sva artha saṃsarga tātparye na ukta doṣa prasaṅga iti paurvāparya ālocanayā prakaraṇa anurodhāt rūḍhim api pūrva kāla tām api parityajya prakaraṇa anuguṇyena jyotiḥ param brahma pratīyate yad tu uktam mumukṣoḥ āditya prāptiḥ abhihitā iti na asau  ātyantikaḥ  mokṣaḥ kintu kārya brahma loka prāptiḥ na ca krama mukti abhiprāyam svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam na hi etad prakaraṇa ukta brahma tattva viduṣaḥ  gati utkrāntī staḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ ana tasmāt  prāṇā utkrāmanti atra eva samavanīyante iti na ca tad dvāreṇa krama muktiḥ arciḥ ādi mārgasya hi kārya brahma loka prāpaka tvam na tu brahma bhūya hetu bhāvaḥ jīvasya tu nirūpa ādhi nitya śuddha buddha brahma bhāva sākṣātkāra hetuke mokṣe kṛtam arciḥ ādi mārgeṇa kārya brahma loka prāptyā atra api brahma vidaḥ tad upapatteḥ tasmāt na jyotiḥ ādityam upasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇā abhiniṣpattiḥ āñjasi iti śruteḥ atra api kleśaḥ apica param jyotiḥ sa uttama puruṣa itiha eva upariṣṭāt viśeṣaṇāt tejasaḥ  vyāvartya puruṣa viṣaya tvena avasthāpanāt jyotiḥ padasya param eva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham ākāśor atha antaratva ādi vyapadeśāt yadi api aākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt iti atra brahma liṅga darśanāt ākāśaḥ paramātmā iti vyutpāditam tathā api tadvat atra paramātma liṅga darśana abhāvāt nāma rūpa nirmahaṇasya bhūta ākāśe api avakāśa dānena upapatteḥ akasmāt na rūḍhi parityāgasya ayogāt nāma rūpe antarā brahma iti ca na ākāśasya nāma rūpayoḥ nirvahituḥ antarāla tvam āha api tu brahmaṇaḥ tena bhūtākāśaḥ  nāma rūpayoḥ nirvahitā brahma ca etayoḥ antarālam madhyam sāram iti yāvat  na tu nirvoḍa eva brahma antarālam vā nirvāḍhṛ tasmāt prasiddheḥ bhūta ākāśaḥ  na tu brahma iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate param eva ākāśam brahma kasmāt  artha antaratva ādi vyapadeśāt nāma rūpa mātra nirvāhakam iha ākāśam ucyate bhūta ākāśam ca vikāra tvena nāma rūpa antaḥpāti sat  katham ātmānam udvahet na hi su śikṣitaḥ  api vijñānī svena skandhena ātmānam voḍhum utsahate na ca nāma rūpa śrutiḥ aviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūta ākāśa varjam nāma rūpa antare saṃkocayitum sati saṃbhave yujyate na ca nirvāhaka tvam niraṅkuśam avagatam brahma liṅgam kathañcid kleśena paratantre netum ucitam aanena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca sraṣṭṛ tvam ati sphuṭam brahma liṅgam atra pratīyate brahma rūpa tayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛ tve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛ tvam uktam evam ca nirvahituḥ evana ātarāla tā upapatteḥ anyaḥ  nirvahitān yad ca antarālam iti artha bheda kalpanā api na yuktā tathā ca te nāma rūpe yad antarā iti ayam artha antara vyapadeśa upapannaḥ  bhavati ākāśasya tasmāt artha antara vyapadeśāt tathā atat brahma tad amṛtam iti vyapadeśāt brahma eva ākāśam iti siddham suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ bhedena aādi madhya avasāneṣu saṃsāri pratipādanāt  tad pare grantha saṃdarbhe sarvam tatra eva yojyate saṃsāri iva tāvat ātmā ahaṅkāra āspada prāṇa ādi parītaḥ sarva jana siddhaḥ tam eva ca ayaḥ  ayam vijñāna mayaḥ prāṇa iṣu ityādi śruti saṃdarbha ādi madhya avasāneṣu āmṛśati iti tad anuvāda paraḥ  bhavitum arhati evam ca saṃsārya ātmā eva kiñcid apekṣya mahān saṃsārasya ca anādi tvena anādi tvāt aja ucyate na tu tad atiriktaḥ kaścid atra nitya śuddha buddha muktatva bhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ yad tu suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ prājñena ātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedam manyase na asau bhedaḥ kintu ayam ātma śabdaḥ svabhāva vacanaḥ tena suṣupti utkrānti avasthāyām viśeṣa viṣaya abhāvāt saṃpiṇḍita prajñā iva prājñena ātmanā svabhāvena pariṣvaktaḥ  na kiñcid veda iti abhede api bhedavat upacāreṇa yojanīyam yathā āhuḥ aprājñaḥ saṃpiṇḍita prajñaḥ iti pati ādayaḥ ca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇī ā iva kārya karaṇa saṃghāta ātmakasya jagataḥ  jīva karma arjita tayā tad bhogya tayā ca yojanīyāḥ tasmāt saṃsāri eva anūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate asuṣupti utkrāntyoḥ bhedena vyapadeśāt iti anuvartate ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ kim saṃsāriṇaḥ  anyaḥ paramātmā na asti tasmāt saṃsārya ātma param ayaḥ  ayam vijñāna mayaḥ prāṇa iṣu iti vākyam āhosvit iha saṃsāri vyatirekeṇa paramātmanaḥ  asaṃkīrtanāt saṃsāriṇaḥ ca ādi madhya avasāneṣu avamarśanāt saṃsāri ātma param na tāvat saṃsāri atiriktasya tasya abhāvaḥ tad pratipādakā hi śataśa āgamāḥ aīkṣateḥ na aśabdam agati sāmānyāt iti ādibiḥ sūtra saṃdarbhaiḥ upapāditāḥ na ca atra api saṃsāri atirikta paramātma saṃkīrtana abhāvaḥ suṣupti utkrāntyeḥ tad saṃkīrtanāt na ca prājñasya paramātmanaḥ  jīvāt bhedena saṃkīrtanam sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivat aupacārikam yuktam na ca prājña śabdaḥ prajñā prakarṣa śālini nirūḍha vṛttiḥ kathañci d ajña viṣayaḥ  vyākhyātum ucitaḥ na ca prajñā prakarṣaḥ  asaṃkucadvṛttiḥ vidita samasta veditavyāt sarva vidaḥ  anyatra saṃbhavati na cetthaṃbhūtaḥ  jīvātmā tasmāt suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ bhedena jīvāt prājñasya paramātmanaḥ  vyapadeśāt  ayaḥ  ayam vijñāna mayaḥ ityādinā jīva ātmānam loka siddha m anūdya tasya paramātma bhāvaḥ  ananadhi gataḥ pratipādyate na ca jīva ātma nuvāda mātra parāṇi etāni vacāṃsi anadhigata artha avabodhana param hi śābdam pramāṇam na tu anuvāda mātra niṣṭham bhavitum arhati ata eva ca saṃsāriṇaḥ paramātma bhāva vidhānāya ādi madhya avasāneṣu anupādya tayā avamarśa upapadyate evam ca mahat tvam ca aja tvam ca sarva gatasya nityasya ātmanaḥ saṃbhavānna āpekṣikam kalpayiṣyate yaḥ tu madhye buddha anta ādi avastha upanyāsāt iti na anena avasthāvat tvam vivakṣyate api tu avasthānām upajana apāya dharmaka tvena tad atiriktam avasthā rahitam paramātmānam vivakṣati uparitana vākya saṃdarbha ālocanāt iti pati ādi śabdebyaḥ sarvasya vaśī vaśaḥ sāmarthyam sarvasya jagataḥ prabhavati ayam vyūha avasthāna samartha iti ata eva sarvasya īśānaḥ sāmarthyena hi ayam uktena sarvasya iṣṭe tad icchā anuvidhānāt jagataḥ ata eva sarvasya adhipatiḥ sarvasya niyantā antaryāmi iti yāvat  kiñca sa evaṃbhūtaḥ  hi adi antar jyotiḥ puruṣaḥ  vijñānam ayaḥ  na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyān utkṛṣṭaḥ  bhavati iti evamādyāḥ śrutayaḥ asaṃsāriṇam paramātmānam eva pratipādayanti tasmāt jīva ātmānam māna antara siddha m anūdya tasya brahma bhāva pratipādana paraḥ  ayaḥ  ayam vijñāna mayaḥ ityādi vākya saṃdarbha iti siddham iti śrīmat vācaspati miśravi racita śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām prathamasya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ iti prathama adhyāyasya jñeya brahma pratipādaka aspaṣṭa śruti samanvaya ākhyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pājaḥ prathama adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ ānumānikam api ekeṣām iticed na śārīra rūpaka vi nyasta gṛhīteḥ darśayati ca syāt etad  brahma jījñāsām pratijñāya brahmaṇaḥ  lakṣaṇam uktam ajanmādyasya yatas iti tad ca idam lakṣaṇam na pradhāna ādau gatam yena vyabhicārāt alakṣaṇam syāt  kintu brahmaṇi eva iti aīkṣateḥ na aśabdam iti pratipāditam gati sāmānyam ca vedānta vākyānām brahma karaṇa vādam prati vidyate na pradhāna kāraṇa vādam prati iti prapañcitam adhas tatena sūtra saṃdarbheṇa tad kim avaśiṣyate tad artham uttaraḥ saṃdarbha ārabhyate na ca amahataḥ param avyaktam ityādīnām pradhāne samanvaye api vyabhāciraḥ na hi ete pradhāna kāraṇa tvam jagata āhuḥ api tu pradhāna sadbhāva mātram na ca tad sadbhāva mātreṇa ajanmādyasya yatas iti brahma lakṣaṇasya kiñcid hīyate tasmāt anarthaka uttaraḥ saṃdarbha iti ata āha brahma jijñāsām pratijñāya iti na pradhāna sadbhāva mātram pratipādayanti amahataḥ param avyaktam aajām ekām ityādayaḥ kintu jagat kāraṇam pradhānam iti amahataḥ param iti atra hi para śabdaḥ  aviprakṛṣṭa pūrva kāla tvam āha tathā ca kāraṇa tvam aajām ekām ityādīnām tu kāraṇatva abhidhānam ati sphuṭam evam ca lakṣaṇa vyabhicārāt avyabhicārāya yukta uttara saṃdarbha ārambha iti pūrvapakṣayati tatra ya eva iti sāṃkhya pravāda rūḍhim āha tatra avyaktam iti sāṃkhya smṛti prasiddheḥ na kevalam rūḍhiḥ avayava prasiddhyā api ayam eva arthaḥ  avagamyata iti āha na vyaktam iti śānya ghora mūḍha śabda ādi hīna tvāt ca iti śrutiḥ uktā smṛtiḥ ca sāṃkhīyā nyāyaḥ ca abhedānām parimāṇāt samanvayāt śaktitas  pravṛtteḥ ca kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya kāraṇam asti avyaktam iti na ca amahataḥ param avyaktam iti prakaraṇa pariśeṣābhyām avyakta padam śarīra gocaram śarīrasya śānta ghora mūḍha pa śabda ādi ātmaka tvena avyaktatva anupapatteḥ tasmāt pradhānam eva avyaktam ucyata iti prāpte ucyate na etad evam na hi etad kāṭhakam vākyam iti laukikī hi prasiddhī rūḍhiḥ veda artha nirṇaye nimittam tad upāya tvāt yathā āhuḥ aya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te  eva vaidikāḥ ta eva ca eṣām arthāḥ iti na tu parīkṣakāṇām pāribhāṣikī pauruṣeyī hi sā na veda artha nirṇaya nibandhana siddhau ya nimittam poḷ  ṣadha ādi prasiddhivat tasmāt rūḍhitaḥ tāvat na pradhānam pratīyate yogaḥ tu anyatra api tulyaḥ tad evam avyakta śrutau  anyathā asiddhāyām prakaraṇa pariśeṣābhyām śarīra gocaraḥ  ayam avyakta śabdaḥ yathā ca asya tad gocara tvam upapadyate tathā agre darśayiṣyati teṣu śarīra ādiṣu madhye viṣayān  tad gecarān viddhi yathā aśvaḥ  adhvānam ālambya calati evam indriya hayāḥ sva gocaram ālambya iti ātmā bhoktā iti āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ katham indriya manaḥ yuktam yogaḥ  yathā bhavati indriya artha manaḥ saṃnikarṣeṇa hi atmā gandha ādīnām bhoktā pradhāsya akāṅkṣāvataḥ  vacanam prakaraṇam iti gantavyam viṣṇoḥ paramam padam pradhānam iti tad ākāṅkṣām avatārayati taiḥ ca indriya ādibhiḥ asaṃyataiḥ iti asaṃyama abhidhānam vyatireka mukhena saṃyama vadātīkaraṇam para śabdaḥ śreṣṭha vacanaḥ nanu āntara tvena yadi śreṣṭha tvam tadā indriyāṇām eva bāhyebhyaḥ  gandha ahibhyaḥ śreṣṭha tvam syāt iti ata āha arthā ye śabda ādaya iti na antara tvena śreṣṭha tvam api tu pradhāna tayā tad ca vivakṣā adhīnam grahebhyaḥ ca indriyebhyaḥ  atigrahaya arthānām pradhānyam śrutyā vivakṣitam iti indriyebhyor athānām prādhānyāt paratvam bhavati ghrāṇa jihvā vāc cakṣuḥ śrotra manaḥ hasta tvacaḥ  hi indriyāṇi śrutyā aṣṭau grahā uktāḥ gṛhṇanti vaśīkurvanti khalu etāni puruṣa paśum iti na ca etani sva rūpavataḥ  vaśīkartum īśate yāvat asmai puruṣa śave gandha rasa nāma rūpa śabda kāma karma sparśān na upaharanti ata eva gandhādayaḥ  aṣṭau  atigrahāḥ tad upahāreṇa grahāṇām grahatva upapatteḥ tad idam uktam indriyāṇām grahaṇam viṣayāṇām atigraha tvam iti śruti prasiddheḥ iti graha tvena indriyaiḥ sāmye api manasaḥ sva gatena viśeṣeṇa arthebhyaḥ paratvam āha viṣayebyaḥ ca manasaḥ paratvam iti kasmāt pumān rathi tvena upakṣiptaḥ  gṛhyata iti ata āha ātma śabdāt iti tad pratyabhijñānāt iti arthaḥ śreṣṭha tve hetum āha bhoktuḥ ca iti tad anena jīvātmā svāmitayā mahānuktaḥ athavā śruti smṛtibhyām hairaṇyagarbhī buddhiḥ ātma śabdena ucyata iti āha athavā iti pūriti bhogya jātasya buddhiḥ adhikaraṇam iti buddhiḥ pūḥ tad evam sarvāsām buddhīnām prathama ja hiraṇyagarbha buddhi eka nīḍa tayā hiraṇyagarbha buddheḥ mahat tvam cāpanādā  copanā dānāḷ tma tvam ca ata eva buddhi mātrāt pṛthak karaṇam upapannam nanu etasmin pakṣe hiraṇyagarbha buddheḥ ātma tvāt na rathita ātmanaḥ  bhoktuḥ
