atra upādānam iti na ratha mātram pariśiṣyate api tu rathavān apītyata āha etasmin  tu pakṣa iti yathā hi samāropitam pratibimbam bimbāt na vastu tas  bhidyate tathā na paramātmanaḥ  vijñāna ātmā vastu tas  bhidyata iti paramātmā eva rathavān iha upāttastena ratha mātram parisiṣṭam iti atha ratha ādi rūpaka kalpanāyāḥ śarīra ādiṣu kim prayojanam iti ata āha śarīra indriya manaḥ buddhi viṣaya vadena asaṃyuktasya hi iti vedanā sukha ādi anubhāvaḥ pratyarthamañcati iti pratyagātmā iha jīvaḥ  abhimataḥ tasya brahma avagatiḥ na ca jīvasya brahma tvam māna antara siddham yena atra na āgamaḥ  apekṣya iti āha tathā ca iti vāc iti chāndasaḥ  dvitīya ālopaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ  anuśaya bīja nirākaraṇa param sūtram sūkṣmam tu tad arha tvāt prakṛteḥ vikāraṇām ananya tvāt prakṛteḥ avyakta tvam vikāra upacaryate yathā agobhiḥ śrī mita iti gauśabdaḥ tādvikāre payasi avyaktāt kāraṇāt  vikāraṇām ananya tvena avyakta śabda arha tve pramāṇam āha tathā ca śrutiḥ iti avyākṛtam avyaktam iti anarthāntaram nanu evam sati pradhānam eva abyupetam bhavati sukha duḥkha moha ātmakam hi jagat evaṃbhūtāt eva kāraṇāt bhavitum arhati kāraṇa ātmaka tvāt kāryasya yad ca tasya sukha ātmaka tvam tad sattvam yad ca tasya duḥkha ātmaka tvam tad gajaḥ yad ca tasya moha ātmaka tvam tad tamaḥ tathā ca avyaktam padhānam eva abhyupetam iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham sūtram tad adhīna tvāt arthavat  pradhānam hi sāṃkhyānām sa īśvarāṇām anīśvarāṇām veśvarāt  kṣetrajñebhyaḥ  vā vastu tas  bhinnam śakyam nirvaktum brahmaṇaḥ tu iyam avidyā śaktiḥ māyā ādi śabda vācyā na śakyā tattvena anya tvena vā nirvaktum idam eva asya avyakta tvam yad anirvācya tvam nāma saḥ  ayam avyākṛta vādasya pradhāna vādāt bhedaḥ avidyā śakteḥ ca īśvara adhīna tvam tad āśraya tvāt na ca dravya mātram aśaktam kāryāya alam iti śakteḥ arthavat tvam tad idam uktam arthavat iti syāt etad  yadi brahmaṇaḥ  avidyā śaktyā saṃsāraḥ pratīyate hanta muktānām api punar utpāda prasaṅgaḥ tasyāḥ pradhānavat tādavasthyāt  tad vināśe vā samasta saṃsāra ucchedaḥ tad mūla vidyā śakteḥ samucchedāt ityata āha muktānām ca punar  bandhasya anutpattiḥ kutas  vidyayā tasyāḥ  bīja śakteḥ dāhāt  ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ na vayam pradhānavat avidyām sarva jīveṣu ekām ācakṣmahe yainevam upālamemahi kintu iyam pratijīvam bhidyate tena yasya eva jīvasya vidyā utpannā tasya eva avidyā apanīyate na jīva antarasya bhinna adhikaraṇayoḥ vidyā vidyayoḥ avirodhāt tad kutas  samasta saṃsāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ padhāna vādinām tu eṣa doṣaḥ pradhānasya ekatvena tad ucchede sarva ucchedaḥ  anucchede vā na kasyacid itya nirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ pradhāna bhede api ca etad aviveka khyāti lakṣaṇa avidyā sat asattva nibandhanau bandha mokṣau tarhi kṛtam pradhānena avidyā sat asadbhāvābhyām eva tad upapatteḥ na ca avidyā upādhi bheda adhīnaḥ  jīva bhedaḥ  jīva bheda adhīnaḥ ca avidyā upādhi bheda iti paraspara āśrayāt ubhaya āsiddhiḥ iti sāṃpratam anādi tvāt bīja aṅkuravat ubhaya siddheḥ avidyātva mātreṇa ca ekatva upacāraḥ  avyaktam iti ca avyākṛtam iti ca iti nanu evam avidyā eva jagat bījam iti kṛtam īśvareṇa ityata āha parameśvara āśraya iti na hi acetanam caitana anadhiṣṭhitam kāryāya paryāptam iti sva kāryam kartum parameśvaram nimitta tayā upādāna tayā vā āśrayate prapañca vibhramasya hi īśvara adhiṣṭhāna tvam ahi vibhramasya iva rajju adhiṣṭhāna tvam tena yathā ahi vibhramaḥ  rajju upādāna evam prapañca vibhrama īśvara upādānaḥ tasmāt jīva adhikaraṇā api avidyā nimitta tayā viṣaya tayā ca īśvaram āśrayata iti īśvara āśrayā iti ucyate na tu ādhāra tayā vidyā svabhāve brahmaṇi tad anupapatteḥ iti ata eva āha yasyām svarūpa pratibodha rahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇaḥ  jīvā iti yasyām avidyāyām satyām śarate jīvāḥ jīvānām svarūpam vāstavam brahma tad bodha rahitāḥ śerata iti laya uktaḥ saṃsāriṇa iti vikṣepa uktaḥ avyakta adhīna tvāt jīva bhāvasya iti yadi api jīva avyaktayoḥ anādi tvena aniyatam paurvāparyam tathā api avyaktasya pūrva tvam vivakṣitvā etad uktam sati api śarīravat indriya ādīnām iti gaubalīvarda pada vetat draṣṭavyam ācārya deśīya matam āha anye tu iti etad dūṣayati taiḥ tu iti prakaraṇa pāriśeṣyayoḥ ubhayatra tulyatva at na eka grahaṇa niyama hetuḥ asti śaṅkate āmnātya artham iti avyakta padam eva sthūla śarīra vyāvṛtti hetuḥ vyakta tvāt tasya iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti na eka vākyata adhīna tvāt iti prakṛta hānya prakṛta prakriyā prasaṅgena eka vākya tve saṃbhavati na vākya bhedaḥ  yujyate na ca akāhkṣāṃ vinā eka vākya tvam ubhayam ca prakṛtam iti ubhayam grāhya tvena iha ākāṅkṣitam iti eka abhidhāyakam api padam śarīra dvaparam na ca mukhyayā vṛttyā tad param iti aupacārikatam na bhavati yathā upahantṛ mātra nirākāhkṣāyām kaka padam prayujyamānam śva ādi sarva hantṛ padam vijñāyate yathā āhuḥ akākebhyaḥ  rakṣyatām annam iti bāle api na uditaḥ upaghāta pradhāna tvāt na śva ādibhyaḥ  na rakṣati iti nanu na śarīra dvaya sya atrākāhkṣā kintu duḥśodha tvāt sūkṣmasya eva śarīrasya na tu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasyaṣa etad hi dṛṣṭa bībhatsa tayā sukaram vairāgya viṣaya tvena śodhayitum iti ata āha na ca evam mantavyam iti viṣṇoḥ paramam padam avagamayitum param paramatra pratipādya tvena prastutam na tu vairāgyāya śodhanam iti arthaḥ alam vā vivādena bhavatu sūkṣmam eva śarīram pariśodhyam tathā api na sāṃkhya abhimatam atra pradhānam param iti abhyupetya āha sarvathā api tu iti jñeyatva avacanāt ca itas  api na ayam avyakta śabdaḥ sāṃkhya abhimata pradhāna paraḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānāt vivekena puruṣam niḥśreyasāya jñātum vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānam jñeya tvena upakṣipyate na ca iha jānīyāt iti ca upāsīta iti vā vidhi vibhakti śrutiḥ asti api tu avyakta pada mātram na ca etāvatā sāṃkhya smṛti pratyabhijñānam bhavati iti bhāvaḥ jñeyatva avacanasya asiddhim āśaṅkya tad siddhi pradarśana artham sūtram vadati iti ced na prājñaḥ  hi prakaraṇāt  nigada vyākhyātam asya bhāṣyam trayāṇām eva ca evam upanyāsaḥ praśnaḥ ca vara pradāna upakramā hi mṛtyu naciketaḥ saṃvāda vākya pravṛttiḥ ām āpteḥ kaṭhavat līnām lakṣyate mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭaḥ trīn varān pradadau naciketa astu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyam vavre dvitīyena agni vidyām tṛtīyena ātma vidyām avaraṇām eṣa varaḥ tṛtīyaḥ iti vacanāt  nanu tatra vara pradāne pradhāna gocare staḥ praśna parti vacane tasmāt kaṭha vallīṣu agni jīva paramātma para eva vākya pravṛttiḥ na tu anupakrānta pradhāna parā bhavitum arhati iti āha itas ca na pradhānasya avyakta śabda vācya tvam iti ahantaḥ ta idam pravakṣyāmi guhyam brahma sanātanam iti anena vyavahitam jīva viṣayam ayathā tu maraṇam prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama ityādi prativacanam iti yojanā atra āha ca udakaḥ kim jīva paramātmanoḥ eka  eva praśnaḥ kim vā anyaḥ  jīvasya ayeyam prete manuṣya iti praśāntaḥ anyaḥ ca paramātmanaḥ aanyatra dharmāt ityādiḥ ekatve sūtra virodhaḥ trayāṇam iti bhede tu saumanasya avāpti agni ātma jñāna viṣaya vara traya pradāna ananta bhāvaḥ  anyatra dharmāt ityādeḥ praśnasya turīya vara antara kalpanāyām vā tṛtīya iti śruti bādha prasaṅgaḥ vara pradāna anantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat  pradhāna ākhyānam api anantarbhūtam vara pradāne astu amahataḥ param vyakta amiti ākṣepaḥ pariharati atra ucyate na evam vayam iha iti vastu tas  jīva paramātmanā uḥ abhedāt praṣṭavya abhedena eka eva praśnaḥ ata eva prativacanam api ekam sūtram tu avāsta bheda abhiprāyam vāstavaḥ ca jīva paramātmanā uḥ abhedaḥ tatra tatra śruti upanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣya kāreṇa darśitaḥ tathā jīva viṣayasya astitva nāstitva praśnasya ityādi ayeyam prete iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnam upaśrutya tad tad kāma viṣayam alobham ca asya pratītya mṛtyuḥ avidyā abhīpsinam naciketasam manye ityādinā naciketasam praśasya praśnam api tadīyam praśaṃsan  asmin praśne brahma eva uttaram uvāca tam durdarśam iti yadi punar jīvāt prājñaḥ  bhidyeta jīva gocaraḥ praśnaḥ prājña gocaram ca uttaram iti kim kena saṃgaccheta apica yad viṣayam praśnam upaśrutya mṛtyunā eṣa praśaṃsitaḥ  naciketāḥ yadi tam eva bhūyas  pṛcchet tad uttare ca avadadhyāt  tatas  praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt  praśna antare tvasā avasthāne prasāritā satya dṛṣṭārthā syāt iti āha yad praśnā iti yasmin praśnaḥ  yad praśnaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham mahadvat ca anena sāṃkhya prasiddheḥ vaidika prasiddhyā virodhān na sāṃkhya prasiddhiḥ veda ādartavyā iti uktam sāṃkhyānām mahat tattvam sattā mātram puruṣa artha kriyā kṣamam sattasya bhāvaḥ sattā tanmātram mahat tattvam iti yā yā puruṣa artha kriyā śabda ādi upabhoga lakṣaṇā ca sattva puruṣa anya tā khyāti lakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahat tattvam sattām ātram ucyata iti camasavat aviśeṣāt  ajā śabdaḥ  yadi api chāgāyām rūḍhaḥ tathā api adhyātma vidyā adhikārān na tatra kartitum arhati tasmāt rūḍheḥ asaṃbhavāt yogena vartayitavyaḥ tatra kim svatantram pradhānam anena mantra varṇena anūdyatām uta pārameśvarī māyā śaktiḥ tejaḥ  abanna vyākriya akāraṇam ucyatām kim tāvat prāptam pradhānam eva iti tathā hi yādṛśam pradhānam sāṃkhyaiḥ smaryate tādṛśam eva asmin  anyūnā anatiriktam pratīyate sā hi pradhāna lakṣaṇā prakṛtiḥ na jāyata iti ajā ca ekā ca lohita śukla kṛṣṇā ca yadi api lohita tvāt ayaḥ  varṇā na rajaḥ prabhṛtiṣu santi tathā api lohitam kusumbha ādi rañjayati rajaḥ  api rañjayati iti lohitam evam prasannam pāthaḥ śuklam sattvam api prasannam iti śuklam evam āvarakam megha ādi kṛṣṇam tamaḥ  api āvarakam iti kṛṣṇam pareṇa api na avyākṛtasya sva rūpeṇa lohitatva ādi yoga āstheyaḥ kintu tad kāryasya tejaḥ  abannasya rohi tvā ādi kāraṇa upacaraṇīyam kāryasārūpeṇa vā kāraṇe kalpanīyam tad asmākam api tulyam aajaḥ  hi ekaḥ  juṣamāṇaḥ  anuśete jahāti enām bhukta bhogām ajaḥ  anyaḥ iti tu ātma bheda śravaṇāt  sāṃkhya smṛteḥ eva atra mantra varṇe pratyabhijñānam na tu avyākṛta prakriyāyāḥ tasyām aikātmya abhyupagamena ātma bheda abhāvāt  tasmāt svatantram pradhānam na aśabdam iti prāptam teṣām sāmya avasthā avayava dharmaiḥ iti avayavāḥ pradhānasma ekasya sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi teṣām dharmā lohitatva āt ayaḥ taiḥ iti prajāḥ traiguṇya anvitā iti sukha duḥkha moha ātmikāḥ tathā hi maitra dāreṣu narmadāyām maitrasya sukham tad  kasya hetoḥ tam prati sattvasya samudbhavāt  tathā ca tad sapatnīnām duḥkham tad  kasya hetoḥ tāḥ prati rajaṛ samudbhavāt  tathā caitrasya tām avindataḥ  mohaḥ  viṣādaḥ sa kasya hetoḥ tam prati tamaḥ samudbhavāt narmadayā ca sarve bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ tad idam traiguṇya anvita tvam prajānām anuśeta iti vyācaṣṭe tām eva avidyayā iti viṣayā hi śabda ādayaḥ prakṛti vikāraḥ traiguṇyena sukha duḥkha moha ātmāna indriya manaḥ  ahaṅkāra praṇālikayā buddhi sattvam upasaṃkrāmanti tena tad buddhi sattvam pradhāna vikāraḥ sukha duḥkha moha ātmakam śabda ādi rūpeṇa pariṇamate citi śaktiḥ tu apariṇāminya pratisaṃkramā api buddhi sattvāt ātmanaḥ  viveka budhyamānā buddhi vṛttyā eva viparyāsena avidyayā buddhi sthān sukha ādīn ātmani abhimanyamānā sukha ādim atī iva bhavati tad idam uktam sukhī duḥkhī mūḍhaḥ  aham iti aviveka tayā saṃsarati ekaḥ sattva puruṣa anya tā ākhyāti samunmūlita nikhila vāsanā vidyā anubandhaḥ tu anyaḥ  jahāti enām prakṛtim tad idam uktam anyaḥ punar iti bhukta bhogām iti vyācaṣṭe kṛta bhoga apavargām śabda ādi āpalabdhiḥ bhogaḥ guṇa puruṣa anyatā khyātiḥ apavargaḥ apavṛjyate hi tayā puruṣa iti evam prāpte abhidhīyate na tāvat  aajaḥ  hi ekaḥ  juṣamāṇaḥ  anuśete jahāti enām bhukta bhogam ajaḥ  anyaḥ iti etad ātma bheda pratipādana param api tu siddham ātma bhedaṃnūdya bandha mokṣau pratipādayati iti sa ca anūditaḥ  bhedaḥ aekaḥ  devaḥ sarva bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarva vyāpī sarva bhūta antarātmā iti ādi śrutibhiḥ ātma ekatva pratipādana parābhiḥ virodhāt kalpanikaḥ  avatiṣṭhate tathā ca na sāṃkhya prakriyā pratyabhijñānam iti ajā vākyam camasa vākyavat pariplavamānam na svatantra pradhāna niścayāya paryāptam tad idam uktam sūtra kṛtā acamasavat aviśeṣāt iti uttara sūtram avatārayitum śaṅkate tatra tu idam tad śira iti sūtram avatārayati atra brūmaḥ jyotiḥ upakramā tu tathā hi adhīyata eke sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam brahma iti sthā etau śākhā antara ukta rohita ādi guṇa yoginī tejaḥ  abanna lakṣaṇā jarāyu jā aṇḍa sveda jat bhijja caturvidha bhūta grāma prakṛti bhūtā iyam ajā pratipattavyā arohita śukla kṛṣṇām iti rohita ādiḥ upatayā tasyāḥ  eva pratyabhijñānāt  na tu sāṃkhya parikalpitā prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ  aprāmāṇika tayā śruta hānya śruta kalpanā prasaṅgāt  rañjana ādinā ca rohita ādi upacārasya sati mukhya artha saṃbhave ayogāt  tad idam uktam rohita ādīnām śabdānām iti ajāpadasya ca samudāya prasiddhi parityāgena na jāyata iti avayava prasiddhi āśrayaṇe doṣa prasaṅgāt  atra tu rūpaka klapanāyām samudāya prasiddheḥ eva anapekṣāyāḥ svīkārāt  api ca ayam api śruti kalāpaḥ  asmad darśana anuguṇā u na sāṃkhya smṛti anuguṇa  iti āha tathā iha api iti kim kāraṇam brahma iti upakramya iti brahma svarūpam tāvat jagat kāraṇam na bhavati viśuddha tvāt tasya yathā āhuḥ apuruṣasya tu śuddhasya na aśuddhā vikṛtiḥ bavet iti āśayavatī iva śrutiḥ pṛcchati kiṅkāraṇam yasya brahmaṇaḥ  jagat utpattiḥ tad  kiṅkāraṇam brahma iti arthaḥ te brahma vidaḥ  dhyāna yogena ātmānam gatāḥ prāptā apaśyan  iti yojanā yaḥ  yonim yonim iti avidyā śaktiḥ yoniḥ sā ca pratijīvam nānā iti uktam atas  vīpsā upapannā śeṣam ati rohita artham sūtra antaram avatārayitum śaṅkate katham punar iti aja ākṛtiḥ jātiḥ tejaḥ  abanneṣu na asti na ca tejaḥ  abannānām janma śravaṇāt ajanma nimittaḥ  api ajā śabdaḥ saṃbhavati iti āha na ca tejaḥ  abannānām iti sūtram avatārayati ata uttaram paṭhati kalpanā upadeśāt ca madhu ādivat avirodhaḥ nanu kim chāgā lohita śukla kṛṣṇā eva anyādṛśīnām api chāgānām upalambhāt ityata āha yadṛcchayā iti bahubarkarā bahuśāvā śeṣam nigada vyākhyātam na saṃkhyā upasaṃgrahāt api nānā bhāvāt atirekāt ca avāntara saṃgatim āha evam parihṛte api iti pañcajanā iti hi samāsa arthaḥ pañca saṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate na ca adiś saṃkhye saṃjñāyām iti samāsa vidhānāt manujeṣu nirūḍhaḥ  ayam pañcajana śabda iti vācyam tathā hi sati pañcamanujā iti syāt  evam ca ātmani pcamanujānām ākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānam iti nistāt paryam sarvasya eva pratiṣṭhānāt  tasmāt rūḍheḥ asaṃbhavāt tad tyāgonātra yoga āstheyaḥ jana śabdaḥ ca kathañcid tattveṣu vyākhyeyaḥ tatra api kim pañca prāṇa ādayaḥ  vākya śeṣa gatā vivakṣyante uta tad atiriktā anya eva vā kecid  tatra paurvāparya paryālocanayā kaṇva mādhyandina vākyayoḥ virodhāt ekatra hi jyotiṣā pañcatvam annena itaratra na ca ṣoḍaśi grahaṇavat vikalpa saṃbhavaḥ anuṣṭhānam hi vikalpyate na vastu vastu tattva kathā ca iyam na anuṣṭhāna kathā vidhi abhāvāt  tasmāt kānicid eva tattvāni iha pañca pratyekam pañca saṃkhyā yogīni pañcaviṃśati tattvāni bhavanti sāṃkhyaiḥ ca prakṛti ādīni pañcaviṃśati tattvāni smaryanta iti tāni eva anena mantreṇa ucyanta iti na aśabdam pradhāna ādi na ca ādhāra tvena ātmanaḥ  vyavasthānāt sva ātmani ca ādhāra ādheya bhāvasya virodhāt  ākāśasya ca vyatirecanāt  trayoviṃśatiḥ janā iti syāt na pañca pañcajanā iti vācyam sati api ākāśa ātmanoḥ vyatirecane mūlaprakṛti bhāgaiḥ sattva rajaḥ tamobhiḥ pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyā upapatteḥ tathā ca satya ātma ākāśābhyām saptaviṃśati saṃkhyāyām pañcaviṃśati tattvāni iti sva siddhānta vyāka upa iti ced  na mūlaprakṛtitva mātreṇa ekīkṛtya sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi pañcaviṃśati tattva upapatteḥ hirugbhāvena tu teṣām saptaviṃśatitva avirodhaḥ tasmāt nāśābdī sāṃkhya smṛtiḥ iti prāptam mūlaprakṛtiḥ pradhānam nāsau  anyasya vikṛtiḥ api tu prakṛtiḥ eva tad idam uktam mūla iti mahat ahaṅkāra pañca tanmātrāṇi prakṛtayaḥ ca vikṛtayaḥ ca tathā hi mahat tattvam ahaṅkārasya tattva antarasya prakṛtiḥ mūla prakṛteḥ tu vikṛtiḥ evam ahaṅkāra tattvam mahataḥ  vikṛtiḥ prakṛtiḥ ca tad eva tāmasam sat  pañca tanmātrāṇām tad eva sāttvikam sat  prakṛtiḥ ekādaśa indriyāṇām pañca tanmātrāṇi ca ahaṅkārasya vikṛtiḥ ākāśa ādīnām pañcānām prakṛtiḥ tad idam uktam mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta ṣoḍaśakaḥ ca vikāraḥ ṣoḍaśa saṃkhyā avacchinnaḥ gaṇaḥ  vikāra eva pañcabhūta anyatanmātrāṇi ekādaśa indriyāṇi iti ṣoḍaśa kaḥ  gaṇaḥ yadi api pṛthivī ādayaḥ  gaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām prakṛtiḥ tathā api na te pṛthivī ādibhyaḥ tattva antaram iti na prakṛtiḥ tattva antara upādāna tvam ca iha prakṛti tvam abhimatam na upādāna mātra tvam iti avirodhaḥ puruṣaḥ tu kūṭastha nityaḥ  apariṇāmaḥ  na kasyacid prakṛtiḥ na api vikṛtiḥ iti evam prāpte abhidhīyate na saṃkhyā upasaṃgrahāt api pradhāna ādīnām śrutimattva āśaṅkā kartavyā kasmāt  nānā bhāvāt nānā hi etāni pañcaviṃśati tattvāni na eṣām pañcaśas  pañcaśas  sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ  asti na khalu sattva rajaḥ ta maḥ hat ahaṅkārāṇām ekaḥ kriyā dā guṇa u vā dravyam vā jātiḥ vā dharmaḥ pañca tanmātra ādibhyaḥ  vyāvṛttaḥ sattva ādiṣu ca anugataḥ kaścid asti na api pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ghrāṇānām na api rasana vakṣuḥ tvac śrotra vācām na api pāṇa apāda pāyu upastha manasām yena ekena asādhāraṇena upagṛhītāḥ pañca pañcakā bhavitum arhati pūrva pakṣa eka deśinam utthāpayati atha ucyeta pañcaviṃśa saṃkhyā eva iyam iti yadi api parasyām saṃkhyāyām avāntara saṃkhyā dvitva ādikā na asti tathā api tad pūrvam tasyāḥ saṃbhavāt  paurvāparya lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā para saṃkhyā upalakṣaṇa artham pūrva saṃkhyā upanyasyata iti dūṣayati ayam eva asmin pakṣe doṣa iti na ca pañca śabdaḥ  jana śabdena samastaḥ  asamastaḥ śakyaḥ  vaktum iti āha paraḥ ca atra pañca śabda iti nanu bhavatu samāsaḥ tathā api kim iti ata āha samasta tvāt ca iti api ca vīpsāyām pañcaka dvaya grahaṇe daśa eva tattvāni iti na sāṃkhya smṛti pratyabhijñānam iti asamāsam abhyupetya āha na ca pañcaka dvaya grahaṇam pañca pañca iti na ca ekā pañca saṃkhyā pañca saṃkhyā antareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum pañca śabdasya saṃkhyā upasarjana dravya vacana tvena saṃkhyāyāḥ  upasarjana tayā viśeṣaṇena asaṃyogāt iti āha ekasyāḥ pañca saṃkhyāyā iti tad evam pūrva pakṣa eka deśini dūṣite parama pūrva pakṣiṇam utthāpayati nanu āpanna pañca saṃkhyākā janā eva iti atra tāvat rūḍhau satyām na yogaḥ saṃbhavati iti vakṣyate tathā api yaugikam pañcajana śabdam abhyupetya dūṣayati yuktam yad pañcapūlī śabdasya iti pañca pūlī iti atra yadi api pṛthaktvā eka artha saṃvāyinī pañca saṃkhyā avacchedikā asti tathā api iha samudāyinaḥ avacchinatti na samudāyam samāsapada gamyam atas tasmin kati te samudāyā iti apekṣāyām pada antara abhihitā pañca saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate pañca iti pañcajanā iti atra tu pañca saṃkhyayā utpatti śiṣṭa tayā janānām avacchinna tvāt samudāyasya ca pañca pūlīvat atra apratīteḥ na pada antara abhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate syāt etad  saṃkhyeyānām janānām mā bhūt śabda antara vāvya saṃkhyā avacchedaḥ pañca saṃkhyāyāḥ tu tayā avat chedaḥ  bhaviṣyati na hi sā api avacchinnā ityata āha bhavat api idam viśeṣaṇam iti uktaḥ  atra doṣaḥ nahi upasarjanam viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañca śabda eva tāvat saṃkhyeya upasarjana saṃkhyām āha viśeṣataḥ tu pañcajanā iti atra samāse viśeṣaṇa apekṣāyām tu na samāsaḥ syāt  asāmarthyāt  na hi bhavati ṛddhasya rāja puruṣa iti samāsaḥ  api tu  pada  vṛttiḥ eva ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa iti sa apekṣa tvena asāmarthyāt iti arthaḥ atirekāt ca iti abhyuccaya mātram yadi sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi pradhānena ekīkṛtya ātma ākāśau tattvebhyaḥ  vyatiricyete tadā siddhānta vyākopaḥ atha tu sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi mithas  bhedena vivakṣyante tathā api vastu tattva vyavasthāpane ādhāra tvena ātmā niṣkṛṣyatām ādheya antarebhyaḥ tu ākāśasya ādheyasya vyatirecanam anarthakam iti gamayitavyam katham ca saṃkhyā mātra śravaṇe sati iti adiś saṃkhye saṃjñāyām iti saṃjñāyām samāsa smaraṇāt  pañcajana śabdaḥ tāvat ayam kkacid nirūḍhaḥ na ca rūḍhau satyām avayava prasiddheḥ grahaṇam sa apekṣa tvāt  nirapekṣa tvāt ca rūḍheḥ tad yadi rūḍhau mukhyor athaḥ prāpyate tatas  sa eva grahītavyaḥ  atha tu asau na vākye saṃbandha arhaḥ pūrva apara vākya virodhī vā tatas  rūḍhya parityāgena eva vṛtti antareṇa artha antaram kalpayitvā vākyam upapādanīyam yathā aśyenena abhicaran yajeta iti śyena śabda śakuni viśeṣe nirūḍha vṛttiḥ tad aparityāgena eva nipatya ādāna sādṛśyena arthavādikena kratu viśeṣe vartate tathā pañcajana śabdaḥ  avayava artha yoga anapekṣa ekasmin  api vartate yathā saptarṣi śabdaḥ  vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate na ca eṣa tattveṣu rūḍhaḥ pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyā anurodhena tattveṣu vartayitavyaḥ rūḍhau satyām pcaviṃśateḥ eva saṃkhyāyāḥ  abhāvāt katham tattveṣu vartate evam ca ke te pañcajanā iti apekṣāyām kim vākya śeṣa gatāḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ  gṛhyantām uta pañcaviṃśatiḥ tattvāni iti viśaye tattvānām aprāmāṇika tvāt  prāṇa ādīnām ca vākya śeṣe śravaṇāt tad parityāge śruta hānya śruta kalpanā prasaṅgāt prāṇa ādaya eva pañcajanāḥ na ca kāṇḍavam ādhyandinayoḥ virodhāt na prāṇa ādīnām vākya śeṣa gatānām api grahaṇam iti sāṃpratam virodhe api tulya balatayā ṣoḍaśi grahaṇavat vikalpa upapatteḥ na ca iyam vastu svarūpa kathā apitu upāsana anuṣṭhāna vidhiḥ amanasā eva anudraṣṭavyam iti vidhi śravaṇāt  katham punar  praṇādiṣu jana śabda prayoga iti janavācakaḥ śabdaḥ  jana śabdaḥ pañcajana śabda iti yāvat  tasya katham prāṇa ādiṣu ajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam anyathā tu pratyasta mita avayava arthe samudāya śabda arthe jana śabda arthaḥ  na asti iti aparyanu yoga eva rūḍhya parityāgena eva vṛtti antaram darśayati jana saṃbandhāt ca iti jana śabda bhājaḥ pañcajana śabda bhājaḥ nanu satyām avayava prasiddhau samupāya śakti kalpanam anupapannam saṃbhavati ca pañcaviṃśatyām tattveṣu avayava prasiddhiḥ iti ata āha samāsa balāt ca iti syāt etad  samāsa balāt ced rūḍhiḥ āsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭaḥ tarhi tasya prayogaḥ  aśva karṇa ādivat vṛkṣa ādiṣu tathā ca loka prasiddhi abhāvāt na rūḍhiti ākṣipati katham punar asati iti janeṣu tāvat pañcajana śabdaḥ ca prathamaḥ prayogaḥ  lokeṣu dṛṣṭa iti asati prathama prayoga iti asiddham iti sthavīyaḥ tayā anabhidhāya abhyupetya prathama prayoga abhāvam samādhatte śakyā udbhidādivat iti ācārya deśīyānām mata bhedeṣu api na pañcaviṃśatiḥ tattvāni sidhyanti paramārthataḥ tu pañcajanā vākya śeṣa gatā eva iti āśa yavān āha kaiścittu iti śeṣam ati rohita artham kāraṇa tvena ca ākāśa ādiṣu yathāvyapadiṣṭa ukteḥ atha samanvaya lakṣaṇe kā iyam akāṇḍe virodha avirodha cintā bhavitā hi tasyāḥ sthānam avirodha lakṣaṇam iti ata āha pratipāditam brahmaṇa iti ayam arthaḥ na aneka śākhā gata tad tad vākya ālocanayā vākya artha avagame paryavasite sati pramāṇa antara virodhena vākya artha āgateḥ aprāmāṇyam āśaṅkya avirodha vyutpādanena prāmāṇya vyavasthāpanam avirodha lakṣaṇa arthaḥ prāsaṅgikam tu tatra sṛṣṭi viṣayāṇām vākyānām parasparam avirodha pratipādanam na tu lakṣaṇa arthaḥ tad prayojanam ca tatra eva pratipādayiṣyate iha tu vākyānām sṛṣṭi pratipādakānām paraspara virodhe brahmaṇi jagat yonau na samanvayaḥ seddhum arhati tathā ca na jagat kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ  lakṣaṇam na ca tatra gati sāmānyam na ca tad siddhaye pradhānasya aśabdatva pratipādanam tasmāt vākyānām virodha avirodha abya amukta artha ākṣepa samādhānābhyām samanvayaḥ eva upapādyata iti samanvaya lakṣaṇe saṃgatam idam adhikaraṇam avākyānām kāraṇe kārye paraspara virodhataḥ samanvayaḥ  jagat yonau na sidhyati para ātmani asat eva somya idam agra āsīt ityādīnām kāraṇa viṣayāṇām aasat vā idam atra āsīt ityādibhiḥ vākyaiḥ kāraṇa viṣayaiḥ virodhaḥ kārya viṣayāṇām api vibhinna krama ākrama utpatti pratipādakānām virodhaḥ tathā hi kānicid anya kartṛkā jagat utpattim ācakṣate vākyani kānicid svayaṅkartṛkām sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tad kāraṇa tayā brahma lakṣitam sṛṣṭi vipratipattau tad kāraṇa tāyām brahma lakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyām bhavati tad lakṣye brahmaṇi api vipratipatti tasmāt brahmaṇi samanvaya abhāvāt na samanvaya agamyam brahma vedāntāḥ tu kartṛ ādi pratipādanena karma vidhi para tayā upacarita arthā avivakṣita arthā vā japa upayogina iti prāptam krama ādi iti ādi grahaṇena ākramaḥ  gṛhyate evam prāpta ucyate asarga krama vivāde api na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate sataḥ tu asat vacaḥ  bhaktyā nirākārya tayā kkacid  na tāvat asti sṛṣṭi krame vigānam śrutīnām avirodhāt  tathā hi aneka śilpa paryavadātaḥ  devadattaḥ prathamam cakra daṇḍa ādi karoti atha tad upakaraṇaḥ kumbham kumbha upakaraṇaḥ ca āharati udakam udaka upakaraṇaḥ ca saṃyavanena godhūma kaṇikānām karoti piṇḍam piṇḍa upakaraṇaḥ tu paṭati ghṛta pūrṇam tad asya devadattasya sarvatra etāsmin kartṛ tvāt śakyam vaktum deva dattāt cakra ādi saṃbhūtam tasmāt cakra ādeḥ kumbha ādi iti śakyam ca deva dattāt kumbhaḥ samudbhūtaḥ tasmāt udaka āharaṇa ādi ityādi na hi asti asaṃbhavaḥ sarvatra asmin kārya jāte kramavatī api devadattasya sākṣāt kartuḥ anusyūta tvāt  tathā iha api yadi api ākāśa ādi krameṇa eva sṛṣṭiḥ tathā api ākāśān akāla anila ādau tatra tatra sākṣāt  parameśvarasya kartṛ tvāt śakyam vaktum parameśvarāt ākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti śakyam ca vaktum parameśvarāt analaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi yadi tu ākāśāt vāyuḥ vāyoḥ teja iti uktvā tejasaḥ  vāyuḥ vāyoḥ ākāśa iti brūyāt bhavet virodhaḥ na ca etad asti tasmāt amūṣām avivādaḥ śrutīnām evam asa imān  lokān asṛjata iti upakrama abhidhāyini api śrutiḥ aviruddhā eṣā hi sva vyāpāram abhidhāna krameṇa kurvatī na abhidheyānām kramam niruṇāddhi te tu yathā krama āsthitā eva ākrameṇa ucyante yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānāti iti tad evam avigānam abhyupetya tu vigānam ucyate sṛṣṭau khalu etad vigānam sraṣṭā tu sarva vedānta vākyeṣu anusyūtaḥ parameśvaraḥ pratīyate na atra śruti vigānam mātrayā api asti na ca sṛṣṭi vigānam sraṣṭari tad adhīna nirūpaṇe vigānam āvahati iti vācyam na hi eṣa sraṣṭṛtva mātreṇa ucyate api tu asatyam jñānam anantam brahma ityādinā rūpeṇa ucyate sraṣṭā tad ca asya rūpam sarva vedānta vākya anugatam tad jñānam ca phalavat  abrahma vid āpnoti param atarati śokam ātma vit ityādi śruteḥ sṛṣṭi jñānasya tu na phalam śrūyate tena aphalavat saṃnidhau  aphalam tad aṅgam iti sṛṣṭi vijñānam sraṣṭṛ brahma vijñāna aṅgam tad anuguṇam sat brahma jñāna avatāra upāya tayā vyākhyeyam tathā ca śrutiḥ aannena somya śuṅgena apaḥ  mūlam anviccha iti ādikā śuṅgena agreṇa kāryeṇa iti yāvat  tasmāt na sṛṣṭi vipratipattiḥ sraṣṭari vipratipattim āvahati api tu aguṇe tu anyāya kalpanā iti tad anuguṇa tayā vyākhyeyā yad ca kāraṇe vigānam aasat vā idam atra asīt iti tad api atat api eṣa ślokaḥ  bhavati iti pūrva prakṛtam sat brahmaṇā ākṛṣya aasat eva idam atra āsīt iti ucyamānam tu asataḥ  abhidhāne asaṃbaddham syāt  śruti antareṇa ca māna antareṇa ca virodhaḥ tasmāt aupacārikam vyākhyeyam ataddhā eka āhuḥ asat eva idam atra āsīt iti tu nirākārya tayā upanyastam iti na kāraṇe vivāda iti sūtre caśabdaḥ tu arthaḥ pūrva pakṣam nivartayati ākāśa ādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu krama vigāne api na sraṣṭari vigānam kutas  yathā ekasyām śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathā eva śruti antareṣu ukteḥ kena rūpeṇa kāraṇa tvena aparaḥ kalpaḥ  yathā vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśa ādiṣu aātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūta ākāśāt vāyuḥ vāyoḥ agniḥ agneḥ āpaḥ  adbhyaḥ pṛthivī iti tasya eva kramasya anapabādhanena atat tejaḥ  asṛjata iti ādikāyā api sṛṣṭeḥ ukteḥ na sṛṣṭau  api vigānam nanu ekatra ātmana ākāśa kāraṇa tvena uktiḥ anyatra ca tejaḥ kāraṇa tvena tad katham avigānam iti ata āha kāraṇatva iti hetau tṛtīyā sarvatra ākāśa anala anila ādau sākṣāt kāraṇa tvena ātmanaḥ prapañcitam ca etad adhastāt vyakriyata iti ca karma kartari karmaṇi vā rūpam na cetanatiriktam kartāram pratikṣipati kintu upasthāpayati na hi lūyate kedāraḥ svayam eva iti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāram devadatta ādim pratikṣipati api tu upasthāpayati eva tasmāt sarvam avadātam jagat vāci tvāt  nanu abrahma te bravāṇi iti brahma abhidhāna prakaraṇāt upasaṃhāre ca asarvān pāpmanaḥ  apahatya sarveṣām ca bhūtānām śraiṣṭhyam svārājyam paryeti ya evam veda iti niratiśaya phala śravaṇāt brahma vedanāt anyatra tad asaṃbhavāt āditya candra ādi gata puruṣa kartṛ tvasya ca ayasya vaitat karma iti ca asya asatyavat chede sarva nāmnā pratyakṣa siddhasya jagataḥ parama arśena jagatkartṛ tvasya ca brahmaṇaḥ  anyatra asaṃbhavāt katham jīva mukhya prāṇa āśaṅkā ucyate brahma te bravaṇi iti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahma abhidhānam pratijñāya tad tad āditya ādi gatā brahma puruṣa abhidhānena na tāvat brahma uktam yasya ca ajātaśatroḥ ayaḥ  vai bālāke eteṣām puruṣāṇām kartā yasya vaitat karma iti vākyam na tena brahma abhidhānam pratijñātam na ca anyadīyena upakrameṇa anyasya vākyam śakyam niyantum tasmāt ajātaśatroḥ vākya saṃdarbha paurvāparya paryālocanayā yaḥ  asya arthaḥ pratibhāti sa eva grāhyaḥ atra ca karma śabdaḥ tāvat vyāpāre nerūḍha vṛttiḥ kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate na ca rūḍhau satyām vyutpattiḥ yukta āśrayitum na ca brahmaṇa udāsīnasya apariṇāminaḥ  vyāpāravat tā vākya śeṣe ca aatha asmin prāṇa eva ekadhā bhavati iti śravaṇāt parispanda lakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇaḥ  yatra upapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayā upadiśyate āditya ādi gata puruṣa kartṛ tvam ca prāṇasya upapadyate hiraṇyagarbha rūpa prāṇa avasthā viśeṣa tvāt āditya ādi devatānām akatama ekaḥ  devaḥ prāṇaḥ iti śruteḥ upakrama anurodhena ca upasaṃhāre sarva śabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣām bhūtānām iti ca apekṣika vṛttiḥ vahūn pāpmanaḥ  bahūnām bhūtānām iti evaṃparaḥ  draṣṭavyaḥ ekasmin vākye upakrama anurodhāt upasaṃhāraḥ  varṇanīyaḥ yadi tu dṛpta bālākim abrahmaṇi brahma abhidhāyinam apodya ajāta śatroḥ vacanam brahma viṣayam eva anyathā tu tad uktāt viśeṣam vivakṣoḥ abrahma abhidhānam asaṃbaddham syāt iti manyate tathā api na etad brahma abhidhānam bhavitum arhati api tu jīva abhidhānam eva yad kāraṇam vedita vyatayā upanyastasya puruṣāṇām kartuḥ vedanāya upetam bālakim prati bubodhayiṣuḥ ajātaśatruḥ suptam puruṣam āmantryāmāntraṇa śabda aśravaṇāt prāṇa ādīnām abhoktṛ tvam asvāmi tvam pratibodha yaṣṭi ghāta utthānāt prāṇa ādi vyatiriktam jīvam bhoktāram svāminam pratibodhayati parastāt api atat yathā śreṣṭhī svaiḥ bhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinam bhuñjanti evam eva eṣa prajñā ātmā etaiḥ ātmabhiḥ bhuṅkte evam eva eta ātmāna enam ātmānam bhuñjanti iti śravaṇāt  yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svaiḥ bhṛtyaiḥ karaṇa bhūtaiḥ viṣayān bhuṅkte yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinam bhuñjanti te hi śreṣṭhinam aśana ācchādana ādi grahaṇena bhuñjanti evam eva eṣa prajñā ātmā jīva etaiḥ āditya ādi gaitara ātmabhiḥ viṣayān bhuṅkte te hi āt iti ādaya āloka vṛṣṭi ādinā sācivyam ācarantaḥ  jīva ātmānam bhojayanti jīva ātmānam api yajamānam tad utsṛṣṭa haviḥ ādānādāt ityādayaḥ  bhuñjanti tasmāt jīvātmā eva brahmaṇaḥ  abhedāt brahma iha veditavyatayā upadiśyate yasya vaitat karma iti jīva pratyuktānām deha indriya ādīnām ka ma jīvasya bhavati karma janya tvāt vā dharma adharmayoḥ karma śabda vācya tvam rūḍhi anusārāt  tau ca dharma adharmau jīvasya dharma adharma ākṣipta tvāt ca āditya ādīnām bhoga upakaraṇānām teṣu api jīvasya kartṛ tvam upapannam upapannam ca prāṇa sṛt tvāt jīvasya prāṇa śabda tvam ye ca praśna prativacane akka eṣa etad  bālāke puruṣaḥ  aśayiṣṭa yadā suptaḥ svapnam na kañcana paśyati iti anayoḥ api na spaṣṭam brahma abhidhānam upalabhyate jīva vyatirekaḥ ca prāṇa ātmanaḥ  hiraṇyagarbhasya api upapadyate tasmāt jīva prāṇayoḥ anyatara iha grāhyaḥ  na raparameśvara iti prāptam evam prāpte ucyate amṛṣṭāvādinam āpodya bālākim brahma vādinam rājā katham asaṃbaddham mithyā vā vaktum arhati yathā hi kenacid maṇi lakṣaṇa jñam amāninā kāce maṇiḥ eva veditavya iti akte parasya kācaḥ  ayam maṇiḥ na tad lakṣaṇā yogāt iti abhidhāya ātmanaḥ  viśeṣam jijñāpayiṣoḥ tattva abhidhānam asaṃbaddham amaṇau maṇī abhidhānam na pūrvavādinaḥ  viśeṣam āpādayati svayam api mṛṣā abhidhānāt  tasmāt anena uttara vādinā pūrvavādinaḥ  viśeṣam āpāda sa tā maṇi tattvam eva vaktavyam evam ajātaśatruṇā dṛpta bāla ākera brahma vādinaḥ  viśeṣam ātmanaḥ  darśayatā jīva prāṇa abhidhāne asaṃbaddha m uktam syāt  tayoḥ vā brahmaṇoḥ brahma abhidhāne mithyā abhihitam syāt  tathā ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ  bālākeḥ gārgyāt jātaśatroḥ bhavet  tasmāt anena brahma tattvam abhidhātavyam tathā satyasya na mithyā avat yam tasmāt  abrahma te bravāṇi iti brahmaṇā upakramāt  sarvān pāpmanaḥ  apahatya sarveṣām ca bhūtānām śraiṣṭhyam sva rājyam paryeti ya evam veda iti ca sati saṃbhave sarva śruteḥ saṃkocāt niratiśayena phalena upasaṃhārāt  brahma vedanāt anyatas ca tad anupapatteḥ āditya ādi puruṣa kartṛ tvasya ca svātantrya lakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇi eva saṃbhavāt anyeṣām hiraṇyagarbha ādīnām tad pāratantryāt  akka eṣa etad bālāke iti ādeḥ jīva adhikaraṇa bhavana āpādana praśnasya ayadā suptaḥ svapnam na kañcana paśyati atha asmin prāṇa eva ekadhā bhavati iti ādeḥ uttasya ca brahmaṇi eva upapatteḥ brahma viṣaya tvam niścīyate atha kasmāt na bhavataḥ  hiraṇyagarbha gocare eva praśna uttare tathā ca na etābhyām brahma viṣayatva siddhiḥ iti etad nirācikīrṣuḥ paṭhati etasmāt ātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathā āyatanam pratiṣṭhanta iti etad uktam bhavati ātmā eva bhavati jīva prāṇa ādīnām adhikaraṇam na anyat iti yadi api ca jīvaḥ  na ātmanaḥ  bhidyate tathā api upādhi avacchinnasya paramātmanaḥ  jīva tvena upādhi bhedāt bhedam āropya ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ  draṣṭavyaḥ evam ca jīva bhavana ādhāra tvam apādāna tvam ca paramātmana upapannam tad evam bāla ākya jāta śatru saṃvāda vākya saṃdarbhasya brahma paratve sthite yasya vaitat karma iti vyāpāra abhidhāne na saṃgacchata iti karma śabdaḥ kārya abhidhāyī bhavati etad iti sarvanāma parāmṛṣṭam ca tad kāryam sarvanāma ca idam saṃnihita parāmarśi na ca kiñcid iha śabda uktam asti saṃnihitam na ca āditya ādi puruṣāḥ saṃnihitā api parāmarśa arhāḥ bahu tvāt  puṃliṅga tvāt ca etad iti ca ekasya napuṃsakasya abhidhānāt  aeteṣām puruṣāṇām kartā iti anena eva gata artha tvāt ca tasmāt aśabda uktam api pratyakṣa siddham saṃbandha arham jagat eva parāmraṣṭavyam etad uktam bhavati atyalpam idam ucyate eteṣām ādityādi gatānām jagat eka deśa bhūtānām kartā iti kintu kṛtsnam eva jagat yasya kāryam iti vā śabdena sūcyate jīva prāṇa śabdau ca brahma parau jīva śabdasya brahma upalakṣaṇa para tvāt na punar brahma śabdaḥ  jīva upalakṣaṇa paraḥ tathā sati hi vahna samañjanam syāt iti uktam na ca anadhigata artha avabodhana svarasasya śabdasya adhigata vodhanam yuktam na api anadhigatena adhigata upalakṣaṇam upapannam na ca saṃbhavati eka vākya tve vākya bhedaḥ  nyāṭyaḥ vākya śeṣa anurodhena ca jīva prāṇa paramātma upāsanā traya vidhāne vākya trayam bhavet  paurvāparya paryālocanayā tu brahma upāsana paratve eka vākyatā eva tasmāt na jīva prāṇa paratvam api tu brahma paratvam eva iti siddham syāt etad  nirdiśyantām puruṣāḥ kāryāḥ tad viṣayā tu kṛtiḥ anirdiṣṭā tad phalam vā kāryasya utpattiḥ ta yasya idam karma iti nirdekṣyete tatas  kutas  paunaruktyam ityata āha na api puruṣa viṣayasya iti etad uktam bhavati kartṛ śabdena eva kartāram abhidadhattā tayoḥ upātta tvāt ākṣipta tvāt  na hi kṛtim vinā kartā bhavati na api kṛtiḥ bhāvanā apara abhidhānā bhūtim utpattim vinā iti arthaḥ nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭam tatas tad antarbhūtāḥ puruṣā api iti ya eteṣām puruṣāṇām iti punaruktam iti ata āha etad uktam bhavati ya eṣām puruṣāṇām iti nanu aprāṇa eva ekadhā bhavati iti ādikāt api vākyāt jīva atiriktaḥ kutas  pratīyata iti atas  vākya antaram paṭhati etasmāt ātmanaḥ prāṇā iti api ca sarva vedānta siddham etad iti āha suṣupti kāle ca iti vedānta prakriyāyām eva upapattim upasaṃhāra vyājena āha tasmāt yatra asya ātmanaḥ  yatas  niḥsaṃbodhaḥ  atas  svaccha tā rūpam iva rūpam asya iti svaccha tā rūpaḥ  na tu svaccha tā eva laya vikṣepa saṃskārayoḥ tatra bhāvāt  samudācarat vṛtti vikṣepa abhāva mātreṇa upamānam etad eva vibhajate upādhibhiḥ antaḥkaraṇa ādibhiḥ janitam yad viśeṣa vijñānam ghaṭa paṭa ādi vijñānam tad ri hitam svarūpam ātmanaḥ yadi vijñānam iti eva ucyeta tatas tad aviśiṣṭam anavacchinnam sat brahmā eva syāt tad ca nityam iti na upādhi janitam na api tad ri hitam svarūpam brahma svabhāvasya aprahāṇāt  ata uktam viśeṣa iti yadā tu laya lakṣaṇa avidyā upabṛṃhitaḥ  vikṣepa saṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣa vijñāna utpādāt svapna jāgara avasthātaḥ paramātmanaḥ  rūpāt bhraṃśa rūpam āgamanam iti na kevalam kauṣītaki brāhmaṇe vājasaneye api evam eva praśna uttarayoḥ jīva vyatirikta mānam ananti paramātmānam iti āha api cā evam eka iti nanu atra ākāśam śayana sthānam tad kutas  paramātma pratyaya iti ata āha ākāśa śabdaḥ ca iti na tāvat mukhyasya ākāśasya ātma ādhāgtavasaṃbhavaḥ yad api ca dvāsaptati sahasra hita abhidhānāḍī saṃcāreṇa suṣupti avasthāyām purī tadava sthānam uktam tad api antaḥkaraṇasya tasmāt  adaharaḥ  asmin  antara ākāśaḥ itivat ākāśa śabdaḥ parama ātmani mantavya iti prathamam bhāṣya kṛtā jīva nirākaraṇāya sūtram idam avatāritam tatra manda dhiyām na idam prāṇa nirākaraṇāya iti buddhiḥ mā bhūt iti āśa yavān āha prāṇa nirākaraṇasya api iti tau hi bāla ākya jāta śatrū suptam puruṣam ājagmatuḥ tamajāta śatruḥ nāmabhiḥ āmantra yāñcakre abṛhat  pāṇḍura vāsaḥ somarājan iti sa amantryamāṇaḥ  na uttasthau tam pāṇinā apeṣam bodhayāñcakāra sa ha uttasthau asa ha uvāca jāta śatruḥ yatra eṣa etad suptaḥ  abhūt ityādi saḥ  ayam supta puruṣa utthāpanena prāṇa ādi vyatirikta upadeśa iti vākya anvayāt nanu maitreyī brāhmaṇa upakrame yājñavalkyena gārhasthya āśramāt uttama āśramam yiyāsatā maitraiṭyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā saha artha saṃvibhāga karaṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyam pratim amṛtatva arthinī prapaccha yad nu ma iyam bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syāt kim aham tana amṛtā syām uta na iti tatra na iti ha uvāca yājñavalkyaḥ yathā eva upakaraṇavatām jīvitam tathā eva te jīvitam syāt amṛta tvasya tu na aśā asti vittena evam vittena amṛtatva āśā bhavet yadi vitta sādhyāni karmāṇi amṛta tve upayujyeran tad eva tu na asti jñāna sādhya tvāt amṛta tvasya karmaṇām ca jñāna virodhinām tad sahabhāvitva anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ sā ha uvāca maitreyī yena aham na amṛtā syām kim aham tenam kuryām yad eva bhagavān veda tad eva me brūhi amṛtatva sādhanam iti śeṣaḥ tatra amṛtatva sādhana jñāna upanyāsāya vairāgya pūrvaka tvāt tasya rāga viṣayeṣu teṣu teṣu pati jāyādiṣu vairāgyam utpādayitum yājñavalkyaḥ  ana vā are patyuḥ kāmāya ityādi vākya saṃdarbham uvāca ātmā epādhikam hi priya tvam eṣām na tu sākṣāt  priyāṇi etāni tasmāt etebhyaḥ pati jāyā ādibhyaḥ  viramya yatra sākṣāt prema sa eva ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ  mantavyaḥ  nididhyāsitavyaḥ vā śabdaḥ  avadhāraṇe vā are darśanena śravaṇa ādi sādhanena idam jagat sarvam viditam bhavati iti vākya śeṣaḥ yatas  nāma rūpa ātmakasya jagataḥ tattvam pāramārthikam rūpam ātmā eva bhujaṅgasya iva samāropitasya tattvam rajjuḥ tasmāt ātmani vidite sarvam idam jagat tattvam viditam bhavati rajjvām iva viditāyām samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvam viditam bhavati yatas tasmāt ātmā eva draṣṭavyaḥ  na tu tad atiriktam jagat  sva rūpeṇa draṣṭavyam kutas  yatas  abrahma tam parādāt brāhmaṇa jātiḥ brahmaṇaḥ  aham iti evam abhimāna iti yāvat  parādāt  parākuryāt amṛtatva padāt kam yaḥ  anyatra ātmanaḥ  brahma brāhmaṇa jātim veda evam kṣatriya ādiṣu api draṣṭavyam ātmā eva jagataḥ tattvam na tu tad atiriktam kiñcid tad iti atra eva bhagavatī śrutiḥ upapattim dṛṣṭānta prabandhena āha yad  khalu yad graham vinā na śakyate grahītum tad tatas  na vyatiricyate yathā rajatam śuktikāyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ  vā rajjoḥ dundubhi ādi śabda sāmānyāt vā tad tad śabda bhedaḥ na gṛhyante ca cit rūpa grahaṇam vinā sthiti kāle nāma rūpāṇi tasmāt na cit ātmanaḥ  bhidyante tad idam uktam sa yathā dundubheḥ hanyamānasya iti dundubhi grahaṇena tad gatam śabda sāmānyam upalakṣayati na kevalam sthiti kāle nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ cidātmā atirekeṇa agrahaṇāt cit ātmanaḥ  na vyatiricyate api tu nāma rūpa utpatteḥ prāk api cit rūpa avasthānāt tad upādāna tvāt ca nāma rūpa prapañcasya tad anatirekaḥ rajju upādānasya iva bhujaṅgasya rajjoḥ anatiḥ eka iti etad vṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī śrutiḥ asa yathā ārdra edhaḥ  agreḥ abhyāhitasya pṛthak dhūnā viniścaranti evam vā are asya mahataḥ  bhūtasya niḥśvasitam etad yadṛgvedaḥ ityādinā caturvidhaḥ  mantra uktaḥ itihāsa ityādinā aṣṭavidham brāhmaṇam uktam etad uktam bhavati yathā agni mātram prathamam avagamyate śrudrāṇām visphuliṅgānām upādānām atha tatas  visphuliṅgā vyuccaranti na ca ete agneḥ tattva anya tvābhyām śakyantam nirvuktam evam ṛgveda āt ayaḥ  api alpa prayatnāt brahmaṇaḥ  vyuccarantaḥ  na tatas tattva anya tvābhyām nirucyante ṛc ādibhiḥ nāma upalakṣyate yadā ca nāmadheyasya iyam gatiḥ tadā tad pūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kā eva kathā iti bhāvaḥ na kevalam tad upādāna tvāt tatas  na vyatiricyate nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ pralaya samaye ca tad anupraveśāt tatas  na vyatiricyate yathā sāmudram eva ambhaḥ pṛthivī tejaḥ saṃparkāt  kāṭhinyam upagatam saindhavam khilyaḥ sa hi su ākāre samudre kṣiptaḥ  ambha eva bhavati evam cit ambhodhau līnam jagat chid eva bhavati na tu tatas  atiricyata iti etad dṛṣṭānta prabandhena āha sa yathā sarvāsām apām ityādi dṛṣṭānta prabandhamuktvā dārṣṭa antike yojayati evam vā are idam mahat iti bahuttvena brahma uktam idam brahma iti arthaḥ bhūtam satyam anantam nityam apāram sarva gatam vijñāna ghanaḥ vijñāna eka rasa iti yāvat  etebhyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena vyavasthā etebhyaḥ  bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyena utthāya kārya kāraṇa saṃghātasya hi avacchedāt duḥ khitva śokitva ādayaḥ tad avacchinne cit ātmani tad viparīte api pratīyante yathā udaka pratibimbite candramasi toya gatāḥ kampa ādayaḥ tad idam sāmyena utthānam yadā tu āgama ācārya upadeśa pūrvaka manana nididhi āsana prakarṣa paryanta jaḥ  asya brahma svarūpa sākṣātkāra upāvartate tadā nirmṛṣṭa nikhila vāsanā vidyā malasya kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta bhūtasya vināśe tāni eva bhūtāni naśyanti ani tad upādhiḥ cit ātmanaḥ khilya bhāvaḥ  vinaśyati tatas  na pretya kārya kāraṇa bhūta nivṛttau rūpa gandha ādi saṃjñā asti iti na pretya saṃjñā asti iti saṃjñā mātra niṣedhāt ātmā na asti iti manyamānā sā maitreyī ha uvāca atra eva mā bhagavān amūmuhat mohitavān na pretya saṃjñā asti iti sa ha uvāca yājñavalkyaḥ sva abhiprāyam dvaite hi rūpa ādi viśeṣa saṃjñā nibandhanaḥ  duḥkhi tvā ādi abhimānaḥ ānanda jñāna eka rasa brahma advaya anubhave tu tad  kena kam paśyet  brahma vā kena vijānīyāt  na hi tadā asya karbhāvaḥ  asti sva prakāśa tvāt  etad uktam bhavati na saṃjñā mātram mayā vyāsedhi kintu viśeṣa saṃjñā iti tad evam amṛtatva phalena upakramāt  madhye ca ātma vijñānena sarva vijñānam pratijñāya tad upapādanāt  upasaṃhāre ca mahat bhūtam anantam ityādinā ca brahma rūpa bhidhānāt dvaita nindayā ca advaita guṇa kīrtanāt brahmā eva maitreyī brahmaṇe pratipādyam na jīva ātmā iti na asti pūrva pakṣa iti anārabhyam eva idam adhikaraṇam atra ucyate bhoktṛtva jñātṛtā jīva rūpa utthāna samādhaye maitreyī brahmaṇe pūrva pakṣeṇa upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ pati jāyā ādi bhogya saṃbandhaḥ  na abhoktuḥ brahmaṇaḥ  yujyate na apijñāna kartṛ tvam akartuḥ sākṣāt ca mahataḥ  bhūtasya vijñāna ātma bhāvena samuttāna abhidhānam vijñāna ātmana eva draṣṭavya tvam āha anyathā brahmaṇaḥ  draṣṭavyatva pare asmin brāhmaṇaḥ  tasya vijñāna ātma tvena samutthāna abhidhānam anupayuktam syāt tasya tu draṣṭavyam upayujyata iti upakrama mātram pūrva pakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ bhoktṛ artha tvāt ca bhogya jātasya iti tad upodbala mātram siddhāntaḥ tu nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa uktaḥ tad evam paurvāparya ālocanayā maitreyī brāhmaṇasya brahma darśana paratve sthite bhoktrā jīva ātmanā upakramam ācārya deśīya matena tāvat samādhatte sūtra kāraḥ pratijñā siddheḥ liṅgam āśmaradhyaḥ yathā hi vahneḥ vikārā vyuccarantaḥ  visphuliṅgā na vahneḥ atyantam bhidyante tad rūpa nirūpaṇa tvāt na api tatas  atyantam abhinnāḥ vahneḥ iva paraspara vyāvṛttya bhāva prasaṅgāt  tathā jīva ātmanaḥ  api brahma vikāra na brahmaṇaḥ  atyantam bhidyante cit rūpatva abhāva prasaṅgāt  na api atyantam na bhidyante parasparam vyāvṛtti abhāva prasaṅgāt  sarvajñam pratyupadeśa vaiyarthyāt ca tasmāt kathañcid bhedaḥ  jīvātmanām abhedaḥ ca tatra tad vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñā siddhaye vijñāna ātma paramātmanā urabhedam upādāya parama ātmani darśayitavye vijñāna ātmanā upakrama iti āśmaradhya ācāryaḥ  mene ācārya deśīya antara matena samādhatte utkramiṣyata evaṃbhāva ādi sya oḍulomiḥ jīvaḥ  hi paramātmanaḥ  atyantam bhinna eva san deha indriya manaḥ buddhi upadhāna saṃparkāt sarvadā kaluṣaḥ tasya ca jñāna dhyāna ādi sādhana anuṣṭhānāt saṃprasannasya deha indriya ādi saṃghātāt utkramiṣyataḥ parama ātma naikya upapatteḥ idam abhedena upakramaṇam etad uktam bhavati bhaviṣyantam abhedam upādāya bheda kāle api abheda uktaḥ yathā āhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ aāmukteḥ bheda eva syāt jīvasya ca parasya ca bhuktasya tu na bhedaḥ  asti bheda hetoḥ abhāvataḥ iti atra eva śrutim upanyasyati śrutiḥ ca evam iti pūrvam deha indriya ādi upādhi kṛtam kaluṣa tvam ātmana uktam saṃprati svābhāvikam eva jīvasya nāma rūpa prapañca āśrayatva lakṣaṇam kāluṣyam pārthivānām aṇūnām iva śyāma tvam kevalam pākena iva jñāna dhyāna ādinā tad apanīya jīvaḥ parātparataram puruṣam upaiti iti āha kkacid ca jīva akṣayam api iti nadī nidarśanam ayathā somya imā nadyaḥ iti tad evam ācārya deśīya mata dvayam uktvā atra aparituṣyan  ācārya matam āha sūtra kāraḥ avisthiteḥ iti kāśa kṛtsnaḥ etad vyācaṣṭe asya eva paramātmana iti na jīva ātmanaḥ  anyaḥ na api tad vikāraḥ kintvā ātmā eva avidyā upādhāna kalpita avacchedaḥ ākāśa iva ghaṭa maṇika ādi kalpita avacchedaḥ  ghaṭa ākāśaḥ  maṇikā ākāśaḥ  na tu parama ākāśāt anyaḥ tad vikāraḥ  vā tatas ca jīva ātmanā upakramaḥ parāma ātmanā eva upakramaḥ tasya tatas  abhedāt  sthūla darśi loka pratīti saukaryāya aupādhikena ātma rūpeṇa upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ atra eva śrutim pramāṇayati tathā ca iti atha vikāraḥ paramātmanaḥ  jīvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati ākāśa ādivat iti āha na ca tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām iti na hi yathā tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām ātma vikāra tvam śrūyate evam jīvasya iti ācārya traya matam vibhajate kāśa kṛt snasya ācāryasya iti ātyantike satyabhede kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt anātyantikaḥ  abheda āstheyaḥ tathā ca kathañcid bhedaḥ  api iti tam āsthāya kārya kāraṇa bhāva iti mata trayam uktvā kāśa kṛt snīya matam sādhu tvena nirdhārayati tatra teṣu madhye kāśa kṛt snīyam matam iti ātyantike hi jīva paramātmanā urabhede tāttvike anādya vidyā upādhi kalpitaḥ  bhedaḥ tattvam asi iti jīva ātmanaḥ  brahma bhāva tattva upadeśa śravaṇa manana nididhi āsana prakarṣa paryanta janmanā sākṣātkāraṇe vidyayā śakyaḥ sa mūla kāṣam kaṣitum rajjvām ahi vibhrama iva rajju tattva sākṣātkāreṇa rāja putrasya iva va mleccha kule vardhamānasya ātmani samāropitaḥ  mleccha bhāvaḥ  rāja putraḥ  asi iti āpta upadeśena na tu mṛd vikāraḥ śarāva ādiḥ śataśas  api mṛd mṛt iti cintyamānaḥ tad janmanā mṛd bhāva sākṣātkāreṇa śakyaḥ  nivartayitum tad kasya hetoḥ tasya api mṛdaḥ  bhinna abhinnasya tāttvika tvāt  vastutas tu jñānena ucchettum aśakya tvāt  saḥ  ayam pratipādayiṣita artha anusāraḥ api ca jīvasya ātma vikāra tve tasya jñāna dhyāna ādi sādhana anuṣṭhānāt  sva prakṛtau  apyaye sati na amṛta tvasya aśāsti iti apuruṣa artha tvam amṛtatva prāpi śruti virodhaḥ ca kāśa kṛt sna mate tu etad ubhayam na asti iti āha evam ca sati iti nanu yadi jīvaḥ  na vikāraḥ kintu brahmā eva katham tarhi tasminnāma rūpa āśrayatva śrutiḥ kathañca ayatha agneḥ śrudrā visphuliṅgā iti brahma vikāra śrutiḥ iti āśaṅkām upasaṃhāra vyājena nirākaroti atas ca sva āśrayasya iti yatas  pratipādayiṣitāra anusāraḥ ca amṛtatva prāptiḥ ca vikāra pakṣe na saṃbhavataḥ atas ca iti yojanā dvitīya pūrva pakṣa bījam anayā eva trisūtrya apākaroti yad api uktam iti śeṣam ati rohita artham vyākhyāta artham ca tṛtīya pūrva pakṣa bīja nirāse kāśa kṛt snīyena eva iti avadhāraṇam tad mata āśrayaṇena eva tasya śakya nirāsa tvāt  aikāntike hi ādvaite ātmanaḥ  anya karma karaṇe akena kam paśyet iti ātmanaḥ ca karma tvam avijñāta āram are kena vijānīyāt iti śakyam niṣeddhum bheda abheda pakṣe vaikāntike vā bhede sarvam etad advaita āśrayam aśakyam iti avadhāraṇasya arthaḥ na kevalam kāśa kṛt snīya darśana āśrayaṇena bhūta pūrva gatyā vijñātṛ tvam api tu śruti paurvāparya paryālocanayā api evam eva iti āha api ca yatra hi iti kasmāt  punar  kāśa kṛt snasya matam āsthīyate na itareṣām ācāryāṇām ityata āha darśitam tu purastāt iti kāśa kṛt snīyasya matasya śruti prabandha upanyāsena punar  śrutimat tvam smṛtimat tvam ca upasaṃhāra upakramam āha atas ca iti kkacid pāṭha ātaḥ ca iti tasya avaśyam ca iti arthaḥ janana jarā maraṇa bhītayaḥ vikriyāḥ tāsām sarvāsām amahān ajaḥ ityādinā pratiṣedhaḥ pariṇāma pakṣe anyasya ca anya bhāva pakṣe aikāntikā dvaita pratipādana parāḥ aekam eva advitīyam ityādayaḥ dvaita darśana nindā parāḥ ca aanyaḥ  asau  anyaḥ  aham asmi ityādayaḥ janma jarā ādi vikriyā pratiṣedha parāḥ ca aeṣa mahān ajaḥ ityādayaḥ śrutaya uparudhyeran apica yadi jīva paramātmanoḥ bheda abhedau  āsthīyeyātām tatas tayoḥ mithas  virodhāt samuccaya abhāvāt ekasya balīyaḥ tve na ātmani nirapavādam vijñānam jāyeta balīyasā ekena durbala pakṣa avalambinaḥ jñānasya bādhanāt  atha tu agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā na bala abala avadhāraṇam tatas  saṃśaye sati na su niścita artham ātmani jñānam bhavet  su niścita artham ca jñānam mokṣa upāyaḥ śrūyate avedānta vijñāna su niścita arthāḥ iti tad etad āha anyathā mumukṣūṇām iti aeka tvam anupaśyataḥ iti śrutiḥ na punar ekatva anekatve anupaśyata iti nanu yadi kṣetrajña parama ātmanā uḥ abhedaḥ  bhāvikaḥ katham tarhi vyapadeśa buddhi bhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmā iti kathañca nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā avidyā kṛta nāma rūpa upādhi vaśāt iti ced  kasya iyam avidyā na tāvat jīvasya tasya paramātmanaḥ  vyatireka abhāvāt  na api paramātmanaḥ tasya vidyā ekarasya avidyā śrayatva anupapatteḥ tad atra saṃsāri tvā saṃsāritva vidyā vidyāvattva rūpa viruddhaya dharma saṃsargudbuddhi vyapadeśa bhedāt ca asti jīveśvarayoḥ bhedaḥ  api bhāvika iti ata āha sthite ca paramātma kṣetrajña ātmā ekatva iti na tāvat bhedadā bhedau  ekā atra bhāvikau bhavitum arhata iti vipra pañcitam prathame pāde dvaita darśana nindayā ca aikāntikā dvaita pratipādana parāḥ paurvāparya ālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante tatra yathā bimbāt avadatāttāt tvike pratibimbānām abhede api nīla maṇi kṛpāṇa kāca ādi upadhāna bhedāt kālpanikaḥ  jīvānām bhedaḥ  buddhi vyapadeśa bhedau vartayati idam bimbam avadātam imāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalāśa śaya amalāni vṛtta dīrgha ādi bheda bhāñji bahūni iti evam paramātmanaḥ śuddha svabhāvāt jīvānam abheda aikāntike api anirvacanīyānādi vidyā upadhāna bhedāt kālpanikaḥ  jīvānām bhedaḥ  buddhi vyapadeśa bheda avayam ca paramātmā śuddha vijñāna ānanda svabhāva ime ca jīvā avidyā śoka duḥkha ādi upadrava bhāja iti vartayati avidyā upadhānam ca yadi api vidyā svabhāve parama ātmani na sākṣāt asti tathā api tad pratibimba kalpa jīva dvāreṇa parasmin  ucyate na ca evam anyonya āśrayaḥ  jīva vibhāga āśraya avidyā avidyā āśrayaḥ ca jīva vibhāga iti bīja aṅkuravat anādi tvāt  ata eva kānuddiśya eva īśvaraḥ  māyā māracayati anārthikām uddeśyanām sarga ādau jīvānām abhāvāt katham ca ātmānam saṃsāriṇam vividha vedanā bhājam kuryāt ityādi anuyogaḥ  niravakāśaḥ na khalu ādimān saṃsāraḥ na api ādi māna vidyā jīva vibhāgaḥ yena anuyujyeta iti atra ca nāma grahaṇena avidyām upalakṣayati syāt etad  yadi na jīvān brahma bhidyate hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmā api tathā syāt  tathā ca anihitam guhāyām iti na upapadyata iti ata āha na hi satyam iti yathā hi bimbasya maṇi kṛpāṇāt ayaḥ  guhā evam brahmaṇaḥ  api pratijīvam bhinnā avidyā guhā iti yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbam tad abhinnam api guhyam evam jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tad abhinnam api brahma guhyam astu tarhi brahmaṇaḥ  anyat guhyam iti ata āha na ca brahmaṇaḥ  anya iti ye tu āśam rathya prabhṛtayaḥ nirbandham kurvanti te vedānta artham iti brahmaṇaḥ sarva ātmanā bhagaśaḥ vā pariṇāma abhyupagame tasya kārya tvāt anitya tvāt ca tad aśritaḥ  mokṣaḥ  api tathā syāt  yadi tu evam api mokṣam nityaṅkṛtakam brūyuḥ tatra āha nyāyena iti evam ye nadī samudra nidarśanena amukteḥ bhedam muktasya ca abhedam jīvasya asthiṣata teṣām api nyāyena asaṃgatiḥ naḥ jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati nanu uktam yathā nadī samudraḥ  bhavati iti kā punar nadī abhimatā āyuṣmataḥ kim pāthaḥ paramāṇava uta eṣām saṃsthāna bheda āhosvit tad ārabdhaḥ  avayavī tatra saṃsthāna bhedasya vāvayavinaḥ  vā samudra niveśe vināśāt  kasya samudreṇa eka tā nadī pāthaḥ paramāṇūnām tu samudra pāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyaḥ  bheda eva nābhedaḥ evam samudrāt api teṣām bheda eva ye tu kāśa kṛtsnīyam eva matam āsthāya jīvam paramātmanoṃ aśamācakhyuḥ teṣām katham aniṣphalam niṣkriyam śāntam iti na śruti virodhaḥ niṣphalam iti sāvayava tvam vyāsedhi na tu sa aṃśa tvam aṃśaḥ ca jīvaḥ paramātmanaḥ  nabhasa iva karṇa nemi maṇḍala avacchinnam nabhaḥ śabda śravaṇa yogyam vāyoḥ iva ca śarīra avacchinnaḥ pañca vṛttiḥ prāṇa iti ced  na tau  annabhaḥ nabhasā uṃśaḥ tasya tattvāt  karṇa nemi maṇḍala avacchinnam aṃśa iti ced  hanta tarhi prāpta aprāpta vivekena karṇa nemi maṇḍalam vā tad saṃyogaḥ  vā iti uktam bhavati na ca karṇa nemi maṇḍala avacchinnam aṃśa iti ced  hanta tarhi prāpta aprāpta vivekena karṇa nemi maṇḍalam vā tad saṃyogaḥ  vā iti uktam bhavati na ca karṇa nemi maṇḍalam tasya aṃśaḥ tasya tatas  bhedāt  tad saṃyogaḥ  nabhaḥ dharma tvāt tasya aṃśa iti ced  na anupapatteḥ nabhaḥ dharma tve hi tad anavayavam sarvatra abhinnam iti tad saṃyogaḥ sarvatra pratheta na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  anavayavam avyāpyavartata iti tasmāt tatra asti ced vyāpya eva na ced vyāpanoti tatra na asti eva vyāpya eva asti kevalam pratisaṃbandhya dhīnanirūpaṇa tayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti ced  na nāma nirūpyatām tad saṃyuktam tu nabhaḥ śravaṇa yogyam sarvatra asti iti sarvatra śravaṇa prasaṅgaḥ na ca bheda abhedayoḥ anyatareṇa aṃśaḥ śakyaḥ  nirvaktum na ca ubhābhyām viruddhayoḥ ekatra asamavāyāt iti uktam tasmāt anirvacanīyānādi vidyā parikalpita eva aṃśaḥ  nabhasaḥ  na bhāvika iti yuktam na ca kālpanikaḥ  jñāna mātra āyatta jīvitaḥ katham avijñāyamānaḥ  asti asan  ca aṃśaḥ katham śabda śravaṇa lakṣaṇāya kāryāya kalpate na jātu rajjvām ajñāyamāna uragaḥ  bhaya kampa ādi kāryāya paryāpta iti vācyam ajñātatva asiddheḥ kārya vyaṅga tvāt asya kārya utpādāt pūrvam ajñātam katham kārya utpādāṅgam iti ced  na pūrva pūrva kārya utpāda vyaṅgya tvāt asati api jñāne tad saṃskāra anuvṛtteḥ anādi tvāt ca kalpanā tad saṃskāra pravāhasya astu vā anupapattiḥ eva kārya kāraṇayoḥ māyā ātmaka tvāt anupapattiḥ hi māyām upodbalayati anupapadyamāna artha tvānyamāyāyāḥ api ca bhāvikā aṃśa vādinām mate bhāvikā aṃśasya jñānena ucchettum aśakya tvāt na jñāna dhyāna sādhanaḥ  mokṣaḥ syāt  tad evam akāśa aṃśa iva śrotram anirvacanīyam evam jīvaḥ  brahmaṇoṃ aśa iti kāśa kṛt snīyam matam iti siddham prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt syāt etad  vedāntānām brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptam samanvaya lakṣaṇam iti kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham idam ārabhyata iti śaṅkām nirākartum saṃgatim darśayan  avaśeṣam āha yathā abhyudaya iti atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatim uktvā lakṣaṇena asya adhikaraṇasya saṃgatiḥ uktā etad uktam bhavati satyam jagat kāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānām uktaḥ samanvayaḥ tatra kāraṇa bhāvasya ubhayathā darśanāt jagat kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ kim nimitta tvena eva uta upādāna tvena api tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ tata upādānakāraṇa anusāraṇe sāṃkhya smṛti siddham pradhānam abhyupeyam tathā ca ajanmādyasya yatas iti brahma lakṣaṇam asādhu ati vyāpteḥ pradhāne api gata tvāt  asaṃbhavāt vā yadi tu uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ tatas  na ati vyāptiḥ na api avyāptiḥ iti sādhu lakṣaṇam saḥ  ayam avaśeṣaḥ tatra aīkṣā pūrva kartṛ tvam prabhu tvam asarūpa tā nimitta kāraṇeṣu eva na upādāneṣu karhicit  tad idam āha tatra nimitta kāraṇam eva tāvat iti āgamasya kāraṇa mātre paryavasānāt anumānasya tad viśeṣa niyamam āgamaḥ  na pratikṣipati api tu anumanyata eva iti āha pāriśeṣyāt brahmaṇaḥ  anyat iti brahma upādāna tvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe anyatra aprasaṅgāt sāṃkhya smṛti prasiddha mānu mānikam pradhānam śiṣyata iti eka vijñānena ca sarva vijñāna pratijñānam auta tam ādeśam ityādinā ayathā somya ekena mṛd piṇḍena iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramātmanaḥ prādhānyam sūcayataḥ yathā somaśarmaṇā ekena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti evam prāpta ucyate prakṛtiḥ ca na kevalam brahma nimitta kāraṇam kutas  pratijñā dṛṣṭāntayoḥ anuparodhāt nimitta kāraṇatva mātre tu tau  uparudhyeyātām tathā hiḥ ana mukhye saṃbhavati arthe jaghanyā vṛttiḥ iṣyate na ca anumānikam yuktam āgamena apabādhitam sarve hi tāvat vedāntāḥ paurvāparyeṇa vīkṣitāḥ aikāntikāt vaita parā dvaita mātra niṣedhataḥ tad iha api pratijñā dṛṣṭāntau mukhya arthau  eva yuktau na tu ayajamānaḥ prastaraḥ itivat guṇa kalpanayā netavyau tasya artha vādasya atatparatvāt pratijñā dṛṣṭanta vākyayoḥ tvad vaita para tvāt upādānakāraṇa ātmaka tvāt ca upādeyasya kārya jātasya upādāna jñānena tad jñāna upapatteḥ nimitta kāraṇam tu kāryāt atyanta bhinnam iti na tad jñāne kārya jñānam bhavati atas  brahma upādāna kāraṇam jagataḥ na ca brahmaṇaḥ  anyat nimitta kāraṇam jagata iti api yuktam pratijñā dṛṣṭānta uparodhāt eva na hi tadānīm brahmaṇi jñāte sarvam vijñātam bhavati jagat nimitta kāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ  anyasya sarva madhya pātinaḥ tad jñānena avijñānāt yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇa mātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau ajanikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ iti tatas  api prakṛti tvam avagacchāmaḥ dundubhi grahaṇam dundubhi āghāta grahaṇam ca tad gata śabdatva sāmānya upalakṣaṇa artham anāgata icchā saṃkalpaḥ  abhidhyā etayā khalu svātantrya lakṣaṇena kartṛ tvena nimitta tvam darśitam abahu syām iti ca sva viṣaya tayā upādāna tvam uktam ākāśāt eva brahmaṇa eva iti arthaḥ sākṣāt iti ca iti sūtra avayava m anūdya tasya artham vyācaṣṭe ākāśāt eva iti śrutiḥ brahmaṇaḥ  jagat upādāna tvam avadhārayantī upādāna antara abhāvam sākṣāt eva darśayati iti sākṣāt iti sūtra avayavena darśitam iti yojanā ātma kṛteḥ pariṇāmāt  prakṛti grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam nimittam iti api draṣṭavyam karma tvena upādāna tvāt kartṛ tvena ca tad prati nimitta tvāt  katham punar iti siddha sādhyayoḥ ekatra asamavāyaḥ  virodhāt iti pariṇāmāt iti brūma iti pūrva siddhasya api anirvacanīya vikāra ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ  anirvacanīya tvāt bhedena abhinna iva iti siddhasya api sādhya tvam iti arthaḥ eka vākya tvena vyākhyāyā pariṇāmāt iti avacchinna vyācaṣṭe pariṇāmāt iti vā iti sat catyat ca iti dve brahmaṇaḥ  rūpe sat ca sāmānya viśeṣeṇa aparokṣa tayā nirvācyam pṛthivī ap tejaḥ lakṣaṇam tyat ca parokṣamata eva anirvācyam idantayā vā aṭu ākāśa lakṣaṇam katham ca tad brahmaṇaḥ  rūpam yadi tasya brahma upādānam tasmāt pariṇāmāt brahma bhūtānām prakṛtiḥ iti pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ  anumānam anubhāṣya āgama virodhena dūṣayati yad punar iti etad uktam bhavati īśvaraḥ  jagataḥ  nimitta kāraṇam eva īkṣā pūrva jagat kartṛ tvāt kumbhakartu kulālavat  atra īśvarasya asiddheḥ āśraya asiddhaḥ  hetuḥ pakṣaḥ ca aprasiddha viśeṣaḥ yathā āhuḥ anānupalabdhe nyāyaḥ pravartate iti āgamāt tad siddhiḥ iti ced  hanta tarhi yādṛśam īśvaram āgamaḥ  gamayati tādṛśaḥ  abhyupagatavyaḥ sa ca nimitta kāraṇam ca upādāna kāraṇam ca īśvaram avagamayati viśeṣya āśraya grāhya āgama virodhāt na anumānam udetam urhati iti kutas tena nimittatva avadhāraṇā iti arthaḥ iyam ca upādāna pariṇāma ādi bhāṣā na vikāra abhiprāyeṇa api tu tathā sarpasya upādānam rajjuḥ evam brahma jagat upādānam draṣṭavyam na khalu nityasya niṣphalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarva ātmanā eka deśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati nitya tvāt aneka deśa tvāt iti uktam na ca mṛdaḥ śara vādayaḥ  bhidyante na ca abhinnāḥ na vā bhinna abhinnāḥ kintvanirvacanīyā eva yathā āha śrutiḥ amṛttikā iti eva satyam iti tasmāt advaita upakramāt upasaṃhārāt ca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikāt vaita parāḥ santaḥ sākṣāt eva kkacid advaitam āhuḥ kkacid dvaita niṣedhena kkacid brahma upādāna tvena jagataḥ etāvatā api tāvat bhedaḥ  niṣiddhaḥ  bhavati na tu upādānatva abhidhāna mātreṇa vikāra graha āstheyaḥ na hi vākya eka deśasya arthaḥ  asti iti syāt etad  mā bhūt pradhānam jagat upādānam tathā api na brahma upādāna tvam sidhyati paramāṇava ādīnām api tad upādānānām upaplavamāna tvāt  teṣām api hi kiñcid upodbalakam asti vaidikam liṅgam iti āśaṅkām apanetum āha sūtra kāraḥ etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam sūtram apratijñā lakṣaṇam lakṣyamāṇe pada samanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatra eva na anyatra iti atra sādhitam iti śrīmat vācaspati miśravi racite śrīmat śārīraka bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām prathama adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ iti prathama adhyāye avyakta ādi saṃdigdha pada mātra samanvaya ākhyaḥ caturthaḥ pādaḥ iti śrīmat brahmasūtra śāṅkara bhāṣye samanvaya ākhyaḥ prathamaḥ  adhyāyaḥ ____________________________ādhyāya ____________________________ atha dvitīyaḥ  adhyāyaḥ smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅga iti ced na anya smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgāt  vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvaya virodha parihāra lakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgati pradarśanāya sukha grahaṇasya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepataḥ tātparya artham āha prathame adhyāya iti anapekṣa veda anta vākya svarasa siddha samanvaya lakṣaṇasya virodha tad parihārābhyām ākṣepa samādhāna karaṇāt anena lakṣaṇena asti viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pūrva lakṣaṇa arthaḥ  hi viṣa śayaḥ tad gocara tvāt ākṣepa samādhānayoḥ eṣa ca viṣayi iti tad evam adhyāyam avatārya tad avayavam adhikaraṇam avatārayati tatra prathamam tāvat iti tantryate vyutpādyate mokṣa sādhanam anena iti tantram tad eva ākhyā yasyāḥ sā smṛtiḥ tantra ākhyā parama ṛṣiṇā kapilena ādi viduṣā praṇītā anyāḥ ca āsuri pañca śikhā ādi praṇītā smṛtayaḥ tad anusāriṇyaḥ na khalva mūṣām smṛtīnām manu ādi smṛtivat anyaḥ  avakāśaḥ śakyaḥ  vaditum ṛte mokṣa sādhana prakāśanāt  tad api ced nābhi dadhi uḥ anavakāśāḥ satyaḥ  apramāṇam prasajyeran tasmāt tad avirodhena kathañcid veda antā vyākhyātavyāḥ pūrva pakṣam ākṣipati katham punar īkṣati ādibhya iti prasādhitam khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyām avirodhe tu anapekṣam syāt asati hi anumānam iti atra yathā śruti viruddhānām smṛtīnām durbala tayā anapekṣaṇīya tvam tasmāt na durbala anurodhena balīyasīnām śrutīnām yuktam upavarṇanam api tu svatas siddha pramāṇa bhāvāḥ śrutayaḥ durbalāḥ smṛtīḥ bādhanta eva iti yuktam pūrva pakṣī samādhatte bhavet ayam iti prasādhitaḥ  api arthaḥ śraddhā jaḍān prati punar  prasādhyata iti arthaḥ āpātatas  samādhānam uktvā parama samādhānam āha pūrva pakṣī kapila prabhṛtīnām cārṣam iti ayam asya ābhaisaṃdhiḥ brahma hi śāstrasya kāraṇam uktam aśāstra yoni tvāt iti tena eṣa veda rāśiḥ brahma prabhavaḥ sanna ajāna siddha an āvaraṇa bhūta artha mātra gocara ta buddhaipūrva kaḥ  yathā tathā kapila ādīnām api śruti smṛti prathita ajāna siddha bhāvānām smṛtayaḥ anāvaraṇa sarva viṣaya tad buddhi prabhavā iti na śrutibhyaḥ  amūṣām asti kaścid viśeṣaḥ na ca etāḥ sphuṭataram pradhāna ādi pratipādana parāḥ śakyante anmathayitacum tasmāt tad anurodhena kathañcid śutaya eva netavyāḥ api ca tarkaḥ  api kapila ādi smṛtiḥ anumanyate tasmāt api etad eva prāptam evam prāpta āha tasya samādhiḥ iti yathā hi śrutīnām avigānam brahmaṇi gati sāmānyāt  na eṣam smṛtīnām avigānam asti pradhāne tāsām bhūyasīnām brahma upādānatva pratipādana parāṇām tatra tatra darśanāt  tasmāt avigānāt śraita eva artha āvastheyaḥ  na tu smārtaḥ  vigānāt iti tad kim idānīm paraspara vigānāt sarvā eva smṛtayaḥ avaheyā iti ata āha vipratipattau ca smṛtīnām iti na ca atīndriya arthān iti arvāk dṛś abhiprāyam śaṅkate śakyam kapila ādīnām iti nirākaroti na siddheḥ api iti na tāvat kapila ādaya īśvaravat ājāna siddhāḥ kintu viniścata veda prāmāṇyānām teṣām tad anuṣṭhānavatām prāci bhave asmin janmani siddhiḥ ata eva ajānasiddhā ucyante yad asmin janmani na taiḥ siddhadyupāyaḥ  anuṣṭhitaḥ prāc bhavī veda artha anuṣṭhāna labdha janma tvāt tad siddhīnām tathā ca avadhṛtaveda prāmāṇyānām tad viruddha artha abhidhānam tad apabādhitam apramāṇam eva apramāṇena ca na veda arthaḥ  atiśaṅkitum yuktaḥ pramāṇa siddha tvāt tasya tad evam veda virodhe siddha vacanam apramāṇam uktvā siddhānām api paraspara virodhe tad vacanādanāḥ ca āsa iti pūrva uktam smārayati siddha vyapāśraya kalpanāyām api iti śraddhā jaḍān bodhayati paratantra prajñasya api iti nanu śrutiḥ ced kapila ādīnām anāvaraṇa bhūta artha gocara jñāna atiśayam bodhayati katham teṣām vacanam apramāṇam tad aprāmāṇye śruteḥ api aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt ityata āha yā tu śrutiḥ iti na tāvat siddhānām paraspara viruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇam bhavitum arhanti na ca vikalpaḥ  vastuni siddhe tad anupapatteḥ anuṣṭhānam anāgata utpādyam vikalpyate na siddham tasya vyavasthānāt  tasmāt śuti sāmānya mātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhya praṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti syāt etad  kapila eva śrautaḥ  na anye manu ādayaḥ tatas ca teṣām smṛtiḥ kapila smṛti viruddha avaheya ityata āha bhavati ca anyā manoḥ iti tasyāḥ ca āgama antara saṃvādam āha mahābhārate api ca iti na kevalam manoḥ smṛtiḥ smṛti antara saṃvādinī śruti saṃvādinī api iti āha śrutiḥ ca iti upasaṃharati ata iti syāt etad  bhavatu veda viruddham kāpilam vacaḥ tathā api dvayoḥ api puruṣa buddhi prabhava tayā kaḥ  vinigamanāyām hetuḥ yatas  veda virodhi kāpilam vacaḥ  na ādaraṇīyam iti ata āha vedasya hi nirapekṣam iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ satyam śāstra yoniḥ īśvaraḥ tathā api asya na śāstra kriyāyām asti svātantryam kapila ādīnām iva sa hi bhagavān yādṛśam pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstram tad anusāreṇa asmin  api sarge praṇītavān evam pūrvatara anusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrva tām anusāreṇa ca pūrvatara iti anādiḥ ayam śāstra īśvarayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tatra īśvarasya na śāstra artha jñāna pūrvā śāstra kriyā yena asya kapila ādivat svātantryam bhavati śāstra artha jñānam ca asya svayam āvirbhavat api na śāstra kāraṇa tām upaiti dvayoḥ api aparyāyeṇa āvirbhāvāt śāstram ca svatas bodhaka tayā puruṣa svātantrya abhāvena nirastam asta doṣa āśaṅkam sat anapekṣam sākṣāt eva sva arthe pramāṇam kapila ādi vacāṃsi tu svatantra kapila ādi praṇetṛkāṇi tad artha smṛti pūrvakāṇi tad artha smṛtayaḥ ca tad artha anubhava pūrvāḥ tasmāt tāsām artha pratyaya aṅga prāmāṇya viniścayāya yāvat smṛti anubhavau kalpete tāvat svatas  siddha pramāṇa bhāva yānepa kṣayā eva śrutyā sva arthaḥ  viniścāyita iti śīghratara pravṛttayā śrutyā smṛti arthaḥ  bādhyata iti yuktam mahat ahaṅkārau tāvat aprasiddhau ahaṅkāra prakṛtika tvena tanmātrāṇi api aprasiddhāni smartum na śakyanta iti āha itareṣām ca iti nanu amahataḥ param avyaktam iti śruti prasiddhāni mahat ādīni iti ata āha yad api iti sūtra tātparyam āha kāryā iti sāṃkhya smṛteḥ mahat ādiṣu iva pradhāne api prāmāṇyam na iti niścīyata iti arthaḥ sāṃkhya smṛteḥ bādhe api tad ukta yuktīnām katham bādha ca ārṣa jñānam atra mūlam upapadyata iti yuktam tasmāt na kāpila smṛteḥ pradhāna upādāna tvam jagata iti siddham etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ na anena yoga śāstrasya hairaṇyagarbha pātañjala ādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyam nirākriyate kintu jagat upādāna svatantra pradhāna tad vikāra mahat ahaṅkāra pañca tanmātra gocaram prāmāṇyam na asti iti ucyate na ca etāvatā eṣām aprāmāṇyam bhavitum arhati yad parāṇi hi tāni tatra aprāmāṇye aprāmāṇyam aśru vīran na ca etāni pradhāna ādi sadbhāva parāṇi kintu yoga svarūpa tad sādhana tadavāntara phala vibhūti tad parama phala kaivalya vyutpādana parāṇi tad ca kiñcid nimittīkṛtya vyutpādyam iti pradhānam sa vikāram nimittīkṛtam purāṇeṣu iva sarga pratisarga vaṃśa manvantara vaṃśa anucaritam tad pratipādana pareṣu na tu tad vivakṣitam anya parāt api ca anya nimittam tad pratīyamānam abhyupeyeta yadi na māna antareṇa virudhyate asti tu vedānta śrutibhiḥ asya virodha iti uktam tasmāt pramāṇa bhūtāt api yoga śāstrān na pradhāna ādi siddhiḥ ata eva yoga śāstram vyutpādayitā āha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ aguṇānām paramam rūpam na dṛṣṭi patham ṛcchati yad tu dṛṣṭi patha prāptam tad māyā eva su tucchakam iti yogam vyutpipādayiṣatā nimitta mātreṇa iha guṇā uktāḥ na tu bhāvataḥ teṣām atāttvika tvāt iti arthaḥ aloka siddhānām api pradhāna ādīnām anādi pūrva pakṣa nyāya ābhāsa utprekṣitānām anuvādya tvam upapannam tad anena abhisaṃdhinā āha etena sāṃkhya smṛti pratyākhyānena yoga smṛtiḥ api pradhāna ādi viṣaya tayā pratyākhyātā draṣṭavyā iti adhikaraṇa antara ārambham ākṣipati nanu evam sati samāna nyāya tvāt iti samādhatte asti atra abhyadhika āśaṅkā mā nāma sāṃkhya śāstrāt pradhāna sattā vijñāyi yoga śāstrāt tu pradhāna ādi sattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulam hi yoga śāstrāṇām vedena saha saṃvādaḥ  dṛśyate upaniṣad upāyasya ca tattva jñānasya yoga apekṣā asti na jātu yoga śāstra vihitam yama niyama ādi bahiraṅgam upāyam apahāya antaraṅgam ca dhāraṇa ādikam antareṇa aupaniṣad ātma tattva sākṣātkāra udetum arhati tasmāt aupaniṣadena tattva jñānena apakṣaṇāt  saṃvāda bāhulyāt ca vedena aṣṭaka ādi smṛtivat yoga smṛtiḥ pramāṇam tatas ca pramāṇāt pradhāna ādi pratīteḥ na aśabda tvam na ca tad apramāṇam pradhāna ādau pramāṇam ca yam ādau  iti yuktam tatra aprāmāṇye anyatra api anāśvāsāt yathā āhuḥ aprasaram na labhante hi yāvat kkacana markaṭāḥ na abhidravanti te tāvat piśācā vā sva gocare iti sā iyam labdha prasarā pradhāna ādau yoga apramāṇa tā api śācī sarvatra eva durvārā bhavet iti asyāḥ prasaram niṣedha tā pradhāna ādi abhyupeyam iti na aśabdam pradhānam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ sā iyam api adhika āśaṅkātirdeśena nivartyate nivṛtti hetum āha artha eka deśa saṃpratipattau  api iti yadi pradhāna ādi sattā param yoga śāstram bhavet  bhavet pratyakṣa vedānta śruti virodhena apramāṇam tathā ca tad vihiteṣu yama ādiṣu api anāśvāsaḥ syāt  tasmāt na pradhāna ādi param tad  kintu tad nimittīkṛtya yoga vyutpādana param iti uktam na ca aviṣaye aprāmāṇyam viṣaye api prāmāṇyam upahanti na hi cakṣū rasādau  apramāṇam rūpe api apramāṇam bhavitum arhati tasmāt vedānta śruti virodhāt prādhāna ādiḥ asya aviṣayaḥ  na tu aprāmāṇyam iti parama arthaḥ syāt etad  adhyātma viṣayāḥ santi sahasram smṛtayaḥ bauddha arhata kāpālika ādīnām tā api kasmāt na nirākriyanta iti ata āha satīṣu api iti tāsu khalu bahulam veda artha visaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭa an ādṛtāsu kaiścid eva tu puruṣa apasadaiḥ paśu prāyaiḥ mleccha ādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu veda mūlatva āśaṅkā eva na asti iti na nirākṛtāḥ tad viparītāḥ tu sāṃkhya yoga smṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhāna ādi paratayā vyudasyanta iti arthaḥ na sāṃkhya jñānena veda nirapekṣeṇa iti pradhāna ādi viṣayeṇa iti arthaḥ dvaitinaḥ  hi te sāṃkhyā yogāḥ ca ye pradhāna ādi paratayā tad śāstram vyācakṣata iti arthaḥ sāṃkhyā samyak buddhiḥ vaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ evam yogaḥ  dhyānam upāya upeyayoḥ abheda vivakṣayā citta vṛtti nirodhaḥ  hi yogaḥ tasya upāyaḥ dhyānam pratyaya eka ānatā etad ca upalakṣaṇam anye api yama niyamādayaḥ  bāhyā āntarāḥ ca dhāraṇādayaḥ  yoga upāyā draṣṭavyāḥ etena abhyupagata veda prāmāṇyānām kaṇa bhakṣa akṣa caraṇa ādīnām sarvāṇi tarka smaraṇāni iti yojanā sugamam anyat  na vilakṣaṇa tvāt asya tathā tvam ca śabdāt  avāntara saṃgatim āha brahma asya jagataḥ  nimitta kāraṇam prakṛtiḥ ca iti asya pakṣasya iti codayati kutas  punar iti samāna viṣaya tve hi virodhaḥ  bhavet  na ca iha asti samāna viṣaya tā dharmavat brahmaṇaḥ  api māna antara aviṣaya tayā tarkya tvena anapekṣa āmnāya eka gocara tvāt iti arthaḥ samādhatte bhavet ayam iti amāna antarasya aviṣayaḥ siddha vastu avagāhinaḥ dharmaḥ  astu kārya rūpa tvāt brahma siddham tu gocaraḥ tasmāt samāna viṣaya tvāt asti atra tarkasya avakāśaḥ nanu astu virodhaḥ tathā api tarka ādare kaḥ  hetuḥ iti ata āha yathā ca śrutīnām iti sa avakāśā vahvayaḥ  api śrutayaḥ anavakāśa eka śruti virodhe tad anuguṇa tayā yathā nīyante evam anavakāśa eka tarka virodhe tad anuguṇa tayā bahvayaḥ  api śrutayaḥ guṇa kalpanādibhiḥ vyākhyānam arhanti iti arthaḥ api ca brahma sākṣāt kāraḥ  virodhita yā ana ādimavidyām nivartayan dṛṣṭena eva rūpeṇa mokṣa sādhanam iṣyate tatra brahma sākṣātkārasya mokṣa sādhana tayā pradhānasya anumānam dṛṣṭa sādharmyeṇa adṛṣṭa viṣayam viṣayataḥ  antaraṅgam bahis aṅgam tu atyanta parokṣa gocaram śābdam jñānam tena pradhāna pratyāsattyā api anumānam eva balīya iti āha dṛṣṭa sādharmyeṇa ca iti api ca śrutyā api brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta iti āha śrutiḥ iti saḥ  ayam brahmaṇaḥ  jagat upādānatva ākṣepaḥ punar tarkeṇa prastūyate aprakṛtyā ca śrutyā api vikārāṇām avasthitam jagat brahma sarūpam ca na iti naḥ tasya vikriyā viśuddham cetanam brahma jagat jaḍam aśuddhi bhāka tena pradhāna sārūpyāt pradhānasya eva vikriyā tathā hi eka eva strī kāyaḥ sukha duḥkha moha ātmaka tayā patyuḥ ca sa partnānām ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tām avindataḥ  aparyāyam sukha duḥkha viṣādān ādhatte striyā ca sarve bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt sukha duḥkha moha ātma tayā ca svarga naraka ādi uccāvaca prapañca tayā ca jagat aśuddham acetanam ca brahma tu cetanam viśuddham ca niratiśaya tvāt  tasmāt pradhānasya aśuddhasya acetanasya vikāraḥ  jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam ye tu cetana brahma vikāra tayā jagat caitanyam āhuḥ tān pratyāha acetanam ca idam jagat iti vyabhicāram codayati nanu cetanam api iti pariharati na svāmi bhṛtyayoḥ api iti nanu mā nāma sākṣāt cetanaḥ cetana antarasya upakāṣīnt tad kārya karaṇa buddhi ādi niyoga dvāreṇa tu upakariṣyati iti ata āha niratiśayā hi akartāraḥ cetanā iti upajana apāyavat dharma yogaḥ  atiśayaḥ tad abhāvaḥ  niratiśaya tvam ata eva nirvyāpāra tvāt akartāraḥ tasmāt teṣām buddhi ādi prayoktṛ tvam api na asti iti arthaḥ codakaḥ  anuśaya bījam uddhāṭayati yopī iti abhyupetya apātatas samādhānam āha tena api kathañcid iti parama sādhānam tu sūtra avayavena vaktum tam eva avatārayati na ca itarat api vilakṣaṇa tvam iti sūtra avayava abhisaṃdhim āha anavagamyamānam eva hi idam iti śabda arthāt  khalu cetana prakṛti tvāt caitanyam pṛthivī ādīnām avagamyamānam upodvalitam māna antareṇa sākṣāt śūyamāṇam api acaitanyam anyathayet māna antara abhāve vā arthor athaḥ śruti arthena apabādhanīyaḥ na tu tad balena śruti arthaḥ  anyathayitavya iti arthaḥ sūtra antaram avatārayitum codayati nanu cetana tvam api kkacid api na pṛthivī ādīnām caitanyam ātham eva kintu bhūyasīnām śrutīnām sākṣāt eva artha iti arthaḥ sūtram avatārayati ata uttaram paṭhati abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām vibhajate tuśabda iti na etāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣāt mṛd ādīnām vāc ādīnām ca caitanyam āhuḥ api tu tad adhiṣṭhātrīṇām devatānām cit ātmanām tena etad śuti balena na mṛd ādīnām vāc ādīnām ca caitanyam āśaṅkanīyam iti kasmāt punar etad evam iti ata āha viśeṣa anugatibhyām tatra viśeṣam vyācaṣṭe viśeṣaḥ  hi iti bhoktṛṇām upakārya tvāt bhūta indriyāṇām ca upakāra tvāt  sāmye ca tad anupapatteḥ sarva jana prasiddheḥ ca avijñānam ca abhavat iti śruteḥ ca viśeṣaḥ cetanā acetana lakṣaṇaḥ prāk uktaḥ sa na upapadyeta devatā śabda kṛtaḥ  vātra viśeṣaḥ  viśeṣa śabdena ucyata iti āha api ca kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇa saṃvāda iti anugatim vyācaṣṭe anugatāḥ ca iti sarvatra bhūta indriya ādiṣu anugatā devatā abhimāninīrūpa diśanti mantra ādayaḥ api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ aagniḥ vāc  bhūtvā mukham prāviśat vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ  bhūtvā nāsike prāviśat ādityaḥ cakṣuḥ bhūtvā akṣiṇī prāviśat iti ādaya indriya viśeṣa gatā devatā darśayanti devatāḥ ca kṣetrajña bhedāḥ cetanāḥ tasmāt na indriya ādīnām caitanyam rūpata iti api ca prāṇa saṃvāda vākya śeṣe prāṇānām asmad ādi śarīrāṇām iva kṣetrajña adhiṣṭhitānām vyavahāram darśayan prāṇānām kṣetrajña adhiṣṭhānena caitanyam draḍhayati iti āha prāṇa saṃvāda vākya śeṣe ca iti tad teja aikṣatā iti api iti yadi api prathame adhyāye mākta tvena varṇitam tathā api mukhya tayā api kathañcid netum śakyam iti draṣṭavyam pūrva pakṣam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti siddhānta sūtram dṛśyate tu prakṛti vikāra bhāve hetum sārūpyam vikalpa dūṣayati vilakṣaṇa tvena ca kāraṇena iti sarva svabhāvān anuvartanam prakṛti vikāra bhāva avirodhi tad anuvartane tādātmyena prakṛti vikāra bhāva abhāvāt myamaḥ tu asiddhaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu nidarśana abhāvāt asādhāraṇa iti arthaḥ atha jagat yonitayā āgamāt brahmaṇaḥ  avagamāt āgama bādhita viṣaya tvam anumānasya kasmāt na udbhāvyata iti ata āha āgama virodhaḥ tu iti na ca asmin  āgama eka samadhigamanīye brahmaṇi pramāṇa antarasya avakāśaḥ  asti yena tad upāya āgama ākṣipyeta iti āśa yavān āha yad tu uktam pariniṣpanna tvāt brahmaṇi iti yathā hi kāryatva aviśeṣa api aārogya kāmaḥ pathyam aśrīyāt asvara kāmaḥ sikatām bhakṣayet ityādīnām māna antara apekṣa tā na tu adarśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ  yajeta ityādīnām tad kasya hetoḥ asya kārya bhedasya pramāṇa antara agocara tvāt evaṃbhūtatva aviśeṣe api pṛthivī ādīnām māna antara gocara tvam na tu bhūtasya api brahmaṇaḥ tasmāmnāya eka gocarasya ati patita samasta māna antara sīmatayā smṛti āgama siddha tvāt iti arthaḥ yadi smṛtyāgama siddham brahmaṇaḥ tarka aviṣaya tvam katham tarhi śravaṇa atirikta manana vidhānam iti ata āha yad api śravaṇa vyatirekeṇa iti tarkaḥ  hi pramāṇa viṣaya vivecaka tayā tad iti kartavya tā bhūtaḥ tad āśrayaḥ  asati pramāṇe anugrāhyasya āśrayasya abhāvāt śuṣka tayā na ādriyate yaḥ tu āgama pramāṇa āśrayaḥ tad viṣaya vivecakaḥ tad avirodhī sa mantavya iti vidhīyate śruti anugṛhīta iti śrutyāḥ śravaṇasya paścāt itikartavya tā tvena gṛhītaḥ anubhava aṅga tvena iti mataḥ  hi bhāvyamānaḥ  bhāvanāyāḥ  viṣaya tayā anubhūtaḥ  bhavati iti mananam anubhava aṅgam ātmanaḥ  ananvāgata tvam iti svapna ādi avasthābhiḥ asaṃpṛkta tvam udāsīna tvam iti arthaḥ api ca cetana kāraṇa vādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye api kāryasya kathañcid caitanya āvirbhāva an āvirbhāvābhyām vijñānam ca avijñānam ca abhavat iti jagat kāraṇe yojayitum śakyam acetana pradhāna kāraṇa vādinām tu duryojam etad  na hi acetanasya jagat kāraṇasya vijñāna rūpa tā saṃbhavinī cetanasya jagat kāraṇasya suṣupta ādi avyavasthāsu iva sataḥ  api caitanya sthāna āvirbhāva tayā śakyam eva kathañcid avijñāna ātma tvam yojayitum iti āha yaḥ  api cetana kāraṇa śravaṇa balena iti parasya eva tu acetana pradhāna kāraṇa vādinaḥ sāṃkhyasya na yujyeta pratyukta tvāt tu vailakṣaṇyasya iti vailakṣaṇye kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  na asti iti abhyupetya idam uktam paramārthataḥ tu na asmābhiḥ etad abhyupeyata iti arthaḥ asat iti ced na pratiṣedha mātra tvāt  na kāraṇāt kāryam abhinnam abhede kāryatva anupapatteḥ kāraṇa vatsvātmani vṛtti virodhāt  śuddhi aśudadhi ādi viruddha dharma saṃsargāt ca atha cit ātmanaḥ kāraṇasya jagataḥ kāryāt bhedaḥ tathā ca idam jagat kāryam sattve api cit ātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāk utpatteḥ na asti na asti ced asat utpadyata iti satkārya vāda vyākopa iti āha yadi cetanam śuddham iti pariharati na eṣa doṣa iti kutas  pratiṣedha mātra tvāt  vibhajate pratiṣedha mātram hi idam iti pratipādayiṣyati hi atat ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ iti atra yathā kāryam sva rūpeṇa sat asat tvābhyām nirvacanīyam api tu kāraṇa rūpeṇa śakyam sattvena nirvaktum iti evam ca kāraṇa sattā eva kāryasya sattā na tatas  anyā iti katham tad utpatteḥ prāk  sati kāraṇe bhavati asat sva rūpeṇa tu utpatteḥ prāk utpannasya dhvastasya vā sat asat tvābhyām anirvācyasya na sataḥ  asataḥ  vā utpattiḥ iti nirviṣayaḥ satkārya vāda pratiṣedha iti arthaḥ api itau tadvat prasaṅgāt asamañjasam asāmañjasyam vibhajate atra āha ca udakaḥ yadi sthaulya iti yathā hi yūṣa ādiṣu hiṅgi saindhava ādīnām avibhāga lakṣaṇaḥ  layaḥ svagata rasa ādibhiḥ yūṣam rūṣayati evam brahmaṇi viśuddhi ādi dharmiṇi jagalliyamānam avibhāgam gacchat brahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet  na ca anyathā layaḥ  loka sidda iti bhāvaḥ kalpa antareṇa āsām añjasyam āha api ca samastasya iti na hi samudrasya phena ūrmi budbuda ādi pariṇāmaḥ  vā rajjvām sarpa dhārā ādi vibhrame vā niyamaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ samudraḥ  hi kadācid phena ūrmi kūpeṇa pariṇāmate kadācid budbuda ādinā rajjvāṃhi kaścid sarpa iti viparyasyati kaścid hārā iti na ca krama niyamaḥ saḥ  ayam atra bhogya ādi vibhāga niyamaḥ krama niyamaḥ ca asamañjasa iti kalpa antareṇa āsām añjasyam āha apica bhoktṛṇām iti kalpa antaram śaṅkā pūrvam āha atha idam iti siddhānta sūtram na tu dṛṣṭānta bhāvāt na avibhāga mātram layaḥ  api tu kāraṇe kāryasya avibhāgaḥ tatra ca tad dharma ārūṣaṇe santi sahasram dṛṣṭāntāḥ tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kārya dharma rūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭānta lavaḥ  api asti iti arthaḥ syāt etad  yadi kāryasya avibhāgaḥ kāraṇe katham kārya dharma ārūṣaṇam kāraṇasya ityata āha ananya tve api iti yathā rajatasya āropitasya pāramārthikam rūpam śukti na ca śuktī rajatam eva midam api iti arthaḥ api ca sthiti utpatti pralaya kāleṣu triṣu api kāryasya kāraṇāt abhedam abhidadhatī śrutiḥ anati śaṅkanīyā sarvaiḥ eva veda vādibhiḥ tatra sthiti utpattyoḥ yaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye api samānaḥ kāryasya avidyā samāropita tvam nāma tasmāt na api iti mātram anuyojyam iti āha ati alpam ced amucyata iti asti ca ayam aparaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā ca svapna dṛś eka iti laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ evam avasthā traya sākṣi eka iti avasthā trayam utpatti sthiti pralayāḥ kalpa antareṇa āsām añjasye kalpa antareṇa dṛṣṭānta bhāvam parihāram āha yad punar etad uktam iti avidyā śakteḥ niyata tvāt utpatti niyama iti arthaḥ etena iti mithyā jñāna vibhāga śakti pratiniyamena muktānām punarutpatti prasaṅgaḥ pratyuktaḥ kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāvasya pratiniyamāt  tattva jñānena ca sa śaktinaḥ mithyājñānasya sa mūla ghātam nihata tvāt iti sva pakṣa doṣāt ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam tāvat samānam eva ubhyoḥ pakṣayoḥ prāk utpatteḥ asatkāryavat aprasaṅgaḥ  apītau tadvat prasaṅgaḥ ca pradhāna upādāna pakṣa eva na asmad pakṣa iti yadi api upariṣṭāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tathā api guḍa jihvikayā samānatva āpādanam idānīm iti mantavyam idam asya puruṣasya sukha duḥkha upādānam kleśa karma āśayāt īdamasya iti sugamam anyat  tarka apratiṣṭhānāt api kevala āgama gamyer athe svatantra tarka aviṣaye na sāṃkhya ādivat  sādharmya dharmya mātreṇa tarkaḥ pravartanīyaḥ  yena pradhāna ādi siddhiḥ bhavet  śuṣka tarkaḥ  hi sa bhavati apratiṣṭhānāt tad uktam ayatnena anumitaḥ  api arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyuktataraiḥ anyaiḥ anyathā eva upapādyate iti na ca mahāpuruṣa parigṛhīta tvena kasyacid tarkasya pratiṣṭhā mahāpuruṣāṇām eva tārkikāṇām mithas  vipratipatteḥ iti sūtre śaṅkate anyathā anumeyam iti ced  tad vibhajate anyathā vayam anumāsyām aha iti na anumāna ābhāsa vyabhicāreṇa anumāna vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ pratyakṣa ādiṣu api tad ābhāsa vyabhicāreṇa tad
