prasaṅgāt  tasmāt  svābhāvika pratibandha valliṅga anusaraṇe nipuṇena anumātrā bhavitavyam tatas ca apratyūham pradhānam setsyati iti bhāvaḥ api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇām apratiṣṭhām āha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ  abhyupeyaḥ tad apratiṣṭhāyām itara apratiṣṭhāna abhāvāt iti āha na hi pratiṣṭhitaḥ tarka eva iti api ca tarka apratiṣṭhāyām sa pala loka yātrā uccheda prasaṅgaḥ na ca śruti artha ābhāsa sanirākaraṇena tad artha tattva viniścaya iti āha sarva tarka apratiṣṭhāyām ca iti api ca vicāra ātmakaḥ tarkaḥ tarkita pūrva pakṣa parityāgena tarkitam rāddha antam anujānāti sati ca eṣa pūrva pakṣa viṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhā rahite pravartate tad abhāve vicāra pravṛtteḥ tad idam āha ayam eva ca tarkasya alaṅkāra iti tām imām āśaṅkām sūtreṇa pariharati evam api avimokṣa prasaṅgaḥ na vayam anyatra tarka pramāṇayāmaḥ kintu jagat kāraṇa sattve svābhāvika pratibandhavat na liṅgam asti yad tu sādharmya vaidharmya mātram tad apratiṣṭhā doṣān na mucyata iti kalpa antareṇa anirmokṣa padārtham āha api ca sāmyak jñānāt mokṣa iti bhūta artha gocarasya hi samyak jñānasya vyavasthita vastu gocara tayā vyavasthānam loke dṛṣṭam yathā pratyakṣasya vaidikam ca idam cetana jagat upādāna viṣayam vijñānam veda uttha tarka iti kartavya tākam veda janitam vyavasthitam veda anapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagat kāraṇa bhedam avasthāpayatām tārkikāṇām anyonyam vipratipatteḥ tattva nirdhāraṇa kāraṇā bhāvāt ca na tatas tattva vyavasthā iti na tatas  samyak jñānam asamyak jñānāt ca na saṃsārāt vimokṣa iti arthaḥ etena śiṣṭā parigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ na kāryam kāraṇāt abhinnam abhede kāraṇa rūpavat  kāryatva anupapatteḥ karoti artha anupapatteḥ ca abhūta prādurbhāvanam hi tad arthaḥ na ca asya kāraṇa ātma tve kiñcid abhūtam asti yad artha mayam puruṣaḥ  yateta abhivyakti artham iti ced  na tasyāḥ  api kāraṇa ātma tvena sattvāt  asattve vā abhivyaṅgyasya api tadvat prasaṅgena kāraṇa ātmatva vyāghātāt na hi tad eva tadānīm eva asti na asti ca iti yujyate kim ca idam maṇi mantra auṣadham indrajālam kāryeṇa śikṣitam yad idam ajāta aniruddha atiśayam avyavadhānam avidūra sthānam ca tasya eva tad avastha indriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācid pratyakṣam parokṣam ca yena asya kadācid pratyakṣam upalambhanam kadācid anumānam kadācid āgamaḥ kārya antara vyavadhiḥ asya pārokṣya hetuḥ iti ced  na kārya jātasya sadātana tvāt  atha api syāt  kārya antarāṇi piṇḍa kapāla śarkarā cūrṇa kaṇa prabhṛtāni kumbham vyavadadhate tatas  kumbhasya pārokṣyam kadācid iti tad na tasya kārya jātasya kāraṇa ātmanaḥ sadātana tvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasya atyanta anupalabdhi prasaṅgāt  kādācid ka tve vā kārya jātasya na kāraṇa ātma tvam nityatva anityatva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargasya bhedaka tvāt  bheda abhedayoḥ ca paraspara virodhena ekatra saha asaṃbhava iti uktam tasmāt  kāraṇāt kāryam ekānta ta eva bhinnam na ca bhede gavāśvavat  kārya kāraṇa bhāva anupapattiḥ iti sāṃpratam abhede api kāraṇa rūpavat tad anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt  atyanta bhede ca kumbha kumbha kārayoḥ nimittaka bhāvasya darśanāt  tasmāt anyatva aviśeṣe api samavāya bheda eva upādāna upādeya bhāva niyama hetuḥ yasya abhūtvā bhavataḥ samavāya pādanānām paṭa ādibhyaḥ  nyūna parimāṇa tvam cit ātmanaḥ tu parama hata upādānāt na atyanta alpa parimāṇam upādeyam bhavitum arhati tasmāt yatra idam alpa tā ramyam viśrāmyati yatas  na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tad jagataḥ  mūla kāraṇam paramāṇuḥ kṣodīnnam upādeyam jagatkāryam abhidadhatī śrutiḥ pratiṣṭhita prāmāṇya tarka virodhāt sahasra saṃvatsara satra gata saṃvatsara śrutivat kathañcit jaghanyatva vṛttyā vyākhyāya iti adhikam śaṅkamānam prati sāṃkhya dūṣaṇam atidiśati etena iti sūtreṇa asya arthaḥ kāraṇāt  kāryasya bhedam atat ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ iti atra niṣetsyāmaḥ avidyā samāropaṇena ca kāryasya nyūna adhika bhāvam api aprayojaka tvāt upokṣiṣyāmahe tena vaiśeṣika ādi abhimatasya tarkasya śuṣka tvena avyavasthiceḥ sūtram idam sāṃkhya dūṣaṇam atidiśati yatra kathañcid veda anusāriṇī manu ādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyata kasya eṣā gatiḥ tatra paramāṇu ādi vādasya atyanta veda bāhyasya manu ādi upekṣitasya ca kā eva kathā iti kenacid aṃśena iti sṛṣṭi ādayaḥ  hi vyutpādya āḥ te na kiñcid sat asat vā pūrva pakṣa nyāya utprekṣitam api udāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacid aṃśena iti uktam sugamam anyat  bhokrāpatteḥ avibhāgaḥ cetyāt lokavat syāt etad  ati gambhīra jagat kāraṇa viṣaya tvam tarkasya na asti kevala gama gamyam etad iti uktam tad katham punar tarka nimitta ākṣepa iti ata āha yadi api śrutiḥ pramāṇam iti pravṛttā hi śrutiḥ anapekṣa tayā svatas pramāṇa tvena na pramāṇa antaram apekṣate pravartamānā punar  sphuṭatara pratiṣṭhita prāmāṇya tarka virodhena mukhya arthāt pracyāvya jaghanya vṛtti tām nīyate yathā mantra artha vādau  iti arthaḥ atirohita artham bhāṣyam yathā tvad yatva iti yadi atīta anāgatayoḥ sargayoḥ eṣa vibhāgaḥ  na bhavet  tatas tad eva adyatanasya vibhāgasya bādhakam syāt  svapna darśanasya iva jāgra darśanam na tu etad asti abādhitāt yata darśanena tayoḥ api tathā tvā anumānāt iti arthaḥ imām śaṅkām āpātatas  avicārita loka siddha dṛṣṭānta upadarśana mātreṇa nirākaroti sūtra kāraḥ syāt lokavat  parihāra rahasyam āha tad ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ pūrvasmāt avirodhāt asya viśeṣa abhidhāna upakramasya vibhāgam āha abhyupagamya ca imam iti syāt etad  yadi kāraṇāt parama artha bhūtāt ananya tvam ākāśa ādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutas tarhi na vaiśeṣika ādi ukta dā uprapañca avatāra iti ata āha vyatirekeṇa abhāvaḥ kāryasya avagamyata iti na khalu ananya tvam iti abhedam brūmaḥ kintu bhedam vyasedhāmaḥ tatas ca nābheda āśraya doṣa prasaṅgaḥ kintva bhedam vyāsedhadbhiḥ vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ asmāsu sāhāyakam eva ācaritam bhavati bheda niṣedha hetum vyācaṣṭe ārambhaṇa śabdaḥ tāvat iti evam hi brahma vijñānena sarvam jagat tattvataḥ  jñāyeta yadi brahmā eva tattvam jagataḥ  bhavet  yathā rajjvām jñātāyām bhujaṅga tattvam jñātam bhavati sā hi tasya tattvam tattva jñānam ca jñānam atas  anyat midhyā jñānam ajñānam eva atra eva vaidikaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā somya ekena mṛd piṇḍena iti syāt etad  mṛdi jñātāyām katham mṛmnayam ghaṭa ādi jñātam bhavati na hi tad mṛdā ātmakam iti upapāditam adhastāt tasmāt tattvataḥ  bhinnam na ca anyasmin vijñāte anyat vijñātam bhavati iti ata āha śrutiḥ avācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ  nāmadheyam vācayā kevalam ārabhyate vikāra jātam na tu tattvataḥ  asti yatas  nāmadheya mātram etad  yathā puruṣasya caitanyam iti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpa mātram yathā āhuḥ vikalpa vidaḥ aśabda jñāna anupātī vastu śūnyaḥ  vikalpaḥ iti tathā ca avastutayā anṛtam vikāra jātam mṛttikā iti eva satyam tasmāt ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādīnām tattvam mṛdā iva tena mṛdi jñātāyām yeṣām sarveṣām eva tattvam jñātam bhavati tad idam uktam na ca anyathā eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam saṃpadyata iti nidarśana antara dvayam darśayan  upasaṃharati tasmāt yathā ghaṭa karaka ādi ākāśānām iti ye hi dṛṣṭa naṣṭa svarūpā na te vastu santaḥ yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikā udaka ādayaḥ tathā ca sarvam vikāra jātam tasmāt avastu sat tathā hi yad asti sat asti eva yathā cit ātmā na hi asau kadācid  kkacid  kathañcid vā asti kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathā asti eva na na asti na ca evam vikāra jātam tasya kadācid  kathañcid  kutracid avasthānāt  na hi rūpam kadācid  kkacid  kathañcid vā gandhaḥ  bhavati atha yasya sat asat tve dharmau te ca sva kāraṇa adhīna janma tayā kadācid eva bhavataḥ tad tarhi vikāra jātam daṇḍāyamānam sa dātanam iti na vikāraḥ kasyacid  atha asattva samaye tad na asti kasya tarhi dharmaḥ  asattvam na hi dharmiṇī apratyutpanne tad dharmaḥ  asattvam pratyutpannam upapadyate atha asya na dharmaḥ kintu artha antara samattvam kim āyātam bhāvasya na hi ghaṭe jāte paṭasya kiñcid bhavati asattvam bhāva virodhi iti ced  na akiñcitkarasya tattva anupapatteḥ kiñcitkara tve vā tatra api asattvena tad anuyoga saṃbhavāt atha asya asattvam nāma kiñcid na jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati yathā āhuḥ ana tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam iti atha eṣa prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ  nirucyatām kim tad svabhāvaḥ  bhāva uta bhāva svabhāvaḥ sa iti tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānām tad svabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagat śūnyam prasajyeta tathā ca bhāva anubhāva abhāvaḥ uttarasmin  tu sa vabhāva nitya tayā na abhāva vyavahāraḥ syāt  kalpanā mātra nimitta tve api niṣedhasya bhāva nityatā āpattiḥ tad avasthā eva tasmāt bhinnam asti kāraṇāt vikāra jātam na vastu sat  atas  vikāra jātam anirvacanīyam anṛtacam tad anena pramāṇena siddham anṛta tvam vikāra jātasya kāraṇasya nirvācya tayā sattvam amṛttikā iti eva satyam ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭānta tayā anuvadati śrutiḥ ayatra laukika parīkṣakāṇām buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ca akṣa pāda sūtram pramāṇa siddhaḥ  dṛṣṭānta iti etad param na punar loka siddha tvam atra vivakṣitam anyathā teṣām paramāṇu ādiḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt  na hi paramāṇu ādiḥ naisargika vainayika buddhi atiśaya rahitānām laukikānām siddha iti saṃprati anekanta vādinam utthāpayati nanu aneka ātmakam iti anekābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ yāḥ pravṛttayaḥ  nānā kārya sṛṣṭayaḥ tad yuktam brahma ekam nānā ca iti kim atas  yadi evam iti ata āha tatra ekatva aṃśena iti yadi punar eka tvam eva vastu sadbhavet  tatas  nānātva abhāvāt vaidikaḥ karma kāṇḍa āśrayaḥ  laukikaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ samasta eva ucchidyeta brahma gocarāḥ ca śravaṇa manana ādayaḥ sarve datta jala añjalayaḥ prasajyeran evam ca aneka ātmaka tve brahmaṇaḥ  mṛd ādi dṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyanti iti tam imam anekānta vādam dūṣayati na evam syāt iti idam tāvat atra vaktavyam mṛdā ātmanā ekatvam ghaṭa śarāva ādi ātmanā nānātvam iti vadataḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ parasparam kim abhedaḥ  abhimataḥ āhaḥ bhedaḥ uta bheda abhedau  iti tatra abheda aikāntike mṛdā ātmanā iti ca ghaṭa śarāva ādi ātmanā iti ca ullekha dvayam niyamaḥ ca na upapadyate bhede ca ullekha dvaya niyamau  upapannau ātmanā iti tu asamañjasam na hi anyasya anya ātmā bhavati na ca anekānta vādaḥ bheda ābeda kalpe tullekha dvayam bhavet api niyamaḥ tu ayuktaḥ na hi dharmiṇoḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ saṃkare tad dharmau  ekatva nānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati tatas ca mṛdā ātmanā ekatvam yāvat bhavati tāvat ghaṭa śarāva ādi ātmanā api syāt  evam ghaṭa śarāva ādi ātmanā nānā tvam yāvat bhavati tāvat mṛdā ātmanā nānā tvam bhavet  saḥ  ayam niyamaḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ aikāntikam bhedam upakalpayati anirvacanīyatām vā kāryasya parākrāntam ca asmābhiḥ prathama adhyāye tad  āstām tāvat  tad etad yukti nirākṛtam anuvadantīm śrutim udāharati mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti syāt etad  na brahmaṇaḥ  jīva bhāvaḥ kālpanikaḥ kintu bhāvikaḥ aṃśaḥ hi saḥ tasya karmasā ahitena jñānena brahma bhāva ādhīyata iti ata āha svayam prasiddha hi iti svābhāvikasya anādeḥ iti yad uktam nānātva aṃśena tu karma kāṇḍa āśrayaḥ  laukikaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ setsyati iti tatra āha bādhite ca iti yāvat abādham hi sarvaḥ  ayam vyavahāraḥ svapna daśāyām iva tad upadarśita padārtha jāta vyavahāraḥ sa ca yathā jāgrat anasthāyām bādhakāt nivartate evam tattvam asya ādi vākya paribhāvana abhyāsa paripāka bhuvā śārīrasya brahma ātma bhāva sākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate syāt etad  ayatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhūt tad kena kam paśyet ityādinā mithyājñāna adhīnaḥ  vyavahāraḥ kriyā kāraka ādi lakṣaṇaḥ samyak jñānena apanīyata itri na brūte kintu avasthā bheda āśrayaḥ  vyavahāraḥ  avasthā antara prāptyā nivartate yathā bālakasya kāma cāra vāda bhakṣa tā upanayana prāptau nivartate na ca tāvatā asau mithyājñāna nibandhanaḥ  bhavati evam atra api iti ata āha na ca ayam vyavahāra abhāva iti kutas  tad tvam asi iti brahma ātma bhāvasya iti na khalu etad vākyam avasthā viśeṣa viniyatam brahma ātma bhāvam āha jīvasya api tu na bhujaṅgaḥ  rajjuḥ iyam itivat  sadātanam tam abhivadati api ca satya anṛta abhidhānena api etad eva yuktam iti āha taskara dṛṣṭāntena ca iti na ca asmin darśana iti na hi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍa ka maṇḍalu kuṇḍala śālinaḥ kuṇḍalitva jñānam daṇḍavat tām kamaṇḍalu mat tām bādhate tad  kasya hetoḥ teṣām kuṇḍala ādīnām tasmin bhāvika tvāt  tadvat iha api bhāvika gocareṇa aikātmya jñānena na nānā tvam bhāvikam apavadanīyam na hi jñānena vastu apanīyate api tu mithyājñānena āropitam iti arthaḥ codayati nanu ekatva ekānta abhyupagama iti abādhita anadhigata asaṃdigdha vijñāna sādhanam pramāṇam iti pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa upapattyā pratyakṣa ādīni pramāṇa tām aśruvate ekatva ekānta abhyupagame tu teṣām sarveṣām bheda viṣayāṇām bādhita tvāt aprāmāṇyam prasajyeta tathā vidhi pratiṣedha śāstram api bhāvanā bhāvya bhāvaka karaṇa iti kartavya tā bheda apekṣa tvāt vyāhanyeta tathā ca nāstikyam eka deśa ākṣepeṇa ca sarva veda ākṣepāt vedāntānām api aprāmāṇyam iti abheda ekānta abhyupagama hāniḥ na kevalam vidhi niṣedha ākṣepeṇa asya mokṣa śāstrasya ākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇa asya api bheda apekṣa tvāt iti āha mokṣa śāstrasya api iti api ca asmin darśane varṇa pada vākya prakaraṇa ādīnām alīka tvāt tad prabhavam advaita jñānam asīcīnam bhavet  na khalva līkāt dhūma ketana jñānam samīcīnam iti āha katham ca anṛtena mokṣa śāstreṇa iti pariharati atra ucyata iti yadi api pratyakṣa ādīnām tāttvikam abādhita tvam na asti yukti āgamābhyām bādhanāt  tathā api vyavahāre bādhana abhāvāt sāṃvyavahāri kam abādhanam na hi pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ artham paricchidya pravartamānaḥ  vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścid  tasmāt abādhanāt na pramāṇa lakṣaṇam atipatanti pratyakṣa ādaya iti satyatva upapatteḥ iti satyatva abhimāna upapatteḥ iti grahaṇaka vākyam etad  vibhajate yāvat hi na satya ātmā ekatva pratipattiḥ iti vikārān eva tu śarīra ādīn aham iti ātma bhāvena putra paśu ādīn mama iti ātmīya bhāvena iti yojanā vaidikaḥ ca iti karma kāṇḍa mokṣa śāstra vyavahāra samarthanā asvapna vyavahārasya iva iti vibhajate yathā suptasya prākṛtasya iti akatham ca anṛtena mokṣa śāstreṇa iti yad uktam tad anubhāṣya dūṣayati katham tu asatyena iti śakyam atra vaktum śravaṇa ādi upāya ātma sākṣātkāra paryantaḥ  vedānta samutthaḥ  api jñāna nicayaḥ  asatyaḥ saḥ  api hi vṛtti rūpaḥ kārya tayā nirodha dharmā yaḥ tu brahmatva bhāva sākṣāt kāraḥ  asau na kāryaḥ tad svabhāva tvāt tasmāt acodyam etad  katham asatyāt satya utpāda iti yad khalu satyam na tad utpadyata iti kutas tasya asatyāt utpādaḥ yad ca utpadyate tad sarvam asatyam eva sāṃvyavahārikam tu satya tvam vṛtti rūpasya brahma sākṣātkārasya iva śravaṇa ādīnām api abhinnam tasmāt abhyupetya vṛtti svarūpasya brahma sākṣātkārasya parama artha satya tām vyabhicāra udbhāvanam iti mantavyam yadi api sāṃvvahārikasya satyāt eva bhayāt satyam maraṇam utpadyate tathā api bhaya hetuḥ ahiḥ tad jñānam vāsatyam tatas  bhayam satyam jāyata iti asatyāt satyasya utpattiḥ uktā yadi api ca ahi jñānam api sva rūpeṇa sat tathā api na tad jñāna tvena bhaya hetuḥ api tu anirvācya ahi rūṣita tvena anyathā rajju jñānāt api bhaya prasaṅgāt jñāna tvena aviśeṣāt tasmāt anirvacya ahi rūṣitam jñānam api anirvācyam iti siddham asatyāt api satyasya upajana iti na ca brūmaḥ sarvasya ādasatyāt satyasya upajanaḥ yatas  samāropita dhūma bhāvāyā dhūma mahiṣyā vahni jñānam satyam syāt  na hi cakṣuṣaḥ  rūpa jñānam satyam upajāyata iti rasa ādi jñānena api tatas  satyena bhavitavyam yatas  niyamaḥ  hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānām yatas  kutaścid  kiñcid eva jāyata iti evam asatyānām api niyamaḥ  yatas  kutaścid asatyāt satyam kutaścid asatyam yathā dīrghatva ādeḥ varṇeṣu samāropitatva aviśeṣe api ajīnam iti atas jyā niviraham avagacchanti satyam ajinam iti atas tu samāropita dīrgha bhāvāt jyāni viraham avagacchantaḥ  bhavanti bhrāntāḥ na ca ubhayatra dīrgha samāropam prati kaścid asti bhedaḥ tasmāt upapannam asatyāt api satyasya udaya iti nidarśana antaram āha svapna darśana avasthasya iti yathā sāṃsārikaḥ  jāgrat bhujaṅgam dṛṣṭvā palāyate tatas ca na daṃśa vedanām āpnoti pipāsuḥ salilam ālokya pātum pravartate tatas tadāsādya pāyaṃpāyam āpyāyitaḥ sukham anubhavati evam svapna antike api tad avastham sarvam iti asatyāt kārya siddhiḥ śaṅkate tad kāryam api anṛtam eva iti evam api nāsatyāt satyasya siddhiḥ uktā iti arthaḥ pariharati tatra brūmaḥ yadi api svapna darśana avasthasya iti laukikaḥ  hi supta utthitaḥ  avagamyam bādhitam manyate na tad avagatim tena yadi api parikṣakā anirvācya rūṣitām avagatim anirvācyām niścinvanti tathā api laukika abhiprāyeṇa etad uktam atra antare laukāyatikānām matam apākaroti etena svapna dṛśaḥ  avagatya bādhanena iti yadākhalu ayam caitraḥ tāra kṣavīm vyātta vikaṭa daṃṣṭrā karāla vadanām uttabdha bambhramat mastaka avacumbi lāṅgūlāmati roṣa aruṇa stabdha viśāla vṛtta locanām romāñca saṃcaya utphullam īṣaṇām sphaṭika acala bhitti pratibimbitām abhyamitrīṇām tanum āsthāya svapne pratibuddhaḥ  mānuṣīm ātmanaḥ tanum paśyati tadā ubhaya deha anugatam ātmānam pratisaṃdadhānaḥ  deha atiriktam ātmānam niścinoti na tu deha mātram tanmātra tve dehavat pratisaṃdhāna abhāva prasaṅgāt  katham ca etad upapadyeta yadi svapna dṛśaḥ  avagatiḥ abādhitā syāt  tad bādhe tu pratisaṃdhāna abhāva iti asatyāt ca satya pratītiḥ śruti siddha anvaya vyatireka siddhā ca iti āha tathā ca śrutiḥ iti tathā ākāra ādi iti yadi api rekhā svarūpam satyam tathā api tad yathā saṃketam asatyam na hi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayanti īdṛśena rekhā bhedena ayam varṇaḥ pratyetavyaḥ  api tu īdṛśaḥ  rekhā bhedaḥ  akāra īdṛśaḥ ca kakāra iti tathā ca asamīcīnāt saṃketāt samīcīna varṇa avagatiḥ iti siddham yad ca uktam ekatva aṃśena jñāna mokṣa vyavahāraḥ setsyati nānātva aṃśena tu karma kāṇḍa āśrayaḥ  laukikaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ setsyati iti tatra āha api ca antyam idam pramāṇam iti yadi khalu ekatva avagati nibandhanaḥ kaścid asti vyavahāraḥ tad avagateḥ sarvettara tvāt  tathā hi atattvam asi iti aikātmya avagatiḥ samasta pramāṇa tad phala tā dvyahāra anapabādha mānā eva udīyate na etasyāḥ parastāt kiñcit anukūlam pratikūlam ca asti yad apekṣena yena ca iyam pratikṣipyeta tatra anukūla pratikūla nivāraṇāt na atas  param kiñcid ākāṅkṣyam iti na ca iyam avagatiḥ ḍula kṣīra prāya iti āha na ca iyam iti syāt etad  antyā ced iyam avagatiḥ niṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca prekṣāvadbhiḥ upādīyeta prayojanavat tve vā na antyā syāt iti ata āha na ca iyam avagatiḥ anarthikā kutas  avidyā nivṛtti phala darśanāt nahīyam utpannā satī paścāt avidyām nivartayati yena na antyā syāt  kintva vidyā virodhi svabhāva tayā tad nivṛtti ātmā eva udayate avidyā nivṛttiḥ ca na tad kārya tayā phalam api tu iṣṭa tayā iṣṭa lakṣaṇa tvāt phalasya iti pratikūlam parācīnam nirākartum āha bhrāntiḥ vā iti kutas  bādhaka iti syāt etad  mā bhūt ekatva nibandhanaḥ  vyavahāraḥ  anekatva nibandhanaḥ tu asti tad eva hi sakalām udvahati lokayātrām atas tad siddhi artham aneka tvasya kalpanīyam tāttvika tvam iti ata āha prāk ca iti vyavahāraḥ  hi buddhi pūrva kāriṇām buddhyā upapadyate na tu asyāḥ tāttvika tvena bhrāntyā api tad upapatteḥ iti āveditam satyam ca tad avisaṃvādāt  anṛtam ca vicāra asahatayā nirvācya tvāt antyasya aikātmya jñānasya anapekṣa tayā bādhaka tvam anekatva jñānasya ca pratiyogi graha apekṣayā durbala tvena bādhya tvam vadan prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt antyena pramāṇena iti syāt etad  na vayam anekatva vyavahāra siddhi artham aneka tvasya tāttvika tvam kalpyāmaḥ kintu śrautam eva asya tāttvika tvam iti codayati nanu mṛdāt iti pariharati na iti ucyata iti mṛd ādi dṛṣṭāntena hi kathañcid pariṇāma unneyaḥ na ca śakya unnetum amṛttikā iti eva satyam iti kāraṇa mātra satyatva avadhāraṇena kāryasya anṛtatva pratipādanāt  sākṣāt kūṭa stha nityatva pratipādikāḥ tu santi sahasraśas  śrutaya iti na pariṇāma dharma tā brahmaṇaḥ atha kūṭasthasya api pariṇāmaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha na hi ekasya iti śaṅkate sthiti gativat iti yathā eka bāṇa āśraye gati nivṛtti evam ekasmin brahmaṇi pariṇāmaḥ ca tad abhāvaḥ ca kauṭasthyam bhaviṣyata iti nirākaroti na kūṭasthasya iti viśeṣaṇāt iti kūṭastha nityatā hi sa dātanī svabhāva dapracyutiḥ sā katham pracyutyā na virudhyate na ca dharmiṇaḥ  vyatiricyate dharmaḥ  yena tad upajana apāye api dharmī kīṭa sthaḥ syāt  bheda aikāntike gavāśvavat dharma dharmi bhāva abhāvāt vāṇa ādayaḥ tu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇāmanta iti api ca svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi āpādita arthavat tvasya veda rāśeḥ ekena api varṇena anarthakena na bhavitavyam kim punar iyatā jagataḥ  brahma yonitva pratipādakena vākya saṃdarbheṇa tatra phalavat brahma darśana samāmnāna saṃnidhau  aphalam jagat yoni tvam samāmnāyamānam tad artham sat tad upāyatayā avatiṣṭhate na artha antara artham iti āha na ca yathā brahmaṇi iti atas  na pariṇāma paratvam asya iti arthaḥ tad ananya tvam iti asya sūtrasya pratijñā virodham śruti virodham ca codayati kūṭastha brahma ātma vādina iti pariharati na avidyā ātmaka iti nāma ca rūpam ca te eva bījam tasya vyākaraṇam kārya prapañcaḥ tad apekṣa tvāt aiśvaryasya etad uktam bhavati na tāttvikam aiśvaryam sarvajña tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ kintva vidyā upādhikam iti tad āśrayam pratijñā sūtram tattva āśrayam ti tad ananyatva sūtram tena avirodhaḥ sugamam anyat  bhāve ca upalabdheḥ kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā ca upalambhaḥ ca tasmin kāryasya upalabdheḥ bhāvāt ca etad uktam bhavati viṣaya padam viṣaya viṣayi param viṣayi padam api viṣayi viṣaya param tena kāraṇa upalambha bhāvayoḥ upādeya upalambha bhāvāt iti sūtra arthaḥ saṃpadyate tathā ca prabhā rūpa anu viruddha bodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ na api vahni bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi bhāva abhāvena dhūma bhedena iti siddham bhavati tatra yathā ukta hetoḥ eka deśa abhidhānena upakramate bhāṣya kāraḥ itas ca kāraṇāt ananya tvam bheda abhāvaḥ kāryasya yad kāraṇam yasmāt kāraṇāt  bhāva eva kāraṇasya iti asya vyatireka mukhena gamaka tvam āha na ca niyamena iti kākatālīya nyāyena anya bhāve anyat upalabhyate na tu niyamena iti arthaḥ hetu viśeṣaṇāya vyabhicāram codayati nanu anyasya bhāve api iti eka deśi matena pariharati na iti ucyata iti śaṅkayā eka deśi parihāram dūṣayitvā parama artha parihāram āha atha iti tad anena hetu viśeṣaṇam uktam pāṭhā antareṇa idam eva sūtram vyācaṣṭe na kevalam śabdāt eva iti paṭa iti pratyakṣa buddhyā tantava eva ātānavitāna avasthā ālambyante na tu tad atiriktaḥ paṭaḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyate eka tvam tu tantūnām eka prāvaraṇa lakṣaṇa artha kriyā avacchedāt bahūnām api yathā eka deśa kāla avacchinnā dhava khadira palāśa ādayaḥ  bahavaḥ  api vanam iti artha kriyāyām ca pratyekam asamarthā api anārabhya eva artha antaram kiñcid militāḥ kurvantaḥ  dṛśyante yathā grāvāṇa ukha ādhāraṇam ekam evam anārabhya eva artha antaram tantavaḥ  militāḥ prāvaraṇam ekam kariṣyanti na ca samavāyāt bhinnayoḥ api bheda anavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama anyonya āśraya tvāt bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyāt ca bhedaḥ na ca bhede sādhana antaram asti artha kriyā vyapadeśa bhedayoḥ abhede api upapatteḥ iti upāditam tasmāt yad kiñcid etam anayā ca diśā mūla kāraṇam brahmā eva paramārtha sat  avāntara kāraṇāni ca tanu ādayaḥ sarve anirvācyā eva iti āha tathā ca tantuṣu iti sattvācat ca avarasya vibhajate itas ca iti na kevalam śrutiḥ upapattiḥ ca atra bhavati yad ca yadā ātmanā iti na hi tailam sikata ātmanā sikatāyām asti yathā ghaṭaḥ  asti mṛdi mṛdā ātmanā pratyutpannaḥ  hi ghaṭaḥ  mṛdā ātmanā upalabhyate na evam pratyutpannam tailam sikata ātmanā tena yathā sikatāyāḥ tailam na jāyata evam ātmanaḥ  api jaganna jāyeta jāyate ca tasmāt ātma ātmanā āsīt iti gamyate upapatti antaram āha yathā kāraṇam brahma iti yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātu asau kkacid paṭa u bhavati evam sat api sarvatra sarvadā sat eva na tu kkacid kadācid asat bhavitum arhati iti upapāditam adhastāt tasmāt kāryam triṣu api kāleṣu sat eva sattvam ced  kim atas  yadi evam iti ata āha ekam ca punar iti sattvam ca ekam kārya kāraṇayoḥ na hi prativyakti sattvam bhidyate tatas ca abhinna sattā an anya tvāt ete api mithas  na bhidyete iti na ca tābhyām ananya tvāt sattvasya eva bheda iti yuktam tathā sati hi sattvasya samāropitatva prasaṅgaḥ tatra bheda abhedayoḥ anyatara samāra upakalpanāyām kim tāttvika abheda upādāna abheda kalpanāḥ tu āhaḥ tāttvika bheda upādāna abheda kalpanā iti vayam tu paśyāmaḥ  bheda grahasya pratiyogi graha pekṣa tvāt bheda graham antareṇa ca pratiyogi graha saṃbhavāt anyonya saṃśraya āpatteḥ abheda grahasya ca nirapekṣa tayā tad anupapatteḥ ekaika āśraya tvāt ca bhedasya eka abhāve tad anupapatteḥ abheda graha upādānā eva bheda kalpanā iti sarva bhava dātam asat vyapadeśāt na iti ced na dharma antareṇa vākya śeṣāt  vyākṛtatva avyākṛta tve ca dharma avanirvacanīyau sūtram etad nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam yukteḥ śabda antarāt ca atiśayavat tvāt prāc avasthāyā iti atiśayaḥ  hi dharmaḥ  na asati atiśayavati kārye bhavitum arhati iti nanu na kāryasya atiśayaḥ  niyama hetuḥ api tu kāraṇasya śakti bhedaḥ sa ca asati api kārye kāraṇasya sattvāt san  eva ityata āha śaktiḥ ca iti na anyā kārya kāraṇābhyām na api asatī kārya ātmanā iti yojanā apica kārya kāraṇayoḥ iti yadi api abhāvāt ca upalabdheḥ iti atra ayam artha uktaḥ tathā api samavāya dūṣaṇāya punar avatāritaḥ anabhyupagamyamāne ca samavāyasya samavāyibhyām saṃbandhe viccheda prasaṅgaḥ  avayava avayavi dravya guṇa ādīnām mithas  na hi asaṃbaddhaḥ samavāyibhyām samavāyaḥ samavāyinau saṃbandhayā ut iti śaṅkate atha samavāyaḥ svayam iti yathā hi sattva ayoga adravya guṇa karmāṇi santi sattvam tu svabhāvata eva sat iti na sattva antara yogam apekṣate tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyām saṃbaddhum na saṃbandha antara yogam apekṣate svayam saṃbandha rūpa tvāt iti tad etad siddhānta antara virodha āpādanena nirākaroti saṃyogaḥ  api tarhi iti na ca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt  kāryasya ca samavāyi kāraṇa adhīna janma tvāt  asamavāye ca tad anupapatteḥ samavāya kalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam aja saṃyoge tad abhāva prasaṅgāt  api ca saṃbandhya dhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyaḥ  yathā saṃbandhi dvaya bhede na bhidyate tad nāśe ca na naśyati api tu nitya eka evam saṃyogaḥ  api bhavet  tatas  kaḥ  doṣaḥ atha etad prasaṅga bhiyā saṃyogavat samavāyaḥ  api pratisaṃbandhi mithunam bhidyate ca anityaḥ ca iti abhyupeyate tathā sati yathā ekasmāt nimitta kāraṇāt eva jāyata evam saṃyogaḥ  api nimitta kāraṇāt eva janiṣyata iti samānam tādātmya pratīteḥ ca iti saṃbandha avagame hi saṃbandha kalpanā bījam na tādātmya avagamaḥ tasya nānātva eka āśraya saṃbandha virodhāt iti vṛtti vikalpena avayava atiriktam avayavinam dūṣayati kathañca kāryam iti samasta iti madhya para bhāgayoḥ arvāga bhāga vyavahita tvāt atha samasta avayava vyāsaṅgī api katipaya avayava sthānaḥ  grahīṣyata iti ata āha na hi bahutvam iti atha avayavaśa iti bahutva saṃkhyā hi sva rūpeṇa eva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate iti ekam asaṃkhyeya agrahaṇe api na gṛhyate samasta vyāsaṅgi tvāt tad rūpasya avayavī tu na sva rūpeṇa avayavān vyāpnotim api tu avayavaśas  tena yathā sūtram avayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvan na samasta kusuma grahaṇam apekṣate katipaya kusuma sthānasya api tasya upalabdheḥ evam avayavī api iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti tadā api iti śaṅkate gaḥtva ādivat iti nirākaroti na iti yadi api gaḥ tvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na parama artha santaḥ tathā ca kkā asya pratyeka parisamāptiḥ iti tathā api abhyupetya idam uditam iti mantavyam akartṛkā yatas  atas  nirātmikā syāt  kāraṇa abhāve hi kāryam anutpannam kiṃnāma bhavet  atas  nirātmaka tvam iti arthaḥ yadi ucyeta ghaṭa śabdaḥ tad avayaveṣu vyāpāra āviṣṭa tayā pūrva aparībhāvam āpanneṣu ghaṭopajana abhimukheṣu tādarthya nimittāt upacārāt prayujyate teṣām ca siddha tvena kartṛ tvam asti iti upapadyate ghaṭaḥ  bhavati iti prayoga iti ata āha ghaṭasya ca utpattiḥ ucyamānā iti utpādanā hi siddhānām kapāla kulāla ādīnām vyāpāraḥ  na utpattiḥ na ca utpādanā eva utpattiḥ prayojya prayojaka vyāpārayoḥ bhedāt  abhede vā ghaṭam utpāda yati itivat ghaṭam utpadyata iti api prasaṅgāt  tasmāt  karoti kārayatyoḥ iva ghaṭa gocarayoḥ bhṛtya svāmi samavetayoḥ utpatti utpādanayoḥ adhiṣṭhāna bhedaḥ  abhyupetavyaḥ tatra kapāsa kulāla ādīnām siddhānām utpādana adhiṣṭhānānām na utpatti adhiṣṭhāna tvam asti iti pāriśeṣyāt ghaṭa eva sādhya utpatteḥ adhiṣṭhānam eṣitavyaḥ na cāsau  asan  adhiṣṭhānam bhavitum arhati iti sattvam asya abhyupeyam evañca ghaṭaḥ  bhavatī tila ghaṭa vyāpārasya dhātu upātta tvāt tatra asya kartṛ tvam upapadyate taṇḍulānām iva satām viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti śaṅkate atha sva kāraṇa sattā saṃbandha eva utpattiḥ iti etad uktam bhavati na utpattiḥ nāma kaścid vyāpāraḥ yena asiddhasya katham atra kartṛ tvam iti anuyujyeta kintu sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ sva satta sva aya u vā sa ca asataḥ  api aviruddha iti saḥ  api asataḥ  anupapanna iti āha katham alabdha ātmakam iti api ca prāk utpatteḥ asattvam kāryaḥ ta iti kārya abhāvasya bhāvena maryādā karaṇa nupapannam iti āha abhāvasya ca iti syāt etad  atyanta abhāvasya bandhyā sutasya mā bhūt maryāt anupākhyaḥ  hi saḥ ghaṭa prāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭena upākhyeyasya asti maryādā iti ata āha yadi bandhyā putraḥ kāraka vyāpārāt iti uktam etad adhastāt yathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati evam asat api sanna bhavati iti tasmāt mṛd piṇḍe ghaṭasya asattve atyanta asattvam eva iti atra asat kārya vādī codayati nanu evam sati iti prāk  prasiddham api kāryam kadācid kāraṇena yojayitum vyāpāror athavā anmavedityata āha tad ananya tvāt ca iti pariharati na eṣa doṣa iti uktam etad yathā bhujaṅga tattvam na rajjoḥ bhidyate rajjuḥ eva hi tad  kālpanikaḥ tu bhedaḥ evam vastutas  kārya tattvam na kāraṇāt bhidyate kāraṇa svarūpam eva hi tad  anirvācyam tu kārya rūpam bhinnam iva abhinnam iva ca avabhāsata iti tad idam uktam vastu avanyatvam iti vastutas  paramārtha taḥ  anya tvam na viśeṣa darśana mātrāt bhavati sāṃvyāvahārike tu kathañcid tattva anya tve bhavata eva uti arthaḥ anayā eva hi diśā eṣa saṃdarbhaḥ  yojyaḥ asat kārya vādinam prati dūṣaṇa antaram āha yasya punar iti kāryasya kāraṇa abhede sa viṣaya tvam kāraka vyāpārasya syāt na anyathā iti arthaḥ mūla kāraṇam brahma śabda antarāt ca iti sūtra  ayavam avārya vyācaṣṭe evam yukteḥ kāryasya iti atirohita artham paṭavat ca yathā ca prāṇa ādi iti ca sūtre nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte itara vyapadeśāt hitākaraṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ yadi api śārīrāt paramātmanaḥ  bhedam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ tathā api abhedam api darśayanti śrutayaḥ bahvayaḥ na ca bheda abhedau  ekatra samavetau virodhāt  na ca bhedaḥ tāttvika iti uktam tasmāt  paramātmanaḥ sarva jñān na śārīraḥ tattvataḥ  bhidyate sa eva tu avidyā upadhāna bhedāt ghaṭa karaka ādi ākāśavat bhedena prathate upahitam ca asya rūpam śārīraḥ tena mā nāma jīvāḥ paramātma tām ātmanaḥ  anubhūvan paramātmā tu tān ātmanaḥ  abhinnān anubhavati ananubhave sārvajñya vyāghātaḥ tathā ca ayam jīvān badhnan  ātmānam eva badhnīyāt  tatra idam uktam na hi kaścid aparatantraḥ  bandhanāgāram ātmanaḥ kṛtvā anupraviśati ityādi tasmāt na cetana kāraṇam jagat iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikam tu bheda nirdeśāt  satya mayam paramātmana sarvajña tvāt yathā jīvān vastuta ātmanaḥ  abhinnān paśyati paśyati evam na bhāvata eṣām sukha duḥkha ādi vedanā saṅga ustya vidyā vaśāt tveṣām tadvat abhimāna iti tathā ca teṣām sukha duḥkha ādi vedanāyām api aham udāsīna iti na teṣām bandhana āgāra niveśe api astikṣatiḥ kācid mama iti na hita akaraṇa ādi doṣa āpattiḥ iti rāddha antar  tad idam uktam apica yadā tad tvam asi iti apicā iti caḥ pūrva upapatti sāhityam dyotayati na upapatti antara tām syāt etad  yadi brahma viṣa rtaḥ  jagat  hanta sarvasya eva jīva vacaitanya prasaṅga iti ata āha aśma ādivat ca tad anupapattiḥ atirohita arthena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam upasaṃhāra darśanāt na iti ced na kṣīravat hi brahma khalu ekam advitīya tayā para anapekṣam krameṇa utpadyamānasya jagataḥ  vivadha vicitra rūpasya upādānam upeyate tad anupapannam na hi eka rūpāt kārya bhedaḥ  bhavitum arhati tasya ākasmikatva prasaṅgāt kāraṇa bhedaḥ  hi kārya bheda hetuḥ kṣīra bīja ādi bheda adṛśi aṅkura ahi kārya bheda darśanāt na cākramāt kāraṇāt kārya kramaḥ  jujyataḥ  samarthasya kṣepā yogāt advitīya tayā ca kramavat tad sahakāri samavadhānāpapatteḥ tad idam uktam iha hi loka iti ekaikam mṛd ādi kārakam teṣām tu sāmagryam sādhanam tatas  hi kāryam sādhayati eva tasmāt na advitīyam brahma jagat upādānam iti prāpte ucyate kṣīravat hi idam tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ  vyācaṣṭām kim tāttvikam asya rūpam apekṣyem ucyate uta anādi nāma rūpa bīja sahitam kālpanikam sārvajñyam sarva śakti tvam tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kim nāma tatas  advitīyāt asahāyāt upajāyate na hi tasya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvasya vastu satkāryam asti tathā ca śrutiḥ ana tasya kāryam karaṇam ca vidyate iti uttarasmin  tu kalpe yadi kulāla ādivat atyanta vyatirikta sahakāri kāraṇa abhāvāt anupādāna tvam sādhyate tatas  kṣīra ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ te api hi bāhya cetanā ādi kāraṇa anapekṣā eva kāla parivaśena svata eva pariṇāma antaram āsādayanti atra antara kāraṇa anapekṣa tvam hetuḥ kriyate tad asiddham anirvācya nāma rūpa bīja sahāya tvāt tathā ca śrutiḥ amāyām tu prakṛtim vidyāt māyinam ti maheśvaram iti kārya krameṇa utparipākaḥ  api kramavān unneyaḥ ekasmāt api ca vicitra śakteḥ kāraṇāt aneka kārya utpādaḥ  dṛśyate yathā ekasmāt vahneḥ dāha pākau  ekasmāt vā karmaṇaḥ saṃyoga vibhāga saṃskārāḥ yadi tu cetana tve sati iti viśeṣa mānna kṣīra ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ dṛṣṭā hi kulāla ādayaḥ  bāhya mṛdā ādi apekṣāḥ cetanam ca brahma iti tatra idam upatiṣṭhate deva ādivat api loke lokyate anena iti lokaḥ śabda eva tasmin kṛtsna prasaktiḥ niravayavatva śabda kopaḥ  vā nanu na brahmaṇaḥ tattvataḥ pariṇāmaḥ  yena kārtsnya bhāga vikalpena ākṣipyeta avidyā kalpitena tu nāma rūpa lakṣaṇena rūpa bhedena vyākṛta avyākṛta ātmanā tattva anya tvābhyām anirvacanīyena pariṇāma ādi vyavahāra āspada tvam brahma pratipadyate na ca kalpitam rūpam vastu spṛśati na hi candramasi taimirikasya dvitva kalpanā candramasaḥ  dvi tvam āvahati tad anupapattyā vā candramasaḥ  anupapattiḥ tasmāt avāstavī pariṇāma kalpanā anupapadyamānā api na paramārtha sataḥ brahmaṇaḥ  anupapattim āvahati tasmāt pūrva pakṣa abhāvāt anārabhyam idam adhikaraṇam iti ata āha cetanam ekam  yadi api śruti śatāt aikāntikā dvaita pratipādana parāt pariṇāmaḥ  vastu tas  niṣiddhaḥ tathā api kṣīra ādi devatā dṛṣṭāntena punar tad vāstavatva prasaṅgam pūrva pakṣa upapattyā sarvathā ayam pakṣaḥ  na ghaṭayitum śakyata iti apabādhya śruteḥ tu śabdāmūla tvāt  aātmani ca evaṃ avicitrāḥ ca hi iti sūtrābhyām vivarta dṛḍhīkaraṇena ekāntikā dvaya lakṣaṇaḥ śruti arthaḥ pariśodhyata iti arthaḥ tasmāt asti avikṛtam brahma tattvataḥ nanu śabdena pi iti codyama vidyā kalpitatva udghaṭānāya na hi niravayavatu asā avayava tvābhyām vidha antaram asti eka niṣedhasya itara vidhāna antarīyaka tvāt tena prakāra antara abhāvāt niravayavatu asā avayava tvayoḥ ca prakārayoḥ anupapatteḥ grāva plavana ādi arthavādavat apramāṇam śabdaḥ syāt iti codya arthaḥ parihāraḥ sugamaḥ ātmani ca evam vicitrāḥ ca hi anena sphuṭitaḥ  māyā vādaḥ svapna dṛś ātmā hi manasā eva svarūpa anupamardena ratha ādīn sṛjati sva pakṣa doṣāt ca codayati nanu na eva iti para harati na evan jātīyakena iti yadi api samudāyaḥ sa avayavaḥ tathā api pratyekam sattva āt ayaḥ  niravayavāḥ na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sattva mātram pariṇamate na rajaḥ tamasī iti sarveṣām saṃbhūya pariṇāma abhyupagamāt pratyekam ca anavayavānām kṛtsna pariṇāme mūla uccheda prasaṅgaḥ eka deśa pariṇāme vā sāvayava tvam aniṣṭam prasajyeta tathā guṇa vādinaḥ  api iti vaiśeṣikāṇām hi aṇubhyām saṃyujya dvi aṇukam ekam ārabhyate taiḥ tribhiḥ dvi aṇukaiḥ tri aṇukam ekam ārabhyata iti prakriyā tatra gvayoḥ aṇvoḥ anavayavayoḥ saṃyogaḥ tau  aṇū vyāpnuyāt  avyāpnuvanvā tatra na varteta na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīm tatra vartate na vartate ca iti tathā ca upari adhas pārśva sthāḥ ṣaṣ api paramāṇavaḥ samāna deśā iti prathima anupapatteḥ aṇu mātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta avyāpane vā ṣaṣ avayavaḥ paramāṇuḥ syāt iti anavayavatva vyākopaḥ aśakyam ca sāvayava tvam upetum tathā sati anantā avayava tvena sumeru rāja sarṣapayoḥ samāna parimāṇatva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt  samānaḥ  doṣaḥ āpāta mātreṇa sāmyam uktam paramārthataḥ tu bhāvikam pariṇāmam vā karya kāraṇa bhāvam vecchatām eṣa durvāraḥ  doṣaḥ  na punar asmākam māyā vādinām iti āha parihṛtaḥ tu iti vicitra śakti tvam uktam brahmaṇa tatra śruti upanyāsa param sūtram sarva upetā ca tad darśanāt  etad ākṣepa samādhāna param sūtram vikaraṇa tvāt na iti ced tad uktam kulāla ādibhyaḥ tāvat bāhya karaṇa apekṣebhyaḥ  deva ādīnām bāhyanapekṣāṇām āntara karaṇa apekṣa sṛṣṭhīnām pramāṇena dṛṣṭaḥ  yathā viśeṣaḥ  na apahnotum śakyaḥ yathā tu jāgrat sṛṣṭeḥ bāhya karaṇa apekṣāyāḥ tad anapekṣa antara karaṇa mātra sādhyā dṛṣṭā svapne ratha ādi sṛṣṭiḥ aśakyā apahnotum evam sarva śakteḥ parasya devatāyāḥ  āntara karaṇa anapekṣāyā jagat sarjanam śrūyamāṇam na sāmānyatas  dṛṣṭa mātreṇa apahnavam arhati iti na pa yojanavat tvāt  na tāvat unmattavat asya mati vibhramāt jagat prakriyā bhrāntasya sarvajñatva anupapatteḥ tasmāt  prekṣavata anena jagat  kartavyam prekṣāvataḥ ca pravṛttiḥ sva para hita ahita prāpti parihāra prayojanā satī na aprayojana alpa āyāsā api saṃbhavati kim punar aparimeya anekavidha uccāvaca prapañca jagat vibhrama viracanā mahā prayāsā ata eva līlā api parāḥ tā alpa āyāsa sādhyā hi sā na ca iyam api aprayojanā tasyāḥ  api sukha prayojanavat tvāt  tādarthyena vā prakṛttau tad abhāve kṛtārthatva anupapatteḥ pareṣām ca upakāryāṇām abhāvena tad upakārāyā api pravṛtteḥ ayogāt  tasmāt  prekṣāvat pravṛttiḥ prayojanavat tayā vyāptā tad abhāve anupapannā brahma upāda āna tām jagataḥ pratikṣipati iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate lokavat tu līlā kaivalyam bhavet etad evam yadi prekṣāvat pravṛttiḥ prayojanavat tayā vyāptā bhavet  tatas tad nivṛttau nivarteta śiṃśāpātvam iva vṛkṣa tā nivṛttau na tu etad asti prekṣāvatām ananu saṃhita prayojanānām api yādṛścikīṣu kriyāsu pravṛtti darśanāt  anyathā ana kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām iti dharma sūtra kṛtām pratiṣedhaḥ  nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta na ca unmattān pratyetat sūtram arthavat  teṣām tad artha bodha tad anuṣṭhāna anupapatteḥ api ca adṛṣṭa hetuka utpattikī śvāsa praśvāsa lakṣaṇā prekṣāvatām kriyā prayojana anusaṃdhānam antareṇa dṛṣṭā na ca asyām cetanasya api caitanyam anupayogi saṃprasāde api bhāvāt iti yuktam prājñasya api caitanya apracyuteḥ anyathā mṛta śarīre api śvāsa praśvāsa pravṛtti prasaṅgāt  yathā ca sva artha para artha saṃpad āsādita samasta kāmānām kṛtakṛtyatayānā kūla manasā āmakāmānām eva līlā mātrāt sati api anuniṣpādini prayojane na eva tad uddeśena pravṛttiḥ evam brahmaṇaḥ  api jagat sarjane pravṛttiḥ na anupapannā dṛṣṭam ca yad alpa bala vīrya buddhinām aśakyam ati duṣkaram vā tad anyeṣām analpa bala vīrya buddhīnām suśakam īṣat karam vā na hi vānaraiḥ māruti prabhṛtibhiḥ nagaiḥ na baddhaḥ  nīra nidhiḥ aga adhaḥ mahāsattvānām na ca eṣa pārthena śilīmukhaiḥ na baddhaḥ na ca ayam na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayā iva kalaśa yoninā mahā muninā na ca adya api na dṛśyante līlā mātra vinirmitāni mahā prāsāda pramada vanāni śrīmat nṛga narendrāṇām anyeṣām manasā api duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam tasmāt upapannam yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvāt vā līlayā vā jagat sarjanam bhagavataḥ  maheśvarasya iti api ca na iyam pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiḥ yena anuyujyeta prayojanam api tu anādya vidyā nibandhanā avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kārya unmukhī na prayojanam apekṣate na hi dvi candra alāta cakra gandharvanagara ādi vibhramāḥ samuddiṣṭa prayojanā bhavanti na ca tad kāryā vismaya bhaya kampa ādayaḥ sva utpattau prayojanam apekṣante sā ca caitanya  churitā jagat utpāda hetuḥ utu cetanaḥ jagadyoniḥ ākhyāyata iti āha na ca iyam parama artha viṣaya iti api ca na brahma jagat kāraṇam api tad tayā vivakṣanti āgamā api tu jagati brahma ātma bhāvam tathā ca sṛṣṭeḥ avivakṣāyām tad āśrayaḥ  doṣaḥ  nirviṣaya eva iti āśayena āha brahma ātma bhāva iti vaiṣamyaneḥ ghṛṇye na sa apekṣa tvāt tathā hi darśayati atirohitaḥ  atra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ uttaraḥ tu ucyate uccāvaca madhyama sukha duḥkha bhedavat prāṇabhṛt prapañcam ca sukha duḥkha kāraṇam sudhā viṣa ādi ca anekavidham viracayataḥ prāṇabhṛt bheda upātta pāpa puṇya karma āśaya sahāyasya atrabhavataḥ parameśvarasya na caiṣamya naiḥ ghaṇye prasajyete na hi sabhyaḥ sabhāyām niyuktaḥ  yukta vādinam yukta vādyasi iti ca ayukta vādinam ayukta vādyasi iti bruvāṇa sabhāpatiḥ vā yukta vādinam anugṛhṇanna yukta vādinam ca nigṛhṇan  anuktaḥ  dviṣṭaḥ  vā bhavati api tu madhyastha iti vīta rāga dveṣa iti ca ākhyāyate tadvat īśvaraḥ puṇya karmāṇam anugṛhṇannapuṇya karmāṇam ca nigṛhṇan madhyastha eva na amadhya sthaḥ evam hi asau  amadhya sthaḥ sya āt ya kalyāṇa kāriṇam anugṛhṇīyāt kalyāṇa kāriṇam ca nigṛhṇīyāt  na tu etad asti tasmāt na vaiṣamya doṣaḥ ata eva na nairghṛṇyam api saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ sa hi prāṇabhṛt karma āśayānām vṛtti nirodha samayaḥ tamita laṅghayan  ayam ayukta kārī syāt  na ca karma apekṣāyām īśvarasya aiśvarya vyāghātaḥ na hi sevā ādi karma bheda apekṣaḥ phala bheda pradaḥ prabhuḥ aprabhuḥ bhavati na ca aeṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyaḥ  lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa eva asādhu karma kārayati tam yam adhaḥ niniṣate iti śruteḥ īśvara eṣa dveṣa pakṣapātābhyām sādhu asādhunī karmaṇī kārayitvā svargam narakam vā lokam nayati tasmāt vaiṣamya doṣa prasaṅga at na īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti vācyam virodhāt  yasmāt  karma kārayitvā īśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukha duḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti śruteḥ avagamyate tasmāt na sṛjati iti viruddham abhidhīyate na ca vaiṣamya mātram atra brūmaḥ  na tu īśvara kāraṇa tvam vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam kim atas  yadi evam tasmāt īśvarasya sa vāsana kleśa aparāmarśam abhivadantīnām bhūyasīnām śrutīnām anugrahāya unninīṣate adhas  ninīṣata iti etad api tad jātīya pūrva karma abhyāsa vaśāt prāṇina iti evam na iyam yathā āhuḥ ajanma janma yad abhyastam dānamam adhyayanam tapaḥ tena eva abhyāsa yogena tad ca eva abhyasate naraḥ iti abhyupetya ca sṛṣṭeḥ tāttvika tvam idam uktam anirvācyā tu sṛṣṭiḥ iti na prasmartavyam atra api tathā ca māyā kārasya iva aṅga sākalya vaikalya bedena vicitrān prāṇinaḥ  darśayataḥ  na vaiṣamya doṣaḥ sahasā saṃharataḥ  vā na nairdhṛṇyam evam asya api bhagavataḥ  vividha vicitra prapañcam anirvācyam viśvam darśayataḥ saṃharataḥ ca svabhāvāt vā līlayā vā na kaścid doṣaḥ iti sthite śaṅkā parihāra param sūtram na karma avibhāgāt iti ced nānā ādi tvāt śaṅkottare atirohita arthena bhāṣya granthena vyākhyāte anādi tvāt iti siddhavat uktam tad sādhana artham sūtram upapadyate ca api upalabhyate ca akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tad phalam bhoktāram adhyāgacchet  tathā ca vidhi niṣedha śāstram anarthakam bhavet  pravṛtti nivṛtti abhāvāt iti mokṣa śāstrasya ca uktam ānarthakyam na ca avidyā kevala iti laya abhiprāyam vikṣepa lakṣaṇa avidyā saṃskāraḥ tu kāryatvāt sva utpattau pūrvam vikṣepam apekṣate vikṣepaḥ ca mithyā pratyayaḥ moha apara nāmā puṇyā puṇya pravṛtti hetu bhūta rāga dveṣa nidānam sa ca rāga ādibiḥ sahitaḥ sva kāryaiḥ na śarīram sukha duḥkha bhoga āyatanam antareṇa saṃbhavati na ca rāgāt vaiṣau  antareṇa ka ma na ca bhoga sahitam moham antareṇa rāga dveṣau na ca pūrva śarīram antareṇa moha ādiḥ iti pūrva pūrva śarīra apekṣaḥ  moha ādiḥ evam pūrva pūrva moha ādi apekṣam pūrva pūrva śarīram iti anādita eva atra bhagavatī cittam anākulayati tad etad āha rāga ādi kleśa vāsanā kṣipta karma apekṣā tu avidyā vaiṣamya karī syāt iti rāgāt veṣa mohā rāga ādayaḥ ta eva hi puruṣam sa āsāra duḥkham anubhāvya kleśayanti iti kleśāḥ teṣām vāsanāḥ karma parvṛtti anuguṇāḥ tābhiḥ ākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tad apekṣā laya lakṣaṇā avidyā syāt etad  bhaviṣyatā api vyapadeśaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ  yathā apuroḍāśa kapālena tuṣān upavapati iti ata āha na ca dhārayiṣyati iti ata iti tad evam anādi tve siddhe asat eva somya idam agra āsīt ekam eva advitīyam iti prāk  sṛṣṭeḥ avibhāga avadhāram am samudācarat rūpa rāga ādi niṣedha param na punar etān prasuptān api apākaroti iti sarvam avadātam sarva dharma upapatteḥ ca atra sarvajñam iti dṛśyate sarvasya cetana adhiṣṭhitasya eva loke pravṛttiḥ iti loka anusāraḥ  darśitaḥ sarva śakti iti sarvasya jagata upādānakāraṇam nimitta kāraṇam ca iti upapāditam mahā māyam iti sarva anupapatti śaṅkā parāḥ tā tasmāt jagat kāraṇam brahma iti siddham iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite bhagavat pāda śārīrika bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām dvitīyasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ iti dvitīya adhyāyasya sāṃkhya āyoga kāraṇa dādi smṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhya ādi prayukta tarkaiḥ ca vedānta samanvaya virodha parihāra ākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ dvitīya adhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam syāt etad  iha hi pāde kha tantrā veda nirapekṣāḥ pradhāna ādi siddhi viṣayāḥ sāṃkhya ādi yuktayaḥ nirākariṣyante tad ayuktam aśāstra aṅga tvāt na hi idam śāstram ucchṛṅkhala tarka śāstravat pravṛttam api tu vedānta vākyāni brahma parāṇi iti pūrva pakṣa uttara pakṣābhyām viniścetum tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ śuṣka tarka vatkha tantra yukti nirākaraṇasya ityata āha yadi api idam vedānta vākyānām iti na hi vedānta vākyāni nirṇetavyāni iti nirṇīyante kintu mokṣamāṇānām tattva jñāna utpādanāya yathā ca vedānta vākyebhyaḥ  jagat upādānam brahma avagamyate evam sāṃkhya ādi anumānebhyaḥ pradhāna ādi acetanam jagat upādānam avagamyate na ca etad eva cetana upādānam acetana upādānam ca iti samuccetum śakyam virodhāt  na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpaḥ  yujyate na ca āgama bādhita viṣaya tayā anumānam eva na udīyata iti sāṃpratam sarvajña praṇīta tayā sāṃkhya ādi āgamasya veda āgama tulya tvāt tad bhāṣitasya anumānasya pratikṛti siṃha tulya tayā abādhya tvāt tasmāt tad virodhān na brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ  vedāntānām sidhyati iti na tatas tattva jñānam seddhum arhati na ca tattva jñānāt ṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇām api anumānānām ābhāsīkaraṇam iha śāstresaṃgatam eva iti yadi evam tatas  parakīya anumāna nirāsa eva kasmāt prathamam na kṛta iti ata āha vedānta artha nirṇayasya ca iti nanu vīta rāga kathāyām tattva nirṇaya mātram upayujyate na punar para pakṣa adhikṣepaḥ sa hi sa rāga tām āvahati iti codayati nanu mumukṣūṇām iti pariharati bāḍham evam tathā api iti tattva nirṇaya avasānā vīta rāga kathā na ca para pakṣa dūṣaṇam antareṇa tattva nirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartum iti tatu anirṇayāya vīta rāgeṇa api para pakṣaḥ  dūṣyate na tu para pakṣatayā iti na vīta rāga kathā tu vyāhatiḥ iti arthaḥ punarukta tām paricodya samādhatte nanu īkṣateḥ iti tatra saṃkhyā iti yāni hi yena rūpeṇa sthaulya ādā ca saukṣmyāt samanvīyante tāni tad karaṇāni dṛṣṭāni yathā dhaṭādayaḥ  rucaka ādayaḥ ca sthaulya ādā ca saukṣmyāt mṛd suvarṇa anvitāḥ tad karaṇāḥ tathā ca idam bāhyam ādhyātmikam ca bhāva jātam suḥkha duḥkha moha ātmanā anvitam upalabhyate tasmāt tad api suḥkha duḥkha moha ātma sāmānya kāraṇakam bhavitum arhati tatra jagat kāraṇasya yā iyam sukha ātma tā tad sattvam yā duḥkha ātma tā tad rajaḥ yā ca meha ātma tā tad tama iti traiguṇya kāraṇa siddhiḥ tathā hi pratyekam bhāvāḥ traiguṇyavantaḥ  anubhūyante yathā maitra dāreṣu padmāvatyām maitrasya sukham tad  kasya hetoḥ taṃprati satva guṇa samudbhavāt  tad sapatnīnām ca duḥkham tad kasya hetoḥ tāḥ pratyasyā rajaḥ guṇa samudbhavāt  caitrasya tu straiṇasya tām avindataḥ  mohaḥ  viṣādaḥ tad  kasya hetoḥ tam pratyasyāḥ tamaḥ guṇa samudbhavāt padmāvatyā ca sarve bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt sarvam suḥkha duḥkha moha anvitam jagat tad kāraṇam gamyate tad ca triguṇam pradhānam pradhīyate kriyate anena jagat iti pradhīyate nidhīyate asmin pralaya samaye jagat iti vā pradhānam tad ca mṛd suvarṇavat acetanam cetanasya puruṣasya bhoga apavarga lakṣaṇam artham sādhayitum svabhāvata eva pravartate na tu kenacid pravartyate tathā hi āhuḥ apuruṣa artha eva hetuḥ na kenacid kāryate karaṇam iti parimāṇa ādibhiḥ iti ādi grahaṇena aśaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya iti avyakta siddhi hetavaḥ  gṛhyante etān  cepariṣṭāt vyākhāyāya nirākariṣyata iti tad etad pradhāna anumānam dūṣayati tatra vadāma iti yadi tāvat acetanam pradhānam anadhiṣṭhita tvena mṛd suvarṇa ādau dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi vyāpteḥ upalabdheḥ viruddha tvāt  na hi mṛd suvarṇa dāru ādayaḥ kulāla hemakāra ratha kāra ādibhiḥ anadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbha rucaka ratha ādi upādadate tasmāt  kṛtaka tvam iva nityatva sādhanayā prayuktam sādhya viruddhena vyāptam viruddham evam samanvaya ādi cetanā anadhiṣṭhita tve sādhya iti racanā anupapatteḥ iti darśitam yad ucyeta dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī acetanam tāvat upādānam dṛṣṭam tatra yadi api tad cetana prayuktam api dṛśyate tathā api tad prayukta tvam hetoḥ aprayojakam bahis aṅga tvāt  antaraṅgam tu acaitanya mātram upādāna anugatam hetoḥ prayojakam yathā āhuḥ avyāpteḥ ca dṛśyamānāyāḥ kaścid dharmaḥ prayojakaḥ iti tatra āha na ca mṛdā ādi iti svabhāva pratibaddham hi vyāptam vyāpakam avagamayati sa ca svabhāva pratibandhaḥ śaṅkita samāropita upādhi nirāse sati niścīyate tad niścayaḥ ca anvaya vyatirekayoḥ āyatate tau ca anvaya vyatirekau na tathā upādāna ācaitanye yathā upādāna ācaitanye yathā cetana prayukta tve ati parisphuṭau tad alam atra antaraṅga tvena iti bhāvaḥ evam api cetana prayukta tvam na abhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ  bhavet  pratyuta śrutiḥ anuguṇatarātra iti āha na ca evam sati iti cakāreṇa suḥkha duḥkha ādi samanvaya lakṣaṇasya hetoḥ asiddha tvam samuccinoti iti āha anvaya ādi anupapatteḥ ca iti āntarāḥ khalu amī suḥkha duḥkha moha viṣādā bāhyebhyaḥ candana ādibhyaḥ  ati vicchinna pratyaya pravedanīyebhyaḥ  vyatiriktā adhyakṣam īkṣyante yadi punar eta eva suḥkha duḥkha ādi svabhāvā bhaveyuḥ tatas svarūpatva ādhemante api candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt  na hi candanaḥ kadācid acandanaḥ tathā nidāgheṣu api kuṅkuma paṅkaḥ sukhaḥ  bhavet  na hi asau kadācid akuṅkuma paṅka iti evam kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣya ādīnām api prāṇabhṛtām sukhaḥ syāt  na hi asau kāṃścid pratyeva kaṇṭaka iti tasmāt asukha ādi svabhāvā api candana kuṅkuma ādayaḥ  jāti kāla avastha ādi apekṣayā sukha duḥkha ādi hetavaḥ  na tu svayam sukha ādi svabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam tasmāt sukha ādi rūpa samanvayaḥ  bhāvānām asiddha iti na anena tad rūpam kāraṇam avyaktam unnīyata iti tad idam uktam śabda ādi aviśeṣe api ca bhāvanā viśeṣāt iti bhāvanā vāsanā saṃskāraḥ tad viśeṣāt karabhajanma saṃvartakam hi karma kara bha ucitām eva bhāvanām abhivyaniktim yathā asmai kaṇṭakā eva rocante evam anyatra api draṣṭavyam parimāṇāt iti sāṃkhyīyam hetum upanyasyati tathā parimitānām bhedānām iti saṃsarga pūrvaka tve hi saṃsargasya ekasmin  advaye asaṃbhavān nānātva eka artha samavetasya nānā karaṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni tāni ca sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi eva iti bhāvaḥ tad etad parimita tvam sāṃkhyīya rāddha anta ālocanena anaikāntikam iti dūṣayati sattva rajaḥ tamasām iti yadi tāvat parimita tvam iyattā sā nabhasaḥ  api na asti iti avyāpakaḥ  hetuḥ parimāṇāt iti atha na yojana ādi mita tvam parimāṇam iyat tām nabhasaḥ  brūmaḥ kintva vyāpitām avyāpi ca nabhaḥ tanmātra ādeḥ na hi kāryam kāraṇa vyāpi kintu kāraṇam kārya vyāpi iti parimitam nabhaḥ tanmātra ādi avyāpi tvāt hanta sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi api na parasparam vyāpnuvanti na ca tattva antara pūrvaka tvam eteṣām iti vyabhicāraḥ na hi yathā taiḥ kārya jātam āviṣṭam evam tāni parasparam viśanti mithas  kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt paraspara saṃsargaḥ tu āveśaḥ citi śaktau na asti na hi citi śaṅktiḥ kūṭastha nityā taiḥ saṃsṛjyate tatas ca tad avyāpakā guṇā iti parimitāḥ evam citi śaktiḥ api guṇaiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭā iti sā api parimitā iti anaikāntika tvam parimita tvasya hetoḥ iti tathā kārya kāraṇa vibhāgaḥ  api samanvayavat viruddha iti āha kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu iti pravṛtteḥ ca na kevalam racanā bhedā na cetana adhiṣṭhānam antareṇa bhavanti api tu sāmya avasthāyāḥ pracyutiḥ vaiṣamyam tathā ca yad udbhūtam balīyaḥ tad aṅgī abhibhūtam ca tad anuguṇa tayā sthitam aṅgam evam hi guṇa pradhāna bhāve satyasya mahat ādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ sā api cetana adhiṣṭhānam eva gamayati na hi cetana adhiṣṭhānam antareṇa mṛd piṇḍe pradhāne aṅga bhāvena cakra daṇḍa salila sūtiḥ ādayaḥ  avatiṣṭhante tasmāt pravṛtteḥ api cetana adhiṣṭhāna siddhiḥ iti aśaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca iti ayam api hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyaḥ  viruddha eva iti uktam vakra uktyā atra sāṃkhyaḥ codayati nanu cetanasya api pravṛttiḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ tvayā kila aupaniṣadena asmadhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasya eva anya nirapekṣasya jagat upādāna tvam nimitta tvam ca samarthanīyam tad ayuktam kevalasya cetanasya pravṛtteḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī anupalabdheḥ iti aupaniṣadaḥ tu cetana hetukām tāvat eṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttim abhyupagacchatu paścāt  sva pakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmi iti abhisaṃdhimān āha satyam etad  na kevalasya cetanasya pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā iti sāṃkhya āha na tu acetana saṃyuktasya iti tuśabda aupaniṣada pakṣam vyāvartayati acetana āśraya eva sarvā pravṛttiḥ dṛśyate na tu cetana āśrayā kācid api tasmāt na cetanasya jagat sarjane pravṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ atra aupaniṣadaḥ  gūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ praśna pūrvakam vimṛśati kim punar atra iti atra antare sāṃkhyaḥ  brūte nanu yasmin  iti na tāvat cetanaḥ pravṛti āśrayatayā tad prayojaka tayā vā pratyakṣam īkṣyate kevalam pravṛttiḥ tad āśrayaḥ ca acetanaḥ  deha ratha ādiḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tatra acetanasya pravṛttiḥ tad nimittā eva na tu cetana nimittā sadbhāva mātram tu tatra cetanasya gamyate ratha ādi vailakṣaṇyāt jīvat dehasya na ca sadbhāva mātreṇa kāraṇatva siddhiḥ mā bhūt ākāśa utpattimatām ghaṭa ādīnām nimitta kāraṇam asti hi sarvatra iti tad anena deha atirikte sati api cetane tasya na pravṛttim prati nimitta bhāvaḥ  asti iti uktam yatas ca asya na pravṛtti hetu bhāvaḥ  asti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛtti darśanāt asati ca adarśanāt dehasya eva caitanyam iti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ tathā ca na cit ātma nimittā pravṛttiḥ iti siddham tasmāt na racanāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ vā cit ātma kāraṇatva siddhiḥ jagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati tad abhidhīyate na brūma iti na tāvat  pratyakṣa anumāna āgama siddhaḥ śārīraḥ  vā paramātmā vā asmābhiḥ idānīm sādhanīyaḥ kevalam asya pravṛtti prati kāraṇa tvam vaktavyam tatra mṛta śarīre vā ratha ādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteḥ adarśanāt  tad viparyaye ca pravṛtti darśanāt anvaya vi atirekābhyām cetana hetuka tvam pravṛtteḥ niścīyate na tu cetana sadbhāva mātreṇa yena atiprasaṅgaḥ  bhavet  bhūta caitanikānām api cedana adhiṣṭhānāt acetanānām pravṛttiḥ iti atra avivāda iti āha laukāyatikānām api iti syāt etad  dehaḥ svayam cetanaḥ kara caraṇa ādimān sva vyāpāreṇa pravartayati iti yuktam na tu tad atiriktaḥ kūṭastha nityaḥ cetanaḥ vyāpāra rahitaḥ  jñāna eka svabhāvaḥ pravṛtti abhāvāt  pravartakaḥ  yukta iti codayati nanu tava iti pariharati na ayaskāntavat rūpa ādivat ca iti yathā ca rūpa ādaya iti sāṃkhyānām hi sva deśa sthā rūpa ādaya indriyam vikurvate tena tad indrayamartham prāptam artha ākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ saṃprati ca udakaḥ sva abhiprāyam āviṣkaroti eka tvāt iti yeṣām acetanam cetanam ca asti teṣām etad yujyate vaktum cetana adhiṣṭhitam acetanam pravartata iti yathā yoginām īśvara vādinām yeṣām tu cetanā atiriktam na asti advaita vādinām teṣām pravartya abhāve kam prati pravartaka tvam cetanasya iti arthaḥ pariharati na avidyā iti kāraṇa bhūtayā laya lakṣaṇayā avidyayā prāc sarga upacitena ca vikṣepa saṃskāreṇa yad  pratyupasthāpitam nāma rūpam tad eva māyā tad āveśena asya codyasya asakṛt prayukta tvāt etad uktam bhavati na iyam sṛṣṭiḥ vastu satī yena advaitinaḥ  vastu sataḥ dvitīyasya abhāvāt anuyujyeta kā alpa nikyām tu sṛṣṭau  asti kālpanikam dvitīyam sahāyam māyā mayam yathā āhuḥ asahāyāḥ tādṛśā eva yādṛśī bhavitavya tā iti na ca evam brahma upādānatva vyāghātaḥ brahmaṇa eva māyā āveśena upādāna tvāt tad adhiṣṭhāna tvāt jagat vibhramasya rajata vibhramasya iva śuktikā adhiṣṭhānasya śuktikā upa ādāna tvam iti niravadyam payombuvat ced tatra api yathā payombunoḥ cetanā anadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttiḥ evam pradhānasya api iti śaṅkā arthaḥ tatra api cetana adhiṣṭhita tvam sādhyam na ca sādhyena eva vyabhicāraḥ tathā sati numāna mātra uccheda prasaṅgāt  sarvatra asya sulabha tvāt  na ca asādhyam atra api cetana adhiṣṭhānasya āgama siddha tvāt na ca sa pakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇasya arthaḥ sādhya pakṣe tyupalakṣaṇam sa pakṣa nikṣipta tvāt iti api draṣṭavyam nanu aupa saṃhāra darśanāt iti atra anapekṣasya pravṛttiḥ daśitā iha tu sarvasya cetana apekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kutaḥ na virodha iti ata āha upasaṃhāra darśanāt iti sthūla darśi loka abhiprāya anurodhena tad uktam na tu paramārtha ta iti arthaḥ vyatireka an avasthiteḥ ca anapekṣa tvāt  yadi api sāṃkhyānām api vicitra karma vāsanā vāsitam pradhānam sāmya avasthāyām api tathā api na karma vāsanāḥ sargasya īśate kintu pradhānam eva sva kārye pravartamānam adharma pratibaddham sanna sukha mayīm sṛṣṭim kartum utsahata iti dharmeṇa adharma pratibandhaḥ  apanīyate evam adharmeṇa dharma pratibandhaḥ  apanīyate daḥkha mayyām sṛṣṭau svayam eva ca pradhānam anapekṣya sṛṣṭau pravartate yathā āhuḥ animittam aprayojakam prakṛtīnām varaṇa bhedaḥ tu tatas  kṣetrikavat iti tatas ca pratibandaka apanaya sādhane dharma adharma vāsane api saṃnihite iti āgantoḥ apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt sadā eva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā na tvayam kādācid kaḥ pariṇāma bheda upapadyeta īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāva vaicitryāt vā karma paripāka apekṣasya pravṛtti nivṛttī upapadyete eva iti anyatra abhāvāt ca na tṛṇa ādivat  dhenu upayuktam hi tṛṇa pallava ādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanā anapekṣam kṣīra bhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyam apekṣyate upayoga mātre tad apekṣa tvāt  evam pradhānam api svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtam atra cetanena iti śaṅkā arthaḥ dhenu upayuktasya tṛṇa ādeḥ kṣīra bhāve kim nimitta antara mātram niṣidhyate uta cetanam na tāvat nimitta antaram dhenu deha sthasya audaryasya vahni ādi bhedasya nimitta antarasya saṃbhavāt  buddhi pūrva kārī tu tatra api īśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavati iti śaṅkā nirākaraṇasya arthaḥ tad idam uktam kiñcid daiva saṃpādyam iti abhyupagame api artha abhāvāt puruṣa artha apekṣā bhāva prasaṅgāt  tad idam uktam evam prayojanam api kiñcid nā apekṣiṣyata iti athavā puruṣa artha abhāvāt iti yojyam tad idam uktam tathā api pradhāna pravṛtteḥ prayojanam vivektavyam iti na kevalam tāttvikaḥ  bhogaḥ  anādheya atiśayasya kūṭastha nityasya puruṣasya na saṃbhavati anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca yena hi prayojanena pradhānam pravartitam tad anena kartavyam bhogena ca etad pravartitam iti tam eva kuryāt na mokṣam tena apravartita tvāt iti arthaḥ apavargaḥ ced prāk api iti citeḥ sadā viśuddha tvāt na etasyām jātu karma anubhava vāsanāḥ santi pradhānam tu tāsām anādīnām ādhāraḥ tathā ca pradhāna pravṛtteḥ prāk  citiḥ muktā eva iti na apavarga artham api tad pravṛttiḥ iti śabda ādi anupalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ ca tad artham apravṛtta tvāt pradhā nasya ubhaya artha tā abhyupagame api iti na tāvat apavargaḥ sādhyaḥ tasya pradhāna apravṛtti mātreṇa siddha tvāt  bhoga artham tu pravarteta bhogasya ca sakṛt śabda ādi upalabghi mātrāt eva samāpta tvāt na tad artham punar  pradhānam pravarteta iti ayatna sādhyaḥ  mokṣaḥ syāt  niḥśeṣa śabda ādi upabhogasya ca ānantyena samāpteḥ anupapatteḥ anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ kṛta bhogam api pradhānam āsattva puruṣa anyatā ākhyāteḥ kriyā samabhihāreṇa bhojayati iti ced  atha puruṣa arthāya pravṛttam kimartham sattva puruṣa anya tā ākhyātim karoti apavarga artham iti ced  hantāyām sakṛt śabda ādi upabhogena kṛta prayojanasya pradhānasya nivṛtti mātrāt eva sidhyati iti kṛtam sattva anyatā khyāti pratīkṣaṇena na ca asyāḥ svarūpataḥ puruṣa artha tvam tasmāt ubhaya artham api na pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ upapadyata iti siddhoḥ atha abhāvaḥ sugamam itarat  śaṅkate dṛś śakti iti puruṣaḥ  hi dṛś śaktiḥ sā ca dṛśyam antareṇa ānarthikā syāt  na ca sva ātmani arthavatī sva ātmani vṛtti virodhāt  pradhānam ca sarga śaktiḥ sā ca sarjanīyam antareṇa ānarthikā syāt iti yad pradhānena śabda ādi sṛjyate tad eva dṛś śakteḥ dṛśyam bhavati iti tad ubhaya arthava tvāya sarjanam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ nirākaroti sarga śakti anucchedavat iti yathā hi pradhānasya sarga śaktiḥ ekam puruṣam prati caritārthā api puruṣa antaram prati pravartate anucchedāt  evam dṛś śaktiḥ api tam puruṣam pratyarthavat tvāya anucchedāt sarvadā pravarteta iti anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ sakṛt dṛśya darśanena vā caritārtha tve na bhūyas  pravarteta iti sarveṣām ekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta iti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeta iti puruṣa aśmavat iti ced tathā api na eva doṣāt pracyutiḥ iti śeṣaḥ mā bhūt puruṣa arthasya śakti arthavat tvasya vā pravartaka tvam puruṣa eva dṛś śakti sampannaḥ paṅguḥ iva pravṛtti śakti saṃpannam pradhānam andham iva pravartayiṣyati iti śaṅkā doṣāt anirmokṣam āha abhyupeta hānam tāvat iti na kevalam abhyupeta hānam ayuktam ca etad bhavat darśana ālocanena iti āha katham ca udāsīna iti niṣkriya tve sādhanam nirguṇa tvāt iti śeṣam ati rohita artham aṅgitvā anupapatteḥ ca yadi pradhāna avasthā kūṭastha nityā tatas  na tasyāḥ prācyutiḥ nityatva prasaṅgāt  yathā āhuḥ anityam tam āhuḥ vidvāṃsaḥ  yaḥ svabhāvaḥ  na naśyati iti tad idam uktam sva rūpa prāṇa āśa bhayāt iti atha pariṇāmi nityā yathā āhuḥ ayasmin vikriyamāṇe api yatta tvam na vihanyate tad api nityam iti tatra āha bāhyasya ca iti yad sāmya avasthayā su ciram paryaṇamat katham tad eva asati vilakṣaṇa pratyaya upanipāte vaiṣamyam upaiti anapekṣasya svatas  vā api vaiṣamye na kadācid sāmyam bhavet iti arthaḥ anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt  evam api pradhānasya iti aṅgitvā anupapatti lakṣaṇaḥ  doṣaḥ tāvat na bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartum iti vakṣyāmaḥ abhyupagamya api asya at oṣa tvam ucyata iti arthaḥ saṃprati aṅgitvā anupapattim upapādayati vaiṣamya upagama yogyā api iti vipratiṣedhāt ca asamañjasam kvacid sapta indriyāṇi iti tvac mātram eva hi buddhīndriyam aneka rūpa ādi grahaṇa samartham ekam karmendriyāṇi pañca saptamam ca mana iti sapta indriyāṇi kvacid  trīṇi antaḥkaraṇāni buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ  mana iti kvacid ekam buddhiḥ iti śeṣam ati rohita artham atra āha sāṃkhyaḥ nanu aupaniṣadānām api iti tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ tāvat ekasmin  opapadyate na hi tapiḥ astiḥ iva kartṛstha bhāvakaḥ kintu paciḥ iva karma stha bhāvakaḥ para samaveta kriyā phala śāli ca karma tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpaka samaveta kriyā phala śālinā tāpakāt anyā iva bhavitavyam ananya tve caitrasya iva gantuḥ sva samaveta gamana kriyā phala nagara prāpti śālinaḥ  api akarmatva prasaṅgāt  anya tve tu tapyasya tāpakāt caitra sama veta gamana kriyā phala bhājaḥ  gamyasi iva nagarasya tapyatva upapatti tasmāt abhede tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ  na upapadyata iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha yadi ca iti na hi svabhāvāt bhāvaḥ  viyojitum śakya iti bhāvaḥ jaladheḥ ca vīci ta raṅga phena ādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāva tirobhāva dharmāṇaḥ  na tu taiḥ jaladhiḥ kadācid api mucyate na kevalam karma bhāvāt tapyasya tāpakāt anya tvam api tu anubhava siddham eva iti āha prasiddhaḥ ca ayam iti tathā hi arthaḥ  api upārjana rakṣaṇa kṣaya rāga vṛddhi hiṃsā doṣa darśanāt anarthaḥ san  arthinam dunoti tad arthaḥ  tapyaḥ tāpakaḥ ca arthaḥ tau ca imau loke pratīta bhedau abhede ca dūṣaṇāni uktāni tad katham ekasmin  advaye bhavitum arhata iti arthaḥ tad evam aupaniṣadam matam asamañjasamuktvā sāṃkhyaḥ sva pakṣe tapya tāpakayoḥ bhede mokṣam upapādayati jāti antara bhāve tu iti dṛś darśana saktyoḥ kila saṃyogaḥ tāpa nidānam tasya hetuḥ aviveka darśana saṃskāraḥ  avidyā sā ca viveka khyātyā vidyayā virodhi tvāt vinivartyate tad nivṛttau tadhetukaḥ saṃyogaḥ  nivartate tad nivṛttau ca tad kāryaḥ tāpaḥ  nivartate tad uktam pañcaśikha ācāryeṇa atad saṃyoga hetu vivarjanāt syāt ayam ātyantikaḥ  duḥkha pratīkāraḥ iti atra ca na sākṣāt puruṣasya apariṇāminaḥ  bandha mokṣau kintu buddhi sattvasya eva citi  chāyā āpattyā labdha caitanyasya tathā hi iṣṭa aniṣṭa guṇa svarūpa avadhāraṇam avibhāga āpannam asya bhogaḥ bhoktṛ svarūpa avadhāraṇam apavargaḥ tena hi buddhi satvam eva apavṛjyate tathā api yathā jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā yogheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyāt svāminī apadiśyate evam bandha mokṣau buddhi satve vartamānau kathañcid puruṣe apadiśyete sa hi avibhāga apatyā tad phalasya bhoktā iti tad etad abhisaṃghāya āha syāt api kadācid mokṣa upapattiḥ iti atra ucyate na eka tvāt eva tapya tāpaka bhāva anupapatteḥ yata ekatve tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ  na upapadyata eka tvāt eva tasmāt sāṃvyavahārika bheda āśrayaḥ tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ  asmābhiḥ abhyupeyaḥ tāpaḥ  hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika ati asakṛt āveditam bhavet eṣa doṣaḥ  yadi eka ātma tāyām tapya tāpakau  anyonyasya viṣaya viṣayi bhāvam pratipadyeya ātāmi tyasmad abhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ  api hi bheda āśrayam tapya tāpaka bhāvam bruvāṇaḥ  na puruṣasya tapikarma tām ākhyātum arhati tasya apariṇāmi tayā tapikriyā janita phala śālitva anupapatteḥ kevalam anena sattvam tapyam abhyupeyam tāpakam ca rajaḥ darśita viṣayat tvāt tu buddhi satve tapye tad avibhāga apatyā puruṣaḥ  api anutapyata iva na tu tapyate apariṇāmi tvāt iti uktam tad avibhāga āpattiḥ ca avidyā tathā ca avidyā kṛtaḥ tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ tvayā abhyupeyaḥ saḥ  ayam asmābhiḥ ucyamānaḥ kim iti bhavataḥ paruṣa iva ābhāti api ca nityatva abhyupagamāt ca tāpakasya anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ śaṅkate tapya tāpaka śaktyoḥ nitya tve api iti saha adarśanena nimittena vartata iti sa nimittaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad apekṣa tvāt iti nirākaroti na adarśanasya tamasa iti na tāvat puruṣasya taptiḥ iti uktam kevalam iyam buddhi sattvasya tāpaka rajaḥ janitā tasya ca buddhi satvasya tāmasa viparyāsāt ātmanaḥ puruṣāt bhedam apaśyataḥ puruṣaḥ tapyata iti abhimānaḥ na tu puruṣaḥ  viparyāsa tuṣeṇa api yujyate tasya tu buddhi satvasya sāttvikyā viveka khyātyā tāmasīyam aviveka khyātiḥ nivartanīyā na ca tamasi mūle śakyā atyantam ucchettum tathā vicchinnā api chinna badarī iva punar tamasā udbhūtena sattvam abhibhūya viveka khyātim apodya śata śikhara avidyā āvirbhāvi eta iti bata iyam apavarga kathā tapasvinaḥ  datta jala añjaliḥ prasajyeta asmad pakṣe tu adoṣa iti āha aupaniṣadasya tu iti yathā hi mukham avadātam api malina adarśa tala upa adhi kalpita pratibimba bhedam malina tām upaiti na ca tad vastu taḥ malinam na ca bimbāt pratibimbam vastu tas  bhidyate atha tasmin pratibimbe malina ādarśa upadhānāt malina tā padam labhate tathā ca ātmanaḥ  malinam mukham paśyan devadattaḥ tapyate yadā tu upādhi apanayāt bimbam eva kalpanā vaśāt  pratibimbam tad ca avadātam iti tattvam avagacchati tadā asya tāpaḥ praśāmyati na ca malinam me mukham iti evam avidyā upadhāna kalpita avacchedaḥ  jīvaḥ paramātma pratibimba kalpaḥ kalpitaiḥ eva śabda ādibhiḥ saṃparkāt tapyate na tu tattvataḥ paramātmanaḥ  asti tāpaḥ yadā tu atat tvam asi aiti vākya śravaṇa manana dhyāna abhyāsa paripāka prakarṣa paryanta jaḥ  asya sākṣātkāra upajāyate tadā jīvaḥ śuddha buddha tattva svabhāvam ātmanaḥ  anubhavan nirmṛṣṭa nikhila savāsana kleśa jālaḥ kevalaḥ svasthaḥ  bhavati na ca asya punar  saṃsāra bhayam asti tad hetoḥ avāstava tvena sa mūla kāṣam kaṣita tvāt  sāṃkhyasya tu sataḥ tamasaḥ  aśakya samuccheda tvāt iti tad idam uktam vikāra bhedasya ca vācā ārambhaṇa mātratva śravaṇāt iti pradhāna kāraṇa vāda iti yathā eva pradhāna kāraṇa vādaḥ  brahma kāraṇa vāda virodhi evam paramāṇu kāraṇa vādaḥ  api atas  saḥ  api nirākartavyaḥ aetena śiṣṭā parigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ iti asya prapañca ārabhyate tatra vaiśeṣikā brahma kāraṇa tvam dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ cetanam ced ākāśa ādīnām upādānam tad ārabdham ākāśa ādi cetanam syāt  kāraṇa guṇa krameṇa hi kārye guṇa ārambhaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ yathā śuklaiḥ tantubhiḥ ārabdhaḥ paṭaḥ śuklaḥ na jātu asau kṛṣṇaḥ  bhavati evam cetanena ārabdham ākāśa ādi cetanam bhavet na tu acetanam tasmāt acetana upādānam eva jagat  tad ca acetanam paramāṇavaḥ sūkṣmāt  khalu sthūlasya utpattiḥ dṛśyate yathā tantubhiḥ paṭasya evam aṃśubhyaḥ tantūnām evam apakarṣa paryantam kāraṇa dravyam ati sūkṣmam anavayavam avatiṣṭhate tad ca paramāṇu tasya tu sāvayava tve abhyupagamyamāne ananta avayava tvena sumeru rāja sarṣapayoḥ samāna parimāṇatva prasaṅga iti uktam tatra ca prathamam tāvat adṛṣṭavat kṣetrajña saṃyogāt paramāṇau karma tatas  asau paramāṇu antareṇa saṃyujyat vyaṇukam ārabhate bahavaḥ tu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlam ārabhante parama aṇu tve sati bahu tvāt  ghaṭopagṛhīta paramāṇuvat  yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavaḥ  ghaṭam ārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarā ādi upalabhyeta teṣām anārabdha tvāt ghaṭasya eva tu taiḥ ārabdha tvāt  tathā sati mudgara prahārāt  ghaṭa vināśe na kiñcid upalabhyeta teṣām anārabdha tvāt tad avayavānām paramāṇūnām atīndriya tvāt  tasmāt na bahūnām paramāṇūnām dravyam prati samavāyi kāraṇa tvam api tu dvau  eva paramāṇū dyvaṇukam āra bhete tasya ca aṇu tvam parimāṇam paramāṇu parimāṇāt  pārimāṇḍalyāt anyat īśvara buddhim apekṣya utpannā dvitva saṃkhyā ārabhate na ca dvi aṇukābhyām dravyasya ārambhaḥ vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt  tad api hi dvi aṇukam eva bhavet na tu mahat  kāraṇa bahutva mahattva pracaya viśeṣebhyaḥ  hi mahat tvasya utpattiḥ na ca dvi aṇukayoḥ mahat tvam asti yatas tābhyām ārabdham mahat bhavet  na api tayoḥ bahu tvam dvi tvāt eva na ca pracaya bhedaḥ tūla piṇḍānām iva tad avayavānām anavayava tvena praśithila avayava saṃyoga bheda virahāt tasmāt tena api tad karaṇa dvi aṇu kava daṇunā eva bhavitavyam tathā ca puruṣa upabhoga atiśaya abhāvāt adṛṣṭa nimitta tvāt ca viśva nirmāṇasya bhoga ārta tvāt tad kāraṇena ca dvi aṇukena tad niṣpatteḥ kṛtam dvi aṇuka āśrayeṇa dvi aṇuka antareṇa iti ārambha vaiyarthyāt ārambha arthavat tvāya bahubhiḥ eva dvi aṇukaiḥ tri aṇukam catur aṇukam vā dravyam mahat dīrgham ārabdhavyam asti tatra tatra bhoga bhedaḥ asti ca bahutva saṃkhyeśvara buddhim apekṣya utpannā mahattva parimāṇa yoniḥ tri aṇuka ādibhiḥ ārabdham tu kārya dravyam kāraṇa bahu tvāt vā kāraṇa mahatvāt vā kāraṇa pracaya bhedāt vā mahat bhavati iti prakriyā tad etayā eva prakriyayā kāraṇa samavāyinaḥ  guṇāḥ kārya dravye samāna jātīyam eva guma antaram ārabhanta iti dūṣaṇam adūṣaṇīkriyate vyabhicārāt iti āha mahat dīrghavat vā hṛsva parimaṇḍalābyām yathā mahat  dravyam tri aṇuka ādi hṛsvād dvi aṇukāt jāyate na tu mahattva guṇa upajanane dvi aṇuka gatam mahat tvam apekṣate tasya hṛsva tvāt  yathā vā tad eva tri aṇuka ādi dīrdham hṛsvād dvi aṇukāt jāyate na tu tad gatam dīrgha tvam apekṣate tad abhāvāt vā śabdaḥ ca arthe anukta samuccaya arthaḥ yathā dvi aṇukam aṇu hṛsva parimāṇam parimaṇḍalāt  paramāṇoḥ aparimaṇḍalam jāyata evam cetanāt brahmaṇaḥ  acetanam jagat niṣpadyata iti sūtra yojanā bhāṣye paramāṇu guṇa viśeṣaḥ tu iti pārimāṇḍalya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam na dvi aṇuke aṇu tvam api paramāṇu varti pārimāṇḍalyam ārabhate tasya hi dvitva saṃkhyā yoni tvāt iti api draṣṭavyam hṛsva parimamḍalābhyām iti sūtram guṇi param na guṇa param yadāhi dve dve dvi aṇuke iti paṭhitavye pramādāt ekam dvepadam na paṭhitam evam catur aṇukam iti ādi upapadyate itarathā hi dvi aṇukam eva tad api syāt na tu mahat iti uktam athavā dve iti dvi tve yathā ahi ekayoḥ dvivacana eka vacane iti atra hi dvi tveka tvayoḥ iti arthaḥ anyathā hi ekeṣu iti syāt saṃkhyeyānām bahu tvāt  tad evam yojanīyam dvi aṇuka adhikaraṇe ye dvi tve te yadā catur aṇukam āra bhete saṃkhyeyānām caturṇām dvi aṇukānām ārambhaka tvāt tad tad gate dvitva saṃkhye api ārambhike iti arthaḥ evam vyavasthitāyām vaiśeṣika prakriyāyām tad dūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ atha avyavasthitā tathā api tad avasthaḥ vyabhicāra iti āha yadā api bahavaḥ paramāṇava iti na aṇu jāyate naḥ hṛsvam jāyate iti yojanā codayati atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇa antareṇa sva kāraṇa dvāreṇa ātkrānta tvāt iti pariharati mā evam maṃsthā iti kāraṇa gatā guṇā na kārye samāna jātīyam guṇa antaram ārabhanta iti etāvatā eva iṣṭa siddhau na tadhetu anusāreṇa khedanīyam mana iti arthaḥ api ca sat parimāṇa antaram ākrāmati na utpatteḥ ca prāk  parimāṇa antaram sat iti katham ākrāmet  na ca tad kāraṇam ākrāmati pārimāṇḍalyasya api samāna jātīyasya kāraṇasya atkramaṇa hetoḥ bhāvena samāna balatayā ubhaya kārya anutpāda prasaṅgāt itya āśayavān āha na ca parimāṇa antarāt krānta tvam iti na ca parimāṇa antara ārambhe vyāpṛta tā pārimāṇḍalāya ādīnām na ca kāraṇa bahutva ādīnām saṃnidhānam asaṃnidhānam ca pārimāṇḍalyasya iti āha na ca parimāṇa antara ārambhe iti vyabhicāra antaram āha saṃyogāt ca iti śaṅkate dravye prakṛta iti nirākaroti na dṛṣṭāntena iti na ca asmākam ayam aniyamaḥ bhavatām api iti āha sūtra kāraḥ  api iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe yathā pratyakṣa apratyakṣayoḥ iti śeṣam ati rohita artham ubhayathā api na karma atas tad abhāvaḥ paramāṇūnām ādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇa abhyupagame anabhyupagame vā na karma atas tad abhāvaḥ tasya dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa sargasya abhāvaḥ athavā yadi aṇu samavāyi adṛṣṭam athavā kṣetrajña samavāyi ubhayathā api tasya acetanasya cetanā anadhiṣṭhitasya apravṛtteḥ karma bhāvaḥ  atas tad abhāvaḥ sarga abhāvaḥ nimitta kāraṇa tā mātreṇa tu īśvarasya adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyate athavā saṃyoga utpatti artham vibhāga utpatti artham ubhayathā api na karma atas sarga hetoḥ saṃyogasya abhāvāt  pralaya hetoḥ vibhāgasya abhāvāt tad abhāvaḥ tayoḥ sarga pralayayoḥ abhāva iti arthaḥ tad tad sūtram tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe idānīm paramāṇu kāraṇa vādam iti nirākārya svarūpam upapatti sahitam āha sa ca vāda iti sva anugataiḥ sva saṃbaddhaiḥ saṃbandhaḥ ca adhārya ādhāra bhūta  ihapratyaya hetuḥ samavāyaḥ pañcama bhūtasya anavayava tvāt  tāni imāni catvāri bhūtāni iti tatra paramāṇu kāraṇa vāde iyam abhidhīyate sūtram tatra prathamām vyākhyām āha karmavatām iti abhighāta ādi ityādi grahaṇena nodana saṃskāra gurutva drava tvāni gṛhyante nodana saṃskārau  abhighātena samāna yogakṣemau gurutva drava tve ca paramāṇu gate sadātane iti karma sātatya prasaṅgaḥ dvitīyam vyākhyānam āśaṅkā pūrvam āha atha adṛṣṭam dharma adharmau ādyasya karmaṇa iti ātmanaḥ ca kṣetrajñasya anutpanna caitanyasya iti adṛṣṭavatā puruṣeṇa iti saṃyukta samavāya saṃbandha iti arthaḥ saṃbandhasya sātatyāt iti yadi api paramāṇu kṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇu karma jaḥ tathā api tad pravāhasya sātatyam iti bhāvaḥ sarva ātmanā ced upacaya abhāvaḥ eka deśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvoḥ eka deśau nirantarau tābhyām anye eka deśāḥ saṃyogena avyāptā iti prathama upapadyate sarva ātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇau  ekasmin paramāṇu āntarāṇi api saṃmānti iti na prathamā syāt iti arthaḥ śaṅkate yadi api niṣpradeśāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tathā api saṃyogaḥ tayoḥ avyāpya vṛttiḥ evaṃsvabhāva tvāt kā eṣā vācoḥ yuktiḥ niṣpradeśam saṃyogaḥ  na vyāpnoti iti eva eṣa vācoḥ yuktiḥ yad yathā pratīyate tad tathā abhyupeyata iti tām imām śaṅkām sūddhārām āha paramāṇūnām kalpitā iti na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  niravayava ekaḥ tadā eva tena eva saṃyuktaḥ ca asaṃyuktaḥ ca iti bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekasmin  advaye virodhāt  avirodhe vā na kvacid api virodhaḥ  avakāśam āsādayeta pratītaḥ tu pradeśa kalpanayā api kalpyate tad idam uktam kalpitāḥ pradeśāḥ iti tathā ca sūddhārā iyam iti tām uddharati kalpitānām avastu tvāt iti tṛtīyam vyākhyām āha yathā ca ādisarga iti nanu abhighāta nodana ādayaḥ pralaya ārambha samaye kasmāt vibhāga ārambhaka karma hetavaḥ  na saṃbhavantyata āha na hi tatra api kiñcid niyatam iti saṃbhavanti abhighāta ādayaḥ kadācid  kvacid  na tu aparyāyeṇa sarvasmin niyama hetoḥ abhāvāt iti arthaḥ na pralaya prasiddhi artham iti yadi api śarīra ādi pralaya ārambhe asti duḥkha bhogaḥ tathā api asau pṛthivī ādi pralaye na asti iti abhipretya idam uditam iti mantavyam samavāya abhyupagamāt ca sāmyāt anavasthiteḥ vyācaṣṭe samavāya abhyupagamāt ca iti na tāvat  svatantraḥ samavāyaḥ  atyantam bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyām samavāyinau ghaṭayitum arhati ati prasaṅgāt  tasmāt anena samavāyi saṃbandhinā satā samavāyinau ghaṭanīyau tathā ca samavāyasya saṃbandha antareṇa samavāyi saṃbandhe abhyupagamyamāne anavasthā atha asau saṃbandhibhyām saṃbandhe na saṃbandha antaram apekṣate saṃbandhi saṃbandhana parama artha tvāt tathā hi na asau bhinne api saṃbandhi nirapekṣaḥ  nirūpyate na ca tasmin sati sama banghinau  asaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ tasmāt  svabhāvāt eva samavāyaḥ samavāyinoḥ na saṃbandha antareṇa iti na anavasthā iti codayati nanu iha pratyaya grāhyā iti pariharati na iti ucyate saṃyogaḥ  api evam iti tathā hi saṃyogaḥ  api saṃbandhi saṃbandhana parama arthaḥ na ca bhinne api saṃyogibhyām vinā nirūpyate na ca tasmin sati saṃyoginau  asaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulya carcaḥ yadi ucyeta guṇaḥ saṃyogaḥ na ca dravya asamavetaḥ  guṇa u bhavati na ca asya samavāyam vinā samaveta tvam tasmāt saṃyogasya asti samavāya iti śaṅkām apākaroti na ca guṇa tvāt iti yadi asamavāye asya aguṇa tvam bhavati kāmam bhavatu na naḥ kācid kṣatiḥ tad idam uktam guṇa paribhāṣāyāḥ ca iti paramārthataḥ tu dravya āśrayī iti uktam tad ca vinā api samavāyam svarūpataḥ saṃyogasya upapadyata eva na ca kārya tvāt sama vāyi samavāyi kāraṇa apekṣitayā saṃyogaḥ samavāyi iti yuktam ca aja saṃyogasya ātathātva prasaṅgāt  api ca samavāyasya api saṃbandhya dhīna sadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaḥ ca ekasya dvayoḥ vā vināśi tvena vināśi tvāt kārya tvam na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  guṇa u vā guṇa guṇinau vā avayavaḥ  vā avayava  ayavinau vā na staḥ  api asti ca tayoḥ saṃbandha iti tasmāt  kāryaḥ samavāyaḥ tathā ca yathā eṣa nimitta kāraṇa mātra adhīna utpāda evam saṃyogaḥ  api atha samavāyaḥ  api samavāyi asamavāyi kāraṇe apekṣate tathā api sā eva anavasthā iti tasmāt samavāyavat saṃyogaḥ  api na saṃbandha antaram apekṣate yadi ucyeta saṃbandhinā avasau ghaṭayati na ātmānam api saṃbandhibhyām tad  kim asau  asaṃbaddha eva saṃbandhibhyām evam ced atyanta bhinnaḥ asaṃbaddhaḥ katham saṃbandhinau saṃbandhayet  saṃbandhane vā himavat vindhyau  api saṃbandhayet  tasmāt saṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam tad etad samavāyasya api samavāyi saṃbandhe samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt tathā ca ca anavasthā iti bhāvaḥ nityam eva ca bhāvāt  pravṛtteḥ apravṛtteḥ vā iti śeṣaḥ atirohita artham asya bhāṣyam rūpa ādimat tvāt ca viparyayaḥ  darśanāt  yad  kila bhūta bhautikānām mūla kāraṇam tad rūpa ādimān paramāṇuḥ nitya iti bhavadbhiḥ abhyupeyate tasya ced rūpa ādimat tvam abhyupeyeta parama aṇutva nityatva viruddhe sthaulya anitya tve prasajyeyātām saḥ  ayam prasaṅga eka dharma abhyupagame dharma antarasya niyatā prāptiḥ hi prasaṅga lakṣaṇam tad anena prasaṅgena jagat kāraṇa prasiddhaye pravṛttam sādhanam rūpa ādimad nitya paramāṇu siddheḥ pracyāvya brahma gocaratām nīyate tad etad vaiśeṣika abhyupagama upanyāsa pūrvakam āha sa avayavānām dravyāṇām iti paramāṇu nityatva sādhanāni ca teṣām upanyasya dūṣayati yad ca nitya tve kāraṇam iti sat iti prāgabhāvāhi avacchinatti akāraṇavat iti ghaṭa ādeḥ yad api nitya tve dvitīyam iti labdha rūpam hi kvacid  kiñcid anyatra niṣidhyate tena anityam iti laukikena niṣedhena anyatra nityatva sadbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ te ca anye paramāṇava iti tad na ātmani api nityatva upapatteḥ vyapadeśasya ca pratīti pūrvakasya tad abhāve nirmūlasya api darśanāt  yathā iha vaṭe yakṣa iti yad api nitya tve tṛtīyam kāraṇam avidyā iti yadi satām paramāṇūnām paridṛśyamāna sthūla kāryāṇām pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇā grahaṇam avidyā tayā nitya tvam evam sati dvi aṇukasya api nitya tvam atha adravya tve sati iti viśeṣyeta tathā sati na dvi aṇuke vyabhicāraḥ tasya aneka dravya tvena avidyamāna dravyatva anupapatteḥ tathā api akāraṇavat tvam eva nitya tā nimittam āpadyeta yatas  adravya tvam avidyamāna kāraṇa bhūta dravya tvam ucyate tathā ca punaruktam iti āha tasya ca iti api ca adravya tve sati sattvāt ityata eva iṣṭā artha siddheḥ avidyā iti vyartham atha avidyā padena dravya vināśa kāraṇa dvaya avidyamāna tvam ucyate dvividhaḥ  hi dravya nāśa hetuḥ ava yava vināśaḥ  avayava vyatiṣaṅga vināśaḥ ca tad ubhayam paramāṇau na asti tasmāt nityaḥ paramāṇuḥ na ca sukha ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ teṣām adravya tvāt iti āha atha api iti nirākaroti na avaśyam iti yadi hi saṃyoga sacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravya antaram ārabheḥ an  iti prakriyā sidhyet  sidhyet  dravya dvayam eva ḷ  tad vināśa kāraṇam iti na tu etad asti dravya svarūpa aparijñānāt  na tāvat  tantu ādhāraḥ tad vyatiriktaḥ paṭaḥ nāma asti yaḥ saṃyoga sacivaiḥ tantubhiḥ ārabhyeta iti uktam adhastāt ṣaṣ padārthasya dūṣayan  agre vakṣyati kintu kāraṇam eva viśeṣavat avasthā antaram āpadyamānam kāryam tad ca sāmānya ātmakam tathā hi mṛdvā suvarṇam vā sarveṣu ghaṭa rucaka ādiṣu anugatam sāmānyam anubhūyate na ca ete ghaṭa rucakāt ayaḥ  mṛd suvarṇābhyām vyatiricyanta iti uktam agre ca vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt mṛd suvarṇe eva tena tenīkāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarā kaṇam iti ca śakala kaṇikā cūrṇam iti ca vyākhyāyete tatra tatra upādānayoḥ mṛd su varṇayoḥ pratyabhijñānāt  na tu ghaṭa ādayaḥ  vā kapāla ādiṣu kapāla āt ayaḥ  vā ghaṭa ādiṣu ca rucakāt ayaḥ  vā śakala ādiṣu śakalādayaḥ  vā rucaka ādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  bhavet  na ca vinaśyantam eva ghaṭakṣaṇam pratītya kapā lakṣaṇaḥ  anupādāna eva utpadyate tad kim upādāna pratyabhijñānena iti vaktavyam etasyāḥ  api vaināśika prakriyāyāḥ  upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt  tasmāt upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ  viśeṣa avasthāḥ sāmānyasya upādeyāḥ sāmānya ātmā tu upādānam evam vyavasthite yathā suvarṇa dravyam kāṭhinya avasthām apahāya drava avasthayā parigaṇitam na ca tatra avayava vibhāgaḥ san  api drava tve kāraṇam paramāṇūnām bhavat mate tad abhāvena dravatva anupapatteḥ tasmāt yathā evam guṇāt ayaḥ  na dravya ādi anadhīna nirūpaṇāḥ api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tad ākāra tayā eva prathante na tu prathāyām eṣām asti svātantryam tasmāt na atiricyante dravyāt api tu dravyam eva sāmānya rūpam tathā tathā prathata iti arthaḥ dravya kāryatva mātram guṇa ādīnām dravya adhīna tvam iti manvānaḥ codayati nanu agreḥ anyasya api iti pariharati bheda pratīteḥ iti na tad adhīna utpāda tām tad adhīna tvam ācakṣmahe kintu tad ākāra tām tathā ca na vyabhicāra iti arthaḥ śaṅkate guṇānām dravya adhīna tvam dravya guṇayoḥ ayuta sidda tvāt iti yadi ucyeta yatra hi dvau  ākāriṇau vibhinnābhyām ākārābhyām
