avagamyate tau saṃbaddha asaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete yathā iha kuṇḍe dadhi yathā vā gauḥ aśva iti na tathā guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ teṣām dravya kāra tayā ākāra antarā yogena dravyāt akāriṇaḥ  anya tvena ākāri tayā vyavasthāna abhāvāt sā iyam ayuta siddhiḥ tathā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena prathā iti arthaḥ tām imām ayuta siddhim vakalpya dūṣayati tad punar ayuta siddha tvam iti tatra apṛthak deśa tvam tad abhyupagamena virudhyata iti āha apṛthak deśatva iti yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyām anya deśa tve yuta siddhiḥ tatas  anya ayuta siddhiḥ nityayoḥ tu saṃyoginoḥ dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā pṛthak gatimat tvam yuta siddhiḥ tatas  anya ayuta siddhiḥ tathā ca ākāśa paramāṇvoḥ paramāṇvoḥ ca saṃyuktayoḥ yuta siddhiḥ siddhā bhavati guṇa guṇinoḥ ca śauklya paṭayoḥ ayuta siddhiḥ siddhā bhavati na hi tatra śauklya paṭābhyām saṃbandhibhyām anya deśau śauklya paṭau sati api paṭasya tad anya tantu deśa tve śauklyasya saṃbandhi paṭa deśa tvāt  tad na nityayoḥ ātma ākāśayoḥ aja saṃyoge ubhayasya api yuta siddheḥ abhāvāt  na hi tayoḥ pṛthak āśraya āśrita tvam anāśraya tvāt na api dvayoḥ anyatarasya vā pṛthak gatima tvam amūrta tvena ubhayoḥ api niṣkriya tvāt  na cāja saṃyogaḥ  na asti tasya anumāna siddha tvāt tathā hi ākāśam ātma saṃyogi mūrta dravya saṅgi tvāt  ghaṭa ādivat iti anumānam pṛthak āśraya āśrayitva pṛthak gatimatva lakṣaṇa yuta siddheḥ anyā tu ayuta siddhiḥ yadi api na abhyupeta virodham āvahati tathā api na sāmānādhikaraṇya prathām upapādayitum arhati evam lakṣaṇe api hi samavāye guṇa guṇinoḥ abhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syāt na tādātmya pratyayaḥ asya ca upapādanāya samavāya āsthīyate bhavadbhiḥ sa ced āsthitaḥ  api na pratyayam imam upapādayet  kṛtam tad kalpanayā na ca pratyakṣaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyayaḥ samavāya gocaraḥ tad viruddha artha tvāt tad gocara tve hi paṭe śukla iti evam ākaraḥ syāt na tu paṭaḥ śukla iti na ca śukla padasya guṇa viśiṣṭa guṇi paratvāt evam prathā iti sāṃpratam na hi śabda vṛtti anusāri pratyakṣam na hi agniḥ māṇavaka iti upacarita agni bhāvaḥ  māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahana ātmanā prathate na ca ayam abheda bibhramaḥ samavāya nibandhanaḥ  bhinnayoḥ api iti vācyam guṇa ādi sadbhāve tad bhede ca pratyakṣa anubhavāt anyasya pramāṇasya abhāvāt tasya ca bhrānta tve sarva abhāva prasaṅgāt  tad āśrayasya tu bheda sādhanasya tad viruddhayā utthāna asaṃbhavāt tad idam uktam tasya tādātmyena eva pratīyamāna tvāt iti api ca ayuta siddha śabdaḥ  apṛthak utpattau mukhyaḥ sā ca bhavat mate na dravya guṇayoḥ asti dravyasya prāc siddheḥ guṇasya ca paścāt utpatteḥ tasmāt mithyā vādaḥ  ayam iti āha yuta siddhayoḥ iti atha bhavatu kāraṇasya yuta siddhiḥ kāryasya tu ayuta siddhi kāraṇa atirekeṇa abhāvāt iti āśaṅkyā anyathā dūṣayati evam api iti saṃbandhi dvaya adhīna sadbhāvaḥ  hi saṃbandhaḥ  na asati ekasmin  api saṃbandhini bhavitum arhati na ca samavāyaḥ  nityaḥ svatantra iti ca uktam adhastāt  na ca kāraṇa samavāyāt ananyā kāryasya utpattiḥ iti śakyam vaktum evam hi sati samavāyasya nityatva abhyupagamāt kāraṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ utpattau ca samavāyasya sā eva kāryasya astu kim samavāyena siddhayoḥ tu saṃbandhe yuta siddhi prasaṅgaḥ na ca anya ayuta siddhiḥ saṃbhavati iti etad uktam tatas ca yad uktam vaiśeṣikaiḥ yuta siddhi abhāvāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgau na vidyate iti idam duruktam syāt  yuta sidhdya bhāvasya eva abhāvāt etena aprāpti saṃyogau yuta siddhiḥ iti api lakṣaṇam anupapannam mā bhūt aprāptiḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ prāptiḥ tu anayoḥ saṃyoga eva kasmāt na bhavati tatra asya asaṃyoga tvāya anya ayuta siddhiḥ vaktavyā tathā ca sā eva ucyatām kim anayā paramparā āśraya doṣa grastayā na ca anyā saṃbhavati iti uktam yadi ucyeta aprāpti pūrvikā prāptiḥ anyatara karma ja ubhaya karma jā vā saṃyogaḥ yathā sthāṇu śyenayoḥ mallayoḥ vā na ca tantu paṭayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ tathā utpanna mātrasya eva paṭasya tantu saṃbandhāt  tasmāt samavāya eva ayam iti ata āha yathā ca utpanna mātrasya iti saṃyoga jaḥ  api hi saṃyogaḥ  bhavadbhiḥ abhyupeyate na kriyāja eva iti arthaḥ na ca aprāpti pūrvikā eva prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ ātma ākāśa saṃyoge nitye tad abhāvāt kāryasya ced panna mātrasya ekasmin kṣaṇe kāraṇa prāpti virahāt ca iti api ca saṃbandhi rūpā atirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tad avāntara bhedāya lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ  anuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatiriktaḥ  asiddhaḥ uktam hi parastāt atiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyām saṃbandhaḥ  asaṃbaddhaḥ  na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitum iṣṭe saṃbandhi saṃbandhe ca anavasthitiḥ tasmāt upapatti anubhavābhyām na kāryasya kāraṇāt anya tvam api tu kāraṇasya eva ayam anirvācyaḥ pariṇāma bheda iti tasmāt  kāryasya kāraṇāt anatirekān kim kena saṃbaddham saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyām anatirekāt  kaḥ tayoḥ saṃyoga iti āha na api saṃyogasya iti vicāra asaha tvena anirvācya tām asya aparibhāvayan  āśaṅkate saṃbandhi śabda pratyayi atirekeṇa iti nirākaroti na ekatve api svarūpa bāhya rūpa apekṣayā iti tad tad anirvacanīya aneka viśeṣa avasthā bheda apekṣayā ekasmin  api nānā buddhi vyapadeśa upapattiḥ iti yathā ekaḥ devadattaḥ sva gata viśeṣa apekṣayā manuṣyaḥ  brāhmaṇaḥ  avadātaḥ sva gata avasthā bheda apekṣayā bālaḥ  yuvā sthaviraḥ sva kriyā bheda apekṣayā kṣotriyaḥ para apekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautraḥ  bhrātā jāmātā iti nidarśana antaram āha yathā ca ekā api satī rekhā iti dārṣṭa antike yojayati tathā saṃbandhinoḥ iti aṅgulyoḥ naurantaryam saṃyogaḥ dadhi kuṇḍayoḥ auttara adharyam saṃyogaḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ tu tādātmye api anirvācyasya kāryasya bhedam vivakṣitvā saṃbandhinaḥ  riti uktam na api saṃbandhi viṣaya tve saṃbandha śabda pratyayayoḥ iti etad api anirvācya bheda abhiprāyam apicā adṛṣṭavat kṣetrajña saṃyogāt  paramāṇu manasā uḥ ca ādyam karma bhavadbhiḥ iṣyate aagneḥ ūrdhva jvalanam vāyoḥ tiryak pavanam aṇu manasā uḥ ca ādyam karma iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni iti vacanāt  na cāṇu manasoḥ ātmānā pradeśena saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati saṃbhave cāṇu manasoḥ ātma vyāpi tvāt parama mahat tvena anaṇutva prasaṅgāt  na ca pradeśa vṛttiḥ anayoḥ ātmanā saṃyogaḥ  apradeśa tvāt ātmanaḥ kalpanāyāḥ ca vastu tattva vyavasthāpanā saha tvāt ati prasaṅgāt iti āha tathā aṇvātma manasām iti kiñca anyat dvābhyām aṇubhyām kāraṇābhyām sāvayavasya kāryasya dvi aṇukasya ākāśena iva saṃśleṣa anupapattiḥ saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgrahaḥ  yata eka saṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhi antarākarṣaḥ  bhavati tasya anupapattiḥ iti ata eva saṃyogāt anyaḥ kārya kāraṇa dravyayoḥ āśraya āśrita bhāvaḥ  anyathā na upapadyata iti avaśyam kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti ced  nirākaroti na kutas  itaretara āśraya tvāt tad vibhajate kārya kāraṇayoḥ hi iti kiñca anyat paramāṇūnām iti ye hi paricchinnāḥ te sa avayavāḥ yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ tathā ca paramāṇavaḥ tasmāt sāvayavā anityāḥ syuḥ aparicchinna tve ca ākāśa ādivat  parama aṇutva vyāghātaḥ śaṅkate yān  tvam iti nirākaroti na sthūla iti kim sūkṣma tvāt  paramāṇavaḥ  na vinaśyanti atha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idam uktam vastu bhūtā api iti bhavat mate uttaram kalpam āśaṅkya nirākaroti vinaśyantaḥ  api avayava vibhāgena iti yathā hi ghṛta suvarṇa ādīnām avibhajyamāna avayavānām api iti yathā hi piṣṭa piṇḍaḥ  avinaśyat avayava saṃyoga eva prathate prathamānaḥ ca aśva śapha ākāra tām nīyamānaḥ puroḍāśa tām āpadyate tatra piṇḍaḥ  naśyati puroḍāśaḥ ca utpadyate na hi tatra piṇḍa avayava saṃyogā vinaśyanti api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ param prathanena nudyamānā adhika deśa vyāpakā bhavanti evam agni saṃyogena suvarṇa dravya avayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santaḥ  dravībhāvam āpadyante na tu mithas  vibhajyante tasmāt yathā avayava saṃyoga vināśau  antareṇa api suvarṇa piṇḍaḥ  vinaśyati saṃyoga antara utpādam antareṇa ca suvarṇe drava upajāyate evam antareṇa api avayava saṃyoga vināśam paramāṇavaḥ  vinaṅkṣyanti anye ca utpatsyanta iti sarvam avadātam samudāya ubhaya hetuke api tad aprāptiḥ avāntara saṃgatim āha vaiśeṣi karāt dhānta iti vaiśeṣikāḥ khalu ardha vaināsikāḥ te hi paramāṇu ākāśa ādi kkāla ātma manasām ca sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyānām ca guṇānām ca keṣāñcit nitya tvam abhyupetya śeṣāṇām niranvaya vināśam upayanti tena ter adhavaināśikāḥ tena tad upanyāsaḥ  vaināśikatva sāmyena sarva vaināśikān smārayati iti tad anantaram vaināśikam atanirākaraṇam iti ardha vaināśikānām sthira bhāva vādīnām samudāya ārambha upapadyeta api kṣaṇika bhāva vādīnām tu asau dūra apeta iti upapādayiṣyāmaḥ tena natarām iti uktam tad idam dūṣaṇāya vaināśika matam upanyasitum tad prakāra bhedān āha sa ca bahu prakāra iti vādi vaicitryāt  khalu kecid sarva astitvam eva rāddha antam pratipadyante kecid jhāna mātra astitvam kecid sarva śūnyatām atha tu atrabhavatām sarva jñānām tattva pratipatti bhedaḥ  na saṃbhavati tattvasya eka rūpyāt iti etad aparitoṣeṇa āha vineya bhedāt vā hīna madhyama utkṛṣṭa dhiyaḥ hi śiṣyā bhavanti tatra ye hīna matayaḥ te sarva astitva vādena tad āśaya anurodhāt śūnya tāyām avatāryante ye tu madhyamāste jñāna mātra astitvena śūnyatāya avatāryante ye tu prakṛṣṭa matayaḥ tebhyaḥ sākṣāt eva śūnyatā tattvam pratipādyate yathā uktam bodha citta vivaraṇe deśanā lokanāthānām sattva āśaya vaśa anugāḥ bhidyante bahudhā loka upāyaiḥ bahubhiḥ punar  gambhīra uttān bhedena kvacid ca ubhaya lakṣaṇā bhinnā api deśanā bhinnā śūnyatā dvaya lakṣaṇā iti yadi api vaibhāṣika sautrāntikayoḥ ava antara mata bhedaḥ  asti tathā api sarva astitāyām asti saṃpratipattiḥ iti ekīkṛtya upanyāsaḥ tathā ca tri tvam upapannam iti pṛthivī khara svabhāvā āpaḥ sneha svabhāvāḥ agniḥ uṣṇa svabhāvaḥ vāyuḥ īraṇa svabhāvaḥ īraṇam preraṇam bhūta bhautikā an uktvā citta caittikān āha tathā rūpa iti rūpyante ebhiḥ iti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā sa viṣayāṇi indriyāṇi rūpa skandhaḥ yadi api rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ  bāhyāḥ tathā api kāyastha tvāt vā indriya saṃbandhāt vā bhavanti ādhyātmikāḥ vijñāna skandhaḥ  aham iti ākāraḥ  rūpa ādi viṣaya indriya ādi janyaḥ  vā daṇḍāyamānaḥ vedanā skandhaḥ  yā priya apriya anubhaya viṣaya sparśe suḥkha duḥkha tad rahita viśeṣa avasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanā skandhaḥ saṃjñā skandhaḥ sa vikalpa pratyayaḥ saṃjñā saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsaḥ yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ  gacchati iti evan jātīyakaḥ saṃskāra skandhaḥ  rāga ādayaḥ kleśāḥ upakleśāḥ ca mada māna ādayaḥ dharma adharmau ca iti tad eteṣām samudāyaḥ pañca skandhī tasmin  ubhaya hetuke api iti bāhye pṛthivyāḥ  dvi aṇu hetuke bhūta bhautika samudāye rūpa vijñāna ādi skandha hetuke ca samudāya ādhyātmike abhipreyamāṇe tad aprāptiḥ tasya samudāyasya ayukta tā kutas  samudāyinām acetana tvāt  cetanaḥ hi kulāla ādiḥ sarvam mṛd daṇḍa ādi upasaṃhṛtya samudāya ātmakam ghaṭam āracayan dṛṣṭaḥ na hi asati mṛd daṇḍa ādi vyā pārīṇi viduṣi kulāle svayam acetanā mṛd daṇḍādayaḥ  vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭam āracayanti na ca asati kuvinde tantu vema ādayaḥ paṭam vayante tasmāt  kārya utpādaḥ tad anuguṇa kāraṇa samavadhāna adhīnaḥ tad abhāve na bhavati kārya utpāda anuguṇam ca kāraṇa samavadhānam cetana prekṣa adhīnam asatyām cetana prekṣāyām na bhavitum utsahata iti kārya utpattiḥ cetana prekṣā dhīnatva vyāptā vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhyā cetanā anadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ  vyāvartamānā cetana adhiṣṭhitatva avā avatiṣṭhata iti pratibandha siddhiḥ yadi ucyeta addhā cetana adhīnā eva kārya utpattiḥ asti tu cittam cetanam tad hīndriya ādi viṣaya sparśe sati abhijvalat  tad kāraṇa cakram yathā yathā kāryāya paryāptam tathā tathā prakāśayat acetanāni kāraṇāni adhiṣṭhāya kāryam abhinirvartayati iti tatra āha citta abhijvalanasya ca samudāya sidydha dhīna tvāt  na khalu bāhya abhya antara samudāya siddhim antareṇa citta abhijvalanam tatas tu tām icchan duruttaram itaretara āśrayam āviśet iti na ca prāc bhavīyā citta abhidīptiḥ uttara samudāyam ghaṭayati ghaṭana samaye tasyāḥ cira atīta tvena sāmarthya virahāt  asmadrāddha antavat anyasya cetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsituḥ vā sthirasya saṃghāta kartuḥ anabhyupagamāt  kāraṇa vinyāsa bhedam hi vidvān kartā bhavati na ca anvaya vyatirekau  antareṇa tad hinyāsa bhedam veditum arhati na ca sakṣamikaḥ  anvaya vyatireka kāla avasthāyī jñātum anvaya vyatirekau  utsahate ata uktam sthirasya iti yadi ucyeta asamavahitāni eva kāraṇāni kāryam kariṣyanti paraspara anapekṣāṇi kṛtam atra samavadhāyayitrā cetanena iti ata āha nirapekṣa pravṛtti abhyupagame ca iti yadi ucyate asti ālayavijñānam ahaṅkāra āspadam pūrva apara anusaṃghātṛ tad eva kāraṇānām pratisaṃghātṛ bhaviṣyati iti tatra āha āśayasya api iti yad  khalu ekam yadi sthiram āsthīyeta tatas  nāma antareṇa ātmā eva atha kṣaṇikam tatas  ukta doṣa āpattiḥ na ca tad saṃtānaḥ tasya anya tve nāma antareṇa ātma abhyupagataḥ  ananya tve ca vijñānam eva tad ca kṣaṇikam eva iti ukta doṣa āpattiḥ āśerate asmin karma anubhava vāsanā iti āśaya ālaya vijñānam tasya api ca pravṛttiḥ samudāyinām vyāpāraḥ na ca kṣaṇikānām vyāpāraḥ  yujyate vyāpāraḥ  hi vyāpārada āśrayaḥ tad kāraṇakaḥ ca loke prasiddhaḥ tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārāt pūrvam vyāpāra samaye ca bhavitavyam anyathā kāraṇatva āśraya tvayoḥ ayogāt  na ca sama samayayoḥ asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na api bhinna kālayoḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ tathā ca kṣaṇikatva hāniḥ iti āha kṣaṇikatva abhyupagamāt ca iti itaretara pratyaya tvāt iti ced na utpatti mātra nimitta tvāt yadi api iti ayam arthaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ  hi pratītyasamutpāda lakṣaṇa m uktam buddhena aidam pratyaya phalam iti autpādāt vā tathāgatānām anutpādāt vā sthitā eṣā dharmāṇām dharmatā adharma sthiti tā dharma niyāmaka tā pratītyasamutpāda anuloma tā aiti atha punar ayam pratītyasamutpādaḥ  dvābhyām kāraṇābhyām bhavati hetu upanibandhataḥ ca pratyaya upanibandhataḥ ca sa punar dvividhaḥ  bāhya ādhyātmikaḥ ca tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetu upanibandhaḥ yad idam bījāt aṅkuraḥ  aṅkurāt patram patrāt kāṇḍam kāṇḍān nālaḥ  nālāt garbhaḥ  garbhāt śūkaḥ śūkāt puṣpam puṣpāt phalam iti asati bīje aṅkuraḥ na bhavati yāvat asati puṣpe phalam na bhavati sati tu bīje aṅkuraḥ bhavati yāvat  puṣpe sati phalam iti tatra bījasya na evam bhavati jñānam aham aṅkuram nirvartayāmi iti aṅkurasya api na evam bhavati jñānam aham bījena nirvartita iti evam yāvat puṣpasya na evam bhavati aham phalam nirvartayāmi iti evam phalasya api na evam bhavati aham puṣpeṇa abhinirvartitam iti tasmāt asati api caitanye bīja ādīnām asati api ca anyasmin  adhiṣṭhātari kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamaḥ  dṛśyate uktaḥ  hetu upanibandhaḥ pratyaya upanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādasya ucyate pratyayaḥ hetūnām samavāyaḥ hetum hetum pratyayante hetu antarāṇi iti teṣāmaya mānānām bhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ samavāya iti yāvat  yathā ṣaṇṇām dhātūnām samavāyāt bīja hetuḥ aṅkuraḥ jāyate tatra ca pṛthivīdhātuḥ bījasya saṃgraha kṛtyam karoti yatas  aṅkuraḥ kaṭhinaḥ  bhavati abdhātuḥ bījam snehayati tejaḥ dhātuḥ bījam paripācayati vāyudhātuḥ bījam abhinirharati yatas  aṅkuraḥ bījāt nirgacchati ākāśa dhātuḥ bījasya anāvaraṇa kṛtyam karoti ṛtuḥ api bījasya pariṇāmam karoti tad eteṣām avikalānām dhātūnām samavāye bīje rohiti aṅkuraḥ jāyate na anyathā tatra pṛthivī dhātoḥ na evam bhavati aham bījasya saṃgraha kṛtyam karomi iti yāvadṛtoḥ na evam bhavati aham bījasya pariṇāmam karomi iti aṅkurasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ nirvartita iti tathā ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ  dvābhyām kāraṇābhyām bhavati hetu upanibandhataḥ pratyaya upanibandhataḥ ca tatra asya hetu upanibandhaḥ  yad idam avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jāti pratyayam jarā maraṇa ādaya udapatsyanta tatra avidyāyā na evam bhavati aham saṃskārān abhinirvartayāmi iti saṃskārāṇām api na evam bhavati vayam avidyayā nirvartitā iti evam yāvat jātyā api na evam bhavati aham jarā maraṇa ādi abhinirvartayāmi iti jarā maraṇa ādīnām api na evam bhavati vayam jāti ādibhiḥ nirvartitā iti atha ca satsu avidyā ādiṣu svayam acetaneṣu cetanā antara anadhiṣṭhiteṣu api saṃskāra ādīnām utpattiḥ bīja ādiṣu iva satsu cetaneṣu cetanā antara anadhiṣṭhiteṣu api aṅkura ādīnām idam pratītya prāpya idam utpadyata iti etāvat mātrasya dṛṣṭa tvāt cetana adhiṣṭhānasya anupalabdheḥ saḥ  ayam ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetu upanibandhaḥ atha pratyaya upanibandhaḥ pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa vijñāna dhātūnām samavāyāt bhavati kāyaḥ tatra kāyasya pṛthivī dhātuḥ kāṭhinyam nirvartayati abdhātuḥ snehayati kāyam tejaḥ dhātuḥ kāyasya aśita pīte paripācayati vāyudhātuḥ kāyasya śvāsa ādi karoti ākāśa dhātuḥ kāyasya antar  suṣira bhāvam karoti yaḥ tu nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati pañca vijñāna kārya saṃyuktam sa āsravam ca manaḥ vijñānam saḥ  ayam ucyate vijñāna dhātuḥ yadā hi ādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivī ādi dhātavaḥ  bhavanti avikalāḥ tadā sarveṣām samavāyāt bhavati kāyasya utpattiḥ tatra pṛthivī ādi dhātūnām na evam bhavati vayam kāyasya kāṭhinya ādi nirvartayāma iti kāyasya api na evam bhavati jñānam aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ abhinirvartita iti atha ca pṛthivī ādi dhātubhyaḥ  acetanebhyaḥ cetana antarānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ  aṅkurasi evam kāyasya utpattiḥ saḥ  ayam pratītyasamutpādaḥ  dṛṣṭa tvāt na anyathayitavyaḥ tatra eteṣu eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu yā eka saṃjñā piṇḍa saṃjñā nitya saṃjñā suḥkha saṃjñā sattva saṃjñā pudgala saṃjñā manuṣya saṃjñā mātṛ duhitṛ saṃjñā ahaṅkāram amakāra saṃjñā sā iyam avidyā saṃsāra anartha saṃbhārasya mūla kāraṇam tasyām avidyāyām satyām saṃskārā rāga dveṣa mohā viṣayeṣu pravartante vastu viṣayā vijña ptiḥ vijñānam vijñānāt catvāraḥ  rūpiṇa upādāna skandhāḥ tad nāma tāni upādāya rūpam abhinirvartate tad aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya nāma rūpam nirucyate śarīrasya eva kalala budduda ādi avasthā nāma rūpa saṃmiśritāni indariyāṇi ṣaṣ āyatanam nāma rūpa indriyāṇām trayāṇām saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśāt vedanā sukha ādikā vedanāyām satyām kartavyam etad sukham punar mayā iti adhyavasānan tṛṣṇā bhavati tatas  upādānam vāc kāya ceṣṭā bhavati tatas  bhavaḥ  bhavati asmāt janma iti bhavaḥ  dharma adharmau tad hetukaḥ skandha prādurbhāvaḥ  jātiḥ janma janma hetukā uttare jarāṃraṇā dayaḥ jātānām skandhānām paripākaḥ  jarā skandhānām na āśaḥ maraṇam mriyamāṇasya mūḍhasya sa abhiṣaṅgasya putra kalatra ādau  anatardāhaḥ śokaḥ tad uttham pralapanam hā mātar  hā tāta hā ca me putra kalatra ādi iti paridevanā pañca vijñāna kārya saṃyuktam asādhi anubhavanan duḥkham mānasam ca duḥkhan daurmanasyam evañjātīyakā śca upāyāḥ ta upakleśā gṛhyante te amī paraspara hetukāḥ janma ādi hetukā avidyādayaḥ  avidyā ādi hetukāḥ ca janma ādayaḥ  ghaṭīyantravat aniśama āvartamānāḥ santi iti tad etaiḥ avidyā ādibhi rākṣiptaḥ saṃghāta iti tad etad dūṣayati tad na kutas  utpatti mātra nimitta tvāt iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ yad  khalu hetu upanibandham kāryam tad anya anapekṣam hetu mātra adhīna utpāda tvāt utpadyatām nāma pañca skandha samudāyaḥ tu pratyaya upanibaddhaḥ  na hetu mātra adhīna utpattiḥ api tu nānā hetu samavadhān janmā na ca cetanam antareṇa anyaḥ saṃnidhāpayitā asmi kāraṇānām iti uktam bījāt aṅkura utpatteḥ api pratyaya upanibaddhāyāḥ  vivāda adhyāsita tvena pakṣa nikṣipta tvāt  pakṣeṇa ca vyabhicāra udbhāvanāyām atiprasaṅgena sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt  syāt etad  anapekṣā eva antyakṣaṇa prāptāḥ kṣiti ādayaḥ  aṅkuram ārabhante teṣām tu upasarpaṇa pratyaya vaśāt paraspara samavadhānam na ca ekasmāt eva kāraṇāt kārya siddheḥ kim anyaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ iti vācyam kāraṇa cakra anantaram kārya utpādāt  siddham iti eva na asti na ca ekaḥ api tad kāraṇa samartham iti anya udāsata iti yuktam na hi te prekṣāvantaḥ  yena esamālocayeyuḥ asmāsu samartha ekaḥ  api kārye iti kṛtam naḥ saṃnidhinā iti kintu upa sarpaṇa pratyaya adhīna paraspara saṃnidhāna utpādā na anutpattum na api asaṃnidhātum īśate tān  ca sarvananapekṣān pratītya kāryam api na net pattum arhati na ca sva mahimnā sarve kāryam utpādayantaḥ  api nānā kāryāṇām īsate tatra eva teṣām sāmarthyāt  na ca kāraṇa bhedāt  kārya bhedaḥ sāmagryā eka tvāt  tad bhedasya ca kārya anānātu hetu tvāt tathā darśanāt  tad na yadi anti akṣaṇa prāptā anapekṣāḥ sva kārya upajanane hanta anena krameṇa tatas  pūrve tatas  pūrve sarva eva anapekṣāḥ tad tad sva kārya upajanana iti kusūla stha tvā aviśeṣe api yena bīja kṣaṇena kusūla sthena sva kārya kṣaṇa paramparayā aṅkura utpatti samarthaḥ  bīja kṣaṇaḥ  janayitavyaḥ saḥ  anapekṣa eva bīja kṣaṇaḥ sva kārya upajanane evam sarva eva tad antarā ananta pavartinaḥ bīja kṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūla nihita bīja eva syāt  kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ kṛtam asya duḥkha bahulena kṛṣi karmaṇā yena hi bīja kṣaṇena su akṣaṇa paramparayā aṅkuraḥ  janayitavyaḥ tasya anapekṣā asau kṣaṇa paramparā kusūla eva aṅkuram kariṣyati iti tasmāt paraspara apekṣā eva antyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kārya upajanana iti vaktavyam yathā āhuḥ ana kiñcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarva saṃbhavaḥ iti tad ca idam samavadhānam kāraṇānām vinyāsa bheda tad prayojana abhijña prekṣāvat pūrvakam dṛṣṭam iti na acetanāt bhavitum arhati tad idam uktam bhavet upapannaḥ saṃghātaḥ  yadi saṃghātasya kiñcid nimittam avagamyeta iti itaretara pratyaya tve api iti itaretara hetu tve api iti arthaḥ uktam abhisaṃdhim avidvān paricodayati nanu avidyā ādibhiḥ arthāt ākṣīpyata iti pariharati atra ucyate yadi tāvat iti kim ākṣepa utpādanam āhaḥ jñāpanam tatra na tāvat  kāraṇam anyathā anupapadyamānam kāryam utpādayati kintu sva sāmarthyena tasmāt jñāpanam vaktavyam tathā ca jñāpitasya anyat utpādakam vaktavyam tad ca sthira pakṣe api sati api ca bhoktari ghiṣṭhā tāram cetanam antareṇa na saṃbhavati kim aṅga punar  kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu bhoktuḥ bhogena api kadācid ākṣipyeta saṃghātaḥ sa tu bhoktā api na asti iti dūra utsārita tvam darśayati bhoktṛ rahiteṣu iti api ca bahava upakārya upakāraka bhāvena sthitāḥ kāryam janayanti na ca kṣaṇika pakṣa upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ  asti bhāvasya upakārān āspada tvāt kṣaṇasya abhedya tvāt anupakṛta upakṛtatva asaṃbhavāt kāla bhedena vā tad upapattau kṣaṇikatva vyāghātāt  tad idam āha āśraya āśrayi śūnyeṣu ca iti atha ayam abhiprāya iti yadā hi pratyaya upanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ  bhavet tadā cetanaḥ adhiṣṭhātā apekṣeta api na tu pratyaya upanibandhane api tu hetu upanibandhaḥ tathā ca kṛtam adhiṣṭhātrā hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kārya saṃghātam kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ astu tāvat yathā kevala adhetoḥ kāryam na upajāyata iti anyonya āśraya prasaṅgaḥ  asmin pakṣa iti āśa yavān āha katham tam eva iti saṃprati pratyaya upanibandhanam pratītyasamutpādam āstāya codayati atha manyase saṃghātā eva iti asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā eva udayante vyante ca na punar atiḥ tatas  avasthitāḥ kenacid  puñjīkriyante tathā ca kṛtam atra saṃhantrā cetanena iti bhāvaḥ anādau iti paraspara āśrayam nivartayati tad etad vikalpya dūṣayati tathā api saṃghātāt iti sa khalu saṃghāta saṃtati varti dharma adharma āhvayaḥ saṃskāra saṃtānaḥ  yathāyatham sukha duḥkhe janayan  āgantukam kañcanānāsādya svata eva janayet  āsādya vā anāsādya janane sadā eva sukha duḥkhe janayet  samarthasya anapekṣasi ākṣepa ayogāt āsādya janane tad āsādana kāraṇam prekṣāva anabhyupeyaḥ tathā ca na pratyaya upanibandhanaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ tasmāt anenāga tantuka anapekṣasya saṃdhāta saṃtānasya eva sadṛśa janane visadṛśa janane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ tathā ca bhāṣya uktam dūṣaṇam iti api ca yad bhoga arthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syāt iti aprāpta bhogaḥ  hi bhogam āptu kāmaḥ tad sādhane pravartata iti pratyātma siddham sā iyam pravṛttiḥ bhogāt anyasmin sthire bhoktari bhoga tad sādhana samaya vyāpini kalpyate na asthire na ca bhogāt ananyasmin na hi bhogaḥ  bhogāya kalpate na api anyaḥ  bhogāya anyasya evam mokṣe api draṣṭavyam tatra bubhukṣu mumukṣū ced  sthirau  āsthīyeyātām tadā abhyupeta hānam asthaiḥ yā vā pravṛtti prasaṅga iti arthaḥ na tu saṃghātaḥ sidhyet bhoktra bhāvāt iti bhoktra bhāvena pravṛtti anupapatteḥ kartṛ abhāvaḥ tatas  karma bhāvāt saṃghāta asiddhiḥ iti arthaḥ uttara utpāde ca pūrva nirodhāt  pūrva sūtreṇa saṃgatim asya āha uktam etad iti hetu upanibandhanam pratītyasamutpadam abhyupetya pratyaya upanibandhanaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ  dūṣitaḥ saṃprati hetu upanibandhanam api tam dūṣayati iti arthaḥ dūṣaṇam āha idam idānīm iti nirudhyamānasya iti na tāvat vaiśeṣikavat nirodha kāraṇa sāṃnidhyam nirudhyamāna tvam vaktavyam niruddha tvam ca cira niruddha tvam vivakṣita tvam tathā ca ubhayoḥ api abhāva grasta tvāt hetutva anupapattiḥ śaṅkate atha bhāva bhūta  iti kāraṇasya hi kārya utpādāt  prāk kāla sattār athavatī na kārya kālā tadā kāryasya siddha tvena tad sidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāt iti bhāvaḥ tad etad loka dṛṣṭyā dūṣayati bhāva bhūtasya iti bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prayeṇa hi kāryam kurvantaḥ  loke dṛśyante tathā ca sthira tvam itarathā tu loka virodha iti punar  śaṅkate atha bhāva eva iti yathā āhuḥ abhūtiḥ yeṣām kriyā sā eva kārakam sā eva ca ucyate aiti bhavati evam vyāpāravat tā tathā api kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇa tvam iti āha tathā api na eva upapadyate kṣaṇikasya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ mṛd suvarṇa kāraṇā hi ghaṭa ādayaḥ ca rūcaka ādaya mṛd suvarṇa ātmānaḥ  anubhūyante yadi ca na kārya samaye kāraṇam sat  katham teṣām tad ātmanā anubhāvaḥ na ca kāraṇa sādṛśyam kāryasya na tu tādātmyam iti vācyam asati kasyacid rūpasya anugame sādṛśyasya api anupapatteḥ anugame vā tad eva kāraṇam tathā ca tasya kārya tādātmyam iti siddhi makṣaṇika tvam iti arthaḥ sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetu phala bhāvaḥ tantu ghaṭa ādau  api prāptam iti atiprasaṅga iti āha vinā eva vā iti na ca tad bhāva bhāvaḥ  niyāmakaḥ tasya ekasmin kṣaṇe aśakya graha tvāt  sāmānyasya ca akāraṇa tvāt  kāraṇa tve vā kṣaṇikatva hāneḥ asmad pakṣa pāta prasaṅgat ca iti bhāvaḥ api ca ca utpāda nirodhayoḥ vikalpa traye api vastunaḥ śāśvatatva prasaṅga iti āha api ca utpāda nirodhau nāma iti paryāyatva āpādane api nityatva āpādanam mantavyam vastu utpāda nirodhābhyām asaṃsṛṣṭam iti vastunaḥ śāśvatatva prasaṅgaḥ saṃsarge api asatā saṃsarga anupapatteḥ sattva abhyupagame śāśvata śāśvata tvam iti draṣṭavyam śeṣam nigada vyākhyātam asati pratijñā uparodhaḥ  yaugapadyam anyathā nīla ābhāsasya hi cittasya nīlāt ālambana pratyayāt nīla ākāra tā samanantara pratyayāt pūrva vijñānāt bodha rūpa tā cakṣuṣaḥ  adhipati pratyayāt rūpa grahaṇa pratiniyamaḥ ālokāt sahakāri pratyaya adhetoḥ spaṣṭa artha tā evam sukha ādīnām api caittānām citta abhinna hetu jānām catvāryotāni eva kāraṇāni sā iyam pratijñā caturvidhān hetūn pratītya citta caittā utpadyanta iti abhāva kāraṇatva uparudhyeta atha uttara kṣaṇa utpattim yāvat tāvat avatiṣṭhata iti utpattiḥ utpadyamānāt bhāvāt abhinnā tathā ca kṣaṇikatva hāniḥ iti pratijñāhāniḥ pratisaṃkhyā pratisaṃkhyā nirodha aprāptiḥ avicchedāt  bhāva pratīpā saṃkhyā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ santam imam asantam karomi iti evam ākāra tā ca buddheḥ bhāva pratīpa tvam etena apratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ  api vyākhyātaḥ saṃtāna gocaraḥ  vā nirodhaḥ saṃtānikṣaṇa gocaraḥ  vā na tāvat saṃtānasya nirodhaḥ saṃbhavati hetu phala bhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina eva udaya vyaya dharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ tatra yaḥ  asau  antyaḥ saṃtānī yad nirodhāt saṃtāna ucchedena bhavitavyam sa kim phalam kiñcid ārabhate na vā ārabhate ced  na antyaḥ tathā ca na saṃtāna ucchedaḥ anārambhe tu bhavet antyaḥ saḥ kintu syāt asan artha kriyā kāritāyāḥ sattā lakṣaṇasya virahāt  tad asatve tad janakam api asat janaka tvena asat iti anena krameṇa asantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti tad saṃtānaḥ  nitarāmasan  iti kasya pratisaṃkhyayā nirodha na ca sabhāgānām saṃtāninām hetu phala bhāvaḥ saṃtānaḥ tasya visabhāga utpādaḥ  nirodhaḥ visabhāga utpādaka eva cakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānasya antyaḥ tathā asati rūpa vijñāna pravāhe rasa ādi vijñāna utpattau saṃtāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ kathañcid sā ārūpye vā visa bhāge api antatas  sat tayā tad asti iti na saṃtāna ucchedaḥ tad anena abhisaṃdhinā āha sarveṣu api saṃtāneṣu saṃtāninām avicchinnena hetu phala bhāvena saṃtāna vicchedasya asaṃbhavāt iti na api bhāva gocarau saṃbhavataḥ pratisaṃkhyā pratisaṃkhyā nirodhau atra tāvat utpanna mātrā pravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ saṃbhavati tasya puruṣa prayatna apekṣā bhāvāt iti asti eva dūṣaṇam tathā api doṣa antaram ubhayasmin  api nirodhaḥ  brūte na hi bhāvānām iti yatas  niranvayaḥ  vināśaḥ  na saṃbhavati atas  nirūpa ākhyaḥ  api na saṃbhavati tena eva anvayinā rūpeṇa bhāvasya naṣṭasya api upākhyeya tvāt  niranvaya vināśa abhāve hetum āha sarvāsu api avasthāsu iti yad yad anvayi rūpam tad tad parama artha sadbhāvaḥ avasthāḥ tu viśeṣa ākhyā upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ tāsām sarva sāma nirvacanīya tayā svatas  na parama artha sattvam anvayyeva tu rūpam tāsām tattvam tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt na vināśa iti avasthāvataḥ  avināśāt na avasthānām niranvayaḥ  vināśa iti tāsām tattvasya anvayinaḥ sarvatra avicchedāt  syāt etad  mṛd piṇḍa mṛd ghaṭa mṛd kapāla ādiṣu sarvatra mṛd tattva pratyabhijñānāt bhavatu evam taptopalatala patita naṣṭasya tu udabindoḥ kim asti rūpam anvayi pratyabhijñāyamānam yena asya na niranvayaḥ  nāśaḥ syāt iti ata āha aspaṣṭa pratyabhijñānāsu api iti atra api tad toyam tejasā mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam ambuda tvāya nīyata iti anumeyam mṛdādīnīm anvayināma viccheda darśanāt śakyam tatra vaktum audambindau ca sindhau ca toya bhāvona bhidyate vinaṣṭe api tatas  bindau  asti tasya anvayaḥ  ambudhau atasmāt na kaścid api niranvayaḥ  nāśa iti siddham ubhayathā ca doṣāt  parikaraḥ sāmagrī samyak jñānasya yama niyama ādiḥ śravaṇam ananādiḥ ca mārgāḥ kṣaṇika nairātmya ādi bhāvanāḥ atirohitam anyat  ākāśaḥ  ca aviśeṣāt etad vyācaṣṭe yad ca teṣām iti veda prāmāṇye vipratipannān api prati śabda guṇa anumeya tvam ākāśasya vaktavyam tathā hi jātimat tvena sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyebhyaḥ  vibhaktasya śabdasya asparśa tve sati bāhya eka indriya grāhya tvena gandha ādivat guṇa tvam anumitam na ayam ātma guṇa u bāhya indri gocara tvāt  ata eva na manaḥ guṇaḥ tad guṇānām apratyakṣa tvāt  na pṛthivī ādi guṇaḥ tad guṇa gandha ādi sāha caryā anupalabdheḥ tasmāt guṇā u bhūtvā gandha ādivat asādhāraṇa indriya grāhyaḥ  yad ravyam anumāpayati tad ākāśam pañcamam bhūtam vastu iti api ca āvaraṇa abhāvam ākāśam icchata iti niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇaḥ  niṣedhaḥ  na asati adhikaraṇa nirūpaṇe śakyaḥ  nirūpayitum tad ca āvaraṇa abhāva adhikaraṇam ākāśam vastu iti atirohita artham anyat  anusmṛteḥ ca vibhajate api vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastuna iti yaḥ tu sati api etasmin  upalabdhṛ smartroḥ anya tve api samānāyām saṃtatau kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt smṛtiḥ upapatsyata iti manyamānaḥ  na parituṣyati tam prati pratyabhijñā samā jñāta pratyakṣa virodham āha api ca darśana smaraṇayoḥ kartarī iti tatas  aham adrākṣīt iti pratīyāt  aham smarāmi anyaḥ tu ad rākṣīt iti arthaḥ pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa virodha prapañcaḥ tu uttaraḥ ā janmanaḥ ā ca uttamāt ucchvāsāt āmaraṇāt iti artha na ca sādṛśya nibandhanam pratyabhijñānam pūrva aparakṣaṇa darśina ekasya abhāve tad anupapatteḥ śaṅkate temedam sadṛśam iti ayam arthaḥ vikalpa pratyayaḥ ayam vikalpaḥ ca su ākāram bāhya tayā adhyavasyati na tu tattvataḥ pūrva aparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyam vā gṛhṇāti tad katham ekasya aneka darśinaḥ sthirasya prasaṅga iti nirākaroti na tena idam iti bhinna padārtha upādānāt iti nānā padārtha saṃbhinna vākya artha ābhāsaḥ tāvat ayam vikalpaḥ prathate tatra ete nānā padārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ sva saṃvedanam bādheta na ca ekasya jñānasya nānā ākāra tvam saṃbhavati ekatva virodhāt  na ca tāvanti eva jñānāni iti yuktam tathā asati pratyākāram jñānānām samāpteḥ teṣām ca paraspara vārtā jñāna abhāvāt nānā iti eva na syāt  tasmāt  pūrva aparakṣaṇa tad sādṛśya gocara tvam jñānasya vaktavyam na ca etad pūrva aparakṣaṇa avasthāyinam ekam jñātāram vinā iti kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ yadi ucyeta asti tasmin vikalpe tena idam sadṛśam iti pada dvaya prayogaḥ  na tu iha tad tedanta āspadau padārthau tayoḥ ca sādṛśyam iti vivakṣitam api tu evam ākāra tā jñānasya kalpitā iti tatra āha yadā hi loka prasiddhaḥ padārtha iti eka adhikaraṇa vipratiṣiddha dharma dvaya abhyupagamaḥ  vivādaḥ tatra ekaḥ sva pakṣam sādhayati anyaḥ ca tad sādhanam dūṣayati na ca etad sarvam asati vikalpānām bāhya ālambana tve asati ca loka prasiddha padārthaka tve bhavitum arhati jñāna ākāra tve hi vikalpa pratibhāsinām nityatva anityatva ādīnām ekārtha viṣayatva abhāvāt jñānānām ca dharmiṇām bhedān na virodhaḥ na hi ātma nitya tvam buddhi anitya tvam ca bruvāṇau vipratipadyate na ca alaukika arthena anitya śabdena ātmani vibhu tvam vivakṣitvā anitya śabdam prayuñjānaḥ  laukika artham nitya śabdam ātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate tasmāt anena sva pakṣam pratitiṣṭhā payiṣatā para pakṣa sādhanam ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānām loka siddha padārthaka tā bāhya lambanatā ca vaktavyā yadi ucyeta dvividhaḥ  hi vikalpānām viṣayaḥ  grāhyaḥ ca adhyavaseyaḥ ca tatra su ākāraḥ  grāhyaḥ  adhyavaseyaḥ tu bāhyaḥ tathā ca pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha lakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddha padārthaka tvam ca upapadyata iti ata āha evam eva eṣor atha iti niścitam yad tad eva vaktavyam tatas  anyat ucyamānam bahu pralāpi tvam ātmanaḥ kevalam prakhyāpayet  ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ keya madhyavaseya tā bāhyasya yadi grāhyatā na dvaividhyam atha anyā sā ucyatām nanu uktā taiḥ eva sva pratibhāse anarther atha adhyavasāyena pravṛttiḥ iti atha vikalpa ākārasya kaḥ  aya madhyavasāyaḥ kim karaṇam āhaḥ yojana muta āropa iti na tāvat  karaṇam na hi anyat anyat  kartu śakyam na hi jātu sahasram api śilpinaḥ  ghaṭam paṭayitum īśate na ca antaram bāhyena yojayitum api ca tathā asati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt  na ca asti āropaḥ  api kim gṛhyamāṇe bāhye uta āgṛhyamāṇe yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kim vikalpena āhaḥ tad samaya jena avikalpakena na tāvat vikalpaḥ  abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya gocaraḥ  aśakya abhilāpa samayam sva lakṣaṇam deśa kālān anugatam gocarayitum arhati yathā āhuḥ aaśakya samayaḥ  hi ātmā sukha ādīnām ananyabhāka teṣām atas  sva saṃvittānārbhi jalpa anuṣaṅgiṇī aiti na ca tad samaya bhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpena agṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ su ākāram āropayitum arhati na hi rajata jñāna apratibhāsini puras vartini vastuni rajata jñānena śakyam rajatam āropayitum agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye su ākāra iti eva syāt na bāhya iti tathā ca na āropaṇam api ca ayam vikalpaḥ sva saṃvedanam santam vikalpam kim vastu santam su ākāram gṛhītvā paścāt bāhyam āropayati atha yadā su ākāram gṛhṇāti tadā eva āropayati na tāvat  kṣaṇikatayā krama virahiṇaḥ  jñānasya krama vartinī grahaṇa āropaṇe kalpete tasmāt yadā eva su ākāram anartham gṛhṇāti tadā eva artham āropayati iti vaktavyam na ca etad yujyate su ākāre hi sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa tayā ati viśadaḥ bāhyam ca āropyamāṇam aviśadam sat tatas  anyat eva syāt na tu su ākāraḥ samāropitaḥ na ca bheda agraha mātreṇa samāropa abhidhānam vaiśadyā vaiśadya rūpa tayā bheda grahasya ukta tvāt  api ca āgṛhyamāṇe ced bāhye abāhyāt sva lakṣaṇāt bheda agrahaṇena tad abhimukhī pravṛttiḥ hanta tarhi trailokyata eva anena na bhedaḥ  gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravarteta aviśeṣāt  etena jñāna ākārasya eva ālokasya api bāhyatva samāropaḥ pratyuktaḥ tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam tatas  anyat ucyamānam bahu pralāpi tvam ātmanaḥ khyāpayet iti api ca sādṛśya nibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ tena idam sadṛśam iti evam ākāra buddhi nibandhanaḥ  bhavet na tu tad eva idam iti ākāra buddhi nibandhana iti āha na ca ayam sādṛśyāt saṃvyavahāra iti nanu jvālā ādiṣu sādṛśyāt asatyām api sādṛśya buddhau tad bhāva avagamana nibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāraḥ  dṛśyate yathā tathā iha iti bhaviṣyati iti pūrva aparitoṣeṇa āha bhavet api kadacid bāhya vastuni iti tathā hi vividha jana saṃkīrṇa gopureṇa puram niviśamānam nara antarebhya ātma nirdhāraṇa āyāsa ādhāraṇam cihnam vidadhatam upahasanti pāśupatam pṛthagjanā iti na asataḥ  adṛṣṭa tvāt  itas ca anupapannaḥ  vaināśika samaya iti asthirāt  kāraya utpattim icchantaḥ  vaināśikā arthāt abhāvāt eva bhāva utpattim āhuḥ uktam etad adhastāt nirapekṣāt  kārya utpattau puruṣa karamavaiyarthyam sa apekṣatāyām ca kṣaṇasya abhedya tvena upakṛtatva anupapatteḥ anupakāriṇi ca apekṣa abhāvāḥ dakṣaṇikatva prasaṅgaḥ sa apekṣatva anapekṣa tvayoḥ ca anyatara niṣedhasya anyatara vidhānana antarīyaka tvena prakāra antara abhāva at na asthirāt bhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ iti kṣaṇika pakṣer athāt abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ iti pariśiṣyata iti arthaḥ na kevalam arthāt āpadyate darśayanti ca na anupamṛdya prādurbhāvāt iti etad vibhajyate vinaṣṭādhikilā iti kilakāraḥ  anicchāyām kūṭasthāt ced kāraṇāt kāryam utpadyeta api sarvam sarvata utpadyeta ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ kūṭasthaḥ  hi kārya janana svabhāvaḥ  vā syāt atad svabhāvaḥ  vā sa ced kārya janana svabhāvaḥ tatas  yāvat anena kāryam kartavyam tāvat sahasā eva kuryāt  samarthasya kṣepā yogāt atad svabhāve tu na kadācid api kuryāt  yad yucye samarthaḥ  api kramavat sahakāri sacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti iti tad ayuktam vikalpa asaha tvāt kim asya sahakāriṇaḥ kañcid upakāram ādadhati na vā anādhāne anupakāritayā sahakāriṇaḥ  na apekṣeran ādhāne api bhinnam abhinnam vā upakāram ādadhyuḥ abhede tad eva abhihitam iti kauṭasthyam vyāhanyeta bhede tu upakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvāt asati ca abhāvāt sati api kūṭasthe kārya anutpādāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām upakāra eva kārya kārī na bhāva iti na artha kriyā kārī bhāvaḥ tad uktam varṣa ātapābhyām kim vyomnaḥ carmaṇi asti tayoḥ phalam carma upamaḥ ced saḥ anityaḥ stulyaḥ ced asat phalaḥ iti tathā ca akiñcitkarāt api ced  kūṭasthāt kāryam jāyeta sarvam sarvasmāt jāyeta iti sūktam upasaṃharati tasmāt abhāva grastebya iti tatra idam ucyate na asataḥ  adṛṣṭa tvāt iti na abhāvāt kārya utpattiḥ kasmāt  adṛṣṭa tvāt  na hi śaśa viṣāṇāt aṅgurādīnām kāryāṇām utpattiḥ dṛśyate yadi tu abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ syāt tatas  abhāvatva aviśeṣāt  śaśa viṣāṇa ādibhyaḥ  api aṅgura utpattiḥ na hi abhāvaḥ  viśiṣyate viśeṣaṇa yoge vā saḥ  api bhāvaḥ syāt na nirūpa ākhya iti arthaḥ viśeṣaṇa yogam abhāvasya abhyupetya āha na api abhāvaḥ kasyacid utpatti hetuḥ iti api ca yadi ena ananvitam na tad tasya vikāraḥ yathā ghaṭa śarāva udañca ānādayaḥ  hemnān anvitā na hema vikāraḥ ananvitāḥ ca ete vikārā abhāvena tasmāt na abhāva vikāraḥ bhāva vikāraḥ tu te bhāvasya tena anvita tvāt iti āha abhāvāt ca bhāva utpattau  iti abhāva kāraṇa vādinaḥ  vacanam anubhāṣya dūṣayati yad tu uktam iti sthiraḥ  api bhāvaḥ kramavat sahakāri samavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti na ca anupakārakāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ sa ca asya sahakāribhiḥ ādhīyamānā upakāraḥ  na bhinnaḥ na api abhinnaḥ kintu nirvācya eva anirvācyāt ca kāryam api anirvācyam eva jāyate na ca etāvatā sthirasya akāraṇa tvam tad upādāna tvāt kāryasya rajju upādāna tvam iva bhujaṅgasya iti uktam tathā ca śrutiḥ mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti apica ye api sarvatas  vilakṣaṇāni sva lakṣaṇāni vastu santyā sthiṣata teṣām api kim iti bīja jātīyebhyaḥ  aṅkura jātīyāni eva jāyante kāryāṇi na tu kramelaka jātīyāni na hi bījāt bīja antarasya vā kramelakasya vā atyanta vailakṣaṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ na ca bīja aṅgura tve sāmānye parama artha satī yena etayoḥ bhāvikaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  bhavet  tasmāt kālpanikāt eva sva lakṣaṇa upādānat bīja jātīyāt tathāvidhasya eva aṅgura jātīyasya utpatti niyama āstheyaḥ anyathā kārya hetuka anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ diś mātrasya sūcitam prapañcaḥ tu brahma tatva samīkṣā nyāya kaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti na iha pratamyate vistara bhayāt  udāsīnānām api ca evam siddhiḥ bhāṣyasya sugamam na abhāva upalabdheḥ pūrva adhikaraṇa saṃgatim āha evam iti bāhya artha vādibhyaḥ  vijñānam atra vādinām sugata abhipreta tayā viśeṣam āha keṣāñcid kila iti atha pramātā pramāṇam prameyam pramitiḥ iti hi catusṛṣu vidhāsu tatva parisamāptiḥ āsāmānyatama abhāve api tattvasya avyavasthānāt tasmāt anena vijñāna skandha mātram tattvam vyavasthāpayatā catasraḥ  vidhā eṣitavyāḥ tathā ca na vijñāna skandha mātram tattvam na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  vijñāna mātram catasraḥ  vidhāḥ ca ityata āha tasmin  ca vijñāna vāde buddhi ārūḍhena rūpeṇa iti yadi api anubhavān na anyaḥ  anubhāvyaḥ  anubhavita anubhavanam tathā api buddhi ārūḍhena buddhi parikalpitena anya stha eva eṣa pramāṇa prameya phala vyavahāraḥ pramātṛ vyavahāraḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam na pāramārthika iti arthaḥ evam ca siddha sādhanam na hi brahma vādinaḥ  nīla ādi ākārām vittim abhyupagacchanti kintvanirvacanīyam nīlāt iti tathā hi svarūpam vijñānasya asati ākāra yuktam prameyam prameya prakāśanam pramāṇa phalam tad prakāśana śaktiḥ pramāṇam bāhya vādinoḥ api vaibhāṣika sautra antikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇa phala vyavahāraḥ  abhimata iti āha sati api bāhyer atha iti bhinna adhikaraṇa tve hi pramāṇa phalayoḥ tad bhāvaḥ  na syāt  na hi khadira gocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvaḥ  bhavati tasmāt anayoḥ aika ādhikaraṇyam vaktavyam katham ca tad bhavati yadi jñāna sthe eva pramāṇa phale bhavataḥ na ca jñānam sva lakṣaṇam anaṃśam aṃśābhyām vastu sabhdyām yujyate tad eva jñānam ajñāna vyāvṛtti kalpita jñānatva aṃśam phalam aśakti vyāvṛtti parikalpita ātmāna ātma prakāśana śakti aṃśam pramāṇam prameyam tu asya bāhyam eva evam sautera antika samaye api jñānasya artha sārūpyam anīla ākāra vyāvṛttyā kalpita nīla ākāra tvam pramāṇam vyavasthāpana hetu tvāt  ajñāna vyāvṛtti kalpitam ca jñāna tvam phalam vyavasthāpya tvāt  tathā ca āhuḥ anahi vitti sattā eva tad vedanā yuktā tasyāḥ sarvatra aviśeṣāt tām tu sārūpyam āviśat sarūpayat tad ghaṭayet iti praśna pūrvakam bāhya artha abhāva upapattīḥ āha katham punar avamyata iti sa hi vijñāna ālambanatva abhimataḥ  bāhyor athaḥ paramāṇuḥ tāvat na saṃbhavati eka sthūla nīla ābhāsam hi jñānam na parama sūkṣma paramāṇu ābhāsam na ca anya ābhāsam anya gocaram bhavitum arhati atiprasaṅgena sarva gocara tayā sarva sarvajñatva prasaṅgāt  na ca pratibhāsa dharmaḥ sthaulyam iti yuktam vikalpa asaha tvāt kim ayam pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsana kāler athasya dharmaḥ yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ advā tathā asati hi sva aṃśa ālambanam eva vijñānam abhyupetam bhavati evam ca kaḥ pratikūlībhavati anukūlam ācarati dvitīya it ced  tathā hi rūpa parimāṇava eva nirantaram utpannā eka vijñāna upārohiṇaḥ sthaulyam na ca atra kasyacid bhrānta tā na hi na te rūpa paramāṇavaḥ na ca na nirantaram utpannāḥ na ca eka vijñānānupārohiṇaḥ tena mā bhūt nīlatva ādivat paramāṇu dharmaḥ pratyekam paramāṇuṣu abhāvāt pratibhā sadaśā āpannānām tu teṣām bhaviṣyati bahutva ādivat sāṃvṛtam sthaulyam yathā āhuḥ agrahe anekasya ca ekena kiñcid rūpam hi gṛhyate sāṃvṛtam pratibhāsa stham tad eka ātmani asaṃbhavāt na ca tad darśanam bhrāntam nānā vastu grahāt yatas  sāṃvṛtam grahaṇam na anyatra ca vastu grahaḥ  bhramaḥ aiti tad na nairantarya avabhāsasya bhrānta tvāt  gandha rasa sparśa paramāṇu antaritā hi te rūpa paramāṇavaḥ  na nirantarāḥ tasmāt ārāt sa antareṣu vṛkṣeṣu eka dhana vana pratyayavat eṣa sthūla pratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sa antareṣu bhrānta eva iti paśyāmaḥ tasmāt  kalpanā apoḍha tve api bhrānta tvāt haṭa ādi pratyayasya pīta śaṅkha ādi jñānavat na pratyakṣatā paramāṇu gocaratva abhyupagame tad idam uktam na tāvat paramāṇavaḥ stambha ādi pratyaya paricchedyā bhavitum arhanti na api tad samūhā vā stambha āt ayaḥ  vayavinaḥ teṣām abhede paramāṇubhyaḥ paramāṇava eva tatra ca uktam dūṣaṇam bhede tu gavāśvasyā iva atyanta vailakṣaṇyam iti na tādātmyam samavāyaḥ ca nirākṛta iti evam bheda abheda vikalpena jāti guṇa karma ādīn api pratyācakṣīta tasmāt yad yad pratibhāsate tasya sarvasya vicāra asaha tvāt apratibhāsamāna sadbhāve ca pramāṇa abhāvāt na bāhya ālambanāḥ pratyayā iti api ca na tāvat vijñānam indriyavat nilīnam artham pratyakṣayitum arhati na hi yathā indriyam artha viṣayam jñānam janayati evam vijñānam aparam vijñānam janayitum arhati tatra api samāna tvāt anuyogasya anavasthā prasaṅgāt  na ca artha ādhāram prākaṭya lakṣaṇam phalam ādhātum utsahate atīta anāgateṣu tad asaṃbhavāt na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  apratyutpannaḥ  dharmī dharmāḥ ca asya pratyutpannā iti tasmāt jñāna svarūpa pratyakṣatā eva artha pratyakṣa tā abhyupeyā tad ca anākāram sadā ajānataḥ  bheda abhāvāt katham artha bhedam vyavasthāpayet iti tad bheda vyavasthāpanāya ākāra bhedaḥ  asya eṣitavyaḥ tad uktam ana hi vitti sattā eva tad vedanā yuktā tasyāḥ sarvatra aviśeṣāt tām tu sārūpyam āviśat sarūpayat tad ghaṭayet iti ekaḥ ca ayam ākāraḥ  anubhūyate sa ced vijñānasya na artha sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam asti iti āha apicā anu bhava mātreṇa sādhāraṇa ātmanaḥ  jñānasya iti api ca saha upalambha niyamāt iti yadyena saha niyata saha upalambhanam tad tatas  na bhidyate yathā ekasmāt candramasaḥ  dvitīyaḥ candramāḥ niyata saha upalambhanaḥ ca arthaḥ  jñānena iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ niṣedhyaḥ  hi bhedaḥ saha upalambha aniyamena vyāptaḥ  yathā bhinnau  aśvinau na avaśyam saha upavabhyete kadācid abhra apidhāne anyatarasya ekasya upalabdheḥ saḥ  ayam iha bheda vyāpaka aniyama virūddhaḥ  niyama upalabhyamānaḥ tad vyāpyam bhedam nivartayati iti tad uktam asaha upalamba niyamāt abhedaḥ  nīla tad dhiyoḥ bhedaḥ ca bhrānti vijñānaiḥ ddṛśyata indau  iva advaye aiti svapna ādivat ca idam draṣṭavyam yaḥ  yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvaḥ  bāhyānāvambanaḥ yathā svapna māyā ādi pratyayaḥ tathā ca eṣa vivāda adhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāva hetuḥ bāhya anālambanatā hi pratyayatva mātra anubandhinī vṛkṣatā iva śiṃśapātu amātra anubandhinī iti tanmātra anubandhini nirālambana tve sādhye bhavati pratyaya tvam svabhāva hetuḥ atra antare sautra antikaḥ codayati katham punar asi bāhyer athe nīlam idam pītam ityādi pratyaya vaicitryam upapadyate sa hi mene ye yasmin sati api kādācid kāḥ te sarve tad atirikta hetu sāpekṣāḥ yathā avivakṣati ajigamiṣati mayi vacana gamana pratibhāsāḥ pratyayāḥ cetana saṃtāna antara sāpekṣāḥ tathā ca vivāda adhyāsitāḥ sati api ālaya vijñāna saṃtāne ṣaṣ api pravṛtti pratyayā iti svabhāva hetuḥ yaḥ ca asau  ālaya vijñāna saṃtāna atiriktaḥ kādācid ka pravṛtti jñāna bheda hetuḥ sa bāhyor atham iti vāsanā paripāka pratyaya kādācitka tvāt  kadācid utpāda iti ced  nanu eka saṃtati patitānām ālaya vijñānānām tad pravṛtti vijñāna janana śaktiḥ vāsanā tasyāḥ ca sva kārya upajanam pratyābhimukhyam paripākaḥ tasya ca pratyayaḥ sva saṃtāna vartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ saṃtāna antara apekṣā anabhyupagamāt tathā ca sarve api ālaya saṃtāna patitāḥ paripāka hetavaḥ  bhaveyuḥ na vā kaścid api ālaya saṃtāna pātitva aviśeṣāt kṣaṇa bhedāt śakti bhedaḥ tasya ca kādācid ka tvāt kāryakādācid ka tvam iti ced  nanu evam ekasya eva nīla jñāna upajana sāmarthyam tad prabodha sāmarthyam ca iti kṣaṇa antarasya etad na syāt  satve vā katham kṣaṇa bhedāt sāmarthya bheda iti ālaya saṃtāna vartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samartha hetu sadbhāve kārya kṣepa anupapatteḥ sva saṃtāna mātra adhīna tve niṣedhyasya kādācid ka tvasya viruddham sadātana tvam tasya upalabdhyā kādācid ka tvam nivartamānam hetu antara apekṣa tve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandha siddhiḥ na ca jñāna saṃtāna antara nibandhana tvam sarveṣām iṣyate pravṛtti vijñānānām vijñāna vādibhiḥ api tu kasyacid eva vicchinna gamana vacana pratibhāsasya pravṛtti vijñānasya api ca sattva antara saṃtāna nimitta tve tasya api sadā saṃnidhānāt na kādācid ka tvam syāt  na hi sattva antara saṃtānasya deśataḥ kālataḥ  vā viprakarṣa saṃbhavaḥ vijñāna vāde vijñāna atirikta deśānābhyupagamāt amūrta tvāt ca vijñānānām adeśa ātmaka tvāt saṃsārasya ādimatvā prasaṅgena apūrva sattva prādurbhāva anabhyupagamāt ca na kālataḥ  api viprakarṣa saṃbhavaḥ tasmāt asati bāhyer athe pratyaya vaicitrya anupapatteḥ astya anumānikaḥ  bāhya artha iti sautra antikāḥ pratipedire tān nirākaroti vāsanā vaicitryāt iti āha vijñāna vādī idam atra ākūtam sva saṃtāna mātra prabhava tve api pratyaya kādācid katva upapattau saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvena hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ tathā hi bāhya nimittaka tve api katham kadācid  nīla saṃvedanam kadācid  pīta saṃvedanam bāhya nīla pīta saṃnidhāna asaṃnidhānābhyām iti ced  atha pīta saṃnidhāne api kim iti nīla jñānam na bhavati pīta jñānam bhavati tatra tasya sāmarthyāt asāmarthyāt ca itarasmin  iti ced  kutas  punar ayam sāmarthya asāmarthya bhedaḥ hetu bhedāt iti ced  evam tarhi kṣaṇānām api sva kāraṇa bheda nibandhaḥ śakti bhedaḥ  bhaviṣyati saṃtāninaḥ  hi kṣaṇāḥ kārya bheda hetavaḥ te ca pratikāryam bhidyante ca na ca saṃtānaḥ  nāma kaścid eka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānām yad abhedāt  kṣaṇā na bhidyeran nanu uktam na kṣaṇa bheda abhedābhyām śakti bheda abhedau bhinnānām api kṣaṇānām eka sāmarthya upalabdheḥ anyathā eka eva kṣaṇe nīla jñāna janana sāmarthyam iti na bhūyaḥ nīla jñānāni jāyeran tad samarthasya atīta tvāt  kṣaṇa antarāṇām ca asāmarthyāt  tasmāt  kṣaṇa bhede api na sāmarthya bhedaḥ saṃtāna bhede tu sāmarthyam bhidyata iti tad na yadi bhinnānām saṃtānānām na ekam sāmarthyam hanta tarhi nīla saṃtānānām api mithas  bhinnānām na ekam asti nīla ākāra ādhāna sāmarthyam iti saṃnidhāne api nīla saṃtāna antarasya na nīla jñānam upajāyeta tasmāt saṃtāna antarāṇām iva kṣaṇa antarāṇām api sva kāraṇa bheda adhīna upajanānām keṣāñcid eva sāmarthya bhedaḥ keṣāñcinna iti vaktavyam tathā ca eka ālaya jñāna saṃtāna patiteṣu kasyacid eva jñā na kṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthya atiśayaḥ  vāsanā para nāmā sva pratyaya āsāditaḥ yatas  nīla ākāram pravṛtti vijñānam jāyate na pīta ākāram kasyacid tu sa tādṛśaḥ  yatas  pīta ākāram jñānam na nīla ākāram iti vāsanā vaicitryāt eva sva pratyaya āsāditāt jñāna vaicitrya siddheḥ na tad atirikta artha sadbhāve kiñcana asti pramāṇam iti paśyāmaḥ ālayavijñāna saṃtāna patitam eva asaṃviditam jñānam vāsanā tad vaicitryāt nīla ādi anubhava vaicitryam pūrva nīla ādi anubhava vaicitryāt ca vāsanā vaicitryam iti anādita anayoḥ vijñāna vāsanayoḥ tasmāt na paraspara āśraya doṣa saṃbhavaḥ  bīja aṅkura saṃtānavat iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām api vāsanā vaicitryasya eva jñāna vaicitrya hetu tā na artha vaicitryasya iti āha api ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ na abhāva upalabdheḥ iti na khalva bhāvaḥ  bāhyasya arthasya adhyavasātum śakyate sa hi upalambha abhāvāt vā adhyavasīyeta sati api upalambhe tasya bāhya aviṣaya tvāt vā sati api bāhya viṣaya tve bāhya artha bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt vā na tāvat  sarvathā upalambha abhāva iti praśna pūrvakam āha kasmāt  upalabdheḥ iti na hi sphuṭatare sarva janīna upalambhe sati tad abhāvaḥ śakyaḥ  vaktum iti arthaḥ dvitīyam pakṣam avalambate nanu na aham evam bravīmi iti nirākaroti bāḍham evam bravīṣi upalabdhi grāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇā upalabdhiḥ gṛhyamāṇā bāhya viṣaya tvena eva gṛhyate na upalabdhi mātram iti arthaḥ atas ca iti vakṣyamāṇa upapatti parāmarśaḥ tṛtīyam pakṣam ālambate nanu bāhyasya arthasya asaṃbhavāt iti nirākaroti na ayam sādhuḥ adhyavasāya iti idam atra ākūtam ghaṭa paṭa āt ayaḥ  hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu parama sūkṣmāḥ tatra idam nānā diś deśa vyāpitva lakṣaṇam sthaulyam yadi api jñāna ākāra tvena āvaraṇa an āvaraṇa lakṣaṇena viruddha dharma saṃsargeṇa yujyate jñāna upādheḥ anāvṛta tvāt eva tathā api tad deśatva ātad deśatva kampatva raktā raktatva lakṣaṇaiḥ viruddha dharma saṃsargaiḥ asya nānā tvam prasajyamānam jñāna ākāra tve api na śakyam śakreṇa api vārayitum vyatireka avyatireka vṛtti vikalpau ca paramāṇoḥ aṃśavat tvam ca upapāditāni vaiśeṣika parīkṣāyām tasmāt bāhya arthavat na jñāne api sthaulya saṃbhavaḥ na ca tāvat  paramāṇu ābhāsam eka jñānam ekasya nānā ātmatva anupapatteḥ ākārāṇām vā jñāna tādātmyāt ekatva prasaṅgāt  na ca yāvanta ākārāḥ tāvanti eva jñānāni tāvatām jñānānām mithas  vārtām abhijña tayā sthūla anubhava abhāva prasaṅgāt  na ca tad pṛṣṭha bhāvī samasta jñāna ākāra saṃkalana ātmaka ekaḥ sthūla vikalpaḥ  vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam tasya api sa ākāratayā sthaulya ayogāt yathā āha dharma kīrtiḥ atasmāt na arthe na ca jñāne sthūla ābhāsaḥ tad ātmanaḥ ekatra pratiṣiddha tvāt bahuṣu api na saṃbhavaḥ aiti tasmāt bhavatā api jñāna ākāram sthaulyam samarthayamānena pramāṇa pravṛtti apravṛtti pūrvakau saṃbhava asaṃbhavā vā astheyau tathā ced anta āspadam aśakyam jñānāt bhinnam yabāhyam apahnotum iti yad ca jñānasya pratyartham vyavasthāyai viṣaya sārūpyam āsthitam na etena viṣayaḥ  apahnotum śakyaḥ asati arthe tad sārūpyasya tad vyavasthāyāḥ ca anupapatteḥ iti āha na ca jñānasya viṣaya sārūpyāt iti yaḥ ca saha upalambha niyama uktaḥ śaḥ api vkalpam na sahate yadi jñāna arthayoḥ sāhityena upalambhaḥ tatas  viruddhaḥ  hetuḥ na abhedam sādhayitum arhati sāhityasya tad viruddha bheda vyāpta tvāt abhede tad anupapatteḥ atha eka upalambha niyamaḥ na eka tvasya avācakaḥ saha śabdaḥ api ca kim eka tvena upalambha āhaḥ eka upālambhaḥ  jñāna arthayoḥ na tāvat eka tvena upalambha iti āha bahis upalabdheḥ ca viṣayasya atha eka upalambha niyamaḥ tatra āha ata eva saha upalambha niyamaḥ  api pratyaya viṣayaḥ  arupāya upeya bhāva hetu kaḥ nābheda hetuka iti avagantavyam yathā hi sarvam cākṣuṣam prabhā rūpa anuviddham buddhi bodhyam niyamena manujaiḥ upalabhyate na ca etāvatā ghaṭa ādi rūpam prabhā ātmakam bhavati kintu prabhā upāya tvāt niyamaḥ evam iha api ātma sākṣika anubhava upāya tvāt arthasya eka upalambha niyama iti api ca yatra eka vijñāna gocarau ghaṭa paṭau tatra artha bhedam vijñāna bhedam ca adyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ na ca etad ekātmye avakalpata iti āha tathā ghaṭa darśanam paṭa jñānam iti tathā artha abhede api vijñāna bheda darśanāt na vijñāna ātmaka tvam arthasya iti āha tathā ghaṭa darśanam ghaṭa smaraṇam iti api ca sva rūpa mātra paryavasitam jñānam jñāna antara vārtān abhijñam iti yayoḥ bhedaḥ te dve na gṛhīte iti bhedaḥ  api tad gataḥ  na gṛhīta iti evam kṣaṇika śūnyānātma tvāt ayaḥ  api aneka pratijñā hetu dṛṣṭānta jñāna bheda sādhyāḥ evam svam asa ādhāraṇam anyatas  vyāvṛtam lakṣaṇam yasya tad api yad vyāvartate yatas ca vyāvartate tad aneka jñāna sādhyam evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam api vidhi rūpam anya apoha rūpam vā aneka jñāna gamyam evam vāsya vāsaka bhāvaḥ  aneka jñāna sādhyaḥ evam avidyā upaplava vaśena yad sat asat dharma tvam yathā nīlam iti saddharmaḥ nara viṣāṇām iti asat dharmaḥ amūrtam iti sat asat dharmaḥ śakyam hi śaśa viṣāṇam amūrtam vaktum śakyam ca vijñānam amūrtam vaktum yathā uktam aanādi vāsanā udbhūta vikalpa pariniṣṭhitaḥ śabda arthaḥ trividhaḥ  dharmaḥ  bhāva abhāva ubhayāśrayaḥ aiti evam mokṣa pratijñā ca yaḥ  mucyate yatas ca mucyate yena mucyate tad aneka jñāna sādhyā evam vipratipannam pratipādayitum pratijñā iti yad pratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaḥ ca tad aneka jñāna sādhya iti asati ekasmin  aneka artha jñāna pratisaṃghātari na upapadyate tad sarvam vijñānasya sva aṃśa ālambane anupapannam iti āha api ca dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ pūrva uttara kālayoḥ iti api ca bheda āśrayaḥ karma phala bhāvaḥ  na abhinne jñāne bhavitum arhati naḥ khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru na api pākaḥ pacyate api tu taṇḍulāḥ tad iha api na jñānam sva aṃśena jñeyam ātmani vṛtti virodhāt api tu tad atiriktor athaḥ pācyā iva taṇḍulāḥ pāka atiriktā iti bhūmi racanā pūrvakam āha kiñca anyat vijñānam vijñānam iti abhyupagaccheta iti codayati nanu vijñānasya sva rūpa vyatirikta grāhyatva iti ayam arthaḥ svarūpāt atiriktam artham ced vijñānam gṛhṇāti tatas tad apratyakṣam sannartham pratyakṣayitum arhati na hi cakṣuḥ iva tad nilīnam arthe kañcana atiśayam ādhatte yena artham apratyakṣam sat pratyakṣayet  api tu tad pratyakṣatā eva artha pratyakṣa tā yathā āhuḥ aapratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati aiti tad ced  jñāna antareṇa pratīyeta tad apratītam na artha viṣayam jñānam aparokṣayitum arhati evam tad tad iti anavasthā tasmāt anavasthāyāḥ  bibhyatā varam sva ātmani vṛttiḥ āsthitā apica yathā pradīpaḥ  na dīpa antaram apekṣate evam jñānam api na jñāna antaram apekṣitum arhati sama tvāt iti tad etad pariharati tad ubhayam api asat vijñāna grahaṇa mātra eva vijñāna sākṣiṇaḥ  grahaṇa ākāṅkṣa anutpādāt anavasthā āśaṅkā anupapatteḥ ayam arthaḥ satyam apratyakṣasya upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati na tu upalabdha āram prati tad pratyakṣa tvāya upalambha antaram prārthanīyam api tu tasmin  indriya artha saṃnikarṣāt antar  karaṇa vikāra bheda utpanna mātra eva prabhātuḥ arthaḥ ca upalambhaḥ ca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ arthaḥ  hi nilīna svabhāvaḥ pramātāram prati sva pratyakṣa tvāya antaḥkaraṇa vikāra bhedam anubhavam apekṣate anubhavaḥ tu jaḍaḥ  api svaccha tayā caitanyūbimba udgrahaṇāya na anubhava antaram apekṣate yena anavasthā bhavet  na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ  anubhava utpannaḥ ca na ca pramātuḥ pratyakṣaḥ  bhavati yathā nīla ādiḥ tasmāt yathā chettā chidayā chedyam vṛkṣa ādi vyāpnoti na tu chidā chidā antareṇa na api chidā eva chetrī kintu svata eva devadatta ādiḥ yathā vā paktā pākyam pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākam pāka antareṇa na api pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadetta ādiḥ evam pramātā prameyam nīla ādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramām pramā antareṇa na api pramā eva pramātrī kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ na ca pramātari kūṭastha nitya caitanye prama apekṣā saṃbhavaḥ  yatas  pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātṛ antara apekṣāyām anavasthā bhavet  tasmāt  suṣṭhu uktam avijñāna grahaṇa mātra eva vijñāna sākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭastha nitya caitanyasya grahaṇa kāṅkṣā nutpādāt iti yad uktam asama tvāt avabhāsya avabhāsaka bhāva anupapatteḥ aiti tatra āha sākṣi pratyayayoḥ ca svabhāva vaiṣamyāt upalabdhrupalabhya bhāva upapatteḥ mā bhūt  jñānayoḥ sāmyena grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ jñātṛ jñānayoḥ tu vaiṣamyāt upapadyata eva grāhya tvam ca jñānasya na grāhaka kriyā janita phala śāli tayā yathā bāhya arthasya phale phala antara anupapatteḥ yathā āhuḥ ana saṃvidaryate phala tvāt iti api tu pramātāram prati svatas siddha prakaṭa tayā grāhyaḥ  api arthaḥ pramātāram prati satyām saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvid api prakaṭā yathā āhuḥ anye na asyāḥ karma bhāvaḥ  vidyate iti syāt etad ṣa yad prakāśate tad anyena prakāśyate yathā jñāna arthau tathā ca sākṣiti na asti pratyaya sākṣiṇoḥ vaiṣamyam iti ata āha svayaṃsiddhasya ca sākṣiṇaḥ  apratyākhyeya tvāt  tathā hi asya sākṣiṇaḥ sadā asaṃdigdha aviparītasya nitya sākṣātkāra tān āgantuka prakāśa tve ghaṭate tathā hi pramātā saṃdihānaḥ  api asaṃdigdhaḥ  viparyasyan  api aviparītaḥ parokṣam artham ud prekṣamāṇaḥ  api aparokṣaḥ smaran  api anubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛt mātrasya na ca etad anya adhīna saṃvedana tve ghaṭe anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ ca uktaḥ tasmāt svayaṃsiddhatā asya anicchatā api apratyākhyeyā pramāṇa mārga yatta tvāt iti kiñca uktena krameṇa jñānasya svayam avagantṛtva abhāvāt pramātuḥ anabhyupagame ca pradīpavat vijñānam avabhāsaka antara nirapekṣam svayam eva prathata iti bruvata apramāṇa gamyam vijñānam anavagantṛkam iti uktam syāt  śilā ghana madhya stha pradīpa sahasra prathanavat avagantuḥ ced kasyacid api na prakāśate kṛtam avagamena svayaṃprakāśena iti vijñānam eva avagantriti manvānaḥ śaṅkate bāḍham evam anubhava rūpa tvāt iti na phalasya kartṛ tvam karma tvam vā asti iti pradīpavat kartṛ antaram eṣitavyam tathā ca na siddha sādhanam iti pariharati na anyasya avagantuḥ iti nanu sākṣi sthāne astu asmad abhimatam eva vijñānam tathā ca nāmni eva vipratipattiḥ na arthā iti śaṅkate sākṣiṇaḥ  avagantuḥ svayaṃsiddha tām upakṣipatā abhipreya tā svayam prathate vijñānam iti eṣa eva iti nirākaroti na iti bhavanti hi vijñānasya utpāda āt ayaḥ  dharmā abhyupetāḥ tathā ca asya phala tayā na avagantṛ tvam kartṛ phala bhāvasya ekatra virodhāt  kintu pradīpa ādi tulya tā iti arthaḥ vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādivat  bādhā bādhau vaidharmyam svapna pratyayaḥ bādhitaḥ  jāgrat pratyayaḥ ca ābādhitaḥ tvayā api ca avaśyam jāgrat pratyayasya ābādhita tvam āstheyam tena hi svapna pratyayaḥ bādhitaḥ  mithyā iti avagamyate jāgrat pratyayasya tu bādhya tve svapna pratyayasya asau na bādhakaḥ  bhavet  na hi bādhyam eva bādhakam bhavitum arhati tathā ca na svapna pratyayaḥ mithyā iti sādhya vikalaḥ  dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt  svapnavat iti tasmāt bādha ābādhābhyām vaidharmyāt na svapna pratyaya dṛṣṭāntena jāgrat pratyayasya śakyam nirālambana tvamadhyavasātum nidrā glānam iti karaṇa doṣa abhidānam mithyātvāya vaidharmya antaram āha api ca smṛtiḥ eva iti saṃskāra mātra jam hi vijñānam smṛtiḥ pratyutpanna indriya saṃprayoga liṅga śabda sārūpyāni atha anupapadyamāna yogya pramāṇa an utpatti lakṣaṇa sāmagrī prabhavam tu jñānam upalabghiḥ tad iha nidrāṇasya sāmagryantara virahāt saṃskāraḥ pariśiṣyate tena saṃskāra ja tvāt smṛtiḥ sā api ca nidrā doṣāt viparīta āvartamānam api pitṛ ādi vartamāna tayā bhāsayati tena smṛteḥ eva tāvat upalabdheḥ viśeṣaḥ tasyāḥ ca smṛteḥ vaiparītyam iti atas  mahat antaram iti arthaḥ api ca svatas prāmāṇye siddhe jāgrat pratyayānām yathārtha tvam anubhava siddham na anumānena anyathayitum śakyam anubhava virodhena tad anutpādāt  abādita viṣaya tā api anumāna utpāda sāmagrī grāhya tayā pramāṇam na ca kāraṇa abhāve kāryam utpattum arhati iti āśa yavān āha api ca anubhava virodha prasaṅgāt iti na bhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ yathā loka darśanam ca anvaya vyatirekau  anuśriyamāṇau  artha eva upalabdheḥ bhavataḥ  na artha anapekṣāyām vāsanāyām vāsanāya api artha upalabdhi adhīnatva darśanāt iti arthaḥ api ca āśraya abhāvāt api na laukikī vāsanā upapadyate na ca kṣaṇikam ālaya vijñānam vāsanā ādhāraḥ  bhavitum arhati dvayoḥ yugapad utpadyamānayoḥ savya dakṣiṇa śṛṅgavat ādhāra ādheya bhāva abhāvāt prāk utpannasya ca ādheya utpāda samaye asataḥ kṣaṇikatva vyāghāta iti āśa yavān āha api ca vāsanā nāma iti śeṣam ati rohita artham kṣaṇika tvāt ca syāt etad  yadi sa ākāram vijñānam saṃbhavati bāhyaḥ ca arthaḥ sthūla sūkṣma vikalpena asaṃbhavī hanta evam artha jñāne sattena tāvat vicāram na sahete na api asattvena asataḥ  bhāsanā yogāt na ubhaya tvena virodhāt sadasataḥḥ ekatra anupapatteḥ na api anubhaya tvena eka niṣedhasya itara vidhānana āntarīyaka tvāt tasmāt vicāra asaha tvam eva astu tattvam vastūnām yathā āhuḥ aiyam vastu bala āyātam yad vadanti vipaścitaḥ yathā yathārthāḥ cintyante vivicyante tathā tathā aiti na kvacid api pakṣe vyavataṣṭhanta iti arthaḥ tad etad nirācikīrṣuḥ āha śūnya vādi pakṣaḥ tu sarva pramāṇa vipratiṣiddha iti tad nirākaraṇāya na ādaraḥ kriyate laukikāni hi pramāṇāni sat asattva gocarāṇi taiḥ khalu sat sat iti gṛhyamāṇam yathābhūtam aviparītam tattvam vyavasthāpyate asat ca asat iti gṛhyamāṇam yathābhūtam aviparītam tattvam vyavasthāpyate sat asatoḥ ca vicāra asaha tvam vyavasthāpayatā sarva pramāṇa vipratiṣiddham vyavasthāpitam bhavati tathā ca sarva pramāṇa vipratiṣedhāt na iyam vyavasthā upapadyate yadi ucyeta tāttvikam prāmāṇyam pramāṇānām anena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam tathā ca bhinna viṣaya tvāt na sarva pramāṇa vipratiṣedha iti ata āha na hyeyam sarva pramāṇa prasiddhaḥ  laloka vyavahāraḥ  anyat ta tvam anadhigamya śakyate apahnotum pramāṇāni hi sva gocare pravartamānāni tattvam idam iti eva pravartante atāttvika tvam tu tad gocarasya anyatas  bādhakāt avagantavyam na punar  sāṃvyavahārikam naḥ prāmāṇyam na tu tāttvikam iti eva pravartante bādhakam ca atāttvika tvam eṣām tad gocara viparīta tattva upadarśanena darśayet  yathā śuktikeyam na rajatam marīcayaḥ na toyam ekaḥ candraḥ  na candra dvayam ityādi tadvat iha api samasta pramāṇa gocara viparīta tattva antara vyavasthāpanena atāttvika tvam eṣām pramāṇānām bādhakena darśanīyam na tu avyavasthāpita tattva antareṇa pramāṇāni śakyāni bādhitum vicāra asaha tvam vastūnām tattvam vyavasthāpayat bādhakam atāt tvika tvam pramāṇānām darśayati iti ced  kim punar idam vicāra asaha tvam vastu yad tattvam abhimatam kim tad vastu paramārthataḥ sat ādīnām anyatamat  kevalam vicāram na sahate atha vicāra asaha tvena nistattvam eva tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnīm anyatamat vicāram na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham na sahate ced na sat ādīnām anyatamat  anyatamat ced  katham na vicāram sahate atha nistattvam ced  katham anyatamat tattvam avyavasthāpya śakyam evam vaktum na ca nistattva tā eva tattvam bhāvānām tāsati hi tattva abhāvaḥ syāt  saḥ  api ca vicāram na sahata iti uktam bhavadbhiḥ api ca āropitam niṣedhanīyam āropaḥ ca tattva adhiṣṭhānaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ  yathā śuktikā ādiṣu rajata ādeḥ na ced  kiñcid asti tattvam kasya kasmin  āropaḥ tasmāt niṣprapañcam parama artha sabrahma anirvācya prapañca ātmanā āropyate tad ca tattvam vyavasthāpya atāttvika tvena sāṃvyavahārikam pramāṇānām bādhakena upapadyata iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ sarvathā anupapatteḥ ca virājate kim bahunā uktena yathā yathā granthator athatas ca ayam vaināśika samaya iti granthataḥ tāvat paśyanā tiṣṭhana āmiddhapa uṣadha ādya sādhu pada prayogaḥ arthataḥ ca nairātmyam abhyupetya ālaya vijñānam samasta vāsanā ādhāram abhyupagacchan  akṣaram ātmānam abhyupaiti evam kṣaṇika tvam abhyupetya autpādāt vā tathāgatānām anutpādāt vā sthitā eva eṣām dharmāṇām dharmatā dharma sthiti tā aiti nityatām upaiti ityādi bahūn netavyam iti na ekasmin  asaṃbhavāt  nirastaḥ  mukta kacchānām sugatānām samayaḥ vivasanānām samaya idānīm nirasyate tad samayam āha saṃkṣepa vistārābhyām sapta ca eṣām padārthāḥ saṃmatā iti tatra saṃkṣepam āha saṃkṣepataḥ tu dvau  eva padārthau  iti bodha ātmakaḥ  jīvaḥ  jaḍa vargaḥ tu ajīva iti yathāyogam tayoḥ jīvā jīvayoḥ imam aparam prapañcam ācakṣate tam āha pañcāstikāyā nāma iti sarveṣām api eṣām avāntara prabhedān iti jīvāstikāyaḥ tridhā baddhaḥ  muktaḥ  nitya siddhaḥ ca iti pudgala astikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā pṛthivī ādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāram jaṅgamam cti dharma astikāyaḥ pravṛtti anumeyaḥ  adharma astikāyāḥ sthiti anumeyaḥ ākāśa āstikāya u dvedhā loka ākāśaḥ  aloka ākāśaḥ ca tatra upari upari sthitānām lokānām antar vartī loka ākāśaḥ teṣām upari mokṣa sthānam aloka ākāśaḥ tatra hi na lokāḥ santi tad evam jīvājīva padārthau pañcadhā prapañcitau āsrava saṃvara nirjarāḥ trayaḥ padārthāḥ pravṛtti lakṣaṇāḥ prapañcyate dvidhā pravṛttiḥ samyak mithyā ca tatra mithyā pravṛttiḥ āsravaḥ samyak pravṛttī tu saṃvara nirjarau āsrāvayati puruṣam viṣayeṣu iti indriya pravṛttiḥ āsravaḥ indriya dvārā hi pauruṣam jyotiḥ viṣayān spṛśat rūpa ādi jñāna rūpeṇa pariṇamata iti anye tu karmāṇi āsravam āhuḥ tāni hi kartāram abhivyāpya sravanti kartāram anugacchanti iti āsravaḥ sā iyam mithyā pravṛttiḥ anartha hetu tvāt saṃvara nirjarau ca samyak pravṛttī tatra śama dama ādi rūpā pravṛttiḥ saṃvaraḥ sā hi āsrava srotasaḥ  dvāram saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate nirjaraḥ tu anādi kāla pravṛtti kaṣāya kaluṣa puṇyā puṇya prahāṇa hetuḥ tapta śilā ārohaṇa ādiḥ sa hi niḥśeṣam puṇya apuṇyam sukha duḥkha upabhogena jarayati iti nirjaraḥ bandhaḥ aṣṭavidham karma tatra ghātikarma caturvidham tad yathā jñāna āvaraṇīyam darśana āvaraṇīyam mohanīyam antarāyam iti tathā catvāri aghāti karmāṇi tad yathā vedanīyam nāmikam gotrikam āyuṣkam ca iti tatra samyak  jñānam na mokṣa sādhanam na hi jñānāt vastu siddhiḥ ati prasaṅgāt iti viparyayaḥ  jñāna āvaraṇīyam karma ucyate āharta darśana abhyāsāt na mokṣa iti jñānam darśana āvaraṇīyam karma bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakaraiḥ upadarśiteṣu mokṣa mārgeṣu viśeṣān avadhāraṇam mohanīyam karma mokṣa mārga pravṛttānām tadvidhna karam vijñānam antarāyam karma tāni imāni śreyaḥ hantṛ tvāt hāti karmāṇi ucyante aghātāni karmāṇi tad yathā vedanīyam karma śukla pudgala vipāka hetuḥ tad hi bandhaḥ api na niḥśreyasa paripanthi tattva jñāna avighātaka tvāt śukla pudgala ārambhaka vedanīya karma anuguṇam nāmikam karma tad hi śukla pudgalasya adya avasthām kalala buddhudādim ārabhate gotrikam avyākṛtam tatas  api ādyam śakti rūpeṇa avasthitam āyuṣkam tu āyuḥ kāyati kathayati utpādana dvāra iti āyuṣkam tāni etāni śukla pudgala ādi āśraya tvāt aghātīni karmāṇi tad etad karma aṣṭakam puruṣam bandhāti iti bandhaḥ vigalita samasta kleśa tadvāsanasya anāvaraṇa jñānasya sukha katānasya ātmana upari deśa avasthānam mokṣa iti eke anye tu ūrdhva gamana śīlaḥ  hi jīvaḥ  dharma adharma astikāyena baddhaḥ tad himokṣāt yad ūrdhvam gaccha iti eva sa mokṣa iti ta ete sapta padārthā jīva ādayaḥ saha avāntara prabhedaiḥ apanyastāḥ tatra sarvatra ca imam sapta bhaṅgīnayam nāma nyāyam avatārayanti syāt asti syāt na asti syāt asti ca na asti ca syāt avaktavyaḥ syāt asti ca avaktavyaḥ ca syāt na asti ca avaktavyaḥ ca syāt asti ca na asti ca avaktavyaḥ ca iti syāt śabdaḥ khalu ayam nipātastiṅanta pratirūpa kaḥ ḷ  anekānta dyotī yathā āhuḥ avākyeṣu anekānta dyoti gamyam prativiśeṣaṇam syāt nipātoḥ athayogi tvāt tiṅanta pratirūpakaḥ ḷ  aiti yadi punar ayam anekāntadyotakaḥ syāt śabdaḥ  na bhavet  syāt asti iti vākye syāt padam anarthakam syāt  tad idam uktam aartha yogi tvāt aiti anaikānta dyotaka tve tu syāt asti kathañcid asti iti syāt padāt kathañcid arthaḥ  asti iti anena anuktaḥ pratīyata iti na anarthakyam tathā ca asya advādaḥ sarvathā ekānta tyāgāt kiṃvṛtta cidvidheḥ sapta bhaṅganayā apekṣaḥ heya ādeya viśeṣa kṛt akiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalu ayam cit nipāta vidhinā sarvathā ekānta tyāgāt  saptasu ekānteṣu yaḥ  bhaṅgaḥ tatra yaḥ  nayaḥ tad apekṣaḥ san heya upādeya bhedāya syāt vādaḥ kalpate tathā hi yadi vastu asti eva iti eva ekāntatas tad  sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarva ātmanā asti eva iti na tad īpsā jihāsābhyām kvacid  kadācid  kathañcid  kaścid  pravarteta nivarteta vā prāpta aprāpaṇīya tvāt  heya hāna anupapatteḥ ca anaikānta pakṣe tu kvacid  kadācid  kasyacid  kathañcid  sattve hāna upādāne prekṣāvatām kalpete iti tam enam sapta bhaṅgīnayam dūṣayati na ekasmin  asaṃbhavāt  vibhājate na hi ekasmin dharmaṇi paramārtha sati parama artha satām yugapad sattva ādīnām dharmāṇām paraspara parihāra svarūpāṇām samāveśaḥ saṃbhavati etad uktam bhavati satyam yad asti vastutas tad sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarva ātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpaṇa asti eva na na asti yathā pratyagātmā yad tu kvacid  kathañcid  kadācid  kenacid ātmanā asti iti ucyate yathā prapañcaḥ tad vyavahārataḥ  na tu paramārthataḥ tasya vicāra asaha tvāt na ca pratyaya mātram vāstava tvam vyavasthāpayati śuktimaru marīcikā ādiṣu rajata toya ādeḥ api vāstavatva prasaṅgāt  laukikānām abādhena tu tad vyavasthāyām deha ātmā abhimānasya api abādhena tāttvika tve sati lokāyata mata āpātena nāstikatva prasaṅgāt  paṇḍita rūpāṇām tu deha ātmā abhimānasya vicārataḥ  bādhanam prapañcasya api anaikāntasya tulyam iti api ca sat asat tvayoḥ paraspara viruddha tvena samuccaya abhāve vikalpaḥ na ca vastuni vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati tasmāt  sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ  vā iti jñānavat  saptatva pañcatva nirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituḥ ca pramātuḥ tad karaṇasya pramāṇasya ca tad prameyasya ca saptatva pañcatvasya sat asattva saṃśaye sādhu samarthitam tīrthakaratva bhṛṣebheṇa ātmanaḥ nirdhāraṇasya ca ekānta sattve sarvatra na anekānta vāda iti āha ya ete sapta padārthā iti śeṣam ati rohita artham evam ca ātmā kārt stnyam evam ca iti cena samuccayam dyotayati śarīra pariṇatve hi ātmanaḥ  akṛtsna tvam paricchinna tvam tathā ca anitya tvam ye hi paricchinnāḥ te sarve anityā yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ tathā ca ātmā iti tad etad āha yathā ekasmin dharmiṇī iti idam ca aparama kṛtsna tvena sūtritam iti āha śarīrāṇām ca anavasthita parimāṇa tvāt iti manuṣya kāya parimāṇaḥ  hi jīvaḥ  na hasti kāyam kṛtsnam vyāptum arhati alpa tvāt iti ātmanaḥ kṛtsna śarīra avyāpi tvādaka ārtsnyam tathā ca na śarīra parimāṇa tvam iti tathā ca hasti śīra ram parityajya yadā puttikā śarīraḥ  bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikā śarīre saṃmīyeta iti akārsnyam ātmanaḥ sugamam anyat  codayati syāt etad  ananta avayava iti yathā hi pradīpaḥ  ghaṭa mahā harmyā udara vartī saṃkoca vikāśavān evam jīvaḥ  api puttikā hasti dehayoḥ iti arthaḥ tad etad vikalpya dūṣayati teṣām punar anantānām iti na tāvat pradīpaḥ  atra nidarśanam bhavitum arhati anityatva prasaṅgāt  viśara āravaḥ  hi pradīpa avayavaḥ pradīpaḥ ca avayavī pratikṣaṇam utpatti nirodha dharmā tasmāt anitya tvāt tasya na asthiraḥ  jīvaḥ tad avayavāḥ ca abyupetavyāḥ tathā ca vikalpa dvaya uktam dūṣaṇam iti yad ca jīva avayavānām ānantyam uditam tad anupapannataram iti āha api ca śarīra mātrā iti śaṅkā pūrvam sūtra antaram avatārayati atha paryāyeṇa iti tatra api ucyate na ca paryāyāt api avirodhaḥ  vikāra ādibhyaḥ karma aṣṭaka muktam jñāna āvaraṇīyādi kim ca ātmanaḥ  nityatva abhyupagame āgacchatām apagacchatām ca avayavānām iyattā nirūpeṇena ca ātma jñāna abhāvāt na apavarga iti bhāvaḥ ata evamādi doṣa prasaṅgāt iti ādi grahaṇa sūcitam doṣam brūmaḥ kim ca ete jīva avayavāḥ pratyekam vā cetayeran samūhaḥ  vā teṣām pratyekam caitanye bahūnām cetanānām eka abhiprāyatva niyama abhāvāt kadācid viruddha dikkriya tvena śarīram unmathyeta samūha caitanye tu hasti śarīrasya puttikā śarīra tve dvi tra avayava śeṣaḥ  jīvaḥ  na cetayet  vigalita bahu samūhitayā samūhasya abhāvāt puttikā śarīre iti athavā iti pūrva sūtra prasañjitāyām jīva aniti tāyām bauddhavat saṃtāna nityatām āśaṅkyā idam sūtram ana ca paryāyāt api avirodhaḥ  vikāra ādibhyaḥ na ca paryāyāt  parimāṇa an avasthāne api saṃtāna abhyupagamena ātmanaḥ  nitya tvāt avirodhaḥ  bandha mokṣayoḥ kutas  pariṇāma ādibhyaḥ  doṣebhyaḥ saṃtānasya vastu tve pariṇāmaḥ tatas carmavat anityatva ādi doṣa prasaṅgaḥ avastu tve ca ādi grahaṇa sūcitaḥ  nairātmya āpatti doṣa prasaṅga iti visicaḥ  vivasanāḥ antya avasthiteḥ ca ubhaya nitya tvāt aviśeṣaḥ evam hi mokṣa avasthā bhāvi jīva parimāṇam nityam bhavet  yadi abhūtvā na bhavet  abhūtvā bhāvinām antya tvāt haṭa dīnām katham ca abhūtvā na bhavet yadi prāk api āsīt  na ca parimāṇa antara avarodhe apūrvam bhavitum arhati tasmāt antyam eva parimāṇam pūrvam api āsīditi abhedaḥ tathā ca eka śarīra parimāṇa tā eva syāt na upacita apacita śarīra prāptiḥ śarīra parimāṇatva abhyupagama vyāghātāt iti atra ca ubhayoḥ parimāṇayoḥ nityatva prasaṅgāt iti yojanā eka śarīra parimāṇa tā eva iti ca dīpyam dvitīye tu vyākhyāne ubhayoḥ avasthayoḥ iti yojanā eka śarīra parimāṇa tā na dīpyā kintu eka parimāṇa tā mātram aṇuḥ mahān vā iti vivekaḥ pati urasām añjasyāt  aviśeṣeṇa īśvara kāraṇa vādaḥ  anena niṣidhyata iti bhrama nivṛtti artham āha kevala iti sāṃkhya yoga vyapāśrayā hiraṇyagarbha patañjali prabhṛtayaḥ pradhāna muktam dṛś śaktiḥ puruṣaḥ pratyaya anupaśyaḥ sa ca nānā kleśa karma vipāka āśayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhāna puruṣābhyām anyaḥ māheśvarā ścatvāraḥ śaivāḥ pāśupatāḥ kāruṇika siddhāntinaḥ kāpālikāḥ ca iti catvāraḥ  api amī maheśvara praṇīta siddhānta anuyāyitayā māheśvarāḥ kāraṇam īśvaraḥ kāryam pradhānikam mahat ādi yogaḥ  api oṅkāra ādi dhyāna dāraṇa ādiḥ vidhiḥ triṣavaṇa snāna ādiḥ gūḍha caryā avasānaḥ duḥkhāntaḥ  mokṣaḥ paśava ātmānaḥ teṣām pāśaḥ  bandhanam tad himokṣaḥ  duḥkhāntaḥ eṣa teṣām abhisaṃdhiḥ cetanasya khalu adhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakāra ādeḥ kumbha ādi kārye nimitta kāraṇatva virodhāt iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate pati urasām añjasyāt  iti idam atra ākūtam īśvarasya nimitta kāraṇatva mātra pratipādana paratva āditya sakṛt āveditam tasmāt anena asmin  arthe pramāṇa antaram āstheyam tatra anumānam tāvat na saṃbhavati tad hi dṛṣṭi anusāreṇa pravartate tad anusāreṇa ca āsām añjasyam tad āha hīna madhyamā iti etad uktam bhavati āgamāt īśvara siddhau na dṛṣṭam anusartavyam na hi svarga apūrva devatā ādiṣu āgamāt avagamyamāneṣu kiñcid asti dṛṣṭam na hi āgamaḥ  dṛṣṭa sādharmyāt pravartate tena śruta siddi artham adṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭa viparīta svabhāvāni su bahūni api kalpamānāni na loha gandhi tām āvahanti pramāṇavat tvāt  yaḥ tu tatra kathañcid dṛṣṭa anusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛd bhāva mātreṇa āgama anapekṣitam anumānam tu dṛṣṭa sādharmyeṇa pravartamānam dṛṣṭa vivaryaye tuṣāt api bibhetitarām iti prāṇi karma apekṣita tvāt adoṣa iti ced  na kutas  karma īśvarayoḥ mithas  pravarti apravartayitṛtva itaretara āśrayatva doṣa prasaṅgāt  ayam arthaḥ yadi īśvaraḥ karuṇā para adhīnaḥ  vīta rāgaḥ tatas  praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet  tad ca utpannam api na adhitiṣṭhet  tāvat mātreṇa prāṇinām duḥkha anutpādāt  na hi īśvara adhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyam karma kartum arhanti tad anadhiṣṭhitam vā kapūyam karma phalam prasotum utsahate tasmāt svatantraḥ  api īsvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭa viparītam kalpanīyam tathā āca ayam aparaḥ  gaṇḍasya upari sphoṭa itaretara āśrayaḥ prasajyeta karmaṇā īśvaraḥ pravartanīya īśvareṇa ca karma iti śaṅkate nānā ādi tvāt iti ced  pūrva karmaṇā īśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravrartyate tena īśvareṇa saṃpratitanam karma sva kārye pravartyeta iti nirākaroti na vartamāna kālavat iti atha pūrvam karma katham īśvara apravartitam īśvara pravartana lakṣaṇam kāryam karoti tatra api pravartitam īśvareṇa pūrvatana karma pravartitena iti evam andha paramparā doṣaḥ cakṣuṣmatā hi andhaḥ nīyate na andha antareṇa tathā iha api dvau  api pravartyau  iti kaḥ kam pravartayet iti arthaḥ apica naiyāyikānām īśvarasya nirdeṣa tvam sva samaya viruddham iti āha apicā iti asmākam tu na ayam samaya iti bhāvaḥ nanu kāruṇyāt api pravartamānaḥ  janaḥ dṛśyate na ca kāruṇyam doṣa iti ata āha sva artha prayukta eva ca iti kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkham bhavati tena tad prahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api sva artha prayuktā eva pravartanta iti nanu sva artha prayukta eva pravartatām evam api kaḥ  doṣa iti ata āha sva arthava tvādīsvarasya iti arthi tvāt iti arthaḥ puruṣasya ca audāsīnya abhyupagamāt na vāstavī pravṛttiḥ iti aparam api dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa dūṣaṇam āha saṃbandha anupapatteḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ  hi sāvayavānām asarva gatānām ca saṃyogaḥ aprāpti pūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogaḥ  na sarva gatānām saṃbhavati aprāpteḥ abhāvāt niravayava tvāt ca avyāpya vṛtti tā hi saṃyogasya svabhāvaḥ na ca niravayaveṣu avyāpya vṛtti tā saṃyogasya saṃbhavati iti uktam tasmāt avyāpya vṛtti tāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛtteḥ tad vyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiḥ iti bhāvaḥ na api samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ sa hi ayuta siddhānām ādhāra ādheya bhūtānām iha pratyaya hetuḥ saṃbandha iti abhyupeyate na ca pradhāna puruṣa īśvarāṇām mithas  asti ādhāra ādheya bhāva iti arthaḥ na api yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ kārya gamya saṃbandha iti āha na api anya iti na hi pradhānasya mahat ahaṅkāra ādi kāraṇa tvam adya api siddham iti śaṅkate brahma vādina iti nirākaroti na kutas  tasya mate anirvacanīya tādātmya lakṣaṇa saṃbandha upapatteḥ apicā iti āgamaḥ  hi pravṛttim prati na dṛṣṭāntam apekṣata iti adṛṣṭa pūrve tad viruddhe ca pravartitum samarthaḥ anumānam tu dṛṣṭa anusāri na evaṃvidhe pravartitum arhati iti śaṅkate parasya api iti pariharati na iti asmākam tu īśvara āgamayoḥ anādi tvāt īśvara yoni tve api āgamasya na virodha iti bhāvaḥ adhiṣṭhāna anupapatteḥ ca yathā darśanam anumānam pravartate na alaukika artha viṣayam iti iha api na prasmartavyam sugamam anyat  karaṇavat ced na bhoga ādibhyaḥ rūpa ādi hīnam iti anudbhūta rūpam iti arthaḥ rūpa ādi hīna karaṇa adhiṣṭhānam hi puruṣasya sva bhoga ādau  eva dṛṣṭam na anyatra na hi bāhyam kuṭhāra ādya paridṛṣṭam vyāpārayan kaścid upalabhyate tasmāt rūpa ādi hīnam karaṇam vyāpārayata īsvarasya bhoga ādi prasaktiḥ tathā ca anīśvara tvam iti bhāvaḥ kalpa antaram āha anyathā iti pūrvam adhiṣṭhitiḥ adhiṣṭhānam idānīm tu adhiṣṭhānam bhoga āyatanam śarīram uktam tathā bhoga ādi prasaṅgena anīśvara tvam pūrvam āpāditam saṃprati tu śarīri tvena bhoga ādi prasaṅgāt anīśvara tvam uktam iti viśeṣaḥ antava tvam asarvajña tā vā api ca sarvatra anumānam pramāṇayataḥ pradhāna puruṣa īśvarāṇām api saṃkhyā bedavat tvam antavat tvam ca dravya tvāt  saṃkhyā anya tve sati prameya tvāt vā anumātavyam tatas ca antavat tvam asarvajña tā vā asmākam tu āgama gamyer athe tad bādhita viṣaya tayā na anumānam prabhavati iti bhāvaḥ svarūpa parimāṇam api yasya yādṛśam aṇu mahat  parama mahat dīrgham hrasvam ca iti atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣa iti uttaraḥ  vikalpaḥ yasya antaḥ  asti tasya antavattva agrahaṇam asarvajña tām āpādayet  yasya tu anta eva na asti tasya tad agrahaṇam na asarvajña tām āvahati na hi śaśa viṣāṇa ādi ajñānāt ajñaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ pariharati tatas  iti āgama anapekṣasya anumānam eṣām antavat tvam avagamayati iti uktam utpatti asaṃbhavāt  anyatra veda avisaṃvādāt i atra aṃśe visaṃvādaḥ sa nirasyate tam aṃśam āha yad punar idam ucyate vāsudevāt saṃkarṣaṇaḥ  jīva iti jīvasya kāraṇava tve satya nitya tvam anityatva īpara lokinaḥ  abhāvāt para loka abhāvaḥ tatas ca svarga naraka apavarga abhāva āpatteḥ na āstikyam iti arthaḥ anupapannā ca jīvasya utpattiḥ iti āha pratiṣedhiṣyati ca iti na ca kartuḥ karaṇam yadi api aneka śilpa paryavadātaḥ paraśum kṛtvā tena palāśam chinatti yadi api ca prayatnena indriya artha ātma manaḥ saṃnikarṣa lakṣaṇam jñāna karaṇam upādāya ātma artham vijānāti tathā api saṃkarṣaṇaḥ  akaraṇaḥ katham pradyumna ākhyam manaḥ karaṇam kuryāt  akaraṇasya vā karaṇa nirmāṇa sāmarthye kṛtam karaṇa nirmāṇena akaraṇāt eva nikhila kārya siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ vijñāna ādi bhāve vā tad apratiṣedhaḥ vāsudevā eva ete saṃkarṣam ādayaḥ  nirdeṣā avidyā ādi doṣa rahitāḥ niradhiṣṭhānā nirūpa ādānāḥ ata eva niravadyā anityatva ādi doṣa rahitāḥ tasmāt utpatti asaṃbhavaḥ  anuguṇa tvāt na doṣa iti arthaḥ atra ucyate evam api iti mā bhūt abi upagamena doṣaḥ prakāra antareṇa tu ayam eva doṣaḥ praśna pūrvam prakāra antaram āha katham yadi tāvat iti na tāvat ete parasparam bhinnā īśvarāḥ paraspara vyāhata icchā bhavitum arhanti vyāhata kāma tve ca kārya anutpādāt  avyāhata kāma tve vā pratyekam īśvara tve ekena eva īśanāyāḥ kṛta tvāt ānarthakyam itareṣām saṃbhūya ca īśanāyām pariśuddhaḥ  na kaścid dīśvaraḥ syāt  siddhānta hāniḥ ca bhagavān eva ekaḥ vāsudevaḥ parama artha tattvam iti abhyupagamāt tasmāt kalpa antaram āstheyam tatra ca utpatti asaṃbhavaḥ  doṣa iti āśayavān kalpa antaram upanyasya utpatti asaṃbhavena apākaroti atha ayam abhiprāya iti sugamam anyat  vipratiṣedhāt ca guṇibhyaḥ khalu ātmabhyaḥ  jñāna ādīn guṇān bhedena uktvā punar abhedam brūte ātmāna eva ete bhagavantaḥ  vāsudevā iti ādi grahaṇena pradyumna aniruddhayoḥ manaḥ  ahaṅkāra lakṣaṇa tayā ātmanaḥ  bhedam abhidhāya ātmana eva eta iti tad viruddha abheda abhidhānam aparam saṃgṛhītam veda vipratiṣedhaḥ  vyākhyātaḥ iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām dvitīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ iti dvitīya adhyāyasya sāṃkhya ādi matānām duṣṭatva pradarśanam nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ dvidīya adhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ na viyat aśruteḥ pūrvam pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ śruteḥ nirākṛtaḥ saṃprati tu śrutīnām eva paraspara virodhaḥ  nirākriyate tatra sṛṣṭi śrutīnām paraspara virodham āha vedānteṣu tatra tatra iti śruti vipratiṣedhāt ca para pakṣāṇām anapekṣita tvam sthāpitam tadvat sva pakṣasya śruti
