vipratiṣedhāt iti tad artha nirmala tvamar tha ābhāsa vinivṛttya artha tattva pratipādanam tasya phalam sva pakṣasya jagataḥ  brahma kāraṇa tvasya anapekṣatva āśaṅkā nivṛttiḥ iha hi pūrva pakṣe śrutīnām mithas  virodhaḥ pratipādyate siddhānte tu avirodhaḥ tatra siddhānti eka deśinaḥ vacanam ana viyat aśruteḥ iti tasya abhisaṃdhiḥ yadi api taittirīyake viyat utpatti śrutiḥ asti tathā api tasyāḥ pramāṇa antara virodhāt bahu śruti virodhāt ca gauṇa tvam tathā ca viyataḥ  nitya tvāt tejaḥ pramukha eva sargaḥ tathā ca na virodhaḥ śrutīnām iti tad idam uktam prathamam tāvat ākāśam āśritya cintyate kim asya ākāśasya utpattiḥ asti uta na asti iti yadi na asti na śruti virodha āśaṅkā atha asti tatas  śruti virodha iti tad parihārāya prayatna antaram āstheyam iti arthaḥ tatra pūrva pakṣa sūtram asti tu taittirīye hi sarga prakaraṇe kevalasya ākāśasya eva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ na ca śruti antara anurodhena asahāyasya adhigatasya api sa sahāya tā kalpanam yuktam asāhatva avagama virodhāt  śruta siddhi artham khalu aśrutam kalpyate na tu tad vidhātāya vihanyate ca asahāya tvam śrutam kalpitena sa sahāya tvena na ca paraspara anapekṣāṇām vrīhi yavavat vikalpaḥ anuṣṭhānam hi vikalpyate na vastu na hi sthāṇu puruṣa vikalpaḥ  vastuni pratiṣṭhām labhate na ca sarga bhedena vyavasthā upapadyate sāṃpratika sargavat bhūta pūrvasya api tathā tvāt  na khalu iha sarge kṣīrāt dadhi jāyate sarga antare ti dadhnaḥ kṣīram iti bhavati tasmāt sarga śrutayaḥ paraspara virodhinyaḥ  na asmin  arthe pramāṇam bhavitum arhanti iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhānti eka deśī sūtreṇa sva abhiprāyam āviṣkaroti gauṇya saṃbhavāt  pramāṇa antara virodhena bahu śruti antara virodhena ca ākāśa utpatti asaṃbhavāt gauṇyeṣa ākāśa utpatti śrutiḥ iti avirodha iti arthaḥ pramāṇa antara virodham āha na hi ākāśasya iti sama vāṭya samavāyi nimitta kāraṇebhyaḥ  hi kāryasya utpattiḥ niyatā tad abhāve na bhavitum arhati dhūma iva dhūma dhvaja abhāve tasmāt sat akāraṇam ākāśam nityam iti apica ya utpadyante teṣām prāk utpatteḥ anubhava artha kriye na upalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete yathā tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām na ca ākāśasya tādṛśaḥ  viśeṣa utpāda an utpādayoḥ asti tasmāt na utpadyata iti āha utpattimatām ca iti prakāśanam prakāśaḥ  ghaṭa paṭa ādi gocaraḥ pṛthivī ādi vaidharmyāt ca iti ādi grahaṇena dravya tve satya sparśavat tvāt ātmavat nityam ākāśam iti gṛhītam āraṇyān ākāśeṣu iti vede api ekasi ākāśasya aupādhikam bahu tvam tad evam pramāṇa antara virodhena gauṇa tvam uktvā śruti antara virodhena api gauṇa tvam āha śabdāt ca sugamam syāt ca ekasya brahma śabdavat  padasya anuṣaṅgaḥ  na padārthasya tad hi kkacit mukhyam kkacid aupacārikam saṃbhava asaṃbhavābhyām iti avirodhaḥ codya dvayam karoti katham iti prathamam codyam pariharati ekam eva iti tāvat iti kulaṅ gṛham amatrāṇi pātrāṇi ghaṭa śarāva ādīni āpekṣikam avadhāraṇam na sarva viṣayam iti arthaḥ upapatti antaram āha na ca nabhasā api iti apiḥ abhyupagame yadi sarva apekṣam tathā api adoṣa  iti arthaḥ na ca prāk utpatteḥ jagata iti śeṣaḥ dvitīyam codyam apākaroti ata eva ca brahma vijñānena iti lakṣaṇa anyatva abhāvena ākāśasya brahmaṇaḥ  ananya tvāt iti api ca avyatirikta deśa kālam ākāśam brahmaṇā ca brahma kāryaiḥ ca tad abhinna svabhāvaiḥ atas  kṣīra kumbha prakṣipta katipaya payaḥ binduvat brahmaṇi tad kārye ca vijñāte nabhaḥ  viditam bhavati iti āha api ca sarvam kāryam utpadyamānam iti evam siddhānta eka deśa mite prāpta idam āha pratijñā hāniḥ avyatirekat śabdebhyaḥ brahma vivartā ātma tayā ajagataḥ tad vikārasya vastu tas  brahmaṇā bhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānam upapadyate na hi jagat tattvam brahmaṇaḥ  anyat  tasmāt ākāśam api tad vivartatayā tad vikāraḥ sat tad jñānena jñātam bhavati na anyathā avikāra tve tu tatas tattva antaram na brahmaṇi vidite viditam bhavati bhinnayoḥ tu lakṣaṇa anyatva abhāve api deśa kāla abhede api na anyatara jñānena anyatara jñānam bhavati na hi kṣīrasya pūrṇa kumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsu api pāthobinduṣu pāthaḥ tattvam prati jñāta tvam asti vijñāne tasmāt na te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñā dṛṣṭānta pracaya anuparodhāya viyata utpattiḥ akāmena abhyupeya iti tad evam siddhānta eka deśini dūṣita īpūrva pakṣī sva pakṣe viśeṣam āha satyam darśitam ata eva viruddham tu tad iti siddhānta sāram āha na eṣa doṣaḥ tejaḥ sargasya taittirīyaka iti śrutyoḥ anyathā upapadyamānāni atha anupapadyamānayoḥ anyathā anupapadyamānā balavatī taittirīyaka śrutiḥ chāndogya śrutiḥ ca anyathā upapadyamānā durbalā nanu asahāyam tejaḥ prathamam avagamyamānam sa sahāya tvena virudhyata iti uktam ata āha na hīyam śrutiḥ tejaḥ jani pradhāna iti sarga saṃsargaḥ śrautaḥ  bhedaḥ tvā arthaḥ sa ca śruti antareṇa virodhinā bādhyate jaghanya tvāt  na ca tejaḥ pramukha sarga saṃsargavat asahāya tvam api asya śrautam kintu vyatireka labhyam na ca śrutena tad avāda bādhane śrutasya tejaḥ sargasya anupapattiḥ tad idam uktam atejaḥ jani pradhānā iti syāt etad  yadi ekam vākyam aneka artha  na bhavati ekasya vyāpāra dva asaṃbhavāt  hanta bhoḥ katham ekasya sraṣṭuḥ aneka vyāpāra tvam aviruddham iti ata āha sraṣṭā tu ekaḥ  api iti vṛdda prayoga adhīna avadhāraṇam śabda sāmarthyam nacānāvṛttasya śabdasya krama ākramābhyām anekatra arthe vyāpāraḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭam tu kramākramābhyām ekasya api kartuḥ aneka vyāpāra tvam iti arthaḥ naca asmin  artha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāraḥ  api tu bhinnānām vākyānām iti āha naca asmābhiḥ iti sugamam codayati nanu śama vidhāna artham iti yad paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ na ca eṣa sṛṣṭi paraḥ  api tu śama para iti arthaḥ para harati na hi tejaḥ prāthamya anurodhena iti guṇa tvāt ārtha tvāt ca kramasya śruta pradhāna padārtha virodhāt tad tyāgaḥ  ayukta iti arthaḥ siṃha avalokita nyāyena viyat anutpatti vādinam pratyāha apica chān dogya iti yad punanyathā pratijñā upapādanam kṛtam tad dūṣayati yad ca uktam iti dṛṣṭānta anurūpa tvāt dārṣṭa antikasya tasya ca prakṛti vikāra rūpa tvāt dārṣṭa antikasya api tathā abhāvaḥ apica bhrānti mūlam ca etad vacanam aekam eva advitīyam iti toye kṣīra buddhivat  aupacārikam vā siṃhaḥ  māṇavaka itivat  tatra na tāvat bhrāntam iti āha kṣīrodaka nyāyena iti bhrānteḥ vipralambha abhiprāyasya ca puruṣa dharma tvāt apauruṣeye tad asaṃbhava iti arthaḥ na api aupacārikam iti āha sa avadhāraṇā ca iyam iti kāmam upacāra ādaḥ tu eka tvam avadhāraṇā dvitīya pade na upapadyete na hi māṇavake siṃha tvam upacarya na siṃhāt anyaḥ  asti manāk api māṇavaka iti vadanti laukikāḥ tasmāt brahma tvam aikāntikam jagataḥ  vivakṣitam śrutyā na tu aupacārikam abhyāse hi bhūyas tvam arthasya ūvati na tu aspa tvam api prāk eva aupacārikam iti arthaḥ na ca sva kārya apekṣayā iti niḥśeṣa vacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarva śabdaḥ  na asati śruti antara virodhe eka deśava viṣayaḥ  yujyata iti arthaḥ ākāśasya utpattau pramāṇa antara virodham uktam anubhāṣya tasya pramāṇa antarasya pramāṇa antara virodhena apramāṇa bhūtasya na gauṇatva āpādana sāmarthyam ata āha yāvat vikāram tu vibhāgaḥ  lokavat  saḥ  ayam prayogaḥ ākāśa diś klāmanaḥ ramāṇavaḥ  vikārāḥ ātmanya tve sati vibhakta tvāt  ghaṭa śarāva udañcana ādivat iti sarvam kāryam nirātmakam iti nirūpa ādānam syāt iti arthaḥ śūnya vādaḥ ca nirākṛtaḥ svayam eva śrutyā upanyasya akatham asataḥ sat jāyeta iti upapāditam ca tad nirākaraṇam adhastāt iti ātma tvāt eva ātmanaḥ pratyak ātmanaḥ  nirākaṇa āśaṅkā anupapattiḥ etad uktam bhavati sa upādānam ced kāryam tatas  ātmā eva upāna tvena śruteḥ upādāna antara kalpanā anupapatteḥ iti syāt etad  astu ātma upādānam asya jagataḥ tasya tu upādāna antaram aśrūyamāṇam api anyat bhaviṣyati ityata āha na hi ātma āgantukaḥ kasyacid  upādāna antarasya upādeyaḥ kutas  svayaṃsiddha tvāt sattā vā prakāśaḥ  vā asya svayaṃsiddhī tatra prakāśa ātmikāyāḥ siddheḥ tāvat anāgantuka tvam āha na hi ātma ātmana iti upapāditam etad yathā saṃśaya viparyāsa pārokṣyānāspada tvāt kadāpi na ātmā para adhīna prakāśaḥ tad adhīna prakāśāḥ tu pramāṇa ādayaḥ ata eva śrutiḥ atam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvam tasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti iti naca īdṛśasya nari kāraṇam saṃbhavati iti nirākaraṇam api hi tad adhīna ātma lābham tad viruddham na udetum arhati iti arthaḥ sattāyā anāgantuka tvam asya āha tathā aham eva idānīm jānāmi iti pramā pramāṇa prameyāṇām vartamāna atīta anāgata tve api pramātuḥ sadā vartamāna tvena anubhavādapracyuta svabhāvasya na āgantukam sattvam traikālya avacchedena hi āgantuka tvam vyāptam tad pramātuḥ sat ā āvartamānādvyavartamānam āgantuka tvam sva vyāpyam ādāya nivartata iti anyathā abhavati api jñātavya iti prakṛti pratyayābhyām jñāna jñeyayoḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ darśitaḥ nanu jīvataḥ pramātuḥ mā bhūt anyathā bhāva u mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyati iti ata āha tathā bhasmībhavasi api iti yad khalu sat svabhāvam anubhava siddham tasya anirvacanīya tvam anyatas  bādhakāt avasātavyam bādhakam ca ghaṭa ādīnām svabhāvāt vicalanam pramāṇa upanītam yasya tu na tad asya ātmanaḥ  na tasya tad kalpanam yuktam abādhita anubhava siddhasya sat svabhāvasya anirvacanīyatva kalpanā pramāṇa abhāvāt tad idam uktam na saṃbhāvayitum śakyam iti tad anena prabandhena pratyanumānena ākāśa an utpatti anumānam tūṣayitvā anaikāntika tvena api dūṣayati yad tūkam samāna jātīyam iti na api enekam eva u pādānam upādeya mārabhate yatra hi kṣīram dadhi bhāvena pariṇamate tatra na avayavānām anekeṣām upādana tvam abhyupagantavyam kintūpāttam eva kṣīram ekam upādeya dadhi bhāvena pariṇamate yathā niravayava paramāṇu vādinā aṅkṣīra paramāṇuḥ dadhi paramāṇu bhāvena iti śeṣam ati rohita artham etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ yadi abhyāse bhūyas tvam arthasya bhavati na alpa tvam dūrata eva upacarita tvam hanta bhoḥ pavanasya nityatva prasaṅgaḥ avāyuḥ ca antarikṣam etad amṛtam iti dvayoḥ amṛta tvam uktvā punar  pavanasya viśeṣeṇa āha sā eṣā anastamitā devatā yad vā āyuḥ iti tasmāt abhyāsāt na apekṣikam vāyoḥ amṛta tvam api tvautpattikam eva iti prāptam tad idam uktam bhāṣya kṛtā astamaya pratiṣedhāt amṛtatva ādi śravaṇāt ca iti cena samuccaya arthena abhyāsaḥ  darśitaḥ evam prāpta ucyate eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñānāt  pratijñā vākya arthasya prādhānyāt  tad upapadana artha tvāt ca vākya antarāṇām teṣām api ca advaita pratipādakānām mātariśva utpatti krama pratipādakānām bahulam upalabdheḥ mukhya bhūyaḥtva abhyām amūṣām śrutīnām balīyaḥ tvāt  etad anurodhena amṛtatva astamaya pratiṣedhau  āpekṣika tvena netavyau  iti bhūyasīḥ śrutīḥ apekṣya dve api śrutī śabda mātra mukte esaṃbhavaḥ tu sataḥ  anupapatteḥ nanu ana ca asya kaścid janitā iti ātmanaḥ sataḥ  akāraṇatva śruteḥ katham utpatti āśaṅkā na ca vacanam adṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣa iti yuktam adhīta vedasya brahma jijñāsā adhikārā darśanānupapatteḥ ata āha viyat pavanayoḥ iti yathā hi viyat pavanayoḥ amṛta tvānastamayatva śrutī śruti antara virodhāt āpekṣika tvena nīte evam akāraṇatva śrutiḥ ātmanaḥ  agni visphuliṅga dṛṣṭānta śruti virodhāt pramāṇa antara virodhāt ca āpekṣika tvena vyākhyātavyā na ca ātmanaḥ kāraṇavat tve anavasthā loha gandhi tāmāvahati anādi tvāt kārya kāraṇa paramparāyā iti bhāvaḥ tathā vikārebhya iti pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ  darśitaḥ evam prāpta ucyate sat ekatva bhāvasya utpatti asaṃbhavaḥ kutas  anupapatteḥ sat eka svabhāvam hi brahma śrūyate tad asati bādhake na anyathayitavyam uktam etad vikārāḥ sattvena anubhūtā api katipaya kāla kalā atikrame vinaśyantaḥ  dṛśyanta iti anirvacanīyāḥ traikālya avacchedāt iti na ca ātmā tādṛśaḥ tasya śruteḥ anubhāvāt vā vartamāna eka svabhāvatva ena prasiddheḥ tad idam āha sat mātram hi brahma iti etad uktam bhavati yad svabhāvāt vicalati tad anirvacanīyam nirvacanīya upādānam yuktam na tu viparyayaḥ yathā rajju upādānaḥ sarpaḥ  na tu sarpa upādānā rajjuḥ iti yayoḥ tu svabhāvāt apracyutiḥ tayoḥ nirvacanīyayoḥ na upādeya upādāna bhāvaḥ yathā rajju śuktikayoḥ iti na ca niradhiṣṭhānaḥ  vibhrama iti āha na api asata iti na ca niradhiṣṭhāna bhrama paraṃpara anāditā iti āha mūlaprakṛti anabhyupagame anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti pāramārthikaḥ  hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ  anādiḥ na anavasthāyā duṣyati samāropaḥ tu vikārasya na samāropita upādāna iti upapāditam mādhyamika mata niṣedha adhikāre tad atra na prasmartavyam tasmāt na asat adhiṣṭhāna vibhrama samartha nānā ādi tvena ucitā iti arthaḥ agni visphuliṅga śrutiḥ ca aupādika rūpa apekṣayā netavyā śeṣam ati rohita artham ye tu guṇa diś kāla utpatti viṣayam idam adhikaraṇam varṇayāñcakruḥ taiḥ asataḥ  anupapatteḥ iti kleśena vyākhyeyam avirodha samarthana prastāve ca asya saṃgatiḥ vaktavyā ap ādivat diś kāla ādīnām utpatti pratipādaka vākyasya anavagamāt tadā āstām tāvat  tejaḥ  atas tathā hi āha yadi api avāyoḥ agniḥ iti apādāna pañcamī akāraka vibhaktiḥ upapada vibhakteḥ balīyasī iti na iyam ānantarī parā yuktā tathā api bahu śruti virodhena durbalā api upapada vibhaktiḥ eva atra ucitā tatas ca anantarya darśana pareyam vāyoḥ agniḥ iti śrutiḥ na ca sākṣāt brahma jatva saṃbhave tad vaṃśya tvena tad ja tvam paraṃparayā āśrayitum yuktam vājapeyasya paśu yūpavat iti prāptam evam prāpte ucyate yuktam paśu yāga vājapeya uraṅga aṅginoḥ nānātvat tatra sākṣāt vājapeyā saṃbandhe kleśena paraṃpara āśrayaṇam iha tu vāyoḥ brahma vikārasya api brahmaṇaḥ  vastu tas  ananyatva advayu upādāna tve sākṣāt eva brahma upādānatva upapatteḥ kāraka vibhakteḥ balīyaḥ tvā anurodhena ubhayatha upapadyamānāḥ śrutayaḥ kāṃsya bhoji nyāyena niyamyanta iti yuktam iti rāddha antar  apāramparyaja tve api iti bheda kalpanābhi prāyam yatas la pāramārthika abhedam āha vāyu bhāva āpannam brahma iti yathā tasyāḥ śṛtam iti tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramparā mātra sāmyena na tu sarvathām sāmyena iti sarvam avadātam āpaḥ nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam pṛthivī adhikāra rūpa śabda antarebhyaḥ anna śabdaḥ  ayam vyutpattyā ca prasiddhyā ca vrīhi yava ādau tad vikāre ca odane pravartate śrutiḥ ca prakaraṇāt balīyasī sā ca vākya śeṣeṇa upodbalitā ayatra kkacana varṣati iti etena tasmāt abhyavaha artham vrīhi yava ādi eva atra ādbhyaḥ  jāyata iti vivakṣitam kārṣṇyam api hi saṃbhavati kasyacid adanīsya na hi pṛthivī api kṛṣṇā lohita ādi rūpāyāḥ  api darśanāt  tatas ca śruti antareṇa aadbhyaḥ pṛthivī pṛthivyāḥ  oṣadhayaḥ ityādinā virodha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ śrutyoḥ virodhe vastuni vikalpa anupapatteḥ anyatara anuguṇa tayā anyatarā netavyā tatra kim aadbhyaḥ pṛthivī iti pṛthivī śabdaḥ  anna para tayā nīyatām uta aannam asṛjata iti anna śabdaḥ pṛthivīparatayā iti viśaye mahābhūta adhikāra anurodhāt prāyika kṛṣṇa rūpa anurodhāt ca atat yad upām śara āsīt iti ca punar  śruti anurodhāt ca vākya śeṣasya ca anyathā api upapatteḥ anna śabdaḥ  anna kāraṇe pṛthivyām iti rāddha antar  tad abhidhyānāt eva tu tad liṅgāt saḥ sṛṣṭi krame bhūtānām avirodha uktaḥ idānīm ākāśa ādi bhūta adhiṣṭhātryaḥ  devatāḥ kim svatantrā eva uttarottara bhūta sarge pravartanta uta parameśvara apekṣāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt  prastāvasya ca liṅgasya ca pāramparyeṇa api mūlākāraṇasya brahmaṇa upapatte svatantrāṇām eva ākāśa ādīnām vā aṭu ādi kāraṇa tvam iti jagataḥ  brahma yonitva vyāghāta iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate ākāśāt vāyuḥ iti ādaya ākāśa ādīnām kevalam upādāna bhāvam ācakṣate na punar  svātantryeṇa adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam na ca cetanānām sva kārya svātantryam iti etad api aikāntikam paratantrāṇām api teṣām bahulam upalabdheḥ bhṛtya antevā asya ādivat  tasmāt liṅga prastāvasām añjasyāya sa īśvara eva tena tena ākāśa ādi bhāvena upādāna bhāvena avatiṣṭhamānaḥ svayam adhiṣṭhāya nimitta kāraṇa bhūtaḥ tam tam vikāram vā aṭvādikam sṛjati iti yuktam itarathā liṅga prastāvau kleśitau syātām iti parameśvara āveśa vaśāt iti parameśvara eva antaryami bhāvena āviṣṭa īkṣitā tasmāt sarvasya kārya jātasya sākṣāt parameśvara eva adhiṣṭhātā nimitta kāraṇam na tu ākāśa ādi bhāvam āpannaḥ ākāśa ādi bhāvam āpannaḥ tu upādānam iti siddham viparyayeṇa tu kramaḥ  ata upapadyate ca utpattau mahābhūtānām kramaḥ śrutaḥ  na api aye api aya mātrasya śruta tvāt  tatrava niyame saṃbhavati na aniyamaḥ vyavasthā rahitaḥ  hi saḥ na ca vyavasthāyām satyām avyavasthā yujyate tatra krama bheda apekṣāyām kim dṛṣṭaḥ  api aya kramaḥ  ghaṭa ādīnām mahābhūta apyaya krama niyāmakaḥ  astu āhaḥ śrauta utpatti krama iti viśaye śrautasya śrauta antaram abhyarhitam samāna jātīya tayā tasya eva buddhi sāṃnidhyāt  na dṛṣṭam viruddha jātīya tvāt  tasmāt śrautena eva utpatti krameṇa api aya kramaḥ  niyamyata iti prāpta ucyate api ayasya krama apekṣāyām khalu utpatti kramaḥ  niyāmakaḥ  bhavet  na tu asti apyayasya krama apekṣā dṛṣṭa anumāna upanītena krama bhedena śruti anusāriṇaḥ  api ayakramasya bādhyamāna tvāt  tasmin hi sati upādāna uparame api upādeyam asti iti syāt  na ca etad asti tasmāt  tad viruddha dṛṣṭa krama avarodhāt ākṅkṣā eva na asti krama antaram pratyayogya tvāt  tasya tad idam uktam sūtra kṛtā aupapadyate ca iti bhāṣya kāraḥ  api āha na ca asau  ayogyatva apyayena akāṅkṣyata iti tasmāt utpatti kramāt viparītaḥ krama iti etantryāya mūlā ca smṛtiḥ uktā antarā avijñāna manasī krameṇa tad liṅgāt iti ced na aviśeṣāt tad evam bhāvanā upayoginau bhūtānām utpatti pralayau vicārya buddhīndriya manasām kramam vicārayati atra ca vijñāyate anena iti vyutpattyā vijñāna śabdena indriyāṇi ca buddhim ca brūte tatra eteṣām krama apekṣāyām ātmānam ca bhūtāni ca antarā samāmnānāt tena eva pāṭhena kramaḥ  niyamyate tasmāt  pūrva utpatti krama bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ yata ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaḥ ca bhūtāni iti pratīyate tasmāt ātmana ākāśa iti bhajyate anna mayam iti ca mayaḍa ānanda maya itivat  na vikāra artha  iti prāpte abhidhīyate vibhakta tvāt tāvat manaḥ prabhṛtīnām kāraṇa apekṣāyām anna mayam mana iti ādi liṅga śravaṇāt apekṣita artha kathanāya vikāra artha tvam eva mayaṭaḥ  yuktam itarathā tu anapekṣitam uktam bhavet  na ca tad api ghaṭate na hi annam ayaḥ  yajña itivat anna prācuryam manasaḥ saṃbhavati evam ca udbhūta vikārā mana ādayaḥ  bhūtānām parastāt utpadyanta iti yuktam prauḍha vādi tayā abhyupetya āha atha tu abhautikāni iti bhavatu ātmana eva karaṇānām utpattiḥ na khalu etāvatā bhūtaiḥ ātmanaḥ  na utpattavyam tathā ca na ukta krama bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ viśiṣyate bhidyate bhajyata iti yāvat  carācara vyapāśrayaḥ tu syāt tad vyapadeśaḥ  bhāktaḥ tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt devadatta ādi nāmadheyam tāvat jīva ātmanaḥ  na śarīrasya tad nāmne śarīrasya śrāddha dikaraṇa anupapatteḥ tad mṛtaḥ  devadattaḥ  jātaḥ  devadatta iti vyapadeśasya mukhya tvam manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ mukhya tve śāstra uktā muṣmika svarga ādi phala saṃbandha anupapteḥ śāstra virodhāt laukika vyapadeśaḥ  bhāktaḥ  vyākhyeyaḥ bhaktiḥ ca śarīrasya utpāda vināśau tatas tad saṃyoga iti jātakarma ādi ca garbha bīja samudbhava jīva pāpa prakṣaya artham na tu jīva janma ja pa apa kṣaya artham ata eva smaranti aevam enaḥ śamam yāti bīja garbha samudbhavam iti tasmāt na śarīra utpatti vināśābhyām jīva janma vināśau  iti siddham etad ca laukika vyapadeśasya abhrānti mūla tvam abhyupetya adhikaraṇam uktā tu adhyāsa bhāṣye asya bhrānti mūlatā iti mā bhūtāmasya śarīra udaya vyayābhyām sthūlau  utpatti vināśau ākāśa ādeḥ iva tu mahā sarga ādau tad ante ca utpatti vināśau jīvasya bhaviṣyata iti śaṅkā antaram apanetum idam ārabhyate na ātma aśruteḥ nitya tvāt ca tābhyaḥ vicāra mūla saṃśayasya bījam āha śruti vipratipatteḥ iti tām eva darśayati kāsucid śutiṣu iti pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti tatra prāptam iti paramātmanaḥ tāvat viruddha dharma saṃsargāt apahata anapahata pāpmatva ādi lakṣaṇāt jīvānām anya tvam te ced na vikārāḥ tatas tattva antara tve bahutara advaita śruti virodhaḥ brahma vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñā virodhaḥ ca tasmāt śutibharanujñāyate vikāra tvam pramāṇa antaram ca atra uktam vibhakta tvāt ākāśa ādivat iti ayatha agneḥ śrudrā visphaliṅgaḥ iti ca śrutiḥ sākṣāt eva brahma vikāra tvam jīvānām darśayati ayathā sūdīptāt  pāvakāt iti ca brahmaṇaḥ  jīvānām utpattim ca tatra api ayam ca sākṣāt darśayati nanu akṣarāt bhāvānām utpatti pralayau  avagamyete na jīvānām iti ata āha jīvātmanām iti syāt etad  sṛṣṭi śrutiṣu ākāśa ādi utpattiḥ iva kasmāt jīva utpattiḥ nāmnā āyate tasmāt āmnāna yogyasya anāmnānāt tasya utpatti abhāvam pratīma iti ata āha na ca kkacid aśravaṇam iti evam hi kasya añcicśā ākhyāyām āmnātasya katipāya aṅga sahitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhā antarīya aṅga upasaṃhāraḥ  na bhavet  tasmāt bahutara śruti virodhāt anupraveśa śrutiḥ vikāra bhāvāt pattyā vyākhyeyā tasmāt ākāśavat jīva ātmāna utpadyanta iti prāpta ucyate bhavet evam yadi jīvā brahmaṇaḥ  bhidyeran na tu etad asti atat  sṛṣṭvā tad eva anuprāviśat aanena jīvena iti ādya vibhāga śruteḥ aupādhika tvāt ca bhedasya ghaca karaka ādi ākāśavat viruddha dharma saṃsargasya upapatteḥ upādhīnā ca manaḥ maya ityādīnām śruteḥ bhūyasīnam ca nityatva aja tvādi gocarāṇām śrutīnām darśanāt  aupādhi pravilayena upahitasya iti ca praśna uttarābhyām aneka dhā upa pāda nāda vibhāgasya ca aekaḥ  devaḥ sarva bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ iti śrutyā eva ukta tvāt nityā jīva ātmanaḥ  na vikārā na ca advaita pratijñā virodha iti siddham maitreyi brāhmaṇam ca adhastāt vyākhyātam iti na iha vyākhyātam jñaḥ  ata eva karmaṇā hi jānātyarthaḥ  vyāptaḥ tad abhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūma dhvaja abhāve suṣupti ādi avasthāsu ca jñeyasya abhāvāt tad vyāpyasya jñānasya abhāvaḥ tathā ca na ātma svabhāvaḥ caitanyam tad anuvṛttau  api caitanyasya vyāvṛttiḥ tasmāt indriya ādi bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt jñāna bhāva abhāvayoḥ indriya ādi saṃnikarṣa ādheyam āgantukam asya caitanyam dharmaḥ  na svābhāvikaḥ ata eva indriya ādīnām arthavat tvam itarathā vaiyarthyam indriyāṇām bhavet  nitya caitanya śrutayaḥ ca śakti abhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyāḥ asti hi jñāna utpādana śaktiḥ nijā jīvānām na tu vyomna iva indriya ādi saṃnikarṣe api eṣā jñānam na bhavati iti tasmāt jaḍā eva jīvā iti prāpte abhidhīyate yad āgantuka jñānam jaḍa svabhāvam tad kadacid  parokṣam kadācid  saṃdigdham kadācid viparyastam yathā ghaṭa ādi na ca evam ātmanā tathā hi anumimānaḥ  api aparokṣaḥ smaran  apyānubhavikaḥ saṃdihānaḥ  api asaṃdigdhaḥ viparyasyan  api aviparītaḥ sarvasya ātmā tathā ca tad svabhāvaḥ na ca tad svabhāvasya caitanyasya abhāvaḥ tasya nitya tvāt  tasmāt vṛttayaḥ kriyā rūpāḥ karma abhāve suṣupti ādau nivartante tena caitanyam ātma svabhāva iti siddham tathā ca nitya caitanya vādinyaḥ śrutayaḥ na kathañcid  kleśena vyākhyātavyā bhavanti gandha ādi viṣaya vṛtti upajane ca indriyāṇām arthavat tā iti sarvam avadātam utkrānti gatyā gatīnām yadi api avikṛtasya eva paramātmanaḥ  jīva bhāvaḥ tathā ca anaṇu parimāṇa tvam tathā api utkrānti gatyā gatīnām śruteḥ ca sākṣāt aṇu parimāṇa śravaṇasya ca avirodha artham idam adhikaraṇam iti ākṣepa samādhānābhyām āha nanu ca iti pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti tatra prāptam tāvat iti vibhāga saṃyoga utpādau hi tu utkrānti ādīnām phalam na ca sarva gatasya tau staḥ sarvatra nitya prāptasya vā sarva ātmakasya vā tad asaṃbhāvāt iti sva ātmanā ca uttarayoḥ utkramaṇam hi maraṇe nirūḍham tad ca acalataḥ api tatra sataḥ  deha svāmi anivṛttya upapadyate na tu gati āgatī tayoḥ calane nirūḍhayoḥ kartṛstha bhāvayoḥ vyāpinī asaṃbhavāt iti madhyamam parimāṇam mahat tvam śarīrasya eva tad ca arhata parīkṣāyām pratyuktam gati āgatī ca paramanahati na saṃbhavataḥ  ata pāriśeṣyāt aṇutva siddhiḥ gati āgatibhyām ca prādeśikatva siddhau maraṇam api dehāt apasarpaṇam eva jīvasya na tu tatra sataḥ svāmya nivṛtti mātram iti siddham iti āha satyoḥ ca gati āgatyoḥ iti itas ca dehāt apasarpaṇam eva jīvasya maraṇam iti āha deha pradeśānām iti tasmāt gati āgati apekṣā utkrāntiḥ api sa āpādāna aṇutva sādhanam iti arthaḥ na kevalam apādāna śruteḥ tad śarīra pradeśa antavyatva śruteḥ api evam eva iti āha sa etāḥ tejaḥ mātrā iti na aṇuḥ atad śuteḥ iti ced na itara adhikārāt yata utkrānti ādi śrutibhiḥ jīvānām aṇu tvam prasādhitam tatas  vyāpakāt paramātmanaḥ teṣām tad vikāra tayā bhedaḥ tathā ca mahattva ananya ādi śrutayaḥ paramātma viṣayā na jīva viṣayā iti avirodha iti arthaḥ yadi jīvā aṇavaḥ tatas  ayaḥ  ayam vijñāna mayaḥ parama iṣu iti katham śārīraḥ  mahattva saṃbandhi tvena pratinirdiśyate iti codayati nanu iti pariharati śāstra dṛṣṭyā pāramārthika dṛṣṭyā nirdeśaḥ  vāmadevavat  yathā hi garbha stha eva vāmadevaḥ  jīvaḥ parama artha dṛṣṭi ātmanaḥ  brahma tvam pratipede evam vikārāṇām prakṛteḥ vāstavāt abhedāt tad parimāṇatva vyapadeśa iti arthaḥ sva śabda unmānābhyām ca sva śabdam vibhajate sākṣāt eva iti unmānam vibhajate tathā unmānam api iti uddhṛtya mānam unmānam bāla agrāt uddhṛtaḥ śatatamaḥ  bhāgaḥ tasmāt api śatatamāt uddhṛtaḥ śatatamaḥ  bhāga iti tad idam unmānam ārā agra ādiddhṛtam māna māra agrā mātram iti sūtra antaram avatārayitum codayati nanu aguṇa tve sati iti aṇuḥ ātmā na śarīra vyāpī iti na sarva aṅgīṇa śaitya upalabdhiḥ syāt iti arthaḥ avirodhaḥ candanavat  tvac saṃyuktaḥ  hi jīvaḥ tvac ca sakala śarīra vyāpinī iti tvac vyāpya ātma saṃbandhaḥ sakala śaitya upalabdhau samartha iti arthaḥ avasthiti vaiśeṣyāt iti ced na abhyupagamāt hṛdi hi candana bindoḥ pratyakṣataḥ alpīyaḥ tvam buddhvā yuktā kalpanā bhavati yasya tu saṃdigdham aṇu tvam sarva aṅgīṇam ca kāryam upalabhyate tasya vyāpi tvam autsargikam apahāya na iyam kalpanā avakāśam labhata iti śaṅkā arthaḥ na ca haricandana bindu dṛṣṭāntena aṇatva anumānam jīvasya pratidṛṣṭānta saṃbhavena anaikāntika tvāt iti āha na ca atra anumānam iti śaṅkām imām apākaroti atra ucyata iti yadi api pūrva uktābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ aṇu tvam siddham ātmanaḥ tathā api vaibhāt śuti antaram upanyastam guṇāt vā lokavat  ye tu sa avayava tvāt candana bindoḥ aṇu saṃcāreṇa deha vyāptiḥ upapadyate na tu ātmanaḥ  anavayavasya aṇusaṃcāraḥ saṃbhavī tasmāt vaiṣamyam iti manyante tān pratidam ucyate guṇāt vā lokavat iti tad vibhajate caitanya iti yadi api aṇuḥ jīvaḥ tathā api tad guṇaḥ caitanyam sakala deha vyāpi yathā pradīpasya alpa tve api tad guṇaḥ prabhāsakala gṛha audara vyāpinī iti etad api śaṅkā dvāreṇa dṛṣayitvā dṛṣṭānta antaram āha vyatirekaḥ  gandhavat  akṣīyamāṇam api tad iti kṣayasya ati sūkṣma tayā anupalabhyamānakṣam iti śaṅkate syāt etad iti viśliṣṭānām alpa tvāt iti upalakṣaṇam dravya antara paramāṇūnām anupraveśāt iti api draṣṭavyam viśleṣa anupraveśābhyām ca san  api viśleṣaḥ sūkṣma tvāt na upalakṣyate iti nirākaroti nā kutas  atīndriya tvāt iti paramāṇūnām parama sūkṣma tvāt tadgata rūpa ādivat gandhaḥ  api na upalabhyeta upalabhyamānaḥ  vā sūkṣma upalabhyeta na sthūla iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham pṛthak upadeśāt nigada vyākhyāta bhasya bhāṣyam tad guṇa sāra tvāt tu tad vyapadeśaḥ prājñavat  kamṭaka todane api iti mahat alpayoḥ saṃyogaḥ  alpam avaruṇaddhi na mahāntam na jātu ghaṭa karaka ādi saṃyogā nabhasaḥ  tabhaḥ vyaśruvate api tvalpān eva ghaṭa karaka ādīn itarathā yatra nabhaḥ tatra sarvatra ghaṭa karaka ādi upalambha iti te api nabhaḥ parimāṇaḥ prasajyeran  iti na cāṇoḥ jīvasya sakala śarīra gatā vedanā upapadyate yadi api antaḥkaraṇam aṇu tathā api tasyatvacā saṃbaddha tvāt tvacaḥ ta samasta śarīra vyāpi tvāt eka deśe api adhiṣṭhitā tvac adhiṣṭhitā eva iti śarīra vyāpī jīvaḥ śaknoti sarva aṅgīṇam śaityam anubhavitum tvac indriyeṇa gaṅgāyām aṇuḥ tu jīvaḥ  yatra asti tasmin  eva śarīra pradeśaḥ  tad anubhavet na sarva aṅgīṇam tasya asarva aṅgīṇa tvāt kaṇṭaka todanasya tu prādeśika tayā na sarva aṅgīṇa upalabdhiḥ iti vaiṣamyam guṇa tvam eva hi iti idam eva hi guṇānām guṇa tvam yad dravya deśa tvam ata eva hi hemante viṣakta avayavāpya dravya gate atisāndre śīta sparśe anubhūyamānā ipya nudbhūtam rūpam na upalabhyate yathā tathā mṛgamada ādīnām gandha vāha viprakīrṇa sūkṣma avayavānām atisāndre gandhe anubhūyamāne rūpa sparśau na anubhūyete tad kasya hetoḥ anudbhūta tvāt tayoḥ gandhasya ca udbhūta tvāt iti na ca dravyasya prakṣya prasaṅgaḥ dravya antara avayava pūraṇāt ata eva kāla parivāsa vaśāt asya hata gandhitā upalabhyate apica caitanyam nāma na gumaḥ jīvasya guṇānaḥ kintu rūpa bhāvaḥ na ca svabhāvasya vyāpi tve bhāvasya avyāpi tvam tattva pracyuteḥ iti āha yadi ca caitanyam iti tad evam śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa siddhe jīvasya avikāritayā paramātma tve tathā śruti āditaḥ parama mahat tve ca yā nāma aṇutva śrutayaḥ tāḥ tad anurodhena buddhi guṇa sāra tayā vyākhyeyā iti āha tad guṇa sāra tvāt iti tad vyācaṣṭe tasyāḥ  buddheḥ iti ātmanā sva saṃbandhinyā buddheḥ upasthāpita tvāt tadā parāmarśaḥ na hi śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ tattvam saṃsāribhiḥ anubhūyate api tu yaḥ  ayam mithyājñāna dveṣa ādi anuṣaktaḥ sa eva pratyātmam anubhava gocaraḥ na ca brahma svabhāvasya jīvātmanaḥ kūṭastha nityasya svata icchā dveṣa anupaṅga saṃbhava iti buddhi guṇānām teṣām tad abheda adhyāsena tad dharmatva adhyāsaḥ upadara avādhyaḥ tasya iva candramasaḥ  bimbasya toya kampe kam apvattva adhyāsa iti upapāditam adhyāsa bhāṣye tathā ca buddhi ādi upādhi kṛtam asya jīvatvam iti buddheḥ antaḥkaraṇasya aṇutayā saḥ  api aṇu vyapadeśa bhāj bhavati nabha iva karaka upa hitam karaka parimāṇam tathā ca utkrānti ādīnām upattiḥ iti nigada vyākhyātam itaram prāyaṇe asattvam asaṃsāri tvam vā tatas ca kṛta vipraṇāśa akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅgaḥ yāvat ātma bhāvi tvāt tu na doṣaḥ tad darśanāt  yāvat saṃsārya ātma bhāvi tvāt iti arthaḥ samānaḥ san  iti buddhyā samānaḥ tad guṇa sāra tvāt iti apica mithyājñāna iti na kevalam yaṃvat saṃsārya ātma bhāvi tvam āgamataḥ upapattitaḥ ca iti arthaḥ āditya varṇam iti prakāśa rūpam iti arthaḥ tamasa iti avidyāyāḥ  iti arthaḥ tam eva viditvā sākṣātkṛtya mṛtyum avidyāmati eti iti yojanā anuśaya bījam pūrva pakṣī prakaṭayati nanu suṣupta pralayayoḥ iti satā parama ātmanā anuśaya bīja parihāraḥ atra ucyate panstu ādivat tvasya sataḥ  abhivyakti yogāt  nigada vyākhyātam asya bhāṣyam nitya upalabdhi anupalabdhi prasaṅgonyatara niyamaḥ  vā anyathā syāt etad  antaḥkaraṇe api sati tasya nitya saṃnidhānāt  kasmāt nitya upalabdhi anupalabdhī na prasajyete atha adṛṣṭa vipākakādācitka tvāt  sāmarthya pratibandha apratibandhābhyām antar  karaṇasya na ayam prasaṅgaḥ tau  asati eva antar  karaṇe ātmanaḥ  vā indriyāṇām vā stām tad kim antar gaḍuna antaḥkaraṇena iti codayati athavā anyatarasya ātmana iti athavā iti siddhāntam nivartayati siddhāntī brūte na ca ātmana iti avadhānam khalu anuvubhūpā śuśrūṣā vā na ca ete ātmanaḥ  dharmau tasya avikriya tvāt na ca undriyāṇam ekaika indriya vyatireke api andhādīnām darśanāt  na ca te āntara tvena anubhūyamāne bāhye saṃbhavataḥ tasmāt asti tadā antaram kim api yasya ca ete tad antaḥkaraṇam tad idam uktam yasya avadhāna iti atra eva arthe śrutim darśayati tathā ca iti kartā śāstra arthavat tvāt  nanu atad guṇa sāra tvāt iti anena eva jīvasya kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam ca labdham eva iti tad vyutpādanam anarthakam ityata āha tad guṇa sāratva adhikāreṇa iti tasya eva eṣa prapañcaḥ  ye bhoktā eva na kartā iti tad nirākaraṇa arthaḥ aśāstra phalam prayoktari tad lakṣaṇa tvāt iti āha sma bhagavān jaiminiḥ prayoktari anuṣṭhātari kartarī iti yāvat  śāstra phalam svarga ādi kutas  prayoktṛ phala sādhana tā lakṣaṇa tvāt  śāstrasya vidheḥ kartṛ apa īkṣita upāya tā hi vidhiḥ buddhiḥ ced kartrī bhoktā ca ātmā tatas  yasya apekṣita upāyaḥ  bhoktuna tasya kartṛ tvam yasya kartṛ tvam na ca tasya apekṣita upāyā iti kim kena saṃgatam iti śāstrasya anarthaka tvam avidyamāna abhidheya tvam tathā ca aprayojanaka tvam syāt  yathā ca tad guṇa sāra tayā asya avastu sat api bhoktṛ tvam sāṃvyavahārikam evam kartṛ tvam api sāṃvyavahārikam na tu bhāvikam avidyāvat viṣaya tvam ca śāstrasya upapāditam adhyāsabhāṣya iti sarvam avadātam vihāra upadeśāt vihāraḥ saṃcāraḥ kriyā tatra svātantryam na akartuḥ saṃbhavati tasmāt api kartā jīvaḥ upādānāt  tad eteṣām prāṇānām indriyāṇām vijñānena buddhyā vijñānam grahaṇa śaktim ādāya upādāya iti upādāne svātantryam na akartuḥ saṃbhavati vyapadeśāt ca kriyāyām ced nirdeśa viparyayaḥ abhyuccaya mātram etatra samgupapattiḥ vijñānam kartṛ  yajñam tanute sarvatra hi buddhiḥ karaṇa rūpā karaṇa tvena eva vyapadiśyate na kartṛ tvena iha tu kartṛ tvena tasyāḥ  vyapadeśe viparyayaḥ syāt  tasmāt ātmā eva vijñānam iti vyapadiṣṭaḥ tena kartā iti sūtra antaram avatārayitum codayati atra āha yadi iti prajñāvān svatantra iṣṭamovātmanaḥ saṃpādayet na aniṣṭam aniṣṭa saṃpattiḥ api asya upalabhyate tasmāt na svatantraḥ tathā ca na kartā tad lakṣaṇa tvāt tasya iti arthaḥ asya uttaram upalabdhit aniyamaḥ karaṇa ādīni kāraka antarāṇi kartā prayuṅkte na tvayam kāraka antaraiḥ prayujyata iti etāvat mātram asya svātantryam na tu kārya kriyāyām na kāraka antarāṇi apekṣata iti īdṛśam hi svātantryam na īśvarasya api atrabhavataḥ  asti iti utsanna saṃkathaḥ kartā syāt  tathā ca ayam adṛṣṭa paripāka vaśa āt iṣṭam abhiprepsuḥ tad sādhana vibhrameṇa aniṣṭa upāyam vyāpārayan  aniṣṭam prāpnuya āditya niyamaḥ kartṛ tvam ca iti na virodhaḥ viṣaya prakalpana mātra prayojana tvāt iti nitya caitanya svabhāvasya khalvātmana indriya ādi iti karaṇāni sva viṣayam upanayanti tena viṣaya avacchinnam eva caitanyam vṛttiḥ iti vijñānam iti ca ākhyāyate tatra ca asya asti svātantryam iti arthaḥ śakti viparyayāt  pūrvam kāraṇaka vibhakti viparyaya uktaḥ saṃprati kāraka śakti viparyaya iti apunaruktam aviparyayāya tu karaṇa antara kalpanāyām nāmni visaṃvāda iti samādhi abhāvāt ca samādhiḥ iti saṃyamam upalakṣayati dhāraṇā dhyāna samādhayaḥ  hi saṃyama pad evadanīyāḥ yathā āhuḥ atrayam ekatra saṃyamaḥ iti atra śrotavyaḥ  mantavya iti dhāraṇa upadeśaḥ nididhyāsitavya iti dhyāna upadeśaḥ draṣṭavya iti samādheḥ upadeśaḥ yathā āhuḥ atat eva dhyānam artha mātra nirbhāsam svarūpa śūnyam iva samādhiḥ iti saḥ  ayam iha kartā ātmā samādhau  upadiśyamāna ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam avaitīti sūtra arthaḥ yathā ca takṣobha yathā avāntara saṃgatim āha evam tāvat iti vimṛśati tad punar iti pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti tatra iti śāstra arthavat tvādayaḥ  hi hetava ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam āpādayanti na ca svābhāvike kartṛ tve saṃbhavati asati apavāde tad aupādhikam yuktam atiprasaṅgāt  na ca mukti abhāva prasaṅgaḥ  asya apavādakaḥ yathā jñāna svabhāvaḥ  jñeya abhāve api na ajñaḥ bhavati evam kartṛ svabhāvaḥ  api kriyā āveśa abhāve api na akartā tasmāt  svābhāvikam eva asya kartṛ tvam iti prāpte abhidhīyate nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvam hi brahma bhūyas bhūyas  śrūyate tad asya buddha tvam asati api boddhavye yuktam vahneḥ iva asati api dāhye dagdhṛ tvam tad śīlasya tasya avagamāt  kartṛ tvam tu asya kriyā veśāt avagantavyam na ca nitya udāsīnasya kūṭasthasya nityasya asakṛt śutasya saṃbhavati tasya ca kadācid api asaṃsarge katham tad śakti yogaḥ  nirviṣayāyāḥ śakteḥ aṃsa bhavāt tathā ca yadi tad sidhi artham tad viṣaḥ kriyā āveśaḥ  abyupeyate tathā sati tad svabhāvasya svabhāva uccheda abhāvāt bhāva nāśa prasaṅgaḥ na ca muktasya asti kriyā yoga iti kriyāyāḥ  duḥkha tvāt na vigalita sakala duḥkha parama ānanda avasthā mokṣaḥ syāt iti āśa yavān āha na svābhāvikam kartṛ tvam ātmana iti abhiprāyam abudhvā codayati nanu sthitāyām api iti pariharati na nimittānām api iti śakta śakyā āśrayā śaktiḥ sva sat tayā avaśyam śakyam ākṣipati tathā ca tayā ākṣiptam śakyam sadā eva syāt iti bhāvaḥ codayati nanu mokṣa sādhanana vidhānāt iti pariharati na sādhana āyattasya iti asmākam tu na mokṣaḥ sādhyaḥ api tu brahma svarūpam tad ca nityam iti uktam abhiprāyam āviṣkaroti apica nitya śuddha  iti codayati para eva tarhi saṃsārī iti ayam arthaḥ paraḥ ced saṃsārī tasya avidya pravilaye muktau sarve mucyeḥ anna viśeṣāt  tatas ca sarva saṃsāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ parasmāt anyaḥ ced sa buddhi ādi saṃghāta eva iti tasya eva tarhi mukti saṃsārau na ātmana iti pariharati na avidyā pratyupasthāpita tvāt iti na paramātmanaḥ  mukti saṃsārau tasya nitya mukta tvāt  na api buddhi ādi saṃghātasya tasya acetana tvāt  api tu avidyā upasthāpitānām buddhi ādi saṃghātānām bhedāt tad tad buddhi ādi saṃghāta bheda upadhāna ātmā ekaḥ  api bhinna iva viśuddhaḥ  api aviśuddha iva tatas ca ekabuddhi ādi saṃghāta apagame tatra mukta iva itaratra baddha iva yathā maṇi kṛpāṇa ādi upadhāna bhedāt ekam eva mukham na anā iva dīrgham iva vṛttam iva śyāmam iva avadātam iva anya tama upadhāna vigame tatra muktam iva anyatra upahitam iva iti na eka m uktau sarva mukta prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na paramātmanaḥ  makṣa saṃsārau na api buddhi ādi saṃghāta asya kintu buddhi ādi upahitasya ātma svabhāvasya jīva bhāvam āpannasya iti parama arthaḥ atra eva anvaya vyatirekau śrutibhiḥ ādarśayati tathā ca iti itas ca aupa adhikam yad upādhi abhibhava udbhavābhyām asya abhibhava udbhavau darśayati śrutiḥ iti āha tathā svapna jāgaritayoḥ iti atra eva arthe sūtram vyācaṣṭe tad etad āha iti saṃprasādaḥ suṣuptiḥ syāt etad  takṣṇaḥ pāṇi ādayaḥ santi taiḥ ayam vāsya ādīn vyāpārayan bhavatu duḥkhī paramātmā tu anavayavaḥ kena manaḥ prabhṛtīni vyāpārayot iti vaiṣamyam takṣṇaḥ  dṛṣṭāntena ityata āha takṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca iti yathā sva śarīra ima uda āsīnaḥ takṣā sukhī na asya ādīni tu karaṇāni vyāpārayan duḥkhī tathā sva ātmanā ātmā udāsīnaḥ sukhī manaḥ prabhṛtīni tu karaṇa ādīni vyāpārayan duḥkhī iti etāvatā asya sāmyam na tu sarvathā yathā ātmā ca jīvaḥ  avayava antara anapekṣaḥ sva śarīram vyāpārayati evam manaḥ prabhṛtīni tu karaṇa antarāṇi vyāpārayati iti pramāṇa siddhe niyoga paryanuyoga anupapattiḥ pūrva pakṣa hetūn anubhāṣya dūṣayati yad tu uktam iti yad param hi śāstram sa eva śāstra arthaḥ kartṛ apekṣita upāya bhāvanā param tad na kartṛ svarūpa param tena yathāloka siddham kartāram apekṣya sva viṣaye pravartamānam na puṃsaḥ svābhāvikam kartṛ tvam avagamayitut sahate tasmāt tad tvam asi iti ādi upadeśa virodhāt avidyā kṛtam tad avatiṣṭhate codayati nanu saṃdhye sthāna iti aupādhikam hi kartṛ tvam na upādhi apagame saṃbhavati iti svābhāvikam eva yujyata iti arthaḥ apica yatra api karaṇam asti tatra api kevalasya ātmanaḥ kartṛtva śravaṇāt svābhāvikam eva yuktam iti āha tathā upādāne api iti tad etad pariharati na tāvat saṃdhya iti upādhi apagamaḥ  asiddhaḥ  antaḥkaraṇasya upādheḥ saṃdhye api avasthānāt iti arthaḥ apica svapne yādṛśam jñānam tādṛśaḥ  vihāraḥ  api iti āha vihāraḥ  api ca tatra iti tathā upādāne api iti yadi api kartṛ vibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathā api karma karaṇa upadhāna kṛtam asya kartṛ tvam na śuddhasya na hi paraśu sahāyaḥ chettā kevalaḥ chettā bhavati nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛ tvam api tu karaṇa ādi sahitasya eva tathā sati karaṇa ādiṣu ati kartṛ vibhaktiḥ syāt  na ca etad asti iti āha bhavati na loka iti karaṇa ādīṣu api kartṛ vibhaktiḥ kadacid asti eva vivakṣā vaśāt iti arthaḥ api ca iyam upādāna śrutiḥ karaṇa vyāpāra uparama mātra parā na svātantrya parā kartṛ vibhaktiḥ tu bhāktī kūlam pipatiṣati itivat abuddhi pūrvakasya karaṇa vyāpāra uparamasya dṛṣṭa tvāt iti āha api cā asmin  upādāna iti yaḥ tu ayam vyapadeśa iti yad tad uktam asmābhiḥ abhyuccaya mātram etam iti tad itas  samutthitam sarva kārakāṇām eva iti viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni sthālī iti hi sva vyāpāre sarveṣām kartṛ tvam tad kim buddhi ādīnām kartṛ tvam eva na karaṇa tvam iti ata āha upalabdhi apekṣam tu eṣām karaṇa tvam nanu evam sati tasyām eva ātmanaḥ svābhāvikam kartṛ tvam astu iti ata āha na ca tasyām ulabdhau  api asya svābhāvika kartṛ tvam asti kasmāt  nitya upalabdhi svarūpa tvāt ātmanaḥ na hi nitye svabhāve ca asti bhāvasya vyāpāriti arthaḥ tad evam na asya upalabdhau sa vābhāvikam kartṛ tvam asti iti uktam na api buddhi ādeḥ upalabdhi kartṛ tvam ātmani adhyastam yathā tad gata madhyavasāya ādi kartṛ tvam iti āha ahaṅkāra pūrvakam api kartṛ tvam na upalabdhuḥ bhavitum arhati kutas  ahaṅkārasya api upalabhyamāna tvāt  na hi śarīra ādi yasyām kriyāyām gamyam tasyām eva gantṛ bhavati etad uktam bhavati yadi buddhiḥ upalabdhī bhavet  tatas tasyāḥ  upalabdhṛ tvam ātmani adhyavasyeta na ca etad asti tasyāḥ  jaḍa tvena upalabhyamāna tayā upalabdhi kartṛtva anupapatteḥ yadā ca aupalabdhau buddheḥ akartṛ tvam tadā yad uktam buddheḥ upalabdhṛ tve karaṇa antaram kalpanīyam tathā ca nāma mātre visaṃvāda iti tad na bhavati iti āha na ca evam sati karaṇa antara kalpanā buddheḥ upalabdhṛtva abhāvāt caitanyam idānīm akaraṇam buddhiḥ upalabdhau  ātmā ca anapalabdha etyata āha buddhe karaṇatva abhyupagamāt ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ caitanyam upalabdhiḥ ātma svabhāvaḥ  nitya iti na tatra ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam na api buddheḥ karaṇa tvam kintu caitanyam eva viṣaya avacchinnam vṛttiḥ iti ca upalabdhiḥ iti ca ākhyāyate tasya tu tad tad viṣaya avacchede vṛttau buddhi adīnām karaṇa tvam ātmanaḥ ca tad upadhānena ahaṅkāra pūrvakam kartṛ tvam yujyata iti parāttu tad śuteḥ yad etad jīvānām aupādhikam kartṛ tvam tad pravartanā lakṣaṇeṣu rāga ādiṣu satsu na īśvaram aparam pravartakam kalpayitum arhati ati prasaṅgāt  naceśvaraḥ  dveṣa pakṣa pāta rahitaḥ  jīvān sādhu asādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitum arhati yena dharma adharma apekṣayā jagat vaicitryam āpadyeta sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇikaḥ  dharma eva jantūn pravartayet na adharme tatas ca tad preritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eva iti sukhina eva syuḥ na duḥkhunaḥ svatantrāḥ tu rāga ādi prayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharma adharma parcayavantaḥ  vaicitryam anubhavanti iti yuktam evañca vidhi niṣedhayoḥ arthavat tvam itarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avasta tantrā iti īśvareṇa eva pravartyanta iti kṛtam vidhi niṣedha ābyām na hi balavat anila salila ogha nudyamānam pratyupadeśoḥ athavān tasmāt  aeṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samasta vidhi niṣedha śruti virodhāt loka virodhāt ca aiśvarya praśaṃsā paratayā neyā iti prāpte abhidhīyate aeṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati ityādayaḥ tāvcachutayaḥ sarva vyāpāreṣu jantūnām īśvara tantra tām āhuḥ tad asati pratibandhake na praśaṃsā paratayā vyākhyātum ucitam na ca śruti siddhasya kalpanīya tā yena pravartakeṣu rāga ādiṣu satsu tad kalpanā virudhyeta na ca īśvara tantra tve dharma eva jantūnām pravṛtteḥ sukhi tvam eva na vaicitryam iti yuktam yadi api ayam īśvaraḥ  vīta rāgaḥ tathā api pūrva pūrva jantu karma apekṣaya jantūn dha mā adharmayoḥ pravartayan na dveṣa pakṣapātābhyām viṣamaḥ na api nirghṛṇaḥ na ca karma pracayasya ādiḥ asti anādi tvat saṃsārasya na ca īśvara tantrasya kṛtam vidhi niṣedha ābyām iti sāṃpratam na hi īśvaraḥ prabalatara pavana iva jantūn pravartayati api tu tad caitanyam anurudhyamānaḥ  rāga ādi upahāra mukhena evam ceṣṭā aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra arthinaḥ  vidhi niṣedhau  arthavantau bhavataḥ tad anena abhisaṃdhinā uktam parāyatte api hi kartṛ tvam karoti eva jīva iti tasmāt vidhi niṣedha śāstra virodhāt lokasya sthūla darśi tvāt  aeṣa hi eva sādhu ka ma kārayati ityādi śruteḥ aajñaḥ  jantuḥ anīśaḥ  ayam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ īśvara preritaḥ  gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā iti smṛteḥ ca īśvara tantrāmām eva jantūnām kartṛ tvam na tu svatantra āmām iti siddham īśvara eva vidhi niṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yad vidhi niṣedhayoḥ phalam tad īśvareṇa tad pratipādita dharma adharma nirapekṣeṇa kṛtam iti vidhi niṣedhayoḥ ānarthakyam na kevalam ānarthakyam viparītam ca āpadyeta iti āha tathā vihita kāriṇam iti pūrva uktaḥ ca doṣaḥ kṛta nāśa akṛta abhyāgamaḥ prasajyeta atirohita artham anyat  aṃśaḥ nānā vyapadeśāt anyathā ca api dāśakita va ādi tvam adhīyata eke avāntara saṃgatim āha jīveśvarayoḥ iti upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ atra apātatas  vinigamanā hetoḥ abhāvāt aniyamaḥ  niścaya iti uktaḥ niścaya hetvābhāsa darśanena bheda pakṣam ālambī āha athavā iti īśita vyeśitṛ bhāvaḥ ca anveṣyānveṣṭṛ bāvaḥ ca jñeya jñātṛ bhāvaḥ ca niyamya niyantṛ bhāvaḥ ca ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ ca na jīva paramātmanā urabhede avakalpyate na ca abrahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ ityādyāḥ ca śrutayaḥ dāśā brahma kitavā brahma ityādi pratipādana parā jīvānām brahmaṇaḥ  bhede avakalpyante na ca etābhiḥ bheda abeda pratipādana parābhiḥ śrutibiḥ sākṣāt aṃśatva pratipādakāt ca mantra varṇāt  apādaḥ  asya viśvā bhūtāni iti ādeḥ smṛteḥ ca amama eva aṃśaḥ iti ādeḥ jīvānām īśvara aṃśatva siddiḥ niratiśaya upādhi saṃpadā ca vibhūti yogena īśvaraḥ sva aṃśānām api nikṛṣṭa upādhīnāmi iṣṭa iti yujyate na hi tāvat anavayava īśvarasya jīvā bhavitum arhanti aṃśāḥ apica jīvānām brahma aṃśa tve tad gatā vedanā brahmaṇaḥ  bhavet  pāda ādi gatā iva vedanā devadattasya tatas ca brahma bhūyaṅgatasya samasta jīva gata vedanā anubhava prasaṅga iti varam saṃsāra eva mukteḥṣa tatra hi sva gata vedanā mātrām anubhavān na bhūri duḥkham anubhavati muktaḥ tu sarva jīva vedanā ābhāj iti prayatnena muktiḥ anartha bahula tayā parihartavyā syāt iti tathā bheda abhedayoḥ paraspara virodhina uḥ eka tra asaṃbhavāt na aṃśa tvam jīvānām na ca brahmā eva sat asantaḥ tu jīvā iti yuktam sukha duḥkha mukti saṃsāra vyavasthā bhāva prasaṅgāt anujñā parihāra abhāva prasaṅgāt ca tasmāt jīvā eva parama artha santaḥ na brahma ekam advayam advaita śrutayaḥ tu jāti deśa kāla ābeda nimitta upacārāt iti prāpte abhidhīyate anadhigata artha avabodhanāni pramāṇāni viśeṣataḥ śabdaḥ tatra bhedaḥ  loka siddha tvāt na śabdena pratipādyaḥ abedaḥ tu anadhigata tvāt adhigata bheda anuvādena pratipādanam arhati yena ca vākyam upakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante ca upasaṃhriyate tatra eva tasya tātparyam upaniṣadaḥ ca advaita upakrama tatparāmarśa tad upasaṃhārā advaica parā eva yujyante na ca yad parāḥ tad aupacārikam yuktam abhyāse hi bhūyas tvam arthasya bhavati na alpa tvam api prāk eva upacarita tvam iti uktam tasmadvaite bāvike sthite jīva bhāvaḥ tasya brahmaṇaḥ  anādya nirvacanīya avidyapadhāna bhedāt ekasya eva bimbasya darpaṇa ādi upādhi bhedāt pratibimba bhedāḥ evam ca anujñā parihārau laukika vaidikau sukha duḥkha mukti saṃsāra vyavasthā ca upapadyeta na ca mokṣasya anartha bahula tā yatas  pratibimbānām iva śyāma tāvat āta tā ādiḥ jīvānām eva nānā vedanā abhisaṃbandhaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ tu bimbasi iva na tad abhisaṃbandhaḥ yathā ca darpaṇa apanaye tad pratibimbam bimba bhāve avatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbatam api evam avidyā upadhāna vigame jīve brahmabāva iti siddham jīvaḥ  brahma aṃśa iva tad tantra tayā na tu aṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ saptadaśa saṃkhyā parimitaḥ  rāśiḥ gaṇaḥ saptadaśakaḥ tad yathā buddhi karma indriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhi manasī vṛtti bheda mātreṇa bhinne api ekīkṛtya ekam antar  karamam śarīram pca viṣayā iti saptadaśa kaḥ rāśiḥ anujñā vidhiḥ abhimataḥ  na tu pravṛtta pravartanā apauruṣeye pravartayituḥ abhiprāya anurodha asaṃbhavāt kratu arthāyām agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyām pravṛtta pravartana anupapatteḥ ca puruṣa arthe api niyama aṃśe pravṛtte kaḥ punar deha saṃbandha iti na hi kūṭastha nityasya ātmanā upari māminaḥ  asti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ  vā anyaḥ  vā kaścid  saṃbandhaḥ sakala dharma atiga tvāt iti abhisaṃdhiḥ uttaram deha ādiḥ ayam saṃghātaḥ  aham eva iti ātmani viparīta pratyaya utpattiḥ ayam arthaḥ satyam na asti kaścid ātmanaḥ  deha ādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kintu buddhi ādi janita ātma viṣayā viparītā vṛttiḥ aaham eva deha ādi saṃghātaḥ iti evaṃrūpā asyām deha ādi saṃghāta ātma tādātmyena bhāsate saḥ  ayam sāṃvṛttaḥ tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ  na pāramārthika iti arthaḥ gūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ codayati samyak darśinaḥ tarhi iti uttaram na tasya iti yadi sūkṣma sthūla deha ādi saṃghātaḥ  avidyā upadarśita ekam eva advitīyam brahma asmi iti samyak darśanam abhimatam addhā tadvantam prati vidhi niṣedhayoḥ ānarthakyam eva etad eva viśadayati heya upādeyayoḥ iti codakaḥ  nigūḍha abhisaṃdhim āviṣkaroti śarīra vyatireka darśina eva āmuṣmika phaleṣu ka masu darsa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu niyojya tvam iti ca utpariharati na tad saṃhatatva abhimānāt  etad vibhajate satyam iti yaḥ  hi ātmanaḥ ṣāṣ kauśikāt dehāt upapattyā avyatirekam veda na tu samasta buddhi ādi saṃghāta vyatirekam tasya amuṣmika phaleṣu ādhikāraḥ samasta buddhi ādi vyatireka vedinaḥ tu karma bhoktṛtva abhimāna rahitasya na adhikāraḥ karmaṇi tathā ca na yathā iṣṭa ceṣṭā abhimāna vikalasya tasyāḥ  api abhāvāt iti yeṣām tu sāṃkhyānām vaiśeṣikāṇām vā sukha duḥkha vyavasthām pāramārthikīm icchatām bahava ātmānaḥ sarva gatāḥ teṣām eva eṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti tatra praśna pūrvakam sāṃkhyān prati vyatikramam tāvat āha katham iti yādṛśaḥ tādṛśaḥ  guṇaṃsaṃbandhaḥ sarvān puruṣān pratyaviśiṣṭa iti tad kṛte sukha duḥkhe sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭe na ca karma nibandhanā vyavasthā karmaṇaḥ prākṛta tvena prakṛteḥ ca sādhāraṇa tvena avyavasthā tādavasthyāt  codayati syāt etad iti ayam arthaḥ na pradhānam sva vibhūtī khyāpanāya pravartate kintu puruṣa artham yam ca puruṣam pratyanena bhoga apavargau puruṣa arthau sādhitau tam prati samāpta adhikāra tayā nivartate puruṣa antaram tu pratyasamāpya adhikāram pravartate evam na mukta saṃsāri vyavastha upapatteḥ sukha duḥkha vyavasthā api bhaviṣyati iti nirākaroti na hi iti sarveṣām puruṣāṇām vibhu tvāt  pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyadamum puruṣam pratyanena arthaḥ sādhita iti etad eva na asti tasmāt  prayojana vaśena vinā hetum vyavasthā stheyā sā ca ayuktā hetu abhāvāt iti arthaḥ bhavatu sāṃkhyānām avyavasthā pradhāna samavāyāt adṛṣṭasyasa pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyāt  kāṇāt ādīnām tu ātma samavāpya dṛṣṭam pratyātmam asādhāraṇam tad kṛtaḥ ca manasā saha ātmanaḥ sva svāmi bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ  anādiḥ adṛṣṭa bhedānām anādi tvāt  tathā ca ātmanaḥ saṃyogasya sādhāraṇye api sva svāmi bhāvasya asādha araṇyāt abhisaṃdhi ādi vyavasthā upapadyata eva na ca saṃyogaḥ  api sādhāraṇaḥ na hi tasya manasa ātmāna taraiḥ yaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa eva svāminā api ātma saṃyogasya pratisaṃyoga bhedena bhedāt  tasmāt ātmā eka tvasya āgama siddha tvāt vyavasthāyāḥ ca ekatve api upapatteḥ na aneka ātma kalpanā gauravāt āgama virodhāt ca antya viśeṣavat tvena ca bheda kalpanāyām anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ bhede hi tad kalpanā tatas ca bheda iti etad eva kāṇādam atadūṣaṇam bhāṣya kṛtā tu prauḍha vādi tayā kāṇādān pratyapi adṛṣṭa aniyamāt itya ādīni sūtrāṇi yojitāni sāṃkhya mata dūṣaṇa parāṇi eva iti tu rocayante kecid tad āstām tāvat  iti śrī nācaspati miśravi racite bhagavat pāda śārīraka bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām dvitīya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ iti dvitīya adhyāyasya pañca mahābhūta  jīvaśrutīnām virodha paripāra ākhyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ dvitīya adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ tathā prāṇaḥ yadi api brahma vedane sarva vedana pratijñātāt upapādana śruti virodhāt bahutara advaita śruti virodhāt ca prāṇānām sarga ādau sadbhāva śrutiḥ viyada smṛtatva ādi śrutaya iva anyathā kathañcid netum ucitā tathā api anyathā ānayana prakāram avidvān anyathā anupapadyamāna ekā api śrutiḥ bahvīranthayet iti manvānaḥ pūrvapakṣayati atra ca ati uccatayā viyat adhi karaṇa pūrva pakṣa hetūn smārayati tatra tāvat iti śabda eka pramāṇa samadhigamyā hi mahābhūta utpattiḥ tasyāḥ  yatra śabdaḥ  nivartate tatra tad pramāṇa bhāvena tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate yathā caitya vandana tad karma dharma tāyā iti arthaḥ atra apātatas śruci vipratipattyā anadhyavasāyena pūrva pakṣayitvā athavā iti abhihitam pūrvapakṣamam avatārayati abhiprāyaḥ  asya darśitaḥ apāna vyāpad ca tadvat iti atra aśva pratigraha iṣṭi ādi adhikaraṇa pūrva pakṣa sūtra artha sādṛśyam tadā parāmṛṣṭam rāddha antaḥ tu syāt etad evam yadi sarga ādau prāṇa sadbhāva śrutiḥ ananyathā asiddhā bhavet  anyathā eva tu eṣā sidhyati avāntara pralaye hi agni sādhanānām sṛṣṭiḥ vaktavyā iti tad arthaḥ  abhau  upakramaḥ tatra adhikāri puruṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ apranaṣṭa eva trailokya mātram pralīnam atas tadīyān prāṇān apekṣya sā śrutiḥ upapanna arthā tasmāt bhūyasīnām śrutīnām anugrahāya sarva vijñāna pratijñā upapatti arthasya ca uttarasya saṃdarbhasya gauṇa tve tu pratājñāta artha anugumya abhāvena anapekṣita arthatva prasaṅgāt prāṇā api nabhaḥvat brahmaṇaḥ  vikārā iti na ca caitya vandana ādivat sarvathā prāṇānām utpatti aśrutiḥ kkacid  khalu eṣām utpatti aśravaṇam utpatti śrutiḥ tu tatra tatra darśitā tasmāt vaiṣamyam caitya vandana poṣadha ādibhiḥ iti kecid viyat adhi karaṇa vyākhyānena gauṇya saṃbhavāt iti sūtram vyācakṣate gauṇī prāṇān āmatpatti śrutiḥ asaṃbhavāt utpatteḥ iti tad ayuktam vikalpa asaha tvāt tathā hi prāṇānām jīvavat vā avikṛta brahma ātma tayā anupapattiḥ syāt  brahmaṇaḥ tattva antara tayā vā na tāvat jīvavat eṣām avikṛta brahma ātma tā jaḍa tvāt  tasmāt tattva antara tayā eṣām anutpattiḥ āstheyā tathā ca brahma vedanena sarva vedana pratijñā vyāhatiḥ samasta vedānta vyākopaḥ ca iti etad āha viyat adhikaraṇe hi iti tad prāc śruteḥ ca nigada vyākhyātam asya bhāṣyam tad pūrvaka tvāt vācaḥ vāca iti vāc prāṇa manasām upalakṣaṇam ayam arthaḥ yatra api tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām sṛṣṭau prāṇa sṛṣṭiḥ na ukta iti brūṣe tatra api uktā iti brūmahe tathā hi yasmin prakaraṇena tejaḥ banna pūrvaka tvam vāc prāṇa manasāmāmnāyate aanna mayam hi ityādinā tad yadi mukhya artham tatas tad sāmānya atrveṣām eva prāṇānām sṛṣṭiḥ uktā atha gaumam tathā api brahma kartṛ kāyām nāma rūpa vyākriyāyām upakrama upasaṃhāra paryālocanayā śruti antara prasiddheḥ ca brahma kāryatva prapañca artham eva prāṇa ādīnām āpemayatu ādi abhidhānam iti uktā eva tatra api prāṇa sṛṣṭiḥ iti siddham sapta gateḥ viśeṣita tvāt ca avāntara saṃgatim āha utpatti viṣaya iti saṃśaya kāraṇam āha śruti vipratiṣedhāt iti viśayaḥ saṃśayaḥ kkacid  sapta prāṇāḥ tad yathā cakṣuḥ ghrāṇa rasanavāc śrotra manaḥ tvak iti kkacid aṣṭau prāṇā graha tvena bandhanena guṇena saṃkīrtyante tad yathā ghrāṇa rasana vāc cakṣuḥ śrotra manohasta tvak iti ta ete grahāḥ eṣām tu viṣayā atigrahāḥ tu aṣṭau  eva aprāṇaḥ  vai grahaḥ saḥ  apānena atigraheṇa gṛhītaḥ  apānena hi gandhān jighrati ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa uktāḥ kkacid nava tad yathā sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇāḥ dvau  avāñcau  iti dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve ghrāṇe ekā vāc iti sapta pāyu upasthau buddhi manasī vā dvau  avāñcau  iti na ca kkacid daśa nava vai puruṣe prāṇā sta uktā nābhiḥ daśami iti kkacid ekādaśa adaśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ tad yathā buddhīndriyāṇi ghrāṇa ādīni pañca karmendriyāṇi api hasta ādīni pañca ātmā ekādaśa āpnoti adhiṣṭhānena iti ātmā manaḥ sa ekādaśa iti kkacid vādaśa asarveṣām sparśānām tvac ekāyanam iti atra tad yathā tvac nāsikā rasana cakṣuḥ śrotra monaḥ hṛdaya hasta pāda upastha pāyū vāk iti kkacid eta eva prāṇā ahaṅkāra adhikāḥ trayodaśa evam vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattām prati śrutayaḥ atra praśna pūrvam pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti kim tāvat  prāptam saptā eva iti sapta eva prāṇāḥ kutas  gateḥ avagate śrutibhyaḥ asapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti ityādibhyaḥ na kevalam śrutitaḥ  avagatiḥ viśeṣaṇāt api evam eva iti āha viśeṣita tvāt ca sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā iti ye sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ śrotra ādayaḥ te prāṇā iti ukte itareṣām aśīrṣaṇyānām hasta ādīnām aprāṇa tvam gamyate yathā dakṣiṇena akṣṇā paśyati iti ukte vāmena na paśyati iti gamyate etad uktam bhavati yadi api śruti vipratiṣedaḥ  yadi api ca pūrva saṃkhyāsu na parāsām saṃkhyānām niveśaḥ tathā api avacchedaka tvena bahvīnām saṃkhyānām asaṃbhavāt ekasyām kalpyamānāyām sapta tvam eva yuktam prāthamyāt lāghavāt ca vṛtti bheda mātra vivakṣayā tu aṣṭa tvādayaḥ  gamayitavyā iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate hasta ādayaḥ tu sthite atas  na evam tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na sapta eva kintu hastāt ayaḥ  api prāṇāḥ pramāṇa antarāt ekādaśa tve prāṇānām sthite atosmin sati sārvavibhaktikaḥ tasiḥ na evam lāghavāt  prāthamyāt ca sapta tvam iti akṣara arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati yadi api śrutayaḥ svatas pramāṇa tayā anapekṣāḥ tathā api paraspara virodhāt na artha tattva paricchedāya alam na ca siddhe vastuni anuṣṭhāna iva vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati tasmāt  pramāṇa anta cara upanīta artha vaśena vyavasthāpyante yathā hīna iti asruveṇa avadi api iti māṃsa puroḍāśa avadāna asaṃbhavāt saṃbhavāt ca drava avadānasya sruva avadāne dravāṇi iti vyavasthāpyate evam iha api rūpa ādi buddhi pañcaka kārya vyavasthātaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi buddhīndriya karaṇa pañcaka vyavasthā na hi andha ādayaḥ satsu api itareṣu ghrāṇa ādiṣu gandha ādi upalabdhyā anumita sadbhāveṣu rūpa ādīn upalabhante tathā vacana ādi lakṣaṇa kārya pañcaka vyavasthātaḥ  vāc pāṇi ādi lakṣaṇa karmendriya pañcaka vyavasthā na hi jātu mūka ādayaḥ satsu api viharaṇa ādi avagata sadbhāveṣu pāda ādiṣu buddhīndriyeṣu vā vacana ādimantaḥ  bhavanti evam karma buddhi indriya asaṃbhavinyā saṃkalpa ādi kriyā vyavasthayā antar  karaṇa vyavasthā anumānam ekam api ca antaḥkaraṇam aneka kriyā kāri bhaviṣyati yathā pradīpa ekaḥ  rūpa prakāśa varti vikāra sneha śoṣaṇa hetuḥ tasmāt na antaḥkaraṇa bhedaḥ ekam eva tu antaḥkaraṇam mananāt mana iti ca abhimānāt ahaṅkāra iti ca adhyavasāyāt buddhiḥ iti ca ākhyāyate vṛtti bhedāt ca abhinnam api bhinnam iva upacaryate trayam iti tattvena tu ekam eva bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt  tad evam ekādaśānām kāryāṇām vyavasthānāt ekādaśa prāṇā iti śrutiḥ āñjasī tad anuguṇa tayā tu itarāḥ śrutayaḥ netavyāḥ tatra avayuti anuvādena sapta aṣṭana vadaśa saṃkhyā śrutayaḥ yathā ekam vṛṇīte dvau iti trīn vṛṇīta iti etadā anuguṇyāt  dvādaśa trayodaśa saṃkhyā śrutī tu kathañcid vṛtti bhedena bhedam vivakṣitvā upāsana ādi para tayā netavye tasmāt ekādaśā eva prāṇā na itara iti siddham apica śīrṣaṇyānām prāṇānām yad saptatva abidhānam tad api caturṣu eva vyavasthāpanīyam pramāṇa antara virodhāt na khalu dve cakṣuṣī rūpaḥ labdhi lakṣaṇasya kāryasya ābedāt pihita eka cakṣuṣaḥ tu na tādṛśī rūpa upalabdhidharbhavati yādṛśī samagra cakṣuṣaḥ tasmāt ekam eva cakṣuḥ adhiṣṭhāna bhedena tu bhinnam iva upacaryate kāṇasya api ekagolaka gatena cakṣuḥ avayavena upalambhaḥ etena ghrāṇa śrotre api vyākhyāte iyam aparā sūtra dvaya yojanā sapta eva prāṇāḥ cakṣuḥ ghāṇa rasanavāc śrotra manaḥ tvaca utkrāntimantaḥ syuḥ saptānām eva gati śruteḥ viśeṣita tvāt iti vyākhyātum śaṅkate nanu sarva śabdaḥ  api atra iti asya uttaram viśeṣita tvāt iti cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ tvac paryantā utkrāntau viśeṣitāḥ tasmāt sarva śabdasya prakṛta apekṣa tvāt sapta eva prāṇā utkrāmanti na pāṇi ādaya iti prāptam codayati nanu atra vijñānam aṣṭamam iti ana vijānāti iti āhuḥ iti anena anukrāntam pariharati na eṣa doṣa iti siddhāntam āha hasta ādayaḥ tu apare saptabhyaḥ  atiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ utkrānti bhājaḥ  avagamyante grahatva śruteḥ hasta ādīnām evam khalu eṣām grahatva āmnānam upapadyeta yadi āmukteḥ ātmānam badhnīyuḥ ita rathā ṣāṭkośika śarīravat eṣām graha tvam nāmnāyeta ata eva ca smṛtiḥ eṣām mukti avadhitām āha puryaṣṭakena iti tathā ātharvaṇa śrutiḥ api eṣām ekādaśānām utkrāntim abhivadati tasmāt śuti antarebhyaḥ smṛteḥ ca sarva śabda artha asaṃkocāt ca sarveṣām utkrameṇa sthite asmin  aivam yad uktam saptā eva iti kintu pradarśana artham saptatva saṃkhyā iti siddham aṇavaḥ ca atra sāṃkhyānām āhaṅkārika tvāt indriyāṇām ahaṅkārasya ca jagnā maṇḍala vyāpi tvāt sarva gatāḥ prāṇāḥ vṛttiḥ teṣām śarīra deśa tayā prādeśikī tad nibandhanā ca gati āgati śrutiḥ iti manyante tān pratyāha aṇavaḥ ca prāṇā anudbhūta rūpa spartā ca aṇu tvam duradhigama tvāt na tu paramāṇu tvam deha vyāpi kārya anutpatti prasaṅgāt tāpa dūnasya śiśira hrada nimagnasya sarva aṅgīṇa śīta sparśa upalabdhiḥ asti iti uktam etad uktam bhavati yadi sarva gatāni indriyāṇi bhaveyuḥ tatas  vyavabita vipravṛṣṭa stu upalambha prasaṅgaḥ sarva gata tve api deha avacchinnānām eva karaṇa tvam tena na vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa vastu upalambha prasaṅga iti ced  hanta prāpta aprāpta avivekena śarīra avacchinnānām eva teṣām karaṇa tvam indriya tvam iti na vyāpinām indriya bhāvaḥ tathā ca nāma mātre visaṃvādaḥ  na arthe asmābhiḥ tad indriyam ucyate bhavadbhiḥ tu vṛttiḥ iti siddham aṇavaḥ prāṇā iti śreṣṭhaḥ ca na kevalam itare prāṇā brahma vikārāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ca prāṇaḥ  brahma vikāraḥ anāsa dāsīt iti adhikṛtya pravṛtte brahmasūkte na asat āsīye sargāt prāgānīt iti prāṇa vyāpāra śravaṇāt asati ca vyāpārān upapatte prāṇa sadbhāvāt jyeṣṭhatva śruteḥ ca na brahma vikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya bahu śruti virodhe api ca śrutyoḥ etayoḥ gatim apaśyataḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu bahu śruti virodhāt evānīt iti na prāṇa vyāpāra pratipādinī kintu sṛṣṭi kāraṇam ānīt jīvati sma āsīt iti yāvat  tena tad sadbhāva pratipādana parā jyeṣṭha tvam ca śrotra ādi apekṣam iti gamayitavyam tasmāt bahu śruti anurodhāt mukhyasya api prāṇasya brahma vikāra tvam iti siddham na vāyukriye pṛthak upadeśāt saṃprati mukhya prāṇa svarūpam nirūpyate atra hi ayaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti śruteḥ vāyuḥ eva prāṇa iti pratibāti athavā aprāṇa eva brahmaṇaḥ caturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā iti vāyoḥ bhedena prāṇasya śravaṇāt etad virodhāt varam tantra antarīyam eva prāṇasya svarūpam astu śrutī ca viruddha arthe kathañcid neṣyete iti sāmānya karaṇa vṛttiḥ eva prāṇaḥ  astu na ca atra api karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthak prāṇasya anukramaṇa śruti virodhaḥ  vṛtti vṛtti matoḥ bhedāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu na sāmānya indriya vṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ sa hi militānām vā indriyāṇām vṛttiḥ bhavet  pratyekam vā na tāvat militānām eka dvi tri catur indriya abhāve tad abhāva prasabhaṅgāt  naḥ khalu cūrṇa haridrā saṃyoga janma aruṇa guṇaḥ tayoḥ anyatara abhāve bhavitum arhati na ca bahu viṣṭi sādhyam śibikā udvahanam dvi tri viṣṭi sādhyam bavati na ca tvac eka sādhyam tathā sati sāmānya vṛttitva anupapatteḥ apica yad saṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tad pradhāna vyāpāra anuguṇa avāntara vyāpāreṇa eva yathā vayasām prātisvikaḥ  vyāpāraḥ pañjara cālana anuguṇaḥ na ca indriyāṇām prāṇe pradhāna vyāpāre janayitavye asti tādṛśaḥ kaścid avāntara vyāpāraḥ tad anuguṇaḥ ye ca rūpa ādi pratyayā na te tad anuguṇāḥ tasmāt na indriyāṇām sāmānya vṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ tathā ca vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ kathañcid bheda vivakṣayā na pṛthak upadeśaḥ  gamayitavyaḥ tasmāt na kriyā na api vāyu mātram prāṇaḥ kintu vāyu bheda eva adhyātmām āpannaḥ pañca vyūhaḥ prāṇa iti syāt etad  yathā cakṣuḥ ādīnām jīvam prati guṇa bhūta tvāt jīvasya ca śreṣṭha tvāt jīvaḥ svatantra evam prāṇaḥ  api prādhānyāt  śreṣṭha tvāt ca svatantraḥ prāpnoti na ca dvayoḥ svatantrayoḥ ekasmin śarīre eka vākya tvam upapadyata iti aparyāyam viruddha aneka diś kriya tayā deha unmathyeta iti prāpte ucyate cakṣuḥ ādivat tu tad saha śiṣṭi ādibhyaḥ yadi api cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣayā śreṣṭha tvam prādhānyam ca prāṇasya tathā api saṃhata tvāt acetana tvāt bhautika tvāt cakṣuḥ ādibiḥ saha śiṣṭa tvāt caca puruṣa artha tvāt puruṣam prati pāratantryam śayana āsana ādivat bhavet tathā ca yathā mantrī itareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānam api rājānam apekṣya asvatantra evam prāṇaḥ  api cakṣuḥ ādiṣu pradhānam api jīve asvatantra iti syāt etad cakṣuḥ ādibiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇam ced  prāṇaḥ evam sati cakṣuḥ ādi viṣaya rūpa ādivat asya api viṣaya antaram vakyavyam na ca tad śakyam vaktum ekādaśa karaṇa gaṇana vyā kopaḥ ca iti doṣam pariharati akaraṇa tvāt ca na doṣaḥ tathā hi darśayati na prāṇaḥ pariccheda dhāraṇa ādi karaṇam asmābhiḥ abhyupeyate yena asya viṣaya antaram anviṣyeta ekādaśa tvam ca karaṇānām vyākupyeta api tu prāṇa antara asaṃbhavi deha indriya vidhāraṇa kāraṇam prāṇaḥ tad ca śruti prabandhena darśitam na kevalam śarīra indriya dhāraṇam asya kāryam apica pañcavṛttiḥ manaḥvat vyapadiśyate aviparyayaḥ mithyājñānam atad rūpa pratiṣṭham yathā maru marīcikā ādiṣu salila ādi buddhayaḥ atad rūpa pratiṣṭhatā ca saṃśaye api asti tasya eka apratiṣṭhānāt  atas  saḥ  api saṃgṛhītaḥ aśabda jñāna anupātī vastu śūnyaḥ  vikalpaḥ yadi api mithyājñāne api asti vastu śūnyatā tathā api na tasya vyavahāra hetu tā asti asya tu paṇḍita rūpa vicāra asahasya api śabda jñāna māhātmyāt vyavahārā hetu bhāvaḥ  asti eva yatha puruṣasya caitanyam iti na hi atra ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ  asti tasya bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt  caitanyasya puruṣāt atyantā bhedāt  yadi api ca atra abhāva pratyaya ālambanā vṛttiḥ na iṣyate tathā api vikṣepa saṃskāra lakṣaṇā manaḥ vṛttiḥ iha asti eva iti sajñavam avadātam aṇuḥ ca asamāḥ tribhiḥ lokaiḥ iti vibhutva śravaṇāt vibhuḥ prāṇaḥ asamaḥ pluṣiṇā iti ādyāḥ tu śrutayaḥ vibhoḥ api avacchedāt bhāviṣyanti yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭa karaka ādi avacchedāt kuṭa ādi sāmyam iti prāpta āha aṇuḥ ca utkrānti gati āgati śrutibhya ādhyātmikasya prāṇasya avacchinna tā na vibhu tvam duradhi gamatā mātreṇa ca śarīra vyāpinaḥ  api aṇu tvam upacaryate na tu aṇu tvam iti uktam adhastāt yad tvasya vibhu tvāt mānam tadā adhidaivikena sūtra ātmanā samaṣṭi vyaṣṭi rūpeṇa na tu ādhyātmikena rūpeṇa tad āśrayāḥ ca asamaḥ pluṣiṇā iti evamādyāḥ śrutayaḥ deha sāmyam eva prāṇasya āhuḥ svarūpataḥ  na tu karaka ākāśavat para upādhika tayā kathañcid natavyā iti jyotiḥ ādi adhiṣṭhānam tu tadā mananāt  yad hi tad kāryam kurvat dṛṣṭam tad sva mahimnā eva karotiti eṣa tāvat utsargaḥtha para adhiṣṭhānam tu tasya balavat pramāṇa antara vaśāt syāt etad  vā asya ādīnām takṣa ādi adhiṣṭhitānām acetanānām kārya kāritva darśanāt acetana tvena undriyāṇām api adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā kalpanā iti ced  na jīva stha eva adhiṣṭhātuḥ cetanasya vidyamāna tvāt  na ca aagniḥ vāc bhūtvavā mukham prāviśat ityādi śrutibhyaḥ  devatānām api adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam abhyupagantum yuktam aneka adhiṣṭhāna abhyupagame hi teṣām eka abhiprāya niyama nimitta abhāvāt na kiñcid kāryam utpadyeta virodhāt  apica ya indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhoktā iti devatānām bhoktṛ tvena svāmi tvam śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syāt bhoktā ca tasmāt agni ādi upacāraḥ  vāc ādiṣu prakāśakatva ādinā kenacid nimittena gamayitatavyaḥ  na tu sva rūpeṇa agni ādi devatānām mukha ādi anupraveśa iti prāptam evam prāpte ucyate nānāvidhāsu tāvat śutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāc ādiṣu agni ādi devatā adhiṣṭhā an avagamyate na ca tad asatyām anupapattau kleśena vyākhyātum ucitam na ca svarūpa upayoga bheda jñāna virahiṇaḥ  jīvasya indriya adhiṣṭhātṛtva saṃbhavaḥ saṃbhavati tu devatānām indriya ādi ārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnām tad svarūpa bheda tad upayoga bheda vijñānam tasmāt tāḥ tā eva devatāḥ tad tad karaṇa adhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktam na tu jīvaḥ bhavatu vā jīvaḥ  api adhiṣṭhātā tathā api adoṣaḥ anekeṣām adhiṣṭhātaṇām ekaḥ parameśvaraḥ  asti niyantā antaryāmī tad śāt vipratipitsavaḥ  api na vipratipattum arhanti tathā ca eka vākya tayā na tad kārya utpatti pratyūhaḥ na ca etāvatā devatānām atra śarīre bhoktṛ tvam na hi yantā ratham adhitiṣṭhin  api tad sādhya vijaya ādeḥ bhoktā api tu svāmi eva evam devatā adhiṣṭhātryaḥ  api na bhoktryaḥ tāsām tāvna mātrasya śruta tvāt  bhoktā tu jīva eva na ca nara ādi śarīra ucitam duḥkha bahulam upabhogam sukham api aḥ  devatā arhanti tasmāt  prāṇānām adhiṣṭhātryaḥ  devatā iti siddham śeṣam ati rohita artham ta indriyāṇi tad vyapadeśāt anyatra śreṣṭhāt  mā bhūt  prāṇaḥ  vṛttiḥ indriyāmām indriyāṇi eva asya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayaḥ  bhaviṣyanti tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi bhāva abhāva tvam indriyāṇām śruti anubhava siddham tathā ca prāṇa śabdasya ekasya anyāṭyam anekā rtvam na bhaviṣyati vṛttīnām vṛttimataḥ tattva antaratva abhāvāt tattva antara tve tu indriyāṇām prāṇa śabdasya aneka artha tvam prasajyeta indriyeṣu lākṣaṇika tvam vā na ca mukhya saṃbhave lakṣaṇā yuktā ughanya tvāt  na ca bhedena vyapadeśaḥ  bheda sādhanam aetasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ iti ādiḥ manasaḥ  api indriyebhyaḥ  asti bhedena vyapadeśa iti anindriyatva prasaṅgaḥ smṛti vaśāt tu tasya indriya tve indriyāmām api prāṇāt bhedena vyapadiṣṭānām api asti prāṇa svabhāva tve ahanta asya eva rūpam asāma iti śrutiḥ tasmāt upapatteḥ śruteḥ ca prāṇasya eva vṛttasya ekādaśa indriyāṇi na tattva antarāṇi iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate mukhyāt  prāṇāt tattva antarāṇi indriyāmi tatra tatra bhedena vyapadeśāt  mṛtyu prāpta aprāptatva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsarga śruteḥ artha kriyā bhedāt ca deha dhāraṇam hi prāṇasya kriyār atha ālocana manane ca indriyāṇām na ca tad bhāva ābāva anuvidhānam tad vṛttitām ā avahati dehena vyabhicārāt  prāṇa ādayaḥ  hi deha anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ  na ca deha ātmanaḥ yā api ca prāṇa rūpa tām indriyāṇām abhidadhāti śrutiḥ tatra api paurvāparya ālocanāyām bheda eva pratīyata iti uktam bhāṣya kṛtā tasmāt bahu śruti virodhāt pūrva apara virodhāt ca prāṇa rūpatā abhidhānam indriyāṇām prāṇa āyatta tayā bhāktam gamayitavyam manasaḥ tu indriya tve smṛteḥ avagate kkacid indriyebhyaḥ  bhedena upādānam gaḥ balīvarda nyāyena athavā indriyāṇām vartamāna mātra viṣaya tvāt manasaḥ tu traikālya gocara tvāt bhedena abhidhānam na ca prāṇe bheda vyapadeśa bāhulyam tathā netum yuktam prāṇa rūpa tā śruteḥ ca gatiḥ darśitā tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇa śabdasya mukhya tvāt indriyeṣu tatas tattva antareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇa śabda iti yuktam na ca mukhyatva anurodhena avagata bhedayoḥ aikyam yuktam mā bhūt gaṅgā ādīnām tīra ādibhiḥ aikyam iti anye tu bheda śabda adhyaya āhāra bhiyā bheda śruteḥ ca iti paunarukti abhiyā ca tad śabdasya ca anantara ukta parama arthaka tvāt anyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ kim ekādaśā eva vāc ādaya indriyāṇi āhaḥ prāṇaḥ  api iti viśaye indrasya ātmanaḥ  liṅgam indriyam tathā ca vāc ādivat prāṇasya api indra liṅgam indriyām iti vāc ādivat prāṇaḥ  api indriyam iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate indriyāṇi vāc ādini śreṣṭhāt  prāṇāt anyatra kutas  tena indriya śabdena teṣām eva vāc ādīnām vyapadeśāt  na hi mukhye prāṇā indriya śabdaḥ  dṛṣṭa caraḥ indra liṅga tā tu vyutpatti mātra nimittam yathā gacchati iti gauḥ iti pravṛtti nimittam tu deha adhiṣṭhāna tve sati rūpa ādi ālocana karaṇa tvam idam ca asya deha adhiṣṭhāna tvam yad deha anugraha upaghātābhyām tad anugraha upaghātau tathā ca na ālokasya indriyatva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt rūḍheḥ vāc ādaya eva indriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham bāṣya kārīyam tu adhikaraṇam bheda śruteḥ ityādiṣu sūtreṣu na iyam saṃjñā mūrti kḷptiḥ tu trivṛt kurvata upadeśāt  sat prakriyāyām atat teja aikṣata ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa tejaḥ  abannānām sṛṣṭim vidhāya upadiśyate aseyam devatā aikṣata hanta aham imāḥ tisraḥ  devatā anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi tāsām trivṛtam trivṛtam ekaikām karavāṇi iti asya arthaḥ pūrva uktam bahu bhavanam īkṣaṇa prayojanam adya api sarvathā na niṣpannam iti punar īkṣām kṛtavatī bahu bhavanam eva prayojanam uddiśya katham hantā idānīm aham imā yathā uktāḥ teja ādyāḥ tisraḥ  devatāḥ pūrva sṛṣṭau  ubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇa saṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇa adharaṇa kartṛ ātmanā anupraviśya buddhi ādi bhūta mātrāyām adarśa iva mukha bimbam toya iva candramasaḥ  bimbam chāyā mātra tayā anupraviśya nāma ca rūpam ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭam karavāṇī damasya nāma idam ca rūpam iti tāsām tisṛṇām devatānām trivṛtam trivṛtam tejaḥ  abanna ātmanā tryātmikām tri ātmikām eka ekām devatām karavāṇi iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim jīvakartṛkam idam nāma rūpa vyākaraṇam āhaḥ parameśvara kartṛkam iti yadi jīva kartṛkam tatas  aākāśaḥ  ha vai nāma nāma rūpayoḥ nirvahitā ityādi śruti virodhāt anadhyavasāyaḥ atha parameśvara kartṛkam tatas  na virodhaḥ tatra ḍitthaḍa vittha ādi nāmakaraṇe ca ghaṭa paṭa ādi rūpa karaṇe ca jīva kartṛtva darśanāt iha api trivṛt karaṇe nāma rūpa karaṇe ca asti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya tathā ca yogya tvāt anena jīvena iti vyākaravāṇi iti pradhāna kriyayā saṃbadhyate na tvā anantaryāt anupraviśya iti anena saṃbadhyate pradhāna padārtha saṃbandhaḥ  hi sākṣāt sarveṣām guṇa bhūtānām padārthānām autsargikaḥ tādarthyāt teṣām tasya tu kkacid sākṣāt asaṃbhavāt parampara āśrayaṇam sākṣāt saṃbhavaḥ ca yogyatayā darśitaḥ nanu sā iyam devatā iti parameśvara kartṛ tvam śrūyate satyam prayojaka tayā tu tad bhaviṣyati yathā loke cāreṇa aham para sainyam anupraviśya saṃkalayāni iti yadi punar asya sākṣāt kartṛ bhāvaḥ  bhavet anena jīvena iti anarthakam syāt  na hi jīvasya anyathā karaṇa bhāvaḥ  bhavitum arhati prayojaka kartuḥ tad sākṣātkartā karaṇam bhavati pradhāna kriyā uddeśena prayojakena prayojya kartuḥ vyāpanāt  tasmāt atra jīvasya kartṛ tvam nāma rūpa vyākaraṇe anyatra tu parameśvarasya iti virodhāt anadhyavasāya iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate parameśvarasya eva iha api nāma rūpa vyākartṛ tvam upadiśyate na tu jīvasya tasya pradhāna kriyā saṃbandham pratyayogya tvāt  nanu anyatra ḍittha javittha ādi nāmaka maṇi ghaṭa śarāva ādi rūpa karmaṇi ca kartṛtva darśanāt iha api yogya tā saṃbhāvyata iti ced  na nirinadī samudra ādi nirmāṇa asāmarthyena artha apatti abhāva paricchinnena saṃbhāvanā apabādhanāt tasmāt  parameśvarasya eva atra sākṣātkartṛ tvam upadiśyate na jīvasya anupraviśya iti anena tu saṃnihitena asya saṃbandhaḥ  yogya tvāt  na ca anarthakyam trivṛt karaṇasya bhoktṛ jīva artha tayā tad anupraveśa abhidhānasya arthavat tvāt  syāt etad  anupraviśya vyākaravāṇi iti samāna kartṛ tve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt  praveśana kartuḥ jīvasya eva vyākartṛ tvam upadiśyate anyathā tu parameśvarasya vyākartṛ tve jīvasya praveṣṭṛ tve bhinna kartṛka tvena ktvaḥ prayogaḥ  vyāhanyeta iti atra āha na ca jīvaḥ  nāma iti atirohita artham anyat  māṃsa ādi bhaumam yathāśabdam itarayoḥ ca atra bhāṣya kṛta uttara sūtra śeṣa tayā sūtram etad viṣaya upadarśana para tayā vyākhyātam śaṅkā nirākaraṇa artha tvam api asya śakyam vaktum tathā hi yaḥ  annasya aṇiṣṭhaḥ  bhāgaḥ tad manaḥ tejasaḥ tu yaḥ  aṇiṣṭhaḥ  bāgaḥ sa vāgiti atra hi kāṇādānām sāṃkhyānām ca asti vipratipattiḥ tatra kāṇādā manaḥ  nityam ācakṣate sāṃkhyāḥ tu ā ahaṅkārike vāc manase anna bhāga tā vacanam tu asya anna saṃbandha lakṣaṇa artham anna upabhoge hi manaḥ svastham bhavati evam vācaḥ  api pāṭavena tejaḥ sāmyam abhyūhanīyam tatra idam upatiṣṭhate māṃsāt iti vāc manasa iti vaktavye māṃsa ādi abhidhānam siddhena saha sādhyasya upanyāsaḥ  dṛṣṭānta lābhāya yathā māṃsa ādi bhauma ādi evam vāc manase api taijasa bhaume iti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati na tāvat brahma vyatiriktam asti kiñcinnatyam brahma jñānena sarva jñāna pratijñā vyāghātāt bahu śruti virodhāt ca na api āhaṅkārikam ahaṅkārasya sāṃkhya abhimatasya tattvasya aprāmāṇika tvāt  tasmāt asati bādhake śrutiḥ āñjasī na anyathā kathañcid netum ucita iti kañcid doṣam iti uktam tam doṣam darśayan  āha pūrva pakṣī yadi sarvam eva iti vaiśeṣyāt tu tad vādaḥ tad vādaḥ tribṛt karaṇa aviśeṣe api yasya ca yatra bhūyas tvam tena tasya vyapadeśa iti arthaḥ iti śrīmat vācaspati miśravi racite śrīmat bhagavat pāda śārīraka bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām dvitīyasya adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ iti śrīmat brahmasūtra śāṅkara bhāṣye avirodha ākhyaḥ  dvitīyaḥ  adhyāyaḥ ____________________________ādhyāya ____________________________ atha tṛtīyaḥ  adhyāyaḥ tad antara pratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśna nirūpaṇābhyām dvitīya tṛtīyā dhyāyayoḥ hetumat bhāva lakṣaṇam saṃbandham darśayan sukha avabodha artham artha saṃkṣepam āha dvitīye adhyāya iti smṛti nyāya śruti virodha parihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāya lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam parihṛtam tathā ca niścalīkṛte tārtīyaḥ  vicāraḥ  bhavati anyathā tu nirbīja tayā na sidhyet iti avāntara saṃgatim darśayitun tatra va jīva vyatiriktāni tattvāni jīva upakaraṇāni ca iti uktam adhyāya artha saṃkṣepam uktvā pāda artha saṃkṣepam āha tatra prathame tāvat pada iti tasya prayojanam āha vairāgya iti pūrva apara pariśodhanāya bhūmikām āracayati jīvaḥ  mukhya prāṇa saciva iti karaṇa upādānavat bhūta upādānasya aśruta tvāt iti atra ca karaṇa upādāna śrutyā eva bhautika tvāt  karaṇānām bhūta upādāna siddheḥ indriya upādāna atirikta bhūta vivakṣaya adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ yadi bhūtāni ādāya āgamiṣyat tadā tad api karaṇa upādāna deva śroṣyat na ca śrūyate tasmāt na bhūta pariṣvaktaḥ  raṃhasi api tu karaṇa mātra pariṣvaktaḥ na hi āgama eka gamyer athe tad abhāvaḥ prameya abhāvam na paricchettum arhati na ca deha antara ārambhāni atha anupapattyā bhūta pariṣvaktasya raṃhaṇa kalpanā iti yuktam iti āha sulabhāḥ ca sarvatra bhūtamātrā iti dyuparjanya iti iha hi kāya ārambhaṇām agnihotrā pūrva pariṇāma lakṣaṇam śraddhā ādi tvena pañcadhā pravibhajya dyu prabhṛtiṣu agniṣu hetavya tvena upāsanam uttara mārga pratipatti sādhanam vivakṣanti āha śrutiḥ aasau vāva lokaḥ  gautama agniḥ ityādi atra sāyaṃprātar agnihotra āhutaḥ hute paya ādi sādhane śraddhā pūrvam āhavanīya agni samidh dhūma arciḥ aṅgāra visphuliṅga bhāvite kartṛ ādi kāraka bhāvite ca antarikṣam krameṇa utkrāmya dyu lokam praviśantyau sūkṣma bhūte drava dravya payaḥ prabhṛti apsaṃbandha āt ap śabda vācye śraddhā hetuka tvāt ca śraddhā śabda vācye tayoḥ āhutyoḥ adhikaraṇam agniḥ anye ca samidh dhūma arciḥ aṅgāra visphuliṅgā rūpaka tvena nirdiśyante asau vāva dyu lokaḥ  gautama agniḥ yathā agnihotra adhikaraṇam āhavanīya evam śraddha śabda vācya agni hotra āhuti pariṇāma avasthā rūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhā bhāvitāḥ tad adhikaraṇam dyulokaḥ asya āt itya eva samidh  tena hi iddhaḥ asau dyu lokaḥ  dīpyate atas  samindhanāt samidh  tasya ādityasya raśmayaḥ  dhūmā indhanāt iva ādityāt raśmīnām samutthānāt  ahar arthiḥ prakāśa sāmānyāt āditya kārya tvāt ca candramā aṅgāraḥ tad etasmin  agnau devāḥ  yajamāna prāṇā agni ādi rūpā adhidevam śraddhām juhvati śraddhā ca uktā parjanyaḥ  vāva gautama agniḥ parjanyaḥ  nāma vṛṣṭi upakaraṇa abhimānī devatā viśeṣaḥ tasya vāyuḥ eva samidh  vāyunā hi parjanyaḥ  agniḥ samidhyate purovāta ādi prābalye vṛṣṭi darśanāt  abhram dhūmaḥ dhūka ārya tvāt  dhūma sādṛśyāt ca vidyut arciḥ prakāśa sāmānyāt  aśaniḥ aṅgārāḥ kāṭhinyāt vidyut saṃbandhāt ca garjitaṃsa moghānām visphuliṅgāḥ viprakīrṇa tā sāmānyāt tasmin devā yajamāna prāṇā agni rūpāḥ somam rājānam juhvati tasya somasya āhuteḥ varṣam bhavati etad uktam bhavati śraddhā ākhyā āpaḥ  dyu lokam āhuti tvena praviśya candra ākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyaḥ  dvitīye paryāye parjanya agnau hutā vṛṣṭi tvena pariṇamanta iti apṛthivī vāva gautama agniḥ tasya pṛthivī ākhyasya agnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samidh  saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmiḥ vrīhi ādi niṣpattaye kalpate ākāśaḥ  dhūmaḥ pṛthivī agneḥ utthita iva ākāśaḥ  dṛśyate rātriḥ arciḥ pṛthivyāḥ  śyāmāyāḥ  anurūpā śyāma tayā rātriḥ agneḥ iva anurupamarciḥ diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātri rūpa arciḥ śamane upaśāntānām prasannānām diśām darśanāt  avāntara diśaḥ visphuliṅgāḥ kṣudratva sāmyāt tasmin  agnau śraddhā soma pariṇāma krameṇa āgatā apaḥ  vṛṣṭi rūpeṇa pariṇatā devāḥ  juhvati tasyāḥ  āhuteḥ annam vrīhi yava ādi bhavati puruṣaḥ  vāva gautama agniḥ tasya vāc eva samidh  vācā khalu ayam tālu ādi aṣṭa sthāna sthitayā varṇa pada vākya abhivyakti krameṇa artha jātam prakāśayan samidhyate prāṇaḥ  dhūmaḥ dhūmavat mukhāt nirgamanāt jihvā arciḥ lohitatva sāmyāt  cakṣuḥ aṅgārāḥ prabhā āśrayatvāt  śrotram visphuliṅgāḥ viprakīrṇa tvāt  tā eva apaḥ śraddhā ādi pariṇāma krameṇa āgatāḥ vrīhi ādi rūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe agnau hutāḥ tāsām pariṇāmaḥ  retaḥ saṃbhavati yoṣā vāva gautama agniḥ tasyāḥ  upastha eva samidh  tena hi sā putra ādi utpādanāya samidhyate yad upamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ strī saṃbhavāt upamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yoniḥ arciḥ lohita tvāt  yad antar  karoti maithunam te aṅgārāḥ abhinandāḥ sukha lavā visphuliṅgāḥ kṣudra tvāt  tasmin  etasmin  agnau devāḥ  retaḥ  juhvati tasyāḥ  āhuteḥ garbhaḥ saṃbhavati evam śraddhā soma varṣa anna retaḥ hava krameṇa yoṣa agnim prāpya apaḥ  garbha ākhyā bhavanti tatra apsamavāyi tvādāpaḥ puruṣa vacasaḥ  bhavanti pañcamyām āhutau  iti yatas  pañcamyām āhutāvāpaḥ puruṣa vacasaḥ  bhavanti tasmāt adbhiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ  jīvaḥ  rahati iti gamyate etad uktam bhavati śraddhā śabda vācyā āpa iti agre vakṣyati tāsām trivṛt kata tayā tejaḥ  anna avinābhāvena ābgrahaṇena teja unnayoḥ api saṃgraha iti etad api vakṣyate yadi api etāvatā api bhūta veṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇam na avagamyate tejaḥ bannānām pañcamyām āhutau puruṣa vacaḥ tu amātra śravaṇāt  tathā api iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām dhūma ādinā pitṛyāṇena pathā candra loka prāpti kathana parayā aākāśāt candramasam eṣa somaḥ  rāṭ iti śrutyā saha aśraddhām juhvati tasyāḥ  āhuteḥ somaḥ  rājā saṃbhavati iti asyāḥ śruteḥ māna tvāt gamyate bhūta pariṣvaktaḥ  raṃhati iti tathā hi yā eva apaḥ  hutā dvitīyasya ām āhutau soma bhāvam gatāḥ tābhiḥ eṣa pariṣvaktaḥ  jīva iṣṭa ādi kārī candra bhūyam gataḥ candra lokam prāpta iti nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhā ādi krameṇa soma bhāvam āpnuvantu tābhiḥ apariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sa indriya mātraḥ  gatvā soma bhāvam anubhavatu kaḥ  doṣaḥ ayam doṣaḥ yatas  śruti sāmānya atikrama iti evam hi śruti sāmānyam kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇa apām soma bhāvaḥ tena eva jīvasya api soma bhāvaḥ  bhavet  anyathā tu na śruti sāmānyam syāt  tasmāt pariṣvaktā pariṣvakta raṃhaṇa viśaye śruti sāmānya anurodhena pariṣvakta raṃhaṇam niścīyate atas  dadhi payaḥ prabhṛtayaḥ drava bhūyaḥ tvādāpaḥ  hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭa ādi kāriṇam āśritā na undhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutim api iṣṭa ādi kāriṇam pariveṣṭya svargam lokam nayanti iti codayati nanu anyā śrutiḥ iti ayam arthaḥ evam hi sūkṣma deha pariṣvaktaḥ  raṃhet  yad i asya sthūlam śarīram raṃhataḥ  na bhavet  asti tu asya vartamāna sthūla śarīra yoga ādeha antara prāpteḥ tṛṇa jala āyukā nidarśanena tasmāt nidarśana śruti virodhān na sūkṣma deha pariṣvaktaḥ  raṃhati iti pariharati tatra api iti na tāvat paramātmanaḥ saṃsaraṇa saṃbhavaḥ tasya nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāva tvāt kintu jīvānām paramātmā eva ca upādhi kalpita avacchedaḥ  jīva iti ākhyāyate tasya ca deha indriya ādeḥ upādheḥ pradeśika tvāt na tatra san deha antaram gantum arhati tasmāt sūkṣma deha pariṣvaktaḥ  raṃhati karma upasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyaḥ  yaḥ  dehaḥ tad viṣayāyā bhāvanāyāḥ  utpādanāyā dīrghībhāva mātram jalūkayā upamīyate sāṃkhyānām kalpanām āha vyāpinām karaṇānām iti āhaṅkārika tvāt karaṇānām ahaṅkārasya ca jagat maṇḍala vyāpi tvāt karaṇānām api vyāpitā iti arthaḥ bauddhānām kalpanām āha kevalasya eva ātmana iti ālayavijñāna saṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaḍ  pravṛtti vijñānāni paśca indriyāṇi tu cakṣuḥ ādīni abhinavāni jāyante kaṇa bhuj klpanām āha mana eva ca iti bhoga sthānam bhoga āyatanam śarīram abhinavam iti yāvat  digambara kalpanām āha jīva eva utplutya iti ādi grahaṇena lokāyatikānām kalpanām saṃgṛhṇāti te hi śarīra ātma vādinaḥ  bhasmībhāvam ātmana āhuḥ na kasyacid gamanam iti codayati nanu udāhṛtābhyām iti atra sūtreṇa uttaram āha tri ātmaka tvāt tu bhūyas tvāt tejasaḥ kāryam aśita pīta āhāra paripākaḥ apām sneha sveda ādi pṛthivyāḥ kāryam gandha ādi yaḥ tu gandha sveda pāka prāṇa avakāśa dāna darśanāt dehasya pāñcabhautika tvam paśyan  tejaḥ banna ātmaka tvena tri ātmaka tve na parituṣyati tam pratyāha punar ca tri ātmaka iti vāta pitta śleṣmabhiḥ tribhiḥ dhātubhiḥ śarīra dhāraṇa ātmakaiḥ tri dhātu tvāt  atas  na sa dehaḥ  bhūta antarāṇi
