pratyākhyāya kevalābhiḥ adbhiḥ ārabdhum śakyate ap grahaṇa niyamaḥ tarhi kasmāt ityata āha tasmāt bhūyaḥtva apekṣa iti pṛthivī dhātu varjam itara teja ādi apekṣayā kāryasya śarīrasya lohita ādi drava bhūyaḥ tvāt tad karaṇayoḥ ca upādāna nimittayoḥ drava bhūyaḥ tvāt apām puruṣa vacaḥ tvā uktiḥ na punarbhūta antara nirāsa arthā prāṇa gateḥ ca prāṇānām jīvat dehe sa āśraya tvam avagatam gacchati jīvat dehe tad anuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchanti iti dṛṣṭam atas  ṣāṣ kauśikā dehāt utkrāmantaḥ kasmiṃścid utkrāmati utkrāmanti sa ca eṣām anuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ  dehaḥ  bhūta indriya maya iti gamyate nahi indriya mātra āśraya tvam eṣām dṛṣṭam yatas tanmātra āśrayāṇām gatiḥ upapadyeta iti agni ādi gati śruteḥ iti ced na bhākta tvāt  śrāvite api spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane agni ādi gati śaṅkā śruti virodha utthāpana arthā atra hi loma keśayoḥ oṣadhi vanaspati gamanam dṛṣṭa virodhāt bhāktam tāvat abhyupeyam evam ca tad madhya patita tvena teṣām api śruti virodhāt bhākta tvam eva ucitam iti bhaktiḥ ca upakāra nivṛttiḥ uktā prathame aśravaṇāt iti ced na tā eva hi upapatteḥ pañcamyām āhutauvapām puruṣa vacaḥ tu aprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyām āhutau anapām śraddhāyā hetavyata abhidhāna saṃbhavat dham anupapannam ca na hi yathā paśu ādibhyaḥ  hṛdayāt ayaḥ  avayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante evam śraddhā buddhi prasāda lakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭum vā hotum vā śakyate na ca api evam autsargikī kāraṇa anurūpa tā kāryasya yujyate tasmāt bhaktyā ayam apsu śraddhā śabdaḥ prayukta iti ata eva śrutiḥ aāpaḥ  hātmai iti aśruta tvāt iti ced na iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām pratīteḥ asya arthaḥ pūrvam eva uktaḥ agnihotre ṣaṭsu utkrānti gati pratiṣṭhā tṛpti punarāvṛtti loka pratyutthāyiṣu agni samiddhūma arciḥ aṅgāra visphuliṅgeṣu praśnāḥ ṣaḍ  teṣām yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇām sā ṣaṭpraśnī tasyāḥ  nirūpaṇam prativacanam sūtra antaram avatārayitum śaṅkate katham punar iti somam rājānam āpyāyasva apakṣīyasva iti evam enān  tatra bhakṣayanti iti kriyā samabhihāreṇa āpyāyana apakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti soma mayān  lokān iti arthaḥ ata uttaram paṭhati bhāktam vānātma visttvāt tathā hi darśayati karma janita phala upabhoga kartā hi adhikārī na punar upabhogyaḥ tasmāt candra sālokyam upagatānām deva ādi bhikṣya tve asvarga kāmaḥ  yajeta iti yāga bhāvanāyaḥ kartṛ apa īkṣita upāya tā rūpa vidhi śruti virodhāt anna śabdaḥ  bhoktṛṇām eva satām deva upājīvitā mātreṇa bhāktaḥ  gamayitavyaḥ  na tu carvaṇa nigaraṇābhyām mukhya  iti atra eva arthe śruti antaram saṃgacchata iti āha tathā hi darśayati śrutiḥ anātma vigāmana ātma vid tvāt eva paśuvat deva upabhogya tām na tu carvaṇīyatayā yathā hi balīvardādayaḥ  bhuñjanā api sva phalam svāminaḥ  hala ādi vahanena upakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ evam parama tattvam avidvāṃsa iṣṭa ādi kāriṇa iha dadhi payaḥ puroṭa āśa ādinā amuṣmin  ca loke paricāraka tayā devānām upabhogyā iti śruti arthaḥ athavā anātma vid tvāt tathā hi darśayati iti asya anyā vyākhyā ātma vid  pañca agni vidyā vid  na ātma vid  anātma vid  yaḥ  hi pañca agni vidyām na vedam tam devāḥ  bhakṣayanti iti nindyate pañca agni vidyām stotum tasyāḥ  eva prakṛta tvāt  tad anena upacārasya projanam uktam upacāra nimittam anupapattim āha tathā hi darśayati śrutiḥ bhoktṛ tvam sa soma loke vibhūtim anubhūya iti śeṣam ati rohita artham kṛta atyaye anuśayavān iṣṭa smṛtibhyām yathetam anevam ca yāvat saṃpātam uṣi tvā iti yāvat upabandhāt  yad kiñca iha karoti am iti ca yad kiñca iha karma kutam tasya antam prāpya iti śravaṇāt  prāyaṇasya ca eka praghaṭṭakena sakala karma abhivyañjaka tvāt na khalu abhivyakti nimittasya sādhāraṇye abhivyakti niyamaḥ  yuktaḥ phala dāna abhimukhīkaraṇam ca abhivyaktiḥ tasmāt samastam eva karma phalam upabhojitavat  sva phala virodhi ca karma tasmāt śuteḥ upapatteḥ cam niranuśayānām eva caraṇāt ācārāt avarohaḥ  na karmaṇaḥ ācāra karmaṇī ca śruteḥ prasiddha bhede yathākārī yathā ācārī tathā bhavati iti tathā ca ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇā iti ācāram eva yoni nimittam upadiśati na tu karma stām vā karma śīle dve api aviśeṣeṇa anuśayaḥ tathā api yadi api ayam iṣṭāpūrta kārī svayam niranuśaye bhukta bhoga tvāt tathā api pitṛ ādi gata anuśaya vaśāt tad vipākān jāti āyuḥ bhogan  candra lokāt avaruhya anubhaviṣyati smaryate hi anyasya sukṛta duṣkṛtābhyām anyasya tad saṃbandhinaḥ tad phala bhāgitā apatati ardha śarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surām pibet ityādi tathā śrāddha vaiśvān arīya iṣṭi ādeḥ pitāputra ādi gami phala śrutiḥ tasmāt yāvat saṃpātam iti upakrama anurodhāt ayat  kiñca iha karoti iti ca śruti antara anusārāt ramaṇīya caraṇa tvam saṃbandhi antara gatam iṣṭāpūrta kāriṇi bhāktam gamayitavyam tathā ca niranuśayānām eva bhukta bhogānām avaroha iti prāpta ucyate yena karma kalāpena phalam upabhojitam tasmin  atīte api sa anuśayā eva candra maṇḍalāt avarohanti kutas  dṛṣṭa smṛtibhyām pratyakṣa dṛṣṭā śrutiḥ dṛṣṭa śabda vācyā smṛtiḥ ca upanyastā athavā dṛṣṭa śabdena uccāvaca rūpaḥ  bhoga ucyate ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ kapūya caraṇā ramaṇīya caraṇā iti avarohitām etad viśeṣaṇam na ca sati mukhya artha saṃbhave saṃbandhi mātreṇa upacarita artha tvam nyāṭyam na ca upakrama virodhāt śuti antara virodhāt ca mukhya artha saṃbhava iti sāṃpratam datta phala iṣṭāpūrta karma apekṣayā api yāvat padasya yad kiñca itipadasya ca upapatteḥ na hi ayāvat jīvam agni hotram juhuyāt iti yāvat jīva mahāra vihāra ādi samaye api homam vidhatte na api madhyāhna ādau  api tu sāyaṃprātar kāla apekṣayā sāyaṃprātar kāla vidhāna sāmarthyāt  kālasya ca anupādeya tayā anaṅgasya api nimitta anupraveśāt tatra evam iti ced  na iha api ramaṇīya caraṇā iti ādeḥ mukhyā arthatva anurodhāt tad upapatteḥ tad kim idānīm upasaṃhāra anurodhena upakramaḥ saṃkocayitavyaḥ na iti ucyate na hi asau  upasaṃhāra anurodhe api asaṃkuca dvṛttiḥ upapattum arhati na hi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatām vā puṃsām saṃpātāḥ te sarve tatra iṣṭa ādi kāriṇā bhogena kṣayam nīyante puruṣa antara āśrayāṇām karma āśayānām tad bhogena kṣaye ati prasaṅgāt  cira upabhuktānām ca karma āśayānām asatām candra maṇḍala upabhogena apanayanāt  tathā ca svayam saṃkucantī yāvat śutiḥ upasaṃhāra anurodha prāptam api saṃkocanam anumanyate etena ayat kiñca iha karoti iti api vyākhyātam api ceṣṭāpūrtakārī iha janmani kevalam na tanmātram akārṣīt api tu gaḥ dohanena apaḥ praṇayan paśu phalam api apūrvam sama caiṣīt  evam ahar niśam ca vāc manaḥ śarīra ceṣṭābhiḥ puṇya apuṇyam iha amutra upabhogyam saṃcitavataḥ  na martya loka ādi bhogyam candra loke bhagyam bhavitum arhati na ca sva phala virodhinaḥ  anuśayasya ṛte prayāḥ cittāt ātma jñānāt vādatta phalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati tasmāt tena anuśayena ayam anuśayavān parāvartata iti śliṣṭam na ca eka bhavikaḥ karma āśaya iti agre bhāṣya kṛt vakṣyati anye tu sakala karma kṣaye parāvṛtti śaṅkā nirbīja iti manyamānā anyathā adhikaraṇam varṇayāñcakruḥ iti āha kecid tāvat āhuti anuśayaḥ  atra datta phalasya karmaṇaḥ śeṣa ucyate tatra idam iha vicāryate kim datta phalānām iṣṭāpūrta karmaṇām avaśeṣāt iha āvartante uta tāni upabhogena nirāvaśeṣam kṣapayitvā anupabhukta karmaśāt iha āvartanta iti tatra iṣṭa ādīnām bhogena sa mūla kāṣam kaṣita tvāt niranuśayā eva anupabhukta karma vaśāt āvartanta iti prāpta ucyate sa anuśayā eva āvartanta iti kutas  dṛṣṭa anusārāt yathā bhāṇḍa sthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite api bhāṇḍa lepakam tad śeṣam madhu vā sarpiḥ vā na kṣālayitum śakyam iti dṛṣṭam evam tad anusārāt etad api pratipattavyam na ca avaśeṣa mātrāt candra maṇḍale tiṣṭha āsan  api sthātum pārayati yathā sevakaḥ  hāstikāśvīya padāti vrāta parivṛtaḥ  mahā rājam sevamānaḥ kāla vaśāt śatra pādukā avaśeṣaḥ  na sevitum arhati iti dṛṣṭam tad mūlā ca laukikī smṛtiḥ iti dṛṣṭa smṛtibhyām sa anuśayā eva āvartanta iti tad edat dūṣayati na ca etad iti eva kāre prayoktavye iva kāraḥ  guḍa jihvikayā prayuktaḥ śabda eka gamyer athe na sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anumāna avasara iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham pūrva pakṣa hetum anubhāṣate yad api uktam prāyaṇam iti dūṣayati tad api anuśaya sadbhāva iti ramaṇīya caraṇā kapūya caraṇā iti ādikayā anuśaya pratipādana parayā śrutyā viruddham iti arthaḥ apicā ityādi iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukha duḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete yugapad ced eka praghaṭṭakena prāyaṇena sukha duḥkha phalāni karmāṇi vyajyeran yugapad eva tad phalāni bhujyeran tasmāt upabhoga paryāya darśanāt balīyasā durbalasya abhibhavaḥ kalpanīyaḥ evam viruddha jāti nimitta upabhoga phaleṣu api karmasu draṣṭavyam na ca abhivyaktam ca karma phalam na datta iti ca saṃbhavati phala upajana abhimukhyam hi karmaṇām abhivyaktiḥ apica prāṇasya abhivyañjaka tve svarga rakata tiryagyoni gatānām jantūnām tasmin janmani karmasu anadhikārāt na apūrva karma upajanaḥ pūrva kṛtasya kramāśyasya prāyaṇa abhivyakta tayā phala upabhogena prakṣayāt na asti teṣām karma āśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ na ca mucyeranna ātma jñāna abhāvāt iti kaṣṭām bata aliṣṭā daśām kiñca sva samavetam eva prāyam ena abhivyajyate apūrvam na para samavetam yena pitṛ ādi gatena karmaṇā varteḥ an  iti śeṣam sugamam caraṇāt iti ced na upalakṣaṇa artha iti kārṣṇa ajiniḥ anena niranuśayā eva avarohanti iti pūrva pakṣa bījam nigūḍham uddhāṭya nirasyati yadi api aakrodhaḥ sarva bhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā anugrahaḥ ca jñānam ca śīlam etāt viduḥ budhāḥ iti smṛteḥ śīlam ācāraḥ  anuśayāt bhinnaḥ tathā api ānuśaya aṅga tayā anuśaya upalakṣaṇa tvam kārṣṇa ajiniḥ ācāryaḥ  mene tathā ca ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇā iti anena anuśaya upalakṣaṇāt siddham sa anuśayānām eva avarohaṇam iti ānarthakyam iti ced na tad apekṣa tvāt  aācāra hīnam na punar anti vedāḥ iti hi smṛtyā veda padena veda artham upalakṣayantyā veda artha anuṣṭhāna śeṣa tvam ācārasya uktam na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanam tena veda artha anuṣṭhāna upakāraka tayā ācārasya na anarthakyam kratu arthasya tad anena samidh ādivat ācārasya kratu artha tvam uktam saṃprati snāna ādivat puruṣa artha tve puruṣa saṃskāra tve api adoṣa  iti āha puruṣa artha tve api ācārasya iti tad evam caraṇa śabdena ācāra vācinā sarvaḥ  anuśayaḥ  lakṣita iti uktam bādariḥ tu mukhya  eva caraṇa śabdaḥ karmaṇi iti āha sukṛta duṣkṛte eva iti tu bādariḥ brahmaṇa parivrāja ka nyā yaḥ  gaḥ balīvarda nyāyaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇām api ca śrutam aye vai ke ca asmāt lokāt prayanti candramasam eva te sarve gacchanti iti kauṣītakinām samāmnānāt  deha ārambhasya ca candra loka gamanam antareṇa anupapatteḥ pañcamyām āhutau  iti āhiti saṃkhyā niyamāt tathā hi dyu soma vṛṣṭi annaretaḥ pariṇāma krameṇa tā eva apaḥ  yoṣit agnau hutāḥ puruṣa vacasaḥ  bhavanti iti aviśeṣeṇa śrutam na ca etad manuṣya abhiprāyam kapūya caraṇāḥ sva yonim iti amanuṣyasya api śravaṇāt  gamana āgamanāya ca deva yāna pitṛyāṇayoḥ eva mārgayoḥ āmnānāt  pathi antarasya aśruteḥ ajāyasva mriyasva iti tṛtīyam sthānam iti ca sthānatva mātreṇa avagamāt pathitvena apratīteḥ candra lokāt avatīrṇānām api ca tad sthānatva saṃbhavāt asaṃpūreṇa prativacana upapatteḥ ananya mārga tayā ca tad bhoga virahiṇām api grāmam gacchan vṛkṣa mūlāni upasarpa ti itivat saṃyamana ādiṣu yama vaśya tāyai candra loka gamana upapatteḥ ana katareṇa vacana iti asya asaṃpūraṇa pratipādana para tayā mārga dvaya niṣedha paratva abhāvāt aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇām api candra loka gamane prāpte abhidhīyate satyam sthāna tayā avagatasya na mārga tvam tathā api vettha yathā asau mārgaḥ  na saṃpūryate iti asya prativacana avasare mārga dvaya niṣedha pūrvam tṛtīyam sthānam abhivadan  asaṃpūraṇāya tad pratipakṣam ācakṣīta yadi punar tena eva mārgeṇa āgatya janma maraṇa prabandhavat  sthānam adhyāsīta na etad tṛtīyam sthānam bhavet  na hi iṣṭa ādi kāriṇaḥ candra maṇḍalāt avaruhya ramaṇīyam ninditām vā yonim pratipadyamānāḥ tṛtīyam sthānam pratipadyante tad kasya hetoḥ pitṛyāṇena pathā avarohāt  tad yadi kṣudrajantavaḥ  api anena eva pathā avaroheyuḥ na etad eṣām janma maraṇa prabandhavat tṛtīyam sthānam bhavet  tatas  avagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanam sapta ca yātanā bhūm īryam avaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇaḥ  na candra maṇḍalāt avarohanti iti tasmāt  aye vai ke ca iti iṣṭa ādi kāri viṣayam na sarva viṣayam pañcamyām āhutau  iti ca sva artha vidhāna param na punar apañcamya āhuti pratiṣedha param api vākya bheda prasaṅgāt  saṃyamane tu anubhūya iti sūtreṇa avaroha apādāna tayā saṃyamanasya upādānāt candra maṇḍala apādāna niṣedha āñjasaḥ tathā ca siddhānta sūtram eva pūrva pakṣa sūtra tve tu śaṅkā antara adhyāhāreṇa kathañcid gamayitavyam jīva jañ jarāyu jam saṃśoka jam saṃsveda jam sābhāvya āpattiḥ upapatteḥ yadi api yathetam ākāśam ākāśāt vāyum iti atas na tādātmyam sphuṭam avagamyate tathā api vāyuḥ bhūtvā ityādeḥ sphuṭataram tādātmya avagamāt yathetam ākāśam iti etad api tādātmya eva avatiṣṭhate na ca anyasya anya bhāva anupapattiḥ manuṣya śarīrasya nandikeśvarasya deva deha rūpa pariṇāma smaraṇāt deva dehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktva smaraṇāt  tasmāt mukhya artha parityāgena na gauṇī vṛttiḥ āśrayaṇīyā gauṇyām ca vṛttau lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ  guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt  yathā āhuḥ alakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ yogāt vṛtteḥ iṣṭā tu gauṇa tā iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ sābhāvya āpattiḥ samānaḥ  bhāvaḥ rūpam yeṣām te sa bhāvāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ sābhāvyam sārūpyam sādṛśyam iti yāvat  kutas  upapatteḥ etad eva vyatireka mukhena vyācaṣṭe na hi anyasya anya bhāvaḥ  mukhya  upapadyate yuktam etad yad deva śarīram ajagara bhāvena pariṇamate deva deha samaye ajagara śarīrasya abhāvāt  yadi tu deva ajaga śarīre sama samaye syātām na deva śarīram ajagara śarīram śilpi śatena api kriyate na hi dadhi payasī sama samaye paraspara ātmanī śakye saṃpādayitum tathā iha api sūkṣma śarīra ākāśayoḥ yugapad bhāvāt na paraspara ātma tvam bhavitum arhati evam vāṭu ādiṣu api yojyam tathā ca tad bhāvaḥ tad sādṛśyena aupacārikaḥ  vyākhyeyaḥ nanu ākāśa bhāvena saṃyoga mātram lakṣyatām kim sādṛśyena iti ata āha vibhu tvāt ca ākāśena iti na aticireṇa viśeṣāt  aduḥ niṣprapataram iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇam brūte na tu vilambena iti manyate pūrva pakṣī vinā sthūla śarīram na sūkṣma śarīre duḥkha bhāgī iti durniṣprapataram vilambam lakṣayati iti rāddha antar  anya adhiṣṭhiteṣu pūrvavat abhilāpāt  ākāśa sārūpyam vāyu dhūma ādi saṃparkaḥ  anuśayina amukta iha idānīm vrīhi yavā oṣa adhivanaspatayaḥ tila māṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate tatra saṃśayaḥ kim anuśayinām bhoga adhiṣṭhānam vrīhi yava ādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti āhosvit  kṣetrajña antara adhiṣṭhiteṣu eṣu saṃsarga mātram anubhavanti iti tatra manuṣyaḥ  jāyate devaḥ  jāyata iti ādau prayoge janeḥ śarīra parigrahe prasiddha tvāt atra api vrīhi ādi śarīra parigraha eva janiḥ mukhyā artha iti vrīhi ādi śarīrā eva anuśayina iti yuktam na ca ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇā itivat  karma viśeṣa asaṃkīrta nāmāt tad abhāve vrīhi ādīnām śarīra bhāva abhāvāt kṣetrajñā anantara adhiṣṭhitānām eva yad saṃparka mātram iti sāṃpratam iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām iṣṭa ādi karma saṃkīrtanāt tad abhāve vrīhi ādīnām śarīra bhāva abhāvāt kṣetrajñā antara adhiṣṭhitānām eva yad saṃparka mātram iti sāṃpratam iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām iṣṭa ādi karma saṃkīrtana ādiṣṭa ādeḥ ca hiṃsā doṣa dūṣita tvena sāvadya phala tayā candra loka bhoga antaram sthāva śarīra bhogya duḥkha phala tvasya api upapatteḥ na ca ana hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti sāmānya śāstrasya agnīṣomīya paśu hiṃsā viṣaya viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhanam sāmānya śāstrasya hiṃsāmānya dvāreṇa viśeṣa upasarpaṇam vilambena iti sākṣāt viśeṣa spṛśaḥ śāstrat śīghratara pravṛttāt durbala tvāt iti sāṃpratam na hi balavat iti eva durbalam bādhate kintu sati virodhe na ca iha asti virodhaḥ bhinna gocara cāri tvāt aagnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhet  iti hi kratu prakaraṇe samāmnātam kratu artha tām asya gamayati na tu apanayati niṣedha apādi tāmasya puruṣam pratyanartha hetu tām tena astu niṣedhāt asya puruṣam pratyanartha hetu tā vidheḥ cha kratu artha tā kaḥ  virodhaḥ yathā āhuḥ ayaḥ  nāma kratu madhya sthaḥ kalañja ādīni bhakṣayet  na kratoḥ tatra vaiguṇyam yathā codita siddhitaḥ iti tasmāt janeḥ mukhyā artha tvāt vrīhi ādi śarīrā anuśayinaḥ  jāyanta iti prāpte abhidhīyate bhavet etad evam yadi ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇā itivat vrīhi ādiṣu anuśayavatām kama viśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na ca etad asti na ceṣṭā ādeḥ karmaṇaḥ sthāva śarīra upabhogya duḥkha phala prasava hetu bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati tasya dharma tvena sukha eka hetu tvāt na ca tad gata eyaiḥ paśu hiṃsāyā ana hiṃsyāt iti niṣedāt kratvarthāya api duḥkha phalavat saṃbhavaḥ puruṣa arthāyāḥ  eva na hiṃsyāt iti pratiṣedhāt  tathā hi na hiṃsyāt iti niṣedhasya niṣedhya adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā yad artham niṣedhyam tad artha eva niṣedhaḥ  vijñāyate na ca etad  anānṛtam vadet ana tau paśau karoti itivat kasyacid prakaraṇe samāmnātam yena anṛta tavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedhaḥ  api kratu arthaḥ syāt  paśau niṣiddhayoḥ ājya bhāgayoḥ kratu artha tvena niṣedhasya api kratu artha tvam bhavet  evam hi satya ājya bhāra garitaiḥ api aṅga antaraiḥ ājya bhāga sādhyaḥ kratu upakāraḥ  vijñāyate tasmāt anārabhya adhītena na hiṃsyāt iti anena abhihitasya vidhi upahitasya puruṣa vyāpārasya vidhi vibhakti virodhāt prakṛti artha hiṃsā karma bhāvyat parityāgena puruṣa artha eva bhāvyaḥ  avatiṣṭhate ākhyāta an abhihitasya api puruṣasya kartṛ vyāpāra abhidhāna dvāreṇa upasthāpita tvāt kevalam tasya rāgataḥ prāpta tvāt tad anuvādena nañartham vidhiḥ upasaṃkrāmati tena puruṣa arthaḥ  niṣedhya iti tad adhīna nirūpaṇaḥ  niṣedhaḥ  api puruṣa arthaḥ  bhavati tathā ca ayam arthaḥ saṃpadyate yad puruṣa artham hananam tad na kuryāt iti kratu arthasya api na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratu upakāraka tvam api kalpyate na ca dṛṣṭe puruṣokāraka tve pratyarthini sati tad kalpana āspadam na ca svātantrya pāratantrye sati saṃyoga pṛthaktve svādi rata ādivat ekatra saṃbhavataḥ tasmāt puruṣa artha pratiṣedhaḥ  na kratu artham api āskandati iti śuddha sukha phala tvam eva iṣṭa ādīnām na sthāva śarīra upabhogya duḥkha phala tvam api iti ākāśa ādiṣu iva karma vyāpāram antareṇa abhilāpāt anuśayinām vrīhi ādi saṃyoga mātram na tu deha tvam iti ayam eva artha utsarga apavāda kathanena upalakṣitaḥ apica mukhye anuśayinām vrīhi ādi janmani iti vrīhi ādi bhāvam āpannāḥ khalu anuśayinaḥ puruṣaiḥ upabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvam anubhavantī śrūyate tad etad vrīhi ādi deha tve anuśayinām na upapadyate vrīhi ādi deha tve hi vrīhi ādiṣu lūneṣu avahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhi ādi deha vināśāt anuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ iti katham anuśayinām retaḥ sigbhāvaḥ saṃsarga mātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhi ādiṣu naṣṭeṣu api na saṃsargiṇaḥ  anuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ iti retaḥ sigbhāva upapadyate śeṣa muktam retaḥ sigyogaḥ  atha sadyas  jātaḥ  hi bālaḥ  na retaḥ sigbhavati api tu cira jātaḥ prauḍha yauvanaḥ tasmāt api saṃsarga mātram iti gamyate tad kim idānīm sarvatra eva anuśayinām saṃsarga mātram tathā ca ramaṇīya caraṇā ityādiṣu tathā abhāva āpadyeta iti na iti āha yoneḥ śarīram sugamam iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīkamīmāṃsā bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām tṛtīyasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ iti tṛtīya adhyāyasya gati āgati cintayā vairāgya nirūpaṇa ākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ tṛtīyā adhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ saṃdhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi idānīm tu tasya eva jīvasya avasthā bhedaḥ svayan jyotiṣṭu asiddhi artha prapañcayate kim prabodha iva svapne api pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiḥ āhosvit māyāmayī iti yadi api brahmaṇaḥ  anyasya anirvācya tayā jāgrat svapna avasthā gatayoḥ ubhayoḥ api sargayoḥ māya maya tvam tathā api yathā jāgrat sṛṣṭiḥ brahma ātma bhāva sākṣātkārāt prāk anuvartate brahma ātma bhāva sākṣāt kārāt tu nivartate evam kim svapna sṛṣṭiḥ āhosvit pratidinam eva nivartata iti vimarśa arthaḥ dvayoḥ ihaloka para loka sthānayoḥ saṃdhau bhavam saṃdhyam aihalaukika cakṣuḥ ādi avyāpārāt rūpa ādi sākṣātkāra upajana nāda naihalaukikam pāralaukika indriya ādi vyāpārasya ca bhaviṣyataḥ  apratyupanna tvena na pāralaukikam na ca na rūpa ādi sākṣāt kāraḥ  asti svapna dṛśaḥ tasmāt ubhayoḥ lokayoḥ asya antarāla tvam iti brahma ātma bhāva sākṣātkārāt prāk tathya rūpā eva sṛṣṭiḥ bhavitum arhati ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ iha hi sarvāṇi eva mithyājñānāni udāharaṇam teṣām satya tvam pratijñāyate prakṛta upayogi tayā tu svapna jñānam udāhṛtam jñānam yam artham avabodhayati sa tathā eva iti yuktam tathā abhāvasya jñāna ārohāt atathātvasya tu apratīyamānasya tathā abhāva prameya virodhena kalpanā āspada tvāt bādhaka pratyayāt atathātvam iti ced  na tasya bādhakatva asiddheḥ samāna gocare hi viruddha artha upasaṃhāriṇī jñāne virudhyate balavat abalavat tvā niścayāt ca bādhya bādhaka bhāvam pratipadyete na ca iha samāna viṣaya tvam kāla bhedena vyavasthā upapatteḥ yathā hi kṣīram dṛṣṭam kāla antare dadhi bhavati evam rajatam dṛṣṭam kāla antare śuktiḥ bhavet  nānā rūpam vā tad vastu yad i asya tīvra ātapa klānti sahitam cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajata rūpa tām gṛhṇāti yasya tu kevalam āloka mātra upakṛtam sa tasya eva śukti rūpa tām gṛhṇāti evam utpalam api nīlalohitam divā saurībhiḥ bhābhiḥ abhivyaktam nīlatayā gṛhyate pradīpa abhivyaktam tu naktam lohita tayā evam asatyām nidrāyām sataḥ  api ratha ādīn na gṛhṇāti nidrāṇaḥ tu gṛhṇāti iti sāmagrī bhedāt vā kāla bhedāt vā virodha abhāvaḥ na api pūrva uttarayoḥ balavat abalavattva nirṇayaḥ dvayoḥ api sva gocara cāri tayā samāna tvena vinigamanā hetoḥ abhāvāt  tasmāt api avaśyam avirodhaḥ  vyavasthāpanīyaḥ tad siddham etad  vivāda āspadam pratyayāḥ samyañcaḥ pratyaya tvāt  jāgrat stambha ādi pratyayavat iti imam artham śrutiḥ api darśayati aatha rathān ratha yogān pathaḥ sṛjate iti na ca ana tatra rathā na ratha yogā na canthānaḥ  bhavanti iti virodhāt upacarita arthām sṛjata iti śrutiḥ vyākhyeyā sṛjata iti hi śruteḥ bahu śruti saṃvādāt pramāṇa antara saṃvādāt ca balīyaḥ tu ena tad anuguṇa tayā na tatra rathā iti asyā bhākta tvena vyākhyānāt  jāgrat avasthā darśana yogyā na santi na tu rathā na santi iti ata eva kartṛ śrutiḥ śākhā antara śrutiḥ udāhṛtā prājña kartṛka tvāt ca asya pāramārthika tvam viyat ādi sargavat  na ca jīvakartṛka tvāt na prājña kartṛka tvam iti sāṃpratam aanyatra dharmāt anyatra adharmāt iti prājñasya eva prakṛta tvāt  jīvakartṛka tve api ca prājñadabhedena jīvasya prājña tvāt  apica jāgrat pratyaya saṃvādavantaḥ  api svapna pratyayāḥ kecid dṛśyante tad yathā svapne śukla ambara dharaḥ śukla mālya anulepanaḥ  brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavratam pratyāha priyavrata pañcame ahani prātar eva urvarā prāya bhūmi dānena narapatiḥ tvām mānayiṣyati iti sa ca jāgrat tathā ātmanaḥ  mānam anubhūya svapna pratyayam satyam abhimanyate tasmāt saṃdhye pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiḥ iti prāpte ucyate māyā mātram tu kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt idam atra kūtam na tāvat  kṣīrasya iva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati na hi jātu īśvara gṛhe cira sthitāni api rajata bhājanāni śukti bhāvam anubhavanti dṛśyante na ca itarasya rajata anubhava samaye anyaḥ  anākula indriyaḥ  na tasya śukti bhāvam anubhavati pratyeti ca na ca ubhaya rūpam vastu sāmagrī bhedāt tu kadācid asya toya bhāvaḥ  anubhūyate kadācid marīcitā iti sāṃpratam pāramārthike hāsya toya bhāve tad sādhyām udānya upaśama lakṣaṇa artha kriyām kuryāt marīci sādhyām api rūpa prakāśa lakṣaṇām na marīcibhiḥ kasyacid tṛṣṇa ja udanyā upaśāmyati na ca toyam eva dvividham udanya upaśamanam atad upaśamanam iti yuktam tad artha kriyā kāritva vyāptam toya tvam mātrayā api tām akurvat toyam eva na syāt  apica toya pratyaya samīcīna tvāya asya dvaividhyam abhyupeyate tad ca abhyupagame api na seddhum arhati tathā hi asamartha vidha apāti toyam etad iti manvānaḥ  na tṛṣṇayā api marīci toyam abhidhāvet  yathā marīcīn anubhavan atha aśaktam abhimanyamānaḥ  abhidhāvati kim aparāddham marīciṣu toya viparyāsena sarva janīnena yattam atilaṅghya viparyāsa antaram kalpyate na ca kṣīra dadhi pratyayavat ācārya mātula brāhmaṇa pratyayavat vā toya marīci vijñāne samuccita avagāhinī sa sva anubhavāt paraspara viruddhayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva avabhāsanāt tatra api rajata jñānam pūrvam utpannam bādhyam uttaram tu bādhakam śukti jñānam prāpti pūrvaka tvāt pratiṣedhasya rajata jñānāt prāc prāpaka abhāvena śukteḥ aprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedha saṃbhavāt pūrva jñāna prāptam tu rajatam śukti jñānam apabadhitum arhati tad apabādha ātmakam ca sva anubhavāt avasīyate yathā āhuḥ aāgāmi tvāt abādhitvā param pūrvam hi jāyate pūrvam punar abādhitvā param na utpadyate kkacit na ca vartamāna rajata avabhāsi jñānam bhaviṣyattām asya agocarayan  bhaviṣyatā sva samaya vartinīm śuktim gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate kāla bhedena virodha abhāvāt iti yuktam mā nāma asya jñāsīt pratyakṣam bhaviṣyat tām tad pṛṣṭha bhāvi tu anumānam upakāra bhāva hetum iva asati vināśa pratyaya upanipāte sthemānam ākalayati asati vināśa pratyaya upanipāte rajatam idam sthiram rajata tvāt anubhūta pratyabhijñāta rajatavat tathā ca rajata gocaram pratyakṣam vastutas  sthiram eva rajatam gocarayet  tathā ca bhaviṣyat śuktikā jñāna kālam rajatam vyāpnuyāt iti virodhāt śukti jñānena bādhyate yathā ahar  arajate gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate bhaviṣyat śuktikā jñāna kālam vyāpnoti tena tad  iti pratyakṣeṇa cira sthāyi iti gṛhyata iti kecid vyācakṣate tad ayuktam yadi cira sthāyi tvam yogya tā na sā pratyakṣa gocaraḥ śakteḥ atīndriya tvāt  atha kāla antara vyāpi tvam tad api ayuktam kāla antareṇa bhaviṣyata indriyasya saṃyoga ayogāt tad upahita sīmnaḥ  vyāpi tvasya atīndriya tvāt na ca pratyabhijñā pratyayavat atra asti saṃskāraḥ yena āvartamānam api ākalayet  tasmāt atyanta abhyāsa vaśena pratyakṣa anantaram śīgratara utpanna vinaśyat avasthā anumāna sahita pratyakṣa abhiprāyemeva cira sthāyi iti gṛhyata iti mantavyam ata eva etad sūkṣmataram kāla vyavadhānam avivecayantaḥ saugatāḥ prāhuḥ dvividhaḥ  hi viṣayaḥ pratyakṣasya grāhyaḥ ca adhyavaseyaḥ ca grāhya kṣaṇa ekaḥ sva lakṣaṇaḥ  adhyavaseyaḥ ca grāhya kṣaṇa ekaḥ slakṣaṇaḥ  adhyavaseyaḥ ca saṃtāna iti etena svapna pratyayaḥ mithyātvena vyākhyātaḥ yad tu satyam svapna darśana muktam tatra api ākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanena ākhyāte saṃvāda abhāvāt  priyavratasya ākhyāta saṃvādaḥ tu kākatālīyaḥ  na svapna jñānam pramāṇayitum arhati tādṛśasya eva bahulam visaṃvāda darśa darśitaḥ ca visaṃvādaḥ  bhāṣya kṛtā kātsnryena anabhivyaktim vivṛṇvatā rajanyām supta iti rajanī samaye api hi bhāratāt varṣa antare ketu māla ādau vāsaraḥ  bhavati iti bhārate varṣa iti uktam sūcakaḥ ca hi śruteḥ ācakṣate ca tad vidaḥ darśanam sūcakam tad ca sva rūpeṇa sat  asat tu dṛśyam ata eva strī darśana svarūpa sādhyāḥ carama dhātu visarga ādayaḥ  jāgrat avasthāyām anuvartante strī sādhyāḥ tu mālya vilepana danta kṣatāt ayaḥ  na anuvartante na ca asmābhiḥ svapne api prājña vyāpāra iti prājña vyāpāra tvena pāramārthikatva anumānam pratyakṣeṇa bādhaka pratyayena virudhyamānam na ātmānam labhata iti bhāvaḥ bandha mokṣayoḥ āntarālikam tṛtīyam aiśvaryam iti parāmi dhyānāt tu tirohitam tatas  hi asya bandha viparyayau deha yogāt vā saḥ  api iti sūtra dvayam kṛta upapādanam asmābhiḥ prathama sūtre nigada vyākhyātam ca etayoḥ bhāṣyam iti tad abhāvaḥ  nāḍīṣu tad śuteḥ ātmani ca iha hi nāḍī puri tad paramātmānaḥ  jīvasya suṣupta avasthāyām sthāna tvena śrūyante tatra kim eṣām sthānānām vikalpa āhosvit samuccayaḥ kim atas  yadi evam etad atas  bhavati yadā nāḍyaḥ  vā purīta dvā suṣupta sthānam tadā viparīta grahaṇa nivṛttau  api na jīvasya paramātma bhāva iti avidyā nivṛttau  api jīvasya paramātma bhāvāya kāraṇa antaram apekṣitavyam tad ca karma eva na tu tad ta jñānam viparīta jñāna nivṛtti mātreṇa tasya upayogāt viparīta jñāna nivṛtteḥ ca vinā api tattva jñānam suṣuptau  api saṃbhavāt  tatas ca karmaṇā eva apavargaḥ  na jñānena yathā āhuḥ akarmaṇā eva tu saṃsiddhim āsthitā janaka ādayaḥ iti ata tu paramātmā eva nāḍī purīta smṛti dvārā suṣupti sthānam tatas  viparīta jñāna nivṛtteḥ asti mātrayā paramātma bhāva upayogaḥ tayā hi tāvat eṣa jīvaḥ tad avasthānaḥ  bhavati kevalam tattva jñāna abhāvena sa mūla kāṣam avidyāyāḥ  akāṣāt jāgrat svapna lakṣaṇam jīvasya vyutthānam bhavati tasmāt prayojanavati eṣā vicāraṇa iti kim tau  aprāptam nāḍīpurī tad paramātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayam prati vikalpaḥ yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣu ekaḥ  narendraḥ kadācid k kacid nilīyate kadācid k kacid evam ekaḥ  jīvaḥ kadācid nāḍīṣu kadācid purītati kadācid brahmaṇi iti yathā nirapekṣā vrīhi yavāḥ kratu sādhanībhūta puroḍāśa prakṛti tayā śrutā eka arthā vikalpyante evam saptamī śrutyā vā āyatana śrutyā veka nilayana arthāḥ paraspara anapekṣā nāḍī adayaḥ  api vikalpam arhanti yatra api nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍība hmaṇoḥ ādhārayoḥ samuccaya śravaṇam prāṇa śabdam ca brahma aatha asmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati nnirapekṣayoḥ avedhāra tvam iyān  tu viśeṣaḥ kadācid nāḍya eva ādhāraḥ kadācid nāḍībhiḥ saṃcaramāṇasya purīta deva evam tābhiḥ eva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācid brahmā eva ādhāra iti siddham ādhāra tve nāḍīpurī tad paramātmanām anapekṣa tvam tathā ca vikalpaḥ  vrīhi yavavat bṛhat rathantaravat vā iti prāptam prāpte abhidhīyate jīvaḥ samuccayena eva etāni nāḍī ādīni svāpāya upaiti na vikalpena ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ nityavat āmnātānām yad pākṣika tvam nāma tad gati antara abhāve kalpyate yathā āhuḥ aevam eṣaḥ  aṣṭa doṣaḥ  api yad vrīhi yava vākyayoḥ vikalpa āśritaḥ tatra gatiḥ anyā na vidyate iti prakṛta kratu sādhanībhūta puroḍāśa dravya prakṛti tayā hi paraspara anapekṣau vrīhi yavau vihita auśakrutaḥ ca etau pratyekam puroḍāśam abhinirvartayitum tatra yadi miśrābhyām puroḍāśaḥ  abhinirvartyeta paraspara anapekṣa vrīhi yava vidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām na ca etau prayoga vacanaḥ samuccatum arhati sa hi yathā vihitāni aṅgāni abhisamīkṣya pravartamānaḥ  na etāni anyathayitam śakroti miśraṇe ca anyathātvam eteṣām na ca aṅga anurodhena pradhāna abhyāsaḥ  agosave ubhe kuryāt itivat yuktaḥ aśrutaḥ  hi atra pradhāna abhyāsaḥ  aṅga anurodhena ca saḥ  anyāyyaḥ na ca aṅga bhūtā aindravāyava ādi graha anurodhena yathā pradhānasya soma yāgasya āvṛttiḥ evam atra api iti yuktam asomena yajeta iti hi tatra apūrva yāga vidhiḥ tatra ca daśamuṣṭi parimitasya soma dravyasya asomam abhiṣuṇoti asomam abhiplāvayati iti ca vākya antara anulocanayā rasa dvāreṇa yāga sādhanībhūtasya indra vāyu ādi uddeśena prādeśa mātreṣu ūrdhva pātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthak prakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante na tu soma yāga uddeśena indra vāyu ādayaḥ  devatāḥ ca udyante yena tāsām yāga niṣpatti lakṣaṇa eka artha tvena vikalpaḥ syāt  na ca prādeśa mātram ekaikam ūrdhva pātram daśa muṣṭi parimita soma rasa grahaṇāya kalpate yena tulya ārta tayā grahaṇāni vikalperan na ca yāvat mātram ekam ūrdhva pātram vyāpnoti tāvat mātram gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭam tyajyeta iti yujyate daśa muṣṭi parimita upādānasya adṛṣṭa arthatva prasaṅgāt  evam tad dṛṣṭa artham bhavet yadi tad sarvam yāga upayujyeta na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā nyāyyā tasmāt sakalasya soma rasasya yāga śeṣa tvena saṃskāra arha tvāt ekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya saṃskartṛm aśakya tvāt tad avayavasya ekena saṃskāre avayava antarasya grahaṇa antareṇa saṃskāra iti kārya bhedāt grahaṇāni samuccīyeran ata eva samuccaya darśanam adaśautān adhvaryuḥ prātar  savane grahan gṛhṇāti iti samuccaye ca sati kramaḥ  api upapadyate aāśvinaḥ  daśamaḥ  gṛhyate tṛtīyaḥ  hūyate tathā eva aaindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇāti iti teṣām ca samuccaye sati yāvat yad uddeśena gṛhītam tāvat tasyai devatāyai tyaktavyam iti arthāt yāgasya āvṛttyā bhavativyam yadi punar  pṛthakkṛtāni api ekīkṛtya kāñcana devatām uddiśya tyajeran pṛthakkaraṇāni ca devatā uddeśāḥ ca adṛṣṭa arthā bhaveyuḥ na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā nyāyyā iti uktam tasmāt tatra samuccayasya avaśyaṃbhāvityāt guṇa anurodhena api pradhāna abhyāsa āsthīyate iha tu abhyāsa kalpanā pramāṇa abhāvāt puroḍāśa dravyasya ca aniyamena prakṛti dravye yasmin kasmiṃścid prāpte ekaikā paraspara anapekṣā vrīhi śrutiḥ yava śrutiḥ ca niyāmikā eka ārta tayā vikalpam arhataḥ na tu nāḍīpurī tad paramātmanām anyonya anapekṣaṇām eka nilayana artha saṃbhavaḥ  yena vikalpaḥ  bhavet  na hi eka vibhakti nirdeśa mātreṇa eka artha tā bhavati samuccitānām api eka vibhakti nirdeśa darśanāt paryaṅke śete prasāde śeta iti tasmāt eka vibhakti nirdeśasya anaikāntika tvāt anyatas  vinigamanā vaktavyā sā ca uktā bhāṣya kṛtā yatra api nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ supti sthāna tvena śrāvayati ityādinā sa apekṣa śruti anurodhena nirapekṣa śrutiḥ netavyā iti arthaḥ śeṣam ati rohita artham nanu yadi brahmā eva nilayana sthānam tāvat mātram ucyatām kṛtam nāḍī upanyāsena iti ata āha api cātra iti apicā iti samuccaye na vikalpe etad upapatti sahitā pūrva upapattiḥ artha sādhini iti mārga upadeśa upayuktānām nāḍīnām stuti artham atra nāḍī saṃkīrtanam iti arthaḥ pittena abhivyāpta karaṇaḥ  na bāhyān viṣayān veda iti tad dvārā sukha duḥkha abhāvena tad kāraṇa pāṣma asparśena nāḍī stutiḥ yadā tu tejaḥ  brahma tadā sugamam apica nāḍyaḥ purīta dvā jīvasya upādhyādhāra eva bhavati iti ayam arthaḥ abhyupetya jīvasya ādheya tvam idam uktam paramārthataḥ tu na jīvasya ādheya tvam asti tathā hi nāḍyaḥ purīta dvā jīvasya upādhīnām karaṇānām āśrayaḥ  jīvaḥ tu brāhma avyatirekāt sva mahi pratiṣṭhaḥ na ca api brahma jīvasya ādhāraḥ tādātmyāt  vikalpa tu vyatirekam brahmaṇa ādhāra tvam ucyate jīvam prati tathā ca suṣupta avasthāyām upādhīnām asamudācārāt jīvasya brahma ātma tvam eva brahma ādhāra tvam na tu nāḍī purīta ādhāra tvam tad upādhi karaṇa mātra ādhāra tayā tu suṣupta daśa ārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurī tad ādhāra tvam iti atulya artha tayā na vikalpa iti apica na kadācid jīvasya iti autsagikam brahma svarūpa tvam jīvasya asati jāgrat svapna daśā rūpe apavāde suṣupta vasthāyām na anyathayitum śakyam iti arthaḥ apica ye api sthāna vikalpam āsthiṣa cata taiḥ api viśeṣa vijñāna upaśama lakṣaṇā suṣupti avasthā aṅgīkartavyā na ca iyam ātma tādātmyam vinā nāḍī ādiṣu parama ātma vyatirikteṣu sthāneṣu upapadyate tatra hi sthitaḥ  ayam jīva ātma vyatireka abhimānī san  avaśyam viśeṣa jñānavān bhavet  tathā hi śrutiḥ ayatra vā anyat iva syāt tatra anye anyat paśyet iti ātma sthāna tve tvad oḥ ayatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhū tad kena kam paśyet vijānīyāt iti śruteḥ tasmāt api ātma sthāna vasya dvāram nāḍī ādi iti āha apica sthāna vikalpa abhyupagame api iti atra codayati nanu bheda viṣayasya api iti bhidyata iti bhedaḥ bhidyamānasya api viṣayasya iti arthaḥ pariharati bāḍham evam syāt iti na tāvat jīvasya asti svatas paricchedaḥ tasya brahma ātma tvena vibhu tvāt  aupādhike tu paricchede yatra upādhi saṃnihitaḥ tanmātram na jānīyāt na tu sarvam na hi asaṃnidhānāt sumerum avidvān devadattaḥ saṃnihitam api na veda tasmāt sarva viśeṣa vijñāna pratyasta mayīm suṣuptim na sama pradhānata yāganyedivat iti vadan vikalpam api apākaroti na ca vayam iha iti svādhyāya adhyayana vidhyā pāditu puruṣa artha tvasya veda rāśeḥ ekena api varṇena na apuruṣa arthena bhavitum yuktam na ca suṣupta avasthāyām jīvasya sva rūpeṇa nāḍī ādi sthānatva pratipādena kiñcid prayojanam brahma bhūya pratipādena tu asti tasmāt na sama pradhāna bhāvena samuccayaḥ  na api vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ nīta artham anyat  sa eva tu karma anusmṛti śabda vidhibhyaḥ yadi api īśvara ādi bhinnaḥ jīvaḥ tathā api upādhi avacchedena bhedam vivakṣitvā adhikaraṇa antara ārambhaḥ sa eva iti duḥsaṃpādam iti sa vā anyaḥ  vā iti īśvaraḥ  vā iti saṃbhava mātreṇa upanyāsaḥ na hi tasya śuddha mukta svabhāvasya avidyā kṛta vyutthāna saṃbhavaḥ ata eva vimarśa avasare asya anupanyāsaḥ yad vi dvi aha ādi nirvartanīyam ekasya puṃsaḥ ca uditam karma tasya pūrvedyus anuṣṭhitasya asti smṛtiḥ iti vakyavye anuḥ pratyabhijñāna sūcana arthaḥ ata eva saḥ  aham asmi iti uktam punar  pratinyāyam pratiyonyādravati iti ayanam āyaḥ niyamena gamanam nyāyaḥ jīvaḥ pratinyāyam saṃprasāde suṣupta avasthāyām buddha antāyāt ravati āgacchati pratiyoni yohi vyāghra yoniḥ suṣuptaḥ  buddha antam āgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jāti antaram tad idam uktam na iha vyāghraḥ  vā siṃhaḥ  vā iti atha tatra supta utiṣṭhet iti yaḥ  hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīra antaram uttiṣṭhati śarīra antara gataḥ tu supta jīva saṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati tatas ca na śarīra antare vyavahāra lopa iti arthaḥ apica na jīvaḥ  nāma kaścid parasmāt anya iti yathā ghacākāśaḥ  nāma na parama ākāśāt anyaḥ atha ca anya iva yāvat haṭam anuvartate na ca asau durvivecaḥ tad upādheḥ ghacaṭasya vivikta tvāt  evam anādya nirvacanīya avidyā upadhāna bheda upādhi kalpitaḥ  jīvaḥ  na vastutas  paramātmanaḥ  bhidyate tad upādi ut bhava abhibhavābhyām ca udbhūta iva abhibhūta iva pratīyate tatas ca suṣupta ādau  api abhibhūta iva jāgrat avastha ādiṣudbhūta iva tasya ca avidyā tad vāsana upādheḥ anāditayā kārya kāraṇa bhāvena pravahataḥ su viveca tayā tad upahitaḥ  jīvaḥ su viveca iti sugdher adhasaṃpattiḥ pariśeṣāt  viśeṣa vijñāna abhāvāt mūrcchā jāgara svapna avasthābhyām bhidyate punar utthānāt ca maraṇa avasthāyāḥ atas  suṣuptiḥ eva mūrcchā viśeṣa jñāna abhāva aviśeṣāt cira anucchvāsa vepathu prabhṛtayaḥ tu supteḥ avāntara prabhedāḥ tad yathā kaścid supta utthitaḥ prāha sukham aham asva apsam laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannam me mana iti kaścid punar duḥkha sama svāpsam gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramati anavasthitam me mana iti na ca etāvatā suṣuptiḥ bhidyate tathā vikāra antare api mūrcchā na suṣupteḥ bhidyate tasmāt loka prasiddhi abhāvāt na iyam pcamī avasthā iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate yadi api viśeṣa vijñāna upaśamena moha suṣuptayoḥ sāmyam tathā api na aikyam na hi viśeṣa vijñāna sadbhāva sāmya mātreṇa svapna jāgarayoḥ abhedaḥ bāhya indriya vyāpāra bhāva abhāvābhyām tu bhede tayoḥ suṣupta mohayoḥ api prayojana bhedāt kāraṇa bhedāt lakṣaṇa bhedāt ca bhedaḥ śrama apanutti arthā hi brahmaṇā saṃpattiḥ suṣaptam śarīra tyāga arthā tu brahmaṇā saṃpattiḥ mohaḥ yadi api sati api mohe na maraṇam tathā api asati mohe na maraṇam iti maraṇa arthaḥ  mohaḥ musala saṃpāta ādi nimitta tvāt mohasya śrama ādi nimitta tvāt ca suṣuptasya sukha netra ādi vikāra lakṣaṇa tvāt mohasya prasanna vadanatva ādi lakṣaṇa bhedāt ca suṣuptasya asuṣuptasya tu avāntara bhede api nimitta prayojana lakṣaṇa abhedāt eka tvam tasmāt  suṣupta moha avasthayoḥ brahmaṇā saṃpattau  api suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattiḥ na tādṛśī moha iti ardha saṃpattiḥ uktā sāmya vaiṣamyābhyām ardha tvam yadā na etad avasthā antaram tadā bhedāt tad pravilāya yatna antaram āstheyam abhede tu na yatnān ram iti cintā prayojanam na sthānataḥ  api parasya ubhaya liṅgam sarvatra hi avāntara saṃgatim āha yena brahmaṇā suṣupta ādiṣu iti yadi api atat ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ iti atra niṣprapañcam eva brahma upapāditam tathā api prapañca liṅgānām bahvīnām śrutīnām darśanāt bhavati punar vicikitsā atas tad nivāraṇāya ārambhaḥ tasya ca tattva jñānam apavarga upayogī iti prayojanavān vicāraḥ tatra ubhaya liṅga śravaṇāt ubhaya rūpa tvam brahmaṇaḥ prāptam tatra api sa viśeṣatva nirviśeṣa tvayoḥ virodhāt svābhāvikatva anupapatteḥ ekam svatas  aparam tu paratas  na ca yad paratas tad apāramārthikam na hi cakṣuḥ ādīnām svatas pramāṇa bhūtānām doṣataḥ  aprāmāṇyam apāramārthikam viparyajñāna lakṣaṇa kārya anutpāda prasaṅgāt  tasmāt ubhaya liṅgaka śāstra prāmāṇyāt ubhaya rūpa tā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikī iti prāpta ucyate na sthānata upādhitaḥ  api parasya brahmaṇa ubhaya cihnatva saṃbhavaḥ ekam hi pāramārthikam anyat adhyāripatam pāramārthika tve hi upādhi janitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ  bhavet  sa ca prāk pratiṣiddhaḥ tad pāriśeṣyāt sphaṭika maṇeḥ iva svabhāva su accha ghavalasya lākṣā rasa vaseka upādhi rūpaṇimā sarva gandhatva ādiraupādhikaḥ  brahmaṇi adhyasya iti paśyāmaḥ  nirviśeṣa tā pratipādana artha tvāt śutīnām sa viśeṣa tāyām api ayaḥ ca ayam asyām pṛthivyām tejaḥ mayaḥ ityādīnām śrutīnām brahma ekatva pratipādana para tvāt ekatva nānātvayoḥ ca ekasmin  asaṃbhavāt ekatva aṅga tvena eva nānātva pratipādana paryavasānāt  nānātvasya pramāṇa antara siddha tayā anuvādya tvāt ekatvasya ca anadhigateḥ vidheyatva upapatteḥ bheda darśana nindayā ca sākṣāt bhūyasībhiḥ śrutibhiḥ abheda pratipānāt ākāravat brahma viṣayāṇām ca kāsāṃcid śutīnām upāsana aparatvam asati bādhake anya parāt vacanāt pratīyamānam api gṛhyate yathā devatānām vigrahavat tvam santi ca atra sākṣāt vaitāpavādena advaita pratipādana parāḥ śataśas  śrutayaḥ kāsāṃcid ca dvaita abhidhāyinīnām tad pravilaya paratvam tasmāt nirviśeṣam eka rūpam caitanya eka rasam sat brahma paramārthataḥ viśeṣāḥ ca sarva gandhatva vāmanī tvādaya upādhi vaśāt adhyastā iti siddham śeṣam ati rohita artham atra kecid dve adhikaraṇe kalpayanti iti kim sāt lakṣaṇam ca prakāśa lakṣaṇam ca brahma kim sat lakṣaṇam eva brahma iti prakāśa lakṣaṇam eva iti tatra pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti prakāśavat ca avaiyarthyāt cakārāt sat ca avaiyarthyāt  brahmaṇi sat śuteḥ siddhāntayati āha ca tanmātram prakāśa mātram na hi sattvam nāma prakāśa rūpāt anyat yathā sarva gandha tvāt ayaḥ  api tu prakāśa rūpam eva sat iti na ubhaya rūpa tvam brahmaṇa iti arthaḥ tad etad anena upanyasya dūṣitam sattā prakāśayoḥ ekatve na ubhaya lakṣaṇa tvam bhede na sthānataḥ  api iti nirākṛtam iti na adhikaraṇa antaram prayojayati parama arthaḥ tu abheda eva prakarṣa prakāśavat iti sarveṣām ca sādhāraṇe pravilaya artha tve sati aarūpavat eva hi tad pradhāna tvāt iti vinigamana kāraṇa vacanam anavakāśam syāt  evam hi tasya avakāśaḥ syāt yāda kāścid upāsana apara tayā rūpam ācakṣīran kāścid nī rūpa brahma pratipādana parā bhaveyuḥ sarvāsām tu pravilaya artha tvena nīrūpa brahma pratipādana artha tve uktaḥ  vinigamana hetuḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ eka niyoga pratīteḥ prayāja darśa pūrṇamāsa vākyavat iti adhikāra abhiprāyam anubandha bhedāt tu bhinnaḥ anayoḥ api niyoga iti kaḥ  ayam prapañca pravilaya iti vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa iva agni saṃyogāt  samāropitasya vā rajjvām sarpa bhāvasya iva rajju tattva parijñānāt  na tāvat vāstavaḥ sarva sādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivī ādi prapañcaḥ puruṣa mātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum apica prahlāda śuka ādibhiḥ puruṣa dhaureyaiḥ sa mūlam unmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyam jagat bhavet  na ca vāstavam tattva jñānena śakyam samucchettum āropita rūpa virodhi tvāttva jñānasya iti uktam samāropita rūpaḥ tu prapañcaḥ  brahma tattva jñāpana paraiḥ eva vākyaiḥ brahma tattvam avabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettum iti kṛtam atra vidhinā na hi vidhi śatena api vinā tattva avabodhanam pravartasva ātma jñāna iti vā kuru prapañca pravilayam vā iti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañca pravilayam kartum na ca asya ātma jñāna vidhim vinā vedānta artha brahma tattva avabodhaḥ  na bhavati maulikasya svādhyāya adhyayana virodheḥ eva vivakṣita artha tayā sakalasya veda rāśeḥ phalavat artha avabodhana para tām āpādayataḥ  vidyamāna tvāt  anyathā karma vidhi vākyāni api vidhi antaram apekṣeran  iti na ca cintā sākṣāt kārayoḥ vidhiḥ iti tattva samīkṣāyām asmābhirūpa pāditam vistareṇa ca ayam arthaḥ tatra eva prapañcitaḥ tasmāt  ajartilaya vāc vā juhuyāt itivat vidhi sarūpā ete aātmā vā are draṣṭavya ityādayaḥ  na tu vidhaya iti tad idam uktam draṣṭavī ādi śabdā api tattva abhimudhīkaraṇa pradhānā na tattva avabodha vidhi pradhānā iti apica brahma tattvam niṣprapañca m uktam na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścid saṃbhavati jīvaḥ  hi niyojyaḥ  bhavet  sa ced prapañca pakṣe vartate kaḥ  niyojyaḥ tasya ucchinna tvāt atha brahma pakṣe tathā api aniyojyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ  aniyojya tvāt  atha brahmaṇaḥ  ananyaḥ  api avidyayā anya iva iti niyojyaḥ tad ayuktam brahma bhāvam pāramārthikam avagamayatā āgamena avidyāyā nirasta tvāt  tasmāt niyojya abhāvāt api na niyogaḥ tad idam uktam jīvaḥ  nāma prapañca pakṣasya eva iti apica jñānavidha paratve tad mātrāt tu jñānasya anutpatteḥ tattva pratipādana paratvam abhyupagamanīyam tatra varam tattva pratipādana paratvam eva astu tasya avaśya abhyupagantavya tvena ubhaya vādi siddha tvāt evam ca kṛtam tattva jñāna vidhinā iti āha jñeya abhimukhasya api iti na ca tad śakyam vā api yuktam iti āha na ca pramāṇa antareṇa iti kiñca anyat niyoga niṣṭhatayā eva ca paryavasyati āmnāye yad abhyupagatam bhavadbhiḥ śāstra paryālocana yā niyojya brahma ātma tvam jīvasya iti tad etad śāstra avirodhāt apramāṇakam atha etad śāstram aniyojya brahma ātma tvam ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvam ca niyuktam tatas  dvi artham ca viruddha artha ca syāt iti āha atha iti darśa paurṇamāsa ādi vākyeṣu jīvasya aniyojyasya api vastu tas  adhyasta niyojya bhāvasya niyojyatā yuktā na hi tad vākyam tasya niyojyatām āha api tu laukika pramāṇa siddhām niyojyatām āśritya darśa pūrṇamāsau vidhatte idam tu niyojyatām apanayati ca niyuṅkte ca iti durghaṭam iti bhāvaḥ niyoga para tāyām ca iti paurvāparya ālocanayā vedāntānām tattva niṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoga niṣṭhata iti arthaḥ apica niyoga niṣṭha tve vākyasya darśa paurṇāmāsa karmaṇa iva apūrvāvāntara vyāpārāt ātma jñāna karmaṇaḥ  api apūrvā avāntara vyāpārāt eva svarga ādi phalavat mokṣasya ānanda rūpa phalasya siddhiḥ tathā ca anitya tvam sa atiśaya tvam svargavat bhavet iti āha karma phalavat iti apica brahma vākyeṣu iti sa prapañca niṣprapañca upadeśeṣu hi sādhya anubandha bhedāt eka niyoga tvam asiddham darśa porṇa māsa prayāja vākyeṣu tu yadi api anubandha bhedaḥ tathā api adhikāra aṃśasya sādhyasya bheda abhāvāt abheda iti prakṛta etāvat tvam hi pratiṣedhati tatas  vravi iti ca bhūyas  adhikaraṇa viṣayam āha dve vāva brahmaṇaḥ  rūpe iti dve eva brahmaṇaḥ  rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārtha taḥ  arūpasya adhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyām hi tad rūpyate te darśayati mūrte ca eva amūrte ca samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam atra pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇaḥ  rūpam mūrtam mūrcchita avayavam itaretara anupraviṣṭa avayavam kaṭhinam iti yāvat  tasya eva viśeṣaṇa antarāṇi martyam maraṇa dharmakam sthitam avyāpi avacchinnam iti yāvat  sat  anyebhyaḥ  viśiṣyamāṇam asādhāraṇa dharmavat iti yāvat  gandha sneha uṣṇatāḥ ca anyonya vyavaccheda hetavaḥ  asādhāraṇā dharmāḥ tasya etasya brahma rūpasya tejaḥ  abannasya catur viśeṣaṇasya eṣa rasaḥ sāraḥ  ya eṣa savitā sapati atha amūrtam vāyuḥ ca antarikṣam ca tad hi na kaṭhinam iti amūrtam etad amṛtam amaraṇa dharmakam mūrtam hi mūrta antareṇa abhihanyamānam avayava viśleṣāt dhvaṃsate na tu tathā abhāvaḥ saṃbhavati amūrtasya etad yadā iti gacchati vyāpnoti iti etad tyam nitya parokṣam iti arthaḥ tasya etasya amūrtasya amṛtasya etasya yata etasya tyasya eṣa rasaḥ  ya eṣa gatasmin savitṛ maṇḍale puruṣaḥ karaṇa ātmakaḥ  hiraṇyagarbha prāṇāhvayaḥ tyasya hi eṣa rasaḥ sāraḥ  nitya parokṣa tā ca sāmyam iti adhidaivatam atha adhyātmam idam eva mūrtam yad anyat prāṇa antara ākāśābhyām bhūta trayam rīra ārambhakam etad martyam etad sthitam etad sattasya etasya mūrtasya etasya martyasya etasya sthitasya etasya sata eṣa rasaḥ  yad cakṣuḥ sataḥ  hi oṣa rasa iti atha amūrtam prāṇaḥ ca yaḥ ca ayam antarātman  ākāśa etad amṛtam etad yad etad tyam tasya etasya amūrtasya etasya amṛtasya etasya yata etasya tyasya eṣa rasaḥ  yaḥ  ayam dakṣiṇa īkṣan puruṣastyasya hi eṣa rasaḥ liṅgasya hi karaṇa ātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇam akṣi dhiṣṭhānam śruteḥ adhigatam tad evam brahmaṇa aupādhikayoḥ mūrtā mūrtayoḥ ādhyātmika ādhidaivikayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena vibhāgaḥ  vyākhyātaḥ sattyat śabda vācyayoḥ atha idānīm tasya karaṇa ātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpam vaktavyam etad uktam bhati mūrta amūrta vāsanā vijñāna mayasya vicitram rūpam liṅgasya iti tad evam niravaśeṣam sa vāsanam satya rūpam uktvā yad tad satyasya satyam uktam brahma tad svarūpa avadhāraṇa artham idam ārabhyate yatas  satyasya rūpam niḥśeṣam uktam atas  avaśiṣṭam satyasya yad satyam tasya anantaram tad ukti hetukam svarūpam vakyavyam iti āha atha ata ādeśaḥ kathanam satya satyasya paramātmanaḥ tam āha na iti na iti iti etad artha kathana artham idam adhikaraṇam nanu kim etāvat eva ādeśyam na aparam asti iti arthaḥ atra evam arthena itinā yad saṃnihitam parāmṛṣṭam tad niṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitam ca mūrta amūrtam sa vāsanam rūpa dvayam tad avacchedaka tvena ca brahma tatra idam vicāryate kim rūpa dvayam sa vāsanam brahma ca sarvam eva ca pratiṣidhyate uta brahma eva atha sa vāsanam rūpa dvayam brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti yadi api teṣu teṣu vedānta pradeśeṣu brahma svarūpam pratipāditam tad asat bhāva jñānam ca ninditam aasti iti eva upalabdhavyaḥ iti ca asya sattvam avadhāritam tathā api sat bodha rūpam tad brahma sa vāsana mūrta amūrta rūpa sādhāraṇa tayā ca sāmānyam tasya ca ete viśeṣā mūrta amūrta ādayaḥ na ca tad tad viśeṣa niṣedhe sāmānyam avasthātum arhati nirviśeṣasya sāmānyasya ayogāt  yathā āhuḥ anirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śuśaviṣāṇavat iti tasmāt tad viśeṣedhe api tad sāmānyasya brahmaṇaḥ  anavasthānāt sarvasya eva ayam niṣedhaḥ ata eva na hi etasmāt iti na iti anyat param asti iti niṣedhāt  param na asti iti sarva niṣedham eva tattvam āha śrutiḥ aasti iti eva upalabdhavyaḥ iti ca upāsanā vidhānavat neyam na tvastitvam eva asya tattvam tad praśaṃsā artham ca asadbhāva jñāna nindā yad ca anyatra brahma svarūpa pratipādanam tad api mūrta amūrta rūpa pratipādanavat niṣedha artham asaṃnihitaḥ  api ca tatra niṣedhaḥ  yogya tvāt saṃbhansyate yathā āhuḥ ayena yasya abhisaṃbandhaḥ  dūra sthasya api tena saḥ iti tasmāt sarvasya eva aviśeṣeṇa niṣedha iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ athavā pṛthivī ādi prapañcasya samastasya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tvāt brahmaṇaḥ tu vāc manasā agocaratayā sakala pramāṇa virahāt katarasya astu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañca pratiṣedhe samasta pratyakṣa ādi vyāka upaprasaṅgāt brahma pratiṣedhaḥ  tu avyākopāt brahmā eva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogya tvāt na prapañcaḥ tad vaiparītyāt vīpsā tu tad atyanta abhāva sūcanāya iti madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ tatra prathamam pakṣam nirākaroti na tāvat ubhaya pratiṣedha upapadyate śūnya vāda prasaṅgāt iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ upādhayaḥ  hi amī pṛthivī ādayaḥ  avidyā kalpitā na tu śoṇa karka ādaya iva viśeṣā aśva tvasya na ca upādhi vigame upahitasya abhāvaḥ  apratītiḥ vā nahi upādīnām darpaṇa maṇi kṛpāṇa ādīnām apagame mukhasya abhāvaḥ  apratitirvā tasmāt upādhi niṣedhe api na upahitasya śaśa viṣāṇa ayamāna tā pratyayaḥ vā na ceti iti saṃnidhāna aviśeṣāt sarvasya pratiṣedhya tvam iti yuktam na hi bhāvam anupāśritya pratiṣedha upapadyate kiñcid ha kkacid niṣidhyate na hi anāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ pratipattum tad idam uktam apariśiṣyamāṇe ca anyasmin ya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhum ārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhuma śakya tvāt tasya eva paramārthatva āpatteḥ pratiṣādha anupapattiḥ madhyamam pakṣam pratikṣipati na api brahma pratiṣedha upapadyate yuktam yad naisargikā avidyā prāptaḥ prapañcaḥ pratiṣidhyate prāpti pūrvaka tvāt pratiṣedhasya brahma tu na avidyā siddham na api pramāṇa antarāt tasmāt śabdena prāptam pratiṣedhanīyam tathā ca yaḥ tasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tad para iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇam iti katham asya niṣedhaḥ  api pramāṇavān na ca paryudāsa adhikaraṇa pūrva pakṣa nyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddha svabhāve tad anupapatteḥ na ca avāc manasa gocaraḥ  buddha avalokhitum śakyaḥ aśakyaḥ ca katham niṣidhyate prapañcaḥ tu anādya vidyā siddhaḥ  anūdya brahmaṇi pratiṣidyata iti yuktam tad imām anupapattim abhipretya uktam anāpi brahma pratiṣedha upapadyate iti hetu antaram āha brahma te bravāṇi iti upakrama virodhāt iti upakrama parāmarśa upasaṃhāra paryālocanayā hi vedāntānām sarveṣām eva brahma paratvam upapāditam prathame adhyāye na ca āsatyām ākāṅkṣāyām dūra tasthena pratiṣedhena eṣām saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati yad ca vāc manasā atīta tayā brahmaṇaḥ tad pratiṣedhasya na pramāṇa antara virodha iti tatra āha vāc manasā atīta tvam api iti pratipādayanti vedāntā mahatā prayatnena brahma na ca niṣedhasya tad pratipādanam anupapatteḥ iti uktam adhastāt idānīm tu niṣprayojanam iti uktam aprakṣālanāt hi paṅkasya iti nyāyāt  tasmāt vedānta vācā manasi saṃnidhānāt brahmaṇaḥ  vāc manasā atīta tvam na añjasam api tu pratipādana prakriyā upakrama eṣaḥ yathā gavādayaḥ  viṣayāḥ sākṣāt śṛṅga grāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca na evam brahma yathā āhuḥ abheda prapañca vilaya dvāreṇa ca nirūpaṇam iti nanu prakṛta pratiṣedhe brahmaṇaḥ  api kasmāt na pratiṣejha iti ata āha yad hi prakṛtam prapañcitam ca iti pradhānam prakṛtam prapañcasya pradhānam na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhī anta tayā prapañca avat śeka tvena apradhāna tvāt iti arthaḥ tatas  anyat bravīti iti na iti na iti iti pratiṣedhāt anyat bhūyaḥ bravīti iti tad nirvacanam na hi etasmāt iti asya yadā na hi etasmāt iti na iti na iti ādiṣṭāt brahmaṇaḥ  anyat param asti iti vyākhyānam tadā prapañca pratiṣedhāt anyat brahmā eva bravīti iti vyākhyeyam yadā tu na hi etasmāt iti sarva nāmnā pratiṣedhaḥ  brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadā api prapañca pratiṣedha mātram na pratipattavyam api tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāva rūpam brahma upalakṣyate kasmāt tyata āha tatas  bravīti ca bhūya iti yasmāt pratiṣedhasya parastāt api bravīti atha brahmaṇaḥ  nāmadheyam nāma satyasya satyam iti tad vyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ aprāṇā vai satyam iti māhāra jana ādi upamitam liṅgam upalaṅayati tad  khalu satyam itara apekṣayā tasya api param satyam brahma tad evam yatas  pratiṣedhasya paraḥ tad bravīti tasmāt na prapañca pratiṣedha mātram brahmā api tu bhāva rūpam iti tad evam pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanam bravīti iti vyākhyātam asmiḥ tum satyasya satyam iti bravīti iti vyākhyeyam śeṣam ati rohita artham ubhaya vyapadeśāt tu ahikuṇḍalavat  anena ahi rūpeṇa abhedaḥ kuṇḍala ādi rūpeṇa tu bheda iti uktam tena viṣaya bhedāt bheda abhedayoḥ avirodha iti eka viṣaya tvena vā sarvadā upalabdheḥ avirodhaḥ viruddham iti hi naḥ kka saṃpratyayaḥ  na yad pramāṇena upalabhyate āgamataḥ ca pramāṇāt eka gocarau  api bheda abhedau pratīyamānau na virodham āvahataḥ savitṛ prakāśayoḥ iva pratyakṣāt pramāṇāt bheda abhedau  iti prakāra antareṇa bheda abhedayoḥ avirodham āha prakāśa āśrayavat vā tejaḥ tvāt  tad evam para matam upanyasya sva matam āha pūrvavat vā ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ yasya matam vastunaḥ  ahi tvena abhedaḥ kuṇḍala tvena bheda iti sa evam bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ  jāyate kim ahitva kuṇḍala tve vastunaḥ  bhinne uta abhinne iti yadi bhinne ahitva kuṇḍala tve bhinne iti vaktavyam na tu vastunaḥ tābhyām bheda abhedau na hi anya bheda abhedābhyām anyat bhinnam abhinnam vā bhavitum arhati atiprasaṅgāt  atha vastunaḥ  na bhidyete ahitva kuṇḍala tve tathā sati kaḥ  bheda abhedayoḥ viṣaya bhedaḥ tayoḥ vastunaḥ  ananya tvena abhedāt  na ca eka viṣaya tve api sadā anubhūyamāna tvāt bheda abhedayoḥ avirodha sva rūpa viruddhayoḥ api avirodhe kka nāma virodhaḥ  vyavatiṣṭheta na ca sadā anubhūyamānam vicāra asaham bhāvikam bhavitum arhati deha ātma bhāvasya api sarvadā anubhūyamānasya bhāvikatva prasaṅgāt  prapañcitam ca etad asmābhiḥ prathama sūtra iti na iha prapañcitam tasmāt anādya vidyā vikrīḍitam eva ekasya ātmanaḥ  jīva bhāva bhedaḥ  na bhāvikaḥ tathā ca tattva jñāna da vidyā nivṛttau  apavarga siddhiḥ tāttvika tve tu asya na jñānāt nivṛtti saṃbhavaḥ na ca tattva jñānāt anyat apavarga sādhanam asti yathā āha śrutiḥ atam eva viditvā atimṛtyum eti na anyaḥ panthā vidyate ayanāya iti śeṣam ati rohita artham paramatas  setūn māna saṃbandha bheda vyapadeśebhyaḥ yadi api śruti prācuryāt brahma vyatiriktam tattvam na asti iti avadhāritam tathā api setu ādi śrutīnām āpātatas tad virodha darśanāt tad pratisamādhāna artham ayam ārambhaḥ jāṅgalam sthalam prakāśavat anantavat jyotiṣmad āyatanavat iti pādā brahmaṇaḥ catvāraḥ teṣām pādānām ardhāni aṣṭau śaphāḥ te aṣṭā  asya brahmaṇa iti aṣṭaśapham brahma ṣoḍaśa kalā asya iti ṣośakalam tad yathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīci iti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavān nāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ etad upāsanāyām prakāśavān mukhyaḥ  bhavati iti prakāśavān pādaḥ atha aparāḥ pṛthivī antarikṣam dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ  anantatavān nāma saḥ  ayam anantavat tvena guṇonā upāsyamānaḥ  ananta tvam upāsakasya avahati iti anantavān pādaḥ atha agniḥ sūryaḥ candramā vidyut iti catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmān nāma pādaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tad upāsanāt jyotiṣmān bhavati iti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ atha ghrāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotram vāc iti catasraḥ kalāḥ caturthaḥ pāda āyatanavān nāma ete ghrāṇāt ayaḥ  hi gandha ādi viṣayā mana āyatanam āśritya bhoga sādhanam bhavanti iti āyatanavān nāma pādaḥ tad evam catuṣpād brahma aṣṭaśapham ṣoḍaṣa kalam unmiṣitam śrutyā atas tatas  brahmaṇaḥ param anyat asti syāt etad  asti ced  parisaṃkhyāya ucyatām etāvat iti ata āha amitam asti iti pramāṇa siddham na tu etāvat iti arthaḥ bheda vyapadeśaḥ ca tri prakāraḥ ādhārataḥ ca atideśataḥ ca avadhitaḥ ca sāmānyāt tu jagataḥ tad maryādānām ca vidhāraka tvam ca setu sāmānyam yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭam vidhārayanti tad upādāna tvāt evam brahmā api jagat vidhārayati tad upapādaka tvāt  tad maryādānām ca vidhārakam brahma itaratha ati capala sthūla balavat kallola mālā kalilaḥ jalanidhiḥ ilā pari maṇḍalam avagilet  vaḍavānalaḥ  vā visphurjita jvālā jaṭilaḥ  jagat bhasmasāt bhāvayet  pavanaḥ pracaṇḍaḥ  vākāṇḍam eva brahmāṇḍam vighaṭa diti ḷ  tathā ca śrutiḥ abhīṣā asmāt vātaḥ pavate iti ādikā buddhi arthaḥ pādavat  manasaḥ  brahma pratīkasya samāropita brahma bhāvasya vāc ghrāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ śrotram iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ manaḥ  hi vaktavya ghrātavyat raṣṭavya śrotavyān gocarān vāc ādibhiḥ saṃcarati iti saṃcaraṇa sādhāraṇa tayā manasaḥ pādaḥ tad idam adhyātman ākāśasya brahma pratīkasya agniḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ  diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ te hi vyāpinaḥ  nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādaḥ tad idam adhidaivatam tad anena pādavat iti vaidikam nidarśanam vyākhyāya laukikam ca idam nidarśanam iti āha athavā pādavat iti tadvat iti iha api manda buddhī nāmādhyāna vyavahārāya iti arthaḥ sthāna viśeṣāt prakāśa ādivat  buddhi ādi upādhi sthāna viśeṣa yogāt udbhūtasya jāgrat svapnayoḥ viśeṣa vijñānasya upādhi upaśame abhibhave suṣupta avasthānam iti tathā bheda vyapadeśaḥ  api trividhaḥ  brahmaṇa upādhi bheda apekṣayā iti yathā saudha jāla mārga niveśinyaḥ savitṛ bhāsaḥ jāla mārga upādhi bedāt bhinnā bhāsante tad vigame tu gabhasti maṇḍalena ekībhavanti atas tena saṃbadhyanta evam iha api iti syāt etad  ekībhāvaḥ kasmāt iha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcid vyākhyāyate na mukhya  eva iti etad sūtreṇa pariharati upapattaḥ ca svam apīta iti hi svarūpa saṃbandham brūte svabhāvaḥ ced anena saṃbandha tvena spṛṣṭaḥ tatas  svābhāvikaḥ tādātmyāt na atiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditam iti arthaḥ tathā bhedaḥ  api trividhaḥ  vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika iti arthaḥ tathā anya pratiṣedhāt sugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam anena sarva gata tvam āyāma śabda ādibhyaḥ brahmā dvaita siddhau  api na sarva gata tvam sarva vyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā sva rūpeṇa rūpavat tvam sidhyati iti ata āha anena setu ādi nirākaraṇena para hetu nirākaraṇena anya pratiṣedha samāśrayaṇena ca sva sādhana upanyāsena ca sarva gata tvam api ātmanaḥ siddham bhavati advaita siddhe sarvaḥ  ayam anirvacanīyaḥ prapañca avabhāsaḥ  brahma adhiṣṭhāna iti sarvasya brahma saṃbandhāt brahma sarva gatam iti siddham phalam ata upapatteḥ siddhānta upakramam idam adhikaraṇam syāt etad  nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvara tvam kutas ca phala hetu tvam api ityata āha tasya eva brahmaṇaḥ  vyāvahārikyām iti na asya pāramārthikam rūpam āśritya etad cintyate kintu sāṃvyavahārikam etad ca atapasā cīyate brahma iti vyācakṣāṇeḥ asmābhirūpa pāditam iṣṭam phalam svargaḥ yathā āhuḥ ayat na duḥkhana saṃbhinnam na ca grastam anantaram abhilāṣā upanītam ca sukham svarga pad āspadam iti aniṣṭa mavīcya ādi sthāna bhogyam vyāmiśram manuṣya bhogyam tatra tāvat pratipādyate phalam ata īśvarā tkarmabhiḥ ārādhitāt bhavitum arhati atha karmaṇa eva phalam kasmāt na bhavati iti ata āha karmaṇaḥ tu anukṣaṇa vināśinaḥ pratyakṣa vināśina iti codayati sayāt etad karma syāt etad karma vinaśyat iti upāttam api phalam bhoktum ayogya tvāt vā karma antara pratibandhāt vā na bhujyata iti arthaḥ pariharati tad api na pariśudhyati iti na hi svarga ātmānam labhatām iti adhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyaḥ  asmākam bhavatu iti tena yādṛśam ebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phala tvam iti bhogyam eva sat phalam iti na ca tādṛśam karma anantaram iti katham phalam tad api sva rūpeṇa apica svarga narakau tīvratame sukha duḥkhe iti tad viṣayeṇa anubhavena bhoga apara nāmnā avaśyam bhavitavyam tasmāt anubhava yogye ananubhūyamāne śaśa śṛṅgavat na sta iti niścīyate codayati atha ucyeta mā bhūt karma anantaram phala utpādaḥ karma akāryāt apūrvāt phalam utpatsyata iti pariharati tad api na iti yad yad acetanam tad tad sarvam cetana adhiṣṭhitam pravartata iti pratyakṣa gamābhyām avadhāritam tasmāt apūrvoṇā api acetanena cetanā adhiṣṭhitena eva pravartitavyam na anyathā iti arthaḥ na ca apūrvam prāmāṇikam api iti āha tad astitve iti śruta tvāt ca anna ādaḥ anna pradaḥ siddhāntena upakramya pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti dharmam jaiminirata eva śrutim āha śrūyate tāvat iti nanu asvarga kāmaḥ  yajeta ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalam prati na sādhana tayā yāgam vidadhati tathā hi yadi yāga ādaya eva kriyā na tad atiriktā bhāvanā tathā api na eva sva padebhyaḥ pūrva aparībhūtāḥ sādhya svabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhya antaram apekṣanta iti na svargeṇa sādhya antareṇa saṃbaddhum arhanti atha api tad itarekiṇī bhavānā asti tathā api asau bhāṣya pekṣā api sva pada upāttam pūrva āgatam na bhāvyam dhātu artham apahāya na bhinna pada upāttam puruṣa viśeṣaṇam ca svarga ādi bhāṣya tayā svīkartum arhati na ca ekasmin vākye sādhya dvaya saṃbandha saṃbhavaḥ vākya bheda prasaṅgāt  na kevalam śabdataḥ vastutas ca puruṣa prayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāt dhātu artha eva sādhyaḥ  na tu svarga ādiḥ tasya tad avyāpya tvāt svarga ādeḥ tu nāma pada abhidheya tayā siddha rūpasya ākhyāta vācyam sādhyam dhātu arthe prati abhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti nyāyāt sādhana tayā guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ tathā ca pāramarṣe sūtram adravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti tathā ca karmaṇaḥ  yāga ādeḥ duḥkha tvena puruṣeṇa asamīhita tvāt samīhitasya ca svarga ādeḥ asādhya tvāt na yāga ādayaḥ puruṣasya upakurvani anupakāriṇām ca eṣām na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaḥ ca na teṣu saṃbhavati adhikārī iti adhikāra abhāva pratipādita ānarthakya parihārāya kṛtsnasya eva āmnāyasya nirmṛṣṭa nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅga nitya sukha maya brahma jñāna para tvam bheda prapañca vilayana dvāreṇa tathā hi sarvatra eva āmnāye kkacid kasyacid bhedasya pravilayaḥ  gamyate yathā asvarga kāmaḥ  yajeta iti śarīra ātma bhāva praliyaḥ iha khalvāpātatas  deha atirikta āmuṣmika phala upabhoga samarthaḥ  adhikārī gamyate tatra adhikārasya uktena krameṇa nirākaraṇāt asataḥ  api pratīyamānasya vicāra asahasya upāya tā mātreṇa avasthānāt anena vākyena deha ātma bhāva pravīlayaḥ tad pareṇa kriyate agodohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti atra api āpātatas  adhikṛta adhikāravagamāt adhikāri bheda pravilayaḥ niṣedha vākyāni ca sākṣāt eva pravṛtti niṣedhena vidhi vākyāni ca anyāyi asāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta grāma kāmaḥ ityādīnā na sāṃgrahaṇya ādi pravṛtti pāraṇī api tu upāya antara upadeśena saṃvādi dṛṣṭa upāya pratiṣedha arthāni yathā viṣam bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣva iti tathā ca rāga ādi akṣipta pravṛtti ṣedhena śāstrasya śāstra tvam api upapadyate rāga nibandhanām tu upāya upadeśa dvāreṇa pravṛttim anujānataḥ  rāga saṃbardha nādaśāstratva prasaṅgaḥ tad niṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānam ādadhat śāstram śāstra bhavet  tasmāt ka maphala saṃbandhasya aprāmāṇika tvāt anādi vicitra avidyā sahakāriṇa īśvarāt eva karma anapekṣāt vicitra phala utpattiḥ ita katham tarhi vidhiḥ kim atra katham pravartanā mātra tvāt vidheḥ tasya ca adhikāram antareṇa api upapatteḥ na hi yaḥ  yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvaḥ  adhikṛtam apekṣate pavana ādeḥ pravartakasya tad anapekṣa tvāt itiśaṅkām apācikīrṣarā āha tatra ca vidhi śruteḥ viṣaya bhāva upagamāt yāgaḥ svargasya utpādaka iti gamyate anyathā hi ananuṣṭhātṛkaḥ  yāga āpadyeta ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ upadeśaḥ  hi vidhiḥ yathā uktam atasya jñānam upadeśaḥ iti upadeśaḥ ca niyojya prayojane karmaṇi loka śāstrayoḥ prasiddhaḥ tad yathā ārogya kāmaḥ  jīrṇe bhuñjīta eṣa supanthā gacchatu bhavānanena iti na tu ajñādiḥ iva niyoktṛ prayojanaḥ tatra abhiprāyasya pravartaka tvāt  tasya ca apauruṣeye asaṃbhavāt  asya ca upadeśasya niyojya prayojana vyāpāra viṣaya tvam anuṣṭhātrapekṣita ānukūla vyāpāra gocara tvam asmābhirūpa pāditam nyāya kaṇikāyām tathā ca asvarga kāmaḥ  yajeta ityādiṣu svarga kāma ādeḥ samīhita upāyā gamyante yāga ādayaḥ itarathā tu na sādhayitāram anugaccheyuḥ tad uktam ṛṣiṇā aasādhakam tu tādarthyāt iti anuṣṭhātṛ apekṣita upāya tā rahita pravartanā mātra artha tve yajeta iti ādīnām asādhakam karma yāga ādi syāt  sādhayitāram na adhigacchet iti arthaḥ na ca ete sākṣāt bhāvanā bhāvyā api kartṛ apa īkṣita sādhana tā vidhi upahita maryādā bhāvanā uddeśyā bhavitum arhanti yena puṃsām anupakārakāḥ santaḥ  na adhikāra bhājaḥ  bhaveyuḥ duḥkha tvena karmaṇām cetana samāhāna āspada tvāt svarga ādīnām tu bhāvanā pūrvarūpa kāmanā upadhānāt ca prīti ātmaka tvāt ca nāma pada abhidheyānām api puruṣa viśeṣaṇānām api bhāvanā uddeśya tā lakṣaṇa bhāvyatva pratīteḥ phala artha pravṛtta bhāvanā bhāvyatva lakṣaṇena ca yāga ādi sādhya tvena phala artha pravṛtta bhāvanā bhāvyatva rūpasya phala sādhya tvasya sama pradhānatva abhāvena eka vākya samavāya saṃbhavāt bhāvanā bhāvyatva mātrasya ca yāga ādi sādhya tvasya karaṇe api avirodhāt anyathā sarvatra tad ucchedāt paraśu ādeḥ api chidh ādiṣu tathā abhāvāt phalasya sākṣāt bhāvanā vyāpyatva virahiṇaḥ  api tad uddeśya tayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānāt svarga sādhane yāga ādau svarga kāma ādeḥ adhikāra iti siddham na ca aprāpta artha viṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇya ādi yāga vidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitum arhanti na ca adhikāra abhāve deha ātma pravilayaḥ  vādhikāri bheda pravilayaḥ  vā śakya upapādayitum āpātatas  pratibhāne ca asya tad paratvam eva na artha āyāta paratvam svarasataḥ pratīyamāner athe vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpāta āya āta para tvam ucitam na ca etāvatā śāstra vyāghātaḥ tasya svarga ādi upāya aśane api śāstratva upapatteḥ puruṣa śreyaḥ  abhidhāyaka tvam hi śāstra tvam sa rāga vīta rāga puruṣa śreyaḥ  abhidhāyaka tvena sarva pāriṣadatayā na tattva vyāghātaḥ tasmāt vidhi viṣaya bhāva upagamāt yāgaḥ svargasya utpādaka iti siddham karmaṇaḥ  vā kācid avasthā iti karmaṇaḥ  avāntara vyāpāraḥ etad uktam bhavati karmaṇaḥ  hi phalam prati yad sādhana tvam śrutam tad nirvāhayitum tasya eva avāntara vyāpāraḥ  bhavati na ca vyāpāravati sati eva vyāpāraḥ  na asati iti yuktam asatsu api āgneya ādiṣu tad upatti apūrvāṇām paramāpūrve janayitavye tad avāntara vyāpāra tvāt asatī api ca taila pāna karmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyām antarā taila pariṇāma bhedānām tad avāntara vyāpāra tvāt tasmāt karma kāryam apūrve karmaṇā phale kartavye tad avāntara vyāpāra iti yuktam yadā punar  phala upajananāni atha anupapattyā kiñcid kalpyate tadā phalasya vā pūrva avasthā avicitrasya kāraṇasya iti yadi īśvarāt eva kevalāt iti śeṣaḥ karmabhiḥ vā śubha aśubhaiḥ kārya t vaidha utpāde rāga ādimattva prasaṅga iti āśayaḥ pūrvam tu bādarāyaṇaḥ  hetu vyapadeśāt  dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī hi kalpanā yuktā na anyathā na hi jātu mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādayaḥ kumbhakāra ādi anadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbha ādi ārambhāya vibhavavantaḥ  dṛṣṭāḥ na ca vidyutpavana ādibhiḥ aprayatna pūrvaiḥ vyabhicāraḥ teṣām api kalpanā āspada tayā vyabhicāra nidarśanatva anupapatteḥ tasmāt acetanam karma vāpūrve vā na cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam svatantram sva kārye pravartitum utsahate na ca caitanya mātram karma svarūpa sāmānya viniyoga ādi viśeṣa vijñāna śūnyam upayujyate yena tad rahita kṣetrajña mātra adhiṣṭhānena siddha sādhya tvam udbhāvyeta tasmāt tad tad prāsāda aṭṭāla gopura toraṇa ādi upajana nidarśana sahasraiḥ su pariniścitam yathā cetana adhiṣṭhānāt acetanānām kārya ārambhaka tvam iti tathā caitanyam devatāyāḥ  asati bādhake śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa prasiddham na śakyam pratiṣedhdhum iti api spaṣṭam niraṭaṅki devatā adhikaraṇe laukikaḥ ca īśvaraḥ  dāna paricaraṇa praṇāmañjali karaṇa stuti mayībhiḥ ati śraddhā garbhābhiḥ bhaktibhiḥ ārādhitaḥ prasannaḥ sva anurūpam ārādhakāya phalam prayacchati virodhataḥ ca apa kriyābhiḥ virodhakāya āhitām iti api su prasiddham tad iha kevalam karma vāpūrvam vā cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam acetanam phalam prasūta iti dṛṣṭa viruddham yathā vinaṣṭam karma na phalam prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭa virodhāt evam iha api iti tathā deva pūjā acmakaḥ  yāgaḥ  devatām na prasādayan phalam prasūta iti api dṛṣṭa viruddham na hi rāja pūjā ātmakam ārādhanam rājānam aprasādya phalāya kalpate tasmāt dṛṣṭa anuguṇyāya yāga ādibhiḥ api devatā prasattiḥ utpādyate tathā ca devatā prasādāt eva sthāyinaḥ phala utpatteḥ upapatteḥ kṛtam apūrveṇa evam aśubhena api karmaṇā devatā virodhanam śruti smṛti prasiddham tatas  sthāyinaḥ  aniṣṭa phala prasavaḥ na ca śubha aśubha kāriṇām tad anurūpam phalam prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatī iti yujyate na hi rājā sādhu kāriṇam anugṛhṇan nigṛhṇan vā pāpa kāriṇam bhavati dviṣṭaḥ  raktaḥ  vā tadvat alaukikaḥ  api īśvaraḥ yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpatti apūrvāṇām aṅga apūrvāṇām ca upayogaḥ evam pradhāna ārādhane aṅga ārādhanānām utpatti ārādhanānām ca upayogaḥ svāmi ārādhana iva tad amātya tad praṇayi jana ārādhanānām iti sarve samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt tasmāt dṛṣṭa avirodhena devatā ārādhanāt  phalam na tu apūrvāt karmaṇaḥ  vā kevalāt virodhataḥ  hetu vyapadeśaḥ ca śrautaḥ smārtaḥ ca vyākhyātaḥ ye punar antaryimi vyāpārāyā phala utpādanāyā nitya tvam sarva sādhāraṇa tvam iti manyamānā bhāṣya kārīyam adhikaraṇam dūṣa vibhāge bhāmatyām tṛtīyasya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ iti tṛtīya adhyāyasya tad tvampadārtha pariśodhana ākhyaḥ  dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ tṛtīyā adhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ sarva vedānta pratyayam codanā ādi aviśeṣāt pūrveṇa saṃgatim āha vyākhyātam vijñeyasya brahmaṇa iti nirūpa ādhi brahma tattva gocaram vijñānam manvāna ākṣipati nanu vijñeyam brahma iti sāvayavasya hi avayavānām bhedāt tad avayava viśiṣṭa brahma gocarāṇi vijñānāni gocara bhedāt bhidyeran  iti vayavā brahmaṇaḥ  nirākṛtāḥ pūrva apara ādi iti anena na ca nānā svabhāvam brahma yatas  svabhāva bhedāt bhinnāni jñānāni iti uktam eka rasam iti dhanaṅ kaṭhinam nanu ekam api aneka rūpam loke dṛṣṭam yathā somaśarma ekaḥ  api ācāryaḥ  māyula pitā putraḥ  bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottama iti aneka rūpa iti ata uktam eka rūpa tvāt ca ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tu anekākāraṇī iti uktam aneka rūpāṇi rūpam ākāraḥ samādhatte ucyate sa guṇa iti tad tad guṇa upādhāna brahma viṣayā upāsanāḥ prāṇa ādi viṣayāḥ ca dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭakamuktiphalā viṣaya bhedāt bhidyanta iti arthaḥ tatas  upapannaḥ  vimarśa iti āha teṣu eṣā cintā pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti tatra iti nāmnaḥ tāvat iti asti aatha eṣa jyotiḥ etena sahasra dakṣiṇena yajeta iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim yajeta iti saṃnihita jyotiṣṭoma anuvādena sahasra dakṣiṇā lakṣaṇa guṇa vidhānam uta etad guṇa viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhānam iti kim tāvat  prāptam jyotiṣṭomasya prakrānta tvāt yajeta iti tad anuvādāt jyotiḥ iti prātipadika mātram paṭhitvā etena iti anukṛṣya karma sāmāna adhikaraṇyena karma nāma vyavasthāpanāt  karmaṇaḥ ca anuvādya tvena tad tantrasya nāmnaḥ  api tathā eva vyavasthāpanāt  jyotiḥ śabdasya avasante vasante jyotiṣā iti ca jyotiṣṭome yoga darśanāt  nāma eka deśena ca nāma upalakṣaṇasya loka siddha tvāt bhīmasena upalakṣaṇa bhīma padavat  athaśabdasya ca anantarya arthasya asaṃbandhi tve anupapatteḥ guṇa viśiṣṭa karma antara vidheḥ ca guṇa mātra vidhānasya lāghavāt  dvādaśa śata dakṣiṇāyāḥ ca utpatti aśiṣṭa tayā sama śiṣṭa tayā sahasra dakṣiṇayā saha vikalpa upapatteḥ prakṛtasya eva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasra dakṣiṇā lakṣaṇa guṇa vidhāna artham ayam anuvādaḥ  na tu karma antaram iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate bhavet pūrvasmin guṇa vidhiḥ yadi tad eva prakaraṇam syāt  vicchinnam tu tad  tathā hi saṃnidhau  api pūrva asaṃbaddha artham saṃjñā antaram pratīyamānam aanyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti nyāyāt utsargator atha antara artha tvāt pūrva buddhim vyavacchinatti apūrva buddhim ca prasūta iti loka siddham na jātu dehi devadattāya gām atha devāya vājinam iti deva śabdāt devadattam vāji bhājam avasyanti laukikāḥ tathā ca upariṣṭāt  ayajeta iti śrūyamāṇam asaṃbaddha artha pada vyavāyāt tad karma buddhi manāt adhat tatra guṇa vidhāna mātrā samartham karma antaram eva vidhatte na ca ekatra anupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥ śabdaḥ  jyotiṣṭome pravṛtta iti asatyām anupapattau lākṣaṇikaḥ  yuktaḥ na hi gāṅgāyām ghoṣa iti atra gāṅgā padam lākṣaṇikam iti mīnaḥ  gāṅgāyām iti atra api lākṣaṇikam bhavati bhede api ca prathamam saṃjñā antareṇa ullikhite yaji śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyam karma nāma dheya tā mātra tām āvahati na tu saṃjñā antara upajanitām bheda dhiyam apanetum utsahate tathā cātha śabdaḥ  adhikāra arthaḥ prakaraṇa antara tām avadyotayati eṣa śabdaḥ ca adhikriyamāṇa parāmarśaka iti saḥ  ayam saṃjñā antarāt bheda iti bhavatu saṃjñā antarāt karma bhedaḥ prastute tu kim āyātam iti ata āha asti ca atra vedānta antara vihiteṣu iti yathā eva kāṭhaka ādi samākhyā granthe prayujyanta evam jñāne api laukikāḥ na ca asti viśeṣaḥ  yatas  granthe mukhya avijñāne gauṇī bhavet  praṇayanam ca grantha jñānayoḥ abhinnam pravṛtti nimittam tasmāt jñānasya api vācikā samākhyā tathā ca yadā jyotiṣṭoma saṃnidhau śrūyamāṇam samākhyā antaram tad pratikam api karmaṇaḥ  bhedakam tadā kā eva kathā śākhā antarīye viprakṛṣṭatame atad pratīka bhūta samākhya antara abhidheye jñāta iti tathā rūpa bhedaḥ  api karma bhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddhaḥ  yathā avaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyaḥ  vājinam iti evamādiṣu idam āmnayate atapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā iti atra hi dravya devatā saṃbandha anumitaḥ  yāgaḥ  vidhīyate tad ananta caram cadamāmnāyate avājibhyaḥ  vājinam iti atra idam saṃdihyate kim pūrvā asmin  eva karmaṇi vājinam guṇa u vidhīyate uta karma antaram dravya devatā antara viśiṣṭam apūrvam vidhīyata iti kim tāvat  prāptam dravya devatā antara viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhau vidhi gaurava prasaṅgāt  karma antarā pūrva antara kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt ca na karma antara vidhānam api tu pūrvasmin  eva karmaṇi vājina dravya vidhiḥ na ca utpatti śiṣṭam ikṣā guṇa avarodhāt tatra vājinam alabdha avakāśam karma antaram gocarayati iti yuktam ubhayoḥ api vākyayoḥ sama samaya pravṛtteḥ āmikṣa avājinayoḥ utpattau samam śiṣyamāṇa tvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭa tvam tad katham anayā avaruddham karma na vājinam niviśet  na ca vaiśvadevī iti atra śrauta āmikṣā saṃbandhaḥ  viśveṣām devānām yena vājina saṃbandhāt vākya gamyāt balavān bhavet ubhayoḥ api pada antara apekṣa pratīti tayā vākya gamyatva aviśeṣāt naḥ khalu vaiśvadevī iti ukte āmikṣāpada an apekṣām āmikṣā madhyavasyāmaḥ astu vā śrauta tvam tathā api vājibhya iti padam vājam annam āmikṣā tad eṣām asti iti vyutpattyā tad saṃbandhinaḥ  viśvān devān upalakṣayati yadi api viśvadeva śabdāt vāji padam bhinnam yena ca śabdena codanā tena eva uddeśe devatā tvam na śabda antareṇa anyathārtha eka tvena sūrya āditya padayoḥ sūrya āditya carvoḥ eka daivatya prasaṅgāt  tathā api vājinnitīneḥ sarva nāma arthe smaraṇāt  saṃnihitasya ca sarva nāma artha tvāt viśveṣām devānām ca viśvadeva āpadena saṃnidhāpanāt tad pada puraḥsarā eva ete vāji padena upasthāpya na tu sūrya āditya padavat svatantrāḥ tathā ca tad upalakṣaṇa artham vāji padam viśvadeva upahitām eva devatām upalakṣayati iti na śabda antarāt devatā bhedaḥ tatas ca āmikṣā saṃbandha upajīvanena viśvebhyaḥ  vājinam vidhīyamānam na āmikṣayā bādhyate kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karma antaram api tu vākyābhyām dravya yuktam ekam karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate syāt etad evam yadi vaiśvadevī iti tad hita śruti āmikṣā na ucyeta tad hitasya tvasya iti sarva nāma arthe smaraṇāt  saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarva nāma artha tvāt tatra eva tad hitasya api vṛttiḥ natu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu na tad saṃbandhe na api tad saṃbandhi mātre nanu evam sati kasmāt vaiśvadevī śabda mātrāt eva nāmikṣām pratīmaḥ kim iti cāmikṣā padam apekṣāmahe tad hita antasya padasya abhidhāna aparyavasānān na pratīmaḥ tad paryavasānāya ca apekṣamahe avasita abhidhānam hi padam samartham arthadhiyam ādhātum idam tu saṃnihita viśeṣa abhidhāyi tad saṃnidhim apekṣamāṇam saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣa āpadam apekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpada anapekṣa āmikṣā pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ kutaḥ vā tatra anapekṣā atas ca satyām api pada antara apekṣāyām yad padam pada antara apekṣam abhidhatte tad pramāṇa bhūta prathama bhāvi padau  agamya tvāt śrautam balīyaḥ ca yad tu paryavasita abhidhāna pada abhihita padārtha vagam agamyam tad tad carama pratīti vākya gamyam durbalam ca iti tad hita śruti avagata āmikṣā lakṣaṇa guṇa avarodhāt pūrva karma asaṃyogi vājina dravyam sa saṃbandhi pūrvasmāt bhinatti vāji padam kathañcid yaugikam sa apekṣā vṛtti viśvadeva śabdām devatām vaiśvadevī padāt āmikṣā dravyam pratyupasarjanībhūtām avagatām upalakṣayiṣyati prakṛtam hi sarva nāma pada gocaraḥ pradhānam ca prakṛtam ucyate na upasarjanam prāmāṇike ca vidhi kalpanā gaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattva viṣaya tvāt tasmāt yathā iha pūrva karma asaṃbhavinaḥ  guṇāt karma bheda evam iha api pañca agni vidyāyāḥ ṣaṣ agni vidyā bhinnā evam prāṇa saṃvāda iṣu unādhika bhāvena vidyā beda iti tathā dharma viśeṣaḥ  api karma bhedasya pratipādaka iti tathā hi kārīri vākyāni adhīyānāḥ taittirīyā bhūmau bhojanam ācaranti na ācaranti anye tathā agnim adhīyānāḥ kecid upādhyāyasya uda kumbham āharanti na āharanti anye tathā aśvamedha dhīyānāḥ kecid aśvasya ghāsam ānayanti nānayanti anye kecid ti anye kecidtva ācaranti anyam eva dharmam na ca tāni eva karmāṇi bhūmi bhojana ādi janitam upakāram ākāṅkṣanti na ākāṅkṣanti ca iti yujyate atas  avagamyate bhinnāni tāsu śākhāsu karmāṇi iti astu prastute kim āyātam iti ata āha asti ca atra iti anyeṣām śākhinām na asti iti śeṣaḥ evam punaruktyādayaḥ  api iti samidhaḥ  yajati ityādiṣu pañca kṛtvā u abhyastaḥ  yajati śabdaḥ tatra kim ekā karma bhāvanā kiṃvā pañca eva iti kim tāvat prāptam dhātu artha anubandha bhedena śabda antara adhikaraṇe bhāvanā bheda abhidhānāt dhātu arthasya ca dhātu bhedam antareṇa bheda anupapatteḥ asamidhaḥ  yajati iti prathama bhāvinā vākyena vihitā karma bhāvanā viparīvartamāna uparitanaiḥ vākyaranu udyate na ca prayojana abhāvāt ananuvādaḥ pramāṇa siddhasya aprayojanasya ananuyojya tvāt  karma bhāvanā bhede ca aneka apūrva kalpanā prasaṅgāt eka apūrvavāntara vyāpāram ekam karma iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate paraspara anapekṣāṇi hi samidh ādi vākyāni iti sarvāṇi eva prāthamya arhaṇī api yugapad adhyayana anupapatteḥ krameṇa adhītāni iti na tu ayam eṣām prayojakaḥ kramaḥ paraspara apekṣāṇām eka vākya tve hi prayojakaḥ syāt  tena prāthamyā bhāvāt  prāptam iti eva na asti iti kasya kaḥ  anuvādaḥ kathañcid va parivṛtti mātrasya autsargikā pravṛtta pravartanā lakṣaṇa vidhitva apavāda sāmarthya abhāvāt guṇa śravaṇe hi guṇa viśiṣṭa karma vidhāne vidhi gaurava bhiyā guṇa mātra vidhāna lāghavāya karma anuvādapekṣāyām viparivṛtteḥ upakāraḥ yathā adadhnā juheti iti dadhi vidhi pare vākye viparivṛtti apekṣāyām aagnihotram juheti iti vihitasya homasya viparīvartamānasya anuvādaḥ na ca atra guṇāt bhedaḥ samidh ādi padānām karma nāmadheyānām guṇa vacanatva abhāvāt agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā ca kiṃvacana vihita kiṅkarma anuvādena kasya guṇa vidhi tvam iti na vinigamyate na ca apūrvā nāma jyotiḥ ādivat vidhāna saṃbandham prathamam avagatam yatas  pūrva buddhi vicchedena vidhīyamānam ka ma pūrvasmāt saṃjñātaḥ  vyavacchindyāt  kintu prathamata eva karma sāmānādhi karaṇyena avagatāḥ samidh ādayaḥ tad vaśāt karma nāmadheyatām pratipadyamānā ākhyātasya anuvāda tve anuvādā vidhi tve vidhayaḥ  na tu svātantryeṇa kasyacid īśate tasmāt  svarasa siddha aprāpta karma vidhi para tvāt karmaṇi ayam abhyāsaḥ  bhāvanā anubandha bhūtāni bhindānaḥ  bhāvanām bhinatti yathā tathā śākhā antara vihitā api vidyāḥ śākhā antara vihita abhyaḥ  vidyā abhyaḥ  abhyāsaḥ  bhetsyati iti aśakteḥ ca na hi ekaḥ puruṣaḥ sarva vedānta pratyaya ātmikām upāsanām upasaṃhartum śaknoti sarva vedānta adhyayanā sāmarthyāt anadhīta artha upasaṃhāre adhyayana vidhāna vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt  pratiśākham bhede tu upāsanānām na ayam doṣaḥ samāpti bhedāt ca keṣāñcid  śākhinā amoṅkāra sārvātmya kathane samāptiḥ keṣāñcid anyatra tasmāt api upāsana abhedaḥ anya artha darśanāt api bhedaḥ tathā hi anaitat acīrṇa vrataḥ  adhīte iti acīrṇa vratasya adhyayana abhāva darśanāt upāsana abhāvaḥ kkacit acīrṇa vratasya adhyayana darśanāt upāsana avagamyate tasmāt upāsana abheda iti atra siddhāntam āha sarva vedānta pratyayam ced ana ādya viśeṣāt tad vyācaṣṭe sarva vedānta pratyayāni sarva vedānta pramāṇāni vijñānāni tasmin  tasmin vedānte tāni tāni eva bhavitum arhanti yāni ekasmin vedānte tāni eva vedānta antareṣu api iti arthaḥ codanā ādi aviśeṣāt ādi śabdena saṃyoga rūpa ākhyāḥ saṃgṛhyante atra ca codyata iti codanā puruṣa prayatnaḥ sa hi puruṣasya vyāpāraḥ tatra khalu ayam homa ādi dhātu artha avicchinne pravartate tasya devatā uddeśena tyāgasya āsecana ādikasya avacchedyaḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ sa eva śākhā antare yathā evam iha api prāṇa jyeṣṭhatva śreṣṭhatva vedana viṣayaḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ sa eva śākhā antareṣu api iti evam phala saṃyogaḥ  api jyeṣṭha śreṣṭha bhavana lakṣaṇaḥ sa eva rūpam api tad eva yathā yāgasya yad ekasyām śākhāyām dravya devatā rūpam tad eva śākhā antareṣu api iti evam vedanasya api yad ekatra prāṇa jyeṣṭhatva śreṣṭhatva rūpam viṣayaḥ tad śākhā antareṣu api iti kañcid viśeṣam iti yuktam yad agnīṣomīyasya utpannasya paścāt ekādaśa kapālatva ādi saṃbandhe api abheda iti yathā utpannasya tasya sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt iha tu agniṣu utvapatti gata eva guṇa bheda iti katham vaiśvadevī ivat na bhedaka iti viśeṣaḥ tam imam viśeṣam abhipretya āśaṅkate sūtra kāraḥ bhedāt na iti ced iti parihāraḥ sūtra avayavaḥ na ekasyām api iti pañca eva sāṃpādikā agnayaḥ  vājasaneyinām api chāndogyānām iva vidhīyante ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu agniḥ saṃpad vyatiḥ ekāyānu udyate na tu vidhīyate vaiśvadevyām tu utpattau guṇa u vidhīyata iti bhavatu bhedaḥ athavā chāndogyānām api ṣaṣṭhaḥ  agniḥ paṭhyata eva athavā bhavatu vājasaneyinām ṣaṣṭha agni vidhānam mā ca bhūcchāndogyānām tathā api pañcatva saṃkhyāyāḥ  avidhānāt na utpatti śiṣṭa tvam
