saṃkhyāyāḥ kintu utpanneṣu agniṣu pracaya śiṣṭā saṃkhyā anūdyate sāṃpādika anagnīnvat śetum tena yeṣām utpattiḥ teṣām pratyabhijñānāt  apratyabhijñāyamānāyāḥ ca saṃkhyāyāḥ  anuvādya tvena anutpatteḥ vidhīyamānasya ca adhikasya ṣoḍaśi grahaṇavat vikalpa saṃbhavān na śākhā antare jñāna bhedaḥ utpatti śiṣṭa tve asiddhe prāṇa saṃvāda āt ayaḥ  api prāṇa saṃvāda āt ayaḥ  api bhavanti pratyabhijñānāt abhinnāḥ tāsu tāsu śākhāsu iti svādhyāyasya tathā tvena hi samācāre adhikārāt ca savavat ca tad niyamaḥ yaiḥ ātharvaṇika grantha upāyā vidyā veditavyām teṣām eva śiraḥ vrata pūrva adhyayana prāpta grantha bodhitā phalam prayacchati na anyathā anyeṣām tu chāndogya ādīnām sā eva vidyā cīrṇa śiraḥ vratānām phala dā iti ātharvaṇa grantha adhyayana saṃbandhāt avagamyate tad saṃbandhaḥ ca veda vratena iti anaitat acīrṇa vrataḥ  adhīte iti samāmnānāt avagamyate ateṣām eva etām brahma vidyām vadeta iti vidyā saṃyoge api etām iti prakṛta parāmarśinā sarva nāmnā adhyāyana saṃbandha avirodhāt ātharchavi hitā eva vidyā ucyata iti savā homāḥ sapta saurya ādayaḥ śata odana antā śata odana antā ātharvaṇikānām ta ekasmin  eva artharvaṇike agnau kriyante na tretāyām vidyā eka tvam darśayati ca bhūyas bhūyas  vidyā eka tvasya veda darśanāt yatra api sa guṇa brahma vidyānām na sākṣāt veda eka tvam āha tāsām api tad prāya paṭhitānām tadvidhānām prāya darśanāt eka tvam eva tathā hi agrya prāye likhitam dṛṣṭvā bhavet ayam agrya iti buddhiḥ iti yad ca kāṭhaka ādi samākhyayā upāsanā bheda iti tad ayuktam etā hi pauruṣeyyaḥ samākhyāḥ kāṭaka ādi pravacana yogāt tāsām śākhānām na tu upāsanānām na hi etāḥ kāṭha ādibhiḥ proktā na ca kaṭhā ādi anuṣṭhānam āsām itara anuṣṭhānebhyaḥ  viśeṣyate na ca kāṭha proktā nimitta mātreṇa granthe pravṛttau tad yogāt ca kathañcid lakṣaṇayā upāsanāsu pravṛttau saṃbhavantyām upāsana abhidhānām api āsām śakyam kalpayitum na ca tad bheda abhedau jñāna bheda abheda prayojakau mā bhūt yathā svam āsāma bhedāt jñānānām eka śākhā gatānām aikyam kaṭha ādi puruṣa pravacana nimittāḥ ca etāḥ samākhyāḥ kaṭha ādibhyaḥ prāk  na āsan  iti tad nibandhanaḥ  jñāna bhedaḥ  na āsīt idānīm ca asti iti durghaṭam āpadyeta tasmāt na samākhyātaḥ  bhedaḥ abhyāsaḥ  api na atra bhedakaḥ yuktam yad eka śākhā gataḥ  yajati abhyāsaḥ samidh ādīnām bhedaka iti tatra hi vidhi tvam autsargikam ajñāta jñāpanam apravṛtta pravartanam ca kupyeyātām aśākhā antare tu adhyetṛ puruṣa bhedāt ekatve api na autsragika vidhitva vyāka upa iti aśaktiḥ api na bheda hetuḥ svādhyāyaḥ  adhyetavya iti sva śākhāyām adhyayana niyamaḥ tatas ca śākhā antara parīyān arthān anyebhyaḥ tad vidyebhyaḥ  adhigamya upasaṃhariṣyati samāptiḥ ca ekasmin  api tad saṃbandhini samāpte tasya vyapadiśyate yathā adhvaryave karmaṇi jyotiṣṭomasya samāpti vyapadiśanti ajyotiṣṭomaḥ samāptaḥ iti tasmāt samāpti bhedaḥ  api na sādhanam upāsana abhedasya tad evam asati bādhake codanā ādi aviśeṣāt sarva vedānta pratyayāni karmāṇi tāni tāni eva iti siddham kañcid viśeṣam āśaṅkya pūrva tantra prasādhitam vakṣyamāṇa artha siddhi artham artham āha rasa sūtrakṛt  cintā prayojana pradarśana artham sūtram upasaṃhāroḥ atha abhedāt vidhi śeṣavat samāne ca atra aidam āśaṅkate bhavatu sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam vijñānam tathā api śākhā antara uktānām tad aṅga antarāṇām na śākhā antara ukte tasmin  upasaṃhāraḥ  bhavitum arhati tasya ekasya karmaṇaḥ  yāvat mātram aṅga jātam ekasyām śākhāyām vihitam tāvna mātreṇa eva upakāra siddheḥ adhika anapekṣaṇāt apekṣaṇe ca adhikam api tatra vidhīyate na ca vihitam tasmāt yathā naimittikam karma sakala aṅgavat vihitam api aśaktau yāvat śakyam aṅgam anuṣṭhātum tāvat mātra janyena upakāreṇa aupakṛtam bhavati evam iha api aṅga antara avidhānāt eva bhaviṣyati iti evam prāpta ucyate sarvatra ekatve karmaṇaḥ sthite gṛhamedhīya nyāyena na upakāra avacchedaḥ  yujyate na hi tad eva karma sat tad aṅgam apekṣate na apekṣate ca iti yujyate naimittike tu nimitta anurodhāt avaśya kartavye sarva aṅga upasaṃhārasya sadātanatva asaṃbhavāt upakāra avacchedaḥ kalpyate prākṛta upakāra piṇḍe ca udaka prāpte ājya bhāga vidhānāt gṛhamedhīye api upakāra avacchedaḥ syāt  iha tu śākhā antare katipaya aṅga vidhānam tāni vidhatte na itarāṇi parisaṃcaṣṭe na ca tad upakāra piṇḍe ca udaka prāpte ājya bhagavat tanmātra vidhānam tasmāt tattvena karmaṇām sarva aṅga saṅgama autsargi kaḥ  asati balavati bādhake na apavaditum yukta iti anyathātvam śabdāt iti ced na aviśeṣāt dvayā dvi prakārāḥ prājāpatyā devāḥ ca asurāḥ ca tatas  kānīyasā eva devāḥ  jyāyasā asurāḥ śāstra janyayā sāttvikyā buddhyā saṃpannā devāḥ te hi dīvyanta iti devāḥ śāstra yuktya parikalpita matayaḥ tāmasa vṛtti pradhānā asurā asubhiḥ prāṇaiḥ anindriyaiḥ agṛhītaiḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu ramanta iti asurā ata eva te jyāyāṃsaḥ yatas  amī tattva jñānavantaḥ kānīyasā astu devāḥ ajñāna pūrvaka tvāt tattva jñānasya prāṇasya prajāpateḥ sāttvika vṛtti udbhavaḥ tāmasa vṛtti abhibhavaḥ kadācid  kadācid tāmasa vṛtti udbhavaḥ  abhibhavaḥ ca sāttvikyā vṛttaiḥ sā iyam spardhā te ha devāḥ  ūcuḥ hanta asurān yajña udgīthena atyayāma asurān jayāmā asmin  ābhi cārike yajña udgītha lakṣaṇa sāma bhakti upalakṣitena udgātreṇa karmaṇā uti te ha vācam ūcuḥ iti ādinā saṃdarbheṇa vāc prāṇa cakṣuḥ śrotra manasā āmāsura pāpma viddha tayā ninditvā atha hemam āsanyam āsye ūvam āsanyam mukha antar bila stham mukhyam prāṇam prāṇa abhimānavatīm devatām ūcuḥ tvam na udgāya iti tathā iti abhyupagamya tebhya eva prāṇa udagāyat  te asurā viduḥ anena prāṇena udgātrā naḥ asmān devāḥ  atyeṣyanti iti tam abhidrutya pāpmanā vidhi an  surā yathā aśmānam ṛtvā prāpya mṛd tvāt loṣṭaḥ  vā vidhvaṃsata evam vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañcaḥ  asurā vineśuḥ tad etad saṃkṣipya āha vājasaneyaka iti tathā chāndogye api etad uktam iti āha tathā chāndogye api iti viṣayam darśayitvā vimṛśati tatra saṃśaya iti pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti vidyā eka tvam iti pūrva pakṣam ākṣipati nanu na yuktam iti ekatra udgātṛ tvena ucyate prāṇa ekatra ca udgāna tvena kriyākartroḥ ca sphuṭaḥ  bheda iti arthaḥ samādhatte na eṣa doṣa iti bahutara rūpa pratyabhijñā nāda pratyabhijñāyamānam kiñcid lakṣaṇayā netavyam na kevalam śākhā antare ekasyām api śākhāyām dṛṣṭam etad na ca tatra vidyā bheda iti āha vājasanetyake api ca iti bahutara rūpa pratyabhijñāna anugrahāya com iti anena api udgītha avayavena udgītha eva lakṣaṇīya iti pūrva pakṣaḥ na vā prakaraṇa bhedāt paraḥ varīyaḥ tu ādivat  bahutara pratyabhijñāne api upakrama bhedāt tanu rodhena ca upasaṃhāra varṇanāt ekasmin vākye tasya eva ca udgīthasya puna jhapunaḥ saṃkīrtanāt lakṣaṇāyām ca chāndogye vājasaneyake pramāṇa abhāvāt vidyā bheda iti rāddha antar  oṃkārasya upāsya tvam prastutya rasa tama ādi guṇa upavyākhyānam oṅkārasya oṃkāra tathā hi bhūta pṛthivī oṣadhi puruṣa vāc ṛksāmnām pūrvasya uttaram uttaram rasa tayā sāratayā uktam teṣām sarveṣām rasatama oṃkāra uktaḥ chāndogye na ca vivakṣita artha bheda iti ekatra udgītha udgātārau  upāsya tvena vivakṣitau  ekatra tad avayava oṃkāra iti tathā hi abhyudaya vākye iti evam hi śrūyate avivā etam prajayā paśubhiḥ ardhayati vardhayati asya bhrātṛvyam yasya haviḥ niruptam purastāt candramā abhyudeti sa tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet ye madhyamāḥ syuḥ tān agnaye dātre puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālam nirvapedye sthiviṣṭhāḥ tān indrāya pradātre dadhan  carum ye kṣodiṣṭhāḥ tān viṣṇave śipi viṣṭāya śṛte carum iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kāla ārādhe yāga antaram idam codyata uta teṣu eva karmasu prakṛteṣu kāla aparādhe nimitte devatā apanaya iti eṣa tāvat atra viṣayaḥ amāvāsyāyām eva darśa karma artham vedi kriyā agni praṇayana kriyā vrata ādiḥ ca yajamāna saṃskāraḥ dadhi arthaḥ ca dohaḥ pratipadi ca darśa karma pravṛttiḥ iti anuṣṭhāna kramaḥ tāttvikaḥ yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścid bhama nibandhanāt caturdaśyām eva amāvāsya abuddhau pravṛtta prayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatra idam śrūyate ayasya haviḥ niruptam iti tena yajamānena abhyuditena amāvāsyāyām eva nimitta adhikāram parisamāpya puras tad ahar eva vedi ut dharaṇa ādi karma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ tatra ābhāyudaye kim naimittikam idam karma antaram darśāt ca udyata uta tasmin  eva darśa karmaṇi pūrva devatāpanayanena devana antaram vidhīyata iti tatra haviḥ bhāga mātra śravaṇāt caru vidhāna sāmarthyāt ca karma antaram yadi hi pūrva devatā abhyaḥ  havīṃṣi vibhajet iti śrūyate tatas tāni eva havīṃṣi devatā antareṇa yujyamānāni na karma antaram gamayitum arhanti kintu prakṛtam eva karma tad ha viṣkam apanīta pūrta devatākam devatā antara yuktam syāt  atra punar tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti haviṣa eva madhyama ādi krameṇa vibhāga śravaṇāt anapanītā haviṣi pūrvadevatā iti pūrva davata avaruddhe haviṣi devatā antaram alabdha avakāśam śrūyamāṇam karma antaram eva gocarayet  apica prāpte pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnaḥ taṇḍulānām ca indra ādi devatā saṃbandhaḥ ca vidhātavyaḥ caru tvam ca atra vihitam na asti iti tad apiva vidhātavyam tathā prāpte karmaṇi aneka guṇa vidhānāt vākyam bhidyeta karma antaram tu apūrvam śakyam ekena eva prayatnena aneka guṇa viśiṣṭam vidhātum iti nimitte karma antaram eva vidhīyate darśaḥ tu lupyate kāla aparādhāt iti prāpta ucyate na karma antaram pūrva davatātaḥ  haviṣaḥ  vibhāga pūrvam nimitte devatā antara vidhānāt carvarthasya ca artha prāpteḥ bhavet etad evam yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti taṇḍulānām tredhā vibhāga vidhāna param etad vākyam syāt api tu vākya antara prāptam taṇḍulānām tredhātvam anūdya vibhajet iti etāvat vidhatte tatra vākyāni apanīte pūrvavat  devatā saṃbandhe haviṣaḥ tasmin  eva karmaṇi apratyūham devatā antara saṃbandham vidhātum śaknuvanti tathā ca dravya mukhena prakṛta mukha pratyabhijñānāt  devatā antara saṃbandhe api na karma antara kalpanā bhavitum arhati tatas ca samāpte api naimittika adhikāra siddhi artham tāni eva punar  karmāṇi anuṣṭheyāni na ca dadhani carum iti caru saptamī arthayoḥ vidhānam tayoḥ api artha prāpta tvāt  prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍula peṣaṇa prathanam puroḍāśa pāka ādi dadhi payasī ca prāptāni tatra abhyudaya nimitte dadhi yuktānām payaḥ yuktānām ca taṇḍulānām vibhajet iti vākyena pūrva devatā apanayam kṛtvā ye madhyamā ityādibhiḥ vākyaiḥ devatā antara saṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ na ca prabhūta dhipayaḥ saṃsaktaiḥ alpaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ puroḍāśa kriyā saṃbhavati iti puroḍāśa nivṛttau tad arthasya prathanasya api nivṛttiḥ anivṛttaḥ tu pākaḥ  apavāda abhāvāt tathā ca artha prāptaḥ codyate bhavatu vā aneka vākya kalpanam prakṛta adhikāra avagama balāt asya api nyāyya tvāt iti tasmāt tad eva idam karma na tu karma antaram iti siddham paśu kāma vākye tu apūrva karma vidhiḥ abhyudaya vākya sārūpye api ayaḥ paśu kāmaḥ syāt saḥ  amāvāsyām iṣṭvā vatsa an apākurya āt ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ tān agnaye sa nimate aṣṭhākapālam nirvapedye madhyamāḥ tān viṣṇave śipi viṣṭāya śṛte carum ye kṣodiṣṭhāḥ tanindrāya pradātre dadhan  carum iti atra hi amāvāsyām iṣṭvā iti samāpte yāge paśu kāma iṣṭi vidhānam na atra pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ  ananu vṛtteḥ yāga antara vidhiḥ iti yuktam paras varīyaḥ tu ādivat  yathā udgītha upāsanā sāmye api āditya gata hiraṇyaśma kṣu tvā ādi guṇa viśiṣṭa udgītha upāsanātaḥ paras varīyaḥ tu aguṇa viśiṣṭa udgītha upāsanā bhinnā tadvat idam api iti parasmāt  paraḥ  varāt ca varīyān iti paras varīyān udgīthaḥ paramātma rūpaḥ saṃpannaḥ ata eva anantaḥ paramātma dṛṣṭi mudgīthe bhavayitum aākāśaḥ  hi eva ebhyaḥ  bhūtebhyaḥ  jyāyān iti ākāśa śabdena paramātmānam nirdiśati saṃjñātaḥ ced tad uktam asti tu tad api sphuṭatare medā avagame saṃjñā eka tvam nābheda sādhanam ati prasaṅga pātāt  apica śruti akṣara ālocanayām bheda pratyayaḥ antaraṅgaḥ ca anapekṣaḥ ca saṃjñā eka tvam tu śruti bāhya tayā bahis aṅgam ca pauruṣeya tayā sa apekṣam ca tasmāt urbalam nāmeda sādhanāyālam iti vyāpteḥ ca samañjasam adhyāsaḥ  nāma iti gauṇī buddhiḥ adhyāsaḥ yathā māṇavake anivṛttāyām eva māṇavaka buddhi vyāpadeśa vṛttau siṃha buddhi vyapadeśa vṛttiḥ siṃhaḥ  māṇavaka iti evam pratimāyām vāsudeva buddhiḥ nāmni ca brahmabuddhiḥ tathā uṅkāga udgītha buddhi vyapadeśau  iti apavāda ekatva viśeṣaṇāni ca uktāni eka arthe pi ca śabda dvaya prayogaḥ  dṛśyate yathā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vijñānam ānandam vyākhyāyām ca paryāyāṇam api saha prayogaḥ  yathā sindhuraḥ karī pikaḥ kokila iti vimṛśya anadhyavasāya lakṣaṇam pakṣam gṛhṇāti tatra anyatama iti siddhāntam āha idam ucyate vyāpteḥ ca pratyanuvākam pratyṛcam upakrame ca samāptau cokāraḥ sarda veda vyāpī iti kiṅgataḥ  ayam oṅkāraḥ tad tadā api ādi guṇa viśiṣṭaḥ tasmai tasmai kāma avāpti ādi phalāya upāsya tvena adhikriyata iti apekṣāyām udgītha padena iti viśiṣyate udgītha padena ukāra ādi avayava ghaṭita sāma bhakti bheda abhidhāyinā samudāyasya avayava bhāva anupapatteḥ tad saṃbandha vayava oṃkāraḥ  lakṣyate na punar oṅkāreṇa avayavina udgīthasya lakṣaṇā oṃkārasya eva upariṣṭāt tu tad tad guṇa viśiṣṭasya tad tad phala viśiṣṭasya ca upavyākhyāsyamāna tvāt  dṛṣṭaḥ ca samudāya śabdaḥ  avayave lakṣaṇayā yathā grāmaḥ  dagdhaḥ paṭaḥ dagdha iti tad eka deśa dāhe adhyāse tu lakṣaṇā phala kalpanā ca tathā hi āpti ādi guṇaka praṇava upāsanāt idamudgītha tā upāsanam praṇavasya anyat na cātra api ādi upāsaneṣu iva phalam śrūyate tasmāt  kalpanīyam udgītha saṃbandhi praṇava upāsana adhikāra pare vākye na ayam doṣaḥ apica gauṇyā vṛtteḥ lakṣaṇāvṛttiḥ balīyasī lāghavāt  lakṣaṇāyāḥ  hi lakṣaṇīya paratvam padasya tasya eva vākya artha antarbhāvāt yathā gāṅgāyām ghoṣa iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākya arthe antarbhāvaḥ  adhikaraṇa tayā gauḥ vāhīka iti atra tu gaḥ saṃbandhi tīṣṭhat mūtra purīṣa ādi lakṣaṇayā na tad paratvam gaḥ śabdasya api tu tad kakṣā adhya vasita tad guṇa yukta vāhīka paratvam iti gauṇyā vṛtteḥ durbala tvam tad idam uktam lakṣaṇāyām api tu iti gauṇī api vṛttiḥ lakṣaṇa avayava tvāt lakṣaṇa uktā yadi api vaiśvadevī padam āmikṣāyām pravartate tathā api artha medaḥ sphuṭataraḥ āmikṣā padam hi rūpeṇa āmikṣāyām pravartate vaiśvadevī padam tu tasyām eva viśvadeva viśiṣṭāyām evam hi vijñānān dayoḥ api sphuṭataraḥ pravṛtti nimitta bhedaḥ sati api brahmaṇyā ekārthye na ca vyākhyānam ubhayoḥ api prasiddha artha tvāt bhinna artha tvāt ca śeṣam ati rohita artham sarva abhedāt anyatra iti evaṃśabdasya sannihita prakāra bheda parāmarśa artha tvāt sākṣāt śabda upasthāpitasya ca saṃnidhānāt śākhā antara gatasya ca anukrama tayā ḷ  saṃnidhāna abhāvāt na kauṣītaki prāṇa saṃvāda vākye prāṇasya vasiṣṭhatva ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ upāsya tvam api tu jyeṣṭha treṣṭhatva mātreṇa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu satyam saṃnihitam parāmṛśati evaṅkāraḥ  na tu śabda upātta mātram saṃnihitam kintu yad śabda abhihita arthanā antarīyaka tayā prāptam tad api hi buddhau saṃnihitam saṃnihitam eva yathā ayasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati iti avyabhicārita kratu samanvayayā juhvā upasthāpitaḥ kratuḥ tasmāt upāsya phala pratyabhijñānāt tad avyabhicāriṇaḥ prakāra bhedasya iha an uktasya api buddhau saṃnidhānāt prakṛta parāmarśinā evaṅkāreṇa parāmarśaḥ  yukta iti siddham kauṣītaki brāhmaṇa gatena tāvat evaṅkāreṇa śakyate parāmraṣṭum tathā api abhyupetya api brūma iti āśayavatā bhāṣya kṛta uktam tathā api tasmin  eva vijñāne vājasaneyi brāhmaṇa gatena iti śruta hāniḥ iti kevalasya śrutasya hāniḥ itara sahitasya cākṣutasya kalpanā na ca iti arthaḥ atirohitam anyat  ānanda ādayaḥ pradhānasya guṇavat upāsanā vidhānasya vāstava guṇa vyākhyānāt viveka artham idam adhikaraṇam yathā ekasya brahmaṇaḥ saṃyat vāmatva ādayaḥ satya kāma ādayaḥ ca guṇā na saṃkīryeran eva ām ānanda vijñāna tvāt ayaḥ  vibhutva nityatva ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ pradeśa antara uktaiḥ na saṃkīryeran tad saṃkare vā saṃyat vāma tvāt ayaḥ  api satya kāma ādibhiḥ saṃkīryeran na hi brahmaṇaḥ  dharmiṇaḥ sattve kaścid viśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu vāstava vidheyayoḥ vastu dharma tayā ca anuṣṭheya tayā ca avyavasthā vyavasthe vyavatiṣṭhete vastu dharmaḥ  hi yāvat vastu vyavatiṣṭhate na asau  ekatra ukte anyatra anuktaḥ  na asti iti śakyam vaktum vidheyaḥ tu puruṣa prayatna tantraḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ ca yatra yāvat guṇa viśiṣṭe brahmaṇi coditaḥ sa tāvatī eva avatiṣṭhate na avihitam api guṇam cotarīkartum arhati tasya vidhi tantra tvāt vidheḥ ca vyavasthānāt  tasmāt ānanda vijñānāt ayaḥ  brahma tattva ātma tayā uktā yatra yatra brahma śrūyate tatra tatra anuktā api labhyante saṃyat vāma ādayaḥ ca upāsanā prayatna vidhi viṣayā yathāvidhi avatiṣṭhante na tu yathāvastu iti siddham priya śiraḥ tu ādīnām tu upāsya tvam āropya nyāyaḥ  darśitaḥ tasya  ḷ  tu saṃyat vāma ādiḥ uktaḥ modana mātram modaḥ pramodaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ  modaḥ tau  imau paraspara apekṣau  upacaya apacayau ādhyānāya prayojana abhāvāt indriyebhyaḥ parā hi arthā iti kim atra sarveṣām eva artha ādīnām para tvam pratipādayiṣitam āhaḥ puruṣasya eva tad pratipādana artham ca itareṣām paratva pratipādanam tatra pratyekam artha ādi paratva pratipādana śruteḥ śrūyamāṇa tad tatparatve ca saṃbhavati na tad tad ati karme sarveṣām eka paratva adhyavasānam nyāṭyam na ca prayojana abhāvāt asaṃbhavaḥ sarveṣām eva pratyekam paratva abhidhānasya adhyāna prayojana tvāt  tad tadā adhyānānām ca prayojanavattva smṛteḥ tathā hi smṛtiḥ adaśa manvantarāṇi iha tiṣṭhanti indriya cintakāḥ bhautikāḥ tu śatam pūrṇam sahasram tvā abhimānikāḥ bauddhā daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti vigata jvarāḥ pūrṇam śata sahasram tu tiṣṭhanti anyakta cintakāḥ puruṣam nirguṇam prāpya kāla saṃkhyā na vidyate iti prāmāṇikasya vākya bhedasya abhyupeya tvāt  pratyekam teṣām artha ādīnām paratva parāṇi etāni vākyāni iti prāptaya ucyate indriyebhyaḥ parā hi arthā iti eṣa tāvat saṃdarbhaḥ  vastu tattva pratipādana paraḥ pratīyate na adhyāna vidhi paraḥ tad aśruteḥ tad atra yad pratyasya sākṣāt prayojanavat tvam dṛśyate tad pratyaya para tvam sarveṣām dṛṣṭam ca viṣṇoḥ parama pada jñānasya nikhila anartha saṃsāra kāraṇa avidyā upaśamaḥ tattva jñāna udayasya viparyāsa upaśama lakṣaṇa tveta tatra tatra darśanāt  artha ādi paratva pratyayasya tu na dṛṣṭam asti prayojanam na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā nyāṭyā na ca parama puruṣa artha hetu paratve saṃbhavati avāntara puruṣa arthatā ucitā tasmāt dṛṣṭa prayojanavat tvāt  puruṣa paratva pratupādana arthaḥ  ayam saṃdarbha iti gamyate kiñca ādarāt api ayam eva asya artha  iti āha apica para pratiṣedhena iti nanu atra adhyāna vidhiḥ na asti tad katham ucyate ādhyānāya iti ata āha ādhyānāya iti ātma śabdāt ca anadhigata artha pratipādana svabhāvatva apramāṇānām viśeṣataḥ ca āgamasya puruṣa śabda vācyasya ca ātmanaḥ svayam śrutyā eva duradhigamatva avadhāraṇāt vastutas ca duradhigama tvāt artha ādīnām ca sugama tvāt tatpara tvam eva artha ādi paratva abhidhānasya iti arthaḥ śruteḥ āśaya atiśa iva āśaya atiśayaḥ tad tāt paryata iti yāvat  kiñca śruti antara apekṣitā abhidhānāt api evam eva artha ādi paratve tu sva rūpeṇa vivakṣite na apekṣitam śrutiḥ ācaṣṭe iti āha apica saḥ  adhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti iti ātma gṛhītiḥ itaravat uttarāt  śruti smṛtyorhi loka sṛṣṭiḥ parameśvara adhiṣṭhitā parameśvara hiraṇyagarbha kartṛkā upalabdhā sā iyam iha mahābhūta sargam anabhidhāya prāthamikī loka sṛṣṭiḥ upalabhyamānau  āntara īśvara kāryā prāk utpatteḥ ātma ekatva avadhāraṇam ca ava antara īśvara saṃbandhi tayā gamayati pārameśvara sargasya mahābhūta ākāśa ādi tvādasya ca tad vaiparītyāt asti hi tasya eva ekasya vikāra antara apekṣa yāgna tvam asti ca īkṣaṇam api ca etasmin  aitareyake pūrvasmin prakaraṇe prajāpati kartṛkā eva loka sṛṣṭiḥ uktā tad anusārāt api etad eva vijñāyate apica tābhyaḥ  gām ānayat iti ādayaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ śrutyā uktā viśeṣa vatsvātma paramātmaṣu prasiddhāḥ tatas  api avāntara īśvara eva vijñāyate ātma śabda prayogaḥ ca atra api dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt apara ātmā abhilāpaḥ  ayam iti prāpta ucyati paramātmanaḥ  gṛhītiḥ iha yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭi śravaṇeṣu aetasmāt ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ ityādiṣu tasmāt uttarāt sa aikṣateti īkṣaṇa pūrvaka sraṣṭṛtva śravaṇāt ātmā iti avadhāraṇāt ca etad abhisaṃhitam mukhyam tāvat  sargāt prāk kevala tvam ātma pada tvam sraṣṭṛ tvam ca parameśvarasya atra bhavataḥ tad asatyām anupapattau na anyatra vyākhyātum ucitam na ca mahābhūta sṛṣṭi anabhidhānena loka sṛṣṭi abhidhānam anupapatti bījam ākāśa pūrvikāyām vastu tas  brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā kkacid tejaḥ pūrvaka sṛṣṭi abhidhānam na virudhyate aetasmāt ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ iti darśanāt  ākāśam vāyum sṛṣṭvā iti hi tatra pūrayitavyam evahā api mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā iti kalpanīyam sarva śākhā pratyaya tvena jñānasya śruti sidvi artham aśrutā upalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyam na punar  śrute mahābhūta ādi tve sargasya śaithilyam ādaraṇīyam apica svādhyāya vidhi adhīna grahaṇaḥ  vedarāśiḥ adhyayana vidhi āpādita prayojanavat artham abhidadhānaḥ  yathā yathā prayojana ādhikyam āpnoti tathā tathā anumanyatetarām yathā ca asya brahma gocara tve parama puruṣa artha aupayika tvam na evam anya gocara tve tad idam uktam yaḥ  api ayam vyāpāra viśeṣa anugama iti na ca loka sargaḥ  api hiraṇyagarbha vyāpāraḥ  api tu tad anupraviṣṭasya paramātmana iti atra eva uktam tasmāt ātmā eva agna iti upakramāt tad vyāpāreṇa ca īkṣaṇena madhye parāmarśāt upariṣṭāt ca bheda jātam mahābhūtaiḥ saha anukamya brahma pratiṣṭhatvena brahmaṇa upasaṃhārāt brahma abhilāpa tvam eva asya iti niścīyate yatra tu puruṣavidha ādi śravaṇam tasya bhavet tu anya para tvam gati antara abhāvāt iti sarvam avadātam aparaḥ kalpaḥ sat upakramasya saṃdarbhasya ātma upakramasya ca kim aika arthyam āhosvidartha bhedaḥ tatra sat śabdasya aviśeṣeṇa ātmani ca anātmani ca pravṛtteḥ na ātma artha tvam kintu samasta vastu anugata sattā sāmānya artha tvam tathā ca upakrama bhedāt bhinna artha tvam sa ātmā tad tvam asi iti ca upasaṃhāra upakrama anurodhena saṃpatti artha tayā vyākhyeyaḥ tad hi sat sāmānyam parama ātma tayā saṃpādanīyam tad vijñānena ca sarva vijñānam mahāsāmānyasya sattāyāḥ samasta vastu vistāra vyāpi tvāt iti evam prāpta ucyate ātma gṛhītiḥ vājasaneyinām iva chāndogyānām api uttarātma ātmā tad tvam asi iti tādātmya upadeśāt astu tāvat ātma vyātiriktasya prapañcasya sat asat tvābhyām anirvācya tayā na sattvam sattvam tu ātma dhātoḥ eva tattvena nirvācya tvāt tasmāt ātmā eva san  iti abhyupetya āha sat śabdasya sattā sāmānya abhidhāyi tvāt prativyakti ca tasya pravṛtteḥ ātmani ca anyatra ca sat śabda pravṛtteḥ saṃśaye sati upasaṃhāra anurodhena sat ā iva iti ātmani eva avasthāpyate nīta artha upakrama anurodhena hi upasaṃhāra varṇanā na punar  saṃdigdha arthena upakrameṇa upasaṃhāraḥ  varṇanīyaḥ apica saṃpattau phalam kalpanīyam na ca sāmānya mātre jñāte viśeṣa jñāna saṃbhavaḥ na khalu ākārāt vṛkṣe jñāte śiṃśapa ādayaḥ tad viśeṣā jñātā bhavanti tad evam avadhāraṇa ādi sarvam anātma artha tve syāt anupapannam iti chāndogyasya ātma artha tvem eva iti siddham atra ca pūrvasmin pūrva pakṣe hiraṇyagarbha upāsanā siddhānte tu brahma bhāvanā iti kārya ākhyānāt apūrvam viṣayam āha chāndogā vājasaneyinaḥ ca iti ananam prāṇanam anaḥ prāṇaḥ tam prāṇam anagnam kurvantaḥ anagnatā cintanam iti manyanta iti mananam jñānam tad vyāna paryantam iti cintanam uktam saṃśayam āha tad kim iti khura rava mātreṇa apātata ubhaya vidhāna pakṣam gṛhītvā madhyamam pakṣam ālambate pūrva pakṣī atha vācanam eva iti yadi evam anagna tā saṃkīrtanasya kim prayojanam iti ata āha tasya eva tu stuti artham iti ayam abhisandhiḥ yadi api smārtam prāyatya artham ācamanam asti tathā api prāṇa upāsana prakaraṇe avidhānāt tad aṅga tvena aprāptam iti vidhānam arthavat bhavati anṛta vadana pratiṣedha iva smārte jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ  na anṛtam vadet iti pratiṣedhaḥ  jyotiṣṭoma aṅga tayā arthavān iti rāddhāntanam āha evam prāpta iti codayati nanu iyam śrutiḥ iti pariharati na iti tulya arthayoḥ mūla mūli bhāvaḥ  na atulya arthayoḥ iti arthaḥ abhiprāya stham pūrva pakṣa bījam nirākaroti na ca iyam śrutiḥ iti kratu artha puruṣa arthayoḥ anṛta vadana pratiṣedhayoḥ yuktam apaunaruktam iha tu smārtam ācamanam sakala karma aṅgatayā vihitam prāṇa upāsana aṅgam api iti vyāpakena smārtena ācamana vidhinā punarukta tvāt anarthakam na ca smārtasya anena paunarukyam tasya ca vyāpaka tvāt etasya ca pratiniyaviṣaya tvāt iti madhyamam pakṣam apākṛtya prathama pakṣam apākaroti ata eva ca na ubhaya vidhānam yukti antaram āha ubhaya vidhāne ca iti upasaṃharati tasmāt prāptam eva iti na ca ayam anagna tā vāda iti stotavya abhāve stutiḥ na upapadyata iti arthaḥ apica māna antara prāptena aprāptam vidheyam stūyeta na ca anagna tā saṃkalpaḥ  anyatas  prāptaḥ  yatas  stāvakaḥ  bhavet  na ca ācamanam anyatas  aprāptam yena vidheyam satstūyeta iti āha svayam ca anagna tā saṃkalpasya iti api ca ekasya karmaṇa ekārtha tā eva iti ucitam tasya balavat pramāṇa vaśāt ananya k ati tve sati aneka artha tā kalpyate saṃkalpe tu karma antare vidhīyamāne na ayam doṣa iti āha na ca evam sati ekasya ācamanasya iti apica dṛṣṭicodanā sāhaca yāt dṛṣṭi codanā eva nyāṭyā na ca ācamana codanā iti āha apica yad idam kiñca iti yathā hi śva ādi maryādasya annasyāttumaśakya tvāt anna dṛṣṭiḥ ca udyate evam iha api apām paridhāna asaṃbhavāt dṛṣṭiḥ eva codyata iti anna dṛṣṭi vidhi sāhacaryāt gamyate aśabda tvam ca yadi api dṛṣṭi abhyavahārayoḥ tulyam tathā api dṛṣṭiḥ śābda dṛśyanāntarīyaka tayā sākṣāt śabdena kriyamāṇa upalabhyate abhyavahāraḥ tu adhyāharaṇīyaḥ kathañcid yogyatā mātreṇa iti viśeṣaḥ kiñca chāndogyānām vājasaneyinām ca ācamane prāyeṇa ācāmanti iti vartamāna apadeśaḥ evam yatra api vidhi vibhaktiḥ tatra api jartila yavāgvavā vā juhuyāt itivat vidhi tvam avivakṣitam manyanta iti tvad prāpta artha tvāt samidhaḥ yajati ityādivat vidhiḥ eva iti āha api cā ācāmanti iti śeṣam ati rohita artham samāna  evam ca abhedāt  iha abhyāsa adhikaraṇa nyāyena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayoḥ vidyā vidhyoḥ eka śākhā gatayoḥ agṛhmamāṇa viśeṣa tayā kasya kaḥ  anuvāda iti viniścaya abhāvāt ajñāta jñāpana apravṛtta pravartana arūpasya ca vidhi tvasya svarasa siddheḥ ubhayatra upasanā bhedaḥ na ca guṇa antara vidhānāya ekatra anuvāda ubhayatra api guṇa antara vidhāna upalabdheḥ vinigamanā hetu abhāvāt samāna guṇa an abhidhāna prasaṅgāt ca tasmāt samidhaḥ  yajati ityādivat abhyāsāt upāsana abheda iti prāpta ucyate aika karmyam eka tvena pratyabhijñānāt  na ca agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tā tatra bhūyāṃsaḥ  guṇā yasya karmaṇaḥ  vidhīyante tatra tasya pradhānasya vidhiḥ itaratra tu tad anuvādena katipaya guṇa vidhiḥ yathā yatra chatra cāmara patākā hāstikāḥ cīya śaktikayāṣṭīka dhānuṣka kārpāṇika prāsika padāti pracayaḥ tatra asti rājā iti gamyate na tu katipaya gaja vāji padāti bhāji tad amātye tathā iha api na ca ekatra vihitānām guṇānām itaratra uktiḥ anrathikā pratyabhijñāna dārḍhya artha tvāt astu vā asmin nitya anuvādaḥ  na hi anuvādānām avaśyam sarvatra prayojanavat tvam anuvāda mātrasya api tatra tatra upalabdheḥ tasmāt tad eva bṛhadāraṇyake api upāsanam tad guṇena upasaṃhārāt iti siddham saṃbandhāt evam anyatra api yadi ekasyām api śākhāyām tattvena pratyabhijñānāt upāsanasya tatra vihitānām dharmāṇām saṃkaraḥ tathā sati satyasya eka sasyā bedāt maṇḍala dvaya vartina upaniṣadoḥ api saṃkara prasaṅgāt  tasya iti ca prakṛta parāmarśi tvāt bhedaḥ satyasya ca pradhānasya prakṛta tvāt adhidaivam iti asya viśeṣaṇa tayā upasarjana tvena aprastutvāt prastutasya ca satyasya abhedāt pūrvavat guṇa saṃkaraḥ iti prāpta ucyate na vā viśeṣāt  satyam yatra sva rūpa mātra saṃbandhaḥ  dharmāṇām śrūyate tatra evam svarūpasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt tanmātra saṃbandhi tvāt ca dharmāṇām yatra tu sa viśeṣaṇam pradhānam avagamyate tatra sa viśeṣaṇasya eva tasya dharma abhisaṃbandhaḥ  na nirviśeṣaṇasya nāṭī anya viśeṣaṇa sahitasya na hi daṇḍinam puruṣam ānayā iti ukte damḍa rahitaḥ kamaṇḍalumān ānīyate tasmāt adhidaivam satyasya upaniṣad uktā na tasya eva adhyātmam bhavitum arhati yathā ca ācāryasya gacchataḥ  anugamanam vihitam na tiṣṭhataḥ  bhavati tasmāt na upaniṣadoḥ saṃkaraḥ kintu vyavasthitiḥ tad idam uktam sva rūpa anapāyāt iti darśayati ca atideśāt api evam eva tattve hi na ati deśaḥ syāt iti saṃbhṛti dyuvyāpti api ca atas  abrahma jyeṣṭhā vīryā saṃbhṛtāni brahma agne jyeṣṭham divam ātatāna brahma bhūtānām prathamam tu jajñe tena arhati brahmaṇā spardhitum kaḥ brahma jyeṣṭham yeṣām tāni brahma jyeṣṭhā jajñe āsa yadi api tāsu tāsu śāṇḍilya ādi vidyāsu āyatana bheda parigraheṇa adhyatmika āyatana tvam saṃbhṛtya ādīnām guṇānām ādhida eka tvam iti āyatana bhedaḥ pratibhāti tathā api jyāyān diva ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa ādhidaivika vibhūti pratyabhijñānāt ṣoḍa śakalā ādyāsu ca vidyāsu āyatana aśravaṇāt antatas  brahma āśraya tayā sāmyena pratyabhijñā saṃbhavāt  saṃbṛtya ādīnām guṇānām śāṇḍilya ādi vidyāsu ṣoḍaśa kalā ādi vidyāsu ca upasaṃhāra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu mithas  samāna guṇa śravaṇam pratyabhijñāya yad vidyā apūrvān api tatra aśrutān guṇān upasaṃhārayati na tu iha saṃbhṛtya ādi guṇaka brahma vidyā ayam śāṇḍilya ādi vidyā gata guṇa śravaṇam asti yā tu kācid ādhidaivikī vibhūtiḥ śāṇḍilya ādi vidyā ayam śrūyate tasmāḥ tad prakaraṇa adhīna tvāt tāvat mātram grahīṣyate na etāvat mātreṇa saṃbhṛtya ādīn anukraṣṭum arhati tatra etad pratyabhijñāna abhāvāt iti uktam brahmā śrayatvena tu pratyabhijñāna samartham ati prasaktam bhūyasīnām aikya prasaṅgāt  tad idam uktam saṃbhṛtya ādayaḥ tu śāṇḍilya ādi vākya gocarāḥ ca iti tasmāt saṃbhṛtiḥ ca dyuvyāptiḥ ca tad idam saṃbhṛti dyuvyāpti api ca atas  pratyabhijñāna abhāvāt na śāṇḍilya ādi vidyā su upasaṃhriyata iti siddham puruṣa vidyāyamitra cetareṣām anāmnānāt  puruṣa yajña tvam ubhayatra api aviśiṣṭam na ca viduṣaḥ  yajñasya iti na sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbhavaḥ yajñasya ātmā iti ātma śabdasya svarūpa vacana tvāt  yajñasya svarūpam yajamānaḥ tasya ca cetana tvāt viduṣa iti sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbhavaḥ tasmāt puruṣa yajñatva aviśeṣāt maraṇa avabhṛthatva ādi sāmānyāt ca eka vidyā adhyavasāne ubhayatra ubhaya dharma upasaṃhāra iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate yādṛśam tāṇḍinām paiṅginām ca puruṣa yajña saṃpādanam tadā āyuṣaḥ ca tredhā vyavasthitasya savana traya saṃpādanam aśiśiṣa ādīnām ca dīkṣā ādi bhāva saṃpādanam na evam taittirīyāṇām teṣām na tāvat  puruṣe yajña saṃpattiḥ na hi ātmā yajamāna iti atra ayam ātma śabdaḥ svarūpa vacanaḥ na hi yajña svarūpam yajamānaḥ  bhavati kartṛ karmaṇoḥ abheda abhāvāt cetanā cetanayoḥ ca ekya anupapatteḥ yajña karmaṇoḥ ca acetana tvāt  yajamānasya cetana tvāt  ātmanaḥ tu cetanasya yajamāna tvam ca vidvat tvam ca upapadyate tathā ca ayam arthaḥ evam viduṣaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ saṃbandhī yajñaḥ tasya saṃbandhi tayā yajamāna ātmā tathā ca ātmanaḥ  yajamāna tvam ca vidvat saṃbandhi tā ca yajñasya mukhye syātām itara chā ātma śabdasya svarūpa vāci tve viduṣaḥ  yajñasya iti ca yajamānaḥ  yajña svarūpam iti ca gauṇe syātām na ca satyām gatau tad yuktam tasmāt puruṣa yajña tā taittirīye na asti iti tayā tāvat na sāmyam na ca patnī yajamāna veda vidyā ādi saṃpādanam taittirīyāṇām ivi tāṇḍinām paiṅginām vā vidyate savana saṃpattiḥ api eṣām vilakṣaṇā eva tasmāt bhūyas  vailakṣaṇye sati na kiñcid mātra sālakṣaṇyāt vidyā eka tvam ucita mati prasaṅgāt  apica tasya evam viduṣa iti anuvāda śrutau satyām aneka artha vidhāne vākya bheda doṣa prasaktiḥ iti arthaḥ api ca iyam paiṅginām tāṇḍinām ca puruṣa yajña vidyā phala antara yuktā svatantrā pratīyate taittirīyāṇām tu evaṃviduṣa iti śravaṇāt pūrva ukta parāmarśāt tad phalatva śruteḥ ca pāratantryam na ca svatantra parantrayoḥ aikyam ucitam iti āha apica sa saṃnyāsām ātma vidyām iti upasaṃharati tasmāt iti vedha ādi artha bhedāt vicāra viṣayam darśayati ātharvaṇikānām iti ātharvaṇikā ādi upaniṣad ā ārambhe te te mantrāstāni tāni ca pravargya ādi iti karmāṇi samamnātīni saṃśayam āha kim ima iti pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti upasaṃhāra eva eṣām vidyāsu iti saphalā hi sarvā vidyā āmnātāḥ tad sannidhau mantrāḥ karmāṇi ca samāmnātāni aphalavat sannidhā phalam tad aṅgam iti nyāyāt vidyā aṅga abhāvena vijñāyante codayati nanu eṣām iti na hi atra śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānāni santi viniyojakāni pramāṇāni na hi yathā darśa pūrṇamāsau  ārabhya samidh ādayaḥ samāmrātāḥ tathā kāñcid vidyām ārabhya mantrā vā karmāṇi vā samāmrātāni na ca asati sāmānya saṃbandhe saṃbandhi saṃnidhāna mātrāt tāt arthya saṃbhavaḥ na ca śruta sva aṅga paripūrṇā vidyā etān ākāṅkṣitum arhati yena prakaraṇa āpadita sāmānya saṃbandhānām saṃnidhiḥ viśeṣa saṃbandhāyā bhavet iti arthaḥ samādhatte bāḍham anupalabhamānā api iti mā nāma bhūt phalavatīnām vidyānām paripūrṇa aṅgānām ākāṅkṣā mantrāṇām tu svādhyāya vidhi āpādita puruṣa artha bhāvanām karmaṇām ca pravargya ādīnām sva vidhi āpādita puruṣa artha bhāvānām puruṣa abhilaṣitam ākāṅkṣatām saṃnidhānāt anya tārā kāṅkṣā nibandhaḥ rakta paṭa nyāyena saṃbandhaḥ tatra api ca vidyānām phalavat tvāt tāt arthyam aphalānām mantrāṇām karmaṇām ca na ca pravargya ādīnām piṇḍa pitṛ yajñavat svargaḥ kalpanā spadam phalavat saṃnidhānena tad avarohāt anumāsyāmahe saṃnidhi sāma arthyāt iti idam khalu nivṛtta ākāṅkṣāyā vidyāyāḥ saṃnidhāne śrutam anākāṅkṣāyā sa ākāṅkṣasya api saṃbaddhum asāmarthyāt tasyāḥ  api ākāhkṣām utthāpayati utthāpya ca eka vākyatām upaiti asamarthasya ca upakārakatva anupapatteḥ prakaraṇinam prati upakāra sāmarthyam ātmanaḥ kalpayati na ca sati api sāmarthye tatra śrutyā aviniyuktam sat aṅga tām upagantum arhati iti anayā paramparayā saṃnidhiḥ śrutim artha āpattyā kalpayati ākṣipati nanu na eṣām mantrāṇām iti prayoga samaveta artha prakāśanena hi mantrāṇām upayogaḥ  varṇitaḥ aaviśiṣṭaḥ tu vākya arthaḥ iti atra na ca vidyā saṃbaddham kañcana artham mantreṣu pratīmaḥ yadi api ca pravargyaḥ  na kiñcid ārabhya śrūyate tathā api vākya saṃyogena kratu saṃyogena kratu saṃbandham pratipadyate apurastāt upasadām pravargyeṇa pracaranti iti upasadām juhūvat avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha tvāt yadi api jyotiṣṭoma vikṛtau  api santi upasadaḥ tathā api tatra anumānikyaḥ  jyotiṣṭome tu pratyakṣa vihitāḥ tena śīghra pravṛtti tayā jyotiṣṭoma aṅga tā eva vākyena avagamyate apica prakṛtau vihitasya pravargyasya ca udakena upasadvat tad vikṛtau  api prāptiḥ prakṛtau vā advirukta tvāt iti nyāyāt jyotiṣṭome eva vidhānam upasadā saha yuktam tad etad āha katham ca pravargyāt iti saṃnidhānāt artha viprakarṣeṇa vākyam balīya iti bhāvaḥ samādhatte na eṣa doṣaḥ sāmarthye tāvat iti yathā aagnaye tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti mantre agnaye nirvapām iti pade karma samaveta artha prakāśake śiṣṭānām tu padānām tad eka vākya tayā yathā kathañcit vyākhyānam evam iha api hṛdaya padasya upāsanāyām samaveta artha tvāt tad anusāreṇa tad eka vākyatā āpat nā api pada antarāṇi gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā ca vṛttyā kathañcid neyāni iti na asamaveta artha tā mantrāṇām na ca mantra viniyogaḥ  na upāsaneṣu dṛṣṭaḥ  yena atyanta adṛṣṭam kalpyata iti āha dṛṣṭaḥ ca upāsaneṣu iti yadi api vākyena balīyasā saṃnidhiḥ durbalaḥ  bādhyate tathā api virodhe sati na coha asti virodhaḥ vākyena viniyuktasya api jyotiṣṭome pravargyasya saṃnidhinā vidyāyām api viniyoga saṃbhavāt  yathā abrahmavarcasa kāmaḥ  bṛhaspati savena yajeta iti brahmavarcasa phalaḥ  api bṛhaspati savaḥ  vājapeya aṅga tvena codyate vājapeyena iṣṭvā bṛhaspati savena yajeta iti atra hi ktvaḥ samāna kartṛka tvam avagamyate dhātu saṃbandhe pratyaya vidhānāt  dhātvartha antara saṃbandhaḥ ca katham ca samānaḥ kartā syāt  yadyakaḥ prayogaḥ  bhavet  prayoga āviṣṭam hi kartṛ tvam tad ca prayoga bhede katham ekam  tasmāt samāna kartṛka tvāt eka prayoga tvam vājapeya bṛhaspati savayoḥ dhātu artha antara saṃbandhāt ca na ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa eka prayoga tā saṃbandhaḥ ca tatra api vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānāt vājapeyaḥ pradhānam aṅgam bṛhaspati savaḥ na ca adarśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti atra aṅga pradhāna bhāva prasaṅgaḥ na hi etad vacanam kasyacid darśa pūrṇam āsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam tathā ca dvayoḥ sa adhikāra tayā agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā guṇa pradhāna bhāvam prati vinigamana abhāvena adhiṣṭhāna mātra vivakṣayā lākṣaṇikam samāna kartṛka tvam iti adoṣaḥ yadi tu kasya añcicśā ākhyāyām ārabhya adhītam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā iti tathā api anārabhya adhītasya eva ārabhya adhīte pratyabhijñānam iti yuktam tathā sati dvayoḥ api pṛthak adhikāra tayā pratītam sama pradhāna tvam atyaktam bhavet itarathā tu guṇa pradhāna bhāvena tad tyāgaḥ  bhavet  tasmāt kāla arthaḥ  ayam saṃyoga iti siddham siddhāntam upakramate evam prāpta iti hṛdayam pravidhya iti ayam mantraḥ svarasataḥ tāvat ābhicārika karma samavetam sakalaiḥ eva padaiḥ artham abhidadhat upalabhyate tad asya abhidhāna sāmarthya lakṣaṇam liṅgam vākya prakaraṇābhyām kramāt balīyobhyām api balavat kim aṅga punar  kramāt  tasmāt liṅgena saṃnidhim apodya ābhicārika karma śeṣa tvam eva āpādyate yadi api ca upāsanāsu hṛdaya pada mātrasya samaveta artha tvam tathā api tad itareṣām sarveṣām eva padānām asamaveta artha tvam ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣām artha samavāya iti kim eka pada samaveta artha tā kariṣyati na ca saṃnidhi upagṛhīyāsu upāsanāsu mantram avasthāpayati iti yuktam hṛdaya padasya abhicāre api samaveta arthasya itara pada eka vākyatā āpannasya vākya pramāṇa sahitasya ābhicārikāt karmaṇaḥ saṃnidhinā ācālayitum aśakya tvāt evam adeva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam iti ādeḥ api yajña prasava liṅgasya yajñaṅga tve siddhe jaghanyaḥ  vidyā saṃnidhiḥ kim kariṣyati evam anyeṣām api śvetāśva iti evamādīnām keṣāñcid liṅgena keṣāñcid śutyā keṣāñcid pramāṇa antareṇa prakaraṇena iti kasmāt punar  saṃnidhiḥ liṅga ādibhiḥ vādhyate iti ata āha durbalaḥ  hi saṃnidhiḥ iti prathama tantra gator athaḥ smāryate tatra tu śruti liṅgayoḥ samavāye samāna viṣayatva lakṣaṇe virodhe kim balīya iti cintā atra udāharaṇam asti aindrī ṛc  akadācanaḥ tarī rasi na indra iti ādikā śrutiḥ viniyokī aaindrayā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti atra hi sāmarthya lakṣaṇāt liṅgāt indre viniyogaḥ pratibhāti śruteḥ ca gārhapatyam iti dvitīyātas  gārhapatyasya śeṣi tvam aindriya iti catṛtīyā śruteḥ aindyā ṛcaḥ śeṣa tvam avagamyate yadi api gārhapatyam iti dvitīya aśruteḥ āgneyīm ṛcam prati gārhapatyasya śeṣi tvena upapatteḥ yadi api ca aindraya iti ca tṛtīyā śruteḥ aindrayā indram prati śeṣa tvana upapatteḥ avirodhaḥ pada antara saṃbandhe tu vākyasya eva liṅgena virodhaḥ  na tu śruteḥ tatra ca viparītam balābalam tathā api śruti vākyayaḥ rūpataḥ  vyāpāra bhedāt adoṣaḥ dvitīyā tṛtīya aśrutī hi kāraka vibhakti tayā kriyām prati prakṛti arthasya karma karaṇa bhāvam avagamayata iti viniyojike kriyām prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣi tvam karaṇasya ca śeṣa tvam iti hi viniyogaḥ pada antara anapekṣe ca kriyām prati śeṣa śeṣi tve śruti mātrāt pratiyete iti śraute saḥ  ayam śrutitiḥ sāmānya avagataḥ  viniyogaḥ pada antara vaśāt viśeṣe avasthāpyate saḥ  ayam viśiṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ  vākya gocaraḥ śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ tu śrautaḥ tasmāt vākī labhyam viśiṣam apekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ  liṅgena virudhyata iti śruti liṅga virodhe kim liṅga anuguṇena gārhatvam iti dvitīyā śrutiḥ saptamī arthe vyākhyāyatām gārhapatya samīpe aindrayā indra upastheya iti āhaḥ śruti anuguṇa tayā liṅgam vyākhyayatām prabhavati hi sva ucitāyām kriyāyām gārhapatya iti indra indarteḥ aiśvarya vacana tvāt iti kim tāvat prāptam śruteḥ liṅgam balīya iti naḥ khalu yatra asamartham tad śuti sahasreṇa api tatra viniyoktum śakyate yathā agninā siñcet  pāthasā dahet iti tasmāt sāmarthyam purodhāya śrutyā viniyoktavyam tad ca asyā ṛcaḥ pramāṇa antarataḥ śabdataḥ ca indre pratīyate tathā hi vidita pada tad arthaḥ kadācana iti ṛcaḥ spaṣṭam indram avagacchati śabdāt caindraya iti atas  tasmāt dāru dahanasya iva dahanasya salila dahane viniyogaḥ  gārhapatye viniyoga aindrayāḥ na ca śruti anurodhāt jaghanyām āsthāyā vṛttim sāmarthya kalpanā iti sāmpratam samarthyasya pūrva bhāvitayā tad anurodhena eva śruti vyavasthāpanāt  tasmāt aindraya indra eva gārhapatya samīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte abhidhīyate aliṅga jñānam purodhāya na śruteḥ vinayoktṛtā śruti jñānam purodhāya liṅgam tu viniyojakam yadi hi sāmarthyam avagamya śruteḥ viniyogam avadhārayet pramātā tatas  śruteḥ viniyogam prati liṅga jñāna apekṣa tvāt durbala tvam bhavet  na tu etad asti śrutiḥ viniyogāya samarthyam apekṣate na apekṣate sāmarthya vijñānam avagate tu tatas  viniyoge na asamarthasya sa iti tad nirvāhāya sāmarthyam kalpyate tad śuti viniyogāt pūrvam asti sāmarthyam na tu pūrvam agamyate viniyoge tu siddhe tad anyathā anupapattyā paścāt pratīyata iti śruti viniyogāt parācīnā sāmarthya pratītiḥ tad anurodhena avasthā apanīyā liṅgam tu na svatas  viniyojakam api tu viniyokīm kalpyitvā śrutim tathā hi na svarasataḥ  liṅgāt anena indra upasthātavya iti pratīyate kintvī dṛś indra iti tasya tu prakaraṇa āmnānasa amartyāt  sāmānyatas  prakaraṇa āpati taidamarthyasya tad anyathā anupapattyā viniyoga kalpanāyām api śrautāt viniyogāt kalpanīyasya viniyogasya artha viprakarṣāt śutiḥ eva kalpayitum ucitā na tu tad arthaḥ  viniyogaḥ na hi śrutam anupapannam śākyam arthena upapādayitum na hi trayaḥ  atra brahmaṇāḥ kaṭha kauṇḍinyau  iti vākyam pramāṇa antara upasthāpitena māṭhareṇa upapādayanti upapādayataḥ  vā na upahasanti śabdāḥ māṭharaḥ ca iti tu śrāvayantam anumanyante tasmāt śuta artha samutthāna anupapattiḥ śrutena eva artha antareṇa upapādanīyā na artha antara mātreṇa pramāṇa antara upanītena iti loka siddham na ca loka siddhasya niyoga anuyogau yujyete śabda artha jñāna upāya bhūta loka virodhāt tasmāt viniyojikā śrutiḥ kalpanīyā tathā ca yāvat liṅgāt viniyojikām śrutim kalpayitum prakānta vyāpāraḥ tāvat pratyakṣayā śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti nivṛtta ākāṅkṣam prakaramam iti kasya anupapattyā liṅgam viniyokīm śrutim upakalpyet  mantra samāmnānasya pratyakṣayā eva viniyoga śrutyā upapādita tvāt yathā āhuḥ ayāvat ajñāta saṃdigdham jñeyam tāt pramitsyate pramite tu pramātṛṇām pramautsukyam vihanyate iti tasmāt pratīta śrauta viniyoga upapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tad anuguṇa tvena nīyamānam prathamām vṛttim ajahat jaghanyayā api na iyam iti siddham liṅga vākyayoḥ iha virodhaḥ  yathā asya ūnam te sadanam kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśeṣam kalpyāmi tasmin sīda amṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇām medha sumanasyamānaḥ iti kim ayam kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadana karaṇe puroḍāśa āsādane ca prayoktavya uta kalpyāmi anta upastaraṇe tasmin tsīda iti evamādiḥ tu puroḍāśa āsādana iti yadi vākyam balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra su śevam kalpyāmi iti etad apekṣaḥ  hi tasmin sīda ityādiḥ pūrveṇa eka vākyatām upaiti yad kalpayāmi tasmin tsīdā iti atha liṅgam balīyaḥ tatas  kalpyāmi antar  sadana karaṇe tad prakāśane hi tad samartham tasmin tsīdā iti puroḍāśa āsādane tatra hi tad samartham iti kim tāvat prāptam liṅgāt vākyam balīya iti ubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti iha hi yad tad pada samabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajya māna sākāṅkṣa tvāt eka vākya tāyām siddhāyām tad anurodhena paścāt tad abhidhāna sāma arthyam kalpanīyam yathā devasyatvā iti mantre agnye nirvapāmi iti padayoḥ samaveta artha tvena tad eka vākya tayā pada antarāṇām tad paratvena tatra sāmarthya kalpanā tad evam pratīta eka vākya tā nirvāhāya tad anuguṇa tayā sāmarthyam kḷptam sanna tad vyāpādayitum arhati api tu viniyojikām śrutim mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam evam prāpte ucyate bhavet etad evam yadi eka vākyata avagama pūrvam sāmarthya avadhāraṇam api tu avadhṛta sāmarthyānām padānām praśliṣṭa pāṭhitānām sāmarthya vaśena prayojana eka tvena ika vākyatva avadhāraṇam yavanti padāni pradhānam ekam artham avagamayitum samarthāni vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣāṇi tāni ekam vākyam anuṣṭheyaḥ ca arthaḥ  mantreṣu prakāśyamānaḥ pradhānam sadana karaṇa puroḍāśa āsādane ca anuṣṭheya tayā pradhāne tayoḥ ca sadana karaṇam kalpayāmi antaḥ  mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayitum puroḍāśa āsādanam ca tasmin sīda ityādiḥ tatas ca yāvat eka vākyatā vaśena sāmarthyam anumīyate tāvat pratītam sāmarthyam ekaikasya bhāgasya ekaikasmin  arthe viniyojikām śrutim kalpayati tathā ca śrutyā eva ekaikasya bhāgasya ekatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇa pāṭha upapattau na vākya kalpitam liṅgam viniyojikām śrutim aparām kalpayitum arhati iti eka vākyatā buddhiḥ utpannā apya ābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt  yatra tu virodhakam liṅgam na asti tatra samaveta artha eka dvi tri pada eka vākyatā pada antarāṇām api sāmarthyam kalpayati iti bhavati vākyasya viniyojaka tvam yathā atra eva syonam ta ityādīnām tasmāt vākyāt liṅgam balīya siddham vākya prakaraṇayoḥ virodha udāharaṇam atra ca padānām paraspara apekṣā vaśāt kasmiṃścid viśiṣṭa ekasmin  arthe paryavasitānām vākya tvam labdha vākya bhāvanām ca punar  kārya antara apekṣā vaśena vākya antareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam kartavyāyāḥ khalu phala bhāvanāyāḥ  labdha dhātu artha karaṇāyāḥ  itikartavya tā kāṅkṣāyā vacanam prakaraṇam ācakṣate vṛddhāḥ yathā adarśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ  yajeta iti etad hi vacanam prakaraṇam tad etasmin sva pada gaṇena kiyati api arthe paryavasite karaṇa upakāra lakṣaṇa kārya antara apekṣāyām asamidhaḥ  yajati ityādi vākya antara saṃbandhaḥ samidh ādi bhāvanā hi sva vidhi upahitāḥ puruṣe hitam bhāvi apekṣamāṇā viśva jitryāyena vā anuṣaṅgataḥ  vā arthavādataḥ  vā phala antara apratilambhena darśa pūrṇamāsa bhāvanām nirvārayitum īśate tasmāt tad akāṅkṣāyām upanipatitāni etāni vākyāni sva kārya apekṣāṇi tad apekṣita karaṇa upakāra lakṣaṇam kāryam asādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam saḥ  ayam anayoḥ naṣṭa aśva dagdha rathavat saṃyogaḥ tad evam lakṣaṇayoḥ vākya prakaraṇayoḥ virodha udāharaṇam sūkta vāka nigadaḥ tatra hi paurṇamāsī devatā amāvasyā devatāḥ samāmnātāḥ taḥ ca na mitha eka vākyatām gantum arhanti iti liṅgena paurṇamāsī yāgāt indra agnī śabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyām ca samaveta ārta tvāt prayoktavyaḥ atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim yad indra agni pada eka vākya tayā pratīyate aavivṛdhethām mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akātām iti tad notā kraṣṭavyamuta indra agni śabdābhyām saha utkraṣṭavyam iti tatra yadi prakaraṇam balīyaḥ tatas  apanīta devatā kaḥ  api śeṣaḥ prayoktavyaḥ  atha vākyam tatas  tatra devatā śabdaḥ tatra eva prayoktavyaḥ kim tāvat prāptam apanīta devatā kaḥ api śeṣaḥ prayoktavyaḥ prakaraṇasya eva aṅga saṃbandha pratipādaka tvāt  phalavatī hi bāvanā pradhāna itikartavyatā tvam āpādayati tad upajīvanena śruti ādīnām viśeṣa saṃbandha āpādaka tvāt  atas  pradhāna bhāvanā vacana lakṣaṇa prakaraṇa virodhe tad upajīvi vākyam bādhyata iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate bhavet etad evam yadi viniyojya svarūpa sāmarthyam anapekṣya prakaramam viniyojayet  api tu viniyogāya tad apekṣaye anyathā pūṣā ādi anumantraṇa mantrasya dvadaśa upasattāyāḥ ca na utkarṣaḥ syāt  tad rūpa ālocanāyām ca tad yad eva śīghram pratīyate tad tad valavat viprakṛṣṭam tu durbalam tatra yadi tad rūpam śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vā anyatra viniyuktam tatas  prakaramam bhaṅktvā utkṛṣyate piriśiṣṭaiḥ tu prakaraṇasya iti kartavya tāpekṣā puryate atha svasya śīghra pravṛttam śruti ādi na asti tatas  prakaramam viniyojakam yathā samidh ādeḥ tad iha prakaraṇāt vākyasya śīghra pravṛtta tvam utacyate prakaraṇe hi sva artha pūrṇānām vākyanām upakārya upakāraka ākāṅkṣā mātram dṛśyate vākye tu padānām pratyakṣa saṃbandhaḥ tatas ca saha prasthitayoḥ vākya prakaraṇayoḥ yāvat prakaraṇena eka vākyatā kalpyate tāvat vākyena abhidhāna sāmarthyam yāvat itaratra vākyena sāmarthyam tāvat itaratra sāmarthyena śrutiḥ tāvat iha śrutyā viniyogaḥ tāvatā ca vicchinnāyām ākāṅkṣāyām śruti anumāne vihate prakaraṇena antarā kalpitam vilīyanta iti vākya balīyaḥ tvāt tad devatā śeṣaṇām apakarṣa eva iti siddham krama prakaraṇa virodha udāharaṇam rājasūya prakaraṇe pradhānasya eva abhiṣecanīyasya saṃnidhau śaunaḥśepa upākhyāna ādi āmnātam tad kim samastasya rājasūyasya aṅga mutibhiṣecanīyasya yadi prakaramam balīyaḥ tatas  samastasya rājasūyasya atha kramaḥ tatas  abhiṣecanīyasya eva iti kim tāvat prāptam na akāhkṣā mātram hi saṃbandha hatuḥ gām ānaya prasādam paśya iti gām ityasya kriyā mātra apekṣiṇaḥ paśya iti anena api saṃbandha saṃbhavāt vinigamana abhāva prasaṅgāt  tasmāt saṃnidhānam saṃbandha kāraṇam tathā ca ānayā iti ananā eva gām ityasya saṃbandhaḥ  vinigamyate na ca saṃnidhānam api saṃbandha kāraṇam ayam eti putraḥ  rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ  apasāryatām iti atra rājña iti asya putra puruṣa pada saṃnidhāna aviśeṣāt mā bhūt avinigamanā tasmāt ākāṅkṣā niścaya hetuḥ vaktavyā atra putra śabdasya saṃbandhi vacana tayā samutthita ākāṅkṣasya antike yad upanipatitam saṃbandhi antara ākāṅkṣam padam tasya tena eva ākāṅkṣā paripūrteḥ puruṣa padena puruṣa rūpa mātra abhidhāyinā svatantreṇa eva na saṃbandhaḥ kintu pareṇa apasāryatām iti anena apasaraṇīya apekṣeṇa iti sati api saṃnidhāne ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt asaṃbandhaḥ tathā ca ābhāṇakaḥ ataptam taptena saṃbadhyate iti tathā ca ākāṅkṣitam api na yāvat saṃnidhāpyate tāvat na saṃbadhyate tathā saṃnihitam api yāvat na ākāṅkṣyate na tāvat saṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandham prati samāna bala tvāt krama prakaraṇayoḥ samuccaya asaṃbhavāt ca vikalpena rājasūya abhiṣecanīyayoḥ viniyogaḥ śaunaḥśepa upākhyāna ādīnām iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate rājasūyake kathaṃbhāva apekṣā hi pavitrāt ārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtim yāvat anuvartate tathā ca aavicchinne kathaṃbhāve yad pradhānasya paṭhyate anirjñāta phalam karma tasya prakaraṇa aṅga tā iti nyāyāt rājasūya aṅga tā śaunaḥśopa upākhyāna ādīnām abhiṣecanīyasya tu sva vākya upātta padārtha nirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhi pāṭhena ākāṅkṣa utthāpanīyā yāvat tāvat siddha ākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyena eka vākyatā kalpyate yāvat ca abhiṣecanīya eka vākya tayā liṅgam kalpyate tāvat kḷpta liṅgam viniyokrīm śrutim kalpyati yāvat vākya kalpitena liṅgena śrutiḥ itaratra kalpte tāvat kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge sati prakaraṇa pāṭha upapattau saṃnidhāna parikalpitam antarā vilīyate pramāṇa abhāve apratibha tvāt  prakaraṇinaḥ ca rājasūyasya sa vadā buddhi sāṃniśyena tad saṃnidherakalpanīya tvāt tasmāt prakaraṇa virodhe kramasya bādha eva na ca vikalpaḥ  durbala tvāt iti siddham krama samākhyayoḥ virodha udāharaṇam pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāṭya krame ca śundhadhvam daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhana arthaḥ  mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ tatra saṃdihyate kim samākhyānasya balīyaḥ tvāt puroḍāśa pātrāṇām śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ āhaḥ sānnāṭya pātrāṇām śundhena kramaḥ  balīyān iti kintāvat prāptam samākhyānām balīya iti pauroḍāśika śabdena hi puroḍāśa saṃbandhīni iti ucyante tāni adhikṛtya pravṛttam kāṇḍam pauroḍāśikam tatas ca yāvat krameṇa prakaraṇa ādi anumāna paramparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvat samākhyayā śrutyā eva sākṣāt eva sa pratipādita iti artha viprakarṣeṇa kramāt samākhyā eva balīyasi iti puroḍāśa pātra śundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭya pātra śundhana iti prāptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate samākhyānāt kramaḥ  balavān artha viprakarṣāt iti tathā hi samākhyā na tāvat saṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśa viśiṣṭam kāṇḍam āha tad viśiṣṭa tvāni atha anupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasya anumīyate na tu sākṣāt mantra bedasya tad dhāreṇa ca tad madhya pātinaḥ  mantra bedasya api tad anumānam na ca asau saṃbandhaḥ  api śrutyā eva śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ pratīyate api tu saṃbandha mātram tasmāt śati sādṛśyam asya dūra apetam iti krameṇa na asya spardhā ucitā tatra api ca sāmānyatas  darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa āpādi tā aidamarthyasya śaunaḥśepa upākhyāna ādivat cārāt upakāraka tayā prakṛta mātra saṃbandha anupapattiḥ mantrasya prayoga samaveta artha smāraṇena sāmavāyika aṅga tvāt tathā ca yam kañcid prakṛta prayoga gatam artham prakāśayataḥ  asya prakaraṇa aṅga tvam aviruddham iti viśeṣa apekṣāyām sānnāṭya kramaḥ sānnāṭyam prati prakaraṇa ādi anumāna dvāreṇa viniyogam kalpayitum utsahate na tu samākhyānam tasya durbala tvāt  tathā hi samākhyā saṃbandha nibandhanā sati tad sidhi artham saṃnidhim upakalpayati yāvat tāt vaidikena pratyakṣa dṛṣṭena saṃnidhānena ākāṅkṣā kalpyate yāvat ca kḷptena saṃnidhānena ākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvat itaratra kḷptayā kāṅkṣaya eka vākya tā tāvat itaratra eka vākya tayā kḷptayā upakāra sāmarthyam yāvat cātra eka vākya tayā upakāra sāmarthyam tāvat itaratra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutiḥ yāvat atra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutiḥ tāvat itaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvatā eva prakaraṇa pāṭha upapatteḥ sarvam samākhyāna kalpitam vicchinna mūla tvāt tūyamāna śasyam iva nirbījam bhavati puroḍāśa abhidhāyakramantrā bāhulyāt kāṇḍasya pauroḍāśika samākhyā iti mantavyam aeka dvi tri catuṣpañca vastu antaraya kāritam śruti artham prati vaiṣamyam liṅga ādīnām pratīyate iti artha viprakarṣa uktaḥ tatra api ca abādhikā eva śrutiḥ nityam samākhyā bādhyate sadā madhyamānām tu bādhya tvam bādhaka tvam apekṣayā iti viśeṣa uktaḥ  vṛddhaiḥ tad vayam vistarāt bibhyataḥ  api prathama tantra anabhijñā anukampayā nidhrā vistare patitāḥ sma iti uparamyate tasmāt yathā anujñāpana anujñayoḥ prajñā takra mayoḥ upahūta upahūyasva iti evam mantra vāmnātau deśa sāmānyāt tathā eva aṅga tayā prāpnutaḥ upahūta iti liṅgataḥ  anujñā mantraḥ  na anujñāpane upahūyasva iti ca liṅgataḥ  anujñāpanaḥ  ca mantraḥ  na anujñāyām tad iha liṅgena kramam bādhitvā viparītam śeṣa tvam āpādyate yāvat hi sthānena prakaraṇam utpādya eka vākya tvam kalpyate tāvat liṅgena śrutim kalpayitvā sādhitaḥ  viniyoga iti akalpita liṅga śruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ tad vid ihā api viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena catur antaritasya vidyā kramasya bādha iti yadi api prathama tantra eva ayam artha upapāditaḥ tathā api virodhe tad upapādanam iha tu avirodhaḥ na hi liṅgena ābhicārika karma saṃbandhaḥ vidyā saṃbandhena krama kṛtena virudhyate na ca viniyukta viniyoga lakṣaṇaḥ  atra virodhaḥ  bṛhaspati save api tad prasaṅgāt  atha eva pratīti virodhaḥ  na ca vastu virodhaḥ sa vidyāyām viniyoge api tulyaḥ tasmāt avirodhāt vedhāmantrasya upāsana aṅga tvam iti asti abhyadhikā śahkā tatra ucyate anahi liṅga virodhena krama bādhaḥ abhidhīyate kintu liṅga paricchinne na kramaḥ kalpanā akṣamaḥ prakaraṇa pāṭhā upapattyā hi śruti liṅga tvākya prakaraṇaiḥ aviniyuktaḥ krameṇa prakaraṇa vākya liṅga śruti kalpanā prāmālikayā viniyujyate tadā viniyuktasya prakaraṇa pāṭhā narthakya prasaṅgāt upapādite tu śruti ādibiḥ prakaraṇa pāṭhe kṣīṇa tvāt arthāpatteḥ kramaḥ  na sva ucitām pramām utpādayitum arhati pramitya abhāvāt iti bṛhaspati savasya tu ktvā śrutiḥ eva dhātu saṃbandha adhikārakāt samāna kartṛka tāyām vihitā saṃyoga pṛthaktvena viniyuktam api viniyojayantī na śakyā śruti antareṇa niroddhum sva pramām iti vaiṣamyam tad idam uktam vājapeye tu bṛhaspati savasya spaṣṭam viniyoga antaram iti api ca ekaḥ ayam pravargya iti tulya balatayā bṛhaspati samasya tulya tā śaṅkā pākaraṇa dvāreṇa samuccayaḥ  na tu pṛthak ukti tayā paraspara apekṣa tvāt iti saṃnidhi pāṭham upapādayati araṇya ādi vacana vād iti hānau tu upāyana śabda śeṣa tvāt kuśāt chandastuti upagānavat tad uktam yatra hāna upāyane śrūyete tatra avivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatra api upāyana mātra śravaṇam tatra api na antarīyaka tayā hānam ākṣiptam iti asti saṃnipātaḥ yatra tu hāna mātram sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ śrutam na śrūyate upāyanam tatra kim upāyanam upādānam saṃnipatet na vā iti saṃśayaḥ atra pūrva pakṣam gṛhṇāti asaṃnipāta iti syāt etad  yathā śrūyamāṇam ekatra śākhāyām upāsana aṅgam tasmin  eva upāsane śākhā antare aśrūyamāṇam upasaṃhriyate evam śākhā antara śrutam upāyanam upasaṃhariṣyata iti ata āha vidyā antara gocara tvāt ca iti ekatve hi upāsana karmaṇām anyatra utānām api anyatra samavāyaḥ  ghaṭate na tu iha upāsanānām eka tvam sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena bhedāt iti arthaḥ nanu yathā upāyanam śrutam hānam upasthāpayati evam hānam api upāyanam ityata āha api ca ātma kartṛkam iti grahaṇam hi na svāminaḥ  apagamam antareṇa bhavati iti grahaṇāt apagama siddhiḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī apagamaḥ tu asati api anyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭaḥ  yathā prāyaścittena apagatirena sa iti kartṛ bheda kathanam tu etad upodbala artham na punar avaśyaṃbhāvasya prayojakam upāyanena anaikāntyāt iti siddhāntam upakramate asyām prāptau  iti ayam asya arthaḥ karma antare vihitam hi na karma antara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇa abhāvāt  yad punar na vidhīyate kintu stuti artham siddha tayā saṃkīrtyate tad asati bādhake devatā adhikaraṇa nyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānam parityaktum aśakyam tathā ca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ nirguṇāyām vidyāyām aśva roma ādivat kim bhavatu iti ākāṅkṣāyām na tāvat prāyaścittena iva tad vilaya saṃbhavaḥ tathā sati aśva romarāhu dṛṣṭānta anupapatteḥ na jātu aśva romarāhu mukhayoḥ vilayanam asti api tu aśva candrābhyām vibhāgaḥ na ca naṣṭe vidhūnana pramocana artha saṃbhavaḥ tasmāt artha vādasya apekṣāyām śabda saṃnidhi kṛtaḥ  api viśeṣa upāyanam buddhau saṃnidhāpayitum śakroti apekṣām pūrayitum iti nirguṇā api vidyā hāna upāyanābhyām stotavyā stuti prakarṣaḥ tu prayojanam na pramāṇam aprakarṣe api stuti upapatteḥ na ca artha vāda antara apekṣā artha vāda antarāṇām na dṛṣṭā na ca taiḥ na pūraṇam iti āha prasiddhā ca iti vidyā stuti artha tvāt ca asya upāyana vādasya iti yadi api anyadīye api sukṛta duṣkṛte anyasya phalam prayacchataḥ yathā putrasya śrāddha karma pituḥ tṛptim yathā ca pituḥ vaiśvānarīya iṣṭiḥ putrasya nāryāḥ ca surā pānam bhartuḥ narakam tathā api anyadīye api sukṛta duṣkṛte sākṣāt anyasmin  saṃbhavata iti āśayena śaṅkā phalataḥ prāptyā stutiḥ iti parihāraḥ guṇa upasaṃhāra vivakṣāyā miti api na svarūpataḥ sukṛta duṣkṛta saṃcāra abhiprāyam nanu vidyā guṇa upasaṃhāra adhikāre kaḥ  ayam akāṇḍe stuti artha vicāra itiśaṅkām upasaṃhāran  apākaroti tasmāt guṇa upasaṃhāra vicāra prasaṅgena iti vidyā guṇa upasaṃhāra prasaṅgataḥ stuti guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ  vicāritaḥ prayojanam ca upāsake sauhārdam ācaritavyam na sva sauhārdam iti chanda eva ācchanda ācchādana adāt śabdaḥ  bhavati yathā eva ca aviśeṣa upagānam iti ṛtvija upagāyanti iti aviśeṣeṇa upagānam ṛtvijām bhāllavinaḥ tu viśeṣeṇa na adhvarī upagāyati iti tad etasmāt bhāllavinām vākyam ṛtvija upagāyanti iti etad śeṣam vijñāyate etad uktam bhavati adhvaryu varjitā ṛtvija upagāyanti iti kasmāt punar evam vyākhyāyate nanu svatantrāṇi eva santu vākya āni iti ata āha śruti antara kṛtam iti aṣṭa doṣa vikalpa prasaṅga bhayena vākya antarasya vākya antara śeṣa tvam atrabhavataḥ  jaimineḥ api saṃmatam iti āha tad uktam dvādaśa lakṣaṇyām aapi tu vākya śeṣaḥ syāt anyāṭya tvāt vikalpasya vidhīnām eka deśaḥ syāt iti etad eva sūtram artha dvāreṇa paṭhati api tu vākya śeṣa tvāt itara paryudāsaḥ syāt pratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt sa ca anyāṭya iti śeṣaḥ evam kila śrūyate aeṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ yajñe yajñe anvāyatta iti tatas  na āyu yājeṣu yeya jām aham karoti iti tad atra anārabhya kañcid yajñam yajñeṣu yeyajāmaha karaṇam upadiṣṭam tad upadiśya ca āmnātam na anuyājeṣu iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ vikalpa uta paryudāsaḥ  anuyāja varjiteṣu yeyajāmahar  kartavya iti mā bhūt artha prāptasya śāstrīyeṇa niṣedhe vikalpaḥ dṛṣṭam hi tādātvikīmasya sundara tām gamayati na āyatau doṣavat tām niṣedhati tasya tatra audāsīnyāt niṣedha śāstram tu tādātvikam saundaryam abādhamānam eva pravṛtti unmukham naram nivārayat āyatyāmasya duḥkha phala tvam avagamayati yathā āha aakartavyaḥ  duḥkha phalaḥ iti tatas  gārataḥ pravṛttam api āyatyām duḥkhataḥ  vibhyatam puruṣam śaknoti nivārayitum iti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ  gārataḥ pravṛtteḥ iti na tayā vikalpam arhati śāstrīyau tu vidhi niṣedhau tulya balatayā ṣoḍaśi grahaṇavat vakalpyete tatra hi vidhi darśanāt pradhānasya upakāra bhūyaḥ tvam kalpyate niṣedha darśanāt ca vaiguṇye api phala siddhiḥ avagamyate tathā āha aartha prāptavat iti ced na tulya tvāt ubhayam śabda lakṣaṇama iti na ca vācyam yāvat yajatiṣu yeya jāmaha karaṇam yāvat yajati sāmānya dvāreṇa anuyājam yajati viśeṣam upasarpati tāvat anuyāja gatena niṣedhena tad niṣiddham iti śīghra pravṛtteḥ sāmānya śāstra dviśeṣa niṣedhaḥ  balavān iti yatas  bhavatu evaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ  dadhi dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti tatra takradha prāptyai tad vidhim apekṣate pravartitum iha tu prāpta pūrvakatva apratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya ca anyatas  aprāpteḥ tad niṣedhena niṣedha prāptyai tad vidhiḥ apekṣaṇīyaḥ na ca sa apekṣa tayā niṣedhāt vidhiḥ eva balīya anitya tulya śiṣṭa tayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasya eva bādhanam iti sāṃpratam tathā sati niṣedha śāstram pramatta gītam syāt  na ca yadi uktam tulyam hi sāṃpradāyikam na ca na tau paśau karoti itivat artha vāda tā asamevatā artha tvāt paśau hi na ājya bhāgau sta iti upapadyate na ca atra tathā yeyajāmahābhāvaḥ yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha vidhānāt  anuyājānām ca tad bhāvāt na ca paryudāsaḥ tadā ananuyājeṣu iti kātyāyana matena niyama prasakteḥ tasmāt vihita pratiṣiddha tayā vikalpa iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate uktam ṣoḍaśi grahaṇayoḥ vikalpa iti na hi tatra anyā gatiḥ asti tena adoṣa duṣṭaḥ  api vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe api prāmāṇyāt mā bhūt pramata gīta tā iti iha tu paryudāsena api upapattau saṃbhavanti ām anyāṭyam vikalpa āśraṇam ayuktam evam hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandhaḥ  ananuyājeṣu yajatiṣu anuyāja vartiteṣu yeyajāmahar  kartavya iti kim atas  yadyavam etad atas  bhavati na anuyājeṣu iti etad vākyam aparipūrṇam sa ākāṅkṣam pūrva vākya eka deśena saṃbhantasyate yad etad yeya jām ahaṅkaroti iti etad na anuyājeṣu yāvat uktam syāt anuyāja varjita ūṣu iti tāvat uktam bhavati na anuyājeṣu iti tathā ca yajita viśeṣaṇa artha tvāt ananuyāja vidhiḥ eva ayam iti pratiṣedha abhāvāt na vikalpaḥ na ca abhiyuktatara pāṇi nivirodhe kātyāyanasya asat vādi tvam nitya samāsa vādinaḥ saṃbhavati sa hi vibhāṣā adhikāre samāsam śāsti tasmāt anuyāja varjiteṣu yeyajāmaha vidhānam iti siddham varṇaka antaram āha athavā etāsu iti yathā hi sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ amūrtayoḥ kalpanam na añjasam sūrti anuvidhāyi tvāt kampasya tathā anyadīyayoḥ anyatra saṃcāraḥ  api anupapannaḥ  amūrta tvāt eva tasmāt yatra vidhūnana mātram śrutam tatra kampanena varam sva kārya rambhāt cālana mātram eva lakṣyatām na tu tatas  apagatyā anyatra saṃcāraḥ kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt  tasmāt sva kārya ārambhāt cālanam vidhūnanam iti prāpte abhidhīyate yatra tāvat upāyana śrutiḥ tatra avaśyam tyāgaḥ  vidhūnanam vaktavyam kkacid api ca udvidhūnanam tyāge vartate tathā sati anyatra api tatra eva vartitum arhati evam hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanam iha mukhyam labhyeta na ca etad asti tatra api sva kāryāt cālanasya lakṣyamāṇa tvāt  na ca prāmāṇikam kalpanā gauravam loha gandhi tām ācarati apicā aneka artha tvāt dhātatūnām tyāge api vidhūyate mukhya geva bhaviṣyati prācuryeṇa tyāge api loke prayoga darśanāt  vinigamana hetoḥ abhāvāt gaṇakārasya ca upalakṣaṇa tvena api artha nirdeśasya tatra darśanāt  tasmāt dhāna artha eva atra iti yuktam sāṃparāye tartavya abhāvāt tathā hi anye nanu pāṭha kramāt ardha pathe sukṛta duṣkṛta taraṇe pratīyete vidyā sāmarthyāt ca prāk eva avagamyete tathā śāṭhyāyaninām tāṇḍinām ca śruteḥ śruti arthau ca pāṭha kramāt balīyāṃsau aagnihotram juhoti yavāgūm pacati iti atra yathā tasmāt pūrva pakṣa abhāvāt anārabhyam etad  atra ucyate na etad pāṭha krama mātram api tu śrutiḥ tad sukṛta duṣkṛte vidhūnuta iti tad iti hi sarvanāma tasmāt arthe sannihita parāmarśakam tasya hetu bhāvam āha sannihitam ca yad anantaram śrutam tad ca ardha patha varti virajānadī manaḥ  abhigamanam iti ardha patha eva sukṛta duṣkṛta tyāgaḥ na ca śruti antara virodhaḥ ardha pathe api pāpa vidhūnane brahma loka saṃbhavāt prāk kālatā upapatteḥ evam śāṭhyāyaninām api avirodhaḥ na hi tatra jīvan  iti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam tathā ca ardha patha eva sukṛta duṣkṛta vimokaḥ evañca na paryaṅka vidyātaḥ tad prakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu vidyā sāmarthya vidhūta kalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchataḥ  brahma prāptiḥ na ca aprakṣīṇa kalmaṣasya uttara mārga gamanam saṃbhavati yathā yavāgū pākāt prāgna agnihotram yama niyama ādi anuṣṭhāna sahitāyāḥ  vidyāyā uttareṇa mārgeṇa paryaṅka stha brahma prāpti upāyatva śravaṇāt aprakṣīṇa pāpmanaḥ ca tad anupapatteḥ vidyā eva tādṛśī kalmaṣam kṣapayati kṣapita kalmaṣam ca uttara mārgam prāpayati iti katham ardha pathe kalmaṣayaḥ tasmāt pāṭha krama bādhena artha kramaḥ  anusartavyaḥ nanu na pāṭha krama mātram atra tad iti sarvanāma śrutyā saṃnihita parāmarśāt iti uktam tad ayuktam buddhi saṃnidhāna mātram atra upayujyate na anyat  tad ca anantarasya iva vidyā prakaraṇāt vidyāyā api iti samānā śrutiḥ ubhayatra api iti artha pāṭhau pariśiṣyete tatra ca arthaḥ  balīyān iti na ca tāṇḍyādi śrutya virodhaḥ pūrva pakṣe aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya iti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāram brūte na ca paretasya asti svātantryam tasmāt tad virodhaḥ chandata ubhaya avirodhāt  kebhyaḥ cit padebhya idam sūtram nanu yathā paretasya uttareṇa pathā brahma prāptiḥ bhavati iti vidyā phalam evam tasya eva ardha pathe sukṛta duṣkṛta hāniḥ api bhaviṣyati iti śaṅkā padāni tebhya uttaram idam sūtram yad vyācaṣṭe yadi ca dehāt apasṛptasya iti vidyā phalam api brahma prāptiḥ na aparetasya bhavitum arhati śaṅkā padebhyaḥ yathā āhuḥ na ajanitvā tatra gacchanti iti sukṛta duṣkṛta prakṣayaḥ tu sati api nara śarīre saṃbhavati iti samarthasya hetoḥ yama niyama ādi sahitāyāḥ  vidyāyāḥ karya kṣaya ayogāt i uktaḥ  jīvata eva sukṛta duṣkṛta kṣaya iti siddham chandataḥ svacchandataḥ sva icchayā iti yāvat  sva icchayā anuṣṭhānam yama niyama ādi sahitāyāḥ  vidyāyāḥ tasya jīvataḥ puruṣasya syāt na mṛtasya tad pūrvakam casu kṛta duṣkṛta hānam syāt jīvata eva samarthasya kṣepā yogāt evam kāraṇa anantaram kārya utpāde sati nimitta naimittakayoḥ tad bhāvasya upapattiḥ tāṇḍi śāṭhyāya niśrutyoḥ ca saṃgatiḥ ita rathā svātantrya abhāvena asaṃgatiḥ uktā syāt  tad anena ubhaya virodhaḥ  vyākhyataḥ ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛta duṣkṛte katham paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottara tayā sūtram vyācakhyuḥ chandataḥ saṃkalpata iti śruti smṛtyoravirodhādevaḥ na tu atra āgama gamyer athe svātantryeṇa yuktiḥ niveśanīyete teṣām adhikaraṇa śarīra anupraveśe saṃbhavati artha antara upavarṇa nama saṅgatam eva iti gateḥ arthavat tvam ubhayathā anyathā hi virodhaḥ yathā hāni saṃnidhau  upāyanam anyatra śrutam iti tatra api kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatra api upāyanam upasthāpayati evam tad sannidhau  eva deva yānaḥ panthāḥ śruta iti yatra api sukṛta duṣkṛta hāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatra api deva yānam panthānam upasthāpayitum arhati na ca nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti anena virodhaḥ deva yānena pathā brahma loka prāptau nirañjanasya parama sāmya upapatteḥ tasmāt hāni mātre deva yānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam evam prāptam ucyate vidvān puṇya pāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti hi viduṣaḥ  vidhūta puṇya pāpasya vidyayā kṣema prāptim āha bhrama nibandhanaḥ  akṣemaḥ  yāthātmya jñāna lakṣaṇayā vidyāyā vinivartanīyaḥ na asau deśa viśeṣam apekṣate na hi jātu rajjau sarpa bhrama nivṛttaye samutpannam rajju tattava jñānam deśa viśeṣam apekṣate vidyā utpādasya eva sva virodhi avidyā nivṛtti rūpa tvāt na ca vidyā utpādāyāḥ  brahma loka prāptiḥ apekṣaṇīyā yama niyama ādi viśuddha sattvasya iha eva śravaṇa ādibhiḥ vidyā utpādāt  yadi parama ārabdha kārya karma kṣapaṇāya śarīra pātau  adhyapekṣā iti na deva yānena asti iha artha iti śruti dṛṣṭa virodhāt na apekṣitavya iti asti tu paryaṅka vidyāyām tasmārtha iti uktam dvitīyena sūtreṇa iti ye tu yadi puṇyam api nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatar iti āśaṅkya sūtram avatārayanti gateḥ arthavat tvam ubhayathā duṣkṛta nivṛttyā su kṛta nivṛttyā ca yadi punar  puṇyam anuvarteta brahma loka gatasya api iha puṇya phala upabhogāya vṛttiḥ syāt  tathā ca etena pratipādyamāna āgatyanāvṛtti śruti virodhaḥ tasmāt duṣkṛtasya iva sukṛtasya api prakṣaya iti taiḥ punar anāśaṅkanīyam eva āśaṅkitam vidyā kṣiptāyām hi gatau kā iyam āśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇa sukṛtaḥ kimartha mayam yāti iti na hi eṣā su kṛta nibandhanā gatiḥ api tu vidyā nibandhanā tasmāt vṛddha uktam eva upavarṇanam sādhu iti aniyamaḥ sarvāsām avirodhaḥ śabda anumānābhyām prakaraṇam hi dharmāṇām niyāmakam yadi tu tad na ādriyate tatas  darśa pūrṇamāsa jyotiṣṭoma ādi dharmāḥ saṃkīryeran na ca teṣām vikṛtiṣu saurya ādiṣu dvādaśa aha ādiṣu ca udakataḥ prāptiḥ sarvatra aupadeśika tvāt  na ca darvi homasya aprakṛti vikārasya adharmaka tvam na ca sarva dharma yuktam karma kiñcid api śakyam anuṣṭhātum na ca evam sati śruti ādoya api viniyojakāḥ teṣām api hi prakaraṇena sāmānya saṃbandhe sati viniyojaka tvāt  yatra api vinā aprakaraṇam śruti ādibhyaḥ  viniyogaḥ  avagamyate tatra api tad nirvāhāya prakaraṇasya avaśyam kalpanīya tvāt  tasmāt prakaraṇam viniyogāya tad niyamāya ca avaśya abhyupetavyam anyathā śruti adīnām aprāmāṇya prasakteḥ tasmāt yāsu eva upāsanāsu deva yānaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ  vā panthā āmnātaḥ tāsu eva na tu upāsana antareṣu tad anāmnānāt  na ca aye ca ime araṇye śraddhā ātapa iti upāsate iti sāmānya vacanāt sarva vidyāsu tad patha prāptiḥ śraddhā tapaḥ parāyaṇānām eva tatra tad patha prāptiḥ śrūyate na tu vidyā parāyaṇānām api cā evam sati ekasyām vidyāyām mārga upadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu iti ekatra eva mārga upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ  na vidyā antare vidyā antare ca śrūyate tasmāt na sarva upāsanāsu pathiprāptiḥ iti prāptam evam prāpte ucyate aye ca ime araṇye śraddhā ātapa iti upāsate iti na śraddhā tapaḥ mātrasya pathi prāptim āhā api tu vidyayā tadā āroha anti iti atra na avidvāṃsaḥ tapasvina iti kevalasya tapasaḥ śraddhāyāḥ ca tad prāpti pratiṣedhāt vidyā sahite śraddhā tapasī tad prāpi upāya tayā vadan vidyā antarīlānām api pañca agni vidyā vidbhiḥ samāna mārgatām darśayati tathā anyatra api pañca agni vidyā adhikāre abhidhīyate aya evam etāt viduḥ ye cāmī araṇye śraddhām satyam upāsate iti satya śabdasya brahmaṇi eva anapekṣa pravṛtti tvāt tad eva hi satyam anyasya mithyātvena kathañcid āpekṣika satya tvāt pañca agni vidāṃ cetthaṃvittayā eva upātta tvāt vidyā sāhacaryāt ca vidyā antara parāyaṇānām eva idam upādānam nyāṭyam mārga dvaya bhraṣṭānām ca adhas gati śravaṇāt  tatra api ca yogyatayā deva yānasya eva iha adhvanaḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ etad uktam bhavati bhavet prakaraṇam niyāmakam yadi aniyama pratipādakam vākyam śrautam smārtam vā na syāt asti tu tad tasya ca prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ tvam tasmāt aniyamaḥ  vidyā antareṣu api sa guṇeṣu deva yānaḥ panthā asakṛt mārga upadeśasya ca prayojanam varṇitam bāṣya kṛta iti yāvat adhikāram avasthiti gadhi kārikāṇām sa guṇānām vidyāyām cintām kṛtvā nirguṇāyām cintayati nirguṇāyām vidyāyām na apavargaḥ palam bhavitum arhati śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu viduṣām api apāntara tamaḥ prabhṛtīnām tad tad deha parigraha parityāgau śrūyete tad apavarga phala tve na upapadyate apavṛktasya tad anupapatteḥ upapattau vā tad lakṣaṇā yogāt apunā āvṛttiḥ hi tad lakṣaṇam tena satyām api vidyāyām tad anupapatteḥ na mokṣaḥ phalam vidyāyām vibhūtayaḥ tu tāḥ tāḥ tasyāḥ phalam apunarāvṛtti śrutiḥ punar tad praśaṃsā artha iti manyate na ca atāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimokṣye atha saṃpatsye iti śruteḥ viduṣaḥ  deha pāta avadhi pratīkṣāvat vasiṣṭha ādīnām api prārabdha karma phala upabhoga pratīkṣā iti sāṃpratam yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭha ādīnām ārabdham śarīram tad pratīkṣā syāt  tathā ca na śarīra antaram te gṛhṇīyuḥ na ca tāvat eva ciram iti etad api ārjavena ghaṭate samartha hetu saṃnidhau kṣepā yogāt tasmāt etad api vidyāstutya eva gamayitavyam tasmāt na apavargaḥ  vidyā phalam tathā cāpa varga ākṣepeṇa pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ atra ca pākṣikam mokṣa hetu tvam iti āpātatas  ahetu tvam vetu tu pūrva pakṣa tattvam rāddha antaḥ tu vidyā karmasu anuṣṭhāna toṣita īśvara coditam adhikāram samāpya ete pratiśanti param padam nirguṇāyām vidyāyām apavarga lakṣaṇam śrūyamāṇam na stuti mātra tayā vyākhyāyam ucitam paurvāparya paryālocane bhūyasīnām śrutīnām atra eva tātparya avadhāraṇāt na ca yatra tātparyam tad anyathayitum yuktam uktam hi ana vidyau paraḥ śabda artha iti na ca viduṣam apāntara maḥ prabhṛtīnām tad tad deha saṃtārāt satyām api brahma vidyā āyām anirmokṣān na brahma vidyā mokṣasya hetuḥ iti sāmpratam hetoḥ api sati pratibandhe kārya anupajanaḥ  na hetu bhāvam apaka aroti na hi vṛnta phala saṃyoga pratibaddham guru tvam na patanam ajījanat iti pratibandha apagame tad kurvan  tad hetuḥ na ca na setu pratibandhānām apām nimna deśān abhisarpaṇam iti setu bhede na nimnam abhisarpanti tadvat iha api vidyā karma ārādhana āvarjita īśvara vihita adhikāra pada pratibaddhā brahma vidyā yadi api na muktim dattavatī tathā api tad parisamāptau pratibandha vigame dāsyati yathā hi prārabdha vipākasya karmaṇaḥ prakṣayam pratīkṣamāṇaḥ carama deha samutpanna brahma sākṣātkāraḥ  api dhriyate atha tad prakṣayāt mokṣam prāpnoti evam prārabdha adhikāra lakṣaṇa phala vidyā karmā puruṣaḥ  vasiṣṭha ādiḥ vidvān api tad kṣayam pratīkṣamāṇaḥ  yuj utkrameṇa vā tad tad deha parigraha parityāgau kurvan muktaḥ  api anābhoga ātmikayā prakhyayā sāṃsārika ava viharati tad idam uktam sukṛta pravṛttam eva hi te karma āśayam adhikāra phala dānāya iti prārabdha vipākāni tu karmāṇi varjayitvā vyapagata anijñānena eva ativāhitāni na ca ete jātismarā iti yaḥ  hi para vaśaḥ  deham parityājyate deha antaram ca nītaḥ pūrva janma anubhūtasya smarati sa janmavān jāti smarca gṛhāt iva gṛha antare sva icchayā kāya antaram saṃcaramāṇaḥ  na jāti smara ākhyāyatam vyudya vivādam kṛtvā vyatirekam āha yadi hi upayukte sukṛt pravṛtte prārabdha vipāke karmaṇi karma antara mapra ārabdha vipākam iti syet ātat  vidyayā avidyā ādi kleśa nivṛttau na avaśyam niḥśeṣasya karma āśayasya nivṛtti nara nādi bhava paraspara āhitasya aniyata vipāka kālasya asaṅkhyeya tvāt karma śayasya ityata āha na ca avidyā ādi kleśa dāhe satīte nahi samāne vināśa hetau kasyacid vināśaḥ  na aparasya iti śakyam vaditum tad kim idānīm pravṛtta phalam iti karma vinaśyet  tathā ca na viduṣaḥ  vasiṣṭha ādeḥ deha dhāraṇā ityata āha pravṛtta phalasya tu karmaṇa iti tasya tāvat eva ciram iti śruti prāmāṇāt anāgata phalam eva karma kṣīyate na pravṛtta phalam iti avagamyate apica na adhikāra vayām sarveṣām ṛṣīṇām ātma tattva jñānam tena avyāpakaḥ  api ayam parva pakṣa iti āha jñāna antareṣu ca iti tad kinteṣām anirmokṣa eva na iti āha te paścāt aiśvarya kṣaya iti nirviṇṇā viraktāḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ pralayaḥ apica svarga ādau  anubhava patham anārohati śabda eka samadhigamye vicikitsā syāt api manda dhiyāmām uṣmika phala tvam prati yathā ca artha vādaḥ akaḥ hi tad veda yad amuṣmin  loke asti vā na vā iti advaita jñāna phala tve mokṣasya anubhava siddhe vicikitsā gandhaḥ  api na asti iti āha pratyakṣa phala tvāt ca iti advaita tattva sākṣāt kāraḥ  hi avidyā samāropitam prapañcam sa mūla ghātam nighnandhoram saṃsāra aṅga paritāpam upaśamayati puruṣasya iti anuvāt api sphuṭam upapatidraḍhimnaḥ ca śrutiḥ darśitā tad ca anubhavāt vāmadeva ādīnām siddham nanu tad tvam asi vartasa iti vākyam katham anubhavam eva dyotayati iti ata āha na hi tattvam asīti asya iti vartamāna apadeśasya bhaviṣyat artha tā mṛta śabda adhyāhāraḥ ca aśakya iti arthaḥ akṣara dhiyām tu avarodhaḥ sāmānya tad bhāvābhyām aupasadavat tad uktam aṅara viṣayāṇām  ḷ  pratiṣedha dhiyām sarva veda vartinīnām avarodha upasaṃhāraḥ pratiṣedha sāmānyāt akṣarasya tad bhāva pratyabhijñānāt ānanda ādayaḥ pradhānasya iti atra ayam arthaḥ  yadi api bhāva rūpeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu siddhaḥ tantrī āyatayā ca niṣedha rūpeṣu iti siddha eva tathā api tasya eva eṣa prapañcaḥ  avagantavyaḥ nidarśanam jāmadagnye ahīna iti yadi api śābare datta uttaram atra udāharaṇa antaram tathā api tulya nyāyatayait api śakyam udāhartum iti udāharaṇa antaram darśitam tatra śābaram udāharaṇam asti ādhānam yajurveda vihitam aya evam vidvān agnim ādhatta iti tad aṅga tvena yajurveda eva aya evam vidvān vāravantīyam gāyati ya evam vidvān yajñāyajñīyam gāyati ya evam vidvān vāmadevyam gāyati iti vihitam etāni ca sāmāni sāmavedeṣu utpannāni tatra idam saṃdihyate kim etāni yatra utpadyante tatrapyaineva ucca eṣṭvena svareṇa ādhāne prayoktavyāni atha yad na viniyujyante tatratyena upāṃśu tvena svareṇa auccais  sāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā iti śruteḥ kim tāt prāptam utpatti vidhinā eva apekṣita upāyatva ātmanā vihita tvāt aṅganām tasya eva prāthamyāt tad nibandhana eva uccais svare prāpta ucyate guṇa mukhya vyatikrame tad artha tvāt mukhyena veda saṃyogaḥ ayam arthaḥ utpatti vidhiḥ guṇa u viniyoga vidhiḥ tu pradhānam tad anayoḥ vyātikrame virodhe utpatti vidhi ālocanena uccaiṣṭvam viniyoga vidhi ālocanena ca upāṃśu tvam saḥ  ayam virodhaḥ  vyatikramaḥ tasmin vayati krame mukhyena pradhānena niyujyamānatva rūpeṇa tasya vāravantīya ādeḥ veda saṃyogaḥ  grāhyaḥ  na utpadyamāna tvena guṇena kutas  viniyujyamāna tvasya mukhya tvena utpadyamāna tvasya guṇa tvena tad artha tvāt viniyujyamāna artha tvāt utpadyamāna tvasya etad uktam bhavati yadi api utpatti vidhau  api cātūrūpyam asti vidhi tvasya aviśeṣāt tad mātranā antarīyaka tvāt ca ca ātabarūpyasya tathā api vākyānām aidaṃparyam bhidyate ekasya eva vidheḥ utpatti viniyoga adhikāra prayoga rūpeṣu caturṣu madhye kiñcid eva rūpam kenacid vākyena ullikhyate yad anyatas  aprāptam tatra yadi api sāmavede sāmāni vihitāni tathā api tad vākyānām tad utpatti mātra para tā viniyogasya yājuḥ vaidikaiḥ eva vākyai prāpta tvāt  tathā ca utpatti vākyebhyaḥ samīhita artha apratilambhāt viniyoga vākyebhyaḥ ca tad avagateḥ tad arthāni eva utpatti vākyāni bhavanti iti tatra yena vākyena viniyujyante tasya eva svarasya sādhana tvaṃsaṃsparśinaḥ grahaṇam na tu rūpa mātra sparśina iti bhāṣya kārīyam api udāharaṇam evam eva yojayitavyam udrātṛ veda utpannānām mantraṇām udgātrā prayoge prāpte adhvaryu pradānake api puroḍāśe viniyukta tvāt pradhāna anurodhena adhvaryuṇā eva teṣām prayogaḥ  na udrātra iti dārṣṭa antike yojayati evam iha api iti iyat āmananāt  aguhān praviṣṭau  ātmānau iti atra siddhaḥ  api arthaḥ prapañcyate ekatra bhokra bhokroḥ vedya tā anyatra bhokroḥ eva iti vedya bhedāt vidyā bheda iti na ca sṛṣṭiḥ upada dhāti itivat pibadapibat lakṣaṇa aparam pibantau  iti netum ucitam sati mukhya artha saṃbhave tad āśrayaṇa ayogāt na ca vākya śeṣa anurodhāt tad āśrayaṇam saṃdehe hi vākya śeṣāt nirṇayaḥ  na ca mukhya lākṣaṇika grahaṇa viṣayaḥ  viṣayaḥ saṃbhavati tulya balatva abhāvāt prakaraṇasya ca tatas  balīyasā vākyena bādhanāt  tasmāt vedya bhedāt vidyā bheda iti prāpta ucyate dvāsuparṇati atra ṛtam pibantau  iti atra ca dvitva saṃkhyā utpattau pratīyate tena samāna tautsargikī pibantau  iti dvayoḥ pibantā yā sā bādhanīyā sā ca upakrama upasaṃhāra anurodhena na dvayoḥ api tu chatri nyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā yena hi upakramyate yena ca upasaṃsthite tad anurodhena madhyam jñeyam yathā jāmitva doṣa saṃkīrtana upakrame tad pratisamādhāna upasaṃhāre ca saṃdarbhe madhya pātinaḥ  viṣṇu rūpāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ  ajāmi tvāya iti ādayaḥ pṛthagvidhi tvam alabhamānā vidhi tvam avivakṣitvā artha vāda tayā nītāḥ tad kasya hetoḥ eka vākyatā hi sādhīyasī vākya bhedāt iti tathā iha api tad anurodhena pibat apibatsamūha param lakṣaṇīyam pibantau  iti anena tathā ca vedya abhedāt vidyā bheda iti apica triṣu api eteṣu vedāntaṣu prakaraṇa traye api paurvāparya paryālocanayā parama ātma vidyā eva avagamyate yadi evam katham tarhi jīva upādānam astu iti ata āha tādātmya vivakṣaya iti na asyām jīvaḥ pratipādyate kintu paramātmanaḥ  abhedam jīvasya darśayitum asau  anūdyate paramātma vidyāyāḥ ca abheda viṣaya tvāt na bheda abheda vicāra avatāraḥ tasmāt aika vidyam atra siddham antarā bhūta grāma vatsvātmanaḥ kauṣīta keya kahola cākrāyaṇa uṣasta praśna upakramayoḥ vidyoḥ na etarantaṇa āmnātayoḥ kim asti bhedaḥ  na vā iti viśaye bheda eva iti bhrūmaḥ kutas  yadi api ubhayatra praśna uttarayoḥ abhedaḥ pratīyate tathā api tad sya eva ekasya punar  śruteḥ aviśeśāt ānarthakya prasaṅgāt yajati abhyāsavat bhedaḥ prāptaḥ na ca ekasya eva tāṇḍinām nava kṛtva upadeśe api yathā bhedaḥ  na bhavati asa ātmā tattvam ati śvetaketaḥ iti atra tathā iha api abheda iti yuktam bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatu iti hi tatra śrūyate tena abhedaḥ  yujyate na ca iha tathā asti tena yadi api iha vedyā bhedaḥ  avagamyate tathā api ekatra tasya eva aśanāya ādi mātra atyaya upādheḥ upāsanāt ekatra ca kārya karaṇa viraha upādheḥ upāsanāt vidyā bheda eva iti prāpte pratyucyate na etad upāsana avidhāna param api tu vastu svarūpa pratipādana param praśna prativacana ālocanena upalabhyate kim atas  yadyavam etad atas  bhavati vidhera prāpta prāpaṇa artha tvāt prāptau  anupapattiḥ vastu svarūpam tu punar punar ucyamānam api na doṣam āvahati śata kṛtvā u api hi pathyam vadanti āptāḥ viśeṣataḥ tu vedaḥ pitṛbhyām api abhyarhitaḥ na ca sarvathā paunaruktyam ekatra aśanāya ādi atyayāt anyatra ca kārya kāraṇa pravilayāt tasmāt ekā vidyā pratyabhijñānāt  ubhābhyām api vidyābhyām bhinna ātmā pratipādyate iti yaḥ  manyate pūrva pakṣa eka deśī tam prati sarva antaratva virodhaḥ  darśitaḥ anyathā bheda anupapattiḥ iti ca id na upadeśa antaravat iti asya tu pūrva pakṣa tattva abhiprāyaḥ  darśitaḥ sugamam anyat  vyatihāraḥ  virsiṣanti hi itaravat  utkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭa rūpā patteḥ na ubhayatra ubhaya rūpa anucintanam api tu nikṛṣṭe jīva utkṛṣṭa rūpa abheda cintanam evam hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭaḥ  bhavati iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate itaretara anuvādena itareta rūpa vidhānāt ubhayatra abhaya cintanam vidhīyate itarathā tu yaḥ  aham saḥ  asau  iti etāvat eva ucyeta jīvātmānam anūdyeśvara tvam asya vidhīyeta na tu īśvarasya jīva ātma tvam yaḥ  asau saḥ  aham iti yathā tad tvam asīti atra tasmāt ubhaya rūpam ubhayatra adhyānāya upadiśyate nanu evam utkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭa prasaṅga iti uktam tad kim idānīm saguṇe brahmaṇi upāsyamāne asya vastu tas  nirguṇasya nikṛṣṭa tā bhavati kasmaicid phalāya tathā dhyāna mātram vidhīyatena tu asya nikṛṣṭa tām āpādayati iti ced iha api vyatihāra anucintana mātram upadiśyate phalāya na ti nikṛṣṭa tā bhavati utkṛṣṭasya anvācaya śiṣṭam tu tādātmya dārḍhyam bhavat na upekṣāmahe satya kāma ādi guṇa upadeśa iva tad guṇa īśvara siddhiḥ iti siddham ubhayatra ubhaya ātmatva adhyanam iti sā eva hi satya ādayaḥ tad vai tad etad eva tadāsa satyam eva sa yaḥ  ha etad mahat yakṣam prathama jam veda satyam brahma iti jayati imān  lokān jita iti asāvasat ya evam etad mahat yakṣam prathama jam veda satyam brahma iti satyam hi eva brahma pūrva uktasya hṛdaya ākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyam iti upāsanam ena saṃdarbheṇa vidhīyate tad iti hṛdaya ākhyam brahmā ekena tadā parāmṛśati etad eva iti vakṣyamāṇam prakāra antaram asya parāmṛśati tad tāda agre āsa
