babhūva kim tad iti ata āha satyam eva sat ca mūrtam tyat cāmūrtam ca sattyam tad upāsakasya phalam āha sa yaḥ  ha etam iti yaḥ prathama jam yakṣam pūjyam veda katham veda ityata āha satyam brahma iti iti sa jayati imān lokān kiñca jitaḥ  vaśīkṛta inu śabda itthaṃśabdasya arthe vartate vijetavya tvena buddhi saṃnihitam śatrum parāmṛśati asau  iti asat bhavet naśyet  uktam artha nigamayati ya evam etad iti evam vidvān kasmāt jayati iti ata āha satyam eva yasmāt brahma iti atas tad upāsanāt phala utpādaḥ  api satya iti arthaḥ tad yad tad satyam kim atau atra api tad padābhyām rūpa prakārai parāmṛṣṭau kasmiṃnna ālambane tad upāsanīyam iti ata uttaram sa ādityaḥ  ya eṣa ityādinā tasya upaniṣad haraham iti hanti pāpmānam jahāti ca ya evam veda iti antena upaniṣad  rahasyam nāma tasya nirvacanam hanti pāpmānam jahāti ca iti hanteḥ jahāteḥ vā rūpam etad  tathā ca nirvacanam kurvan phalam pāpa hāni māhā iti tam imam viṣayam āha bhāṣya kāraḥ yaḥ  vai ha etam iti sa nāma akṣara upāsanām iti tathā ca śrutiḥ atat etad akṣaram satyam iti sa iti ekam akṣaram ti iti ekam akṣaram yam iti ekam akṣaram prathama uttame akṣare satyam madhyataḥ  anṛtam tad etad anṛmubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītam satya bhūyam eva bhavati na evaṃvid vāṃsam anṛtam hinasti iti tītīkāra anubandha uccāraṇa arthaḥ niranubandhastakāraḥ  draṣṭavyaḥ atra hi prathama uttame akṣare satyam mṛtyu rūpa abhāvāt madhyataḥ  madhye anṛtam anṛtam hi mṛtyuḥ mṛtyvanṛtayoḥ takāra sāmyāt  tad etad anṛtam mṛtyu rūpam ubhayatas  satyena parigṛhītam antar bhāvitam satya rūpābhyām atas  akiñcitkaram tad satya bhūyam eva satya bāhulyam eva bhavati śeṣam ati rohita artham sā iyam satya vidyāyāḥ sa nāma akṣaya upāsana tā yadi api tad yad satyam iti prakṛta anukarṣeṇa ābedaḥ pratīyate tathā api phala bhedena bhedaḥ sādhya bhedena iva nitya kāmya diṣayoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ  yajeta yāvat jīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti śāstrayoḥ sati api anubandha abhede bheda iti prāpte pratyucyate ekaiva iyam vidyā tad satyam iti prakṛta parāmarśāt abhedena pratyabhijñānāt  na ca phala bhedaḥ tasya upaniṣad haraham iti tasya eva yad aṅga antaram rahasya nāmnā upāsanam tad praśaṃsā arthoḥ athavādaḥ  ayam na phala vidhiḥ yadi punar vidyā vidhau  adhikāra śravaṇa abhāvāt tad kalpana āyāma artha vādikam phalam kalpyeta tatas  jāteṣṭau  iva agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā saṃvalita adhikāra kalpanā tatas ca samasta artha vādika phala yuktam ekam eva upāsanam iti siddham parakīyam vyākhyānam upanyasyati kecid punar iti vājasaneyakam api akṣi āditya viṣayam chāndogyam api iti upāsya abhedāt abhedaḥ tatas ca vājasaneya uktānām satya ādīnām upasaṃhāra iti atra arthe sā eva hi satya ādaya iti sūtram vyākhyātam tad etad dūṣayati tad na sādhu iti jyotiṣṭoma karma saṃbandhinīya mudgītha vyapāśraya iti anubandha abhede api sādhya bhedāt bheda iti vidyā bhedāt anupasaṃhāra iti kāma ādi itaratra tatra ca āyatana ādibhyaḥ chān dogya vāja saneya vidyayoḥ yadi api sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena bhedaḥ tathā hi chāndogye aatha ya iha ātmānam anuvidya vrajanti etān  ca satyān kāmān iti ātmavat kāmānām api vedya tvam śrūyate vājasaneye tu nirguṇam eva param brahma upadiśyate avimokṣāya brūhi iti tathā api tayoḥ paraspara guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ nirguṇāyām tāvat vidyāyām brahmastutyartham eva sa guṇa vidyā saṃbandhi guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ saṃbhavī sa guṇāyām ca yadi api ādhyānāya na vaśitva ādi guṇa upasaṃhāra saṃbhavaḥ na hi nirguṇāyām vidyāyāmādhāyātavya tvena ete coditā yena atra adhyeya tvena saṃbadhyeran  api tu satya kāma ādi guṇanā antarīyaka tvena eteṣām prāptiḥ iti upasaṃhāra ucyate evam vyavasthita eṣa saṃkṣepaḥ  adhikaraṇa arthasya sāmya bāhulye api ekatra ākāśa ādhāra tvasya aparatra ca ākāśa tādātmyasya śravaṇāt bhede vidyayoḥ na paraspara guṇa upasaṃhāra iti pūrva pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu sarva sāmyam eva ubhaya tra api ātma upadeśāt ākāśa śabdena ekatra ātmā uktaḥ  anyatra ca dahara ākāśa ādhāraḥ sa eva ukta iti sarva sāmyāt brahmaṇi ubhayatra api sarva guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena tu vidyā bhede api guṇa upasaṃhāra vyavasthā darśitā tasmāt sarvam avadātam ādārada lopaḥ asti vaiśvānara vidyāyām tad upāsakasya atithibhyaḥ pūrva bhojanam tena yadi api iyam upāsana agocarā na cintā sākṣāt tathā api tad saṃbaddha prathama bhojana saṃbandhāt asti saṃgatiḥ vicāra gocaram darśayati chāndogye vaiśvānara vidyām prakṛtyā iti vicāra prayojakam saṃdeham āha kim bhojana lopa iti atra pūrva pakṣa abhāvena saṃśayam ākṣipati tad yad bhaktam iti bhakta āgamana saṃyoga śravaṇāt iti uktam khalu etad prathama  eva tantre apada karma aprayojakam nayanasya para artha tvāt iti anena yathā soma kraya arthānīyamāna eka hāyanī saptama pada pāṃśu grahaṇam aprayojakam na punar eka hāyanyā nayanam prayojayati tad kasya hetoḥ soma krayeṇa tad nayanasya prayukta tvāt tad upajīvi tvāt saptama pad pāṃśu grahaṇasya iti tathā iha api bhojana artha bhakta āgamana saṃyogāt prāṇa āhuteḥ bhojana abhāve bhaktam pratyaprayojaka tvam iti na asti pūrva pakṣa iti apūrva pakṣam idam adhikaraṇam iti arthaḥ pūrva pakṣam ākṣipya samādhatte evam prāpte na lupyeta iti tāvat āha tāvat śabdaḥ siddhānta śaṅkā nirākaraṇa arthaḥ pṛcchati kasmāt  uttaram ādarāt  tad eva sphorayati tathā hi iti jābālā hi śrāvayanti apūrvaḥ  atithibhyaḥ  aśrīyāt iti aśrīyāt iti ca prāṇa agnihotra pradhānam vacaḥ ayathā hi śrudhitā bālā mātaram paryupāsate evam sarvāṇi bhūtāni agnihotram upāsate iti vacanāt agni hotrasya atithīn bhūtāni pratyupajīvya tvena śravaṇāt tad eka vākyatayā iha api pūrvaḥ atithibhyaḥ  aśrīyāt iti prāṇa āhuti pradhānam lakṣyate tad evam sati ayathā āha vai svayam ahutvā agnihotram parasya juhuyāt iti evam tad iti atithi bhojanasya prāthamyam ninditvā svāmi bhojanam svāminaḥ prāṇa agni hotram prathamam prāpayantī prāṇa agni hotrāt aram karoti nanu ā atithitām eṣā śrutiḥ prāṇa hutim kintu svāmi bhojana pakṣa eva na abhojane api iti ata āha yā hi na prāthamyalopam sahate natarām sā prāthamyavataḥ  agnihotrasya lopam saheta iti manyate īdṛśaḥ khalu ayam ādaraḥ prāṇa agnihotrasya dharmiṇaḥ prāthamyadharma lopam api na sahate śrutiḥ tadā asyāḥ kā eva kathā dharmi lopam sahata iti arthaḥ pūrva pakṣa ākṣepam anubhāṣya dūṣayati nanu bhojana arthā iti yathā hi kauṇḍapāyinām ayana gate agnihotre prakaraṇa antarāt naiyamika agnihotrāt bhinne dravya devatā rūpa dharma antara rahita tayā tad ākāṅkṣe sādhya sādṛśyena naiyamikā agnihotra samāna nāmatayā tad dharma atideśena rūpa dharma antara prāptiḥ evam prāṇa agnihotre api naiyamika agnihotra gata payaḥ prabhṛti prāptau bhojana āgata bhakta dravya tā vidhīyate na ca etāvatā bhojanasya prayojaka tvam uktam etad yathā bhojana kāla atikramāt prāṇa agnihotrasya na bhojana prayukta tvam iti na ca eka deśa dravya tayā uttara ardhāt sviṣṭa kṛte samavadyati itivat aprayojaka tvam eka deśa dravya sādhanasya api prayojaka tvāt  yathā jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti iti patnī saṃyājānām jāghanī eka deśa dravya juṣām jāghanī prayojaka tvam sa hi nāma aprayojakaḥ  bhavati yasya prayojaka grahaṇam antareṇa arthaḥ  na jñāyate yathā na prayojaka puroḍāśa grahaṇam antareṇa uttara ardham jñātum śakyam śakyam tu jāghanīvat bhaktam jñātum tasmāt yathā jāghanī antareṇa api paśu upādānam para prayukta śūpa jīvanam vā khaṇḍaśaḥ māṃsa vikrayiṇaḥ  muṇḍa ādivat ākṛti rūpa ādīyate evam bhaktam api śakyam upādātum tasmāt na bhojanasya lope prāṇa agni hotra lopa iti manyate pūrva pakṣī adbhiḥ iti tu pratinidhi upādānam āvaśyakatva sūcana artham bhāṣya kārasya upasthite atas tad vacanāt  tad homīyam iti hi vacana kim api saṃnihita dravyam home viniyuṅkte tadaḥ sarva nāmnaḥ saṃnihita avagamam antareṇa abhidhāna aparyavasānāt tadanena sva abhidhāna paryavasānāya tad yad bhaktam prathamam āgacchet iti saṃnihitam apekṣya nirvartitavyam tad ca saṃnihitam bhaktam bhojana artham iti uttara ardhāt sviṣṭa kṛte samavadyati itivat na bhaktam vāpaḥ  vā dravya antaram vā prayoktum arhati jāghanyā astu avayava bhedasya na agnīṣomīya paśu adhīnam nirūpaṇam svatantrasya api tasya sūnā sthasya darśanāt tasmāt asti etasya jāghanītaḥ viśeṣaḥ yad ca uktam ca udaka prāpta dravya bādhayā bhakta dravya vidhānam iti tad ayuktam vidhi uddeśa gatasya agnihotra nāmnaḥ tathā bhāvāt artha vādikasya tu siddham kiñcid sādṛśyam upādāya stāvaka tvena upapatteḥ na tad bhāvam vidhātum arhati iti āha na ca atra prākṛta agnihotra dharma prāptiḥ iti api ca agnihotrasya ca udakataḥ dharma prāptau  abhyupagamyamānāyām bahutaram prāptam bādhyate na ca saṃbhave bādhanicayaḥ  nyāpyaḥ kṛṣṇala carau khalva gatyā prāpta bādhaḥ abhyupeyata iti āha tad dharma prāptau ca abhyupagamyamānāyām iti ca udaka abhāvam upodbalayati ata eva ca iha api iti yata eva uktena krameṇa atideśa abhāvaḥ  ata eva sāṃpādika tvam agni hotra aṅgānām tad prāptau tu sāṃpādika tvam na upapadyeta kāminyām kila kuca vadanāt yasatā cakravāka nalina ādi rūpeṇa saṃpādyate na tu nadyām cakravākādaya eva cakravāka ādinā saṃpādyante atas  api avagacchāmaḥ  na ca udaka prāptiḥ iti yadtva ādara darśanam iti tad bhojana pakṣe prāthamya vidhāna artham yasmin pakṣe dharmān avalopaḥ tasmin dharmiṇaḥ  api na tu etāvatā dharmi nityatā sidhyati iti bhāvaḥ nanu atithi bhojana uttara kālatā svāmi bhojanasya vihitā iti katham asau bādhyata iti ata āha na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ sāmānya śāstra bādhāyām viśeṣa śāstrasya ati bhāraḥ  na asti iti arthaḥ tad nirdhāraṇā niyamaḥ tad dṛṣṭeḥ pṛthak hya pratibandhaḥ phalam yathā eva ayasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti etad anārabhya adhītam avyabhicārita kratu saṃbandham juhūdvārā kratu prayoga vacana gṛhītam kratatvartham sat phala anapekṣam siddha vartamāna apadeśa pratītam na rātri satravat phala tayā svīkaroti iti evam avyabhicārita karma saṃbandha udgītha gatam upāsanam karma prayoga vacana gṛhītam na siddha vartamāna apadeśa avagata samasta kāma vāpakatva lakṣaṇa phala kalpanāya alam para artha tvāt  tathā ca pāramartha tvāt  tathā ca pāramarṣam sūtram adravya saṃskāra karmasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ syāt iti evañca sati kratau parṇa tā niyamavat upāsana aniyama iti prāpte ucyate yuktam parṇa tāyām phala śruteḥ artha vāda mātra tvam na hi parṇa tānāśrayā yāga ādivat phala saṃbandham anubhavitum arhati avyāpāra rūpa tvāt  vyāpārasya eva ca phalavat tvāt  yathā āhuḥ autpattimataḥ phala darśanāt iti na api svādi ratāyām iva prakṛta kratu saṃbaddhaḥ  yūpa āśrayaḥ tad āśrayaḥ prakṛtaḥ  asti anārabhya adhīta tvāt parṇa tāyāḥ tasmāt vākyena eva juhū saṃbandha dlāreṇa parṇa tāyāḥ kratuḥ āśrayaḥ  jñāpanīyaḥ na ca ātad param vākyam jñāpayitum arhati iti tatra vākyatāt paryam vaśya āśrayaṇīyam tathā ca tad param sanna parṇa tāyāḥ phala saṃbandham api gamayitum arhati vākya bheda prasaṅgāt  upāsanānām tu vyāpāra ātma tvena svata eva phala saṃbandha upapatteḥ udgītha ādi āśrayaṇam phale vidhānam na virudhyate viśiṣṭa vidhānāt  phalāya khalu udgītha sādhanakam upāsanam vidhīyamānam na vākya bhedam āvahati nanu karma aṅga udgītha saṃskāra upāsanam prokṣaṇa ādivat vitīya aśruteḥ udgītham iti tathā ca añjana ādiṣu iva saṃskāreṣu phala śruteḥ arthavāda tvam mā evam na hi atra udgīthasya upāsanam kintu tad avayavasya uṅkārasya iti uktam adhastāt na ca uṅkāraḥ karma aṅgam api tu karma aṅga udgītha avayavaḥ na ca anupayogam īpsitam tasmāt saktūn juhoti itivat viniyoga bhaṅgena uṅkā rasa ādhānāt upāsanāt phalam iti saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt yathā kratu ā āśrayāṇi api gaḥ dohana ādīni phala saṃyogāt anityāni evam udgītha ādi upāsanāni iti draṣṭavyam śeṣa muktam bhāṣye na ca idam phala śravaṇam arthavāda mātram iti arthavāda mātra tve atyanta parokṣā vṛttiḥ yathā na tathā phala paratve na tu vartamāna apadeśāt sākṣāt phala pratītiḥ ata eva prayāja ādiṣu na artha vādāt vartamāna apadeśāt phala kalpanā phala paratve tu asya na śakyam prayāja ādīnām pārārthyena aphala tvam vaktum iti pradānavat eva tad uktam tad tad śuti artha ālocanayā vāyu prāṇayoḥ svarūpa abhede siddhe tad adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā tad viṣaya upāsanā api abhinnā na ca adhyātma ādhidaiva guṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ na hi guṇa bhede guṇavataḥ  bhedaḥ nahi agni hotram juhoti iti utpannasya agnihotrasya taṇḍula ādi guṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ  bhavati utpadyamāna karma saṃyuktaḥ  hi guṇa bhedaḥ karmaṇaḥ  bhedakaḥ yathā āmikṣā vājina saṃyuktayoḥ karmaṇoḥ na utpanna karma saṃyuktaḥ adhyātma adhidaiva upadeśeṣu ca utpanna upāsanā saṃyogaḥ tathā upakrama upasaṃhāra ālocanayā vidyā ekatva viniścayāt ekā eva sakṛt pravṛttiḥ iti pūrva pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu satyam vidyā eka tvam tathā api guṇa bhedāt pravṛtti bhedaḥ sāyaṃprātar kāla guṇa bhedāt yatha ekasmin  api agnihotre pravṛtti bhedaḥ evam iha api adhyātma ādhidaiva guṇa bhedāt upāsanasya ekasya api pravṛtti bheda iti siddham ādhyāna arthaḥ  hi ayam adhyātma adhidaiva vibhāga upadeśa iti agnihotrasya iva adhyānasya kṛte tadhi taṇḍula ādivat ayam pṛthak upadeśaḥ etena vrata upadeśa iti etenat  tattva abhedena eva kāraḥ ca vāc ādi vrata nirākaraṇa arthaḥ nanu etasyai devatāyai iti devatā mātram śrūyate na tu vāyuḥ tad katham vāyu prāptim āha ityata āha devatā iti atra vāyuḥ iti vāyuḥ khalu agni ādīn saṃvṛṇuta iti agni ādīn apekṣyān avacchinnaḥ agni ādaya stutena eva avacchinnā iti saṃvarga guṇa tayā vāyuḥ anavacchinnā devatā sarveṣām abhigamayan  iti militānām śravaṇa aviśeṣāt indrasya devatāyāḥ  abheda atrayāṇām api puroḍāśānām saha pradāna āśaṅkāyām utpatti vākya eva rāja adhirāja sva rāja guṇa bheda ādi ājya anuvākya avyatyāsa vidhānāt ca yathānyāsam eva devatā pṛthaktvāt pradāna pṛthaktvam bhavati saha pradāne hi vyatyāsa vidhānam anupapannam kramavati pradāne vyatyāsa vidhiḥ arthavān tathāvidhasya eva kramasya vivakṣita tvāt  sugamam anyat  liṅga bhūyaḥ tvāt tad hi balīyaḥ tad api iha siddhāntena upakramasya pūrva pakṣayitvā siddhāntayati tatra yadi api bhūyāṃsi santi liṅgāni manaḥ cit ādīnām svātantrya sūcakāni tathā api na tāni svātantryeṇa svātantryam prati prāpakāṇi pramāṇa prāpitam tu svātantryam upodbalayanti na ca atra asti svātantrya prāpakam pramāṇam na ca idam sāmarthya lakṣaṇam liṅgam yena asya svātantryeṇa prāpakam bhavet  tad hi sāmarthyam ābhidhānasya vā arthasya vā syāt  tathā pūṣā ādi anumantraṇa mantrasya pūṣā anumantraṇe yathā vā apaśunā yajeta iti ekatva saṃkhyāyāḥ  arthasya saṃkhyeya avat śetasāmarthyam na cedanam anyasya artha darśana lakṣaṇam liṅgam tathā stuti artha tvena asya vidhi uddeśena eka vākya tayā vidhi paratvāt  tasmāt asati sāmarthya lakṣaṇe viroddhari prakaraṇa pratyūham manaḥ cit ādīnām kriyā aśeṣa tām avagamayati na ca te ha ete vidyā cita eva iti avadhāraṇa śrutiḥ kriyā anupraveśam vārayati yena śruti virodhe sati na prakaraṇam bhavet  bāhya sādhana tāpa akaraṇa artha tvāt avadhāraṇasya na ca vidyayā ha eva eta evaṃvidaḥ citā bhavanti iti puruṣa saṃbandham āpādayat vākyam prakaraṇam apabādhitum arhati anya artha darśanam khalu etad api na ca tad svātantryeṇa prāpakam iti uktam tasmāt tad api na prakaraṇa virodhāya alam iti sāṃpādikā api ete agnayaḥ prakaraṇāt kriyā anupraveśina eva mānasavat  dvādaśa ahe tu śrūyate aanayā tvā pātreṇa samudram rasayā prājāpatyam manaḥ graham gṛhṇāmi iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim mānasam dvādaśa ahā daharantam uta tad madhya pātinaḥ  daśamasya ahna aṅgam iti tatra vāc vai dvādaśa ahaḥ  manaḥ  mānasam iti mānasasya dvādaśa ahāt bhedena vyapadeśāt vāc manasa bhedavat bhedaḥ nirdhūtāni dvādaśa ahasya gata rasāni chandāṃsi tāni mānasena eva āpyāyanti iti ca dvādaśa ahasya mānasena stūyamāna tvāt bhede ca sati stutiḥ tutyabhāvasya upapatteḥ dvādaśa ahāda har antaram na tad aṅgam patnī saṃyāja anta tvāt ca ahnām patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpanti iti ca mānasasya patnī saṃyājasya parastāt śuteḥ trayodaśa ahe api avayujya dvādaśa saṃkhyā samavāyāt kathañcit jaghanyayā api vṛttyā dvādaśa aha saṃjñā virodha abhāvāt iti prāpte abhidhīyate pramāṇa antareṇa hi trayodaśa tve ahnām siddhe dvādaśa āha iti jaghanyayā vṛttyā unnīyeta na tu asti tādṛśam pramāṇa antaram na ca vyapadeśa bhedaḥ  aharantara tvam kalpayitum arhati aṅga aṅgi bhedena api tad upapatteḥ ata eva ca stutyaḥ tāvaka bhāvasya api upapattiḥ devadattasya iva dīrghaiḥ keśaiḥ patnī saṃyāja anta tā tu yadi api autsargikī tathā api daśamasya ahnaḥ viśeṣa vacanāt mānasāni grahaṇa āsādana havana ādīni patnī saṃyājāt parāñci bhaviṣyanti kim iva hi na kuryāt vacanam iti eṣa vai daśamasya ahnaḥ visargaḥ  yad mānasam iti vacanāt daśama aharaṅga tā gamyate visargaḥ  antaḥ antavataḥ  dharmaḥ  na svatantra iti daśame ahani mānasāya pramarpanti iti daśamasya ahna ādhāratva nirdeśāt ca tad aṅgam mānasam na ahar antaram iti siddham tad iha dvādaśa aha saṃbandhinaḥ  daśamasya ahnaḥ aṅgam mānasamitim dharmamī māṃsā sūtra kṛta uktam daśa rātra gasya api daśamasya ahnaḥ aṅgam iti bhagavan bhāṣya kāraḥ śruti antara balena āha yathā daśa rātrasya daśame ahani avivākya iti avivākya iti daśamasya ahnaḥ nāma atideśāt ca na hi sāṃpādikānām agnīnām iṣṭakāsu citena agninā kiñcid asti sādṛśyam anyatra kriyā anupraveśāt tasmāt api na svatantra iti prāpte abhidhīyate vidyā eva tu nirdhāraṇāt  mā bhūt anyeṣām śruta vidhi uddeśānām anya artha darśanānām aprāpta prāpaka tvam eteṣu tu aśruta vidhāyuddeśeṣu avacanāni tu apūrva tvāt iti nyāyāt vidhiḥ unnetavyaḥ tathā ca etebhyaḥ  yādṛśoḥ athaḥ pratīyate tad anurūpa eva sa bhavati pratīyate ca etebhyaḥ  manaḥ cit ādīnām sāntatyam ca avadhāraṇam ca phala bheda samanvayaḥ ca puruṣa saṃbandhaḥ ca na ca asya gaḥ dohana ādivat kratvartha āśrita tvam yena puruṣa arthasya karma pāratantryam bhavet  na ca vidyā cita eva iti avadhāraṇam bāhya sādhana apākaraṇa artham svabhāvata eva vidyāyā bāhyān upekṣatva siddheḥ tasmāt pariśeṣāt mānasa grahavat kriyā anupraveśa śaṅkā pākaraṇa artham avadhāraṇam na ca evam artha tve saṃbhavati dyotakatva mātreṇa nipāta śrutiḥ pīḍanīyā tasmāt śuti liṅga vākyāni prakaraṇam apodya svātantryam manaḥ cit ādīnām avagamayanti iti siddham anubandha ati deśa śruti ādibhya evam eva vijñeyam te ca bhāṣya eva sphucāḥ yad uktam pūrva pakṣiṇā kratu aṅga tve pūrveṇa iṣṭakā citena manaḥ cit ādīnām vikalpa iti tad utalya kārya tvena dūṣayati na ca sati eva kriyā saṃbandha iti apica pūrva aparayoḥ bhāgayoḥ vidyā prādhānya darśanāt tad madhya pātinaḥ  api tad sāmānyāt vidyā pradhāna tvam eva lakṣyate na karma aṅga tvam iti āha sūtreṇa pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyam bhūyas tvāt tu anubandhaḥ sphuṭam asya bhāṣyam asti rājasūyaḥ arājā svārājya kāmaḥ  rājasūyena yajeta iti tam prakṛtyām ananti aveṣṭim nāma iṣṭim āgneyaḥ  aṣṭākapālaḥ  hiraṇyam dakṣiṇā iti evamādi tām prakṛti ā adhīyate yadi brāhmaṇaḥ  yajeta bārhaspatyam madhye nidhāya āhutim hutvā abhighārayet yadi vaiśyaḥ  vaiśvadevam yadi rājanya aindram iti tatra saṃdihyate kim brāhmaṇa ādīnām prāptānām nimitta arthena śravaṇam uta brāhmaṇa ādīnām ayam yāgaḥ  vidhīyata iti tatra yadi prajā pālana kaṇṭaka uddharaṇa ādi karma rājyam tasya kartā rājā iti rāja śabdasya arthaḥ tatas  rājā rājasūyena yajeta iti rājyasya kartū rājasūye adhikāraḥ tasmāt saṃbhavanti aviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśyā rājyasya kartāra iti siddham sarva eva ete rājasūye prāptā iti ayadi brāhmaṇaḥ  yajeta iti evamādayaḥ  nimitta arthāḥ śrutayaḥ atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti rāja kartṛ yogāt tad karma rājyam tatas  kaḥ  rājā iti apekṣāyām āryeṣu tad prasiddheḥ abhāvāt pika nema tāmarasa ādi śabda artha avadhāraṇāya mleccha prasiddhiḥ iva andhrāṇām kṣatriya jātau rāja śabda prasiddhiḥ tad avadhāraṇa kāraṇam iti kṣatriya eva rājā iti na brāhmaṇa vaiśyayoḥ prāptiḥ iti rājasūya prakaraṇam bhittvā brāhmaṇa ādi kartṛkāṇi pṛthak eva karmāṇi prāpyanta iti na naimittikāni tatra kim tāvat prāptam naimittikāni iti rājyasya kartā rājā iti āryāṇā māndhrāṇām ca avivādaḥ tathā hi brāhmaṇa ādiṣu prajā pālana kartṛṣu kanaka daṇḍa ātapatra śveta cāmara ādi lāñchaneṣu rāja pada māndhrāḥ ca āryāḥ ca avivādam prayuñjānā dṛśyante tena avipratipatrvipratipatta avapi āryāndhra prayogayoḥ yava vara āhavat ārya prasiddheḥ āndhra prasiddhitaḥ balīyasī tvāt  balavat ārya prasiddhi virodhe tu atad mūlāyāḥ pāṇinīya prasiddheḥ avirodhe tu anapekṣam syāt iti nyāyena bādhanāt tad anuguṇa tayā vā kathañcinna sva nakula ādivat anvākhyānā mātra para tayā nīyamāna tvāt rajyasya kartā rājā iti siddhe nimitta arthāḥ śrutayaḥ tathā ca yadi śabdaḥ  api āñjasaḥ syāt iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate arūpataḥ  na viśeṣaḥ  asti hi āri amleccha prayogayoḥ vaidikāt vākī aśeṣāt tu viśeṣaḥ tatra darśitaḥ tad iha rāja śabdasya karma yogāt vā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛ prayogāt vā karmaṇi iti viśaye vaidika vākī aśeṣavat abhiyuktatarasya atrabhavataḥ pāṇineḥ smṛteḥ nirṇāyate prasiddhiḥ āndhraṇām anādiḥ ādimatī cāryāṇām prasiddhiḥ gaḥ gāvi ādi śabdavat  na ca saṃbhāvita ādimad bhāvā prasiddhiḥ pāṇi nimsṛtim apa udyāna ādi prasiddhim ādimatīm kartumat sahate gāvi ādi śabda prasiddheḥ anādi tvena gavā ādi pada prasiddheḥ api ādimattva āpatteḥ tasmāt pāṇinīya smṛti anumata andhra prasiddhi balīyaḥ tu ena kṣatriyatva jātau rāja śabde mukhye tad kartari atad jātau rāja śabdaḥ  gauṇa iti kṣatriyasya eva ākārāt rājasūye tad prakaraṇam apodya āva iṣṭeḥ utkarṣaḥ anvaya anurodhī yadi śabdaḥ  na tu apūrva vidhausati tam anyathayitum arhati ata eva āhuḥ ayadi śabda parityāgaḥ  ruci adhyahāra kalpanā iti iyam ca rājasūyāt adhikāra antaram etayā annādya kāmam yājayet iti na asti iti kṛtvā cintā etasmin  tu adhikāre annādya kāmasya traivarṇikya saṃbhavāt prāpteḥ nimitta artha tā brāhmaṇa ādi śravaṇasya durvāra eva iti eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt  adhikāraṇa tātparyam āha iha iti samarthana prayojanam āha bandha mokṣa iti asamarthane bandha mokṣa adhikāra abhāvam āha na hi asati iti adhastana tantra uktena paunaruktyam codayati nanu iti pariharati uktam bhāṣya kṛtā iti nasūtra kāreṇa tatra uktam yena punaruktam bhavet api tu bhāṣya kṛtā iti atratyasya eva arthasya apakarṣaḥ pramāṇa lakṣaṇa upayogi tayā tatra kṛta iti yata iha sūtra kṛt vakṣyati ata eva bhagavatā upavarṣeṇa uddhāraḥ  apakarṣasya kṛtaḥ vicārasya asya pūrva uttara tantra śeṣa tvam āha iha ca iti pūrva adhikaraṇa saṃgatim āha apicā iti nanu ātmā astitva upapattaya eva atra ucyantām kim tad ākṣepeṇa iti ata āha ākṣepa pūrvikā hi iti ākṣepam āha atra eke deha mātra ātma darśina iti yadi api samasta vyasteṣu pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyuṣu na caitanyam dṛṣṭam tathā api kāya akāra pariṇateṣu bhaviṣyati na hi kiṇva ādayaḥ samasta vyastā na madanā dṛṣṭā iti madirā ākāra pariṇatā na madayanti aham iti ca anubhave deha eva gaura ādi akāraḥ prathate na tu tad atiriktaḥ tad adhiṣṭhānaḥ kuṇḍa eva dadhi iti ata eva aham sthūlaḥ  gacchāmi ityādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyā upapattiḥ ahamaḥ sthūla ādibhiḥ na jātu dadhi samāna adhikaraṇāni madhura ādīni kuṇḍasya eka adhikaraṇyam anubhavanti sitam madhuram kuṇḍam iti na ca apratyakṣam ātma tattvam anumāna ādibhiḥ śakyam unnetum na khalva pratyakṣam pramāṇam asti uktam hi adeśa kāla ādi rūpāṇām bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu bhavānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā iti yadā ca upalabdhi sādhyana āntarīyaka bhāvasya liṅgasya iyam gatiḥ tadā kā eva kathā dṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya śabdasya artha āpatteḥ ca atyanta parokṣa artha gocarāyāḥ  upamānasya hetuḥ bhāṣya kṛtā vyākhyātaḥ ceṣṭā hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthaḥ  vyāpāraḥ sa ca śarīra adhīna tayā dṛśyamānaḥ śarīra dharma evam prāṇaḥ śvāsa praśvāsa ādi rūpaḥ śarīra dharma eva icchā prayatna ādayaḥ ca yadi api āntarāḥ tathā api śarīra atiriktasya tad āśraya anupalabdheḥ sati śarīre bhāvāt  antar  śarīra āśrayā eva anyathā dṛṣṭa hāna adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt  śarīra atirikta ātmani pramāṇa abhāvāt śarīre ca saṃbhavāt śarīre ca saṃbhavāt śarīram eva icchā ādimadātmā iti prāpta ucyate vyatirekaḥ tad bhāva abhāvi tvāt na tu upalabdhivat  na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ  jāyate kutaḥ bhavān anumāna ādīnām aprāmāṇyam avadhāritavān iti pratyakṣam hi liṅga ādi rūpa mātra grāhi na aprāmāṇi am eṣām viniścetum arhati na hi dhūma jñānam iva eṣām indriya artha sannikarṣāt aprāmāṇyajñānam udetum arhati kintu deśa kāla avasthā rūpa bhedena vyabhācirotprekṣayā na ca etāvān pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati yathā āhuḥ nahi idam iyataḥ  vyāpārān kartum samartham saṃnihita viṣaya balena utpatteḥ avicāraka tvāt iti tasmāt asmin  anicchatā api pramāṇa antaram abhyupeyam apica pratipannam pumāṃsam apahāya apratipanna saṃdigdhāḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ pratipādyante na ca eṣām itthaṃbhāvaḥ  bhavat pratyakṣa gocaraḥ na khalu ete gauratva ādivat pratyakṣa gocarāḥ kintu vacana ceṣṭā ādi liṅga anumeyāḥ na ca liṅgam pramāṇam yata ete sidhyanti na puṃsām itthaṃbhāvam avijñāya yam kañcana puruṣam pratipipātayiṣataḥ  anavadheya vacanasya prekṣāvat tā nāma apica paśavaḥ  api hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthinaḥ komala śaṣpa śyāmalāyām bhuvi pravartante pariharanti ca aśyāna tṛṇa kaṇṭaka ākīrṇām nāstikaḥ tu paśoḥ api paśuḥ iṣṭa niṣṭa sādhanam avidvān na khalu asmin  umāna gocara pravṛtti nivṛtti gocare pratyakṣam prabhavati na ca para pratyāyanāya śabdam prayuñjīta śābdasya arthasya apratyakṣa tvāt  tad eva mā nāma bhūt nāstikasya janma antaram asmin  eva janmani upasthitaḥ  asya mūkatva pravṛtti nivṛtti viraha rūpaḥ  mahān narakaḥ parākrāntam ca atra sūribhiḥ atyanta parokṣa gocarā api anyathā anupapadyamāna artha prabhava arthāpattiḥ bhūyaḥ sāmānya yogena ca upamānam upapāditam pramāṇa lakṣaṇe tad atra astu tāvat pramāṇa antaram pratyaśram eva ahaṃpratyayaḥ śarīra atiriktam ālambata iti anvayatiḥ ekābhyām avadhāryate yoga vyāghravat svapna daśāyām ca śarīra antara parigraha abhimāne api ahaṅkāra āspadasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tvam iti uktam sūtra yojanā tu na tu avyatiriktaḥ kintu vyatirikta ātmā dehāt  kutas tad bhāva abhāvi tvāt caitanya ādiḥ yadi śarīra guṇaḥ tatas  anena viśeṣa guṇena bhavitavyam na tu saṃkhyā parimāṇa saṃyoga ādivat sāmānya guṇena tathā ca ye bhūta viśeṣa guṇaḥ te yāvat bhūta bhāvinaḥ  dṛṣṭā yathā rūpa ādayaḥ na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ bhūtam ca rūpa ādi rahitam ca iti tasmāt bhūta viśeṣa guṇa rūpa ādi vaidharmyāt na caitanyam śarīra guṇaḥ etena icchā ādīnām śarīra viśeṣa guṇa tvam pratyuktam prāṇa ceṣṭādayaḥ  yadi api deha dharmā eva tathā api na deha mātra prabhavāḥ mṛta avasthāyām api prasaṅgāt  tasmāt yasya ete adhiṣṭānāt deha dharmā bhavanti sa deha atirikta ātmā adṛṣṭa kāraṇa tve abhyupagamyamāne tasya api deha āśrayatva anupapatteḥ ātmā eva abhyupetavya iti vaidharmya antaram āha deha dharmāḥ ca iti sva para pratyakṣā hi deha dharmā dṛṣṭā yathā rūpa ādayaḥ icchā ādayaḥ tu sva pratyakṣā eva iti deha dharma vaidharmyam tasmāt api deha atirikta dharmā iti tatra yadi api caitanyam api bhūta viśeṣa guṇaḥ tathā api yāvat bhūtam anuvarteta na ca mada śaktyā vyabhicāraḥ sāmarthyasya sāmānya guṇa tvāt  apica mada śaktiḥ prati madira avayavam mātrayā avatiṣṭhate tadvat dehe api caitanyam tad avayaveṣu api mātrayā bhavet  yathā ca ekasmin dehe bahavaḥ cetayeran na ca bahūnām cetanānām anyonya abhiprāya anuvidhāna saṃbhava iti eka pāśa nibaddhā iva bahavaḥ  vihaṅgamāḥ viruddha ādi kriyā abhimukhāḥ samarthā api na hasta mātram api deśam atipatitum utsahante evam śarīram api na kiñcid kartum utsahate api na anvaya mātrāt tad dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ śakyaḥ  viniścetum mā bhūt ākāśasya sarvaḥ  dharmaḥ sarveṣu anvayāt api tu anvaya vyatirekābhyām saṃdigdhaḥ ca atra vyatirekaḥ tathā ca sādhaka tvam anvaya mātrasya iti āha apica sati hi tāvat iti dūṣaṇa antaram vivakṣuḥ iṇāma bhedaḥ  rūpa ādiḥ na tu bhūta catuṣṭayāt artha antaram evam bhūta pariṇāma bheda eva caitanyam na tu bhūtebhyor atha antaram yena apṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ  vāyuḥ iti tattvāni iti pratijñā vyāghātaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ etad uktam bhavati caturṇām eva bhūtānām jagat pariṇāmaḥ  na tu asti tattva antaram yasya pariṇāmaḥ  rūpādayaḥ  anyat vā pariṇāma antaram iti atra uktābhiḥ tāvat upapattibhiḥ deha dharma tvam nirastam tathā api upapatti antara abhidhitsayā āha ced tarhi iti bhūta dharmā rūpādayaḥ  jaḍa tvāt viṣayā eva dṛṣṭā na tu viṣayiṇaḥ na ca keṣāñcit viṣayāṇām api viṣayi tvam bhaviṣyati iti vācyam sva ātmani vṛtti virodhāt  na ca upalabdhau  eṣa prasaṅgaḥ tasyāḥ  ajaḍāyāḥ svayaṃprakāśatva abhyupagamat kṛta upapādanam ca etad purastāt  upalabdhivat iti sūtra avayavam yojayati yathā eva asya iti upalabdhi grāhiṇa eva pramāṇāt śarīvyatirekaḥ  api alagamyate tasyāḥ tatas  svayaṃprakāśa pratyayena bhūta dharmebhyaḥ  jaḍebhyaḥ  vailakṣaṇyena vyatireka niścayāt  astu tarhi vyatirekāt upalabdhiḥ bhūtebhyaḥ svatantrā tathā api ātmani pramāṇa abhāva iti ata āha upalabdhi svarūpa eva ca na ātmā iti ājānataḥ tāvat upalabdhi bhedaḥ  na anubhūyata iti viṣaya bhedāt abhyupeyaḥ na ca upalabdhi vyatirekiṇām viṣayāṇām prathā saṃbhavati iti upapādatam na ca viṣaya bheda grāhi pramāṇam asti iti ca upapāditam brahma tattva samīkṣāyām asmābhiḥ evam ca sati viṣaya rūpa tad bhedau  eva su durlabhau  iti dūra nirastā viṣaya bhedāt upalabdhi bheda saṃkathā tena upalabdheḥ upalabdhṛ tvam api na tāttvikam kintvavidyā kalpitam tatra avidyāt aśāyām api upalabdheḥ abheda iti āha aham idam adrākṣam iti ca iti na kevalam tāttvika abhedāt nitya tvam atāt tvikāt api nitya tvam eva iti tasya arthaḥ smṛti ādi upapatteḥ ca nānātve hi na anyena upalabdhe anyasya puruṣasya smṛtiḥ upapadyata iti arthaḥ nirākṛtam api artham nirākaraṇa antarāya anubhāṣate yad tu uktam iti yaḥ  hi deha vyāpārāt upalabdhiḥ utpadyate tena deha dharma iti manyate tam pratīdam dūṣaṇam na ca atyantam dehasya iti prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt anavadyam iti aṅgava baddhāḥ tu na śākhāsu hi prativedam svara ādi bhedāt prativeda mudgīthādayaḥ  bhidyante tad anubaddhāḥ tu pratyayāḥ pratiśākham vihitā bhedena tatra saṃśayaḥ kim yasmin vede yad udrīthāt ayaḥ  vihitāḥ teṣām eva tad veda vihitāḥ pratyayā uta anya veda vihitānām api udrītha ādīnām te pratyayā iti kim tāvat prāptam aomiti akṣara mudrītham upāsti iti udrītha śravaṇena udrītha sāmānyam avagamyate nirviśeṣasya ca tasya anupapatteḥ viśeṣa kāṅkṣāyām sva śākhā vihitasya viśeṣasya saṃnidhānāt tena eva ākāṅkṣā vinivṛtteḥ na śākhā antarīyam udrītha antaram apekṣate na ca evam saṃnidhānena śruti pīḍā yadi hi śruti samarpitam artham apabādhena tatas  śrutim pīḍayet na ca etad asti na hi udrītha śruti abhihita lakṣitau sāmānya viśeṣau bādhitau sva śākhā gatayoḥ svīkaraṇāt śākhā antarīyāsvīkāre api yathā āhuḥ ajāti vyaktī gṛhītvā iha vayam tu śruti lakṣite kṛṣṇa ādi yadi muñcāmaḥ kā śrutiḥ tatra pīḍyate evam prāptam evam prāpta ucyate udrītha aṅgavavat dhāstu pratyayā nānā śākhāsu prativedam anuvarteranna pratiśākham vyavatiṣṭheran udrītham ityādi sāmānya śruteḥ aviśeṣāt etad uktam bhavati yuktam śuklam paṭamānayā ityādau paṭa śrutim aviśeṣa pravṛttām api saṃnidhānāt śukla śrutiḥ bādhata iti viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyana pratyukta tvāt padānām samabhivyāhārasya anyathā tad anupapatteḥ na ca sva artham asmārayitvā viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyanam padānām iti viśiṣṭa artha prayuktam sva artha smāraṇam na sva prayojakam apavādhitum utsahate mā ca vādhi prayojaka abhāvena sva artha smāraṇam api iti yuktam aviśeṣa pravṛttāyā api śruteḥ ekasmin  eva viśeṣe avasthāpanam iha tu udrītha śruteḥ viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyaka tvāt  saṃkoce pramāṇam kiñcid nā asti na ca saṃnidhi mātram apabādhitum arhati śruti sāmānya dvāreṇa ca sarva viśeṣa gāminyāḥ śruteḥ ekasmin  avasthānam pīḍā eva tasmāt sarva udrītha viṣayāḥ pratyayā iti mantra ādivat vāvirodhaḥ viruddham iti naḥ saṃpratyayaḥ  yad pramāṇena na upalabhyate upalabdham ca mantra ādiṣu śākhā antarīyeṣi śākhā antarīya karma saṃbandhi tvam tadvat iha api iti darśanāt avirodhaḥ etad ca darśitam bhāṣyeṇa sugamena iti bhūmnaḥ kratuvat jyāyaḥ tvam tathā hi darśayati vaiśvānara vidyāyām chāndogye kim vyasta upāsanam samasta upāsanam eva iti tatra divam eva bhagavaḥ  rājan  iti ha uvāca iti pratyakam upāsana śruteḥ pratyekam ca phalavattva āmnānāt samasta upāsane ca phalavattva śruteḥ ubha yathā api upāsanam na ca yathā vaiśvānarīya iṣṭau yad aṣṭākapālaḥ  bhavati ityādīnām avayujyavādānām pratyekam phala śravaṇe api artha vāda mātra tvam vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapediti asya eva tu phalavat tvam evam atra api bhavitum arhati tatra hi dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet iti vidhi bhakti śrutiḥ yad aṣṭākapālaḥ  bhavati ityādiṣu vartamāna apadeśaḥ na ca vacanāni tu apūrva tvāt iti vidhi kalpanā avayujya vādena stutyā api upapatteḥ iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamāna apadeśasya aviśeṣāt agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa śatayā ubhayatra api vidhi kalpanāyāḥ phala kalpanāyāḥ ca bhedāt  nindāyāḥ ca samasta upāsana ārambhe vyasta upāsane api upapatteḥ śyāmaḥ  vā aśu āhutim abhyavaharati itivat ubhayavidham upāsanam iti prāpta ucyate samasta upāsanasya eva jyāyaḥ tvam na vyasta upāsanasya yadi api vartamāna apadeśa tvam ubhayatra api aviśiṣṭam tathā api paurvāparya ālocanayā samasta upāsana paratvasya avagamaḥ yad param hi vākyam tad asya arthaḥ tathā hi prācīna śāla prabhṛtayaḥ vaiśvānara vidyā nirmayāya aśvapatim kaikeyam ājagmiḥ te ca tad tad eka deśa upāsanam upanyastavantaḥ tatra kaikeyaḥ tad tad upāsana nindā pūrvam tad nivāraṇena samasta upāsanam upasaṃhāra tathā ca eka vākya tālābhāya vākya bheda parihārāya ca samasta upāsana para ta eva saṃdarbhasya lakṣyate tasmāt bahu phala saṃkīrtanam pradhānaḥ tavanāya samasta upā nasya eva tu phalavat tvam iti siddham eka deśi vyākhyānam upanyasya dūṣayati kecid tvatra iti saṃbhavati aka vākya tve vākya bhedasya anyāpya tvāt na īdṛśam sūtra vyākhyānam samañja miti arthaḥ nānā śabda ādi bhedāt siddham kṛtvā vidyā bhedam adhastanam vicāra jātam abhinirvartitam saṃprati tu sarvāsām īśvara gocarāṇām vidyānām kim abhedaḥ  bhedaḥ  vā evam prāṇa ādi gocarāsu iti vicārayitavyam nanu yathā pratyaya abhidheyāyāḥ  apūrva bhāvanāyāḥ  ājānataḥ  bheda bhāve api dhātu arthena nirūpyamāṇa tvāt tasya ca yāga ādeḥ bhedāt prakṛti artha yāga ādi dhātu artha anubandha bhedāt bhedaḥ tad anuraktāyā eva tasyāḥ pratīyamāna tvāt  evam vidyānām api rūpataḥ  vedyasya īśvarasya abhede api tad tad satya saṃkalpatva ādi guṇa upadhāna bhedāt vidyā bheda iti na asti abheda āśaṅkā ucyateyuktam anubandha bhedāt kārya rūpāṇām apūrva bhāvanānām bheda iti iha brahmaṇaḥ siddha rūpa tvāt guṇānām api satya saṃkalpatva ādīnām tad āśrayāṇām siddha tayā sarvatra abhedaḥ  vidyāsu na hi viśāla vakṣāḥ cakora īkṣaṇaḥ kṣatriya yuvā duśryavana dharmā iti ekatra upadiṣṭaḥ  anyatra siṃhāsyaḥ  vṛṣa skandhaḥ eva upadiśyamānaḥ cakora īkṣaṇatva ādi apajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśam vastu bhidyate tasya sarvatra tādavasthyāt  atādavasthye vā tad eva na bhavet  na hi vastu vikalpyata iti tasmāt vedyā bhedāt vidyānām bheda iti prāptam evam prāpta ucyate bhavet etad evam yadi vastu niṣṭāni upāsana vākyāni kintu tad viṣayām upāsana abhāvanām vidadhati sā ca kārya rūpā yadi api ca upāsanā bhāvanā upāsana adhīna nirūpaṇa upāsanam ca upāsya adhīna nirūpaṇam upāsyam ca īśvara ādi vyavasthita rūpam tathā api upāsana viṣayībhāvaḥ  asya kadācid kasyācid kenacid rūpeṇa iti apariniṣṭhita eva yathā ekaḥ strī kāyaḥ kenacid bhakṣya tayā kenacid upagantavya tayā kenacid apatya tayā kenacid mātṛ tayā kenacid upekṣaṇīya tayā viṣayī kriyamāṇaḥ puruṣa icchā tantraḥ evam iha api upāsanāni puruṣa icchā tantra tayā vidheya tām na atikrāmanti na ca tad tad guṇa tayā upāsanāni guṇa bhedāt na bhidyante na ca agnihotram iva upasanām vidhāya dadhi taṇḍula ādi guṇavat iha satya saṃkalpatva ādi guṇa vidhiḥ yena eka śāstra tvam syāt  api tu utpattau  eva upāsanānām tad tad guṇa viśiṣṭānām avagamāt tatra agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā sarvāsām bedaḥ tulyaḥ na ca samasta śākhā vihita sarva guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ śakya anuṣṭhānaḥ tasmāt bedaḥ na ca asmin pakṣe sāmānā santaḥ satyakāma ādayaiti kecid khalu guṇāḥ kāsucid vidyāsu samānāḥ tena eka vidyā tve āvartayitavyāḥ ekatra ukta tvāt  vidyā bhede tu na paunaruktyam ekasyām vidyāya amuktā vidyā antare na uktā iti vidyā antarasya api tad guṇa tvāya vaktavyā anuktānām aprāpteḥ iti vikalpaḥ  aviśiṣṭa phala tvāt agnihotra darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu pṛthak adhikārāṇām api succayaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ  niyamavān  teṣām nitya tvāt upāsanāḥ tu kāmya tayā na nityāḥ tasmāt nāsām samuccaya niyamaḥ tena samāna phalānām darśa pūrṇamāsa jyotiṣṭoma ādīnām iva na niyamavān vikalpaḥ phabhūma arthinaḥ samuccayasya api saṃbhavāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ upāsanānām amūṣām upāsi asākṣāt karaṇa sādhya tvāt phala bhedasya ekena upāsanena upāsya sākṣāt karaṇe tatas  eva phala prakila ābhe tu kṛtam upāsana antareṇa na ca sākṣātkaraṇasya atiśaya saṃbhavasya upāya sahasraiḥ api tādavasthyāt tanmātra sādhya tvāt ca phala avāpteḥ upāsana antara abhyāse ca citta ekāgra tā vyāghātena kasya cit upāsanā niṣpatteḥ iha vikalpa eva niyamavān iti rāddha antar  kāmyāḥ tu yathākāmam samuccīyeran na vā pūrva hetu abhāvāt yāsu upāsanāsu vinā upāsya sākṣāt kāraṇam adṛṣṭena eva kāmya sādhanam tāsām kāmya darśa paurṇamāsa ādivat puruṣa icchā vaśena vikalpa samuccayau  iti sāmpratam aṅgeṣu yathā āśraya bhāvaḥ tad nirdhāraṇā niyamaḥ tad dṛṣṭeḥ pṛthak hya pratibandhaḥ phalam iti atra upasanāsu phala śruteḥ parṇa mayī nyāyena arthavāda tayā upāsanānām kratu artha tvena samuccaya niyamam āśaṅkya puruṣa artha tayā eka prayoga vacana grahaṇa abhāve samuccaya niyamaḥ  nirastaḥ iha tu sati api puruṣa artha tve kasmāt na eka prayoga vacana grahaṇam bhavati iti pūrva uktam artham ākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate yadi api hi kāmyā etā upāsanāḥ tathā api na svatantrā bhavitum arhanti tathā sati hi kratu arthān āśrita tayā kratu prayogāt bahis api amūṣām prayogaḥ prasajyate na ca prayujyante tad kasya hotoḥ kratu artha āśritānām eva tāsām tad tad phala uddeśena vidhānāt iti evam ca āśraya tantra tvāt āśritānām prayoga vacanena āśrayāṇām samuccaya niyamena āśritānām api samuccaya niyamaḥ  yukta itarathā tad āśritatva anupapatteḥ sa ca prayoga vacana upāsanāḥ samucci tanvan  tad tad phala kāmanānām avaśyaṃbhāvam ākṣipati tad abhāve tāsām samuccaya niyama abhāvāt iti manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ rāddha antaḥ tu yathā vihita uddiṣṭa padārtha nurodhī prayoga vacanaḥ  na padārtha svabhāvān anyathayitum arhati kintu tad avirodhena avatiṣṭhate tatra kratu arthānām nityavat āmnānāt tathā bhāvasya na saṃbhavān niyamena etān tsamuccinotu kāma avabaddhāḥ tu upāsanāḥ kāmānam anitya tvāt na samuccayena niyantum arhati na hi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyeran  api tu uddiśyante māna antara anusārī ca uddeśaḥ  na tad virodhena uddeśyam anyathayatī tathā sati uddeśa anupapatteḥ tasmāt kāmānām anitya tvāt tad avabaddhānām upāsanānām api anitya tvam nitya anitya saṃyoga virodhāt sati api tad āśrayāṇām nitya tve idam eva ca āśraya tantra tvam āśritānām yad āśraye sati eva vṛttiḥ na asati iti na tu tatra vṛttiḥ eva na āvṛttiḥ iti tad idam uktam āśraya tantrāṇi api hi iti samāhārāt  hotṛṣadanāt ha eva api durudgītham anusamāharati iti apiḥ bhinna kamaḥ dirudgītham api iti vedānta rohita praṇava udgītha ekatva pratyaya sāmarthyāt hotṛ karmaṇaḥ śaṃsanāt udrātā pratisamādadhāti kim tad iti ata āha durudrītham api vedāntara udite ca audrātre karmaṇi utpannam kṣatam evam bruvan veda antara uditasya pratyasya ityādi yojanīyam guṇa sādha araṇya śruteḥ ca asya sūtrasya anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukhena ca vyākhyā śeṣam ati rohita artham iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām tṛtīya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ tṛtīyā adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ  atas śabdāt iti bādarāyaṇaḥ sthitam kṛtvā upaniṣadām apavarga ākhya puruṣa artha sādhana ātma jñāna paratvam upāsanānām ca tad tad puruṣa artha sādhana tvam adhastanam vicāra jātam abhinirvartitam samprati tu kim aupaniṣada ātma tattva jñānam apavarga sādhana tayā puruṣa artham āhaḥ kratu prayoga apekṣita kartṛ pratipādaka tayā kratvartham iti mīmāṃsāmahe yadā ca kratu artham tadā yāvat mātram kratu prayoga vidhinā apekṣitam kartṛ tvam āmuṣmika phala upabhoktṛ tvam ca na ca etad anitya tve ghaṭate kṛta vipraṇāśa akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅga ādatas  nitya tvam api tāvat mātram upaniṣatsu vivakṣitam itas  anyat anapekṣitam viparītam ca na upaniṣad arthaḥ syāt  yathā śuddhatva ādi yadi api jīva anuvādena tasya brahmatva pratipādana paratvam upaniṣadām iti mahatā prabandhena tatra tatra pratipāditam tathā api atra keṣāñcid pūrva pakṣa śahkā bījānām nirākaraṇe tad eva sthūṇa nikhanana nyāyena niścalīkriyata iti asti vicāra prayojanam tatra yadi api prokṣaṇa ādivat ātma jñānam na kañcid kratum ārabhya adhītam yadi api ca kartṛ mātram na avyabhicārita kratu saṃbandham kartṛ mātrasya laukikeṣu api karmasu darśana āt yena parṇata ādivat anārabhya adhītam api avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha jihūdvāreṇa vākyena eva kratu artham āpadyate tathā api yādṛśa ātmā kartā muṣmika svarga ādi phala bhoga bhāgī deha ādi atirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasya asti laukikeṣu karma su upayogaḥ teṣām aihika phalānām śarīra anatiriktena api yādṛśa tādṛśena kartṛ aupapatteḥ āmuṣmika phalānām tu vaidikānām karmaṇām tam antareṇa asaṃbhavāt tad saṃbandha eva ayam aupaniṣadaḥ ka ta iti tad avyabhicārāt tāni anusmārayat juhvā ādivat vākyena eva tad jñānam parṇa tāvat kratvā aidam arthyam āpadyata iti phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ tad uktam adravya saṃskāra karmasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ syāt iti aupaniṣada ātma jñāna saṃskṛtaḥ  hi kartā pāralaukika phala upabhoga yogyaḥ  asmi iti vidyāvācśraddhāvān kratu prayoga aṅgam na anyathā prokṣitā iva vrīhayaḥ kratu aṅgam iti priya ādi sūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa eva ātmanaḥ  draṣṭavya tvena pratijñāpanāt apahata pāpmatva ādi tu tad viśeṣaṇam tasya eva stuti artham na tu tad para tvam upaniṣadām tasmāt kratvartham eva ātma jñānam kartṛ saṃskāra dvārā na punar  puruṣa artham iti etad upodbala artham ca brahma vidām ācāra ādiḥ śruti avagata upanyastaḥ na kevalam vākyāt ātma jñānasya kratu artha tvam tṛtīyā śruteḥ ca na tu etad prakṛta udgītha vidyā viṣayam yad eva vidyayā iti sarvanāmavadhāraṇābhyām vyāpteḥ adhigamat  yathā ya eva dhūmavān deśaḥ sa vahu imān iti samanvārambha vacanam ca phala ārambhe vidyā karmaṇoḥ sāhityam darśayati tad ca yadi api āpneya ādi yaga ṣaṭkavat sama pradhāna tvena api bhavati tathā api uktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅga bhāvena eva netavyam veda artha jñānavataḥ karma vidhānāt upaniṣadaḥ  api veda artha  iti tad jñānam api karma aṅgam iti niyamāt ca sugamam siddhāntayati adhika upadeśāt tu bādarāyaṇasya evam tad darśanāt  yadi śarīra ādi atiriktaḥ kartā bhoktā ātmā iti etad matra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syuḥ tatas  syāt evam na tu etad asti tāḥ tu evaṃbhūta jīva anuvādena tasya śuddha buddha uda āsīna brahma rūpa tā pratipādana parā iti tatra tatra asakṛt āveditam anadhigata artha bodhana svarasa tā hi śabdasya pramāṇa antara siddha anuvādena tathā ca aupaniṣada ātma jñānasya kratu anuṣṭhāna virodhinaḥ kratu saṃbandha eva na asti kim aṅga punar  tad avyabhicāraḥ tatas ca kratu śeṣa tā tathā ca na apavarga phala śruteḥ artha vāda mātra tvam api tu phala paratvam eva ata eva priya ādi sūcitena saṃsāriṇa ātmanā upakramasya tasya eva ātmanaḥ  adhika upadidikṣāyām paramātmanā atyanta abheda upadiśyate yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajju rūpāt atyanta abhedaḥ pratipādyate yaḥ  ayam sarpaḥ sā rajjuḥ iti yathā vidyāyāḥ karma aṅga tve darśanam upanyastam eva karma aṅga tve darśanam uktam tatra karma aṅgatva darśanānām anyathā siddhiḥ uktā kevala vidyā darśanānām tu na anyathā siddhiḥ asārvatrikī vyāptiḥ api udgītha vidyā apekṣayā tasyāḥ  eva prakṛta tvāt na tu aśeṣa apekṣayā yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantām iti nimintrita apekṣayā teṣām eva prakṛta tvāt  vibhāgaḥ śatavat  sugamam avibhāge api na doṣa iti āha na ca idam samanvārambha vacanam iti saṃsāri viṣayā vidyā vihitā yathā udgītha vidyā pratiṣiddhā ca yathā asat śāstra adhigamana lakṣaṇā adhyayana mātravata eva karma vidhiḥ na tu upaniṣad adhyayanavataḥ etad uktam bhavati yad adhyayanam artha avabodha paryantam karmasu upayujyate yathā karma vidhi vākyānām tad mātravata eva adhikāraḥ karmasu na upaniṣadadhi anavataḥ tad adhyayanasya karmasu anupayogāt iti adhyayana mātravata eva iti mātra grahaṇena artha jñānam vā vyavacchinnam iti manvānaḥ  bhrāntaḥ codayati nanu evam sati iti sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayan samādhatte na vayam iti upaniṣad adhyayana apekṣam mātra grahaṇam na artha bodha apekṣam iti arthaḥ na aviśeṣāt  kurvan  eva iha karmāṇi iti avidyāvat viṣayam iti arthaḥ vidyavat viṣaya tve api avirodhaḥ  vidyā stuti artha tvāt iti āha stutayaḥ anumatiḥ vā apica vidyā phalam pratyakṣam darśayantī śrutiḥ kāla antara bhāvi phala karma aṅga tvam vidyāyā nirākaroti iti āha kāmakāreṇa ca eke kāma kāra icchā upamardam ca adhika upadeśāt iti anena ātmana eva śuddha buddha udāsīna tvādaya uktāḥ iha tu samasta kriyā kāraka phala vibhāga upamardam ca iti ūrdhvaretaḥsu ca śabde hi su bodham parāmarśam jaiminiḥ acodanā ca apavat ati hi siddha ūrdhvaretasām āśrami tve tad vidyānām akarma aṅga tayā apavarga artham syāt  āśrami tvam tu eṣām anya artha parāmarśa mātrāt na sidhyati vidhi abhāvāt  smṛti ācāra prasiddhiḥ ca teṣām pratyakṣa śruti virodhāt apramāṇam nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutiḥ āśrama antaram avīra hā vā eṣa devānām iti ādikā pratyakṣa śruti virodhe ca smṛti ācārayoḥ aprāmāṇyam uktam avirodhe tu anapekṣam syāt asati hi anumānam iti tad etad sarvam āha trayaḥ  dharma skandhā ityādinā anadhikṛta viṣayā vā iti andha paṅga vādayaḥ  hi ye naimittika karma an adhikṛtāḥ tān pratyāśrama antara vidhiḥ iti apicāpavat iti hi na kevala m anya para tayā parāmarśasya āśrama antaram na labhyate api tu āśrama antara nindā dvāreṇa apavādāt api iti arthaḥ syāt etad  bhavatu eṣa parāmarśaḥ  anya arthaḥ ye ca ime araṇya ityādibhyaḥ tu āśrama antaram setasi atītyata āha ye ca ime araṇya iti asya api deva patha upadeśa paratva at na etad paratvam iti arthaḥ na ca anya parāt api sphuṭatara āśrama antara pratyata iti āha saṃdigdham ca iti na hi tapa eva dvitīya iti atra āśrama antara abhidhāyī kaścid asti śabda iti nanu etam eva pravrājina iti vacanāt āśrama antaram setsyati iti ata āha tathā etam eva iti etad api loka saṃstavana param iti adhikaraṇa ārambham ākṣipya na asti pratyakṣa vacanam iti kṛtvā cintā iyam iti samādhatte nanu brahmacaryāt eva iti anuṣṭheyam bādarāyaṇaḥ sāmya śruteḥ bhavatu anyārthaḥ parāmarśaḥ tathā api etasmāt āśrama antarāṇi pratīyamānāni ca na apākaraṇam arhanti evam tāni apākriyeḥ anyadyasmāt na pratīyeran pratīyamānāni vā śrutyā bādhyeran na tāvat na pratīyante tathā hi trayaḥ  dharma skandhā iti skandha tri tvam pratijñātam tatra skandha śabdaḥ  yadi āśrama paraḥ  na syāt iti tu samūha vacanaḥ tatas  dharmāṇām yajña ādīnām prātisvika utpattīnām kim apekṣya tri tvam aṅkhyā su vyavasthāpyeta ekaika āśrama upasaṃgṛhītāḥ tu āśramāṇām tri tvāt śakyāḥ tri tve vyavasthāpayitum iti āśram atritva pratijña upapattiḥ tatra yajña ādi liṅgaḥ  gṛhāśrama ekaḥ  dharma skandhaḥ  brahmacārī iti dvitīyaḥ tapa iti ca tapaḥ pradhānāt tu vānaprastha āśramāt na anyaḥ brahma saṃstha iti ca pāriśeṣyāt parivrāj iti vakṣyati tasmāt anya parāt api parām arthāt aśrama antarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatā adhikaraṇa nyāyena na śakyante apākartum na ca pratyakṣa śruti virodhaḥ  vīra hā vā ityādeḥ pratipanna gārhasthyam pramādāt ajñānāt vā agnim udvāsayitum pravṛttam pratyupapatteḥ evañca avirodhe siddhavat parāmarśāt aśrama antarāṇām śāstra antara siddhim vā kalpayiṣyāmaḥ  yathā upavīta vidhi pare vākye aupavyayate deva lakṣmam eva tad kurute iti atra nivītam manuṣyāṇām prācīnāvītam pitṛṇām iti śāstra antara siddhayoḥ nivīta prācīna āvītayoḥ parāmarśa iti vidhiḥ vā dhāraṇavat  yadi api brahma saṃstha tvaḥ tu tiparatayā asya saṃdarbhasya eka vākyatā gamyate saṃbhava antyām ca eka vākya tāyām vākya bhedaḥ  anyāpyaḥ tathā api āśrama antarāṇām pūrva siddheḥ abhāvāt parāmarśa anupapatteḥ aparāmarśe ca stuteḥ saṃbhavena kiṃparatayā eka vākyatāḥ tu itī tām bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavat varam apūrva tvāt vidhiḥ eva astu yathā aadhastāt samidham dhārayan  anudravet upari hi devebhyaḥ  dhārayati iti atra satyām api adhas dhāraṇena eka vākyatā pratītau vidhīyata eva upari dhāraṇam apūrva tvāt tathā uktam avidhiḥ tu dhāraṇe apūrva tvāt it tathā iha api āśrama antara parāmarśa śrutiḥ vidhareva iti kalpyte saṃprati parāmarśe api itareṣām āśramāṇām brahma saṃsthatā saṃstava sāmarthyāt eva vidhātavyā na khalva vidheyam saṃstūyate tad artha tvāt saṃstavasya iti āha yadā api iti atra avāntara vicāram ārabhate sā ca kim caturṣu iti vicāra prayojanam āha yadi ca iti nanu anāśramya iva brahma saṃsthaḥ  bhaviṣyati iti ata āha anāśrayam itvā iti tatra pūrva pakṣam āha tatra tapaḥ śabdena iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ yadi tāvat brahma saṃstha iti padam pratyastam itya avayava artham parivrājake aśva karṇa ādi padavat rūḍham tad āśrama prāpti mātreṇa eva amṛtībhāva iti na tad bhāvāyā brahma jñānam apekṣeta tathā ca na anyaḥ panthā vidyate ayanāya iti virodhaḥ na ca saṃbhati avayava arthe samudāya sakti kalpanā tasmāt brahmaṇi saṃsthāsya iti brahma saṃsthaḥ evañca caturṣu āśrameṣu yasya eva brahmaṇi niṣṭha tvam āśramiṇaḥ sa brahma saṃsthaḥ  amṛta tvam eti iti yuktam tatra tāvat brahmacāri gṛhasthau sva śabda abhihitau tapaḥ padena ca tapaḥ pradhāna tayā bhikṣuvānaprasthau  upasthāpitau bhikṣuḥ api hi samādhika śauca aṣṭa grāsī bhojana niyamāt bhavati vānaprasthavat tapaḥ pradhānaḥ na ca gṛhastha ādeḥ karmiṇaḥ  brahma niṣṭhatvā asaṃbhavaḥ yadi tāvat karma yogaḥ karmi tā sā bhikṣoḥ api kāya vāc manobhiḥ asti atha ye na brahma arpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāma arthitayā te karmiṇaḥ tathā sati gṛhasthādayaḥ  api brahma arpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ tasmāt brahmaṇi tātparyam brahma niṣṭhatā na tu karma tyāgaḥ pramāṇa virodhāt  tapasā ca dvayoḥ āśramayoḥ ekīkaraṇena traya iti tri tvam upapadyate evañca trayaḥ  api āśramā abrahma saṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇya loka bhājaḥ  bhavanti yaḥ punar eteṣu brahma saṃsthaḥ saḥ  amṛtatva bhāj iti na ca yeṣām puṇya loka bhāj tvam teṣām eva amṛta tvam iti virodhaḥ yathā devadatta yajñadattau manda prajñā avabhūtām saṃprati tayoḥ yajñādattaḥ tu śāstra abhyāsāt paṭu prajñaḥ  vartate iti tathā iha api ya eva abrahma saṃsthāḥ puṇya loka bhājaḥ ta eva brahma saṃsthā amṛtatva bhāja iti avasthā bhedāt avirodhaḥ tathā ca brahma saṃstha iti yaugikam padam prakṛta viṣayam bhaviṣyati yathā āgnepya agnīdhram upatiṣṭhata iti atra viniyuktā api prakṛtā eva āgneyī gṛhyate na ca viniyukta viniyoga virodhaḥ yadi hi atra agnoti upadiśyeta tatas  yathā pratītā tathā uddiśyate viniyuktā ca pratītiḥ bhavet iti viniyukta viniyoga virodhaḥ iha tu āgnīdhra upasthāne sā vidheya tvena viniyujyate na tu uddiśyate vidheya tvena ca viniyoge āgneyī padārtha apekṣaṇāt prakṛta atikrame pramāṇa abhāvāt  tāvatā ca śāstra upapatteḥ na aprakṛtānām api grahaṇa saṃbhavaḥ na ca yātayāmatayā na viniyogaḥ vācaḥ teme sarveṣām eva mantrāṇām viniyogāt anyatra api aviniyoga prasaṅgāt tathā iha api prakṛtā eva āśramā buddhi viparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante na anuktaḥ parivrāj ā iva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ rāddha antam upakramate tad ayuktam na hi satyām gatau vānaprastha viśeṣena iti yathā upakrāntam tathā eva parisamāpanam ucitam yad saṃkhyākāḥ ca ye prasiddhāḥ te tad saṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti ca ucitam na tu satyām gatau  utsargasya apavādaḥ  yujyate aśādhāraṇena ekaikena lakṣaṇena ekeka āśramaḥ  vaktum upakrānta iti tathā eva samāpanam ucitam na tu sādhāraṇā sādhāraṇābhyām upakrama samāptī śrliṣyete na ca tapaḥ  nāma nāsā dhāraṇam vānaprasthānām iti ata āha tapaḥ ca asādhāraṇa iti na khalu parāka ādibhiḥ kāya kleśa pradhānaḥ  yathā vānaprasthaḥ tathā bhikṣuḥ sati api aṣṭa grāsa ādi niyame na ca śauca santoṣa śama ādayaḥ tapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānām tapaḥ prasiddheḥ asiddheḥ ata eva vṛddhāḥ tapasaḥ  bhedena śauca ādīn ācakṣate aśauca santoṣa tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni niyamāḥ iti siddha saṃkhyā bhedeṣu ca saṃkhyā antara abhidhānam aśliṣṭam iti āha catuṣṭvena ca iti apica bheda vyapadeśaḥ  atra iti traya eta iti kim bhikṣuḥ api parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣu varjam traya eva na tāvantraya iti bhikṣu saṃgrahe tad varjanam ete traya iti atra vartum śakyam eva iti prakṛtānām sākalyena parāmarśāt bhikṣu saṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇya loka tvam abrahma saṃsthātva abhāvāt bhikṣoḥ tena tasya brahma saṃsthasya sadā puṇya loka tvam amṛta tvam ca iti virodhaḥ triṣu ca brahma saṃsthapade yadā iti saṃbandhanīyam bhikṣau ca sadā iti vaiṣamyam tad idam uktam pṛthaktve ca iti pūrva pakṣa ābhāsam smārayati katham punar brahma saṃstha śabdaḥ  yogāt iti tad nirākaroti atra ucyata iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ satyam yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛta saṃbhave na tad atipattyāprakṛte vartitum arhati asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūt pramāda pāṭha iti aprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ darśitaḥ ca atra asaṃbhavaḥ  adhastāt iti eṣa hi brahma saṃsthatā lakṣaṇaḥ  dharmaḥ  bhikṣaḥ rasādhāraṇa āśrama antarāṇi tad saṃsthāni atad saṃsthāni ca bhikṣuḥ tad saṃstha iti eva tad saṃstha tā hi svābhāvam vyavacchindantī virodhāt yaḥ tad saṃstha eva tatra añjasī na anyatra śama damādiḥ tu tadīya iti sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti arthaḥ brahma saṃstha tvam asādhāraṇam parivrājaka dharmam śrutiḥ ādarśayati iti āha tathā ca nyāsa iti brahma iti sarva saṅga parityāgaḥ  hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta iti ata āha brahmā hi paraḥ atas  paraḥ  brahma iti kim apekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsa iti ata āha tāni vā etāni avarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa eva atyarecayat iti etad uktam bhavati brahma para tayā sarveṣaṇā parityāga lakṣaṇaḥ  nyāsaḥ  brahma iti tathā ca īdṛśam nyāsa lakṣaṇam brahma saṃstha tvam bhikṣā ūḥ eva asā dhāraṇam na itareṣām āśramiṇām brahma jñānasya śabda janitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ  apavarga sādhanam tad aṅgatayā parivrājyam vihitam na tu anadhikṛtam prati iti arthaḥ stuti mātram upādānāt iti ced na apūrva tvāt yadi atra saṃnidhāna upāsana avidhiḥ na asti tatas  pradeśa antara sthitaḥ  api vidhi vyabhicārita tad vidhi saṃbandhena udgīthena upasthāpitaḥ sa eṣa rasānām rasatama ityādinā pada saṃdarbheṇa eka vākya bhāvam upagataḥ stūyate na hi samabhivyāhṛtaiḥ eva eka vākyatā bhavati iti kaścid niyama hetuḥ asti anuṣaṅga atideśa labdhaiḥ api vidhi asam abhivyāhṛtaiḥ artha vādaiḥ eka vākyata abhyupagamāt yadi tu udgītham upāsīta sāma upāsīta ityādi vidhi samabhivyāhāraḥ śrutaḥ tathā api tasya eva vidheḥ stutiḥ na tu upāsanā viṣaya samarpaṇa para om iti etad akṣara mudgītham iti anena eva upāsanā viṣaya samarpaṇāt iti prāpte abhidhīyate na tāvat dūra sthena karma vidhi vākyena eka vākyatā saṃbhavaḥ pratīta samabhivyāhṛtānām vidhinā eka vākya tayā stuti artha tvam artha vādānām rakta paṭa nyāyena bhavati na tu stutyā vinā kācid anupapattiḥ vidheḥ yathā āhuḥ aasti tu tad iti atireke parihāraḥ iti ata eva vidheḥ apekṣā bhāvāt pravartana ātmakasya anuṣaṅga tideśa ādibhiḥ arthavāda prāpti abhidhānam asamañjasam na hi kartṛ apekṣita upāyām avagatāyām prāśasti apratyayasya asti kaścid upayogaḥ tasmāt dūra sthasya karma vidheḥ stutau  ānarthakyam tena eka vākyata anupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tu upāsanā vidheḥ kim viṣaya samarpaṇena upayujyatām uta stutyā iti viśaye viṣaya samarpaṇena yathārthavat tvam na evam stutyā bahis aṅga tvāt  agatyā hi sā tasmāt upāsana arthā iti siddham akuryāt kriyeta kartavyam bhavet syāt iti pañcamam etad syāt sarva vedeṣu niyatam vidhi lakṣaṇam bhāvanāyāḥ khalu kartṛ samīhita anukūla tvam vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ ca kartuḥ ahita anukūla tvam yathā āhuḥ akartavyaḥ ca sukha phalaḥ  akartavyaḥ  duḥkha phalaḥ  akartavyaḥ  duḥkha phalaḥ iti etad ca asmābhiḥ upapāditam nyāya kaṇikāyām kriyā ca bhāvanā tad vacanāḥ ca karoti ādayaḥ yathā āhuḥ kam abhvastayaḥ kriyā sāmānya vacanā iti ata eva kṛbhvastīn udāhṛtavān sāmānya uktau tad viśeṣāḥ pacet ityādayaḥ  api gamyanta iti tatra kuryāt iti ākṣipta kartṛkā bhāvanā kriyeta iti ākṣiptakarmikā bhāvanā kartavyam iti tu karma bhūta dravya upasarjana bhāvanā evam daṇḍī bhavet daṇḍinā bhavitavyam daṇḍinā bhūyeta iti eka dhātu artha viṣayā vidhi upahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ bhavatiḥ ca eṣa janmani yathā kulāla vyāpārāt ghaṭaḥ  bhavati bījāt aṅkuraḥ  bhavati iti prayuñjate na ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ  asti iti prayuñjate tasmāt asti sattāyām na janmani iti pāriplava arthā iti ced na viśeṣita tvāt  yadi api upaniṣad ākhyānāni vidyā saṃnidhau śrutāni tathā api asarvāṇi ākhyānāni pāriplave iti sarva śrutyā niḥśeṣa artha tayā durbalasya saṃnidheḥ bādhita tvāt pariplava arthāni eva ākhyānāni na ca sarvā dāśa tayīḥ anubrūyāt iti viniyoge api dāśa tayīnām prātisvika viniyogāt tatra tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogaḥ  na virudhyate tathā iha api sati api pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānāt vidyā aṅga tvam api bhaviṣyati iti vācyam dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānām viniyogānām samudāya viniyogasya ca tulya bala tvāt iha tu saṃnidhānāt  śruteḥ balīyaḥ tvāt  tasmāt pāriplava arthāni eva ākhyānāni iti prāpta ucyate na eṣām ākhyānānām pāriplave viniyogaḥ kintu pāriplavam ācakṣīta iti upakramya yāni āmnātāni manuḥ vaivasvataḥ  rājā ityādīni teṣām eva tatra viniyogaḥ tāni eva hi pāriplavena viśeṣitāni itarathā pāriplave sarvāṇi ākhyānān iti etāvatā eva gata tvāt pariplavam ācakṣīta iti anarthakam syāt  ākhyāna viśeṣaṇa tve tu arthavat  tasmāt viśeṣāṇa anurodhāt sarva śabdaḥ tad apekṣaḥ  na tu aśeṣa vacanaḥ yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti atra nimintra ātāpekṣaḥ sarva śabdaḥ tathā ca upaniṣad ā ākhyānānām vidyā saṃnidhiḥ apratidvandīm vidyā eka vākyatām saḥ  arodīt iti ādīnām iva vidhi eka vākya tvam gamayati iti siddham pratipatti saukaryāt ca iti upākhyānena hi bālā api avadhīyante yathā tantra upākhyāyikayā iti ata eva ca agni indhana ādi anapekṣā vidyāyāḥ kratu artha tve sati tathā kratu upakaraṇāya sva kāryāya kratuḥ apekṣitaḥ tad abhāve kasya upakāraḥ  vidyayā iti yadā tu puruṣa arthā tadā na anayā kratuḥ apekṣitaḥ sva kārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt  agni indhāna ādinā ca āśrama karmāṇi upalakṣyante tad āha agni indhana ādīvyāśrama karmāṇi vidyayā sva artha siddhau na apekṣitavyāni iti sva artha siddhau na apekṣitavyāni na tu sva siddhau  iti etad ca adhikam upariṣṭāt vakṣyate tad vivakṣayā ca etad prayojanam pūrvatanasya adhikaraṇasya uktam adhika vivakṣya iti yad uktam tad adhikam āha sarva apekṣā ca yajña ādi śruteḥ aśvavat  yathā sva artha siddhau na apekṣyante āśrama karmāṇi evam utpattau  api na apekṣyeḥ an  iti śaṅkā syāt  na ca vividiṣanti yajñena ityādi virodhaḥ na hi eṣa vidhiḥ api tu vartamāna apadeśaḥ sa ca stutyā api upapadyate apica catasraḥ pratipattayaḥ  brahmaṇi prathamā tāvat upaniṣad vākya śravaṇa mātrāt bhavati yām kila ācakṣate śravaṇam iti dvitīyā mīmāṃsā sahitā tasyāt eva upaniṣad vākya ādyām ācakṣate mananam iti tṛtīyā cintā santati mayī yām ācakṣate nididhi āsanam iti caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛtti rūpā na āntarīyakam hi tasyāḥ kaivalyam iti tatra ādye tāvat pratipatti vidita padatad arthasya vidita vākya gati gocara nyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eva iti na tatra karma apekṣā te eva ca cintā mayīm tṛtīyam pratipattim prasuvāte iti na tatra api karma apekṣā sā ca ādara nairantarya dīrgha kāla sevitā sākṣātkāravatīm ādhatta eva pratipattim caturthīm iti na tatra api asti karma apekṣā tad na āntarīyakam ca kaivalyam iti na tasya api karma apekṣā tad evam pramāṇataḥ ca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karma apekṣā iti bījam śaṅkāyām evam prāpta ucyate utpattau jñānasya karma apekṣā vidyate vividiṣā utpāda dvārā avividiṣanti yajñena iti śruteḥ na ca idam vartamāna apadeśa tvāt stuti mātram apūrva tvāt arthasya yathā yasya parṇa mayī juhūrbhavati iti parṇa maya tā vidhiḥ apūrva tvāt na tvayam vartamāna apadeśaḥ anuvāda anupapatteḥ tasmāt utpattau vidyayā śama ādivat  karmāṇi apekṣyante tatra api evaṃvid iti vidyā svarūpa saṃyogāt antaraṅgāṇi vidyā utpāde śama ādīni bahis aṅgāṇi karmāṇi vividiṣā saṃyogāt tathā hi āśrama vihita nitya karma anuṣṭhānāt dharma samutpādaḥ tatas  pāpmā vilīyate sa hi tattvataḥ  anitya aśuci duḥ khānātmani saṃsāre sati nitya śuci mukha ātma lakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati citta sattvam adharma nibandhana tvāt vibhramāṇām atas  pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣa upapatti dvāra apāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣa upapattibhyām saṃsārasya tāttvikīm anitya aśuci duḥkha rūpa tām apratyūham viniścinā iti tatas  asmin  anabhirati saṃjñam vairāgyam upajāyate tatas tad jihāsā asya upāvartate tatas  hāna upāyam prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaḥ ca ātma tattva jñānam asya upāya iti śāstra dācārya vacanāt ca upaśrutya tad jijñāsata iti vividiṣā upahāra mukhena ātma jñāna utpattau  asti karmāṇam upayogaḥ vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgra tayā śravaṇa manane kartum utsahate tatas  asya atattvam asi iti vākyat nirvicikitsam jñānam utpadyate na ca nirvicikitsam tad tvam asi iti vākya artham avadhārayataḥ karmaṇi adhikāraḥ  asti yena bhāvanāyām vā bhāvanā kārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇām upayogaḥ etena vṛttirūra pasākṣātkāra kārye apavarge karmaṇām upayogaḥ  dūra nirastaḥ  veditavyaḥ tasmāt yathā eva śama damādayaḥ  yāvat jīvam anuvartante evam āśrama karma apīti asamīkṣita ābhādhānam viduṣaḥ tatra anadhikārāt iti uktam dṛṣṭa artheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddha varjam anadhikāre api asaktasya svārasikī pravṛttiḥ upapadyata eva na hi tatra anvaya vyatireka samadhigamanīya phale asti vidhi apekṣā atas ca abhrāntyā ced laukikam karma vaidikam ca tathā astu te iti pralāpaḥ śama dama ādīnām tu vidyā utpādāya upāttānām upariṣṭāt avasthā svābhāvyāt anapekṣitānām api anuvṛttiḥ upapāditam ca etad asmābhiḥ prathama sūtra ite na iha punar  pratyāpyate tasmāt vividiṣa utpāda dvāra āśrama karmaṇām vidyā utpattau  upayogaḥ  na vidyā kārya iti siddham śeṣam ati rohita artham sarvān na anumatiḥ ca prāṇa atyaye tad darśanāt  prāṇa saṃvāde sarva indriyāṇām śrūyate eṣa kila vicāra viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi khalu vāc ādīni avajitya prāṇaḥ  mukhya  uvāca etāni kim me annam bhaviṣyati iti tāni ha ūcuḥ yad idam loke anna mā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarva prāṇinām yad annam tad tava annam iti tad anena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvam annam iti anucintanam vidhāya āha śrutiḥ ana ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana anannam bhavati iti sarvam prāṇasya annam iti evaṃvidi na kiñcinā anannam bhavati iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim etad sarvān na abhyanujñānam śama ādivat etad vidyā aṅga tayā vidhīyata uta stuti artham saṃkīrtyata iti tatra yadi api bhavati iti vartamāna apadeśāt na vidhiḥ pratīyate tathā api yathā yasya parṇa mayī juhūrbhavati iti vartamāna apadeśāt api palāśa mayītva vidhi pratipattiḥ pañca malakāra āpattyā tathā iha api pravṛtti viśeṣa kara ta alābhe vidhi pratipattiḥ stutau hi arthavāda mātram na tathā arthavat yathā vidhau bhakṣya abhakṣya śāstram ca sāmānyatas  pravṛttam anena viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhyate gamya agamya viveka śāstram iva sāmānyatas  pravṛttam vāmadeva vidyā aṅga bhūta samastantrya parihāra śāstreṇa viśeṣa viṣayeṇa iti prāpta ucyate aśakteḥ kalpanīya tvāt śāstra antara virodhataḥ prāṇasya annam idam sarvam iti cintana saṃstavaḥ na tāvat kauleyaka maryādam annam manuṣya jātinā yugapad paryāyeṇa vā śakya mattum ibhakarabhaka ādīnām annasya śamī karīra kaṇṭaka vaṭa kāṣṭha ādeḥ ekasya api aśakyādana tvāt  na ca atra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhi pratipattiḥ asti na ca kalpanīyaḥ  vidhiḥ apūrvatva abhāvāt  stutyā api ca tad upapatteḥ na ca satyām gatau sāmānyatas  pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣaya saṃkocaḥ  yuktaḥ tasmāt sarvam prāṇasya annam iti anucintana vidhāna stutiḥ iti sāmpratam śakya tve ca pravṛtti viśeṣa karatā upayujyate na aśakya vidhāna tve prāṇātyasya iti ca avadhāraṇa param prāṇātyaya eva sarva anna tvam tatra upākhyānāt ca sphuṭatara vidhi smṛteḥ ca surā varjam vidvāṃsam avidvāṃsam prati vidhānāt  na tu anyatra iti ibhyena hastipakena sāmi svādi tā nardha bhakṣitān sa hi cākrāyaṇaḥ  hastipaka ucchiṣṭān kulmāṣān bhuñjānaḥ  hastipakena uktaḥ kulmāṣān iva mad ucchiṣṭam udakam kasmāt na anupibasi iti evam uktaḥ tad udakam ucchiṣṭa doṣāt pratyācacakṣe kāraṇam ca atra uvāca na vājīviṣṭam na jīviṣyāmi iti imān kulmāṣā nakhādam kāmaḥ  ma udaka pānam iti svātantryam me udaka pāne nadī kūpa taḍāga prāpa ādiṣu yathākāmam prāpnomi iti na ucchiṣṭa udaka abhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatra ucchiṣṭa bhakṣaṇa doṣa iti maṭa cīhateṣu kuruṣu glāyan  aśanāyayā muniḥ nirapatrapa ibhyena sāmi jagdha an khādayāmāsa vihita tvāt ca āśrama tarmā api nityāni hi āśrama karmāṇi yāvat jīva śruteḥ nityehita upāya tayā avaśyam kartavyāni vividiṣanti iti ca vidyā saṃyogāt vidyāyāḥ ca avaśyaṃbhāva niyama abhāvāt anitya tā prāpnoti nitya anitya saṃyogaḥ ca ekasya na saṃbhavati avaśya anavaśyaṃbhāvayoḥ ekatra virodhāt  na ca vākya bhedāt vāstavaḥ  virodhaḥ śakyaḥ  apanetum tasmāt anadhyavasāya eva atra iti prāptam etena aekasya tu ubhaya tve saṃyoga pṛthak tvam iti ākṣiptam evam prāpte abhidhīyate siddhe hi syāt virodhaḥ  ayam na tu sādhye kathañcana vidhi adhīna ātma lābhe asmin yathāvidhi matā sthitiḥ siddham hi vastu viruddha dharma yogena bādhyate na tu sādhya rūpam yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇa agrahaṇe te hi vidhi adhīna tvāt vikaspete eva na punar  siddhe vikalpa saṃbhavaḥ tad iha ekam eva agnihotra ākhyam karma yāvat jīva śruteḥ nimittena yujyamānam nityehita upātta durita prakṣaya prayojanam avaśya kartavyam vidyā aṅga tayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācid ka tayā anavaśyam bhāve api akāmyaḥ  vā naimittikaḥ  vā vikṛtya niviśate iti nyāyāt anitya adhikāreṇa niviśamānam api na nityam anityayati tena api tasmiddheḥ iti saṃyoga pṛthaktvāt na nitya anitya saṃyoga virodha ekasya kāryasya iti siddham saha akira tvam ca karmaṇām na kārye vidyāyāḥ kim tu utpattau kor athaḥ vidyā sahakārīṇi karmāṇi iti ayam arthaḥ satsu karmasu vidyā eva sva kārye vyāpriyate yathā asaha eva daśābhiḥ pūtraiḥ bhāram vahati gardabhī iti sātsu eva daśa putreṣu sā eva bhārasya vāhikā iti avidhi lakṣaṇa tvāt iti vihitam hi darśa paurṇamāsa ādi aṅgaiḥ yujyate na tu avihitam grāhaka grahaṇa pūrvaka tvāt aṅga bhāvasya vidhaiḥ ca grāhaka tvāt  avihite ca tad anupapatteḥ catasṛṇām api ca pratipattīnām brahmaṇi vidhāna anupapatteḥ iti uktam prathama sūtre draṣṭavyaḥ  nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhi sarūpam ni vidhiḥ iti api uktam utpattim prati hetu bhāvaḥ tu sattva śuddhyā vividiṣā upajana dvāra iti adhastāt upapāditam asādhya tvāt ca vidyā phalasya apavargasya svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ  hi saḥ na ca svam rūpam brahmaṇaḥ sādhyam nitya tvāt  śeṣam ati rohita artham sarvathā api ta eva ubhaya liṅgāt  yathā māsam agni hotram juhvati iti prakaraṇa antarāt karma bheda evam iha api atam etam veda anuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena itikratu prakaraṇam atikramya śravaṇāt prakaraṇa antarāt tad buddhi vyavacchede sati karma antaram iti prāpta ucyate sati api prakaraṇa antare tad eva karma śruteḥ smṛteḥ ca saṃyoga bhedaḥ param yathā aagnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ ayāvat jīvam agni hotram juhuyāt iti tad eva agnihotram ubhaya saṃyuktam na hi prakaraṇa antaram sākṣadbhedakam kintu ajñāta jñāpana svarasaḥ  vidhiḥ prakaraṇa aikye sphuṭatara pratyabhijñā balena svarasam jahyāt  prakaraṇa antareṇa tu vighaṭuta pratyabhijñānaḥ svarasam ajahat karma bhinatti iha tu siddhavat utpanna rūpāṇi eva yajña ādīni vividiṣāyām viniyuñjānaḥ  na juhvati ityādivat apūrvam eṣām rūpam utpādayitum arhati na ca tatra api naiyamika agnihotre māsa vidhiḥ na apūrva agni hotra utpattiḥ iti sāṃpratam homa eva sākṣat vidhi śruteḥ kālasya ca anupādeyasya avidheya tvāt  kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla iti utsargaḥ iha tu vividiṣāyām vidhi śrutiḥ na yajña ādau tāni tu siddhāni eva anūdyanta ityaika karmyāt saṃyoga pṛthaktvam siddham smṛtimuktvā liṅga darśanam uktam antarā ca api tu tad dṛṣṭeḥ yadi vidyā sahakārīṇi āśrama karmāṇi hanta bhaḥ vidhura ādīnām anāśramiṇām anadhikāraḥ  vidyāyām abhāvāt sahakāriṇām āśrama karmaṇām iti prāpta ucyate na atyantam akarmāṇaḥ  raikka vidhura vāca kravī prabhṛtayaḥ santi hi teṣām anāśrami tve api japa upavāsa devatā ārādhanāt iti karmāṇi karmaṇām ca sahakāri tvam uktam āśrama karmaṇām upalakṣaṇa tvāt iti na teṣām anadhikāraḥ  vidyāsu janma antara anuṣṭhiteḥ api ca iti na khalu vidyā kārye karmaṇām apekṣā api tu utpāde utpādayanti ca vividiṣā upahāreṇa karmāṇi vidyām utpanna vividiṣāṇām puruṣa dhaureyāṇām vidhura saṃvarta prabhṛtīnām kṛtam karmabhiḥ yadi api ca iha janmani tathā iha janmani āśrama karma utpādita vividiṣa eva vidyāyām adhikṛtaḥ  na itara iti anāśramiṇām anadhikāraḥ  vidhura prabhṛtīnām ityata āha dṛṣṭārthā ca iti avidyā nivṛttiḥ vidyāyā dṛṣṭoḥ athaḥ sa ca anvavyatireka siddhaḥ  na niyamam apekṣata iti arthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ  vighātaḥ tasya abhāva iti arthaḥ yadi anāśramiṇām api adhikāraḥ  vidyāyām kṛtam tarhi āśramaiḥ ati bahula āyāsaiḥ iti āśaṅkyāha atas tu itarat jyāyaḥ liṅgāt ca svasthena āśrami tvam āstheyam daivāt punar  patnī ādi viyogātaḥ sati ana āśrami tve bhavet adhikāraḥ  vidyāyām iti śruti smṛti saṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñena ityādinā jyāyaḥ tvā avagateḥ śruti liṅgāt smṛti liṅgāt cva āgamyate tena eti puṇya kṛt iti śruti liṅgam anāśramī na tiṣṭheta ityādi ca smṛti liṅgam tad bhūtasya tu na atadbhāvaḥ  jaimineḥ api niyama ātad rūpa abhāvebhyaḥ ārohavat pratyavarohaḥ  api kadācid ūrdhvaretasām syāt iti manda āśaṅkā nivāraṇa artham idam adhikaraṇam pūrva dharmeṣu yāga homa ādiṣu rāgataḥ  vā gṛhasthaḥ  aham patnī ādi parivṛtaḥ syām iti niyamam vyācaṣṭe tathā hi atyantam ātmanām iti atad rūpa tām āroha tulya tā bhāvam vyācaṣṭe tathā ca brahmacaryam samāpya iti abhāvam śiṣṭa ācāra abhāvam vibhajate na ca evam ācārāḥ śiṣṭā iti atirohita artham anyat  na ca ādhikārikam apipatana anumānāt tad ayogāt  prāyaścittam na paśyāmi iti naiṣṭhikam prati prāyaścitta abhāva smaraṇāt nairṛta gardabha ālambhaḥ prāyaścittam upakurvāṇakam prati tasmāt chinna śirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyā abhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ sūtra yojanā tu na ca adhikārikam adhikāra lakṣaṇe prathama kāṇḍe nirṇītam aavakīrṇi paśuḥ ca tadvat ādhānasya aprāpta kāla tvāt iti anena yad prāyaścittam tad na naiṣṭhike bhavitum arhati kutas  ārūḍhaḥ  naiṣṭhikam iti smṛtyā patana śruti anumānāt tad prāyaścittā yogāt  upapūrvam api iti eke bhāvam aśanavat tad uktam śrutiḥ tāvat sarasataḥ  asaṅkacat vṛttiḥ brahmacāri mātrasya naiṣṭhikasya upakurvāṇasya ca aviśeṣeṇa prāyaścittam upadiśati sākṣāt  prāyaścittam na paśyāmi iti tu smṛtiḥ tasyām api ca sākṣāt prāyaścittam na kartavyam iti prāyaścitta niṣedhaḥ  na gamyate na paśyāmi iti tu darśana abhāvena saḥ  anumātavyaḥ tathā ca smṛtiḥ niṣedha artha iti anumāya tad arthā śrutiḥ anumātavyā śrutiḥ tu sāmānya viṣayā viśeṣam upasarpantī śīghra pravṛttiḥ iti smārtam prāyaścitta adarśanam tu yatna gaurava artham etad uktam bhavati kṛta nirṇejanaiḥ api etaiḥ na saṃkhyānam kartavyam iti sūtra arthaḥ tu upapūrvam api pātakam naiṣṭhikasya avakīrṇi tvam na mahāpātakam apiḥ eva kāra arthe ata eke prāyaścitta bhāvam icchanti iti ācāryāṇām vipratipattau viśeṣa abhāvāt sāmyam bhavet  śāstra sthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstra mūla tvāt  upapādetam ca prāyaścitta bhāva prasiddheḥ śāstra mūla tvam iti sugamam itaram yadi naiṣṭhika ādīnām asti prāyaścittam tad kim etaiḥ kṛta nirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyam uta na iti tatra doṣa kṛta tvāt asaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tad nibarhaṇāt anibarhaṇe vā tad karaṇa vaiyarthyāt saṃvyavahāryā eva iti prāpta ucyati bahis tu ubhayathā api smṛteḥ ācārāt ca niṣiddha karma anuṣṭhāna janya mena u loka dvaye api aśuddhim āpādayati dvaidham loka dvaye api aśuddhiḥ apanīyate prāyaścittaiḥ enonibarhaṇam kurvāṇaiḥ kasya acid tu para loka aśuddhi mātram apanīyate prāyaścittaiḥ enonibarhaṇam kurvāṇaiḥ ihaloka aśuddhiḥ tu enasā āpāditā na śakyā apanetum yathā strī bāla ādi ghātinām yathā āhuḥ aviśuddhān api dharmataḥ  na saṃpibet iti tathā ca aprāyaścittaiḥ apaityena u yad ajñāna kṛtam bhavet kāmataḥ kṛtam api bāla ghrādiḥ tu kṛta nirṇejanaḥ  api vacanāt avyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti vacanam ca bāla ghrān  ca ityādi tasmāt sarvam avadātam svāminaḥ phala śruteḥ iti ātreyaḥ prathame kāṇḍe śeṣa lakṣaṇe tathākāma iti atra ṛtvij saṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kim kāmaḥ  yājamāna uta artvijya iti saṃśapya ārtvijye api karmaṇi yājamāna eva kāmaḥ  guṇa phaleṣu iti nirṇītam ihi tu evan jātīyakāni ca aṅga saṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kim yājamānani eva ūta ārtvijyāni iti vicāryata iti na punaruktam tatra upāsakānām phala śravaṇāt anadhikāriṇaḥ tad anupapatteḥ yajamānasya ca karma janita phala upabhoga bhājaḥ  adhikārāt ṛtvijām ca tad anupapatteḥ vacanāt ca rāja ājñā sthānīyāt kkacid ṛtvijām phala śruteḥ asati vacane yajamānasya phalavat upāsanam tasya phala śruteḥ tam ha bakaḥ  dālabhyaḥ  vidāñcakāra iti ādeḥ upāsanasya ca siddha viṣaya tayā anyāya apavāda sāmarthya bhāvāt yājamānam eva upāsana akarma iti prāpta ucyate ārtvijyam iti auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate upākhyānāt tāvat upāsanam audgātram avagamyate tad balavati sati bādhake anyathā upapādanīyam na ca ṛtvikkartṛka upāsane yajamāna gāmitā phalasya asaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyaḥ tad gāmine phalāya ghaṭate tasmāt na vyasani tā mātreṇa upākhyānam anyathayitum yuktam iti rāddha antar  tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityam nirvidya niścayena labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāset bālyam ca pāṇḍityam ca nirvidya atha muniḥ amaunam ca maunam ca nirvidya atha brāhmaṇa iti yatra hi vidhi vibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ bālyena tiṣṭhāset iti atra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune tasmāt yathā atha brahmaṇa iti etad aśrūyamāṇa vidhikam avidheyam evam maunam api na ca apūrva tvāt vidheyam tasmāt brāhnaḥ pāṇḍityam nirvidya iti pāṇḍitya vidhānāt eva mauna siddheḥ pāṇḍityam eva maunam iti athavā bhikṣu vacanaḥ  ayam muni śabdaḥ tatra darśanāt  agārhasthyam ācārya kulam maunam vānaprastham iti atra tasya anyatas  vihitasya ayam anuvādaḥ tasmāt bālyam eva atra vidhīyate maunam tu prāptam praśaṃsā artham anūdyata iti yuktam bhavet evam yadi paṇḍita paryāyaḥ  muni śabdaḥ  bhavet  api tu jñāna mātram pāṇḍityam jñāna atiśaya saṃpattiḥ tu maunam tad prasiddheḥ āśrama bhede tu tad pravṛttiḥ gārhasthi ādi pada saṃnidhānāt tasmāt apūrva tvāt maunasya bālya pāṇḍitya apekṣayā tṛtīyam idam maunam jñāna atiśaya rūpam vidhīyate evam ca nirvedanīya tvam api vidhāna āñjasam syāt iti āha nirvedanīyatva nirdeśāt iti kasya idam maunam vidhīyate vidyā asahakāritayā ityata āha tadvataḥ  vidyāvataḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ  bhikṣoḥ pṛcchati katham iti vidyāvat tā pratīyate na saṃnyāsitā iti arthaḥ uttaran tad adhikārāt  bhikṣoḥ tad adhikārāt  tad darśayati ātmānam viditvā iti sūtra avayavam yojayitum śaṅkate nanu iti pariharati ata āha pakṣeṇa iti vidyāvān iti na vidyā atiśayaḥ  vivakṣitaḥ api tu vidyā udayāya abhyāse pravṛttaḥ  na punar utpanna vidyā atiśayaḥ tathā āca asya pakṣe kadācid bheda darśanāt saṃbhava iti arthaḥ vidhi ādiḥ vidhi mukhyaḥ pradhānam iti yāvat  ata eva samidh ādiḥ vidhi antaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhāna vidheḥ paścāt iti tatra aśrūyamāṇa vidhi tve apūrva tvāt vidhiḥ āstheya iti arthaḥ nanu yadi ayam āśramaḥ  bālya pradhānaḥ kasmāt punar gārhasthyena upasaṃharati iti codayati evam bālya ādi viśiṣṭa iti uttaram paṭhati kṛtsna bhāvāt tu gṛhiṇā upasaṃhāraḥ chāndogye bahulāya asādhya karma bahula tvāt gārhasthyasya ca āśrama antara dharmāṇām ca keṣāñcid ahiṃsā ādīnām samavāyāt tena upasaṃhāraḥ  na punar tena samāpanāt iti arthaḥ evam tad āśrama dvaya upanyāsena kkacid kadācid itara abhāva śaṅkā manda buddheḥ syāt iti tad apākaraṇa artham sūtram maunavat itareṣām api upadeśāt vṛttiḥ vānaprasthānām anekavidhaiḥ evam brahmācāriṇaḥ  api iti vṛtti bhedaḥ  anuṣṭhātāraḥ  vā puruṣā bhidyante tasmāt dvi tve api bahuvacanam aviruddham anāviṣkurvan  anvayāt  bālyena iti yāvat bāla carita śruteḥ kāma cāra vāda bhakṣa tāya aśacā atyanta bālyena prasiddheḥ śauca ādi niyama vidhāyinaḥ ca sāmānya śāstrasya anena viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhanāt sakala bāla carita vidhānam iti prāpte abhidhīyate vidyā aṅga tvena bālya vidhānāt samasta bāla caryāyām ca pradhāna virodha prasaṅgāt yad tad anuguṇam aprauḍha indriyatva ādi bhāva śuddhi rūpam tad eva vidhīyate evam ca śāstra antara ābādhena api upapattau na śāstra antara bādhanam anyāpyam bhaviṣyati iti aihikam api aprastuta pratibandhe tad darśanāt  saṃgatim āha sarva apekṣā ca iti kim śravaṇa ādibhiḥ iha eva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate uta aniyama iha vā amutra vā iti yadi api karmāṇi yajña ādinya niyata phalāni teṣām ca vidyā utpada sādhana tvena vidyā utpādasya aniyamaḥ pratibhāti tathā ca garbha sthasya vāmadevasya ātma pratibodha śravaṇāt aaneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas  yati parām gatim iti ca smaraṇāt āmuṣmika tvam api avagamyate tathā api yajña ādīnām prameyāṇām apramāṇa tvāt śravaṇa ādeḥ ca pramāṇa tvāt teṣām eva sākṣāt vidyā sādhana tvam yajña ādīnām sattva śuddhi ādhānena vā vidyā utpādaka śravaṇa ādi lakṣaṇa pramāṇa pravṛtti vighna upaśamena vā vidyā sādhana tvām śravaṇa ādīnām tu anapekṣāmām eva vidyā utpādaka tvam na ca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikam api cira bhāvinam pramotpādam kāmayante kintu tādātvikam eva prāk eva tu pāralaukikam na hi kumbhala ādi dṛkṣuḥ cakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kāla antarīyāya kumbha darśanāya kintu tādātvikāya tasmāt aihika eva vidyā utpādaḥ  na aniyata kālaḥ śruti smṛtī ca pāralaukikam vidyā utpādam stutyā brātar  itthaṃbhūtāni nāma śravaṇa ādīni āvaśyaka phalāni yad kāla antare api vidyām utpādayanti iti evam prāpta ucyate yata eva atra vidyā utpāde śravaṇa ādibhiḥ kartavye yajña ādīnām sattva aśuddhi dvāreṇa vā vighna upaśama dvārā vā upayogaḥ  ata eva teṣām yajña ādīnām karma antara pratibandha apratibandhābhyām aniyata phala tvena tad apekṣāṇām śravaṇa ādīnām api aniyata phala tvam nyāṭya niyata phala tvam nyāṭyam anapahata vighnānām śravaṇa ādīnām anutpādaka tvāt aviśuddha sattvāt vā puṃsaḥ pratyanutpādaka tvāt  tathā ca teṣām yajña ādi apekṣāṇām teṣām ca aniyata phala tvena śravaṇa ādīnām api aniyata phala tvam yuktam evam śruti smṛti pratibandhaḥ na stuti mātra tvena vyākhyeyaḥ  bhaviṣyati puruṣāḥ ca vidyā arthinaḥ sādhana sāmarthya anusāreṇa tad anurūpam eva kāmayiṣyante tad idam uktam abhisaṃdheḥ niraṅkaśa tvāt iti evam mukti phala aniyamaḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ yajña ādi upakṛta vidyā sādhana śravaṇa ādi vīrya viśeṣāt kila tad phale vidyāyāmaihika muṣmikatva lakṣaṇa utkarṣaḥ  darśitaḥ tathā ca yathā sādhana utkarṣa nikarṣābhyām tad phalasya vidyāyā utkarṣau  evam vidyā phalasya api mukteḥ utkarṣa nikarṣau saṃbhāvyete na ca muktā vaihika amuṣmikatva lakṣaṇaḥ  viśeṣa upapadyate brahma upāsana aparipāka labdha janmani vidyāyām jīvataḥ  mukteḥ avaśyaṃbhāva niyamāt sati api ārabdha vipāka karma aprakṣaye tasmāt muktau  eva rūpataḥ  nikarṣa utkarṣau syātām apica sa guṇānām vidyānām utkarṣa nikarṣābhyām tad phalānām utkarṣa nikarṣau dṛṣṭau  iti mukteḥ api vidyā phala tvāt rūpataḥ ca utkarṣa nikarṣau syātām iti prāpata ucyate na mukteḥ tatra tatra ekarūpyaśruteḥ upapatteḥ ca sādhyam hi sādhana viśeśaṣāt viśeṣavat bhavati na ca muktiḥ brahmaṇaḥ  nitya svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitum arhati na ca sa vāsana niḥśeṣa kleśa karma āśaya prakṣayaḥ  vidyā jarnma viśeṣavān yena tad viśeṣāt mokṣaḥ  viśeṣavān bhavet na ca sa avaśeṣaḥ kleśa ādi prakṣayaḥ  mokṣāya kalpate na ca cira acira utpāda an utpādau  antareṇa vidyāyām api rūpataḥ  bhedaḥ kaścid upalakṣyate tasyāḥ  api eka rūpa tvena śruteḥ sa guṇāya aḥ tu vidyāyāḥ tad tad guṇau  apa udjhāmābhyām tad kāryasya phalasya utkarṣa nikarṣau yujyete na ca atra vidyā tvam sāmānyatas  dṛṣṭam bhavati āgama tad prabhava yukti bādhita tvena kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt tasmāt tasyāḥ  mukti avasthāyāḥ  aika rūpya avadhṛteḥ mukti lakṣaṇasya phalasya aviśeṣaḥ  yukta iti iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām tṛtīya adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ iti tṛtīya adhyāyasya nirguṇa vidyāyāḥ  antaraṅga sādhana vicāra ākhyaḥ caturthaḥ pādaḥ ____________________________ādhyāya ____________________________ atha caturthaḥ  adhyāyaḥ  bhāmatī  na abhyarthyā iha santaḥ svayam pravṛttā na ca itare śakyāḥ matsara pitta nibandhanam acikitsyam arocakam yeṣām śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅka madhunā sva rājya saukhyam vahannendraḥ sāndra tapaḥ sthiteṣu katham api udvegam abhyeṣyati yad vācaspati miśra niḥ mita mita vya ākhyāna mātra sphuṭa dvedānta artha viveka vañcita bhavāḥ svarge api amī niḥspṛhāḥ āvṛttiḥ asakṛt upadeśāt sādhana anuṣṭhāna pūrvaka tvāt phala siddheḥ viṣaya krameṇa viṣayiṇoḥ api tad vicārayoḥ kramam āha tṛtīye adhyāya iti mukti lakṣaṇasya phalasya atyanta parokṣa tvāt tad arthāni darśana śravaṇa manana nididhi āsanāni codyamānāni adṛṣṭa arthāni iti yāvat vidhānam anuṣṭheyāni na tu tatas  adhikam āvartanīyāni pramāṇa abhāvāt  yatra punar  sakṛt upadeśa upāsīta ityādiṣu tatra sakṛt eva prayogaḥ prayāja ādivat iti prāpta ucyate yadi api muktiḥ adṛṣṭa carī tathā api sa vāsana avidyā ucchedena ātmanaḥ svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇāyāḥ tasyāḥ śruti siddha tvāt avidyāyāḥ ca vidyā utpāda virodhitayā vidyā utpādena samucchedasya ahi vibhramasya iva rajju tatva sā akṣātkāreṇa samucchedasya upapatti siddha tvāt anvaya vi atirekābhyām ca śravaṇa manana nididhya āsana abhyāsasya eva sva gocara sākṣātkāra phala tvena loka siddha tvāsakala duḥkha vinirmukta eka caitanya ātmakaḥ  aham iti aparokṣa rūpa anubhavasya api śravaṇa ādi abhyāsa sādhana tvena anumānāt tad arthāni śravaṇa ādīni dṛṣṭa arthāni bhavanti na ca dṛṣṭa artha tve satya dṛṣṭa artha tvam yuktam na ca etāni anāvṛttāni satkāra dīrgha kālanairantaryeṇa sākṣāt kāravate tādṛśa anubhavāya kalpante na ca atra asākṣāt kāravat vijñānam sākṣātkāravatīm avidyām ucchettum arhati na khalu pitta upahṛta indriyasya guḍe tikta tā sākṣāt kāraḥ  antareṇa mādhurya sākṣātkāram sahasreṇa api upapattibhiḥ nivartitum arhati atadvataḥ  nara antara vacāṃsiva upapatti sahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśataḥ  api thūtkṛtya guḍa tyāgāt  tad evam dṛṣṭa artha tvad dhyāna upāsanayoḥ ca anta nīṛtāvṛttika tvena lokataḥ pratīteḥ āvṛttiḥ eva iti siddham adhikaraṇa artham uktvā nirupādhi brahma viṣaya tvam asya
