prāyaścitta vidhiḥ na niyojya viśeṣa pratilambha mātreṇa nirvṛṇoti iti apekṣita kāṅkṣāyām doṣa saṃyogena śravaṇāt tad nibarhaṇaphalaḥ kalpeta tathā api brahma jñānasya tad saṃyogena aśravaṇat nadu parita nibarhaṇa sāmarthye pramāṇam asti mokṣavāt  tasya api svarga ādi phalavat deśa kāla nimitta apekṣayā upapatteḥ śāstra prāmāṇyāt saṃbhaviṣyati asau  avasthā yasyām upabhogena samasta karma kṣaye brahma jñānam mokṣam prasoṣyati yoga adhdyaiḥ va vā divi bhuvi antarīkṣe bahūni śarīra indriyāṇi nirmāya phalān ayupabhujyarddhena yoga sāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate sthite ca etasmin  arthe nyāya balāt yathā puṣkara palāśa ityādi vyapadeśaḥ  brahma vidyā stuti mātra para tayā vyākhyeya iti prāpta ucyate vyākhyāyeta evam vyapadeśaḥ  yadi karma virodhaḥ syāt na tu ayam asti śāstram hi phala utpādana sāmarthya mātram karmaṇām avagamayati na tu kutaścid āgantukān nimittatas prāyaścitta ādeḥ tad apratibandham api tasya tatra audāsīnyāt yadi śāstra bodhita phala prasava sāmarthyam apratibaddham āgantukena kenacid  karmaṇā tatas tad phalam prasūta eva ati na śāstra vyāghātaḥ na abhuktam karma kṣīyatā eti ca smaraṇa pratibaddha sāmarthya karma abhiprāyam doṣa kṣaya uddheśena ca apara vidyānām asti prāyaścittavat vidhānam aiśvarya bhalānām api ubhaya saṃyoga aviśeṣāt yatra api nirguṇāyām para vidyāyām doṣa uddheśaḥ  na asti tatra api tad svabhāva ālocanāt eva tad prakṣaya prasava sāmarthyam avasīyate na hi tatvam asi vākya artha paribhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila kartṛ bhokktṛtva ādi vibhramaḥ  jīvaḥ phala upabhoga ūna yujyate na hi rajjavān bhujaṅka samāropa nibandhanā bhaya kampa ādayaḥ sati rajju tatva sā akṣātkāre prabhavanti kintu saṃskāra śeṣāt kiñcid kālam anuvṛttā api nivartanta eva amum eva artham anuvadantaḥ  yathā puṣkara palāśa ityādayaḥ  vyapadeśāḥ samaveta arthāḥ santaḥ  na stuti mātra tayā kathañcid vyākhyānam arhanti nanu uktam saṃbhaviṣyanti sā avasthā jīva ātmanaḥ  yasyām paryāyeṇa upabhogāt vā yoga ṛddheḥ prabhāvataḥ  yugapanna eka vidha kāya nirmāṇena aparyāyeṇa upabhogāt vā jantuḥ karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyata iti ata āha evam eva ca mokṣa upapadyata iti anādi kāla pravṛttā hi karma āśayā aniyata kāla vipākāḥ kramavatā tāvat bhogena kṣetum aśakyāḥ bhuñjānaḥ khalu ayam aparān api saṃcinoti karma āśayān iti na api aparyāyam upabhogena āsaktaḥ karma antarāṇi asaṃcinvānaḥ kṣeṣyati iti sāmpratam kalpa śatāni krama kāla bhogyānām samprati bhoktu sāmarthyāt  dīrgha kāla phalāni ca karmāṇi katham ekapade kṣeṣyanti tasasmāt na anyathā mokṣa saṃbhavaḥ nanu satsu api karma āśaya antara iṣu sukha dukha phaleṣu mokṣa phalāt  karmaṇaḥ samudācarataḥ  brahma bhāvam anubhūya atha labdha vipākānām karma antarāṇām phalāni bhokṣyanta iti āha na ca deśa kāla nimitta apekṣā iti na hi kāryaḥ sat mokṣaḥ  mokṣaḥ  bhavitum arhati brahma bhāvaḥ  hi saḥ na ca brahma kriyate niyatvāt iti arthaḥ parokṣatva anupatteḥ ca jñāna phalasya jñāna phalam khalu mokṣaḥ  abhyupeyate jñānasya ca anantara bhāvinī jñeya abhivyaktiḥ phalam sā eva avidyā ucchedam ādadhatī brahma svabhāva svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇāya mokṣāya kalpate evam hi dṛṣṭa artha tā jñānasya syāt  apūrvādhāna paramparayā jñānasya mokṣa phale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣa phala tvam adṛṣṭa artha tvam bhavet  na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā yuktā iti arthaḥ tasmāt brahma adhigame brahma jñānesatya dvaita siddhau durita kṣaya iti siddham itarasya api evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu adharmasya svābhāvika tvena rāga ādi nibandhana tvena śāstrīyeṇa brahma jñānena pratibandhaḥ  yuktaḥ dharma jñānayoḥ tu śāstrīya tvena jyotiṣṭoma darśa paurṇamāsa virodhāt na ucchedya ucchet tṛ bhāvaḥ  yujyate pāpna manaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ  brahma jñāna ucchedyatva śruteḥ dharmasyana tad ucchedya tvam viśeṣa vidhānasya śeṣa pratiṣedhana antarīyaka tvena lokataḥ siddheḥ yathā devadattaḥ  dakṣiṇena akṣṇā paśyati iti ukte na vāmena paśyati iti gamyate ubhe hi eva eṣa ete tarati iti ca yathāsaṃbhavam brahma jñānena duṣkṛtam bhogena sukṛtam iti akṣīyante ca asya karmaṇi iti ca sāmānya vacanam asarve pāpmānaḥ iti viśeṣa śravaṇāt pāpa karmāṇi iti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam tasmāt brahma jñānāt duṣkṛtasya eva kṣayaḥ  na sukṛtasya iti prāpte pūrva adhikaraṇa rāddha antaḥ  atidiśyate naḥ khalu brahma vidyā kenacid adṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtam apanayati api tu dṛṣṭena eva bhoktṛ bhoktavya bhoga ādi pravilaya dvāreṇa tad ca etad tulyam sukṛtā ipi iti katham etad api na ucchindyāt evam ca satina śāstrīyatva sāmya mātram avirodha hetuḥ anahi pratyakṣatva sāmānya mātrāt avirodhaḥ  jala anala ādīnām na ca sukṛta śāstram anartha kamabrahma vidam prati tad vidheḥ arthava tvāt  evam avasthite ca pāpma śrutyā puṇyam api grahītavyam brahma jñānam apekṣya puṇyasya nikṛṣṭa phala tvāt tad phalam hi kṣaya atiśayāt  na hi evam mokṣaḥ  niratiśaya tvāt nitya tvāt ca dṛṣṭa prayogaḥ ca ayam pāpma śabdaḥ  vede puṇya pāpayoḥ tad yathā puṇya pāpe anukramya sarve pāpmānaḥ  atas  nivartaneta iti atra tasmāt aviśeṣeṇa puṇya pāpayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau  iti siddham anārabdha kārya eva tu pūrve tad avadheḥ yadi at vaita jñāna svabhāva ālocanayā uttara pūrva su kṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau hanta ārabdha an ārabdha kāryayoḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa eva vināśaḥ syāt  kartṛ karma ādi pravilayasya ubhayatra aviśeṣāt tad nibandhana tvāt ca vināśasya na ca saṃskāra śeṣāt kulāla cakra bhramaṇavat anu vṛttiḥ vastunaḥ khalu anuvṛttiḥ māyā eva ādinaḥ ca puṇya pāpayoḥ ca māyā mātra vinirmita tvena māyā nivṛttau na puṇya apuṇye na tata saṃskāraḥ  vastu santi iti kasya anuvṛttiḥ na ca rajjau sarpa ādi vibrama janitā bhaya kama pādayaḥ  nivṛtte api vibhrame yathā anuvartante tathā iha api iti yuktam tatra api sarpāsa tve api tad jānasya satve tad janita bhaya kampa ādīnām tad saskārāṇām ca vastu sattvena nivṛtte api vibhrame anivṛtteḥ atra tu māyā na tad jaḥ saṃskāraḥ  na tad gocara iti tuccha tvāt kim anuvarteta na saṃskāra śeṣaḥ  na karma iti aviśeṣeṇa ārabdha kāryāṇām anārabdha kāryāṇām ca nivṛttiḥ na ca tasya tāvat eva ciram yāvat na vimokṣye atha saṃmapatya iti śruteḥ deha apratīkṣā ārabdha kāryāṇām yuktā na hi eṣā śrutiḥ avadhi bheda vidhāyini api tu kṣipra tā aparā yathā loka etāvat me ciram yad sanātaḥ  bhuñjānaḥ ca iti na hi tatra snāna bhojane avadhi tvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyaḥ tā pratipādyate ubhaya vidhāne hi vākyam bhidyeta avadhi bhedaḥ ciratāca iti prāpte abhidhīyate yadi api advaita brahma tatva sākṣātkāraḥ  anādya vidya padarśita pruñca mātra virodh itayā tad madhya patita sakala karma viredhī tathā api anārabdha vipākam karma jātam drāk iti eva samucchinatti na tu ārabdha vipākam saṃpādita jāti āyuḥ vitata pūrvā parībhīta sukha duḥkha upabhoga pravāham karma jātam tad hi samudācarat vṛtti tayā itarebhyaḥ prasupta vṛttibhyaḥ  balavat  anyathā deva rṣīṇām hiraṇyagarbha manūddālaka prabhṛtīnāṃvigalita nikhila kleśa jālāvarama tayā paritas  pradyotamāna buddhi satvānām na jyok jīvitā bhavet  śrūyate ca eṣām śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu tatvajña tā ca mahākalpa kalpa manvantara ādi jīvitā ca na ca ete mahadhi yaḥ na tadīya samasta phala upabhoga pratīkṣā sati api tatva sā akṣātkāre tāvat eva ciram iti na ciratā vidhīyate api tu śruti antara siddhām cira tām anūdya deha pāta avadhi mātra vidhānam tad etad abhisaṃdhāya aucitya mātra tayā āha bhagavān bhāṣya ākāraḥ na tāvat anāśriti ārabdha kāryam karma āśayam iti na ca idam na jātu dṛṣṭam yad viredhi samavāye viroddhi antaram anuvartata iti āha akartṛ ātma bodhaḥ  api iti yadā loke api virodhinoḥ kiñcid kālam saha anuvṛttiḥ upalabdhā tadeha gama balāt dīrgha kālam api bhavati iti na śakyā nivārayitum pramāṇa siddhasya niyoga paryanuyoga anupapatteḥ tad evam madhyasthana pratipādya ye bhāṣya kāram āptam manyate tān pratyāha apica na eva atra vivaditavyam iti sthita prajñaḥ ca na sādhakaḥ tasya uttarottara dhyāna utkarṣeṇa pūrva pratyaya anavasthita tvāt niratiśayaḥ tu sthita prajñaḥ sa ca siddha eva na ca jñāna kāryā bhaya kampa ādayaḥ jñāna mātrāt anutpādāt  sarpa avacchedaḥ hi tasya bhaya kampa ādi hetuḥ sa ca āsanna nirvacanīya iti kutaḥ vastu sataḥ karyā utpādaḥ na ca kāryamam api bhaya kampa ādi vastu sat tasya api vicāra asaha tvena anirvācya tvāt anirvācyāt ca anirvācya utpattau na anupapattiḥ yādṛśaḥ  hi yakṣaḥ tādṛśaḥ  baliḥ iti sarvam avadātam agni hotra ādi tu tad kāryāya eva tad darśanāt  yadi puṇyasya api aśleṣa vināśau hanta nityam api agni hotra ādi na kartavyam yogam ārūrukṣuṇā tasya api itara puṇyavat vidyayā vināśāt  aprakṣālanāt hi paṅkasya dūrāt asparśanam vara am iti nyāyāt  na ca vividiṣanti yajñena dānena iti mokṣa lakṣaṇa eka kārya tayā vidyā karmaṇoḥ avirodhaḥ saha asaṃbhavena eka kāryatva asaṃbhavāt na hi etam ātmānam viduṣaḥ  vigalita akhila kartṛtva ādi prapañca vibhramasya pūrva uttare nitye kriyā janye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ tasmāt vividiṣanti yajñena iti vartamāna apadeśaḥ  brahma jñānasya yajña ādīnām vā stuti mātram na tu mokṣamāṇasya mukti sādhanam yajña ādi vidhiḥ iti prāpta ucyate satyam na vidyayā eka kārya tvam karmaṇām paraspara virodhena saha asaṃbhavāt  vidyā utpādaka tayā tu karmaṇā amārāt upakārakāṇām astu mokṣa upayogaḥ na ca karmaṇām vidyayā virudhyamānānām na vidyā kāraṇa tvam sva kāraṇa virodhinām kāryāṇām bahulam upalabdheḥ tathā ca vidyā lakṣaṇa kārya upāya tayā kārya vināśyānām api karmaṇām upādānam arthavat  tad abhāve tad kāryasya anutpādena mokṣasya asaṃbhavāt evañca vividiṣanti yajñena iti yajña sādhana tvam vidyāya apūrvam artham prāpayataḥ pañca malakārasya na atyanta parokṣa vṛtti tayā jñāna stuti artha tayā kathañcid vyākhyānam bhaviṣyati tad anena abhisamadhinā uktam jñānasya iva hi prāpakam satkarama praṇaḍyā mokṣa kāraṇam iti upacaryate yata eva na vidyā udaya samaye karma asti na api parastāt api tu prāk eva vidyāyāḥ ata eva ca atikrānta viṣayam etad kārya ekatva abhidhānam etad eva sphorayati na hi brahma vida iti sūtra antaram avatārayitum pṛcchati kiṃviṣayam punar idam iti asya uttaram sūtram atas  anyā api hi ekeṣām ubhayoḥ kāmya karma viṣayam aśle vināśa vacanam śākhā antarīya vacanam ca tasya putrā dāyam upayanti iti yad eva vidyayā iti hi asti vidyā saṃyuktam yajña ādi ya evam vidvān yajeta iti ādikam asti ca kevalam tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyam dadya ādi yukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadya atra brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāya iti viśeṣa pratilambhaḥ tad kasya hetoḥ tasya atiśayava tvāt evam vidyā rahitāt yajña ādeḥ vidyā sahitam atiśayavat iti tasya eva para vidyā sā dhana tvam upātta durita kṣaya dvārā na itasya tasmāt vividiṣanti yajñena iti aviśeṣa śrutam api vidyā sahite yajña ādau  upasaṃhartavyam iti prāpte abhidhīyate yad eva vidyayā karāti tad eva asya vīryavattaram iti tarabartha śruteḥ vidyā rahitasya vīryavat tā mātram avagamyate na ca sarvathā kiñcitkarasya tad upapadyate tasmāt asti asya api kayā api mātrayā para vidyā utpāda upayoga iti vidyā rahitam api yajña ādi para vidyā arthinā anuṣṭheyam iti siddham bhogena tu itare kṣapayitvā saṃpadyate anārabdha kārya iti asya nañaḥ phalam bhogena nivṛttim darśayati anena sūtreṇa asya tu upapādanam purastāt apakṛṣya kṛtam iti na iha kriyate punarukti bhayāt  iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām caturthasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ caturthe adhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ vāc manasi darśanāt śabdāt ca atha asmin phala vicāra lakṣaṇe vāc manasi saṃpadyata ityādi vicāraḥ  asaṃgata iti ata āha atha aparāsu vidyāsu phala prāptaya iti apara vidyā phala prāpti artha deva yāna mārga artha tvāt utkrānteḥ tad gataḥ  vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phala vicāra iti na asaṃgata iti arthaḥ nanu ayam utkrānti kramaḥ  viduṣaḥ  na upapadyate ana tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti atra eva samavanīyante iti śravaṇāt tad katham asya vidyā adhikāra iti ata āha samānā hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ iti viṣayam āha asti iti vimṛśati kim iha iti viśayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrva pakṣam āha tatra vāc eva iti śrati lakṣaṇa aviśaye saṃśaye siddhānta sūtram pūrayitvā paṭhati vāc vṛttiḥ manasi saṃpadyate iti vṛtti adhyāhāra prayojanam praśna pūrvakam āha katham iti uttara adhikaraṇa paryālocanena evam pūritam iti arthaḥ tattvasya dharmiṇaḥ  vācaḥ pralaya vivakṣāyām tu iha sarvatra eva paratra iha ca avibhāga sāmyāt kim paratra eva viṃśiṣyāt avibhāga iti na tu atra api tasmāt iha avibhāgena āviṃśiṣataḥ  atra vṛtti upasaṃhāra mātra vivakṣā sūtrakārasya iti gamyate siddhānta hetum praśna pūrvakam āha kasmāt iti satyām eva manaḥ vṛttau vāc vṛtteḥ upasaṃhāra darśanāt vācastu upasaṃhāram adṛṣṭam na āgamaḥ  api gamayitum arhati āgama prabhava yukti virodhāḥ ca āgamaḥ  hi dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇām layam āha na ca vācaḥ prakṛtiḥ manaḥ yena asmin  iyam līyate tasmāt vṛtti vṛttim atora bheda vivakṣayā vāc padam tad vṛttau vyākhyeyam saṃbhavati ca vāc vṛtteḥ vāc prakṛtau  api manasi layaḥ tathā tatra tatra darśanāt iti āha vṛtti udbhava abhibhavau  iti ata eva ca sarvāṇi anu yata eva prakṛti vikāra bhāva abhāvat manasi na sva rū palayaḥ  vācaḥ  api tu vṛttilayaḥ ata eva ca sarveṣām cakṣuḥ ādī nāmidriyāṇām sati eva sa vṛttike manasi vṛtteḥ anuga tiḥ layaḥ  na svarūpa layaḥ vācaḥ tu pṛthak  grahaṇam pūrva sūtre udāharaṇa apekṣam na tu tad eva iha vivakṣitam iti arthaḥ tad manaḥ prāṇa uttarāt  yadi sva prakṛtau vikārasya layaḥ tatas  manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate iti atra manaḥ svarūpasya eva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam tathā hi manaḥ iti na upacārataḥ  vyākhyānam bhaviṣyati saṃbhavati hi prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ prāṇa manasoḥ anna mayam hi somya mana iti anna ātma tām āha manasaḥ śrutiḥ āpaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasya ābātma tām prakṛti vikārayoḥ tādātmyāt tathā ca prāṇaḥ  manasaḥ prakṛtiḥ iti manasaḥ  vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte abhidhīyate satyam āpaḥ  annam asṛjanta iti śruteḥ abannayoḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ  avagamyate na tu tad vikārayoḥ prāṇa manasoḥ kha yoni prāṇāḍikayā tu mithas  vikārayoḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāva abhyupagame saṃkarāt ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt  tasmāt yaḥ  yasya sākṣāt vikāraḥ tasya tatra laya iti annasya apsu layaḥ  na tu abvikāre prāṇe anna vikārasya manasaḥ tathā ca atra api manaḥ vṛtteḥ vṛttimati prāṇe layaḥ  na tu vṛttimataḥ  manasa iti siddham saḥ  adhyakṣe tad upagama ādibhyaḥ prāṇaḥ tejasi iti tejaḥ śabdasya bhūta viśeṣa vacana tvāt vijñāna ātmani ca aprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmani upagama anugama avasthāna śrutīnām ca teja uddhāreṇa api upapatteḥ tejasi samāpanna vṛttiḥ khalu prāṇaḥ tejaḥ tu jīvātmani samāpanna vṛtti tad vārā jīva ātmasamāpanna vṛttiḥ prāṇa iti upapadyate tasmāt tejasi eva prāṇa vṛtti pravilaya iti prāpte abhidhīyate sa prakṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ  adhyakṣe vijñāna ātmani avatiṣṭhate tad tantra vṛttiḥ bhavati kutas  upagama anugama avasthānebhyaḥ  hetubhyaḥ tatra upagama śrutim āha evam eva imam ātmānam iti anugamana śrutim āha tam utkrāmantam iti avasthāna śrutim āha sa vijñānaḥ  bhavati iti ca iti vijñāyate anena iti vijñānam pañca vṛtti prāṇa sahita indriya grāmaḥ tena saha avatiṣṭhata iti sa vijñānaḥ codayati nanu prāmaḥ tejasi iti śrūyata iti adhika avāpaḥ  aśabda artha vyākhyānam pariharati na eṣa doṣa iti yadi api prāṇaḥ tejasi iti atas tejasi prāṇa vṛtti layaḥ pratīyate tathā api sarva śākhā pratyaya tvena vidyānām śruti antara ālocanayā vijñāna ātmani layaḥ  avagamyate na ca tejasaḥ tatra api laya iti sāmpratam tasya anila ākāśa krameṇa parama ātmani tatvalaya avagamāt  tasmāt tejaḥ grahaṇena upalakṣyate tejaḥ sahacarita deha bīja bhūta pañcabhūta sūkṣma paricāra adhyakṣaḥ  jīvātmā tasmin prāṇa vṛttiḥ api eti iti codayati nanu ca iyam śrutiḥ iti tejaḥ sahacaritāni bhūtāni upalakṣyantām tejaḥ śabdena adhyakṣe tu kim āyātam tasya tad asāha caryāt iti arthaḥ pariharati saḥ  adhyakṣa iti adhyakṣasya api iti yadā hi ayam prāṇaḥ  antarāle adhyakṣam prāpya adhya saṃparka vaśāt eva tejaḥ prabhṛtīni bhūta sūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadā upapadyate prāṇaḥ tesi iti atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yaḥ  api srughnāt iti sūtra antaram avatārayitum pṛcchati katham tejaḥ sahacariteṣu iti na ekasmin darśayataḥ  hi atra bhāṣya kāraḥ  anumāna darśanam āha kāryasya śarīrasya iti sthūla śarīra anurūpam anumeyam sūkṣmam api śarīram pañca ātmakam iti arthaḥ darśayata iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe darśayataḥ ca etam artham iti praśna prativacana abhiprāyam dvivacanam śruti smṛti abhiprāyam vā aṇvyaḥ  mātrāḥ sūkṣmā daśārdhānām pañcabhūtānām iti śruti antara virodham codayati nanu ca upasaṃhṛteṣu vāc ādiṣu iti karma āśraya ta iti pratīyate na bhūta āśraya tā iti arthaḥ pariharati atra ucyata iti grahā indriyāṇi atigrahāḥ tad viṣayāḥ karmaṇām prayojaka tvena āśraya tvam bhūtānām tu upādāna tvena iti avirodhaḥ praśaṃsā śabdaḥ  api karmaṇām prayojaka tayā prakṛṣṭam āśraya tvam brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśraya antare tad upapatteḥ iti āha praśaṃsā śabdāt api tatra iti samānā ca asṛti upakramāt amṛta tvam ca anupoṣya atra abhṛtatva prāpti śruteḥ para vidyāvantam pratyetat iti manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ viśayānānām saṃdihānānām puṃsām codayati nanu vidyā prakaraṇa iti pariharati na svāpa ādivat iti para vidyayā eva amṛtatva prāpti avasthām ākhyātum tad sadharmāḥ ca tad vidharmāḥ ca anyā api avasthāḥ tad anuguṇa tayā ākhyāyante sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayaḥ bhavati iti na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśāt viśeṣavantaḥ  avidvāṃsaḥ  vidhīyante yena vidyā prakaraṇa vyākhyātaḥ  bhavet api tu vidyām pratipādayitum loka siddhānām tad anuguṇa tayā teṣām anuvāda iti evam prāpte abhidhīyate samānā ca eṣā utkrāntiḥ vāc manasi ityādyā vidvat viduṣoḥ kutas  āsṛti upakṛmāt  sṛtiḥ saraṇam deva yānena pathā kārya brahma loka prāptiḥ āsṛteḥ ākārya brahma loka prāpteḥ ayam vidyā upakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat  tasmāt etad uktam bhavati na iyam parā vidyā yatas  nāḍī dvāram āśrayate api tu apara vidyā iyam na ca asyām ātyantikaḥ kleśa pradāhaḥ  yatas  na tatra utkrāntiḥ bhavet  tasmāt apara vidyā sāmarthyāda apekṣi ka bhā bhūta saṃplava sthānam amṛta tvam prepsate puruṣa arthāya saṃbhavati eṣa utkrānti bhedavān sṛti upakrama upadeśaḥ upapūrvā t uṣa dāha iti asmāt upoṣya iti prayogaḥ tadā apīteḥ saṃsāra vyapadeśāt  siddhām kṛtvā bīja bhāva avaśeṣam paramātma saṃpattim vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥ samarthitā sā eva saṃprati cintyate kimātmani tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām bhūta sūkṣmāṇām tatva pravilaya eva saṃpattiḥ āhosvit bīja bhāva avaśeṣa iti yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ na utkrāntiḥ atha uttaraḥ tatas  sā iti tatra aprakṛtau na vikāra tatva pravilayaḥ  yathā manasi na vāc ādīnām sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devatā iti tattva pralaya eva ātyantikaḥ syāt tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām iti prāpte abhidhīyate ayonim anye prapadyante śarīra tvāya dehinaḥ sthāṇum anye anusaṃyanti yathākarma yathāśrutam iti avidyāvataḥ saṃsāram upadiśati śrutiḥ sā iyam ātyantike tad tvalaye na upapadyate na ca prāyaṇasya eva eṣa mahimā vidvāsam avidvāṃsam vā prati iti sāṃpratam iti āha anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇa samaya eva iti vidhi śāstram jyotiṣṭoma ādi viṣayam anarthakam prāyaṇāt eva ātyantika pralaye punarbhava abhāvāt mokṣa śāstram ca aprayatnalabhyāt prāyaṇāt eva jantu mātrasya mekṣa prāpteḥ na kevalam śāstra anarthakyama yuktaḥ ca prāyaṇa mātrāt mokṣa iti āha mithyājñāna iti na asati nidāna praśame praśamaḥ tadvataḥ  yujyata iti arthaḥ atha itara bhūta sahitam tejaḥ  jīvasya āśraya bhūtam utkrāntamad dehāt deha antaram vā saṃcarat kasmāt asmābhiḥ na nirīkṣyate tad hi mahat tvāt vā aneka dravya tvāt vā rūpavat upalabdavyam kasmāt na mūrta antaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkām apākartum idam sūtram sūkṣmam pramāṇataḥ ca tathā upalabdheḥ cakāre bhinnakramaḥ na kevalam āpīteḥ tad avatiṣṭhate tad ca sūkṣmam svarūpataḥ parimāṇataḥ ca svarūpam eva hi tasya tādṛśam adṛśyam yathā cākṣuṣasya tejasaḥ  mahataḥ  api adṛṣṭa vaśāt anudbhūta rūpa sparśam hi tad  parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyam yatas  na upalabhyate yathā trasareṇavaḥ  jāla sūrya marīcibhyaḥ  anyatra pramāṇataḥ tathā upalabdhiḥ iti vyācaṣṭe tathā hi nāḍī niṣkramaṇa iti ādi grahaṇena cakṣuṣṭaḥ  vā mūrdhaḥ vā anyebhyaḥ  vā śarīra deśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam apratighāte hetum āha svaccha tvāt ca iti etad api hi sūkṣma tvena eva saṃgṛhītam yathā hi kāca abhra paṭalam svaccha svabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam evam sarvam eva vastu jātam asya iti na upamardena atas  ata eva ca svaccha tā lakṣaṇāt saukṣmyāt asaktatva apara nāmnaḥ asya eva ca upapatteḥ eṣa ūṣmā upapattiḥ prāptiḥ etad uktam bhavati dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām ūṣmaṇaḥ  anvaya vyatirekābhyām asti sthūlāt dehāt atiriktam kiñcid cadāmāt sūkṣmam śarīram iti pratiṣedhāt iti ced na śārīrāt  adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha amṛta tvam cīnupoṣya iti atas  viśeṣaṇāt iti viṣayam āha atha ākāmayamāna iti siddhānti matam āśaṅkya tad nirākaraṇena pūrva pakṣī sva matam avasthāpayati atas  para vidyā viṣayāt pratiṣedhāt iti yadi hi prāṇa upalakṣitasya sūkṣma śarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūla śarīrāt utkrāntim pratiṣedhet śrutiḥ tatas  etad upapadyate na tu etad asti na tasmāt prāṇa utkrāmanti iti hi tadā sarva nāmnā pradhāna avamarśinā abhyudayaniḥ śreyasa adhikṛtaḥ  dehi pradhānam parāmṛśyate tathā ca tasmāt dehinaḥ  na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmam śarīram utkrāmanti api tu tad sahitaḥ kṣetrajña eva utkrāmati iti gamyate sa punar atikramya brahma nāḍya saṃsāra maṇḍalam hiraṇyagarbha paryantam sa liṅgaḥ  jīvaḥ parasmin brahmaṇi līyate tasmāt parām api devatām viduṣa utkrāntiḥ ata eva mārga śrutayaḥ smṛtiḥ ca mumukṣoḥ śukasya āditya maṇḍala prasthānam darśayati iti prāptam evam prāpte pratyucyate spaṣṭaḥ  hi ekeṣām na ayam dehi apādānasya pratiṣedhaḥ api tu deha āpādānasya tathā hi ārta bhāga praśna uttare hi ekasmin pakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīva ātmanaḥ  anutkrāntim parigṛhya na tarhi eṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānām anutkrānteḥ iti svayam āśaṅkya prāṇānām pravilayam pratijñāya tad siddhi artham utkrānti avadheḥ ucchvayana ādhmāne bruvanyasya ucchvayana ādhmāne tasya tad avadhi tvam āha śarīrasya ca te iti śarīram eva tad apādānam gamyate nanu evam api astu aviduṣaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ  viduṣaḥ tu kim āyātam iti ata āha tad sāmānyāt iti nanu tadā sarva nāmnā pradhāna tayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tad katham atra deha  agatiḥ ityata āha tad sāmānyat iti nanu tadā sarva nāmnā pradhāna tayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tad katham atra deha  agatiḥ ityata āha abheda upacāreṇa deha dehinoḥ dehi parāmarśinā sarva nāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamī pāṭhe vyākhyeyam ṣaṣṭhī pāṭhe tu na upacāra iti āha yeṣām tu ṣaṣṭhī iti api ca prāpti pūrvaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ  bhavati na aprāpte aviduṣaḥ  hi dehāt utkrāmaṇam dṛṣṭam iti viduṣaḥ  api tad sāmānyāt dehāt utkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānām jīvau  adhikam kvacid utkramaṇam dṛṣṭam yena tad niṣidhyate apicā dvaita paribhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila prapañca avabhāsa jātasya gantavya abhāvāt eva na asti gatiḥ iti āha na ca brahma vida iti apadasya hi brahma vidaḥ  mārge pada eṣiṇaḥ  api devāḥ  iti yojanā codayati nanu gatiḥ api iti pariharati sa śarīrasya eva ayam yoga balena apara vidyā balena iti tāni pare tathā hi āha pratiṣṭhā vilayana śrutyoḥ vipratipatteḥ vimarśaḥ tam apanetum ayam ārambhaḥ tāni punar  prāṇa śabda uditāni indriyāṇi ekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca brahma vidaḥ tasmin  eva parasmin  ātmani iti ārambha bījam vimarśam āha nanu gatāḥ kalā iti ghrāṇa manasoḥ eka prakṛti tvam vivakṣitvā pañcadaśa tvam uktam atra śrutyoḥ viṣaya vyavasthayā vipratipatti abhāvam āha sā khalu iti vyavahāraḥ  laukikaḥ sāṃvyavahārika pramāṇa apekṣeyam śrutiḥ na tāttvika pramāṇa apekṣā itarā tu evam eva asya paridṛṣṭuḥ iti ādikā vidvat pratipatti apekṣā tāttvika pramāṇa apekṣā tasmāt viṣaya bhedāt avipratipattiḥ śrutyoḥ iti avibhāgaḥ  vacanāt  nimitta apāye naimittikasya ātyantika apāyaḥ avidyā nimittaḥ ca vibhāgaḥ  na avidyāyām vidyayā sa mūla ghātam apahatāyām sa avaśeṣaḥ  bhavitum arhati tathā api pravilaya sāmānyāt  sa avaśeṣa tā śaṅkām atimandām apanetum idam sūtram tad oka ugrajva lavam tad prakāśi ta dvāraḥ  vidyā sāmarthyāt tad śeṣa gati anusmṛti yogāt ca hārda anugṛhītaḥ śata adhikayā apara vidyā vidaḥ  aviduṣaḥ ca utkrāntiḥ uktā tatra kim vidvān avidvān  ca aviśeṣeṇa mūrdha ādibhya utkrāmati āhaḥ vidvān mūrdha sthānāt eva apare tu sthāna antarebhya iti atra vidyā sāmarthyam apaśyataḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ tasya upasaṃhṛta vāc ādi kalāpasya uccikta miṣataḥ  vijñāna ātmanā oka āyatanam hṛdayam tasya agram tasya jvalanam yad tad prakāśita dvāraḥ  viniṣkramadvāraḥ  vidvān mūrdha sthānāt eva niṣkrāmati na anyebhyaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi sthānebhyaḥ kutas  vidyā sāmarthāt  hārda vidyā sāmarthyāt  utkṛṣṭa sthāna pratilambhāya hi hārdavidya upadeśaḥ mūrdha sthānāt aniṣkramaṇe ca na utkṛṣṭa deśa prāptiḥ atha sthāna antarebhyaḥ  api utkrāmam ankasmāt lokam utkṛṣṭam na prāpnoti iti ata āha tad śeṣa gati anusmṛti yogāt ca hārda vidya aśeṣa bhūtāḥ  hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā tad anuśīlanena khalu ayam jīvaḥ  hārdena su upāsitena brahmaṇā anugṛhītaḥ tasya anusmaran  tad bhāvam āpannaḥ  mūrdhan yaya eva śata adhikayā nāḍya niṣkrāmati hṛdayāt udgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālu mūlam bhittvā mūrdhānam etya raśmibhiḥ ekībhūtā āditya maṇḍalam anupraviṣṭā tām anuśīlayataḥ tayā eva anta kāle nirgamanam bhavati iti raśmi anusārī rātrau  ahani ca aviśeṣeṇa raśmi anusārī san  āditya maṇḍalam prāpnoti iti siddhānta pakṣa pratijñā pūrva pakṣam āśaṅkate sūtra avayavena niśi na iti ced  sūtra avayava antareṇa nirākaroti na saṃbandhasya yāvat deha bhāvi tvāt darśayati pramāṇa antarāt pratīyate darśayati ca etam artham śrutiḥ api aśeṣeṇa amuṣmādādityāt pratāyante raśmayanta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyaḥ  nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante vistāryante te raśmayaḥ  amuṣmin  āditye sṛptāḥ pratāpa ādi kārya darśanāt iti ādi grahaṇena candrāpaḥ saṃgṛhyante candramasā khalu aṃmayena saṃbadhyamānānām sūrīṇām bhāsām candrikā tvam tasmāt api asti niśi saurya raśmi pracāra iti ye tyāhuḥ sa yāvat kṣipyet manaḥ tāvat ādityam gacchet iti nirapekṣa śravaṇāt rātrau prete na asti raśmi apekṣā iti tān pratyāha yadi ca rātrau preta iti na hi etad viśiṣya ādhīyate dhyetāraḥ ye tu manyante vidvān api rātri prāyaṇa aparādhena na ūrdhvam ākramata iti tān pratyāha atha tu vidvān api iti nityavat phala saṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yuktā iti ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣaḥ  ahar apekṣām sūrya maṇḍala prāptiḥ ācakṣate tad matam āśaṅkya āha atha api rātrau  iti yāvat tāvat upabandhena anapekṣā gatiḥ śrutā na ca apekṣā śakyā avagamā upabandha virodhāt iti atas ca ayane api dakṣiṇe ata eva iti ukta hetu parāmarśa iti āha ata eva ca udīkṣā anupapatteḥ iti pūrva pakṣa bījam āha uttarāyaṇa maraṇa prāśastya iti apanodam āha prāśasti aprasiddhiḥ iti atas pada parāmṛṣṭa hetu balāt aviduṣaḥ  maraṇam praśastam uttarāyaṇe viduṣaḥ tu ubhaya trāpi aviśeṣaḥ  vidyā sāmarthyāt iti viduṣaḥ  api ca bhīṣmasya uttarāyaṇa pratīkṣaṇam aviduṣa ācāram grāha yati ayat yad ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ tad tad eva itaraḥ janaḥ iti nyāyāt  āpūryamāṇa pakṣāt itya ādyā ca śrutiḥ na kāla viśeṣa pratipatti arthā api tvā ativāhikīḥ devatāḥ pratipādayati iti vakṣyati tasmāt avirodhaḥ sūtra antara avataraṇāya codayati nanu ca yatra kāle tu iti kāla eva atra prādhānyena ucyate na tvā ativāhikī devatā iti arthaḥ yoginaḥ prati ca smaryate smārte ca ete smārtīm upāsanām pratyayam smārtaḥ kāla bheda viniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīm prati iti arthaḥ atra yadi smṛtau kāla bheda vidhiḥ śrautau ca agni jyotiḥ ādi vidhiḥ tatra agni ādīnāmātivāhika tayā viṣaya vyavasthayā virodha abhāva uktaḥ atha pratyabhijñānam tathā api yatra kāla iti atra api kāla abhidhāna dvāreṇa ativāhikya eva devatā uktā iti avirodha eva iti iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śārīraka bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām caturthasya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ caturthe adhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pāṭhaḥ arciḥ ādinā tad prathiteḥ bhinna prakaraṇa stha tvāt bhinna upāsana yogataḥ anapekṣā mithas  mārgaḥ tu arātaḥ  avadhṛteḥ api gantavyam ekam nagaram prati vakreṇa adhvanā gatim apekṣya ṛjunā adhvanā gatiḥ tvarāvatī kalpyate eka mārga tve tu kam aparam apekṣya tvarā syāt  atha taiḥ eva raśmibhiḥ iti avadhāraṇam na upapadyate pathi antarasya nivartanīyasya abhāvāt tasmāt para anapekṣā eva ete panthāna eka brahma loka prāpti upāyā vrīhi yavau  iva vikalperan  iti prāpte pratyucyate ekatve api pathaḥ  aneka parvava saṃbhavāt  gauravāt na eva nānā tvam pratyabhijñāna liṅgataḥ sa parvā hi panthā nagara ādikam ekam gantavyam prāpayati nābhāgaḥ tatra kim ete raśmi ahar vāyu sūryāt ayaḥ  adhvanaḥ parvāṇaḥ santaḥ  adhvana ekena yujyante āhaḥ yathāyatham adhvānam api bhindanti iti saṃdehe abhede api adhvanaḥ  bhāga bheda upapatteḥ na bhāgi bheda kalpanā ucitā gaurava prasaṅgāt  eka deśa pratyabhijñānāt ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva upapatteḥ na aneka adhva kalpanā atha etaiḥ eva raśmibhiḥ iti avadhāraṇam na tāvat artha antara nivṛtti artham tad prāpakaiḥ eva vākya antaraiḥ virodhāt tasmāt anyā an apekṣām asya avadhārayati iti vaktavyam na ca ekam vākyam aprāptam adhvānam prāpayati tasya ca anapekṣatām pratipādayati iti artha dvayāya paryāptam tasmāt vidhi sāmarthya prāptam ayoga vyavacchedam eva kāraḥ  anuvadati iti yuktam tvarā vacanam ca iti na khalu ekasmin  eva gantavye pathi bhedam apekṣya tvarā avakalpyate kintu gantavya bhedāt api tad upapattiḥ yathā kaśmīrebhyaḥ  mathurām kṣipram yāti caitra iti tathā iha api anyatas  kutaścid ganta vyādanena upāyena brahma lokam kṣipram prayāti iti bhūyāṃsi arcira ādi śrutau mārga parvāṇi iti ayam arthaḥ eka tvāt prāptavyasya brahma lokasya alpa parvaṇā mārgeṇa tad prāptau saṃbhavantyām bahu mārga upadeśaḥ  vyarthaḥ prasajyate tatra cetanasya apravṛtteḥ tasmāt bhūyasām parvaṇām virodhena alpānām tad anupraveśa eva yukta iti vāyumabdāt aviśeṣa viśeṣābhyām aśruti ādi abhāve pāṭhasya kramam prati niyantṛ tā ūrdhva ākramaṇa mātre ca śrutā vāyoḥ nimitta tā asa vāyum āgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā ratha cakrasya kham tena sa ūrdhvam ākramate iti hi vāyu nimittam ūrdhvākramaṇam śrutam na tu vāyu nimittam āditya gamanam asa ādityam gacchati iti āditya gamana mātra pratīteḥ na ca tena iti anantara śruta ūrdhvī kramaṇa kriyā saṃbandhi nirākāṅkṣam āditya gamana kriyayā api saṃbanddhum arhati na ca āditya āgamanasya tena iti vinā kācid anupapattiḥ yena anya saṃbaddham api anuṣajyate tatra agni lokam āgacchati sa vāyu lokam ityādi saṃdarbha gatasya pāṭhasya kvacid niyāmaka tvena kḷpta sāmarthyāt agni vāyu varuṇa krama niyāmaka śruti ādi abhāvāt iti prāpte pratyucyate ūrdhva śabdaḥ  na lokasya kasyacid pratipādakaḥ tad bheda apekṣayā yuktam ādityena viśeṣaṇam bhavet etad evam yadi ūrdhva śabdāt kaścid loka bhedaḥ pratīyeta sa tu upari deśa mātra vācī loka bhedāt vināparyavasyan  loka bheda vācinā āditye vyavasthāpyate tathā ca āditya loka gamanam eva vāyu nimittam iti śrauta krama niyame pāṭhaḥ padārtha mātra pradarśana arthaḥ  na tu kramāya prabhavati śruti virodhāt iti siddham vājasaneyinām saṃvatsara lokaḥ  na paṭhyate chāndogyānām deva lokaḥ  na paṭhyate tatra ubhaya anurodhāt ubhaya pāṭhe māsa saṃbandhāt saṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimaḥ  deva lokaḥ na hi māsaḥ  deva lokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa tasmāt tayoḥ paraspara saṃbandhāt māsa ārabhya tvāt ca saṃvatsarasya māsa ānantarye sthite deva lokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastāt bhavati tatra ādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsara ādityasya sthāne deva lokāt vāyum iti paṭhitavyam vāyapam abdāt iti tu sūtram atra api vācakam eva tathā api saṃvatsarāt parāñcam ādityāt arvāñcam vāyum abhisaṃbhavanti iti chāndogya pāṭha mātra apekṣayā iktam tad idam āha vāyum abdāt iti tu iti taḍitaḥ  adhi varuṇaḥ saṃbandhāt  taḍidante arciḥ ādye adhvanyappatiḥ taḍitaḥ paraḥ tad saṃbandhāt tathā indra ādiḥ appateḥ para īṣyate āgantūnām niveśaḥ  ante sthāna abhāvāt prasādhitaḥ tathā ca indra ādiḥ āgantuḥ paṭhyate ca appateḥ paraḥ ativāhikāḥ tad liṅgāt  mārga cihna sarūpa tvāt cihnāni eva arcira ādayaḥ bhartṛ bhoga bhuvaḥ  vā syuḥ loka tvāt na ativāhikāḥ arciḥ ādi śabdā hi jvalana ādau  acetaneṣu nirūḍha vṛttayaḥ  loke na ca eṣām tvau  adhikānām iva niyamavatī saṃvahana svarūpā svata nantra kriyā buddhi pūrvā saṃbhavati acetanānām tasmāt loka śabda vācya tvāt bhartuḥ jīva ātmanaḥ  bhoga bhūmaya eva iti manyāmahe api ca arciṣa iti asmāt apādānām pratīyate na hetuḥ na aguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacid  jāḍyāt baddha ityādiṣu guṇa vacaneṣu jāḍya ādiṣu hetu pañcamī dṛṣṭā na ca arciḥ ādi śabdā guṇa vācinaḥ  yena pañcamyā teṣām vahanam prati hetu tvam ucyate apādāna tvam ca acetaneṣu api asti iti na ativāhikāḥ na ca amānavasya puruṣasya vidyut ādiṣu voḍhṛtva darśanāt arcirādīnām api voḍhṛtvā anna amānavaḥ puruṣaḥ  voḍhā śrūyate yatas  śrūyate tatas  avagacchāmaḥ  vidyut ādivat na arcira ādīnām voḍhṛtvam iti tasmāt bhoga bhūmaya eva arcirādayaḥ  na ativāhikā iti prāpte pratyucyate saṃpiṇḍa karaṇānām hi sūkṣma dehavatām gatau na svātantryam na ca agni ādyā netāraḥ  acetanāstu te īdṛśī hi niyamavatī gatiḥ svayam vā prekṣāvataḥ  aprekṣāvataḥ  vā prekṣāvat prayuktasya na tāvat vigalita sthūla kalevarāḥ sūkṣma dehavantaḥ saṃpiṇḍita karaṇa grāmā utkrāntimantaḥ  jīva ātmānaḥ  matta mūrcchicavat svayam prekṣāvantaḥ  yad evam svātantryeṇa gaccheyuḥ tad yadi arciḥ ādayaḥ  api mārga cihnāni vā śamīkāraskara ādivat bhoga bhūmayaḥ vā sumeru śailalā vṛtta ādivat ubhayathā api acetana tayā na nayanam pratyeṣām asti svātantryam na ca etebhyaḥ  anyasya cetanasya netuḥ kalpanā sati śrutānām caitanya saṃbhave na ca parameśvara eva astu netā iti yuktam tasya atyanta sādhāraṇa tayā lokapālagraha ādīnām akiñcitkara tvāt tasmāt vyavasthita eva parameśvarasya sarva adhyakṣa tve yathā yathātvam lokapāla ādīnām svātantryam evam iha api arciḥ ādīnām ātivāhika tvam eva darśana anusārāt śabda artha  iti yuktam imam eva artham amāna vapuruṣa ativāhana lakṣaṇam liṅgam upodvalayati iti uktam anavasthita tvāt arcirādīnām iti avasthitam hi mārga cihnam bhavati avyabhicārāt na anavasthitam vyabhicārāt iti arciṣa iti ca hetau pañcamī na apādāne guṇa tvam ca āśrita tayā na ca vaiśeṣika paribhāṣayā niyama āstheyaḥ  loka virodhāt  apica te arciḥ abhisaṃbhavanti iti saṃbandha mātram uktam iti sāmānya vacane śabde viśeṣa ākāṅkṣiṇi sphuṭam yad viśeṣa padam tena tad sāmānyam niyamyate yathā brāhmaṇam ānaya bhojayitavya iti tad viśeṣa apekṣāyām yadā tad saṃnidhau  upanipatati padam kaṇṭha ādi ḷ  tadā tena etad niyamyate evam iha api iti vaidyutena eva tatas tad śruteḥ vidyut lokam āgataḥ  amānavaḥ puruṣaḥ  vaidyutaḥ tena eva na tu varuṇa ādinā svayam uhyate tad śruteḥ tasya eva svayam voḍhṛtva śruteḥ varuṇa ādayaḥ tu tad sāhāyake vartamānā voḍhāraḥ  bhavanti iti ca vaiṣamyam na voḍhṛ tve iti sarvam avadātam pāṭha kramāt artha kramaḥ  balavān itiyathārtha kramam paṭhyante sūtrāṇi param jaiminiḥ mukhya tvāt  sa etān brahma gamayati iti vicikitsyate kim param brahma gamayati āha ūsvit aparam kāryam brahma iti mukhya tvāt amṛta prāpteḥ para prakaraṇāt api gantavyam jaiminiḥ mene param eva arciḥ ādinā brahma gamayati iti atra hi napuṃsakam brahma padam parasmin  eva brahmaṇi nirūḍha tvāt anapekṣa tayā mukhyam iti sati saṃbhave na kārye brahmaṇi guṇa kalpanayā vyākhyātum ucitam api ca amṛtatva phalāvartiḥ na kārya brahma prāptau yujyate tasya kāryatvena maraṇa dharmavat tvāt  kiñca tatra tatra param eva brahma prakṛtya prajāpati sadma pratipatti ādaya ucyamānā na apara brahma viṣayā bhavitum arhanti prakaraṇa virodhāt  na ca parasmint sarva gate gatiḥ na upapadyate prāpta tvāt iti yuktam prāptepi hi prāptiphalā gatiḥ dṛśyate yathā ekasminnyagrodha pādape mūlāt agram agrāt ca mūlam gacchataḥ śākhāmṛgasya ekena eva nyagrodha pādapena nirantaram saṃyoga vibhāgā bhavanti na ca ete tad avayava viṣayī na tu nyagrodha viṣayā iti sāmpratam tathā sati na śākhāmṛgaḥ  nyagrodhena yujyate nyagrodha avayavasya tad avayava yogāt  evam dṛśyamānānām api tad avayavānām na yogaḥ tad avayava yogāt tad antena krameṇa tad avayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu vyavatiṣṭhate te ca atīndriyā iti kasmin nu nāma ayam anubhava paddhatim adhyāḥ tām saṃyoga tapasvī tasmāt akāmena api anubhava anurodhena prāpta eva prāpti phalatva avagatiḥ eṣitavyā tad brahma prāptam api prāpti phalāya avagategocaraḥ  bhaviṣyati brahma lokeṣu iti ca bahuvacanam ekasmin  api prayoga sādhu tā mātreṇa gamayitavyam loka śabdaḥ ca ālokane prakāśe vartayitavyaḥ  na tu sanniveśavati deśa viśeṣe tasmāt  para brahma prāpti artham gati upadeśa sāmarthyāt ayam arthaḥ  bhavati yathā vidyā karma vaśāt arcirādinā gatasya satyalokam atikramya param jagat kāraṇam brahma lokam ālokam svayam prakāśakam iti yāvat  prāptasya tatra eva liṅgam pralīyate na tu gatim evaṃbhūtām vinā liṅga pravilaya iti ata eva śrutiḥ puruṣamāṇāḥ puruṣam prāpya astam gacchanti tad anena abhisandhinā param brahma gamayati amānava iti mene jaiminiḥ ācāryaḥ kāryam bādariḥ asya gati upapatteḥ tattva darśīm bādariḥ dadarśa kāryam aprāpta pūrva tvāt aprāpta prāpaṇī gatiḥ prāpayet brahma na param prāpta tvāt jagat ātmakam tattvam asi vākya artha sākṣātkārāt prākkila jīvātma avidyā karma vāsanā ādi upādhi avacchedāt vastutaḥ anavacchinnaḥ avacchinnam iva abhinnaḥ api lokebhyaḥ  bhinnam iva ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ svarūpāt anyānaprāptānarciḥ ādīn  lokān gati āpnoti iti yujyate advaita brahma tattva sākṣāt kāravataḥ tu vigalita nikhila prapañca avabhāsa vibhramasya na gantavyam na gatiḥ na gamayitāra iti kim kena saṃgatam tasmāt anidarśanam nyagrodha saṃyoga vibhāgā nyayagrodha vānara tad gati tad saṃyoga vibhāgānām mithas  bhedāt  na ca tatra api prāpta prāptiḥ karma jena hi vibhāgena niruddhāyām pūrva prāptau  aprāptasya eva uttara prāpteḥ utpatteḥ etad api vastu tas  vicāra saha tayā sarvam anirvacanīyam vijṛmbhitam avidyāyāḥ samutpanna advaita tattva sākṣātkāraḥ  na vidvān abhimanyate viduṣaḥ  api dehapātāt pūrvam sthita prajñasya yathā ābhāsa mātreṇa sāṃsārika dharma anuvṛttiḥ abhyupeyate evam āliṅga śarīra pātāt viduṣaḥ tad dharma anuvṛttiḥ tathā ca aprāpta prāpteḥ gati upapattiḥ tad deśa prāptau ca liṅga deha nivṛtteḥ muktiḥ śruti prāmāṇyāt iti ced  na para vidyāvata utkrānti pratiṣedhāt  abrahmā eva san brahmā apyeti na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atra eva samavanīyante iti yathā vidyā brahma prāptyoḥ samāna kāla tā śrūyate abrahma veda brahmā eva bhavati aānandam brahmaṇaḥ  vidvān na bibheti atadātmānam eva veda aham brahma asmi iti tad sarvam abhavat atatra kaḥ  mohaḥ kaḥ śoka eka tvam anupaśyataḥ iti paurvāparya aśravaṇāt para vidyāvataḥ  muktim prati na upāya antara apekṣā iti lakṣyate abhisaṃdhiḥ śruteḥ upapannam ca etad  na khalu brahma eva idam viśvam aham brahma asmi iti paribhāvanābhuvā jīva ātmanaḥ  brahma bhāva sākṣātkāreṇa unmūlitāyām anavayavena avidyāyām asti gantavya gantṛ vibhāgaḥ  viduṣaḥ tad abhāve katham ayam arciḥ ādi mārge pravarteta na ca chāyā mātreṇa api sāṃsārika dharma anuvṛttiḥ tatra pravṛtti aṅgam yādṛcchika pravṛtteḥ śraddhā vihīnasya dṛṣṭa arthāni karmāṇi phalanti na phalanti ca adṛṣṭa arthānām tu phale kā kathā iti uktam prathama sūtre na ca arciḥ ādi mārga bhāvanāyāḥ para brahma prāpti artham aviduṣaḥ pratyupadeśaḥ tathā ca karma antareṣu iva nitya ādiṣu tatra api syāt tasya pravṛttiḥ api sāmpratam vikalpa asaha tvāt kim iyam para vidyā anapekṣā para brahma prāpti sādhanam tad apekṣā vā na tāvat anapekṣā atam eva viditvā atimṛtyum eti na anyaḥ panthā vidyate ayanāya iti para brahma vijñānāt anyasya adhvanaḥ sākṣāt pratiṣedhāt para vidyā apekṣa tve tu mārga bhāvanāyāḥ kim iyam vidyā kārye mārga bhāvanā sāhāyakam ācarati atha vidyā utpāde na tāvat vidyā kārye tayā saha tasyāḥ  dvaitādvaita gocara tayā mithas  virodhena saha asaṃbhavāt  na api yajña ādivat vidyā utpāde sākṣāt brahma prāpti upāyatva śravaṇāt etān brahma gamayati iti yajña ādeḥ tu vividiṣā saṃyogena śravaṇāt vidyā utpāda aṅga tvam tasmāt upanyasta bahu śruti anurodhāt upapatteḥ ca brahma śabdaḥ  asaṃbhavat mukhya vṛttiḥ brahma sāmīpyāt apara brahmaṇi lakṣaṇayā netavyaḥ tathā ca lokeṣu iti bahuvacana upapatteḥ kārya brahma lokasya parasya tu anavayava tayā tad dvāreṇa api anupapatteḥ loka tvam celā vṛtta ādivat sanniveśa viśeṣavati bhoga bhūmau nirūḍham na kathañcid yogena prakāśe vyākhyātam bhavati tasmāt sādhudarśī sa bhagavān bādariḥ asādhudarśī jaiminiḥ iti siddham aprāmāṇikānām bahu pralāpāḥ sarva gatasya dravyasya guṇāḥ sarva gatā eva caitanya ānanda ādayaḥ ca guṇinaḥ paramātmanaḥ  bheda abhedavantaḥ  guṇā ityādayaḥ  dūṣaṇāya anubhāṣyamāṇā api aprāmāṇika tvam āvahanti asmākam iti upekṣitāḥ grantha yojanā tu pratyagātma tvāt ca gantṝṇām pratiprati añcati gacchati iti pratyak pratibhāva vṛtti brahma tad ātma tvāt gantṝṇām jīvātmanām iti gauṇī tu anyatra iti yaugikī api hi yoga guṇa apekṣayā gauṇī ā iva viśuddha upādhi saṃbandham iti manaḥ mayatva ādayaḥ kalpanāḥ kāryāḥ kārya tvāt aviśuddhā api śreyaḥ hetu tvāt viśuddhāḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ  mahāpralayaḥ pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ pratipattiḥ gatiḥ padeḥ gati artha tvāt  abhisaṃdhiḥ tātparyam yasya brahmaṇaḥ  nāma abhidhānam yaśa iti pūrva vākya vicchedena iti śruti vākye balīyasī prakaraṇāt  saguṇe api ca brahmaṇi iti praśaṃsā artham iti arthaḥ codayati nanu gatasya api pāramārthikī gantavya tā deśa antara viśiṣṭasya iti nyagrodha vānara dṛṣṭānta upapāditaḥ pariharati na pratiṣiddha sarva viśeṣa tvāt brahmaṇa iti ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ yathā tathā nyagrodhāvayavī pariṇāmavān upajana apāya dharmabhiḥ karma jaiḥ saṃyoga vibhāgaiḥ saṃyujyatāmayam punar  paramātmā nirasta nikhila bheda prapañcaḥ kūṭastha nityaḥ  na nyagrodhavat saṃyoga vibhāga bhāg bhavitum arhati kālpanika saṃyoga vibhāgaḥ tu kālpanikasya eva kārya brahma lokasya upapadyate na parasya śaṅkate jagat utpatti sthiti pralaya hetu tu śruteḥ iti nahi utpatti ādi hetu bhāvaḥ  apariṇāminaḥ saṃbhavati tasmāt pariṇāmi iti tathā ca bhāvikam asya upapadyate gantavya tvam iti arthaḥ nirākaroti na viśeṣa nirākaraṇa śrutinām iti viśeṣa nirākaraṇam samasta śoka ādi duḥkha śamana tayā puruṣa artha phalavat  aphalam tu utpatti ādi vidhānam tasmāt phalavataḥ saṃnidhā  āmnāyamānam tad artham eva ucyata iti upapattiḥ tad vijijñāsasva iti ca śrutiḥ tasmāt śruti upapattibhyām nirasta samasta viśeṣa brahma pratipādana paraḥ  ayam āmnāyaḥ  na tu utpatti ādi pratipādana paraḥ tasmāt na gatiḥ tāt tvikī api ca iyam gatiḥ na vicāram sahata iti āha gati kalpanāyām ca iti anya ananyatvīśrayau  avayava vikāra pakṣau anyaḥ  vā tyantam atha kasmāt ātyantikam ananya tvam na kalpyata iti ata āha atyanta tādātmya iti mṛdā ātma tayā hi svabhāvena ghaṭa ādayaḥ  bhāvāḥ tad vikārā vyāptāḥ tad abhāve na bhavanti śiṃśapā iva vṛkṣatva abhāva iti vikāra avayava pakṣayoḥ ca tadvataḥ saha vikāra avayavaiḥ sthiratvā dacala tvāt brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāra lakṣaṇam gamanam vikāra  ayavayeḥ anupapannam na hi sthira ātmakam asthiram bhavati anya an anya tve api ca ekasya virodhāt asaṃbhavantī iti bhāvaḥ atha anya eva jīvaḥ  brahmaṇaḥ tathā ca brahmaṇya saṃsarati api jīvasya saṃsāraḥ kalpyata iti etad vikalpya dūṣayati saḥ  aṇuḥ iti madhyama parimāṇatva iti madhyama parimāṇānām ghaṭa ādīnām anityatva darśanāt na mukhya ekatva iti bheda abhedayoḥ virodhinoḥ eka tra asaṃbhavāt buddhi vyapadeśa bhedāt artha bhedaḥ ayutasiddha tayā upacāreṇa abhinnamucyata iti amukhyam asya eka tvam iti arthaḥ apica jīvānām brahma avayavatva pariṇāma atyanta bheda pakṣeṣu tāttvikī saṃsārita iti muktau svabhāva hānāt jīvānām vināśa prasaṅgaḥ brahma vivartatve tu brahma eva eṣām svabhāvaḥ pratibimbānām iva bimbam tad ca avināśī iti na jīva vināśa iti āha sarveṣu eteṣu iti mata antaram upanyasyati dūṣayitum yad tu kaiścid jalpyate vinā eva brahma jñānam nitya naimittikāni iti yathā hi kapha nimittaḥ  jvara upāttasya kaphasya viśeṣaṇa ādibhiḥ prakṣaye kapha antara utpatti nimitta dadhi ādi varjane praśāntaḥ  api na punar bhavati evam karma nimittaḥ  bandha upāttānām karmaṇām upabhogāt prakṣaye praśāmyati karmānta rāmaṇām ca bandha hetūnām ananuṣṭhānāt kāraṇa abhāve kārya anupapatteḥ bandha abhāvāt svabhāva siddhaḥ  mokṣa ārogyam iva upātta durita nibarhaṇāya ca nitya naimittika karma anuṣṭhānāt durita nimitta pratyavāyaḥ  na bhavati pratyavāya anutpattau ca svastha svāntaḥ  na niṣiddhāni ācaret iti tad etad dūṣayati tad asat  pramāṇa abhāvāt iti śāstram khalu asmin pramāṇam tad ca mokṣamāṇasya ātma jñānam eva upadiśati natu uktam ācāram na ca atra upapattiḥ prabhavati saṃsārasya anāditayā karma āśayasya api asaṃkhyeyasya aniyata vipāka kālasya bhogena ucchettum aśakya tvāt iti āha na ca etad tarkayitum api iti codayati syāt etad iti nityā iti pariharati tad na virodha abhāvāt iti yadi hi nitya naimittikāni karmāṇi sukṛtam api duṣkṛtam iva nirvaheyuḥ tatas  kāmya karma upadeśā datta jala añjalayaḥ prasajyeran na hi asti kaścid cāturvarṇye cāturāśramye vā yaḥ  na nitya naimittikāni karmāṇi karoti tasmāt na eṣām sukṛta virodhitā iti abhyuccaya mātram āha na ca nitya naimittika anuṣṭhānāt iti na ca asati samyak darśane iti samyak darśī hi viraktaḥ kāmya niṣiddhe varjayan  api pramādāt upanipatite tena eva samyak darśanena kṣapayati jñāna paripāke ca na karoti eva ajñaḥ tu nipuṇaḥ  api pramādāt karoti kṛte ca na kṣapayitum kṣamata iti viśeṣaḥ na ca anabhyupagamyamāne jñāna gamye brahma ātmatva iti kartṛtva bhoktṛ tve samākṣipta kriyā bhoge te ced ātmanaḥ svabhāva avadhārite na tu āropite tatas  na śakyau  apanetum na hi svabhāvāt bhāvaḥ  avaropayitum śakyaḥ  bhāvasya vināśa prasaṅgāt  na ca bhogaḥ  api sat svabhāvaḥ śakyaḥ  asat kartum naḥ khalu nīlam anīlam śakyam śakreṇa api kartum tad idam uktam svabhāvasya aparihārya tvāt iti samāropitasya tu anirvacanīyasya tad svabhāvasya śakyaḥ tattva jñānena avaropaḥ kartum sarpasya iva rajju tattva jñānena iti bhāvaḥ bhāvam imam avidvān paricodayati syāt etad  kartṛtva bhoktṛtva kāryam iti aprakāśita bhāvaḥ  yathā uktam eva samādhatte tad ca na iti kartṛtva bhoktṛ tvayoḥ nimitta saṃbandhasya ca śakti dvāreṇa nitya tvāt bhaviṣyati kadācid eṣām samudācāraḥ  yatas  sukha duḥkhe bhojyete iti saṃbhāvanātaḥ kutas  kaivalya niścaya iti arthaḥ bhūyonirastam api mati draḍhimne punar upanyasya dūṣayati parasmāt ananya tve api iti śeṣam ati rohita artham apratīka ālambanāt nayati iti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā doṣāt tad kratuḥ ca abrahma kratavaḥ  yānti yathā pañca agni vidyayā brahma lokam prayāsyanti pratīka upāsakāḥ tathā santi hi manaḥ  brahma iti upāsīta ityādyāḥ pratīka viṣayā vidyāḥ tad vantaḥ  api arciḥ ādi mārgeṇa kārya brahma upāsakā iva gantum arhanti aaniyamaḥ sarvāsām iti aviśeṣeṇa vidyā antareṣu api gateḥ avadhāraṇāt  na ca eṣām para brahma vidām iva gati asaṃbhava iti na ca brahma kratava eva brahma loka bhājaḥ  na atat kratava iti api ekāntaḥ atad kratūnām api pañca agni vidāṃ tad prāpteḥ na ca ete na brahma kratavaḥ  manaḥ  brahma iti upāsīta ityādau sarvatra brahma anugamena tad kratu tvasya api saṃbhavāt  phala viśeṣasya brahma loka prāptau  api upapatteḥ tasya sāvayavatayā utkarṣa nikarṣa saṃbhavāt iti prāpte pratyucyate uttarottara bhūyastvāt abrahma kratu bhāvataḥ pratīka upāsakān brahma lokam nāma anavaḥ  nayet  bhavatu pañca agni vidyā yām brahma kratūnām api brahma loka nayanam vacanāt  kim iva hi vacanam na kuryāt  na asti vacanasya ati bhāra iha tu tad abhāvāt atam yathā yathā upāsate tad eva bhavati iti śruteḥ autsargikyān na asati viśeṣa vacane apavādaḥ  yujyate na ca pratīka upāsakaḥ  brahma upāste sati api brahma iti anugame kintu nāma ādi viśeṣam brahma rūpa tayā tathā khalu ayam nāma ādi tantraḥ  na brahmatantraḥ āśraya antara pratyayasya āśraya antare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ brahma āśrayaḥ ca pratyayaḥ nāma ādiṣu prakṣipta iti nāmatantraḥ tasmāt na tad upāsakaḥ  brahma kratuḥ kintu nām ādi kratuḥ na ca brahma kratu tve nāma ādi upāsakānām aviśeṣāt uttarottara utkarṣaḥ saṃbhavī na ca brahma kratuḥ tad avayava kratuḥ yena tad avayava apekṣayā utkarṣaḥ  varṇyeta tasmāt pratīka ālambanān viduṣaḥ  varjayitvā sarvān anyān vikāra ālambanāt nayatyamānavaḥ  brahma lokam na hi evam ubhayathā abhāva ubhayathārtha tve kāṃścid pratīkā ālambanāt na nayati vikāra lambanān viduṣaḥ tu nayati iti abhyupagame kaścid doṣaḥ  asti aaniyamaḥ sarvāsām iti asya nyāyasya iti sarvam avadātam iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām caturthasya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ caturthe adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svena śabdāt  prāc abhūtasya niṣpattau kartṛ tvam na sataḥ  yatas  phala tvena prasiddheḥ ca mukte rūpa antara udbhavaḥ abhūtasya ghaṭa ādeḥ bhavanam niṣpattiḥ na punar atyanta sataḥ asataḥ  vā na jātu gagana tad kusume niṣpadyete svarūpa avasthānam ced ātmanaḥ  muktiḥ na sā niṣpadyeta tasya gaganavat ati antasataḥ prāc asattva abhāvāt na ca asya bandha abhāva u niṣpadyate tasya tuccha svabhāvasya kāryatvena atucchatva prasaṅgāt  phalatva prasiddheḥ ca mokṣasya akāryasya phala tvān avakalpanāt āgantunā rūpeṇa kenacid utpattau svena iti prāptam anūdyata iti prāpte abhidhīyate saṃbhavati arthavat tve hi na anarthakyam upeyate bandhasya sat asat tvābhyām rūpam ekam viśiṣyate anadhigata avabodhanam hi pramāṇam śābdam agatyā kathañcid anuvāda tayā varṇyate sakala sāṃsārika dharma apetam tu prasannam ātma rūpam aprasannāt tasmāt eva rūpāt vyāvṛttam anadhigatam avabodhayat na anuvādaḥ  yujyate na ca asya niṣpatti asaṃbhavaḥ sata iva ghaṭa ādeḥ sāṃvyavahārikeṇa pramāṇena bandha vigamasya api niṣpatteḥ loka siddha tvāt vicāra asahatayā tu asiddhiḥ ubhayatra api tulyā na hi asat utpattum arhati iti asakṛt āveditam andhaḥ bhavati iti svapna avasthā darśitā bāhya indriya vyāpāra abhāvāt roditi iva jāgrat avasthā duḥkha śoka ādi ātmaka tvāt vināśam eva apīta iti suṣuptiḥ eva kāraḥ ca iva arthe anavadhāraṇe ātmā prakaraṇāt  nanu jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti paurvāparya śravaṇāt  sva rūpa niṣpatteḥ anyā jyotiḥ upasaṃpattiḥ tathā ca bhautika tve api na mokṣa vyāghātaḥ bhavet etad evam yadi jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya tad  parityajet iti śrūyeta tad adhyāhāre api tad pratipādana vaiyarthyam tad aparityāge ca jyotiṣā eva svena rūpeṇa iti gamyate tasya ca bhūta tve vikāra tvāt maraṇa dharmakatva prasiddheḥ amukti tvam iti prāpte pratyucyate jyotiṣpadasya mukhya tvam bhautike yadi api sthitam tathā api prakramāt vākyāt ātmani eva atra yujyate param jyotiḥ iti hi para pada samabhivyāhārāt paratvasya ca anapekṣasya brahmaṇi eva pravṛttā ijyotiṣi ca apare kiñcid apekṣya para tvāt param jyotiḥ iti vākyāt ātmā eva atra gamyate prakaraṇam ca uktam yad  saṃpadya niṣpadyata iti tad mukham vyādāya svapiti itivat  tasmāt jyotiḥ upasaṃpannaḥ  mukta iti sūktam avibhāgena dṛṣṭa tvāt  yadi api jīvātmā brahmaṇaḥ  na bhinna iti tatra tatra upapāditam tathā api sa tatra paryeti iti ādhāra ādheya bhāva vyapadeśasya saṃpattṛ saṃpattavya bhāva vyapadeśasya ca samādhāna artham āha brāhmeṇa jaiminiḥ upanyāsa ādibhyaḥ upanyāsa uddeśaḥ  jñātasya yathā ya ātma apahata pāpma ityādiḥ tathā ajñāta jñāpanam vidhiḥ yathā sa tatra paryeti jakṣat ramamāṇa  iti tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāma cāraḥ  bhavati iti etad ajñāta jñāpanam vidhiḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva īśvara iti vyapadeśaḥ na ayam uddeśaḥ  vidheya antara abhāvāt na api vidhiḥ apratipādya tvāt  siddhavat vyapadeśāt tad nirvacana sāmarthyāt ayam arthaḥ pratīyate ta ete upanyāsa ādayaḥ etebhyaḥ  hetubhyaḥ bhāva abhāva ātmakai rūpaiḥ bhāvikaiḥ parameśvaraḥ muktaḥ saṃpadyate svaiḥ iti āha sma kila jaiminiḥ na ca cit svabhāvasya ātmanaḥ  abhāva ātmānaḥ  apahata pāpma tvāt ayaḥ  bhāva ātmanaḥ ca sarvajña tvāt ayaḥ  dharmā advaitam ghnanti naḥ khalu dharmiṇaḥ  dharmā bhidyante mā bhūt gava aśvavat dharmi dharma bhāva abhāva iti jaiminiḥ ācārya uvāca citi tanmātreṇa tad ātmaka tvāt iti auḍulomiḥ aneka ākāra tā ekasya na ekatva at na eka tā bhavet  paraspara virodhena na bheda abheda saṃbhavaḥ na hi ekasya ātmanaḥ pāramārthika aneka dharma saṃbhavaḥ te ced ātmanaḥ  bhidyante dvaita āpatteḥ advaita śrutayaḥ vyāvarteram atha na bhidyante tatas  ekasmāt ātmanaḥ  abhedāt mithas  api na bhidyeran ātma rūpavat  ātma rūpam vā bhidyeta bhinnebhyaḥ  ananya tvāt nīla pīta rūpavat  na ca dharmiṇa ātmanaḥ  na bhidyante mithas tu bhidyanta iti sāmpratam dharmya bhedena tad ananya tvena teṣām api abheda prasaṅgāt  bhede vā dharmiṇaḥ  api bheda prasaṅgāt iti uktam bheda abhedau ca paraspara virodhāt ekatra abhāvāt na saṃbhavata iti upapāditam prathame sūtre abhāva rūpāṇām advaita avihantṛ tve api tasya pāpma ādeḥ kālpa nikatayā tad adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā teṣām api kālpanika tvam iti na tāttvikī tad dharmatā śliṣyate etena satya kāma sarvajña sarva īśvara tvāt ayaḥ  api aupādhikā vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt nirasta aśeṣa prapañcena avyapadeśyena caitanya mātra ātmanā abhiniṣpadyamānasya muktau  ātmanor atha śūnyaiḥ eva apahata pāpma satya kāma ādi śabdaiḥ vyapadeśa iti auḍulomiḥ mene tad idam uktam śabda vikalpa jā eva ete apahata pāpma tvāt ayaḥ  na tu sāṃvyavahārikā api iti evam api upanyāsāt pūrva bhāvāt avirodham bādarāyaṇaḥ tad etad ati śauṇḍīrya m auḍulomeḥ na mṛṣyate bādarāyaṇa ācāryaḥ  mṛṣyan  api hi tad matam evam api iti auḍulomi matam anujānāti śauṇḍīryam tu na sahata iti āha vyavahāra apekṣayā iti etad uktam bhavati satyam tāttvika ānanda caitanya mātra eva ātmā apahata pāpma satyakāmatva ādayaḥ tu aupādhika tayā tāttvikā api vyāvahārika pramāṇa upanīta tayā loka siddhā na atyanta asantaḥ  yena tad śabdā rāhoḥ śira iti vadavāstavā iti arthaḥ saṃkalpāt eva tu tad śruteḥ yatna anapekṣaḥ saṃkalpaḥ  loke vastu prasādhanaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ  atra yatnasya lāghavāt avadhāritaḥ loke hi kañcid artham cikīrṣuḥ prayatate prayatamānaḥ samīhate samīhānaḥ tam artham āpnoti iti kramaḥ  dṛṣṭaḥ na tu icchā anantaram eva asya iṣyamāṇam upatiṣṭhate tena śrutyā api loka vṛttam anurudhyamānayā viduṣaḥ tādṛśa eva kramaḥ  anumantavyaḥ avadhāraṇam tu saṃkalpāt eva iti laukikam yatna gauravam apekṣya vidyā prabhāvataḥ  viduṣaḥ  yatna lāghavāt  yad laghu tad asat kalpam iti syāt etad  yathā manoratha mātra upasthāpitā strī straiṇānām carama dhātu visarga hetuḥ evam pitṛ ādayaḥ  api asya saṃkalpa upasthāpitāḥ kalpiṣyante sva kāryāya iti ata āha na ca saṃkalpa mātra samutthāpanā iti santi hi khalu kānicid vastu svarūpa sādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strī vastu sādhyāni danta kṣata maṇi mālā ādīni kānicid tu jñāna sādhyāni yathā ukta carama dhātu visarga roma harṣa ādīni tatra manoratha mātra upanīte pitṛ ādau bhavantu tad jñāna mātra sādhyāni kāryāṇi na tu tad sādhyāni bhavitum arhanti na hi straiṇasya roma harṣa ādivat bhavanti strī vastu sādhyā maṇi mālā ādayaḥ tad idam uktam puṣkalam bhoga miti prāpte abhidhīyate pitṛ ādīnām samutthānam saṃkalpāt eva tad śruteḥ na ca anumāna bādhaḥ atra śrutyā tasya eva bādhanāt  pramāṇa antara anapekṣā hi śrutiḥ sva artham gocarayantī na pramāṇa antareṇa śakyā bādhitum anumānam eva tu sva utpādāya pakṣa dharmatva ādivat māna antara ābādhita viṣaya tvam sva sāmagrī madhya pātena apekṣamāṇam sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tad viruddhayā śrutyā bādhyate ata eva nara śiraḥ kapāla ādi śauca anumānam āgama bādhita viṣaya tayā na upapadyate tasmāt vidyā prabhāvāt viduṣām saṃkalpa mātrāt eva pitṛ ādi upasthānam iti sāṃpratam tathā āhuḥ āgaminaḥ kaḥ  hi yoga prabhāvāt ṛte agastya iva samudram pibati sa iva daṇḍaka araṇyam sṛjati tasmāt sarvam avadātam abhāvam bādariḥ āha hi evam anya yogavyat chittyā manasā iti viśeṣaṇāt  deha indriya viyogaḥ syāt viduṣaḥ  bādareḥ matam anekadhā bhāvaḥ ca ṛddhi prabhāva bhuvaḥ  manaḥ bhedāt vā stuti mātram vā kathañcid bhūma vidyāyām nirguṇāyām tad asaṃbhavāt asatā api hi guṇena stutiḥ bhavati eva iti bhāvam jaiminiḥ vikalpā mananāt  śarīra indriya bhede hi nānābhāvaḥ samañjasaḥ na ca artha saṃbhave yuktam stuti mātram anarthakam na hi manaḥ mātra bhede sphuṭa taraḥ  anekadhā bhāvaḥ  yathā śarīra indriya bhede ata eva saubhareḥ abhivinirmita vividha dehasya aparyāyeṇa māndhātṛ kanyābhiḥ pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate na ca artha saṃbhave stuti mātram anarthakam avakalpate saṃbhavati ca asya arthavat tvam yadi api nirguṇāyam idam bhauma vidyāyām paṭhyate tathā api tasyāḥ purastāt anena sa guṇa avasthā gatena aiśvaryeṇa nirguṇā eva vidyā stūyate na ca anya yoga vyavacchedena eva viśeṣaṇam yathā caitraḥ  dhanurdharaḥ tasmāt manaḥ śarīra indriya yoga aiśvarya śālinām niyamena iti mene jaiminiḥ dvādaśa ahavat ubhayavidham bādarāyaṇaḥ  atas  manasā iti kevala manaḥ viṣayām ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati iti śarīra indriya bheda viṣayām ca śrutim upalabhya aniyama vādī khalu bādarāyaṇaḥ  niyama vādau pūrvayoḥ na sahate dvividha śruti anurodhāt na ca ayoga vyavacchedena evaṃvidheṣu viśeṣaṇam avakalpyate kāmeṣu hi ramaṇam sa manaska indriyeṇa śarīreṇa puruṣāṇām siddham eva iti na asti śaṅkā manaḥ yogasya iti tad vyavacchedaḥ  vyarthaḥ siddhasya tu manaḥ yogasya tad anya parisaṃkhyānena arthavat tvam avakalpate tasmāt vāmena akṣṇā paśyati itivat atra anya yoga vyavaccheda iti sāṃpratam dvādaśa ahavat iti dvādaśa ahasya satra tvam āsana upāyi codane ahīna tvam ca yajati codane sati gamyate dvādaśa aham ṛddhi kāmā upeyuḥ iti upāyicodanena ya evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram upayanti iti ca dvādaśa ahasya satra tvam bahu kartṛkasya gamyate evam tasya eva dvādaśa ahena prajā kāmam yājayet iti yajati codanena niyata kartṛ parimāṇa tvena dvi rātreṇa yajata ityādivat ahīna tvam api gamyata iti saṃprati śarīra indriya abhāvena manaḥ mātreṇa viduṣaḥ svapnavat sūkṣmaḥ  bhogaḥ  bhavati kutas  upapatteḥ manasā etān iti śruteḥ yadi punar  suṣuptavat abhogaḥ  bhavet  na eṣā śrutiḥ upapadyeta na ca sa śarīravat upabhogaḥ śarīra ādi upādāna vaiyarthyāt  sa śarīrasya tu puṣkalaḥ  bhogaḥ iha api upapatteḥ iti anuṣañjanīyam tad idam uktam sūtrābhyām tanu abhāve saṃdhyavat upapatteḥ bhāve jāgratvat  iti pradīpavat āveśaḥ tathā hi darśayati vastutas  paramātmanaḥ  abhinnaḥ api ayam vijñāna ātmānādya vidyā kalpita prādeśika antaḥkaraṇa avacchedena anādi jīva bhāvam āpannaḥ prādeśikaḥ sanna deha antarāṇi svabhāva nirmitāni api nānā pradeśa vartīni sa antaḥkaraṇaḥ  yugapadāveṣṭum arhati na vā ātma antaram sraṣṭum api sṛjyamānasya sraṣṭratireke anātma tvāt ātma tve vā kartṛ karma bhāva abhāvāt bheda āśraya tvāt ayasya na api antaḥkaraṇa antaram tatra sṛjati sṛjyamānasya tad upādhitva abhāvāt anādinā khalu antaḥkaraṇena autpattikena ayam avaruddhaḥ  neda anīntanena antaḥkaraṇena upādhitayā saṃbaddhum arhati tasmāt yathā dāru yantram tad prayoktrā cetanena adhiṣṭhitam sat tad icchām anurudhyate evam nirmāṇa śarīrāṇi api sa indriyāṇi iti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate śarīra tvam na jātu syāt bhoga adhiṣṭhāna tām vinā sa tridhā iti śarīra tvam uktam yuktam ca tad vibhau sa tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhā iti ādikā śrutiḥ viduṣaḥ  nānābhāvam ācakṣāṇā bhinna śarīra indriya upādhi saṃbandhe avakalpate na adeha hetu  bhūta bhede na hi yantrāṇi bhinnāni nirmāya vāhayan yantra vāhaḥ  nānātvena apadiśyate bhoga adhiṣṭhāna tvam ca śarīra tvam na abhoga adhiṣṭhāneṣu yantreṣu iva yujyate tasmāt deha antarāṇi sṛjati na vānena adhiṣṭhitāni deha pakṣe vartante na ca sarva gatasya vastu tas  vigalita prāya avidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasya iva autpattika antaḥkaraṇa vaśya tā yena tad autpattikam antaḥkaraṇam āgantuka antaḥkaraṇa antara saṃbandham asya vārayet  tasmāt vidvān sarvasya vaśī sarva īśvaraḥ satya saṃkalpaḥ sa indriya manāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni ca eka pade praviśya tad tad indriyam antaḥkaraṇaiḥ teṣu lokeṣu muktaḥ  viharati iti sāṃpratam pradīpavat iti tu nidarśanam pradīpa aikyam pradīpa vyaktiṣu upacaryate bhinna varti vartinīnām bhinna vyaktīnām bhedāt  evam vidvān jīva ātmā dehabhede api eka iti parāmarśa arthaḥ eka manonuvartīni ti eka abhiprāya vartīni iti arthaḥ saṃpannaḥ kevalaḥ  mukta iti ucyate na ca etasya itthaṃbhāva saṃbhavaḥ śruti virodhāt iti uktam artha jātam ākṣipati katham punar muktasya iti salila iti salilam iva salilaḥ salila prātipadikāt sarva prātipadikebhya iti upamānāt ācāre kvipi kṛte pacāt yaci ca kṛte rūpam etad uktam bhavati yathā salilam ambhonidhau prakṣiptam tad ekībhāvam upayāti evam draṣṭā api brahmaṇā iti atra uttaram sūtram sva api aya saṃpattyoḥ anyatara apekṣam āviṣkṛtam hi āsu kāścid śrutayaḥ suṣuptim apekṣya kāścid tu saṃpattim tad adhikārāt  aiśvarya śrutayaḥ tu sa guṇa vidyā vipāka avasthā apekṣā mukti abhisaṃdhānam tu tad avasthā satteḥ yathā aruṇa darśane saṃdhyāyām divasa abhidhānam jagat vyāpāra varjam prakaraṇāt asaṃnihita tvāt ca svārājya kāma cāra ādi śrutibhyaḥ syāt niraṅkuśaḥ sva kārya īśvara adhīna siddhiḥ api atra sādhakaḥ aāpnoti svārājyama asarve asmai devāḥ  balim āvahanti asarveṣu lokeṣu kāma cāraḥ  bhavati ityādi śrutibhyaḥ  viduṣaḥ para brahmaṇa iva anyān adhīna tvam aiśvaryam avagamyate nanu asya brahma upāsana alabdham aiśvaryam katham brahma adhīnam na tu svabhāvaḥ na hi kāraṇa adhīna janmānaḥ  bhāvāḥ sva kārye sva kāraṇam apekṣante kim tu atra te svatantrā eva yathā āhuḥ mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa cakra ādi ghaṭaḥ  janmani apekṣate udaka āharaṇe tu asya tad apekṣā na vidyate na ca viduṣām parameśvara adhīna aiśvarya siddhi tvāt tad gatam aiśvaryam yena laukikā iva rājānaḥ  mahā rāja adhīnaḥ sva vyāpāre vidvāṃsaḥ parameśvara adhīnā bhaveyuḥ na khalu yad adhīna utpādam yasya rūpam tad tad rūpā dūnam bhavati iti kaścid niyamaḥ tad samānām tad adhikānām ca darśanāt tathā hi antevāsī guru adhīnavidhaḥ tad samasta dadhikaḥ  vā dṛśyate duṣṭa sāmantāḥ ca pārthiva adhīna aiśvaryāḥ pārthivān spardhamānāḥ tān vijayamānā vā dṛśyante tad iha niratiśaya aiśvarya tvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhū van vidvāṃsaḥ tatas  adhikāḥ tad samāstu bhaviṣyanti tathā ca na tad adhīnāḥ na hi sama pradhāna bhāvānām asti mithas  apekṣā tad ete svatantrāḥ santaḥ tad vyāpāre jagat sarjane api pravarteran  iti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate nitya tvāt anapekṣa tvāt  śruteḥ tad prakramāt api ekya matyāt ca viduṣām parameśvara tantra tā jagat sarga lakṣaṇam hi kāryam kāraṇa eka svabhāvasya eva hi bhavatu āhaḥ kārya kāraṇa svabhāvasya tatra ubhaya svabhāvasya sva utpattau mūla kāraṇa apekṣasya pūrva siddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇam abhyupetavya iti sa eva ekaḥ  astu jagat kāraṇam tasya eva nitya tvena sva kāraṇa anapekṣasya kḷpta sāmarthyāt  kalpya sāmarthyāḥ tu jagat sarjanam prati vidvāṃsaḥ na ca jagat sraṣṭṛ tvam eṣām śrūyate śrūyate tu atrabhavataḥ parameśvarasya eva tam eva prakṛtya sarvāsām tad śrutīnām pravṛtteḥ apica sama pradhānānām hi na niyama vada ekamatyam dṛṣṭam iti yadā ekaḥ sisṛkṣati tadā eva itaraḥ saṃjihīrṣati iti aparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭi saṃhārau syātām na ca ubhayoḥ api īśvara tvam vyāghātam ekasya tu tad ādhipatye tad abhiprāya anurodhinām sarveṣām aikamatya upapatteḥ adoṣaḥ tatra āgantukānām kāraṇa adhīna janma aiśvaryāṇām gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā samatvāt nitya aiśvarya śālinaḥ sa eva teṣām adhīśa iti tad tantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvara vyāpārasya sarga saṃhārasya na īśate pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ  anuśaya bījam āśaṅkya nirākaroti pratyakṣa upadeśāt iti ced na adhi kārika maṇḍala stha ukteḥ yatas  parameśvara adhīnam aiśvaryam tasmāt tatas  nyūna maṇima ādi mātram svārājyam na tu jadat sraṣṭṛ tvam uktān nyāyāt vikāra varti ca tathā hi sthitim āha etāvān asya mahimā iti vikāra varti rūpam uktam tatas  jyāyān  ca iti nirvikāram rūpam tathā pādaḥ  asya viśvā bhūtāni iti vikāra varti rūpam tripādasya amṛtam divi iti nirvikāram āha rūpam darśayataḥ ca apare śruti smṛtī nirvikāram eva rūpam bhagavataḥ te ca paṭhite etad uktam bhavati yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇi upāsyamāne yathā tad guṇasya niravagraha tvam api vastu tas  asti iti niravagraha tve viduṣā prāptavyam iti tad anena vyabhicārayate yathā sa vikāre brahmaṇi upāsyamāne vastutas  sthitam api nirvikāra rūpam na prāpyate tad kasya hetoḥ atatkratu tvāt upāsakasya tathā tad guṇa upāsanayā vastutas  sthitam api niravagraha tvam na āpyate tattva upāsanāsu puruṣa kratu tvāt  upāsakasya tad akratu tvam ca niravagraha tvasya upāsana vidhi agocara tvāt vidhi adhīna tvāt ca upāsanāsu puruṣa svātantrya abhāvāt svātantrye vā prātibhatva prasaṅgāt iti bhoga mātra sāmya liṅgāt ca na kevalam svārājyasya īśvara adhīna tayā jagat sarjanam sākṣāt bhoga mātreṇa tena parameśvareṇa sāmya abhidhānāt api vyapadeśa liṅgāt iti bhūtāni avanti prīṇayanti iti bhojayanti iti yāvat  sūtra antara avatāraṇāya śaṅkate nanu evam sati sa atiśaya tvāt iti saha parameśvarasya atiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryam sa atiśayam yad ca kāryam sa atiśayam tad ca yathā laukikam aiśvaryam tad anena kāryatvam uktam tathā ca kāryatvāt antavat prāptam iti tad ca na yuktam ānantyena tad viduṣām tatra pravṛtteḥ iti ata uttaram paṭhati anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt  kim arciḥ ādi mārgeṇa brahma loka prāptānām aiśvaryasya antavat tvam tvayā sādhyate āhosvit candra lokāt iva brahma lokāt etad loka prāptiḥ mukteḥ antavat tvam tatra pūrvasmin kalpe siddha sādhanam uttaratra tu śruti smṛti virodhaḥ tadvidhānām ca krama mukti pratipādanāt iti tattvam asi vākya artha eka upāsana aparān pratyāha samyak darśana vidhvastatamasām iti dvidhā avidyā tamaḥ nirupādhi brahma sākṣātkāraḥ tattva darśanam na ca etad nirvāṇam svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇam kāryam yena anityam syāt iti āha nitya siddha iti bhaṅktvā vādya surendra vṛndam akhila avidyā upadhāna atigam yena āmnāyapa yoni dheḥ naya pathā brahma amṛtam prāpyate saḥ  ayam śāṅkara bhāṣya jāta viṣayaḥ  vācaspateḥ sādaram saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatām sumatayaḥ sva artheṣu kaḥ  matsaraḥ ajñāna sāgaram tīrtvā brahma tattvam abhīpsatām nīti naukarṇa dhāreṇa mayā apūri manorathaḥ yad nyāya kaṇikā tattva samīkṣā tattva bindubhiḥ yad nyāya sāṃkhya yogānām vedāntānām nibandhanaiḥ sama caiṣam mahat puṇyam tad phalam puṣkalam mayā samarpitam atha etena prīyatām parameśvaraḥ nṛpa antarāṇām manasā api agamyām bhrū kṣepa mātreṇa cakāra kīrtim kārtasvara āsāra su pūrita artha sārthaḥ svayam śāstra vicakṣaṇaḥ ca nareśvarā yad carita anukāram icchanti kartum na ca pārayanti tasmin mahīpe mahanīya kīrtau śrīmat nṛge akāri mayā nibandhaḥ iti śrī vācaspati miśravi racite śaṅkara bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām caturthasya adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ
